40001001	Lunu niirwo olulyo lwa Yesu Kurisito omwizukulu wa Dawudi, iye eyabbaire omwizukulu wa Ibbulaimu:
40001002	OIbbulaimu yabbaire iteeye wa Isaka, oIsaka yabbaire iteeye wa Yaakobbo, era oYaakobbo yabbaire iteeye wa Yuda nʼabagandabe.
40001003	OYuda yabbaire iteeye wa Pereezi nʼoZeera, era ibo omawaabwe yabbaire Tamali. OPereezi yabbaire iteeye wa Kazirooni, era oKazirooni yabbaire iteeye wa Laamu.
40001004	OLaamu yabbaire iteeye wʼAminadaabbu, Aminadaabbu yabbaire iteeye wa Nasoni, era oNasoni yabbaire iteeye wa Salumooni.
40001005	OSalumooni yabbaire iteeye wa Bbowaazi, era iye omaaye yabbaire Lakabbu. OBbowaazi yabbaire iteeye wʼObbedi era iye omaaye yabbaire Luusi, era Obbedi yabbaire iteeye wa Yese.
40001006	OYese yabbaire iteeye wa Dawudi okabaka, era oDawudi yabbaire iteeye wa Sulemaani, oguyabyaire omu muka Wuliya.
40001007	OSulemaani yabbaire iteeye wa Lekobbwamu, era oLekobbwamu yabbaire iteeye wʼAbbiya, era Abbiya yabbaire iteeye wʼAsafu.
40001008	Asafu yabbaire iteeye wa Yokosofaati, oYokosofaati yabbaire iteeye wa Yokolaamu, era oYokolaamu yabbaire iteeye wa Wuziya.
40001009	OWuziya yabbaire iteeye wa Yosamu, oYosamu yabbaire iteeye wʼAkazi, era Akazi yabbaire iteeye wa Kezeekiya.
40001010	OKezeekiya yabbaire iteeye wa Manaase, oManaase yabbaire iteeye wʼAmoni, era Amoni yabbaire iteeye wa Yosiya.
40001011	OYosiya yabbaire iteeye wa Yekoniya nʼabagandabe. Abo babbairewo mu biseera owebatwaliire abantu bʼe Isirairi omu bugalama e Bbabbulooni.
40001012	Okuzwera nakimo omu biseera ebibatwaliiremu aBaisirairi omu busibe e Bbabbulooni paka oku kubyala oYesu, olulyo lwabwe niirwo lunu luti: OYekoniya yabbaire iteeye wa Seyalutiyeeri, era oSeyalutiyeeri yabbaire iteeye wa Zerubbabbeeri.
40001013	OZerubbabbeeri yabbaire iteeye wʼAbbiwudi, Abbiwudi yabbaire iteeye wʼEryakimu, era Eryakimu yabbaire iteeye wʼAzoli.
40001014	Azoli iye yabbaire iteeye wa Zadooki, oZadooki yabbaire iteeye wʼAkimu, era Akimu yabbaire iteeye wʼEriyudi.
40001015	Eriyudi yabbaire iteeye wʼEryezaali, Eryezaali yabbaire iteeye wa Matani, era oMatani yabbaire iteeye wa Yaakobbo.
40001016	OYaakobbo yabbaire iteeye wa Yusufu oibaaye wa Malyamu, oMalyamu eyabbaire omaaye wa Yesu, iye ogubeeta oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.
40001017	Kale emigigi gyonagyona giri ikumi nʼena, okuzwa okwIbbulaimu okutuuka oku Dawudi. Era tete giri emigigi ikumi nʼeena okuzwa oku Dawudi okutuuka oku kutwala aBaisirairi omu bugalama e Bbabbulooni. Era tete nʼegindi giri emigigi ikumi neena okuzwa oku kubatwala e Bbabbulooni okutuuka oku kubyala oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.
40001018	Atyanu okubyala oYesu Kurisito kwabbaire kuti: OMalyamu omaaye wa Yesu yabbaire ngʼasuubizire oYusufu ati ayaba okumufumbirwa era nga kimanyikaine. Neye ngʼakaali okumufumbirwa, ni kitegerekeka ngʼali kida, neye ngʼoMwoyo oMweru niiye eyamwezeserye okukisuna.
40001019	Neye olwakubba oYusufu eyabbaire ayaba okubba oibaaye, yabbaire muntu atuukiriire, era nga tataka okumuswaza omu lwatu, nʼaseega kumulekawo mu kyama.
40001020	Yabbaire akaali aseega atyo, omalaika wa Musengwa oKibbumba nʼamubonekera omu kirooto nʼamukoba ati, “Yusufu, omwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi, tiwaatya okutwala oMalyamu okubba omukaliwo olwakubba, ekida ekyali nakyo oMwoyo oMweru niiye eyamwezeserye okukisuna.
40001021	Era ayaba okubyala omwana mwisuka, era bamwerula bati Yesu, olwakubba niiye eyalirokola abantu okuzwa omu bikole byabwe ebibbibibbi.”
40001022	Era ebyo byonabyona byabbairewo, kaisi oolwo oMusengwa oKibbumba ekiyatumwire ngʼabitira omu naabbi kituukirire ekikoba kiti:
40001023	“Muwulisisye! Omwala omuguna yalibba ekida, era yalibyala omwana mwisuka. Era balimwerula eriina bati Manweri,” amakulu gaalyo gati, “OKibbumba ali na iswe.”
40001024	Era oYusufu oweyalamukire, nʼakola ngʼomalaika oyo oweyamulagiire era nʼatwala oMalyamu e ika e wuwe nʼabba mukaliwe.
40001025	Neye tiyeegaitire naye paka oweyabyaire, era oYusufu nʼayerula omwana oyo ati Yesu.
40002001	OYesu owebamubyaliire omu kibuga e Bbeserekeemu, omwitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya, oKerode yabbaire niiye okabaka wʼeitwale eryo. Era abasaiza abeetegereza ebyʼenkota ni bazwera omu kyalo kyʼe buzwaisana, ni baaba omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi.
40002002	Kale eeyo ni babuulya abantu bati, “Omwana ogubabyaire okubba okabaka wʼaBayudaaya ali nkonaki? Twaboine onkota alaga ati bamubyaire ngʼaizira eenu, kale twizire kusinza mwana oyo nago.”
40002003	Awo abantu owebakobeire okabaka oKerode ebintu ebyo, ni yeeraliikirira, era nʼabantu abakira obungi omu Yerusaalemi ni beeraliikirira.
40002004	Kale awo oKerode nʼakumbaania abakabona abakulu bonabona, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, kaisi nʼababuulya ati, “ OKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta iye babbaire nʼokumubyala yaina?”
40002005	Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Balimubyala mu kibuga e Bbeserekeemu, omwitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya. Ekyo kityo olwakubba onaabbi yakiwandiikire ati:
40002006	‘Inywe abantu bʼomu kibuga Bbeserekeemu ekyʼomu Buyudaaya, ekibuga kyanywe tiniikyo ekisembayo okubba ekyʼekitiisya omu Buyudaaya, olwakubba mwikyo mwalizwamu omufugi, iye yakubbemberanga abantu bange abʼe Isirairi.’ ”
40002007	Kale awo oKerode nʼayeta abasaiza abo abeetegereza ebyʼenkota, nʼababuulya mu kyama ekiseera ekinanyerenyeere onkota ekiyabonekeiremu.
40002008	Awo nʼabatuma e Bbeserekeemu ngʼabakoba ati, “Mwabe munoonererye nakusani omwana oyo, era owemwabba nga mumuboine, mwaira ni munkobera egyali zena ni njaba ni mmusinza.”
40002009	Atyanu owebamalire okuwulira ebibono bya kabaka oKerode ni baaba. Awo ni bairamu okubona onkota onyere oyo ogubabbaire baboine e buzwaisana. Cooka owebaboine onkota oyo nago ni basangaalira nakimo ino. Era onkota oyo yabeekubbembereire paka oweyatuukire nʼayemerera e ngulu wʼenyumba omwana omu yabbaire.
40002011	Kale abasaiza abo owebatuukire ni baingira omu nyumba, era ni babona omwana ngʼali nʼomaaye oMalyamu, bakomere amazwi ni basinza omwana oyo. Awo ni basindibula emigangi gyabwe, era ni bamutonera ebirabo. Bamutoneire ezaabbu, nʼobubbaani nʼebyakaloosa ebibeeta miira.
40002012	Neye olwakubba oKibbumba yabbaire abalabwire omu kirooto ati tibakanga egiri oKerode, kale owebabbaire bakanga omu kyalo kyʼe waabwe babitiire mu nzira gendi.
40002013	Awo abasaiza abeetegereza ebyʼenkota owebazwire e Bbeserekeemu, omalaika wa Musengwa oKibbumba nʼabonekera oYusufu omu kirooto, nʼamukoba ati, “Osetuke, oyanguweku otwale omwana nʼomaaye mwirukire omu kyalo kyʼe Misiri. Era mubbe eeyo paka owenalibakoba okuzwayo olwakubba oKerode ayaba okunoonia omwana okumwita.”
40002014	Kale awo oYusufu obwire obwo nʼasetuka nʼakwata omwana nʼomaaye ni baaba e Misiri.
40002015	Era ni babba eeyo paka oKerode oweyafiire. Ebyo byabbairewo kaisi oMusengwa oKibbumba ekiyatumwire ngʼabitira omu naabbi kituukirire, ekikoba kiti: “Nayetere omwana wange okuzwa omu Misiri.”
40002016	Awo oKerode oweyamanyicirye ati abasaiza abeetegereza ebyʼenkota bamubbeyere-bubbeyi, nʼanyiiga ino. Kale nʼatuma abaisulukale okwita abaana abaisuka bonabona omu Bbeserekeemu nʼomu byalo ebikyeruguuliriirye, abo ababbaire abʼemyanka emibiri nʼokwika ansi. Ekyo yakikolere ngʼasinzirira ku kiseera abasaiza badi nago ekibamukobeire ekibaboneiremu onkota.
40002017	Ekyo oKerode ekiyakolere kyatuukiriirye kiikyo oKibbumba ekiyatumwire ngʼabitira omu naabbi Yeremiya, ekikoba kiti:
40002018	“Abantu bawulira amazingo nʼokukuukulya okwʼamaani omu kibuga e Laama. OLakeeri akunga olwʼabaanabe, era tataka okumusirica. Ekyo kityo olwakubba abaanabe abantu babamalirewo.”
40002019	Kale oluzwanyuma oKerode oweyafiire, omalaika wa Musengwa oKibbumba nʼabonekera oYusufu omu kirooto ngʼali e Misiri.
40002020	Nʼakoba oYusufu ati, “Osetuke, okanje omwana nʼomaaye, omu kyalo kyʼe Isirairi olwakubba oodi abbaire anoonia omwana okwita afiire.”
40002021	Awo oYusufu nʼakwata omwana nʼomaaye na bakanja e Isirairi.
40002022	Neye oYusufu oweyawuliire ati Alukeraawo niiye ogubasikisirye oiteeye oKerode era niiye afuga eitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya, awo nʼatya okwaba omwitwale eryo. Neye oluzwanyuma oKibbumba oweyamulabwire olundi omu kirooto tete, awo nʼayaba mwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya.
40002023	Kale ni baaba ni babba batyami bʼomu kibuga ekibeeta Naazaleesi. Ekyo kyabbaire kityo kaisi onaabbi ekiyatumwire oku Kurisito kituukirire, ekikoba kiti: “Balimweta owʼe Naazaleesi.”
40003001	Omu naku egyo, oYokaana oMubatizi nʼayaba omu kitera ekyʼe Buyudaaya, era nʼalaabba obukwenda bwa Kibbumba eeri abantu.
40003002	Obukwendabwe bwabbaire buti, “Mwenenye, olwakubba obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu bwigereire.”
40003003	OYokaana oyo, niiye onaabbi oIsaaya oguyatumwireku ati: “Waliwo atumulira omu kitera nʼeigono eryaminkirira ati, ‘Mutegeke oluguudo lwa Musengwa aiza, mutereerye amanzirage.’ ”
40003004	OYokaana oyo, yazwalanga ekizwalo ekibakolere omu byoya bya kisolo ogubeeta ongamira, ngʼomu nkende yeesiba musipi gwʼeidiba. Era yaalyanga nzige nʼomujenene gwʼenzoki egyʼomu kigona.
40003005	Awo abantu ni bazwanga omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, nʼomu byalo byʼomu Buyudaaya mwonamwona, nʼomu byalo ebyeruguuliriirye oMwiga oYoludaani, ni baabanga egiri oYokaana,
40003006	ni babbutulanga ebikole byabwe ebibbibibbi era nʼababatiziranga omu mwiga oYoludaani.
40003007	Neye oYokaana oweyaboine ngʼaBafalisaayo nʼaBasedukaayo bangi baaba egyali okubabatiza, nʼabakoba ati, “Inywe abakabbikabbi ooti mpiri enfulugundu! Naani abalabwire ati enu niiyo engeri eyʼokwiruka obusungu bwa Kibbumba obwaba okwiza?
40003008	Aale atyanu mukole ebikole ebiraga biti dala mwenenyere ebikole byanywe ebibbibibbi.
40003009	Era timwaseega muti mwezya okubunuka nga mukoba muti, ‘Kasita iswe tuli baizukulu ba Ibbulaimu,’ olwakubba mbakobera nti omu mabbaale ganu, oKibbumba ayezya okusuuciryamu oIbbulaimu abaizukulu abandi.
40003010	Mumanye muti muli ooti misaale, nga nʼamambaizi agagitema bamalire okugabiikirya oku kikolo kya buli musaale. Ogwo ogutaneneka ebineneka ebisa baaba kugutema, era bagudyake omu musyo.
40003011	Nze mbabatiza na maizi okulaga nti mwenenyere, neye waliwo ankiraku obwezye aali kwiza oluzwanyuma lwange, oguntasaanira naire okusibindula obusibiro bwʼengaitogye ni ngitoola omu bigerebye. Iye, yalibabatiza na Mwoyo oMweru era na musyo.
40003012	Iye ayaba okwabulamu abantu ooti muntu owaakwata olugali nʼasenyenta, empeke nʼebisusungu. Empeke igyo yaligikumbaanirya omu kideerokye, kaisi ibyo ebisusungu nʼabyoca nʼomusyo ogutalikira.”
40003013	Awo oYesu nʼazwa omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya, nʼayaba oku mwiga oYoludaani egiri oYokaana okumubatiza.
40003014	Neye oYokaana nʼagezyaku okuloberya oYesu ngʼamukoba ati, “Nze neetaaga niiwe okumbatiza, tete iwe wena oiza giri ninze nkubatize?”
40003015	Neye iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Oganye kibbe kityo omu kiseera kinu, ikyo kituuce iswe okukola obutuukirirye bwonabwona.” Kale awo oYokaana nʼaikirirya okubatiza oYesu.
40003016	Amangu ago ngʼoYesu bankamubatiza, nʼazwa omu maizi, era omu kiseera ekinanyere ekyo eigulu ni lyeigula, oYesu nʼabona oMwoyo wa Kibbumba ngʼaika ooti njiiwa, era nʼayemerera oku Yesu.
40003017	Era eigono ni lizwa omwigulu, nga likoba liti, “Oyo niiye oMwana wange omutake era ogunsiima eino.”
40004001	Ebyo owebyawoire, oMwoyo oMweru nʼatwala oYesu omu kitera oSitaani okumukema.
40004002	OYesu oluzwanyuma lwʼokumala enaku 40 nga talya omusana nʼobwire, awo enzala nʼemuluma.
40004003	Kale oSitaani iye omukemi nʼayaba egiri oYesu era nʼamukoba ati, “Ngʼoli Mwana wa Kibbumba, aale olagire amabbaale ganu gasuuke kyokulya.”
40004004	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Bakiwandiikire bati: ‘Omuntu tabba mwomi omu bwizulye ngʼalya kyokulya kyonkani, neye yeetaaga nabuli kibono oKibbumba ekyatumula.’ ”
40004005	Awo oSitaani nʼatwala oYesu omu kibuga ekyeru, kaisi nʼamuniinisya oku kisooto kyʼeYeekaalu.
40004006	Awo nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Ngʼoli Mwana wa Kibbumba, ojuuke ogwe ansi olwakubba bakiwandiikire bati: ‘OKibbumba yalagiranga abamalaikabe okukukuuma, era balikubbaka omu ngalo gyabwe, kaisi nandi ni weekontola ekigerekyo okwibbaale.’ ”
40004007	OYesu nʼairamu ati, “Era bakiwandiikire bati: ‘Tokemanga oMusengwa oKibbumbawo.’ ”
40004008	Tete oSitaani nʼalungamya oYesu okuniina angulu oku lusozi oluwanvu eino, nʼamulagisya obwakabaka obwʼamawanga gonagona obwʼoku kyalo nʼebintu ebyʼamaani byonabyona ebirimu.
40004009	Kaisi awo oSitaani nʼamukoba ati, “Atyanu ebyo byonabyona njaba okubikuwa singa oikirirya okunkomera amazwi nʼonsinza.”
40004010	Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Sitaani! Onzwe omu maiso, bakiwandiikire bati: ‘Osinzenge Musengwa oKibbumbawo, era guwaweereryanga yenkani.’ ”
40004011	Kale oSitaani nʼazwawo nʼaleka oYesu, era abamalaika ni baiza ni bamulabirira.
40004012	Awo oYesu oweyawuliire ati oYokaana omubatizi bamwigaliire omu mabbuusu, nʼazwa e Yerusaalemi nʼakanga omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya.
40004013	Awo nʼazwa omu kabuga kʼe Naazaleesi nʼayaba nʼabba mutyami omu kibuga e Kaperenawumu ekiri oku nyanza omu bitundu byʼeigwanga lya Zabbulooni nʼebya Nafutaali.
40004014	Ekyo kyabbairewo kaisi oolwo oKibbumba ekiyatumwire ngʼabitira omu naabbi oIsaaya kituukirire, ekikoba kiti:
40004015	“Inywe abantu bʼomu bitundu byʼe Zabbulooni, nʼoNafutaali, ebiri okumpi nʼenyanza oGaliraaya oku lubba lwʼomwiga oYoludaani, abantu ababba omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya eeyo aBatali Bayudaaya egibabba.
40004016	Abantu abali omu ndikiirya baboine ekitangaala ekyʼamaani. Era nʼabafu omu myoyo, ekitangaala kibaakiire.”
40004017	Okuzwa omu kiseera ekyo, oYesu nʼatandiika okulaabba eeri abantu ati, “Mwenenye olwakubba obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu bwigereire.”
40004018	Lumo, oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼabita oku mbale kwʼenyanza oGaliraaya, nʼabona abaganda babiri, oSimooni ogubeeta oPeetero nʼomugandawe Andereya. Babbaire batega akatimba omu nyanza olwakubba babbaire bazibuli.
40004019	Awo oYesu nʼabeeta ati, “Mwize mubbe beegi bange! Nalibasuuca bazibuli bʼabantu omu kifo kya bazibuli bʼenyanyi.”
40004020	Amangu ago ni baleka aawo obutimba bwabwe, ni baaba naye.
40004021	Oweyazwire awo ni yeeyongeraku omu maiso, oYesu nʼabona abantu abandi babiri abaganda, oYaakobbo nʼoYokaana abataane ba Zebedaayo. Babbaire bali omu lyato nʼoitewaabwe oZebedaayo nga bakwania obutimba bwabwe, awo oYesu nʼabeeta babbe beegibe.
40004022	Era amangu ago ni baleka aawo eryato nʼoitewaabwe, ni baaba nʼoYesu.
40004023	Awo oYesu nʼatambula omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya lyonalyona ngʼayegesya omu makumbaaniro gaabwe, ngʼalaabba eeri abantu aMawuliro aMasa agʼobwakabaka bwʼomwigulu, era ngʼalamya abantu buli ndwaire nʼobunafu omu mubiri.
40004024	Kale amawuliro agamukwataku ni gasalaanira omu kyalo kyʼe Siiriya mwonamwona. Era ni bamuleeteranga abalwaire abʼendwaire egitali gimo, nʼababbaire bakaanya obulumi obubitiriri, nʼabaliku emizimu, nʼabʼempimbu, nʼabasanyalaire, bonabona nʼabalamyanga.
40004025	Awo ebiyindi byʼabantu bingi ino okuzwa omu Galiraaya nʼomwitwale lyʼe Dekapooli, nʼomu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, nʼomu Buyudaaya, era nʼoku lubba lwʼe buzwaisana lwʼomwiga oYoludaani ni bamusengererya.
40005001	Awo oYesu oweyaboine ekiyindi kyʼabantu kinene nga kiigerera egyali, nʼaniinaniina oku lusozi era nʼatyama okwegesya, awo abeegibe ni bakumbaanira egyali okumuwulisisya.
40005002	Kaisi nʼatandiika okubeegesya ati,
40005003	“Bʼenkabi abadoobi omu bwomi bwabwe obwʼomwoyo olwakubba abo obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu ibwo bwabwe.
40005004	Bʼenkabi abo abakunga, olwakubba oKibbumba yalibasaninkirirya.
40005005	Bʼenkabi abo abeiwooyo, olwakubba oKibbumba yalibawa byonabyona ebiyabasuubizire.
40005006	Bʼenkabi abo abeegomba eino okukola oKibbumba ebyataka ooti muntu enzala nʼenyonta ogweruma, olwakubba oKibbumba yalibaikutya.
40005007	Bʼenkabi abo abakola ebyʼekisa, olwakubba oKibbumba yalibakwatira ekisa.
40005008	Bʼenkabi abo abaseega ku biibyo oKibbumba ebyasiima byonkani, olwakubba ibo balibona oKibbumba.
40005009	Bʼenkabi abo ababbeera abantu okusyania, olwakubba abo oKibbumba yalibeeta baanabe.
40005010	Bʼenkabi abo abantu abebayigaania olwʼokukola oKibbumba ebyataka, olwakubba abo obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu ibwo bwabwe.”
40005011	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Muli bʼenkabi singa abantu owebabazumanga, era owebabayigaanianga, era owebabatumulangaku ebibbibibbi olwakubba muli beegi bange.
40005012	Kale ebyo owebibbangawo mujaagaanenge era musangaalenge ino, olwakubba oKibbumba yalibawa empeera eyʼamaani omwigulu. Kyalibba kityo nakimo ngʼoKibbumba oweyawaire abanaabbi empeera abo ababbairewo nga inywe mukaali okubbaawo, ibo abazeiza baanywe abebayigaanirye.”
40005013	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba abeegibe ati, “Inywe oku kyalo kunu mugasa abantu ooti muunyu omugaanike owegugasa omu byokulya. Neye singa gusuuka mujaalaali, bagwiryamu batya ensa? Gubba tigukaali gugasa omu kintu kyonakyona, okutoolaku okugudyaka-obudyaki eedi abantu ni bagwemyagira eeyo.
40005014	“Niinywe ekitangaala ekyʼoku kyalo abantu ekibatakaya okubona. Kityo nakimo ngʼowebatakaya okubona ekibuga ekibombekere oku lusozi.
40005015	Era abantu tibakwatisya eitaala kaisi ni balifuunikaku ekiibo, wazira balyanika ku kikondo, ni limolekera buli muntu abba omu nyumba.
40005016	Kale omu ngeri enanyere eyo, ekitangaala kyanywe kyakenge kityo omu bantu, kaisi babone ebikole byanywe ebisa, era olwʼebyo bawuujanga oItewaanywe aali omwigulu.”
40005017	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Muleke okuseega muti naizire oku kyalo kuvunawo Mateeka ga Musa waire Biwandiike byʼabanaabbi. Nze tinaizire kubivunawo, wazira naizire kaisi ebyo bituukirire.
40005018	Mbakobera amazima, eigulu nʼekyalo nga bikaali biriwo, waire akasale akatyayi eino akʼoku kanyukuta akamo oku Mateeka ga Musa tikaligotaku paka byonabyona ebyo ebiri nʼokutuukirira nga bituukiriire.
40005019	Kale atyanu buli avunaku erimo oku Mateeka, waire liiryo erisembayo obutono, era nʼokwegesya nʼayegesya abantu okukola batyo, oyo oKibbumba yalimutwala okubba tiwamugaso omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu. Neye oyo akwata aMateeka ago era nʼayegesya nʼabandi okugakwata, oyo oKibbumba yalimutwala okubba wa mugaso ino omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu.
40005020	Nʼolwekyo mbakobera nti singa obutuukirirye bwanywe owebutakirengeku obwo obwʼaBafalisaayo nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa timwalingira omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu.”
40005021	Tete oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Mumaite muti oKibbumba yakobere abazeiza baanywe ati, ‘Tiwaitanga omuntu; eyaitanga omuntu balimusingisya omusango.’
40005022	Neye nze mbakoba nti buli omuntu asunguwalira omuntu omwinaye, balimusingisya omusango. Era buli muntu yenayena azuma omwinaye ati, ‘Obula omugaso’ balimutwala okumuwozesya omu Lukiiko oLufugi olwʼaBayudaaya. Neye buli oyo eyazumanga omwinaye ati ‘Oli musiru,’ oKibbumba yalimusindika omu geyeena.
40005023	“Kale atyanu owoobbanga otwaire ekirabokyo oku kyoto, kaisi ni weewukirirya yeeyo omwinawo oguwanyiizire,
40005024	kisa oleke awo ekirabokyo omu maiso gʼekyoto. Osooke oyabe osyanie naye, kaisi okange oweeyo ekirabokyo.”
40005025	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera tete ati, “Omuntu yenayena owakuwaabiranga, osyanie naye mangu nga mukaali muli naye mu nzira nga mwaba omu kooti. Owootakola otyo, akuwaabiire yalikuwaayo e wʼomulamuzi, era nʼomulamuzi nʼakuwaayo egiri omwisulukale, era nʼomwisulukale nʼakuteeka omu mabbuusu.
40005026	Era nkukobera amazima nti, owewalituuka oomwo, tiwalizwamu paka owewalisasula empiiya gyonagyona egyʼomugaito.”
40005027	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okwegesya ati, “Mumaite muti oKibbumba yakobere ati, ‘Tiwayendanga.’
40005028	Neye nze mbakoba nti buli alingirira omukali olwʼokwegomba okwegaita naye, oyo abba abbengere ogwʼobulendi omu biseegobye.
40005029	Abba ngʼeriisolyo eryʼoku ngalo endiiro niiryo erikuzweraku okukola ekikole ekibbikibbi, olyokolemu era olimume eedi. Kikiraku iwe okufiirwa ekimo oku bitundu byʼomubirigwo, okukiraku omubirigwo gwonagwona oKibbumba okugusindika omu geyeena.
40005030	Era singa engaloyo endiiro niiyo ekuzweraku okukola ekikole ekibbikibbi, ogitemeku era ogimume eedi. Kikugasa iwe okufiirwa ekimo oku bitundu byʼomubirigwo, okukiraku omubirigwo gwonagwona oKibbumba okugusindika omu geyeena.”
40005031	Era tete oYesu ni yeeyongera okwegesya ati, “Bakiwandiikire omu Mateeka bati, ‘Buli muntu abbinga omukaliwe, amuwenge ekiwandiiko ekikakasa kiti amubbingire.’
40005032	Neye nze mbakoba nti buli abbinga omukaliwe, azweraku omukali oyo okubba mulendi okutoolaku ngʼamubbingire lwa bulendi. Era omusaiza yenayena atwala omukali oyo ogubabbingire, abba abbengere ogwʼobulendi.”
40005033	Awo tete oYesu ni yeeyongera okwegesya ati, “Tete mumaite muti oKibbumba eira yakobere abazeiza baanywe ati, ‘Tolayiranga ebyobubbeyi, neye ebyosuubiza oMusengwa oKibbumba omu kirayiro, obituukiriryenge.’
40005034	Neye nze mbakoba nti, tolayiranga kadi katyayi kati, waire okulayira ngʼoijuluza eigulu, olwakubba niiyo entebe ya Kibbumba.
40005035	Waire okulayira ngʼoijuluza ekyalo kinu, olwakubba ekyalo niikyo omukonkolo oKibbumba ogwawuumuliryaku ebigerebye. Waire okulayira ngʼoijuluza eriina lyʼekibuga oYerusaalemi, olwakubba niikyo ekibuga oKibbumba iye okabaka omukulu ekyafuga.
40005036	Era tolayiranga waire ngʼowaayo omutwegwo, olwakubba iwe toyezya okucuusa erangi ya nziiri omoiza okubba enjeru ooba enjirugazu.
40005037	Wazira mukobenge muti, ‘Niikyo’ nga mutegeeza muti ‘niikyo,’ ooba muti, ‘bbe’ nga mutegeeza muti, ‘bbe.’ Ebindi byonabyona ebimwongerangaku byabbanga bizwire wa Mubbimubbi oSitaani.”
40005038	Era awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okwegesya ati, “Mwawuliire eiteeka erikoba liti, ‘Eyatoolangamu omwinaye eriiso yena bamutoolangamu liiso. Era nʼeyabbongolangamu omwinaye eriino yena bamubbongolangamu liino.’
40005039	Neye nze mbakoba nti, Timwanyaaŋanga, wazira omuntu owakukubbanga okwitama eryʼoku ngalo endiiro, omucuusiranga nʼerindi lidi lyona nʼakubba.
40005040	“Era singa omuntu yenayena owaatakanga okuwozya na iwe atwale esaatiyo omulekeranga nʼekizibaawokyo kyona.
40005041	Era omuntu yenayena owakukakanga okutambula naye ekiromita emoiza nʼekitundu, otambulanga naye ekiromita isatu.
40005042	Kaisi omuntu owakusabanga ekintu omuwanga, era omuntu owaatakanga iwe okumukoopa ekintu, omukoopanga.”
40005043	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okwegesya ati, “Mwawuliire eiteeka erikoba liti: ‘Otakenge omuntu omwinawo, era ocaawenge omulabewo.’
40005044	Neye nze mbakoba nti, mutakenge abalabe baanywe, era musabirenge abo ababayigaania.
40005045	Era owemwakolanga mutyo mwabbanga mulagire muti muli baana ba Itewaanywe aali omwigulu. Ekyo kityo olwakubba ayakisya eisana eeri abakola ebisa nʼabakola ebibbibibbi, era atonyesya oikendi eeri abatuukirirye nʼabatali batuukirirye.
40005046	Aale singa owemutaka baabo ababataka bonkani, mubba musuubira oKibbumba kubawa mpeera eetya? Ibo abasolooji ba musolo inywe abemweta muti bakola ebibbibibbi bona kaisi tibataka baabo ababataka?
40005047	Era singa owemubbanga mulonsyaku nʼaboluganda baanywe bonkani, mubba mpaawo kimukolere okukiraku badi ibo abandi. Era nʼabantu aBatali Bayudaaya bona tibakola batyo?
40005048	“Kale atyanu inywe mubbenge batuukirirye, ngʼoItewaanywe aali omwigulu owaali mutuukirirye.”
40006001	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Mwegendereze okutakolanga ebikole byanywe ebyobutuukirirye omu lwatu kaisi abantu bababone. Singa owemukola mutyo, oItewaanywe oKibbumba aali omwigulu tiyalibawa empeera.
40006002	Kale owemugabiranga abadoobi, timwewuujanga ooti bananfunsi owebakola omu makumbaaniro nʼomu nguudo, kaisi abantu babawe ekitiisya. Mbakobera amazima nti, empeera yaabwe eyʼokusuna ekitiisya omu bantu babba bagisunire mu bwizulye.
40006003	Neye iwe owoogabiranga abadoobi, tokimanyikisyanga omuntu ogondi yenayena,
40006004	olwʼokugabakwo okubba kwʼekyama. Olwo kaisi oIteewo oKibbumba abona ebikole byʼomu kyama yalikuwa empeera.”
40006005	Awo era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Era owemubbanga musaba oKibbumba, timwabbanga ooti bananfunsi, olwakubba ibo bataka okusaba nga beemereire omu makumbaaniro nʼomu mansanganzira gʼenguudo, kaisi abantu bababone. Mbakobera amazima nti empeera yaabwe eyʼokusuna ekitiisya omu bantu babba bagisunire omu bwizulye.
40006006	Neye owekubba kusaba, oingirenge omu kisengekyo, nʼoigalawo olwigi, kaisi nʼosaba oIteewo oKibbumba iye ataboneka. Era oIteewo oyo abona ebikole byʼomu kyama yalikuwa empeera.
40006007	“Era owemubbanga musaba, timwakolesyanga ebibono ebingi ebinambulamu makulu ooti bantu abataikiririrya omu Kibbumba owebakola. Ekyo kityo olwakubba baseega bati abakibbumba baabwe babawulira lwʼebibono byabwe ebingi.
40006008	Kale inywe timwasabanga ooti niibo, olwakubba oItewaanywe amaite ebimwetaaga, nga mukaali nʼokumusaba.
40006009	“Kale atyanu mumusabenge muti, ‘Itewaiswe aali omwigulu, eriinalyo baliwe ekitiisya,
40006010	obwakabakabwo bwize. Ebyotaka babikole oku kyalo ngʼowebiri omwigulu.
40006011	Otuwe buli lunaku ekyokulya ekitwetaaga.
40006012	Era otusoniye ebibbibibbi byaiswe, nga swena owetusoniya abatukola ebitulumya.
40006013	Era tiwatuleka okugwa omu bikemo, wazira otulamye eeri omubbimubbi.’
40006014	“Singa musoniya abantu ababakola ebibalumirirya, oItewaanywe aali omwigulu nywena abasoniya.
40006015	Neye singa timubasoniya, oItewaanywe yena tabasoniya ebikole byanywe ebibbibibbi.”
40006016	Awo era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Era owemusiibanga, timwabbanga bayungubali omu maiso ooti bananfunsi owebabba, olwakubba ibo bayungubala kaisi abantu bababone bati basiiba. Mbakobera amazima nti babba bamalire okusuna empeera yaabwe omu bwizulye eyʼokusuna ekitiisya omu bantu.
40006017	Neye inywe owekubba kusiiba, musanyuluzenge enziiri gyanywe, ni munaaba nʼomu maiso.
40006018	Mukolenge mutyo kaisi abantu ni bateezya okumanya bati musiiba, okutoolaku oItewaanywe iye ataboneka. Era oItewaanywe iye abona omu kyama inywe yalibawa empeera.”
40006019	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okutumula nʼabeegibe ati, “Timwebisiranga obusuni oku kyalo kunu ebiwuuka nʼokutalaga okubyezya okububebenyera, era abaibbi egibeezya okuvuna ni babwibba.
40006020	Neye mwebisirenge obusuni mwigulu, ebiwuuka nʼokutalaga egibiteezya okububebenyera, era abaibbi egibateezya okuvuna ni babwibba.
40006021	Ekyo kityo olwakubba obusunibwo egibubba, nʼomwoyogwo gwona niiyo egigubba.”
40006022	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Era amaiso gali ooti itaala lyʼomubiri. Kale singa amaisogo gabba moomi, omubirigwo gwonagwona gwizula ekitangaala.
40006023	Neye amaisogo owegatabba moomi, omubirigwo gwonagwona gwizula ndikiirya. Kale singa ekitangaala mwiwe owekibba ndikiirya, leero endikiirya eyo ebba yenkana eetya!”
40006024	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okwegesya ati, “Mpaawo muweererya ayezya okuweererya abasengwa ababiri. Kiri kiti ali nʼokulaga okutaka kunene eeri omoiza okukiraku eeri ogondi, ooba yalyesibira oku moiza, nʼatala ogondi. Kale tikyezyeka okubba nʼoKibbumba aamo nʼempiiya bonabona nga basengwabo.
40006025	“Kagira mbakoba nti timweraliikiriranga omu bwomi bwanywe olwʼekyokulya ooba ekyokunywa newankubbaire olwʼekyokuzwala. Ekyo kityo olwakubba obwomi ibwo bwʼebbeeyi okukiraku ekyokulya. Era nʼomubiri gwona gwʼebbeeyi okukiraku ebyokuzwala.
40006026	Aale mubone enyonyi, igyo tigisiga, waire kukungula tigikungula, era tigibba kadi nʼekideero. Neye oItewaanywe aali omwigulu agiwa ekyokulya. Olwo inywe timuli bamugaso ino okukiraku enyonyi?
40006027	Era naani kwinywe oweyeeraliikirira, ayezya okwongeraku waire ekiseera ekityai kiti oku kuwangaalakwe?
40006028	“Era lwaki mweraliikirira olwʼebizwalo? Aale kaade mubonere oku ngeri ebimuli egibikulamu. Cooka ibyo tibikola waire kwetungira bizwalo.
40006029	Neye mbakobera nti nʼewankubbaire okabaka oSulemaani omu kitiisyakye kyonakyona, tiyazwaireku okuboneka kusani okutuukiryaku ngʼebimuli owebibba.
40006030	Neye obanga oKibbumba azwalisya kusani atyo ebimuli ibyo ebibbaawo atyanu eizo ni babyoca, tiyalikirawo ino okubazwalisya inywe abaliku nʼokwikirirya okutono?
40006031	“Kale timweraliikiriranga nga mukoba muti, ‘Twalya niki?’ ooba muti, ‘Twanywa niki?’ ooba muti, ‘Twazwala niki?’
40006032	Ekyo kityo olwakubba ibyo ebyo byonabyona abantu abataikirirya omu Kibbumba niibyo ebibemaliramu, neye inywe iye oItewaanywe owʼomwigulu amaite ati ebyo byonabyona mubyetaaga.
40006033	Neye ekikira nakimo, mwemalirenge mu kunoonia bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba era nʼebyataka mukole, kaisi era musune byonabyona ebyo ebimwetaaga.
40006034	Kale timweraliikiriranga olwʼebyabbaawo eizo. Eizo lwabba nʼebyokweraliikirira ebyalwo. Buli lunaku lubbaaku ebyokweraliikirira ebyalwo.”
40007001	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okwegesya abeegibe ati, “Timusaliranga abantu emisango, kaisi nywena oKibbumba tiyabasalira.
40007002	Ekyo kityo olwakubba, ngʼowemusalira abandi emisango, nywena webalibasalira. Era ekipimo ekimukolesya omu kusalira abandi emisango, niikyo ekinyere ekyo ekibalikolesya okubasalira nywena emisango.
40007003	Kale lwaki ofaayo oku kasubi akali oku liiso lya mugandawo, kaisi nandi nʼofaayo oku gusubi oguli oku liisolyo?
40007004	Oyezya otya okukoba omugandawo oti, ‘Oleke nkutooleku akasubi oku liisolyo,’ kaisi ngʼoku liryo kuliku ogusubi?
40007005	Munanfunsi iwe, osooke kutoola gusubi oguli oku liryo, oolwo kaisi oyezye okubona nakusani okutoola akasubi akali oku liiso lya mugandawo.”
40007006	Era oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Ekibono kya Kibbumba tiweegumyanga okukyegesya abantu abakinyooma era abatataka okuwulisisya. Ekyo kityo olwakubba kiri ooti kukwata kintu ekitukulye nʼokiwa embwa kaisi igyo ni gigaluka gikuluma-bulumi. Era kiri ooti kukwata mabbaalego agʼebbeeyi nʼogamumira embiizi kaisi igyo ni gigafutyanka-bufutyanki.”
40007007	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Musabenge, era balibawa; Munoonienge, era mwalibona; Mukonkonenge oku lwigi, era balibaigulirawo.
40007008	Ekyo kityo olwakubba buli asaba asuna, era oyo anoonia abona, nʼoyo akonkona oku lwigi bamwigulirawo.
40007009	Era naani kwinywe awa omwanawe eibbaale ngʼamusabire kyokulya,
40007010	ooba amuwa ompiri omukifo kya nyanyi ogwabba amusabire?
40007011	Kale obanga inywe abakola ebibbibibbi mumaite okuwa abaana baanywe ebirabo ebisa, kaisi oItewaanywe owʼomwigulu tiyalikirawo ino okuwa ebirabo ebisa abo ababimusaba?”
40007012	Era nʼakoba ati, “Kale atyanu byonabyona ebimutaka abandi babakolere inywe, aale nywena mubibakolerenge. Ekyo niikyo aMateeka nʼenjegesya yʼabanaabbi ekibikoba omu bumpi.”
40007013	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Mwingirire mu mulyango omudiiŋi, olwakubba omulyango ogwingira omu kujigirika igwo mugalami, nʼenzira eyabayo ngalami, era bangi abagibitamu.
40007014	Neye omulyango ogwingira omu bwomi igwo mudiiŋi, era nʼenzira eyabayo ndiiŋi, era abagibona batono.”
40007015	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Mwekuume abanaabbi abʼobubbeyi. Baiza egimuli ngʼoku ngulu baboneka ooti tibakabbikabbi ooti ntaama, neye ngʼomunda bali ooti misege egiiza okunyaga.
40007016	Mwalibategeerera ku bikole byabwe. Abantu banokola ebineneka byʼemizabbibbu oku mukamirya, ooba banokola ebineneka byʼemitiini oku namuswata?”
40007017	Era nʼakoba ati, “Nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo, omusaale omusa guneneka bineneka ebisa, neye omusaale omubbimubbi guneneka bineneka ebibbibibbi.
40007018	Omusaale omusa tiguneneka ebineneka ebibbibibbi, nʼomusaale omubbimubbi tiguneneka ebineneka ebisa.
40007019	Buli musaale ogutaneneka ebineneka ebisa bagutema, ni bagudyaka omu musyo.
40007020	“Kale atyanu, mwalibategeerera ku bikole byabwe.”
40007021	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Tibuli muntu anjeta ati, ‘Musengwa, Musengwa,’ nti yalingira omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu, okutoolaku oyo iye akola oBbaabba aali omwigulu ebyataka.
40007022	Oku lunaku olwʼenkomerero, bangi balinkoba bati, ‘Musengwa, Musengwa, titwalaabbanga omu liinalyo? Titwabbinganga emizimu oku bantu nga tukolesya eriinalyo? Era titwakolanga ebyewunyo bingi omu liinalyo?’
40007023	Neye nze nalibakoba lwatu nti, ‘Inywe timbamaite. Muzwe nʼegyendi inywe abakola ebibbibibbi.’ ”
40007024	Awo oYesu nʼamaliirirya okwegesya abeegibe ati, “Kale atyanu buli muntu awulira ebibono byange ebyo, era nʼabikoreraku, abba ooti musaiza owʼamalabuki, eyayombekere enyumbaye okwibbaale.
40007025	Oikendi yatoonyere, omukula ni gubanda enyumba eyo, nʼompunga nʼagifuwa, neye nandi nʼegwa olwakubba bagyombekere ngʼomusingi guli kwibbaale.
40007026	“Neye buli muntu awulira ebibono byange ebyo, nandi nʼabikoleraku, abba ooti musaiza omusirusiru eyayombekere enyumbaye oku musenye.
40007027	Oikendi yatoonyere, omukula ni gubanda enyumba eyo, nʼompunga nʼagifuwa, era nʼegwa, nʼeweera okwitakali.”
40007028	Kale awo oYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, ekiziima kyʼabantu ni kyewunya ino engeri egyayegesyamu,
40007029	olwakubba yayegesyanga ngʼonyere obwezye, neye nga tali ooti bakugu baabwe abʼaMateeka.
40008001	Awo oYesu oweyazwire oku lusozi, oguyindi gwʼabantu ni gumusengererya.
40008002	Era omugenge nʼayaba egiri oYesu, nʼamukomera amazwi ngʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, mmaite nti oyezya okundamya, owoobba ngʼotakire.”
40008003	OYesu nʼagolola engalo nʼamukwataku, nʼamukoba ati, “Ntaka, era olame!” Amangu ago ebigenge ni bimuwaaku.
40008004	Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Ekyo, tokikoberaku omuntu kadi moiza wazira oyabe weeyanjule e wa kabona, era ngʼoMusa oweyalagiire, oweeyo nʼekyokuwaayo, kaisi bakakase bati olamire.”
40008005	OYesu oweyaingiire omu kibuga e Kaperenawumu, oMulooma omukulu wʼekibinja kyʼabaisulukale 100, nʼayaba egiyabbaire, nʼasaba obubbeeri
40008006	ngʼakoba ati, “Musengwa, omuweererya wange mulwaire ali e ika oku kitaliri, asanyalaire omubiri era ali omu bulumi bubitiriri.”
40008007	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Naizayo ni mmulamya.”
40008008	Neye oMulooma oyo nʼairamu ati, “Musengwa, tintuukana iwe okwingira omu nyumba yange, wazira otumule-butumuli kibono, era omugalama wange yalama.
40008009	Ekyo kityo olwakubba nze zena ndi muntu aali nʼabasengwa bange abantwala, era ngʼowendi nʼabaisulukale abentwala. Owenkoba onu nti ‘Oyabe,’ era ayaba; nʼogondi nti, ‘Oize,’ era aiza; nʼomugalama wange nti, ‘Okole kinu,’ era akikola.”
40008010	Awo oYesu oweyawuliire ebyo, ni yeewunya, nʼakoba ababbaire bamusengererya ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti, tinjajiryangaku omuntu yenayena omwIsirairi ali nʼokwikirirya okwʼamaani ooti kuukwo!
40008011	Era mbakobera nti bangi balizwa e njuyi nʼe njuyi, era ni batyama oku mbaga nʼoIbbulaimu, nʼoIsaka, nʼoYaakobbo omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu.
40008012	Neye abo abandibubbairemu, balibabbingira e nza omu ndikiirya, ewalibba okukunga nʼokuŋiiya amaino.”
40008013	Awo oYesu nʼakoba oMulooma nago ati, “Oyabe, era kibbe kityo ngʼowoikirirya.” Era omugalamawe nʼalama omu kaseera ako.
40008014	Awo oYesu oweyaingiire omu nyumba ya Peetero, nʼabona omaaye wa muka Peetero ngʼali aawo omusuuja gumuluma ino.
40008015	OYesu nʼamukwata oku ngalo, omusuuja ni gulama, era omukali oyo nʼasetukirawo, era nʼatandiika nʼokumwinula.
40008016	Awo akanaigolo, ni baleetera oYesu abantu bangi ababbaireku emizimu, nʼagibabbingaku ngʼagikaawuukira, era bonabona ababbaire balwaire, nʼabalamya.
40008017	Ekyo kyabbaire kityo, kaisi onaabbi oIsaaya ekiyatumwire kituukirire, ekikoba kiti: “Iye onyere yatwaire obunafu bwaiswe, era ni yeetiika endwaire gyaiswe.”
40008018	OYesu oweyaboine ngʼekiziima kyʼabantu kimweruguulirirye, nʼalagira abeegibe okusomoka naye okwaba oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza.
40008019	Awo omoiza oku bakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaiza egiri oYesu, nʼamukoba ati, “ Musomesya, natambulanga na iwe egiwayabiranga wonawona.”
40008020	Neye oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Amakibbwe igo gali nʼebiina egigabba, nʼenyonyi gyona giri nʼebisaasiriro. Neye oMwana wa Muntu adambaku kadi nʼejaica olubba.”
40008021	Omusaiza ogondi, omoiza oku beegibe, nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, naliiza nga mmalire okuliika obbaabba.”
40008022	Neye oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Oize obbe mwegi wange, era oleke abo abali nʼobwomi obwʼomwoyo obufu baliike abafu baabwe.”
40008023	Awo oYesu nʼaniina omu lyato, era abeegibe bona ni baaba naye.
40008024	Ogumpunga ogwʼamaani ni gutandiika okufuwa oku nyanza, amayengo ni geesuka omu lyato ni libbuuca kwizula amaizi. Neye oYesu iye yabbaire agonere.
40008025	Abeegibe ni baigerera egiyabbaire, era ni bamulamuca ni bamukoba bati, “Musengwa, otulamye, tufa!”
40008026	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Lwaki mutiire? Nga muli nʼokwikirirya kutono!” Awo nʼasetuka, nʼakaawuukira ogumpunga nʼamayengo, era enyanza nʼeteekera nakimo kusani!
40008027	Bonabona ni beewunya, ni bakoba bati, “Onu muntu wʼengeriki? Obona nʼogumpunga nʼamayengo bimuwulira!”
40008028	Awo oYesu oweyatuukire oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza, omu kitundu kyʼaBagaderiini, abantu babiri ababbaireku emizimu, ni bamusangaana nga bazwa omu magombe agʼempuku. Abasaiza abo babbaire bakambwe ino, nga mpaawo muntu ayezya okubitayo egibabbaire.
40008029	Amangu ago ni bakooka nga bakoba bati, “Otuvunaanira niki iwe oMwana wa Kibbumba? Oizire aanu okutugadya ngʼekiseera kyaiswe kikaali okutuuka?”
40008030	Wabbairewo ekiraalo kinene ekyʼembiizi nga giriisya era nga yalaku okuzwa egibabbaire.
40008031	Kale emizimu egyo ni gyegairira oYesu giti, “Singa owekibba kiti kutubbinga ku bantu banu otusindike mu kiraalo kyʼembiizi.”
40008032	OYesu nʼagikoba ati, “Aale mwabe.” Kale ni gibazwaku, ni gingira omu mbiizi. Era ekiraalo kyonakyona ni kitantawuka okuzwa e ngulu oku mugingi, ni kiyoolookera omu nyanza, era gyonagyona ni gifeera omu maizi.
40008033	Era abaliisya baagyo ni bairuka, ni baaba omu kibuga, ni balonsya byonabyona ebyabbairewo, nʼokukiraku eino ebikwata ku badi ababbaireku emizimu.
40008034	Awo abantu bangi ino ni bazwa omu kibuga okwaba okusangaana oYesu. Era owebamuboine, ni bamwegairira abazwere omu kitundu kyabwe.
40009001	Awo oYesu nʼaniina omu lyato, nʼasomoka enyanza nʼakanga omu kibuga kyʼe Kaperenawumu egiyaabbanga.
40009002	Era awo abantu abamo ni bamuleetera omusaiza asanyalaire, ngʼalambaire oku mukeeka. OYesu oweyaboine okwikirirya kwabwe, nʼakoba asanyalaire ati, “Mwana wange, ogume omwoyo, nkusoniyire ebikolebyo ebibbibibbi.”
40009003	Awo abamo oku bakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa ni baweweetanganira bati, “Omusaiza onu atumula omu ngeri ezumirira oKibbumba.”
40009004	OYesu oweyategeire ebiseego byabwe, nʼakoba ati, “Lwaki museega okubbikubbi omu myoyo gyanywe?
40009005	Ekikiraku owangu niikyo ekiriina, kukoba nti, ‘Nkusoniyire ebikolebyo ebibbibibbi,’ ooba kukoba asanyalaire nti, ‘Osetuke era otambule?’
40009006	Aale atyanu oleke mbalage nti oMwana wa Muntu ali nʼobwezye okusoniya ebikole ebibbibibbi oku kyalo kunu.” Era awo nʼakoba asanyalaire ati, “Osetuke, weetiike omukeekagwo, era okange e ika.”
40009007	Era nʼasetuka, nʼakanga e wuwe.
40009008	Ekiziima kyʼabantu owekyaboine ekyo, ni kitya, ni kiwuuja oKibbumba eyawaire abantu obwezye obwenkana awo.
40009009	Awo oYesu oweyazwire omu kifo ekyo, nʼabona omusaiza ogubeeta oMatayo, ngʼatyaime omu yaafeesi ya musolo. Nʼamukoba ati, “Oize obbe mwegi wange.” Era oMatayo yena nʼasetukiramu, nʼayaba naye.
40009010	Oluzwanyuma, oYesu oweyabbaire omu nyumba ya Matayo ngʼatyaime okulya, abasolooji ba musolo bangi nʼabakola ebikole ebibbibibbi ni baiza, ni batyama okulya aamo nʼoYesu nʼabeegibe.
40009011	ABafalisaayo owebaboine ekyo, ni babuulya abeegi ba Yesu bati, “Lwaki oMusomesya waanywe aliira aamo nʼabasolooji ba musolo nʼabantu abakola ebibbibibbi?”
40009012	Neye oYesu oweyawuliire ekyo, nʼakoba ati, “Aboomi tibeetaaga omusawo, wazira abalwaire.
40009013	Neye mwabe era mwetegereze amakulu gʼeKiwandiike kinu ekiti: ‘Ebyekisa niibyo ebintaka, neye tisadaaka.’ Ekyo kityo olwakubba abatuukirirye tiniibo abenaizire okweta beenenye, wazira abakola ebibbibibbi.”
40009014	Awo abeegi ba Yokaana ni baaba egiri oYesu, ni bamubuulya bati, “Lwaki iswe, nʼaBafalisaayo tusiiba emirundi mingi, neye abeegibo ni batasiiba?”
40009015	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Abageni abeete oku mbaga yʼobugole tibeezya okubba nʼenima ngʼomugole omusaiza akaali ali nabo. Neye ekiseera kyalituuka ni babatoolaku omugole oyo, kaisi oolwo ni basiiba.
40009016	“Omuntu takubbira omu kizwalo ekikaire ekiraaka ekiyaaka ekibakaali okwozakuumu, olwakubba owekyereega kyezya okukanula ekizwalo, kaisi ekituli ni kyeyongera okugalama.
40009017	Era omwenge ogwʼemizabbibbu omuyo, tibagusuka mu bisawo byagwo ebyʼamadiba amakaire. Singa ekyo bakikola, gubyata, ni gususuka era omwenge ogwo nʼebisawo nʼobifiirwa. Neye omwenge ogwʼemizabbibbu omuyo, bagusuka mu bisawo byagwo ebyʼamadiba amayaaka, era batyo webabikuuma.”
40009018	OYesu yabbaire akaali abakoba ebyo, omoiza oku bakulu omu kitundu eekyo nʼaiza nʼakomera oYesu amazwi, nʼakoba ati, “Omwala wange yankafa, neye oize omukwateku, airiwe.”
40009019	Awo oYesu nʼasetuka, nʼayaba naye, aamo nʼabeegibe.
40009020	Omu kaseera akanyere ako omukali eyabbaire alwaire ekikulukuto kyʼeisaaye okumala emyanka eikumi na mibiri, nʼayaba enyuma wa Yesu, nʼamukwata oku mugo gwʼekizwalokye
40009021	ngʼakoba omu mwoyogwe ati, “Kadi singa ni mmukwataku-bukwati oku kizwalokye kyonkani, mmaite nti nalama.”
40009022	OYesu nʼagaluka nʼalola enyuma nʼamubona era nʼamukoba ati, “Mwala wange, ogume omwoyo, olamire olwʼokwikiriryakwo.” Era omukali nʼalamirawo omu kaseera ako.
40009023	OYesu oweyatuukire ewʼomukulu wʼeikumbaaniro, nʼabona abafuwa emirere nʼekiziima kyʼabantu nga kikunga,
40009024	nʼakoba ati, “Muzwewo. Omwala tafiire, wazira agonere-bugoni.” Neye ni bamusekerera.
40009025	Neye owebamalire okubulucaamu ekiziima kyʼabantu, oYesu nʼaingira omu nyumba, nʼamusetula ngʼamukwaite oku ngalo era omwala nʼayemerera.
40009026	Amawuliro ago ni gasalaanira omu kitundu ekyo kyonakyona.
40009027	Awo oYesu oweyazwire eeyo, aboofu babiri ni bamusengererya nga bamwaminkirira bati, “Mwizukulu wa Dawudi, otukwatire ekisa!”
40009028	OYesu oweyatuukire omu nyumba, aboofu abo ni baaba egyali, nʼababuulya ati, “Mwikirirya muti mpezya okubalamya?” Awo ni bamwiramu bati, “Niikyo ekyo, Musengwa!”
40009029	Awo nʼakwata oku maiso gaabwe, nʼakoba ati, “Aale kibbe kityo ngʼowemwikirirya.”
40009030	Era amaiso gaabwe ni galama. OYesu nʼabasisiitira ati, “Timwakoberaku omuntu kadi moiza!”
40009031	Neye ibo ni babuluka, ni basalaania omu kitundu ekyo kyonakyona amawuliro agafa oku Yesu.
40009032	Awo abasaiza badi ababiri owebabbaire bawuluka omu nyumba, abantu ni baleetera oYesu omusaiza aliku omuzimu era obbubbu.
40009033	OYesu oweyamubbingireku omuzimu, omusaiza nago nʼatandiika okutumula. Abantu ni beewunya, ni bakoba bati, “Titubonangaku ekiti omwIsirairi!”
40009034	Neye aBafalisaayo ni bakoba bati, “Abbinga emizimu ngʼakolesya bwezye bwa mukulu waagyo.”
40009035	OYesu nʼatambula omu bibuga nʼomu byalo byonabyona omu Galiraaya, ngʼayegesya omu makumbaaniro gaabwe, ngʼalaabba eeri abantu aMawuliro aMasa agʼobwakabaka, era ngʼabalamya buli ndwaire.
40009036	Oweyaboine ebiziima byʼabantu, nʼabakwatira ekisa olwakubba babbaire beeraliikiriire era nga badamba obubbeeri nga bali ooti ntaama eginambulaku muliisya.
40009037	Kaisi nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Ebyokukungula bingi, neye abatambi niibo abatono.
40009038	Kale musabe onyere akola oku byokukungula, ayongere okusindika abatambi abandi omu musirigwe.”
40010001	Awo oYesu nʼayeta abeegibe eikumi na babiri, ni baaba egyali, nʼabawa obwezye okubbinganga emizimu oku bantu, nʼokulamyanga abantu buli ndwaire nʼobunafu.
40010002	Era abeegi abeyasuucirye abatume eikumi na babiri niibo banu: Asooka, niiye oSimooni oguyatuumire erya Peetero, nʼAndereya omugandawe; nʼoYaakobbo nʼomugandawe oYokaana abataane ba Zebedaayo.
40010003	NʼoFiripo, nʼoBbantulumaayo, nʼoTomasi, nʼoMatayo omusolooji wa musolo, nʼoYaakobbo omutaane wʼAlufaayo, nʼoSadaayo,
40010004	nʼoSimooni oMulwaniriri wa kwefuga kwʼeigwangalye, nʼoYuda Isikalyoti eyaliiremu oYesu olukwe.
40010005	Awo oYesu nʼatuma abatume eikumi na babiri abo ngʼabasisiitira ati, “Timwaba egiri aBatali Bayudaaya, waire omu bibuga ebya Basamaaliya.
40010006	Neye mwabe giri bantu bʼe Isirairi abali ooti ntaama egyagotere.
40010007	Mwabe mulaabbe egibali muti, ‘Obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu bwigereire.’
40010008	Era mwabe mulamye abalwaire, nʼokuzuukiza, nʼokulamya abagenge, era mubbinge nʼemizimu oku bantu. Obwezye obwʼokukola ebyo mubusunire bwereere, nywena mubukolesyenge bwereere.
40010009	Timwaba kadi nʼempiiya gyonagyona omu migoba gyanywe.
40010010	Era timwaba waire nʼekisawo. Buli muntu tiyaaba kadi nʼekizwalo kyokubiri waire ngaito, waire omukoomero, olwakubba omutambi awoomera okumuwa ebiyeetaaga.”
40010011	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Buli kibuga ooba buli kyalo ekimwaingirangamu, mwanoonereryanga omuntu abasangaalira, era muzwerenge wʼoyo paka owemwalizwayo.
40010012	Owemwaingiranga omu kisito ekyo, mukobenge abantu baamu muti, ‘Eidembe libbe na inywe.’
40010013	Era singa abantu baamu babasangaaliranga, eidembe erimubatakirya lyasigalanga nabo. Neye singa tibabasangaalirenge, eidembe erimubatakirya lyabairiranga niinywe.
40010014	Era singa abantu bʼomu kisito kyonakyona ooba omu kibuga, owebagaananga okubasangaalira ooba okuwulira ebibono byanywe, mukizwengemu. Era owemwabbanga mukizwamu, mwekunkumulyengeku nʼenkungu egyabbanga gibakwaite oku bigere byanywe.
40010015	Mbakobera amazima nti, oku lunaku olwʼokusaliraku emisango, abantu bʼomu kibuga kyʼe Sodoma nʼe Gomola balibasalira ekibonerezo ekiri gwai gwai okukiraku ekyo ekibaliwa abantu abo abagaananga okubasangaalira.”
40010016	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera era nʼabalabula ati, “Aale muwulisisye, mbatuma nga muli ooti ntaama egibasindikire akati omu misege, ibyo ebisolo ebya kabenje. Nʼolwekyo mubbe balabukirabuki okwekuuma ooti mpiri, era mubbe bʼeiwooyo ooti njiiwa.
40010017	Aale mukimanye muti abantu balibakwata ni babawaayo omu mbuga gyʼamateeka, era ni babafaamuulira omu makumbaaniro gaabwe.
40010018	Era okulwange balibatwala omu maiso gʼabafugi nʼaga bakabaka. Ekyo kyalibeezyesya inywe okubatuucaaku ibo nʼoku Batali Bayudaaya obukwenda bwange.
40010019	Era owebabakwatanga, timweraliikiriranga ekimwatumula nʼengeri eyʼokukitumulamu. Omu kaseera ako mwasunanga ekyokutumula.
40010020	Ekyo kityo olwakubba tiniinywe omwabbanga mutumula, neye oMwoyo wa Kibbumba oItewaanywe niiye eyaabbanga atumula okubitira mwinywe.”
40010021	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Omuntu yaliwaayo omugandawe okumwita, nʼomusaiza omubyaire yaliwaayo omwanawe. Era abaana balyediima ni bawaayo ababyaire baabwe okubaita.
40010022	Era nywena abantu bonabona balibacaawa olwakubba muli basengereri bange. Neye oyo eyaligumira ebigosi ebyo paka oku nkomerero, yalirokoka.
40010023	Kale atyanu abantu owebabayigaanianga omu kibuga ekimo, mwairukiranga omu kindi. Mbakobera amazima nti timwaliwoisya ebibuga byʼomwIsirairi ngʼoMwana wa Muntu akaali okwira.”
40010024	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Ogubeegesya takiraku amwegesya, era nʼomuweererya takiraku omusengwawe.
40010025	Iye ogubeegesya tali nʼokwewunya singa owebamubitya ooti yoodi amwegesya, nʼomuweererya yena atyo singa owebamubitya ooti musengwawe. Obanga onyere ekisito bamwetere Bberuzebbuli, kaisi leero abʼomu kisitokye ibo babba tibabeete ekikiraku ekyo obubbibubbi!”
40010026	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okwegesya ati, “Kale timutyanga abantu abo abababitya okubbikubbi. Ekyo kityo olwakubba buli kintu ekikukuulirirye balikitoolayo, era buli kintu ekiri omu kyama kyalimanyikana.
40010027	Ebintu ebimbakobera inywe omu mbiso, mubikoberenge abantu mulwatu, era nʼebintu ebimbaweweetera inywe mubikookerenge ngulu.
40010028	Era timutyanga abo abaita mubiri gwonkani, neye nga tibeezya okwita omwoyo. Wazira mutyenge Kibbumba iye ali nʼobwezye okujigirica byonabyona, omwoyogwo nʼomubirigwo omu geyeena.
40010029	Obunyonyi obubiri bwa layisi ino, neye mpaawo kadi kamo kwibwo akagwa ansi ni kafa okutoolaku oItewaanywe nga niiye atakire atyo.
40010030	Era nʼainywe nywena oItewaanywe amaite nʼobungi bwʼenziiri gyʼokumitwe gyanywe.
40010031	Kale timwatyanga olwakubba inywe muli bʼebbeeyi okukiraku omududu gwʼobunyonyi.”
40010032	Tete oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Buli ambutula omu maiso gʼabantu, zena nalimubbutula omu maiso ga Bbaabba aali omwigulu.
40010033	Neye buli anegaanira omu maiso gʼabantu, zena nalimwegaanira omu maiso ga Bbaabba aali omwigulu.”
40010034	Awo era oYesu ni yeeyongera okubakoba ati, “Timwaseega muti naizire kuleeta idembe oku kyalo. Tinaizire kuleeta idembe, wazira naizire kuleeta ntalo.
40010035	Ekyo kityo olwakubba naizire okwawukanisya, ‘omwana nʼoiteeye, omwala nʼomaaye, omulya nʼodaaniwe.
40010036	Era abalabe bʼomuntu baabbanga bʼomu nyumbaye.’ ”
40010037	Era ni yeeyongera ati, “Buli oyo ataka oiteeye ooba omaaye okukiraku owantaka tasaanira okubba mwegi wange. Era buli oyo ataka omutaanewe ooba omwalawe okukiraku owantaka, yena tasaanira okubba mwegi wange.
40010038	Era buli oyo etiyeetiika omusalabbagwe gwʼokugada olwʼobwakabaka bwa Kibbumba era nʼansengererya, oyo tasaanira okubba mwegi wange.
40010039	Kale buli agezyaku okulamya obwomibwe okululwe, yalibufiirwa, neye buli afiirwa obwomibwe okulwange, yalibulamya.”
40010040	Awo oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Buli abasangaalira inywe abba asangaaliire ninze, era ansangaalira, abba asangaaliire Kibbumba eyantumire.
40010041	Nʼolwekyo buli asangaalira onaabbi olwakubba mukwenda wa Kibbumba, yalisuna empeera ngʼeya naabbi. Era nabuli asangaalira omuntu atuukiriire olwakubba muntu atuukiriire, yalisuna empeera ngʼeyooyo.
40010042	Era buli muntu awa omoiza oku basengereri bange banu abebanyooma, kadi amaizi agʼokunywa amawolu olwakubba mwegi wange, mbakobera amazima nti anambula kubuusabuusa yalisuna empeeraye.”
40011001	Awo, oYesu oweyamalire okwegesya abeegibe eikumi na babiri, nʼazwa omu kifo ekyo, nʼayaba okwegesya nʼokulaabba eeri abantu abʼomu bibuga byʼomu Galiraaya.
40011002	Atyanu oYokaana oMubatizi oweyabbaire omu mabbuusu nʼawulira ebintu oKurisito ebyakola, kale nʼatuma abeegibe okwaba
40011003	okubuulya oYesu bati, “Niiwe oKibbumba oguyasuubizire okutuma okwiza okununula abantu, ooba tukuumirire gondi?”
40011004	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mukange era mumukobere ebimuwuliire nʼebimuboine.
40011005	Ababbaire aboofu babona, ababbaire abaleme batambula, abagenge balama, ababbaire abamasiipe bawulira, abafu bazuukira, nʼabadoobi bona basuna enkabi gyʼokuwulira aMawuliro aMasa.
40011006	Ali nʼenkabi omuntu oyo atambuusabuusamu.”
40011007	Abakwenda ba Yokaana owebabbaire nga bazwawo, oYesu nʼatandiika okubuulya ekiziima kyʼabantu ebikwata oku Yokaana ati, “Owemwabire egiri oYokaana omu kitera, mwasuubiire kubona muntu afaanana atya? Mwamwajiirye ngʼomuntu omugondi ooti lugada olutengeeta nabuli ompunga owaafuwa?
40011008	Ooba nga tikiikyo, mwasuubiire kubona muntu afaanana atya? Muntu azwaire ebizwalo ebyebbeeyi? Kadi tiyabbaire atyo, olwakubba abazwala ebizwalo ebyebbeeyi babba mu bisito bya bakabaka.
40011009	Aale kale mwabire okubona oYokaana olwakubba yabbaire naabbi? Ekinanyerenyeere nabakobera nʼokubakobera nti yabbaire akiraku okubba naabbi.
40011010	OYokaana oyo, niiye eBiwandiike ogubitumulaku biti: ‘Aale obone, ntuma omukwenda wange akwekubbembere, okukwewulirya enzira egyoyaba.’ ”
40011011	Era ni yeeyongera ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti, kasookeede abantu babba oku kyalo kunu mpaawo muntu akira oYokaana ekitiisya. Neye Iye oKibbumba abala oyo amusemberya omu bwomibwe, waire nga niiye abantu ogubanyooma omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu, okubba akira oYokaana oyo ekitiisya ekyalimu.
40011012	Era okuzwa omu kiseera oYokaana oMubatizi oweyatandikiire okulaabba paka atyanu, obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu babulwanisya nʼamaani, era abantu baazya nʼamaani okubwingiramu.
40011013	Ekyo kityo olwakubba abanaabbi bonabona nʼaMateeka ga Musa balagwire oku bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu paka oYokaana oweyatandiikire okulaabba.
40011014	Era owoobbanga otaka okwikirirya ekyo, oYokaana niiye onaabbi oguyatumwireku oweyakobere ati, ‘Eyaliiza ali ooti Eriya.’
40011015	Aale omuntu aliku amatwi agawulira, awulisisye era ategeere ekintumula.”
40011016	OYesu nʼayongera okukoba ababbaire bamuwulisisya ati, “Abantu abʼomulembe gunu nʼabagerya kuuki? Bafaanana ooti baana abatobato, abazeenya omuzeenyo omu kisaawe abantu okubabona. Batyo nga beezulugumira abanaabwe bati:
40011017	‘Twabafuwiire emirere omu wembo obusa, neye nandi mubina; kale ni twemba enyembo gyʼenima neye nandi mukunga.’
40011018	“Ekyo kityo olwakubba oYokaana oMubatizi yabbaire talya ebyokulya ebya bulijo waire kunywa nviinyo, mwakobere muti, ‘Aliku omuzimu!’
40011019	Tete zena oMwana wa Muntu ndya ebyokulya era nnywa enviinyo era munkoba muti, ‘Omuntu oyo wa gukobbo, era muteemeere, kaisi mukaagwa wa basolooji ba musolo nʼabakola ebibbibibbi.’ Neye abantu abo bonabona abakolera oku malabuki ga Kibbumba, bakakasa bati matuuce.”
40011020	Awo oYesu nʼatandiika okunenya abantu bʼomu bibuga ebiyakoleiremu ebyewunyo ebikira obungi, olwakubba abo tibeenenyere.
40011021	Awo nʼakoba ati, “Wobe! Ala inywe abantu abʼomu kibuga ekyʼe Kolaziini nʼekyʼe Bbesusaida nga mulabire! Kiri kityo olwakubba ebyewunyo ebibakolere mwinywe singa babbaire babikolere mu kibuga ekyʼe Tiiro nʼekyʼomu Sidoni, abantu baayo nga beenenyere era ni bazwala nʼebikotiya, nʼokwepuuda eikoke okulagisya bati beenenyere.
40011022	Neye mbakobera nti oku lunaku olwʼokusaliraku emisango, abantu bʼomu Tiiro nʼomu Sidoni balisuna ekibonerezo ekiri gwai gwai oku kyanywe.
40011023	Kaisi oolwo inywe abantu bʼe Kaperenawumu, inywe niinywe abebaligulumalya okutuuka omwigulu? Ala kadi, era oKibbumba ayaba kubasindika mu geyeena. Ekyo kityo olwakubba ebyewunyo eira ebibakolere mwinywe, singa babbaire babikolere mu kibuga Sodoma, ekibuga ekyo kyandibbaire kikaali kiriwo paka nʼatyanu.
40011024	Neye mbakobera nti oku lunaku olwʼokusaliraku emisango, abantu bʼomu Sodoma balisuna ekibonerezo ekiri gwai gwai oku kyanywe.”
40011025	Awo omu kiseera ekyo oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Nkuwuuja, Bbaabba, iwe oMusengwa afuga eigulu nʼoku kyalo, olwakubba amazima ganu wagabisire abalabuki nʼabategeera, kaisi nʼogamanyikisya bantu ababula ekibamaite ooti baana abatobato.
40011026	Niikyo ekyo Bbaabba olwakubba okwo kwabbaire kutakakwo.”
40011027	Awo nʼakoba abantu ati, “OBbaabba yampaire obwezye oku bintu byonabyona. Era nze ngʼoMwana mpaawo ammaite okutoolaku oBbaabba. Era mpaawo amaite oBbaabba okutoolaku nze oMwana, nʼomuntu oyo iye ogumba nnondere nti amanye oBbaabba.”
40011028	Kale oYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba abantu ati, “Mwize egyendi nywenanywena abali nʼebibakaluubirira, nze nabawa ekiwuumulo.
40011029	Inywe abananyere mugondere enjegesya yange, era mwegere ku ninze, olwakubba ndi wʼeiwooyo era ndi muwombeeki. Era mwasuna ekiwuumulo kyʼemyoyo gyanywe.
40011030	Ekyo kityo olwakubba engeri eginabekubbemberamu iyo nyangu, nʼebiragiro byange tibigosi.”
40012001	Awo owewabitirewo akaseera katono, oku Saabbaato oYesu nʼabeegibe owebabbaire babita omu kasinde akabbaire omu musiri gwʼengaano, abeegibe enzala yabbaire ebaluma era ni bawululaku ebigala byʼengaano era ni balya empeke gyamu.
40012002	Neye aBafalisaayo abamo owebababoine nga bakola ekyo, ni bakoba oYesu bati, “Aale obone abeegibo batambire, ekintu aMateeka ga Musa ekigagaana oku Saabbaato!”
40012003	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Inywe timusomangaku omu Biwandiike kwekyo okabaka oDawudi nʼabeyabbaire nabo ekibakolere enzala oweyabalumire?
40012004	ODawudi yaingiire omu nyumba ya Kibbumba, era iye nʼabeyabbaire nabo ni balyaku emigaati egibabbaire bawongere eeri oKibbumba, aate ngʼaMateeka ga Musa gabbaire tigaikirirya abantu abandi okulyaku emigaati egyo, okutoolaku abakabona bonkani.
40012005	Ooba timusomangaku omu Mateeka ga Musa nti oku Saabbaato, abakabona omu kukola emirimo gyabwe omu Yeekaalu bavuna eiteeka cooka ni batabbaaku omusango?
40012006	Neye mbakoba nti akira eYeekaalu ekitiisya ali aanu.
40012007	Era singa mumaite amakulu gʼeKiwandiike kinu ekikoba kiti, ‘Ebyekisa niibyo ebintaka, neye tisadaaka,’ timwandinenyere bantu ababulaku omusango.
40012008	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oMwana wa Muntu ali nʼobwezye okusalawo abantu ekibasaaniire okukola oku Saabbaato.”
40012009	Awo oYesu nʼazwa omu kifo ekyo, nʼayaba omwikumbaaniro,
40012010	era oomwo mwabbairemu omuntu owʼengalo eyanyolere. Era omunyere oomwo mwabbairemu aBafalisaayo ababbaire banoonianga ensonga yʼokuzweraku okuwaabira oYesu. Kale ni babuulya oYesu bati, “ Amateeka gaiswe gaikirirya okulamya omuntu oku Saabbaato?”
40012011	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Singa omoiza kwinywe abba nʼontaamawe, kaisi nʼagwa omu kiina oku Saabbaato, tamukwata nʼamutoolamu?
40012012	Atyanu oolwo omuntu tiwamugaso ino okukiraku ontaama! Nʼolwekyo baikirirya okukolera omuntu ekintu ekisa oku Saabbaato.”
40012013	Awo nʼakoba omuntu oyo owʼengalo eyanyolere ati, “Waama iswe ogolole engaloyo.” Kale nʼagigolola, era nʼeramirawo era nʼebba nakimo nsa ooti yeedi egendi.
40012014	Neye aBafalisaayo ibo ni bawulukamu era ni bateesa engeri egibeezya okujigiricamu oYesu.
40012015	Awo oYesu oweyategeire olukwe lwʼaBafalisaayo olwʼokumwita, nʼazwa omu kifo ekyo. Era oweyazwirewo, ekiyindi kyʼabantu kinene ni kimusengererya, era nʼalamya abalwaire baabwe bonabona ababbaireyo
40012016	neye nʼabagaana okumubbutula.
40012017	Ekyo kyabbaire kityo olwʼokutuukirirya ekibono kya Kibbumba onaabbi Isaaya ekiyatumwire ekikoba kiti:
40012018	“Onu niiye ogunnondere okubba omuweererya wange, omutake era ogunsiima eino. Nalimwicaaku oMwoyo wange, era yalikobera abantu aBatali Bayudaaya ngʼowenalibalamula nga tinekubbira.
40012019	Tiyaliyomba nʼabantu waire kwakana ngʼaceera, era tiyalitumula nʼeigono eryasyamika ngʼayegeserya oku nguudo.
40012020	Oyo yalibba wʼeiwooyo era wʼekisa eri abo abadamba obubbeeri nʼabanafu, paka oweyaliramula emisango nga tiyeekubbira.
40012021	Era aBatali Bayudaaya baliteeka eisuubi lyabwe mu niiye.”
40012022	Awo ni baleetera oYesu omusaiza aliku omuzimu nga mwofu era bbubbu. Era oYesu nʼamulamya, nʼatandiika okutumula nʼokubona.
40012023	Era abantu bonabona ababbairewo ni beewunya olwʼekyo oYesu ekiyabbaire akolere, era ni babuulya bati, “Omusaiza onu ayezya okubba niiye oKurisito oMwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi?”
40012024	Neye aBafalisaayo owebawuliire ebyo, ni bairamu bati, “Omusaiza onu abbinga emizimu ngʼakolesya bwezye bwa Bberuzebbuli omukulu waagyo.”
40012025	Neye iye oYesu oweyamanyicirye ebiseego byabwe, nʼabakoba ati, “Abantu abʼobwakabaka obumo owebeesalamu, obwakabaka bwabwe obwo bujigirika. Era nʼabantu abʼomu kibuga ekimo waire kisito owebeesalamu, ekibuga ooba ekisito ekyo kisansukana.
40012026	Kale singa oSitaani abbinga emizimu ekitegeeza kiti abba yeerwanisya. Olwo owekibba kityo obwakabakabwe bubbaawo butya?
40012027	Aale obanga nze mbinga emizimu nga nkolesya bwezye bwa Bberuzebbuli, kaisi abasengereri baanywe ibo babba bagibbinga nga bakolesya bwezye bwani? Kagira ibo balibasalira inywe omusango olwakubba ibo bamaite bati bagibbinga lwa bwezye bwa Kibbumba.
40012028	Neye owekibba kiti mbinga emizimu oku bantu nga nkolesya bwezye bwa Mwoyo wa Kibbumba, aale obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba bubba atyanu bubabbutukiiremu.”
40012029	Awo ni yeeyongera ati, “Mpaawo ayezya okwingira omu nyumba ya muntu owʼamaani nʼanyaga ebintubye, okutoolaku ngʼasookere kumusiba, oolwo kaisi nʼayezya okunyaga ebyʼomu nyumbaye.”
40012030	Era ni yeeyongera ati, “Kale iye oyo atabba oku luuda lwange, abba mulabe wange, era iye atambeera okusolooja, asalaanica.
40012031	Nʼolwekyo mbakobera nti, kyezyeka okusoniya abantu ebibbibibbi byabwe byonabyona, nʼokubasoniya olwʼebibono ebizumirira omu ngeri yonayona. Neye buli azuma oMwoyo oMweru, tibalimusoniya.
40012032	Era buli atumula okubbikubbi oku Mwana wa Muntu, beezya okumusoniya; neye oyo iye azuma oMwoyo oMweru, tibalimusoniya waire mu mulembe gunu ooba mu mulembe ogwaliiza.”
40012033	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Omusaale omusa, guneneka bineneka ebisa, nʼomusaale omubbimubbi, guneneka ebineneka bibbibibbi. Ekyo kityo olwakubba omusaale bagutegeerera ku bineneka byagwo.
40012034	Inywe muli bakabbikabbi ooti mpiri enfulugundu! Mwezya mutya okutumula ebintu ebisa nga muli bantu abakola ebibbibibbi? Ekyo kityo olwakubba ebintu ebiizula omu mwoyo gwa muntu, omunwagwe niibyo ebigutumula.
40012035	Omuntu omusa, atoola ku bisa ebiri omu mwoyogwe okukola ebisa, nʼomuntu akola ebikole ebibbibibbi, atoola ku bibbibibbi ebiri omu mwoyogwe okukola ebibbibibbi.”
40012036	Era ni yeeyongera ati, “Neye mbakobera nti oku lunaku lwʼokusaliraku emisango, abantu balibba nʼokwewozyaku omu maiso ga Kibbumba olwa buli kibono ekitagasa ekibatumula.
40012037	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oku bibono byanywe oKibbumba kuyalizwera okubasingisya omusango ooba okubatoolaku omusango.”
40012038	Awo abamo oku Bafalisaayo nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa ni bakoba oYesu bati, “ Musomesya, tutaka otukolerewo akamanyiciryo akalaga kati obwezyebwo buzwa giri Kibbumba.”
40012039	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Abantu bʼomulembe gunu ibo abakola ebibbibibbi era abazwazwa oku Kibbumba ibo basaba akamanyiciryo, neye mpaawo akenjaba okubawa okutoolaku ako akebakoleire onaabbi Yona.
40012040	Ekyo kityo olwakubba ngʼoYona oweyabbaire omu kida kya gunyanyi enaku eisatu embeereri, nʼoMwana wa Muntu yena waayaba okubba omwitakali enaku eisatu.”
40012041	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Abantu bʼe Nineeve balisetuka ngʼoKibbumba asalira abantu bʼomulembe gunu omusango. Era ni babalumiriza omusango okubasinga olwakubba ibo beenenyere ngʼoYona alaabbire egibali ekibono kya Kibbumba, neye obone oyo akira oYona ekitiisya ali aanu.”
40012042	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Okabaka omukali owʼomu kyalo ekiriraine e Isirairi ekyansi, yalisetuka ngʼabantu bʼomulembe gunu babasalira omusango. Era nʼabalumiriza omusango okubasinga olwakubba yazwire yala ino nʼaiza okuwulisisya ebibono ebyamalabuki ebya kabaka oSulemaani. Neye obone oyo akira oSulemaani ekitiisya ali aanu.”
40012043	OYesu ni yeeyongera okubeegesya ati, “Omuzimu oweguzwa oku muntu, gulaaduukira omu bitera, nga gunoonia egigwawuumulira neye owegukayaku,
40012044	awo gukoba guti, ‘Neekangira eginaabbanga.’ Kale owegukanga gwaja omuntu oyo ngʼateereire kusani era ngʼali ooti nyumba enjereere, enjeye era entegeke kusani.
40012045	Atyanu awo gwaba ni gusyoma emizimu egindi musanvu egigukiraku obubbibubbi, ni gingira ni gibba omu muntu oyo. Kale ekyo kizweraku embeera yʼomuntu oyo eyʼoluzwanyuma okubba mbiibbi okukiraku eedi eyasookere. Kale kityo niiye owekyalibba nʼoku bantu abakola ebibbibibbi abʼomulembe gunu.”
40012046	Kale awo oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼakaali atumula nʼekiziima kyʼabantu, abagandabe nʼomaaye ni batuuka egiyabbaire ni beemerera e nza, nga bataka okutumulaku naye.
40012047	Awo omuntu nʼakobera oYesu ati, “Omaawo nʼabagandabo bali e nza, era bataka okutumulaku na iwe.”
40012048	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Omuntu ogunjeta nti mama ooba abenjeta nti baganda bange niibo ababba abʼengeriki?”
40012049	Awo nʼadooda oku beegibe era nʼakoba ati, “Omama nʼabaganda bange niibo banu.
40012050	Ekyo kityo olwakubba buli akola oBbaabba aali omwigulu ebyataka niiye abba omuganda wange, era niiye abba omwonyoko wange, era niiye abba omama.”
40013001	Awo oku lunaku olunyere oolwo oYesu nʼawuluka omu nyumba, nʼayaba oku mbale kwʼenyanza oGaliraaya, nʼatyama.
40013002	Ekiziima kyʼabantu kinene ni kikumbaanira egyali, kale awo oYesu nʼaniina omu lyato, era nʼalityamamu, ngʼekiziima kyʼabantu kyonakyona kyemereire oku mbale kwʼenyanza.
40013003	Era nʼabasonzolera ebintu bingi ngʼakolesya ngero ati, “Wabbairewo omulimi eyaabire okusiga ensigogye.
40013004	Oweyabbaire ngʼasiga, egimo gyagwire ku nzira, enyonyi ni giiza ni gigirya.
40013005	Era ensigo egindi ni gigwa mwitakali eryʼoku bubbaalebbaale, tigyalwire ni gimera olwakubba eitakali eeryo tiryabbaire lyabiriri.
40013006	Neye eisana oweryocerye eino ni liwotoca ebimera ebyo era ni bikala olwakubba emiri gyabyo gyabbaire tigyabiriire ansi omwitakali.
40013007	Ensigo egindi ni gigwa mwitakali eryabbairemu amawa, kaisi ni gakulira aamo nʼensigo egyo, kale amawa ago ni gagiita.
40013008	Nʼensigo egindi ni gigwa omwitakali erisa, ni gimera, era ni gibala ensigo egindi 100, nʼegindi 60, nʼegindi 30.
40013009	Aale omuntu aliku amatwi agawulira, awulisisye era ategeere ekintumula.”
40013010	Awo abeegi ni baigerera egiri oYesu ni bamubuulya bati, “Lwaki oyegesya abantu mu ngero?”
40013011	Kale iye nʼabairamu ati, “Inywe mwasunire enkabi egyʼokumanya ebyama ebikwata oku bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu, neye abantu abo ibo tibagisunire.
40013012	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oyo aali nabyo balimwongeraku nʼebindi, era nʼabba nabyo bingi ino. Neye oyo abula, nʼakatono akaali nako balikamutoolaku.
40013013	Eenu niiyo ensonga lwaki ntumula nabo mu ngero: ‘Newankubbaire babonia neye nga tibeezya kumanyica; newankubbaire bawulisisya neye nga tibategeera ebintumula.’
40013014	“Era kituukirire mwibo oKibbumba ekiyatumwire ngʼabitira omu naabbi Isaaya ati: ‘Amatwi gaanywe gawuliranga ebintumula, neye nga kwibyo mpaawo ekimutegeeraku naire; amaiso gaanywe gabonianga, neye nga mpaawo ekimubona naire.
40013015	Ekyo kityo olwakubba abantu abo basuukire maisiyaaye ni bateezya kuntegeera niki ekinanyere ekyendi, basinyiire amatwi gaabwe ni gasiyalala batyo ni bateezya kuwulira ebyo ebimbakoba. Era nʼamaiso gaabwe gayofuwaire ni bateezya kubona ebyo ebinkola. Neye singa tiniikyo, bankategeire niki ekinanyerenyeere ekyendi, nʼebyo amaiso gaabwe ebigabona nga nkola, nʼebyo amatwi gaabwe ebigawulira nga ntumula egibali. Batyo bankacuukire omu myoyo gyabwe ni baira egyendi, era ni mbalokola.’
40013016	“Neye inywe muli bʼenkabi olwakubba amaiso gaanywe gabona, nʼamatwi gaanywe gawulira.
40013017	Ekyo kityo olwakubba mbakobera amazima nti abanaabbi bangi nʼabantu abatuukirirye beegombere okubona ebimubona, ni batabibona, nʼokuwulira ebimuwulira, ni batabiwulira!”
40013018	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Aale atyanu muwulire amakulu gʼolugero lwʼomusigi.
40013019	Ensigo egyagwire oku nzira, niibo abantu abawulira obukwenda obukwata oku bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu era ni batabutegeera, era oSitaani nʼaiza nʼabutoola omu myoyo gyabwe.
40013020	Kaisi ensigo egyagwire omwitakali eryʼoku bubbaalebbaale, niibo abantu abawulira ekibono kya Kibbumba era ni bakyaniriza mangu nʼeisangaalo.
40013021	Neye ni babba ooti bimera ebidamba emiri egyabirira nakimo ansi omwitakali. Ibo baikirirya ekibono kya Kibbumba okumala ekiseera kityayi kiti, kaisi owebagwa omu bigosi ooba okubayigaania olwʼekibono kya Kibbumba amangu ago ni bakizwaku.
40013022	Igyo egyo egyagwire omwitakali eryamereremu amawa, niibo abantu abawulira ekibono kya Kibbumba. Neye okweraliikirira ebintu byʼe kyalo nʼokubabbeyabbeya nʼebya busuni nʼamasanyu gʼekyalo kinu, owebifuga emyoyo gyabwe bikaisya ekibono kya Kibbumba okubabbeera okukola ebikole ebisa.
40013023	Neye ensigo egyo egyagwire omwitakali erisa, niibo abantu abawulira ekibono kya Kibbumba nʼomwoyo omusa nakimo, kaisi ni bakikuuma era ni beekalangula okukolanga ebikole ebisa. Ekikoba kiti abantu abo ni babba ooti kimera ekyabalire, ngʼonsigo omoiza abala emirundi 100, ooba 60, ooba 30.”
40013024	Awo, tete oYesu nʼabagerera olugero olundi ati, “Obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu tubufaananiaku nʼomuntu eyasigire ensigo egyʼengaano ensa omu musirigwe.
40013025	Neye obwire abantu owebabbaire nga bagonere, omulabewe nʼayaba yena nʼasigamu ensigo gyʼebisubi ebikolokosimbo, era ni yeeyabira.
40013026	Kale engaano owegyamalire okukula ni gisowola era ni gisulya ebigala, awo ebisubi ebyo byona ni byeraga.”
40013027	Kale awo abaweererya ba nanyere omusiri ni baaba ni bakoba onyere bati, “Musengwa, kaisi titwasigire nsigo ensa omu musiri? Kaisi tete ebikolokosimbo ebyamereiremu byazwire yaina?”
40013028	Awo iye nʼabairamu ati, “Omulabe niiye eyakolere ekyo.” Kaisi abaweereryabe ni bamubuulya bati, “Otaka twabe tubiiyemu?”
40013029	Neye iye nʼabairamu ati, “Bbe muleke, olwakubba owemwabba mubiiyamu, mwezya okwiyiramu nʼengaano gyona.
40013030	Wazira muleke byonabyona bikulire aamo paka okwikesa. Omu kiseera ekyo, nalikoba abakesi nti, ‘Musooke mukumbaanie ebikolokosimbo mubisibe binywa babyoce, kaisi engaano mugikumbaanie era mugireete omu kideero kyange.’ ”
40013031	Awo oYesu nʼabagerera olugero olundi ati, “Obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu tubufaananiaku nʼakansigo aka kalidaali, iko omuntu akeyatwaire nʼakakoma omu musirigwe.
40013032	Waire nga kamo oku bunsigo obukira okubba obutono omu nsigo gyonagyona, neye owekamera, kakula ni kasuuka kimera kya syodo ekinene ekikira ebirime bya syodo ebindi byonabyona ebibba omu musiri. Era ni kibba ooti musaale, nʼenyonyi ni girukaku ebisaasiriro nʼokusiibanga omu masaga gaakyo.”
40013033	Tete oYesu nʼabagerera olugero olundi ati, “Obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu tubufaananiaku nʼobukazumbulukuca obutono buti, ibwo omukali obuyakoleserye okusumba emigaati. Waire wona yakandire obusye bungi, obukazumbulukuca bwasalaaniire omu gutole gwonagwona.”
40013034	OYesu yayegesyanga ebintu ebyo byonabyona abantu ngʼakolesya ngero. Mpaawo ekiyabakoberanga nga takoleserye ngero.
40013035	Ekyo kyabbaire kityo kaisi oKibbumba ekiyatumwire ngʼabitira omu naabbi kituukirire, ekikoba kiti: “Nalitumula nga nkolesya ngero; nalibbutula ebimbaire nkaali okubiikulira abantu, okuzwera omu kubbumba kwʼekyalo.”
40013036	Awo oYesu nʼazwa omu kiziima kyʼabantu, era nʼayaba omu nyumba. Era abeegibe ni baaba egyali, ni bamukoba bati, “Otusonzolere amakulu gʼolugero lwʼeisubi okolokosimbo omu musiri gwʼengaano.”
40013037	Kale oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Iye asiga ensigo ensa niiye oMwana wa Muntu.
40013038	Era omusiri niikyo ekyalo, igyo ensigo ensa niibo abantu abo abakola oKibbumba ebyataka. Kaisi eisubi okolokosimbo, niibo abantu abakolera oku bya Sitaani.
40013039	Era omulabe eyalisigiremu niiye oSitaani. Eikesa niiyo enkomerero yʼekyalo kaisi abakesi niibo abamalaika.
40013040	Kale kityo nakimo ngʼeisubi okolokosimbo owebalikumbaania ni balyoca, niiye owekyalibba oku nkomerero yʼekyalo.
40013041	OMwana wa Muntu yalituma abamalaikabe, okulondamu omu bantu bʼobwakabaka bwʼomwigulu abo bonabona abazweraku abantu okukola ebibbibibbi, nʼabo bonabona abakola ebibbibibbi.
40013042	Era abantu abo balibasindika omu musyo ogwʼamaani eino, eeyo ewalibba okukunga nʼokuŋiiya amaino.
40013043	Kaisi abantu abatuukirirye bamesye ooti isana nga bali omu bwakabaka bwa Itewabwe. Aale omuntu aliku amatwi agawulira, awulisisye era ategeere ekintumula!”
40013044	Awo oYesu tete nʼabagerera olugero olundi ati, “Obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu tubufaananiaku nʼekyobusuni omuntu ekiyabisire omu musiri, kaisi omuntu ogondi nʼakivumbula era yena nʼakibisa awandi tete. Era olwʼeisangaalo eringi eriyabbaire nalyo nʼayaba nʼatunda ebintubye byonabyona ebiyabbaire nabyo, nʼagula omusiri ogwo.”
40013045	OYesu nʼabagerera ati, “Tete obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu era tubufaananiaku nʼomuntu omusuubuuzi, eyabbaire anoonia amabbaale agʼebbeeyi.
40013046	Era oweyavumbwire eryʼebbeeyi eino egiriri, yaabire nʼatunda ebintubye byonabyona ebiyabbaire nabyo, nʼaligula.”
40013047	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Era tete obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu tubufaananiaku nʼakatimba kʼenyanyi, abazibuli akebategere omu nyanza ni bapapalya enyanyi egya buli ngeri.
40013048	Kaisi owekaizwire, abazibuli ni bakakuusira oku lukalu. Awo ni batyama ni balondyamu enyanyi ensa ni bagiteeka omu biibo, kaisi embiibbi ni bagidyaka eedi.
40013049	Era kityo niiye owekyalibba oku nkomerero yʼekyalo. Abamalaika baliiza ni baabulamu abantu abakola ebibbibibbi mwabo abatuukirirye.
40013050	Kaisi abo abakola ebibbibibbi balibasindika omu musyo ogwʼamaani eino, eeyo e walibba okukunga nʼokuŋiiya amaino.”
40013051	Kale awo oYesu nʼabuulya abeegibe ati, “Mutegeire ebintu ebyo byonabyona ebimbeegeserye?” Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Niikyo ekyo.”
40013052	Awo nʼabakoba ati, “Kale atyanu buli mukugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, iye asuuka omwegi omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu, ali ooti muntu aali nʼenyumbaye kaisi omu kisenge ekyabisamu ebintu, nʼatoolerangamu ebintu ebiyaaka nʼebikaire.”
40013053	Awo oYesu oweyamalire okubagerera engero egyo, nʼazwa omu kitundu ekyo,
40013054	nʼayaba e Naazaleesi omu kibuga kyʼe waabwe nʼatandiika okwegesya omwikumbaaniro lyabwe. Era abantu ni bawuninkirira, ni bakoba bati, “Omusaiza onu yasunire atya amalabuki ago nʼobwezye okukola ebyewunyo binu?
40013055	Oyo tiniiye omutaane wa mubaizi? Omaaye tiniiye ogubeeta oMalyamu? Nʼabagandabe tiniibo oYaakobbo nʼoYusufu, nʼoSimooni nʼoYuda?
40013056	Era aboonyokobe bonabona tibabba kwaiswe kunu na iswe? Kaisi oolwo atoola yaina amalabuki agatyo nʼobwezye obwo bwonabwona?”
40013057	Awo ni bamukwatira engongi. Neye iye oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Onaabbi bamuwa ekitiisya wonawona okutoolaku omu kitundu kyʼe waabwe, nʼomu nyumba yʼe waabwe.”
40013058	Era eeyo tiyakolereyo ebyewunyo ebingi olwakubba abantu baayo tibabbaire nʼokwikirirya.
40014001	Kale awo omu kiseera ekyo, oKerode omufugi wʼeitwale lyʼe Galiraaya nʼawulira okufuma kwa Yesu.
40014002	Nʼakoba abaweereryabe ati, “Omuntu oyo ateekwa okubba Yokaana oMubatizi niiye azuukiire, era nga niikyo ekigira ali nʼobwezye okukola ebyewunyo.”
40014003	Ekyo kyabbairewo olwakubba oKerode yabbaire akwaite oYokaana nʼamusiba, nʼamwigalira omu mabbuusu, ngʼagenderera kusangaalya Kerodiya, omukali wa mugandawe oFiripo oguyabbaire abandwire.
40014004	Ekyo kyabbairewo olwakubba oYokaana yabbaire adeebere oKerode ati, “ Amateeka tigaikirirya iwe okutwala oKerodiya okubba mukaliwo.”
40014005	Era newankubbaire oKerode yabbaire ataka okwita oYokaana, neye yabbaire atya aBayudaaya olwakubba ibo babbaire baikirirya bati oYokaana naabbi.
40014006	Neye oku lunaku lwa kwewukiriryaku olubabyaliire oKerode, omwala wa Kerodiya nʼabina nʼasangaalya ino oKerode.
40014007	Nʼolwekyo, omu kirayiro oKerode nʼasuubiza okuwa omwala oyo kyonakyona ekiyamusaba.
40014008	Iye omwala nʼakolera ku malabuki omaaye ageyamuwaire, kale nʼakoba oKerode ati, “Ompe aanu mutwe gwa Yokaana oMubatizi nga baguteekere okwitiba.”
40014009	Ekyo ni kiruma ino okabaka, neye olwakubba yabbaire alayiire, aate nga nʼabagenibe bawuliire, nʼalagira ni bamukolera ekiyasabire.
40014010	Era okabaka nʼalagira ni baaba omu mabbuusu batemaku oYokaana omutwe.
40014011	Era ni baguleetera okwitiba, ni baguwa omwala, era yena nʼagutwalira omaaye.
40014012	Kale awo abeegi ba Yokaana ni baaba, ni batwala omulambogwe, ni baguliika kaisi ni baaba bakobera oYesu ebibbairewo.
40014013	Awo oYesu oweyawuliire ati batemereku oYokaana omutwe, nʼazwa omu kifo ekyo nʼabeegibe, ni baniina omu lyato, ni baaba bonkani omu kifo ekinambulamu bantu. Neye ekiyindi kyʼabantu bʼomu bibuga ebyeruguuliriirye aawo owekyategeireku, ni kisenjaayo nʼebigere nga kibita oku mbale mbale kwʼenyanza.
40014014	OYesu oweyatuukire oku lukalu, nʼabona ekiziima kyʼabantu kinene nga kiri awo, nʼakikwatira ekisa, nʼalamya ababbairemu abalwaire.
40014015	Obwire owebwabbaire nga bwirugala, abeegi ni baaba egiri oYesu, ni bamukoba bati, “Ekifo kinu mpaamu bantu, aate nga nʼobwire buunu bwabire. Abantu obaseebule baabe beegulire ekyokulya omu byalo ebiriraine aanu.”
40014016	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Tikibeetaagisya ibo okwaba, wazira niinywe omubbe mubawe ekyokulya balye.”
40014017	Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Tulikuuwo aanu nʼemigaati mitaanu gyonkani, nʼenyanyi ibiri.”
40014018	OYesu nʼakoba ati, “Mubindeetere aanu.”
40014019	Era nʼalagira abantu okutyama ansi okwisubi, awo nʼatoola emigaati emitaanu, nʼenyanyi eibiri, kaisi nʼalingirira omwigulu, ni yeebalya oKibbumba. Awo nʼavunavunamu emigaati, nʼagiwa abeegibe ni bagigabira abantu.
40014020	Era abantu bonabona baliire ni baikuta, era abeegibe ni bakumbaania ebitundutundu ebyafiikireku, ni baizulya ebiibo ikumi na bibiri.
40014021	Obungi bwʼabantu abaliire, babbaire abasaiza ooti 5,000, nga tibabaliireku abakali nʼabaana.
40014022	Awo ngʼebyo byankawa, oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe okuniina omu lyato beesooke baabenge oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza, nga iye akaali aseebula abantu.
40014023	Oweyamalire okuseebula abantu, nʼaniina oku lusozi yenkani okusaba oKibbumba. Endikiirya oweyakwatiire yabbaire akaali ali eeyo.
40014024	Neye omu kiseera ekyo eryato abeegi eribabbairemu lyabbaire yala nʼoku lukalu, era amayengo gabbaire mangi nga gakubba eryato olwʼogumpunga ogwabbaire gufuwa nga gubazwera omu maiso.
40014025	Obwire owebwabbaire bwatira okuca, oYesu nʼayaba egibabbaire ngʼatambula oku maizi.
40014026	Neye ibo owebamuboine ngʼatambula oku maizi, ni batya ino, ni bakoba bati, “Kyewo!” Ni bakubba enduulu olwʼokutya.
40014027	Neye amangu ago oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Ninze! Timwatya, mwiremu omwoyo.”
40014028	Awo oPeetero nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, ondagire ntambulire oku maizi nga njiza egyoli, owoobbanga dala niiwe.”
40014029	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Oize.” Awo oPeetero nʼazwa omu lyato, nʼatambula oku maizi ngʼayaba egiri oYesu.
40014030	Neye oPeetero oweyaboine amayengo olwʼogumpunga ogwʼamaani nʼatya. Awo nʼatandiika okweinika, kaisi nʼaceera ati, “Musengwa, ondamye!”
40014031	Amangu ago oYesu nʼagolola engalo, nʼamukwata, nʼamukoba ati, “Lwaki obuusabuusire? Ngʼooli nʼokwikirirya kutono!”
40014032	Kale awo owebaniinire omu lyato, ompunga nʼawaaku.
40014033	Kaisi awo abeegi badi ababbaire omu lyato ni basinza oYesu nga bamukoba bati, “Dala, oli Mwana wa Kibbumba.”
40014034	Awo owebasaliremu enyanza ni basomoka kudi, batuukiire mu kitundu kyʼe Genesareeti.
40014035	Era abantu bʼomu kitundu ekyo owebamanyicirye oYesu, ni batumisya obukwenda omu bitundu ebyeruguuliriirye aawo byonabyona. Era abantu ni bamuleetera abalwaire baabwe bonabona,
40014036	era ni bamwegairira aikirirye abalwaire nago bakwateku-bukwati oku mugo gwʼekizwalokye. Era bonabona abakikwaiteku, ni balama.
40015001	Awo abamo oku Bafalisaayo nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa ni bazwa e Yerusaalemi, ni baaba egiri oYesu, ni bamubuulya bati,
40015002	“Lwaki abeegibo tibasengererya obulombolombo bwa bazeiza baiswe? Ekyo kityo olwakubba ibo owebabba baaba okulya, tibanaaba omu ngalo!”
40015003	Neye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Kaisi lwaki inywe nywena muvuna ekiragiro kya Kibbumba olwʼokutaka okusengererya obulombolombo bwanywe?
40015004	Iye oKibbumba yakobere ati, ‘Oiteewo nʼomaawo obawenge ekitiisya,’ era ati, ‘Eyazumanga oiteeye ooba omaaye, bamwitenge-bwiti.’
40015005	Neye inywe mukoba muti singa omuntu akoba oiteeye ooba omaaye ati, ‘Ekinandikuwaire ngʼobubbeeri, nkiwaire Kibbumba.’
40015006	Awo omuntu oyo nga takaali abbaaku nʼakantu kadi kamo akaakolera oiteeye ooba omaaye. Omu ngeri eyo oKibbumba ekyakoba ni mukidibya ni musengererya bulombolombo bwanywe.
40015007	Bananfunsi inywe, kaisi ekibono kya Kibbumba onaabbi Isaaya ekiyabalagwireku kituuce, oweyakobere ati:
40015008	‘Abantu banu bampa ekitiisya mu bibono-bubono, neye emyoyo gyabwe gimbulaku.
40015009	Era nʼengeri egibansinzamu tintuuce, olwakubba ebibono ebyʼabantu-obuntu, niibyo ebibeegesya bati Mateeka ga Kibbumba.’ ”
40015010	Awo olundi oYesu nʼayeta ekiziima kyʼabantu, ni kyaba egyali, nʼakikoba ati, “Mumpulisisye era mutegeere
40015011	Ekyo omuntu ekyalya tiniikyo ekimusuuca okubba owa muliko omu maiso ga Kibbumba, neye ekyo ekizwa omu mwoyogwe niikyo ekimusuuca okubba owa muliko.”
40015012	Awo abeegibe ni baaba egyali, ni bamubuulya bati, “Omaite oti aBafalisaayo kibanyiigisirye owebawuliire ekyo?”
40015013	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Buli kimera oBbaabba aali omwigulu ekinandi nʼakoma balikiiya ni kizwayo paka nʼemiri.
40015014	Mubaleke, abo abali ooti beekubbemberi aboofu. Singa omwofu yeekubbembera omwofu omwinaye, bonabona bagwa omu kiina.”
40015015	Awo oPeetero nʼamukoba ati, “Otusonzolere amakulu gʼolugero oolwo.”
40015016	OYesu nʼakoba ati, “Nywena mukaali okutegeera?
40015017	Timubona muti buli kintu ekibalya kyaba mu kida, era kizwamu ni kiwuluka omu mubiri?
40015018	Neye omuntu ebyatumula bizwa mu mwoyo, era ebyo niibyo ebisuuca omuntu okubba owa muliko omu maiso ga Kibbumba.
40015019	Ekyo kityo olwakubba omu mwoyo gwa muntu niimwo omuzwa ebiseego ebibbibibbi, nʼobwiti, nʼobulendi, nʼobudankaani, nʼobwibbi, nʼokusibirirya oku bantu, nʼokutumula ebyakalebule oku bantu.
40015020	Era ebintu ebyo niibyo ebisuuca omuntu okubba owa muliko omu maiso ga Kibbumba. Neye omuntu okulya nga tanaabire omu ngalo, tikimusuuca owa muliko.”
40015021	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe ni bazwa omu kifo ekyo, ni baaba omu kitundu ekiriraine ebibuga oTiiro nʼoSidoni.
40015022	Omukali oMukanani, neye nga mutyami wʼomu kitundu ekyo, nʼayaba egiri oYesu, ngʼamwaminkirira ati, “Musengwa, iwe oKurisito oMwizukulu wa Dawudi, onkwatire ekisa! Omwala wange aliku omuzimu, era gumugadya ino!”
40015023	Neye oYesu nandi nʼamwiramu kadi. Kale abeegibe ni baaba egyali ni bamwegairira bati, “Omuseebule ayabe olwakubba atusengererya ngʼatuceererera!”
40015024	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Nze bantumire eeri bantu bʼe Isirairi bonkani abali ooti ntaama egyagotere.”
40015025	Neye era omukali oyo nʼayaba nʼakomera oYesu amazwi era nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, ombeere!”
40015026	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Tikituuce okutoola ekyokulya kyʼabaana ni bakimumira embwa gyabwe.”
