40015027	Omukali nʼakoba ati, “Niikyo ekyo Musengwa, neye nʼembwa gyona, girya obukunkumukira obuzwa oku menza ya Musengwa waagyo.”
40015028	Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Mukali iwe, oli nʼokwikirirya kwʼamaani! Aale kibbe kityo ngʼowootaka.” Era omwalawe nʼalamirawo omu saawa eyo.
40015029	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe ni bazwa omu kifo ekyo, ni baaba oku mbale kwʼenyanza oGaliraaya, nʼaniina oku lusozi nʼatyama.
40015030	Era ebiyindi byʼabantu ebinene ni byaba egyali nga bamutwalira abaleme, nʼaboofu, nʼabanialuuki, nʼababbubbu, nʼabalwaire abandi bangi. Era abalwaire abo ni babateeka omu maisoge, nʼabalamya.
40015031	Kale abantu ni bawuninkirira nga babona ababbaire babbubbu batumula, ababbaire banialuuki nga babba kusani, ababbaire abaleme batambula, ababbaire aboofu nga babona. Era ni bagulumalya oKibbumba wa Isirairi.
40015032	Awo oYesu nʼayeta abeegibe, ni baaba egyali, nʼabakoba ati, “Abantu banu bankwatisirye ekisa olwakubba bamalire na nze enaku isatu nambirira, aate atyanu badambaku ekibalya. Tintaka okubaseebula ngʼenzala ebaluma, bademba babbalikira omu nzira.”
40015033	Abeegibe ni bamwiramu bati, “Omu kitundu kinu omunambula muntu twatoola yaina ekyokulya ekimala okwikutya ekiziima kyʼabantu ekityo?”
40015034	OYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Muliwo nʼemigaati mimeka?” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Musanvu, nʼobunyanyi obukafingiri butono buti.”
40015035	Awo nʼalagira abantu batyame ansi,
40015036	nʼatoola emigaati omusanvu nʼobunyanyi, ni yeebalya oKibbumba. Era nʼabivunavunamu, nʼabikwatisya abeegibe, era bona ni babigabira abantu.
40015037	Era abantu bonabona ni balya ni baikuta. Era abeegibe ni bakumbaania ebitundutundu ebyafiikireku, ni baizulya ebiibo musanvu.
40015038	Obungi bwʼabantu abaliire, babbaire abasaiza 4,000, nga tibabaliireku abakali nʼabaana.
40015039	Awo oYesu nʼaseebula abantu, kaisi nʼaniina omu lyato, ni baaba omwitwale lyʼe Magadani.
40016001	Awo abamo oku Bafalisaayo nʼaBasedukaayo ni baaba egiri oYesu okumukema. Ni bamusaba abawe akamanyiciryo akalaga kati obwezyebwe buzwa giri Kibbumba.
40016002	Neye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, [“Obwire owebubba nga bwirugala, mukoba muti, ‘Bwabba busa eizo, olwakubba angulu atukuliki.’
40016003	Era amakeezi pwi, mukoba muti, ‘Olwatyanu oikendi yatoonya, olwakubba angulu atukuliki, era awandi ebireri biirugazu zigi.’ Mumaite okuvuunula amakulu gʼemboneka yʼangulu, neye timwezya okuvuunula amakulu gʼebyo ebiri kubbangawo omu kiseera kinu!]
40016004	Abantu bʼomulembe gunu ibo abakola ebibbibibbi, era abazwazwa oku Kibbumba, ibo basaba akamanyiciryo. Neye mpaawo akenjaba okubawa, okutoolaku ako akebakoleire onaabbi Yona.” Awo nʼabazwaku ni yeeyabira.
40016005	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe ni basalamu enyanza ni basomoka oku lubbba ludi, neye ngʼabeegi beerabiire okwabaku nʼemigaati.
40016006	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mulabuke, mwekuume ekizimbulukuca kyʼenjegesya yʼaBafalisaayo nʼaBasedukaayo.”
40016007	Awo ibo ni beegeyamu bati, “Atukoba atyo olwakubba tituleetere emigaati.”
40016008	Neye oYesu oweyamanyicirye ekibakoba, nʼababuulya ati, “Inywe, lwaki mwegeyamu ni mukoba muti mubula emigaati? Nga muli nʼokwikirirya kutono!
40016009	Mukaali okutegeera, era timwewukirya owenagabuliire abantu 5,000 emigaati emitaanu? Kwolwo mwasolongere ebiibo bimeka ebiizwire ebitutundutundu ebyafiikireku?
40016010	Kaisi tete owenagabuliire abantu 4,000 emigaati omusanvu, mwasolongere ebiibo bimeka ebiizwire ebitundutundu ebyafiikireku?
40016011	Lwaki timutegeire muti timbaire ntumula na inywe ku migaati? Kale, aale mwekuume ekizimbulukuca kyʼenjegesya yʼaBafalisaayo nʼaBasedukaayo!”
40016012	Awo ni bategeera bati tabbaire abakoba kwekuuma kizumbulukuca ekibateeka omu migaati, neye kwekuuma njegesya embiibbi eyʼaBafalisaayo nʼaBasedukaayo.
40016013	Awo oYesu nʼayaba nʼabeegibe omu bubuga bwʼomu kitundu ekibeeta Kaisaaliya Firipo, nʼabuulya abeegibe ati, “Abantu owebabba batumula oku Mwana wa Muntu bamweta naani?”
40016014	Ni bamukobera bati, “Abamo bakweta Yokaana oMubatizi, abandi bati mbu niiwe onaabbi Eriya, kaisi nʼabandi bati mbu Yeremiya, ooba omoiza oku banaabbi badi abandi.”
40016015	Awo nʼababuulya ati, “Kaisi inywe munjeta naani?”
40016016	Iye oSimooni Peetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Niiwe oKurisito nago oKibbumba oguyasukireku amafuta, era oMwana wa Kibbumba onyere obwomi.”
40016017	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Simooni, omwana wa Yona, ngʼoli wʼenkabi! Ekyo kityo olwakubba amazima ago, omuntu tiniiye akumanyikisirye, neye Bbaabba aali omwigulu.
40016018	Kale nʼolwekyo nkukoba nti niiwe oPeetero, amakulu gaalyo nti Ibbaale. Era okwibbaale eeryo niigwo omusingi oku nalyemererya ekanisa yange. Era kadi nʼamaani agʼegeyeena tigalyezya okugiyinga.
40016019	Nalikuwa obwezye oku bantu bʼobwakabaka bwʼomwigulu. Era kyonakyona ekiwagaananga oku kyalo oKibbumba yena omwigulu yaabbanga akigaine, era kyonakyona ekiwaikiriryanga oku kyalo oKibbumba yena omwigulu yaabbanga aikiriirye ati kibbeewo.”
40016020	Awo oYesu nʼasisiitira abeegibe okutakoberaku omuntu yenayena bati, niiye oKurisito nago oKibbumba oguyasukireku amafuta.
40016021	Okuzwera omu kiseera ekyo, oYesu nʼatandiika okumanyikisya abeegibe ati ateekwa okwaba e Yerusaalemi. Era ati abantu abakulu omwigwanga, nʼabakabona abakulu, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa bamugadya ino, nʼokumwita, neye oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ibiri, oku lwokusatu yalizuukira.
40016022	Awo oPeetero nʼairya oYesu oku mbale nʼamwakanisya ino ati, “Kadi naire, Musengwa. Ekyo tikyalikutuukaku kadi naire!”
40016023	Neye oYesu nʼagaluka nʼalola oku Peetero kaisi nʼamukoba ati, “Onzwe omu maiso, oli Sitaani! Oli kuntigalira okutuukirirya ekyandeetere olwakubba ebigendererwa bya Kibbumba tiniibyo ebyofaaku, neye ofa ku bya bantu!”
40016024	Awo oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Buli muntu ataka okubba omusengereri wange, ali nʼokwerabira ekyali, ni yeetiika omusalabbagwe ogwa kugada olwʼobwakabaka bwa Kibbumba, era nʼansengererya.
40016025	Ekyo kityo olwakubba buli agezyaku okulamya obwomibwe okululwe, yalibufiirwa, neye buli afiirwa obwomibwe okulwange, yalibulamya.
40016026	Aale kirimu mugasoki omuntu okusuna obusuni bwonabwona obwa ku kyalo, neye kaisi nʼafiirwa obwomibwe? Era dala mpaawo omuntu ekyayezya okuwaayo okugula obwomibwe.
40016027	Ekyo nkitumula olwakubba oMwana wa Muntu ayaba okwizira omu kitiisya kya Iteeye, nʼabamalaikabe, era awo awe buli muntu empeeraye, ngʼasinzirira ku biibyo buli muntu ebiyakolere.
40016028	Mbakobera amazima nti abamo oku bantu abali aanu, tibalifa nga bakaali okubonaku oMwana wa Muntu ngʼaiza okufuga.”
40017001	Enaku mukaaga owegyabitirewo, oYesu nʼayaba nʼoPeetero, nʼabaganda ababiri oYaakobbo nʼoYokaana, nʼabeekubbembera, ni baniina olusozi oluwanvu egibabbaire bonkani.
40017002	Awo embonekaye nʼecuuka nga babona. Omu maisoge ni munekaaneka ooti isana, era ebizwalobye ni bimirikiinya ooti kitangaala.
40017003	Ananyere awo oMusa nʼEriya ni babeerukira nga batumula nʼoYesu.
40017004	Awo oPeetero nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Musengwa, kisa okubba aanu. Singa ewataka, naluka aanu obusiisira busatu: Akamo kako, akandi ka Musa, nʼakandi kʼEriya.”
40017005	Oweyabbaire ngʼakaali atumula ebyo, ekireri ekimirikiinya ni kiiza, ni kibabbuunaku nʼekiiriirye kyakyo. Era eigono ni lizwera omu kireri ekyo nga likoba liti, “Onu niiye oMwana wange oguntaka eino, era ogunsiima eino, mumuwulisisye.”
40017006	Era abeegi abo owebawuliire ekyo, ni bagwa nga bakotamirye amaiso ansi okwitakali olwʼokutya ino.
40017007	Neye oYesu nʼayaba egibali, nʼabakwataku, nʼabakoba ati, “Musetuke, timwatya!”
40017008	Awo owebagangamukire, kadi kubonaku omuntu, okutoolaku oYesu yenkani.
40017009	Era owebabbaire baniinuka oku lusozi, oYesu nʼabasisiitira ati, “Ekimuboine timukikoberangaku muntu yenayena paka oMwana wa Muntu ngʼabamalire kumuzuukiza.”
40017010	Awo abeegibe ni bamubuulya bati, “Olwo lwaki abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa bakoba bati Eriya niiye ateekwa okusooka okwira kaisi oKurisito aize?”
40017011	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Kituuce, Eriya niiye aali nʼokusooka okwira, okwirya emyoyo gyʼabantu obuyaaka.
40017012	Neye mbakobera nti omuntu aali ooti Eriya yaizire ira, neye abantu tibamutegeire, ni bamukola ebintu byonabyona ebibatakire. Era nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo oMwana wa Muntu yena baaba okumugadya.”
40017013	Awo abeegi abo ni bategeera bati yabbaire atumula ku Yokaana oMubatizi.
40017014	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe abasatu owebatuukire awabbaire ekiziima kyʼabantu, omusaiza moiza nʼayaba egiri oYesu nʼamukomera amazwi.
40017015	Era nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, okwatire omutaane wange ekisa olwakubba agwa empimbu, era agadira nakimo ino. Emirundi mingi agwa omu musyo, ooba omu maizi.
40017016	Era mmuleetereku egiri abeegibo, neye ni bakaya okumulamya.”
40017017	Awo oYesu nʼairamu ati, “Abantu inywe abʼomulembe gunu ababula okwikirirya era abʼeitalo, nalimala na inywe kiseera kyenkana aina nga mbaguminkiriza?” Awo nʼakoba oiteeye wʼomwisuka ati, “Ondeetere aanu omwisuka nago.”
40017018	Era awo oYesu nʼakaawuukira omuzimu, ni guzwa oku mwisuka nago, era nʼalama omu kaseera ako.
40017019	Oluzwanyuma abeegi ni baaba egiri oYesu bonkani, ni bamubuulya bati, “Olwo lwaki iswe titwezyerye okugumubbingaku?”
40017020	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Ekyo kityo olwakubba mudamba okwikirirya okumala. Mbakobera amazima nti singa mubba nʼokwikirirya okutyai ooti kampeke aka kalidaali, mwezya okukoba olusozi lunu muti, ‘Ozwe aanu, oyabe aadi,’ era ni lwaba. Era mpaawo ekyalibakaisya. [
40017021	Neye omuzimu ogwʼengeri eyo, tibagubbinga oku muntu anambula kusaba oKibbumba nʼokusiiba].”
40017022	Lumo oYesu nʼabeegibe owebakumbaaniire omu Galiraaya, yabakobere ati, “OMwana wa Muntu baaba okumulyamu olukwe era bamuweeyo eeri abʼobwezye,
40017023	era balimwita. Neye oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ibiri, oku lwokusatu yalizuukira.” Awo owebawuliire entumula eyo ni baizula enima omu myoyo gyabwe.
40017024	OYesu nʼabeegibe owebatuukire e Kaperenawumu, abasolooji ba musolo ogwʼeYeekaalu ni baaba egiri oPeetero, ni bamubuulya bati, “ OMusomesya waanywe iye tawa omusolo gwʼeYeekaalu?”
40017025	Nairamu ati, “Awa.” Oluzwanyuma oPeetero oweyaingiire omu nyumba, oYesu nʼamwesooka okutumula, nʼamukoba ati, “Oseega otya, Simooni? Abakabaka bʼomu kyalo munu, empooza ooba omusolo babitoola ku bantuki? Ku bantu baabwe ababyaliranwa, ooba ku bantu abatali babyaliranwa?”
40017026	Awo oPeetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Ku bantu abatali babyaliranwa.” OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Nʼolwekyo abantu baabwe ababyaliranwa tibateekwa okuwa omusolo.
40017027	Neye obutabanyiigisya, oyabe olobe omu nyanza. Onyanyi oguwasooka okupapalya, wamwasamya omunwa, era wayajiryamu ogundusu gwʼefeeza. Wagutwala nʼogubawa, okusasulira nze na iwe omusolo.”
40018001	Omu kiseera ekyo, abeegi baabire egiri oYesu, ni bamubuulya bati, “Naani akira ekitiisya omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu?”
40018002	Kale awo oYesu nʼayeta omwana omutomuto, kaisi nʼamukoba okwemerera omu maiso gaabwe.
40018003	Awo nʼabakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti, okutoolaku nga mucuukire ni mwewombeeka ngʼabaana abatobato, neye nga bbe timwalingira naire omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu.
40018004	Kale nʼolwekyo buli muntu eyewombeeka ooti mwana onu, niiye akira ekitiisya omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu.”
40018005	OYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Era buli asangaalira omwana ooti yoonu okulwange, abba asangaaliire ninze.
40018006	Neye singa omuntu yenayena azweraku omoiza oku batobato abo abanjikiririryamu okukola ekibbikibbi, ekikirira kimo kusiba muntu oyo ibbaale erizito omu mamiro, ni bamudyaka omu lwabi lwʼenyanza.”
40018007	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okutumula nʼabeegibe ati, “Wobe! Ala abantu bʼoku kyalo nga balabire! Ekyo kityo olwʼebintu ebitendera abantu okukola ekibbikibbi. Kaisi nago era ebintu ebyo biteekwa kubbaawo, neye wobe! Ala omuntu oyo abireeta, ngʼalabire!”
40018008	Era ni yeeyongera ati, “Era singa engaloyo ooba ekigerekyo kikuzweraku okukola ekikole ekibbikibbi, okitemeku era okimume eedi. Kikugasa iwe okusuna obwomi obutawaawo ngʼoli wʼengalo moiza ooba wʼekigere kimo, okukiraku okubba nʼengalo eibiri ooba ebigere ebibiri neye oKibbumba nʼakusindika omu geyeena omuli omusyo ogutalikira.
40018009	Era abba ngʼeriisolyo niiryo erikuzweraku okukola ekikole ekibbikibbi, olyokolemu era olimume eedi. Kisa okusuna obwomi obutawaawo, ngʼoli wʼeriiso limo, okukiraku okusigalya amaiso gonagona, neye ni bakumuma omu geyeena omuli omusyo ogutalikira.”
40018010	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mwegendereze okubona muti timubityamu kadi omoiza kwabo abatobato amaiso. Ekyo kityo olwakubba mbakobera nti omwigulu abamalaika baabwe abababbeera, bulijo batuukirira oBbaabba aali omwigulu. [
40018011	Kaisi era nʼoMwana wa Muntu yaizire kunoonia nʼokulokola baabo ababbaire bagotere].”
40018012	Era awo nʼabagerera olugero ati, “Museega mutya? Singa omuntu owaabba nʼentaamagye 100, kaisi omoiza nʼamugotaku, taleka 99 omu kiriisiryo, kaisi nʼayaba okunoonia oodi agotere?
40018013	Mbakobera amazima nti owamubona, asangaala ino olwʼoyo omoiza, okukiraku olwa gidi 99 etigibbaire gigotere.
40018014	Kale omu ngeri enanyere eyo, nʼoItewaanywe aali omwigulu yena tataka okusindika waire omoiza kwabo abatobato omu geyeena.”
40018015	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okwegesya abeegibe ati, “Singa omwinawo owakukola ekikulumirirya, oyabe egyʼali omukobere ekisobyokye nga muli babiri mwenkani. Singa owakuwulisisya nʼaikirirya ekisobyokye, oolwo obba oiriryewo enkolagana nʼomwinawo oyo.
40018016	Neye singa owaagaana okukuwulisisya, okangeyo egyʼali nʼomwinawo ogondi ooba abandi babiri. Ekyo kityo olwakubba eKiwandiike kikoba kiti buli nsonga bateekwa kugikakasa nʼobujulizi bwa bantu babiri ooba basatu.
40018017	Era singa agaana bona okubawulisisya, okobere ekanisa. Era singa agaana okuwulisisya nʼekanisa, awo ngʼomubitya ngʼowewankubitirye omuntu atali mwikirirya ooba ngʼomusolooji wa musolo inywe abemweta abakola ebibbibibbi.”
40018018	OYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti kyonakyona ekimwagaananga oku kyalo oKibbumba yena omwigulu yaabbanga akigaine, era kyonakyona ekimwaikiriryanga oku kyalo oKibbumba yena omwigulu yaabbanga aikiriirye ati kibbeewo.”
40018019	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Era tete ekindi, mbakobera nti singa ababiri kwinywe oku kyalo owemwaikirizagananga ni mubbaaku nʼekimusaba, oBbaabba aali omwigulu yakibakoleranga.
40018020	Ekyo kityo olwakubba kadi babiri ooba basatu owebabba bakumbaine okulwange, zena mbaawo aamo nabo.”
40018021	Awo oPeetero nʼaigerera egiri oYesu, nʼamubuulya ati, “Musengwa, emirundi mimeka omuntu omunange egiyankolanga ebindumirirya era nga mmusoniya? Mmusoniyenge emirundi egyera musanvu?”
40018022	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Nkukoba nti emirundi timusanvu, neye 70 emirundi musanvu.
40018023	Kagira obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu tubufaananiaku nʼokabaka eyatakire okutegeera empiiya egiyabbaire abanza abakungube.
40018024	Oweyabbaire ngʼatandiika okukebera ebitabo, ni bamuleetera omoiza oku bakungube ogwabanza etalanta 10,000.
40018025	Neye tiyabbaire nʼempiiya okusasula eibbanja. Kale omusengwawe nʼalagira okumutundamu, nʼomukaliwe, nʼabaanabe, nʼebintubye byonabyona, okusasula eibbanja eeryo.
40018026	Awo omukungu oyo nʼagwa oku mazwi omu maisoge, nʼamwegairira ati, ‘Onguminkirizeku era nakusasula gyonagyona.’
40018027	Kale omusengwawe nʼaira nʼamukwatira ekisa, nʼamusoniya eibbanja eeryo, era nʼamuteera.”
40018028	OYesu ni yeeyongera nʼolugero ati, “Neye omukungu oyo oweyazwire awo, nʼayajirya omoiza oku bakungu abainaye ogwabanza edinaali 100. Awo nʼamugwa omu mamiro nga waakoba ati, ‘Onsasule edinaali gyange mangu!’
40018029	Kale omwinaye oyo oluzwanyuma nʼamwegairira ngʼagwire oku mazwi omu maisoge ati, ‘Onguminkirizeku era nakusasula.’
40018030	Neye iye nʼagaana okumusoniya, era nʼayaba nʼamuteeka omu mabbuusu paka ngʼamalire okumusasula eibbanja.
40018031	“Awo abakungu abainaye owebaboine ebibbairewo, ni kibaluma ino, ni baaba ni bakobera omusengwa waabwe byonabyona ebibbairewo.
40018032	Kale awo omusengwawe nʼamweta, nʼamukoba ati, ‘Mukungu iwe omubbimubbi, nkusoniyire eibbanja lyonalyona olwakubba onegairiire.
40018033	Obbaire nga toyezya okukwatira omwinawo ekisa, nga nze ekinkukwatiire?’
40018034	Atyo omusengwawe nʼanyiiga ino, nʼamukwatisya abaisulukale abakuumi bʼamabbuusu bamugadye, era paka ngʼamalire okusasula eibbanja lyonalyona.”
40018035	OYesu nʼamaliirirya ati, “OBbaabba aali omwigulu atyo yena weyalikola buli moiza kwinywe, singa buli muntu omu mwoyogwe tasoniya omwinaye.”
40019001	Awo oYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebibono ebyo, nʼazwa e Galiraaya nʼayaba nʼabeegibe omu kitundu ekyʼe Buyudaaya, oku lubba ludi olwʼomwiga oYoludaani.
40019002	Era ekiyindi kyʼabantu kinene ni kimusengererya, era nʼalamya abalwaire ababbairemu.
40019003	Era eeyo abamo oku Bafalisaayo baabire egiri oYesu okumukema ni bamubuulya bati, “ Amateeka gaikirirya omusaiza okubbinga omukaliwe olwa buli nsonga yonayona?”
40019004	Neye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Timusomangaku eKiwandiike ekikoba kiti okuzwera nakimo oku ntandiika oweyabbumbiire ekyalo, oKibbumba ‘yabbumbire omusaiza nʼomukali.’
40019005	Era nʼakoba ati, ‘Kagira omusaiza yalekanga oiteeye nʼomaaye nabba nʼomukaliwe, era ni basuuka muntu moiza?’
40019006	Olwo nga tibakaali bali babiri, neye nga bali muntu moiza. Kale oKibbumba ekiyagaitire aamo, omuntu takigaitululanga.”
40019007	Awo aBafalisaayo ni bamubuulya bati, “Kale lwaki oMusa yalagiire ati omusaiza awenge omukaliwe ekiwandiiko ekikakasa kiti abbingire omukaliwe, oolwo kaisi ni baawukana?”
40019008	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Olwʼobukakanyali bwʼemyoyo gyʼabantu, oMusa kiyazwireku abaikirirye okubbinganga abakali baabwe. Neye okuzwera nakimo owebabbumbiire ekyalo, tikyabbaire kityo.
40019009	Era mbakobera nti buli abbinga omukaliwe okutoolaku ngʼamubbingire lwa bulendi, kaisi nʼaleeta omukali ogondi, abba abbengere ogwʼobulendi.”
40019010	Awo abeegibe ni bamukoba bati, “Owekibba nga kiri kityo akati wʼomusaiza nʼomukaliwe, ekikira kutafumbirwa.”
40019011	Neye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Tibuli muntu nti aikirirya enjegesya eyo, okutoolaku abo ibo oKibbumba abaabba ayezyesyerye.
40019012	Ekyo kityo olwakubba waliwo ababba ooti balaawe, ibo nga bababyaire nga batyo. Kaisi ni wabbaawo ibo abandi abebalaawire-bulaawi. Era ni wabbaawo nʼabandi ibo nga basalirewo ni babba bawuulu olwʼokutaka kweweerayo nakimo mu kuweererya Kibbumba. Iye oyo ayezya okwikirirya ekyo ekikwata oku bufumbo, akiikirirye.”
40019013	Era wabbairewo abantu abatwaire abaana abatobato egiri oYesu okubateekaku engalo abasabire enkabi. Neye abeegi ni babaloberya nga babakaawuukira.
40019014	Neye oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Muleke abaana abatobato baize egyendi, timwabaloberya, olwakubba abali ooti baabo, niibo ababba omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu.”
40019015	Era oweyamalire okubateekaku engalo okubasabira enkabi, nʼazwa omu kifo ekyo.
40019016	Lumo wabbairewo omusaiza eyaabire egiri oYesu, nʼamubuulya ati, “ Musomesya, kintuki ekisa ekinteekwa okukola, okusuna obwomi obutawaawo?”
40019017	Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Lwaki ombuulya ebikwata oku kintu ekisa? OKibbumba yenkani niiye omusa. Kale owoobba ngʼotaka okusuna obwomi, okwate ebiragirobye.”
40019018	Era omusaiza nago nʼamubuulya ati, “Biragiroki?” Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Tiwaitanga muntu, tiwayendanga, tiwaibbanga, tiwasibiriryanga oku muntu,
40019019	oiteewo nʼomaawo obawenge ekitiisya. Era otakenge omuntu omwinawo, ngʼoweweetaka iwe onyere.”
40019020	Awo omusaiza nago nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Ebyo byonabyona nabituukiriirye. Niki ekindi ekinetaaga okukola?”
40019021	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Obanga otaka okubba atuukiriire, oyabe otunde ebibyo byonabyona, era empiiya egyazwamu ogigabire abadoobi, kaisi oize otambulenge na nze, awo walisuna obusuni omwigulu.”
40019022	Omusaiza nago oweyawuliire ebibono ebyo, nʼayaba nga muyungubali olwakubba yabbaire nʼebyobusuni bingi.
40019023	Awo oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti nga kigosi omusuni okwingira omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu!
40019024	Era mbakobera nti kyanguku okisolo omunene ooti ngamira okubita omu kawundu kʼempisyo, okukiraku omusuni okwingira omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.”
40019025	Abeegi owebawuliire ekyo, ni bawuninkirira ino, ni bamubuulya bati, “Olwo naani ayezya okulokoka?”
40019026	OYesu nʼabalingirira kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Ekyo abantu tibakyezya, neye oKibbumba iye ayezya byonabyona.”
40019027	Awo oPeetero nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Musengwa, aale obone iswe twalekere ebyaiswe byonabyona kaisi tutambulenge na iwe. Olwo twalisuna niki?”
40019028	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti oMwana wa Muntu oweyalityama oku ntebeye eyʼekitiisya, ngʼoKibbumba amalire okwirya buli kintu buyaaka, nywena abatambula na nze, mwalityama oku ntebe egyʼobufugi eikumi na ibiri, ni musalira ebika eikumi na bibiri ebya Isirairi emisango.
40019029	Era buli muntu eyalekere ekisitokye ooba abagandabe, ooba aboonyokobe ooba oiteeye ooba omaaye ooba abaanabe, ooba ebigonabye okulwange, yalisuna emirundi 100, ni bamuwa nʼobwomi obutawaawo.
40019030	Neye bangi kwabo abʼekitiisya omu kiseera kinu abalibba aba bulijo, era bangi kwabo aba bulijo omu kiseera kinu, abalibba abʼekitiisya.”
40020001	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okugerera abeegibe olugero ati, “Obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu tubufaananiaku nʼomuntu onyere omusiri gwʼemizabbibbu, eyabwine okunoonia abapakasi abʼokukola omu musirigwe.
40020002	Era oweyamalire okubasuna nʼokwikirizagana nabo okusasula buli muntu edinaali moiza olunaku, nʼabasindika okukola omu musirigwe ogwʼemizabbibbu.
40020003	Era nʼayaba oku saawa ooti isatu omu katale, nʼayajiryayo abasaiza nga beemereire era nga mpaawo ekibakola.
40020004	Kale nʼabakoba ati, ‘Inywe nywena mwabe mukole omu musiri gwange ogwʼemizabbibbu, era nabasasula kusani.’
40020005	Kale bona ni baaba era ni batandiika okukola. Era tete nʼayaba omu katale oku saawa ooti mukaaga, nʼoku saawa ooti mwenda, ngʼayajiryayo abapakasi era ngʼabasindika okukola omu musirigwe.
40020006	Era nʼoku saawa ooti ikumi na moiza nʼayaba omu katale, nʼayajiryayo abandi nga beemereire, nʼababuulya ati, ‘Lwaki mwemereire aanu olunaku lwonalwona nga mpaawo ekimukola?’
40020007	“Awo ibo ni bamwiramu bati, ‘Ekyo kityo olwakubba mpaawo atuwaire ekipakasi.’ Kale iye nʼabakoba ati, ‘Kale nywena mwabe mukole omu musiri gwange ogwʼemizabbibbu.’ ”
40020008	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Eigolo esaawa egyokwinukiramu owegyatuukire, onyere omusiri nʼakoba onyampalawe ati, ‘Oyete abapakasi, era obasasule empeera yaabwe, ngʼotandiikira kwabo abasembereyo okwiza okukola, kaisi osembyeyo abasookere oku mulimo.’
40020009	Era badi abatandiikire okukola oku saawa eikumi na moiza buli muntu nʼasuna edinaali moiza moiza.
40020010	Kale awo abasookere oku mulimo owebaabire okubasasula, ni basuubira okusuna kineneku. Neye era bona ni basuna edinaali moiza moiza buli muntu.
40020011	Era owebagisunire, ni batandiika okwezulugumira onyere omusiri,
40020012	bati, ‘Badi ibo abaizire oluzwanyuma batambire okumala esaawa moiza yonkani, kaisi dala nʼobasasula kyenkanyi na iswe abatambire olunaku lwonalwona, nga tukaanya nʼeisana!’
40020013	“Neye onyere omusiri nʼairamu omoiza kwibo ati, ‘Munange, tindi kukubitya kubbikubbi. Aale nandi nʼoikirirya okukolera edinaali moiza olunaku?
40020014	Kale okwate empeerayo, era oyabe. Era kutaka kwange nze okusasula nʼaizire oluzwanyuma yena kyenkanyi na iwe.
40020015	Olwo tindi wʼeidembe okukolesya empiiya gyange ngʼowentaka? Ooba ogongera olwakubba mpaire badi ababbaire bankaiza kyenkanyi na inywe omwizire eira?’ ”
40020016	Awo oYesu nʼamaliirirya ati, “Kale nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo abʼekitiisya omu kiseera kinu balibba babulijo, era bangi kwabo aba bulijo omu kiseera kinu, abalibba abʼekitiisya.”
40020017	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼayaba e Yerusaalemi nʼabeegibe, nʼairya abeegibe eikumi na babiri oku mbale, nʼabakoba ati,
40020018	“Tuli kwaba e Yerusaalemi, era eeyo oMwana wa Muntu baaba okumulyamu olukwe bamuweeyo eeri abakabona abakulu, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa. Era baaba okumusalira ogwʼokufa,
40020019	kaisi bamuweeyo eeri aBatali Bayudaaya okumujerega, nʼokumufaamuulira efaalu egiriku emirobo egisima, nʼokumukomerera oku musalabba. Neye oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ibiri, oku lwokusatu yalizuukira.”
40020020	Awo oluzwanyuma lwʼekyo omuka Zebedaayo nʼayaba nʼabataanebe ababiri egiri oYesu, nʼakoma amazwi, nʼamusaba amukwatire ekisa.
40020021	Awo oYesu nʼamubuulya ati, “Niki ekyotaka?” Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Osuubize oti abataane bange banu balityama nga bakuliraine ngʼoli omu bwakabakabwo, omoiza oku lubbaalwo olwʼengalo endiiro, kaisi ogondi oku lwʼengooda nga bafugira aamo na iwe.”
40020022	Neye oYesu nʼakoba abaganda abo ati, “Ekimusaba timukimaite. Mwezya okunywa oku kipimo kyokugada ekinjaba okunywa?” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Twezya.”
40020023	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Ekipimo kyange ekyokugada dala mwalikinywaku. Neye ekyʼokutyama nga mundiraine oku lubba lwange olwʼengalo endiiro ooba engooda, tininze nsalawo, neye oBbaabba yalikigabira baabo abeyakitegekeire.”
40020024	Awo abeegi badi eikumi owebawuliire abaganda abo ekibasaba, ni banyiiga olwʼabaganda nago.
40020025	Kale oYesu nʼabeeta bonabona aamo, kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Mumaite muti abafugi bʼabo aBatali Bayudaaya bataka kubaweererya. Era abakungu baabwe abakulu bataka abantu abebafuga babamanye bati babaliku obwezye.
40020026	Neye mwinywe, tiniikyo owekiri nʼokubba. Wazira mwinywe, buli ataka okubba omukulu, ateekwa kubba muweererya wʼabainaye.
40020027	Era buli ataka okubba omukulu wa bainaye, ali nʼokubba muweererya wʼabainaye.
40020028	Era nʼoMwana wa Muntu, tiyaizire bamuweererye, neye kuweererya, era nʼokuwaayo obwomibwe, ngʼomugaito okununula abangi.”
40020029	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe owebabbaire nga bazwa e Yeriko, ekiyindi kyʼabantu ekinene ni kibasengererya.
40020030	Atyanu wabbairewo aboofu babiri nga batyaime oku nzira. Owebawuliire bati oYesu abita, ni batandiika okutumula maaminkirira bati, “Musengwa, iwe oKurisito oMwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi, otukwatire ekisa!”
40020031	Awo abantu ni babakaawuukira nga babakoba basirike. Neye ibo ni beeyongera-bweyongeri kwaminkirira bati, “Musengwa, iwe oKurisito oMwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi, otukwatire ekisa!”
40020032	Kale oYesu nʼayemerera nʼayeta aboofu abo, nʼababuulya ati, “Mutaka mbakolere niki?”
40020033	Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Musengwa, otulamye amaiso gaiswe gabone.”
40020034	Era oYesu nʼabakwatira ekisa, nʼakwata oku maiso gaabwe. Amangu ago amaiso gaabwe ni galama, era ni beeyabira naye.
40021001	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe owebabbaire batira okutuuka omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, era nga baigereire e Bbesufaage ekiri oku lusozi olubeeta oLusozi olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni, oYesu nʼatuma babiri oku beegibe,
40021002	ngʼabakoba ati, “Mwabe omu kitundu ekyo ekiri omu maiso awo, era owemwabba mwankaingira muti, mwabona ompunda ogubasibire ngʼali nʼomwanawe. Mugiteere era mugindeetere.
40021003	Owewabbaawo abakobaku, mwamwiramu muti oMusengwa niiye agyetaaga, era amangu ago yabaikirirya ni mugireeta.”
40021004	Ekyo kyabbairewo kutuukirirya Musengwa oKibbumba ekiyatumwire ngʼabitira omu naabbi ekikoba kiti:
40021005	“Mukobere abantu bʼe Sayuuni muti: ‘Aale mubone, okabaka waanywe aiza egimuli. Muwombeeki, era aiza ngʼatyaime oku mpunda, ekikoba nti aiza ngʼali oku mpunda omutomuto.’ ”
40021006	Kale abeegi abo ababiri ni baaba, ni bakola ngʼoYesu oweyabalagiire.
40021007	Era ni baleeta ompunda nʼomwanawe, ni bagiteekaku ebizibaawo byabwe, era oYesu nʼatyama oku mwana wa mpunda.
40021008	Era ekiziima kyʼabantu ni kyala omu nzira ebizwalo byabwe, era abandi ni batema bikoola oku misaale, ni baala omu nzira.
40021009	Awo ebiyindi byʼabantu ebyabbaire bimwekubbembeire, nʼebindi nga bimuzwaku enyuma, ni baaba nga baaminkirira bati, “Tuwuuje oKurisito oMwizukulu wa Dawudi! Wʼenkabi oyo iye aiza omu liina lya Musengwa oKibbumba! Tumuwuuje oMusengwa aali omwigulu!”
40021010	Awo oYesu oweyatuukire omu Yerusaalemi, abantu bonabona ni bawuninkirira. Era ni babuulya bati, “Naani oyo?”
40021011	Ni babairamu bati, “Onu niiye oYesu, oNaabbi owʼe Naazaleesi ekyʼe Galiraaya.”
40021012	Awo oYesu nʼaingira omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, nʼabbingamu abo bonabona ababbaire batundiramu, era nʼababbaire baguliramu ebintu. Nʼagangulyaga amamenza gʼabawanyisya empiiya, nʼebityamo ebyʼababbaire batundiramu enjiiwa.
40021013	Era nʼabakoba ati, “Bakiwandiikire bati, ‘Enyumba yange yaabbanga nyumba ya kusabiramu.’ Neye inywe mugisuucirye mpuku yʼabanyagi omu beebisa.”
40021014	Awo oluzwanyuma aboofu nʼabaleme bangi ni baaba egiri oYesu omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, era nʼabalamya.
40021015	Neye abakabona abakulu nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa owebaboine ebyewunyo ebiyakolere, era ni bawulira abaana nga baaminkirira omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, bati, “Tumuwuuje oMwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi,” ni banyiiga.
40021016	Kale ni bakoba oYesu bati, “Owulira abaana abo ebibakoba?” Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Niikyo ekyo. Neye timusomangaku eKiwandiike ekikoba kiti, ‘Wayegeserye abaana abatobato nʼebibbuuta okukuwuuja kusani!’ ”
40021017	Awo nʼabaleka era nʼazwa omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, nʼayaba nʼabeegibe okugona e Bbesaniya.
40021018	Awo oku lunaku olwairireku, amakeezi oYesu nʼabeegibe owebabbaire bakanga omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, oYesu enzala nʼemuluma.
40021019	Era awo nʼalengera omusaale omutiini oku nzira. Nʼayaba nʼagutuukaku, neye nandi nʼayajiryaku kineneka kadi kimo okutoolaku ebikoola byonkani. Awo nʼagukoba ati, “Toirangayo okuneneka emirembe gyonagyona!” Era amangu ago omutiini ni gutandiika okukala.
40021020	Era abeegi owebaboine ekyo, ni beewunya era ni babuulya bati, “Omusaale omutiini gukalire gutya amangu ago?”
40021021	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti singa mubba nʼokwikiririrya omu Kibbumba era nga timubuusabuusa, mwezya okukola ekinkolere oku mutiini ogwo. Era tiniikyo ekyo kyonkani, neye mwezya nʼokukoba olusozi lunu muti, ‘Weeginge oyabe weemume omu nyanza,’ era ni kituukirira.
40021022	Era singa mwabbanga nʼokwikirirya, buli ekimwasabanga oKibbumba mwakisunanga.”
40021023	Awo oYesu oweyakangire omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, abakabona abakulu, nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, ni baaba egyali ngʼayegesya, ni bamubuulya bati, “Oli nʼobwezyeki okukola ebintu ebyo ebyokola? Era naani eyakuwaire obwezye obwo?”
40021024	Neye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Zena oleke mbabuulye ekibuulyo kimo. Era singa mwanjiramu, zena nabakobera egintoola obwezye okukola ebintu binu.
40021025	Naani eyatumire oYokaana okubatiza, Kibbumba ooba bantu?” Awo ni beegeyamu bati, “Singa tumwiramu tuti, Kibbumba niiye eyamutumire, ayaba okutubuulya ati, ‘Kaisi lwaki oYokaana iye timwamwikiririiryemu?’
40021026	Neye singa tumwiramu tuti, abantu niibo abamutumire, tutya abantu olwakubba bonabona baikirirya dala bati oYokaana yabbaire naabbi.”
40021027	Kale ni bairamu oYesu bati, “Titumaite.” Awo oYesu yena nʼabakoba ati, “Aale zena tinabakobere obwezye obundinabwo okukola ebintu binu.”
40021028	Awo oYesu nʼakoba abakabona abakulu nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga ati, “Neye museega mutya ku kinu? Wabbairewo omusaiza eyabbaire nʼabataanebe babiri. Era lumo nʼakoba omukulu waaku ati, ‘Mwana wange, olwatyanu oyabe okole omu musiri gwʼemizabbibbu.’
40021029	Neye iye nʼamwiramu ati, ‘Tinaabe bbe.’ Neye oluzwanyuma nʼacuusa enseegaye, nʼayaba nʼakola.
40021030	Era oiteeye wa baana abo nʼakoba nʼomutomuto waaku ekintu ekinyere ekyo. Oyo iye nʼamwiramu ati, ‘Bbaabba oleke njabe.’ Neye nandi nʼayaba okukola ekyamukobere.”
40021031	Kale oYesu nʼabuulya abakabona abakulu nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga ati, “Naani oku baana abo ababiri eyakolere oitewaabwe ekiyatakire?” Ni bairamu bati, “Omukulu waaku.” Awo oYesu nʼabakobera ekyategeeza ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti abasolooji ba musolo nʼabamalaaya baaba okwingira omu obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba okukiraku inywe,
40021032	olwakubba oYokaana oMubatizi yaizire egimuli, nʼabalaga enzira entuuce, nandi ni mumwikiririryamu. Neye abasolooji ba musolo nʼabamalaaya, ibo ni bamwikiririryamu. Era ekyo nʼowemwakiboine, mwagaine okumwikiririryamu nʼokwenenya ebikole byanywe ebibbibibbi.”
40021033	OYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Muwulire olugero olundi. Wabbairewo omuntu eyabbaire nʼekigona, nʼakomamu omusiri gwʼemizabbibbu. Nʼagusitaku olukita, nʼakuulamu ekikunyiro, nʼayombekamu ekifo ekigingice nga kuliku nʼakasiisira abakuumi omu balengerera. Olwo nʼaguteekamu abapangisya, era nʼazwawo nʼayaba omu lugendo.
40021034	Awo ekiseera ekyʼamakungula owekyabbaire kituukire, nʼatuma abagalamabe eeri abapangisya, bamuweeku omugabogwe oku bineneka byʼomusiri gwʼemizabbibbu.
40021035	Neye abapangisya ni bakwata abagalamabe, ni bakubba omoiza, ogondi ni bamwita, nʼogondi ni bamukasuukirira amabbaale.
40021036	Oluzwanyuma lwʼekyo nʼabasindikira tete abagalama abandi bangi okukiraku abasookere. Era ni bababitya mu ngeri nanyere eyo.
40021037	Awo oluzwanyuma lwʼebyo byonabyona nʼabatumira omutaanewe ngʼakoba ati, ‘Omutaane wange bamuwa iye ekitiisya.’
40021038	Neye abapangisya owebaboine omutaane nago, ni beegeyamu bati, ‘Onu niiye omusika! Oleke tumwite, era tutwale ebyobusikabwe.’
40021039	Kale ni bamukwata, ni bamutoola omu musiri gwʼemizabbibbu ogwo ni bamutwala ni bamwita.”
40021040	Awo oYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Kale awo onyere omusiri ogwo oweyaliira, museega muti yalikola niki abapangisya abo?”
40021041	Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Yaliita abasaiza ababbibabbi abo bundi, era nʼomusiri ogwo nʼagupangisyamu abandi ibo abamuwanga omugabogwe oku bineneka buli makungula.”
40021042	Awo oYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Timukisomangaku omu Biwandiike ekiti? ‘Eibbaale abombeki eribagaine, lisuukire niiryo erikulu erisiba ensonda. Ekyo oMusengwa niiye eyakikolere, ni tukibona, ni tukyewunya.’ ”
40021043	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Nʼolwekyo mbakobera nti obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba balibabutoolaku inywe aBayudaaya, ni babugabira abantu abalikola ebikole ebisa. [
40021044	Era buli muntu agaana enjegesya yange ali ooti muntu agwa okwibbaale eeryo, nʼavunikavunika, era ali ooti yooyo oguligwaku ni limususungula].”
40021045	Awo abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo owebawuliire olugero oolwo, ni bategeera bati abbaire atumula ku niibo.
40021046	Kale ni bagezyaku okumukwata, neye ni batya ekiziima kyʼabantu olwakubba ibo abantu babbaire bamaite oYesu ngʼonaabbi.
40022001	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera tete okutumula nʼabeekubbemberi ba Bayudaaya ngʼakolesya ngero, nʼakoba ati,
40022002	“Obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu tubufaananiaku nʼokabaka eyategekeire omutaanewe embaga yʼobugole.
40022003	Awo esaawa yʼembaga oweyatuukire nʼatuma abagalamabe okukoba abagenibe abeete baabe oku mbaga. Neye abageni ni bagaana okwaba.
40022004	“Kale nʼatuma abagalama abandi okubakoba bati, ‘Bamalire okutegeka embaga era nʼokusala ente endaawo, nʼente egindi ensava nʼokutegeka nabuli kimo. Kale mwize twabe oku mbaga.’
40022005	Neye abageni abeete kadi kubafaaku era nʼabamo ni beeyabira mubyabwe. Era abandi ni beeyabira mu misiri gyabwe, nʼabandi mu bisuubuuzi byabwe.
40022006	Era nʼabasigairewo ni bakwata abagalamabe ni bababitya kubbikubbi, era ni babaita.”
40022007	OYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Awo okabaka nʼanyiiga, kale nʼasindika abaisulukalebe, ni bajigirica abaiti abo, era ni booca ekibuga kyabwe.
40022008	Awo nʼakoba abagalamabe abandi ati, ‘Embaga yʼobugole bamalire okugitegeka neye abo abembaire njetere tibasaanira.
40022009	Kale mwabe omu mansanganzira gʼenguudo gyʼomu kibuga, era mwanirize ogumwajirya yenayena aize oku mbaga.’
40022010	Era abagalama abo ni baaba omu nguudo gyʼomu kibuga, ni baaniriza bonabona abebaajiirye, abasa nʼababbibabbi, era ekisenge omwabbaire embaga ni kiizula abageni.
40022011	“Neye okabaka oweyaingiire okubona abageni abaizire, nʼabonamu omusaiza atazwaire ebizwalo ebisa ebiwoomera okuzwala oku mbaga yʼobugole.
40022012	Kale okabaka nʼamukoba ati, ‘Munange, oingiire otya munu nga tozwaire ebizwalo ebisa?’ Neye omusaiza oyo yabbaire abula ekyokwiramu.
40022013	Awo okabaka nʼakoba abaweereryabe ati, ‘Mumusibe engalo nʼebigere, era mumumume e nza omu ndikiirya, eeyo egibakungira nʼokuŋiiya amaino olwʼobulumi.’ ”
40022014	Era oYesu nʼamaliirirya ati, “OKibbumba abantu bangi abaayeta okwingira omu bwakabakabwe, neye alondamu batono.”
40022015	Oluzwanyuma lwʼebyo abamo oku Bafalisaayo ni baaba, ni bateesa oku ngeri egibakwatisyamu oYesu omu ntumulaye.
40022016	Awo ni bamutumira abamo oku beegi baabwe, nʼabamo oku bawagiri ba kabaka oKerode, ni bamukoba bati, “ Musomesya, tumaite tuti iwe oli wa mazima, era abantu obeegesya mazima gʼebyo oKibbumba ebyataka bakole. Era tokolerera bantu kukusiima, olwakubba bonabona obabitya mu ngeri moiza.
40022017	Kale atyanu, otukobere, oseega otya? Kituuce okuwa oKaisaali omusolo, ooba bbe?”
40022018	Neye oYesu yabbaire amaite omutego gwabwe, kale nʼabakoba ati, “Bananfunsi inywe, lwaki munkema?
40022019	Mundeetere ondusu ogubasasula omusolo!” Kale ni bamuleetera ondusu,
40022020	kaisi nʼababuulya ati, “Ekifaananyi nʼamaliina ebiriku byani?”
40022021	Ni bamwiramu bati, “Bya Kaisaali.” Awo nʼabakoba ati, “Kale atyanu ebya Kaisaali mubiwe oKaisaali, nʼebya Kibbumba mubiwe oKibbumba.”
40022022	Era owebawuliire ebyo, ni beewunya ino. Kale ni bamuleka, era ni baaba.
40022023	Oku lunaku olunyere oolwo, abamo oku Basedukaayo, abakoba bati mpaawo kuzuukira, ni baaba egiri oYesu.
40022024	Awo ni bamubuulya bati, “Musomesya, oMusa yatukobere ati singa omuntu owaafa nga tabyaireku omwana, omuganda wʼomufu ali nʼokufumbirwa onamwandu oyo, kaisi babyalire omufu nago abaana.
40022025	Atyanu, wabbairewo abaganda musanvu abetwabbaire tumaite. Era asooka nʼaleeta omukali neye nʼafa nga tabyaireku omwana. Kale omugandawe nʼafumbirwa onamwandu oyo.
40022026	Era ekintu ekinyere ekyo niikyo ekyatuukire nʼoku wokubiri nʼoku wokusatu, paka oku womusanvu.
40022027	Oluzwanyuma, omukali yena nʼafa.
40022028	Atyanu oolwo oku lunaku olwʼokuzuukira, omukali oyo yalibba mukaani kwabo omusanvu ngoyo bonabona bamufumbiirweku?”
40022029	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mugota lwʼobutamanya Biwandiike, era nʼobwezye bwa Kibbumba.
40022030	Kiri kiti abantu owebalizuukira, balibba ooti bamalaika omwigulu, nga tibakaali babba nʼobufumbo.
40022031	Kaisi ebifa oku kuzuukira, timusomangaku oKibbumba ekiyakobere? Yakobere ati,
40022032	‘Ninze oKibbumba wa Ibbulaimu, era wa Isaka, era wa Yaakobbo.’ Iye Kibbumba wa bantu ababba aboomi newankubbaire nga bamalire okufa, neye tiwa bantu abasigala omu kufa.”
40022033	Era ekiziima kyʼabantu owekyawuliire ebyo, ni kyewunya enjegesyaye.
40022034	Awo aBafalisaayo owebawuliire bati oYesu akaisirye aBasedukaayo, ni bakumbaana okuteesa ekibamukoba.
40022035	Era omoiza kwibo, omukugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, nʼamubuulya ngʼamukema ati,
40022036	“Musomesya, kiragiroki ekikira byonabyona obukulu omu Mateeka ga Musa?”
40022037	Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Otakenge oMusengwa oKibbumbawo nʼomwoyogwo gwonagwona, nʼobwomibwo bwonabwona, nʼebiseegobyo byonabyona.
40022038	Ekyo niikyo ekiragiro ekisooka, era ekikira obukulu.
40022039	Kaisi ekyokubiri kifaanana nʼekyo, era kiti: ‘Otakenge omuntu omwinawo, ngʼoweweetaka iwe onyere.’
40022040	Era oku biragiro ebyo ebibiri, aMateeka ga Musa gonagona nʼeBiwandiike byʼabanaabbi kubisinzirira.”
40022041	Awo aBafalisaayo owebabbaire nga bakaali bakumbaine awo, oYesu nʼababuulya ati,
40022042	“Museega mutya oku Kurisito ogubasukireku amafuta? Mwizukulu waani?” Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Mwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi.”
40022043	Awo oYesu niiye okubabuulya ati, “Kale oolwo lwaki oDawudi onyere, oweyabbaire ngʼaizwire oMwoyo oMweru, yamwetere Musengwawe? Kiri nti yakobere ati,
40022044	‘OMusengwa oKibbumba yakobere oMusengwa wange ati: Otyame ngʼondiraine oku lubba lwange olwʼengalo endiiro, paka owenaligondya abalabebo ni mbasuuca mukonkolo gwa kuwuumuliryaku ebigerebyo.’ ”
40022045	Awo oYesu nʼamaliriirya ati, “Kale obanga oDawudi onyere amweta Musengwawe, kaisi tete oolwo oKurisito ayezya atya okubba mwizukuluwe?”
40022046	Era ni watabbaawo ayezya okumwiramu kadi kibono. Era okuzwa oolwo ni watabbaawo muntu ogondi eyagumire nʼamubuulya ebibuulyo ebindi.
40023001	Oluzwanyuma lwʼebyo oYesu nʼatumula nʼekiziima kyʼabantu aamo nʼabeegibe,
40023002	ati, “ Abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo niibo abali nʼobwezye okuvuunula aMateeka ga Musa.
40023003	Kale byonabyona ebibabakobera mubikwate, era mubikole. Neye timusengereryanga ebikole byabwe, olwakubba ebibeegesya abantu, tiniibyo ibo abanyere ebibakola.
40023004	Era batiika abantu amateeka amakakaali agatakwatika, neye nga ibo abanyere mpaawo kibakola okubbeera abantu okugakwata.
40023005	Era byonabyona ebibakola, bagenderera bantu kubabona. Kagira beesiba oku mpumi ooba oku ngalo obusawo bwʼamadiba obugalami obukiraku obwʼabandi omubbaamu enyiriri gyʼeBiwandiike. Era eganduula gyabwe nga igyo giriku amajwenjwe amanviriri.
40023006	Era bataka ebifo ebyʼekitiisya oku mbaga, nʼebifo ebikiraku ekitiisya omu makumbaaniro.
40023007	Era bataka nʼokubasugirya nga babawa ekitiisya omu butale, nʼokubeeta bati, ‘ Musomesya.’
40023008	“Neye inywe timwikiriryanga abantu okubeeta bati, ‘Musomesya,’ olwakubba oMusomesya waanywe ali moiza. Era inywe nywenanywena muli boluganda.
40023009	Era oku kyalo timubbangaku nʼomuntu ogumuwa ekitiisya nga mumweta ‘Itewaanywe,’ olwakubba oItewaanywe omu mwoyo ali moiza, era ali mwigulu.
40023010	Era tibabeetanga bati, ‘Beegesi,’ olwakubba omwegesi waanywe ali moiza, era niiye oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.
40023011	Kale akira ekitiisya mwinywe, yaabbanga muweererya wʼabainaye.
40023012	Ekyo kityo olwakubba omuntu yenayena eyegulumalya, balimwica. Neye buli iye oyo eyewombeeka, balimugulumalya.”
40023013	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba ati, “Wobe! Ala abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo nga mwalaba! Bananfunsi inywe! Ekyo kityo olwakubba mukaisya abantu okwingira omu bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu olwʼenjegesya yaanywe eyʼobubbeyi. Inywe abananyere omwegesya timwingira, era ni mukaisya nʼabo abagezyaku okwingira. [
40023014	Wobe! Ala abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo nga mwalaba! Bananfunsi inywe! Ekyo kityo olwakubba munyaga ebintu byonabyona omu manyumba ga banamwandu. Era musaba oKibbumba omu bibono ebingi olwʼokweraga. Nʼolwekyo balibawa ekibonerezo ekikiraku obunene].
40023015	“Wobe! Ala abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo nga mwalaba! Bananfunsi inywe! Ekyo kityo olwakubba mutambula nabuli wantu okucuusaku omuntu kadi moiza okubba musengereri waanywe. Era owemumala okumucuusa era ni mumuleetera okugada ino omu geyeena okukubbisyamu emirundi mibiri.
40023016	“Wobe! Ala nga mwalaba inywe abali ooti beekubbemberi aboofu! Mwegesya muti, ‘Buli alayira ngʼakolesya eYeekaalu okukakasa ekirayiro, tabba nʼomusango owaatatuukirirya ekyasuubizire. Neye buli alayira ngʼakolesya ezaabbu omu Yeekaalu okukakasa ekirayiro, ateekwa okutuukirirya ekyasuubizire.’
40023017	Inywe abasirusiru, era abali ooti bantu aboofu! Ekikira obukulu niikyo ekiriina, Zaabbu, ooba Yeekaalu esuuca ezaabbu okubba ntukulye?
40023018	Era mwegesya muti, ‘Buli alayira ngʼakolesya ekyoto okukakasa ekirayiro, tabba nʼomusango owaatatuukirirya ekyasuubizire. Neye buli alayira ngʼakolesya ekirabo ekiri oku kyoto okukakasa ekirayiro, ateekwa okutuukirirya ekyasuubizire.’
40023019	“Inywe abali ooti bantu aboofu, ekikira obukulu niikyo ekiriina, Kirabo, ooba kyoto ekisuuca ekirabo okubba ekitukulye?
40023020	Kale atyanu oyo alayira ngʼakolesya ekyoto okukakasa ekirayiro, era abba alayire ngʼakolesya nʼebirabo byonabyona ebikiriku.
40023021	Era iye oyo alayira ngʼakolesya eYeekaalu okukakasa ekirayiro, abba alayire nʼoKibbumba abbaamu.
40023022	Era iye oyo alayira ngʼakolesya eigulu okukakasa ekirayiro, era abba alayire ngʼakolesya ntebe ya Kibbumba, nʼoKibbumba agityamaku.
40023023	“Wobe! Ala abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo, nga mwalaba! Bananfunsi inywe! Ekyo kityo olwakubba muwa ekimo kyʼeikumi nʼoku birime ebisembayo obutyai ebimukolesya okuwoomesya ebyokulya. Neye muleka okutuukirirya ebintu ebikira obukulu omu mateeka ngʼobwenkanya, nʼekisa, nʼobwesigwa. Mwankubbaire nga muwa ekimo kyʼeikumi, neye nga timulagajalira ebintu ebindi bidi ebikira obukulu.
40023024	Inywe abali ooti beekubbemberi aboofu, mwegendereza ino okukola ebintu ebitali bikulu omu Mateeka, neye ni mulagajalira ebintu ebikulu kaisi nandi mukitegeera.
40023025	“Wobe! Ala abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo, nga mwalaba! Bananfunsi inywe! Ekyo kityo olwakubba muli ooti bantu abafaayo kunaabyaku ebikopo nʼamatiba ku ngulu kwonkani, neye ngʼomu ntooma mugagi. Nti inywe mukola ebintu, abantu ni baseega bati muli batuukirirye, aate ngʼemyoyo gyanywe giizwire buluvu na inywe okwetakiryanga mwenkani ebisa.
40023026	Bafalisaayo inywe, aboofu omu myoyo, musooke mucuuke muzwe omu biseego byanywe ebibbibibbi kaisi ebimukola nʼebimukoba bibbe bisa.
40023027	“Wobe! Ala abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo, nga mwalaba! Bananfunsi inywe! Ekyo kityo olwakubba muli ooti magombe agebasiigireku erangi enjeru. Era gaboneka nga gatukula oku ngulu, neye ngʼomu ntooma gaizwire magumba gʼabafu, nʼobuvundi.
40023028	Kale nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo na inywe, muboneka ooti bantu abakola ebintu ebyobutuukirirye, neye ngʼomu myoyo gyanywe mwizwire bunanfunsi nʼebiseego ebibbibibbi.”
40023029	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okulabula abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo ati, “Wobe! Ala abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo, nga mwalaba! Bananfunsi inywe! Ekyo kityo olwakubba mutandaza amagombe gʼabanaabbi abazeiza baanywe abebaitire, era ni mujolija nʼamagombe gʼabatuukirirye.
40023030	Era ni mukoba muti, ‘Singa twabbairewo omu biseera bya bazeiza baiswe, nga titwemigiire omu kwita abanaabbi.’
40023031	Kale omu ngeri eyo inywe abanyere ni muwa obukakafu muti muli baizukulu ba badi abaitire abanaabbi era muli ooti niibo.
40023032	Kale aale nywena mwabe omu maiso mumalirirye ekikole ekibbikibbi ekyo abazeiza baanywe ekibatandiikire.
40023033	“Inywe omuli ooti mpiri! Era omuli abakabbikabbi ooti mpiri enfulugundu! Mwalibunuka mutya okubasalira omusango gwʼokubasindika omu geyeena?
40023034	Kale dala nabatumira abanaabbi nʼabasaiza abalabuki era nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa. Neye abamo kwibo mwalibaita, era nʼabandi ni mubakomerera oku misaalaba, nʼabandi ni mubafaamuulira omu makumbaaniro gaanywe era nʼabandi ni mubagudya mu buli kibuga.
40023035	Kagira omusango gwʼokwita abantu bonabona abatuukirirye oku kyalo gwalibba ku niinywe. Niiye owekyalibba, okuzwera oku mutuukirirye Abberi, okutuuka oku Zakaliya omwana wa Bbalakiya, ogubaitiire akati wʼekyoto nʼekifo ekyeru omu Yeekaalu.
40023036	Mbakobera amazima nti, omusango gwʼokwita abantu bonabona abatuukirirye gwalibba ku bantu bʼomulembe gunu.”
40023037	Awo oYesu nʼakunga oku lwʼabantu bʼe Yerusaalemi ati, “Inywe abantu bʼe Yerusaalemi, inywe omwita abanaabbi, era ni mwita nʼabantu oKibbumba ababatumira nga mubakubba nʼamabbaale! Emirundi mimeka egintakire okusolooja abaanabo ooti nkoko owaamaamira obumiyobwe omu biyayabye, neye nga timwikirirya?
40023038	Aale atyanu mwaba okubona ngʼekibuga kyanywe kisigaliire awo ooti kinameje.
40023039	Ekyo kityo olwakubba mbakobera nti timwalimbonaku tete paka owemwalikoba muti, ‘Wʼenkabi oyo iye aiza omu liina lya Musengwa oKibbumba.’ ”
40024001	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire asimbukire ngʼatambula okuzwa omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, abeegibe ni baigerera egyali okumulagisya enyombeka yʼamanyumba gʼeYeekaalu.
40024002	Neye iye nʼabakoba ati, “Mubona amanyumba ago gonagona? Mbakobera amazima nti mpaawo eibbaale kadi limo aanu eryalisigala nga lyombeke oku liinaye. Gonagona baaba kugawumpulyagawo.”
40024003	Awo oluzwanyuma oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼatyaime oku Lusozi olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni ngʼali eeyo yenkani nʼabeegibe, ni baigerera egyali ni bamubuulya bati, “Otukobere ebyo byalibbaawo di? Era kamanyiciryoki akaliraga kati kiseerakyo ekyokwira, era enkomerero yʼekyalo etuukire?”
40024004	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mwekuume tiwaabbaawo abagotesyagotesya.
40024005	Ekyo kityo olwakubba bangi baliiza nga beeyeta Kurisito ogubasukireku amafuta, era baligotesyagotesya bangi.
40024006	Era mwaliwulira entalo aanu nʼaadi, neye timutyanga. Ebyo biteekwa okubbaawo, neye era enkomerero yalibba ekaali okutuuka.
40024007	Eigwanga lyalirumba eigwanga erindi, nʼobwakabaka bwalirumba obwakabaka obundi. Walibbaawo amanzala nʼomusisi ngʼatengeetya ekyalo omu bitundu bingi.
40024008	Neye ebyo byonabyona owebyalibbaawo oolwo okugada kwalibba nga kutandiika-butandiiki.”
40024009	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okubakobera ati, “Abalabe baanywe balibakwata, ni babawaayo eeri abʼobwezye okubagadya era nʼokubaita. Abantu bonabona balibacaawa olwʼeriina lyange.
40024010	Omu kiseera ekyo bangi balizwa omu kwikirirya, era baliryanganamu enkwe era balicaawagana.
40024011	Era abanaabbi abʼobubbeyi bangi baliboneka, era baligotesyagotesya bangi ni bazwa oku Kibbumba.
40024012	Era olwakubba ebikole ebibbibibbi byalyeyongera obungi omu bantu, bangi balirekeraawo okutaka abanaabwe.
40024013	Neye oyo eyaligumira ebigosi ebyo paka oku nkomerero, yalirokoka.
40024014	Era aMawuliro aMasa agakwata oku bwakabaka bwʼomwigulu, baligalaabba eeri amawanga gonagona, oolwo abantu bonabona ni bamanya amazima anambula kyokwekwatisya, kaisi awo enkomerero nʼetuuka.”
40024015	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okutumula nʼabeegibe ati, “Kale mwalibona ekintu ekyomuliko era ekikwatisya enyinya onaabbi Danieri ekiyatumwireku nga bakiteekere omu kifo ekyeru.” Oyo asoma binu amanye amakulu.
40024016	“Abalibba omu Buyudaaya, bairukiranga mu nsozi.
40024017	Kaisi eyalibba e ngulu oku nyumbaye owaikanga ansi, taingiranga omu nyumba ati atoolemu ekiyatwala.
40024018	Era eyalibba omu musiri, takanganga e ika okusyoma ekizwalokye ekindi.
40024019	Abalibba ebida nʼabalibba bayonkesya omu naku egyo, nga baligada ino!
40024020	Aale mwegairire oKibbumba, ebyo tibyabbaawo omu biseera bya ikendi nʼobuwolondoki bwa bbalaafu ooba oku Saabbaato.
40024021	Mbakobeire ekyo olwakubba omu naku egyo, walibbaawo okugada kunene, nga kukira okundi kwonakwona okwabbairekuuwo, okuzwera nakimo omu kubbumba ekyalo paka atyanu. Era tiwalibbaawo tete okugada okundi okwagaagana awo.
40024022	Era singa oKibbumba tiyakendeiryeku-bukendeeri enaku egyo egyʼokugada, tiwankulamirewo omuntu kadi moiza. Neye olwʼabalondemube, enaku egyo yagikendeiryeku.
40024023	“Omu biseera ebyo, singa omuntu owabakobanga ati, ‘Aale mubone oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta ali aanu,’ ooba ati, ‘Ngodi,’ timukiikiriryanga.
40024024	Ekyo kityo olwakubba abaKurisito abʼobubbeyi, era nʼabanaabbi abʼobubbeyi baliboneka. Era balikola obumanyiciryo bwʼebyewunyo nʼebyamagero ebyʼamaani nga bagenderera kugotesya nʼabalondemu ba Kibbumba owekibba kyezyeka.
40024025	Aale muwulire, mbakobeire nga bukaali.
40024026	“Kale singa omuntu yenayena owabakobanga ati, ‘OKurisito omulonde ali omu kitera,’ timwabangayo; ooba ati, ‘Ali omu kisenge,’ timwikiriryanga.
40024027	Ekyo kityo olwakubba, ngʼokumesya kwa ikendi owekumeserya e buzwaisana ni kumoleka nʼoku bugwaisana, nʼokwira kwʼoMwana wa Muntu kutyo niiye owekwalibba.
40024028	“Era okwirakwe kwalimanyikana eeri buli muntu ngʼowebakoba bati, ‘Iwo awo awabba eisaaye, niiwo ensega egyegikumbaanira.’ ”
40024029	Awo ni yeeyongera okubakobera ati, “Omu naku egyo, ngʼekiseera ekyokugada kyankawa, ‘Eisana lyaliirugaza, nʼomweri gwalirekeraawo okwaka; nʼenkota gyalyanuka e ngulu ni gigwa, era nʼamaani agali e ngulu omwibbanga baligatengeetya.’ ”
40024030	Era oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Omu kiseera ekyo akamanyiciryo akalaga kati oMwana wa Muntu aira kaliboneka angulu oku kireri, kaisi oolwo abantu bonabona abʼoku kyalo balikuukulya. Era balibona oMwana wa Muntu ngʼaizira oku bireri okuzwa omwigulu, ngʼali nʼobwezye, nʼekitiisya ekyʼamaani.
40024031	Era oMwana wa Muntu yalituma abamalaikabe nʼamakondeere agavuga eino, era balikumbaania abantube abalondemu, okuzwa mu buli kansonda konakona akʼekyalo kyonakyona.”
40024032	Tete oYesu ni yeeyongera okukobera abeegibe ati, “Aale mubonere oku musaale omutiini mwege. Ebikoola byagwo owebikunkumuka biwaaku, nʼobusaga ni busebuka, nga mumanya muti ebiseera ebyʼensaaca biigereire.
40024033	Nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo, owemubonanga ebyo byonabyona ebimbakobeire nga biri kubbangawo, mumanyanga muti enkomerero eigereire.
40024034	Era mbakobera amazima nti ebintu ebyo byonabyona byaba okubbaawo ngʼabantu abʼomulembe gunu bakaali okufa okuwaawo.
40024035	Eigulu nʼekyalo byaliwaawo, neye ebibono byange tibyaliwaawo kadi naire.”
40024036	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera okubakobera ati, “Neye mpaawo amaite olunaku olunyere kadi saawa, ebyo owebyaligwerawo, waire abamalaika omwigulu, naabba oMwana, okutoolaku oBbaabba yenkani niiye amaite.
40024037	“Era kityo nakimo ngʼowekyabbaire oku mulembe gwa Nuwa, era niiye owekyalibba nʼomu kwira kwʼoMwana wa Muntu.
40024038	Ekyo kityo olwakubba amataba owegabbaire nga gakaali okubbaawo, abantu babbaire nga balya era nga banywa, era nga bafumbirwa, paka oku lunaku oNuwa oluyaingiriire omu lyato.
40024039	Era babbaire tibamaite ekyaba okubbaawo paka amataba owegaizire ni gabasaanyawo bonabona. Era kyalibbeera nakimo kityo oku lunaku oMwana wa Muntu oluyaliiriraku.
40024040	“Owewalibbaawo abasaiza babiri abalibba omu musiri, omoiza balimutwala, kaisi iye ogondi ni bamuleka.
40024041	Era owewalibbaawo abakali ababiri abalibba nga basya oku mengo, omoiza balimutwala, kaisi iye ogondi ni bamuleka.
40024042	“Kale mubbe bulindaala olwakubba timumaite olunaku oMusengwa waanywe oluyaliirira.
40024043	Aale mumanye kinu muti singa onyere enyumba amanya ekiseera ekyʼobwire omwibbi ekiyaiziramu, abba bulindaala, nandi nʼaleka enyumbaye ni bagivuna era ni bagingiramu.
40024044	Kale atyanu nywena muteekwa okubbanga beetegeki, olwakubba oMwana wa Muntu yaliizira omu kiseera ekimutamusuubiriramu.”
40024045	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Ndi kutumula ku muntu omwesigwa era iye oyo eyegendereza, iye omusengwawe ogwateekawo okulabirira abaweererya abainaye, nʼokubawa omugabo gwabwe ogwʼebyokulya omu kiseera ekituuce.
40024046	Era kyalibba kisa eeri omuweererya oyo, iye omusengwawe oweyaliira kaisi nʼamwajirya ngʼakola ekyo ekiyamulagiire.
40024047	Era mbakobera amazima nti ebintu byonabyona ebya musengwawe oyo balibikwatisya omuweererya oyo okubirabirira.”
40024048	Kale awo nʼamaliirirya ati, “Neye singa omuweererya oyo abba muweererya omubbimubbi nʼakoba omu mwoyogwe ati, ‘Omusengwa wange alwireyo,’
40024049	nʼatandiika okukubba abaweererya abainaye, era nʼokulya nʼokunywera aamo nʼabateemeere.
40024050	Kale omusengwa wʼomuweererya oyo abba yaliirira oku lunaku olwatamukuumiriireku, nʼomu saawa egyatamaite.
40024051	Awo omusengwa wʼomuweererya oyo yalimubonereza ino era yalimusindika aamo nʼabananfunsi eeyo ewalibba okukunga nʼokuŋiiya amaino.”
40025001	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okugerera abeegibe ati, “Ekiseera ekyo oMwana wa Muntu ekiyaliiriramu, obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu bwalifaananaku nʼabaala eikumi abaguna, abakwaite amataala gaabwe, ni baaba okwaniriza omugole omusaiza.
40025002	Era oku baala abo, abataanu babbaire basirusiru, kaisi abataanu nga ibo balabukirabuki.
40025003	Badi ibo abasirusiru baabire nʼamataala gaabwe, neye nandi ni baaba nʼamafuta agʼokwongerangamu.
40025004	Neye ibo abalabukirabuki baabire nʼamataala gaabwe era nʼamacupa gʼamafuta agʼokwongerangamu.
40025005	Kale awo omugole oweyalwirewo okwiza, bonabona endoolo ni gibakwata era ni bagona.
40025006	“Neye omu kiire akati, ni wabbaawo eyaaminkiriire ati, ‘Aale omugole ngonu atuukire, muwuluke mumwanirize.’
40025007	Kale awo abaala bonabona eikumi ni balamuka, ni bakwania amataala gaabwe gaake kusani.
40025008	Kaisi badi abasirusiru ni bakoba badi abalabukirabuki bati, ‘Amataala gaiswe gakaliire era gatira kulikira, kale mutuweeku amafuta.’
40025009	Neye ibo badi abalabukirabuki ni bairamu bati, ‘Amafuta matono tigatumale iswe na inywe. Wazira, mwabe egibagatunda, mugule agaanywe.’
40025010	“Neye abaala nago abasirusiru owebabbaire nga baabire okugula amafuta, omugole nago nʼatuuka. Awo abaala abo ababbaire beetegekere ni baingirira aamo nʼomugole omu nyumba omu babbaire bategekeire embaga, era abaweererya ni baigalawo olwigi.
40025011	“Kale awo oluzwanyuma, abaala badi abasirusiru bona ni batuuka ni bakoba bati, ‘Musengwa, Musengwa, otwigulirewo olwigi.’
40025012	Neye iye nʼabairamu ati, ‘Mbakobera amazima nti inywe timbamaite.’ ”
40025013	Awo oYesu nʼamaliriirya ati, “Nʼolwekyo mubbenge bulindaala, olwakubba timumaite olunaku waire saawa oMwana wa Muntu egiyaliiriramu.”
40025014	Awo oYesu nʼabagerera olugero olundi ati, “Era omu kiseera oMwana wa Muntu ekiyaliiriramu, obwakabaka bwʼomwigulu bwalifaananaku nʼomuntu omukulu eyabbaire ayaba omu lugendo, nʼayeta abagalamabe, kaisi nʼabakwatisya ebintubye okubirabirira.
40025015	Kale awo nʼawa buli moiza obungi obwayezya okulabirira, era eyasookere nʼamuwa empiiya etalanta itaanu, nʼowokubiri nʼamuwa etalanta ibiri, nʼogondi etalanta moiza, awo nʼayaba omu lugendolwe.
40025016	Amangu ago, oodi oguyawaire etalanta eitaanu, nʼayaba nʼagisuubuulamu, nʼasunamu amagoba etalanta egindi itaanu.
40025017	Nʼoodi oguyawaire etalanta eibiri yena nʼagisuubuulamu, era nʼasunamu amagoba etalanta egindi ibiri.
40025018	Neye oodi oguyawaire etalanta emoiza, nʼayaba, nʼakuula ekiina omwitakali, nʼabisamu etalanta ya musengwawe.
40025019	“Oluzwanyuma lwʼekiseera ekiwanvu, omusengwa wʼabagalama abo yairire, era nʼataka okutegeera ebifa oku talanta egiyabawaire.
40025020	Atyanu omugalama oguyawaire etalanta eitaanu, nʼaleeta egindi itaanu, nʼamukoba ati, ‘Musengwa, wandekeire etalanta itaanu, ngonu nasuniremu amagoba gʼetalanta egindi itaanu.’
40025021	Kale oMusengwawe nʼamukoba ati, ‘Weebale ino iwe omugalama omusa era omwesigwa. Era ngʼowobbaire muntu omwesigwa omu bintu ebitono, kale njaba okukuwa obwezye oku bintu bingi. Era oingire ojaagaanire aamo nʼomusengwawo.’
40025022	Nʼomugalama oguyawaire etalanta eibiri, nʼaleeta etalanta egindi ibiri, nʼamukoba ati, ‘Musengwa, wandekeire etalanta ibiri, ngonu nasuniremu amagoba gʼetalanta egindi ibiri.’
40025023	“Kale oMusengwawe nʼamukoba ati, ‘Weebale ino iwe omugalama omusa era omwesigwa, olwakubba wabbaire muntu omwesigwa omu bintu ebitono, njaba okukuwa obwezye oku bintu bingi. Era oingire ojaagaanire aamo nʼomusengwawo.’
40025024	“Awo omugalama oguyawaire etalanta emoiza nʼaiza, iye nʼamukoba ati, ‘Musengwa, namaite nti oli muntu mugosi, era oli ooti mulimi akungula ebinandi nʼakoma era akesa ebinandi nʼasiga.
40025025	Kale natiire era ni njaba ni nkuula ekiina omwitakali ni mbisamu etalantayo, era ngenu.’
40025026	Neye omusengwawe nʼamukoba ati, ‘Iwe omugalama akola ebibbibibbi era omugayaali! Kale ekitegeeza nti wamaite nga ndi ooti mulimi akungula ebinandi nʼakoma era akesa ebinandi nʼasiga?
40025027	Aale kale lwaki empiiya gyange tiwagikoopere abasuubuuzi, kaisi nze nga njirire ni ngisyomayo nga kuliku nʼamagoba?’ ”
40025028	OYesu nʼamaliriirya ati, “Omusengwa waabwe nʼalagira ati, ‘Mumutooleku etalanta eyo egyali nayo, mugiwe oodi aali nʼetalanta gidi eikumi.
40025029	Ekyo kityo olwakubba buli ali nabyo balimwongeraku nʼebindi, era nʼabba nabyo bingi ino. Neye oyo abula, balimutoolaku nʼakatyayi kadi akebalibba bamuwaire.
40025030	Era omugalama oyo abula ekyagasa, balimubbingira e nza omu ndikiirya, eeyo egiyalikungira nʼokuŋiiya amaino.’ ”
40025031	Awo oYesu nʼabakobera ati, “OMwana wa Muntu omu kitiisyakye oweyaliira era ngʼali nʼabamalaikabe bonabona, yalityama omu ntebeye eyʼekitiisya.
40025032	Era abantu bonabona ni bakumbaanira omu maisoge, kaisi nʼabaabulamu ooti muliisya owaayabulamu entaama omu mbuli.
40025033	Entaama nʼagiteeka oku lubbaalwe olwʼengalo endiiro, kaisi embuli nʼagiteeka oku lubba lwʼengalo engooda.
40025034	“Awo oKabaka ngʼatyaime oku ntebeye nago, yalikoba abo abalibba oku lubba lwʼengalo endiiro ati, ‘Inywe oBbaabba abeyawaire enkabi, mwize mubbe omu bwakabaka obwebabategekeire okuzwa owebabbumbiire ekyalo.
40025035	Ekyo kityo olwakubba enzala oweyabbaire enduma mwampaire ekyokulya, nʼenyonta oweyabbaire enduma, mwampaire ekyokunywa, nʼowenabbaire omugeni mwanjanirizire.
40025036	Era owenabbaire ndamba ekyokuzwala, mwakimpaire. Owenabbaire omulwaire mwanjanjabire era owenabbaire omu mabbuusu, mwaizire okumbona.’
40025037	“Awo abantu abo abatuukirirye balimwiramu bati, ‘Musengwa, twakuboine di ngʼenzala ekuluma ni tukuwa ekyokulya, ooba ngʼenyonta ekuluma ni tukuwa ekyokunywa?
40025038	Era wabbaire di omugeni, ni tukwaniriza, ooba wabbaire di ngʼodamba ekyokuzwala ni tukikuwa?
40025039	Era twakuboine di ngʼoli mulwaire ni tukujanjabya, ooba ngʼoli omu mabbuusu ni twiza okukubona?’
40025040	“OKabaka nago yalibairamu ati, ‘Mbakobera amazima nti buli ekimwakoleire omoiza oku baganda bange abo abebanyooma, mwakikoleire ninze.’
40025041	“Awo yalikoba abo abalibba oku lubbaalwe olwʼengalo engooda ati, ‘Muzwe egyendi inywe oKibbumba abeyalaamire. Era mwabe omu musyo ogutalikira, eira ogubategekeire oSitaani nʼabamalaikabe.
40025042	Ekyo kityo olwakubba enzala oweyabbaire enduma, timwampaire ekyokulya. Era enyonta oweyabbaire enduma, timwampaire ekyokunywa.
40025043	Owenabbaire omugeni, timwanjanirizire. Era owenabbaire ndamba ekyokuzwala, timwampaire ekyokuzwala. Era owenabbaire omulwaire timwanjanjabire, era owenabbaire omu mabbuusu, timwannambwire.’
40025044	“Awo bona balimubuulya bati, ‘Musengwa, twakuboine di ngʼenzala ekuluma, ooba ngʼenyonta ekuluma, ooba ngʼoli mugeni, ooba ngʼodamba ekyokuzwala, ooba ngʼoli mulwaire, ooba ngʼoli omu mabbuusu, ni tutakubbeera?’
40025045	Awo oKabaka yalibairamu ati, ‘Mbakobera amazima, buli owemwagaine okubbeera omoiza kwabo abebanyooma, mwabbanga mugaine kubbeera ninze.’
40025046	“Kale abo balibasindika oku kibonerezo ekitawaawo. Neye abatuukirirye balyaba mu bwomi obutawaawo.”
40026001	Awo oYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo byonabyona, nʼakoba abeegibe ati,
40026002	“Mumaite muti wabulayo enaku ibiri oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya gutuuke, era omu kiseera ekyo oMwana wa Muntu baaba okumuwaayo bamukomerere oku musalabba.”
40026003	Awo abakabona abakulu, nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga ni bakiika e wa kabona akira obukulu oKayaafa.
40026004	Era eeyo ni basala olukwe okukwata oYesu omu mbiso era bamwite.
40026005	Neye ni bakoba bati, “Tuleke okumukwata omu naku gyʼomukolo, demba abantu beediima.”
40026006	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire e Bbesaniya omu nyumba ya Simooni eyabbaireku omugenge,
40026007	ni wabbaawo omukali eyaabireyo nʼecupa erimu amafuta agʼakaloosa, era agʼebbeeyi eino, nʼagasuka oku mutwe gwa Yesu oweyabbaire atyaime ngʼalya.
40026008	Neye abeegi owebaboine ekyo, ni banyiiga, ni beebuulya bati, “Lwaki amafuta ago bagabebenyeserye?
40026009	Babbaire beezya okugatunda ni gʼazwamu empiiya nyingi, ni bagigabira abadoobi.”
40026010	Awo oYesu oweyategeire ekibakoba, nʼabakoba ati, “Omukali onu lwaki mumuleyerya? Ekintu ekyankoleire kisa.
40026011	Ekyo kityo olwakubba abadoobi ibo baabbanga na inywe bulijo, neye nze tinaabbe na inywe okumala ekiseera ekinene.
40026012	Asukire amafuta agʼakaloosa oku mubiri gwange ngʼagukwanirya nakimo olwa kuguliika.
40026013	Era mbakobera amazima nti, wonawona aMawuliro aMasa ago agankwataku egibagalaabbanga okumalaku ekyalo, nʼekinu omukali onu ekyakolere, bakitumulangaku ni bamwewukirya.”
40026014	Awo omoiza oku beegi eikumi na babiri ogubeetanga oYuda Isikalyoti, nʼayaba egiri abakabona abakulu,
40026015	nʼababuulya ati, “Singa owenababbeera ni mukwata omusaiza oyo mwampa imeka?” Kale awo ni bamuwa amandusu gʼefeeza 30.
40026016	Era okuzwa oolwo oYuda nʼanoonia akaseera akasa akʼokubabbeera bakwate oYesu.
40026017	Oku lunaku olusooka olwa Mukolo ogwʼeMigaati eGibulamu eKizimbulukuca, abeegi baabire egiri oYesu, ni bamubuulya bati, “Otaka tukutegekere yaina egiwaliira oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya?”
40026018	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mwabe omu kibuga e wa musaiza oodi ogumumaite, mumukobe muti oMusomesya akobere ati, ‘Ekiseera kyange ekiraagaane kiigereire, kale nze nʼabeegi bange e bubwo niiyo egitwaliira oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.’ ”
40026019	Kale abeegi ni bakola ngʼoYesu oweyabalagiire, ni baaba ni bategeka oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.
40026020	Awo obwire owebwairugaire, oYesu nʼabeegibe eikumi na babiri ni batyama okulya.
40026021	Era owebabbaire balya, oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti omoiza kwinywe ayaba okundyamu olukwe.”
40026022	Cooka awo abeegi ni beekondamira ino, era moiza moiza, ngʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Musengwa, oolwo ninze?”
40026023	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Oyo akozya na nze omu kibya, niiye eyandyamu olukwe.
40026024	Dala oMwana wa Muntu baaba okumwita, ngʼeBiwandiike owebimutumulaku. Neye wobe! Omuntu oyo eyalyamu oMwana wa Muntu olukwe, ngʼalabire! Kyandimubbeereire kisa singa tibamubyaire!”
40026025	Awo oYuda eyaliremu oYesu olukwe, nʼakoba ati, “Musomesya, oolwo ninze?” OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Ee, kityo ngʼowokobere.”
40026026	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe owebabbaire nga balya, oYesu nʼatoola omugaati, ni yeebalya oKibbumba, nʼaguvunavunamu nʼabawa, nʼabakoba ati, “Mutoole mulye, gunu niigwo omubiri gwange.”
40026027	Era oluzwanyuma nʼakwata ekikopo kyʼenviinyo, ni yeebalya oKibbumba nʼabawa, nʼabakoba ati, “Munywe kunu nywenanywena.
40026028	Ekyo kityo olwakubba linu niiryo eisaaye lyange eryasusuka oku lwʼabangi, era erikakasa endagaano eya Kibbumba egyali kukola nʼabantube okubasoniya ebikole byabwe ebibbibibbi.
40026029	Neye mbakoba nti okuzwa atyanu tinaliirayo tete okunywa ekyokunywa kyʼemizabbibbu, paka owenalikinywa na inywe omu ngeri empyaka, omu bwakabaka bwa Bbaabba.”
40026030	Awo owebamalire okwemba olwembo olwa kuwuuja oKibbumba, ni bawuluka ni baaba oku Lusozi olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni.
40026031	Awo oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Omu kiire kinu nywenanywena mwairuka ni mundekawo, olwakubba bakiwandiikire bati: ‘Naliita omuliisya, era entaama egyʼomu kiraalo ni gisalaanika.’
40026032	“Neye owebalimala okunzuukiza, nalibasooka okwaba e Galiraaya.”
40026033	Awo oPeetero nʼamukakasa ati, “Abandi bonabona nʼowebairuka ni bakulekawo olwʼebyakubbaaku, nze tinakulekewo.”
40026034	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Nkukobera amazima nti omu kiire ekinanyere kinu, onkoko yaabba akaali nʼokukookoola, nga wankanegaanira emirundi misatu.”
40026035	Neye oPeetero nʼamukakasira nakimo ati, “Nʼowebaabba nga bateekwa kunjitira aamo na iwe, tinakwegaane.” Era nʼabeegi abandi bonabona ni bakoba kinanyere ekyo.
40026036	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe ni baaba omu kifo ekibeeta Gesusemani. Owebatuukire eeyo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mutyame aanu, nga nze njaba aadi negairire oKibbumba.”
40026037	Nʼayaba nʼoPeetero nʼabataane ba Zebedaayo ababiri, era awo nʼatandiika okutya nʼokweririgana.
40026038	Kale nʼabakoba ati, “Omwoyo gwange gwizwire enima eyezya nʼokunjita! Musigale aanu era nga nywena mubonia.”
40026039	Oweyeeyongeireyo katono omu maiso, nʼagwa oku mazwige era nʼakotamya omutwe ansi, kaisi ni yeegairira oKibbumba ati, “Bbaabba, owekibba kyetagisya kiti nteekwa okubita omu kipimo ekyokugada okwo, kale kibbe ngʼowootaka.”
40026040	Awo nʼakanga egiri abeegibe badi abasatu nʼabaajirya nga bagonere, kaisi nʼabuulya oPeetero ati, “Timwezyerye okubba na nze aanu nga tubonia waire esaawa emoiza eti?
40026041	Mubonie era musabe oKibbumba, kaisi okubagezesya tikwa batuukaku, olwakubba emyoyo gyanywe dala mimaliriri, neye emibiri minafu.”
40026042	Era nʼayaba omulundi gwokubiri, nʼasaba oKibbumba ati, “Bbaabba, ekipimo kinu ekyokugada owekibba nga tikyezyeka okukintoolaku paka nga nkinywireku, kale kibbe ngʼowootaka.”
40026043	Era oYesu oweyakangire omulundi ogundi tete nʼabaajirya nga bagona olwakubba endoolo gyabbaire gibali kubbikubbi.
40026044	Kale awo oYesu nʼabaleka, nʼakanga, nʼasaba oKibbumba omulundi ogwokusatu, ngʼasaba omu bibono ebinyere ebyo.
40026045	Awo nʼakanga egiri abeegibe, nʼabakoba ati, “Mukaali mugona, era mukaali muwuumula? Aale mubone esaawa etuukire eyʼokulyamu oMwana wa Muntu olukwe bamuweeyo eeri obwezye bwʼabakola ebikole ebibbibibbi bamugadye.
40026046	Musetuke twabe tubasangaane! Era andiiremu olukwe ngonu atuukire.”
40026047	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire akaali atumula, oYuda omoiza oku beegibe eikumi na babiri, nʼatuuka nʼekiyindi ekinene ekyʼabantu ababbaire nʼempiima nʼemiigo. Abantu abo, abakabona abakulu nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga niibo ababbaire babatumire.
40026048	Atyanu eyaliiremu oYesu olukwe yabbaire amalire okuwa ekiyindi kyʼabantu ekyo akamanyiciryo ngʼabakobere ati, “Omuntu ogunasugirya nga mmugwa omu kifubba, yaabba niiye oyo, mwamukwata-bukwati.”
40026049	Awo oYuda oweyatuukire, amangu ago nʼayaba egiri oYesu nʼamusugirya ati, “Musomesya oli otya!” Era nʼamugwa nʼomu kifubba.
40026050	Neye oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Munange, okole ekikuleetere.” Awo ni baiza ni bakwata oYesu era ni bamukalangula.
40026051	Amangu ago omoiza oku babbaire nʼoYesu nʼatoolayo empiimaye, nʼatemaku omugalama wa kabona akira obukulu ekitwi nʼamutiicaaku.
40026052	Neye oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Empiimayo ogikanjeeyo omu kiruutu kyayo, olwakubba bonabona abakolesya empiima okwita bona balibaita nʼempiima.
40026053	Oseega oti timpezya okusaba oBbaabba nʼampeererya enkumi nʼenkumi egyʼabamalaika okwiza okunkuuma?
40026054	Neye owensaba ni babampa oolwo kaisi eBiwandiike ebikoba biti kinu kiteekwa okuntuukaku bibba byatuukirira bitya?”
40026055	Omu kaseera ako oYesu nʼakoba ekiziima kyʼabantu ati, “Mwizire okunkwata nga muli nʼempiima nʼemiigo ooti mwaba kukwata muyeekera? Kale buli lunaku natyamanga na inywe omu Yeekaalu nga njegesya ni mutankwata.
40026056	Neye binu byonabyona birikubbangawo lwa kutuukirirya Biwandiike abanaabbi ebibawandiikire.” Awo abeegibe bonabona ni bairuka ni bamuleka awo.
40026057	Awo abo abakwaite oYesu ni bamutwala e wa Kayaafa okabona akira obukulu, abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼabantu abandi abakulu omwigwanga, egibabbaire bakumbaaniire.
40026058	Neye iye oPeetero yasengereirye oYesu ngʼalekerekuuwo eibbanga okutuukira nakimo omu luuga lwa kabona akira obukulu. Yaingiire nʼatyama nʼabakuumi bʼeYeekaalu abone ebyazwamu.
40026059	Olwo abakabona abakulu nʼabʼoLukiiko oLufugi olwʼaBayudaaya bonabona ni banoonia obujulizi obwʼobubbeyi obubasinziriraku okwita oYesu.
40026060	Neye nandi ni babusuna, waire ngʼabajulizi abʼobubbeyi bangi baizire ni bamusibiriryaku. Neye oluzwanyuma ni wazwayo babiri
40026061	era ibo ni bakoba bati, “Omusaiza onu yakobere ati, ‘Mpezya okuvunawo eYeekaalu ya Kibbumba era nʼokugyombeka omu naku isatu.’ ”
40026062	Awo okabona akira obukulu nʼayemerera nʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Tiwairemu? Niki ekyokoba ku binu ebibakulumiriza?”
40026063	Neye oYesu nʼasigala ngʼasirikire. Awo okabona akira obukulu nʼamukoba ati, “Nkulagira nti olayire oKibbumba onyere obwomi, otukobere obanga niiwe oKurisito oMwana wa Kibbumba.”
40026064	OYesu nʼairamu ati, “Ee, kityo ngʼowokobere. Era mbakobera nywenanywena nti mwalibona oMwana wa Muntu ngʼatyaime nʼoKibbumba omu kifo kyʼekitiisya eino era ngʼaizira oku bireri okuzwa omwigulu.”
40026065	Awo okabona akira obukulu omu busungu nʼanyiira eganduulaye, era nʼakoba ati, “Omusaiza onu yeeyeta okubba Kibbumba! Tete tukaali tutakira niki abajulizi abandi? Nti ngoyo muwuliire ebibono ebyatumwire.
40026066	Inywe museega mutya?” Ibo ni bairamu bati, “Awomeire kumwita.”
40026067	Awo ni bamwanda ebitanta omu maiso era ni bamukubba ebinfuute, abandi ni bamukubba empi
40026068	neenu webamukoba bati, “Kurisito, otukobere, naani akukubbire?”
40026069	Awo oPeetero oweyabbaire ngʼatyaime e nza oku luuga, ni wabbaawo omoiza oku baala ababbaire abaweererya e wa kabona akira obukulu nʼaigerera egyali, kaisi nʼamukoba ati, “Wena wabbaire nʼoYesu owʼe Galiraaya.”
40026070	Neye oPeetero ni yeegaana omu maiso gaabwe bonabona, ngʼakoba ati, “Ekyokoba tinkimaite.”
40026071	Awo oPeetero nʼazwa oku luuga nʼayaba oku muzigo, era tete eeyo yona omwala ogondi omoiza oku baweererya nʼamubona, nʼakoba abantu ababbaire awo ati, “Oyo yena yabbaire nʼoYesu owʼe Naazaleesi.”
40026072	Tete era oPeetero ni yeegaana ngʼalayira ati, “Omu mazima aganyere nze omusaiza oyo timmumaite.”
40026073	Tete nga wabitirewo akaseera katono, ababbaire beemereire aawo ni bakoba oPeetero bati, “Dala oli moiza oku basengereri ba Yesu, olwakubba nʼentumulayo ekuloopa nti oli Mugaliraaya.”
40026074	Neye oPeetero nʼatandiika okweraama era nʼokulayira ati, “Omu mazima aganyere nze omusaiza oyo timmumaite!” Amangu ago onkoko nʼakookoola.
40026075	Awo oPeetero nʼayewukirya ebyo oYesu ebiyabbaire amukobere ati, “Onkoko yaabba akaali nʼokukookoola, nga wanegaine emirundi misatu ngʼokoba oti tommaite.” Era awo oPeetero nʼawuluka, era nʼakunga ino.
40027001	Awo obwire owebwaceire amakeezi, abakabona abakulu bonabona nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, ni bateesa era ni basalawo okwita oYesu.
40027002	Kale ni bamusiba amangalo, ni bamutwala ni bamuwaayo eeri oPiraato omufugi oMulooma.
40027003	Atyanu oYuda eyaliiremu oYesu olukwe, oweyaboine ngʼoYesu bamusaliire ogwʼokufa, ni yeejusa olwʼekiyabbaire akolere. Era amandusu gʼefeeza nago 30 nʼagakanjirya abakabona abakulu, nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga,
40027004	ngʼabakoba ati, “Nkolere kibbikibbi okuwaayo omuntu abulaku omusango okumwita!” Neye ibo ni bairamu bati, “Kaisi iswe ekyo kitukwataku? Iwe ekyo kigosikyo.”
40027005	Kale oYuda nʼamuma amandusu ago omu Yeekaalu, kaisi nʼayaba ni yeemyeda.
40027006	Neye abakabona abakulu ni balondya amandusu ago, era ni bakoba bati, “ Amateeka gaiswe tigaikirirya okuteeka empiiya ginu omwigwanika, olwakubba gyʼokusuka isaaye.”
40027007	Kale owebamalire okuteesa, ni bagigulamu ekigona ekibakuulangamu eitakali lyʼokubbumbamu ebintu, baliikengemu abageni.
40027008	Era ekyo niikyo ekigira ekigona ekyo bakyeta Kigona kyʼoKusuka Isaaye paka atyanu.
40027009	Awo onaabbi Yeremiya ekiyatumwire ni kituukirira ekikoba kiti: “Batwaire amandusu gʼefeeza 30, nga niiyo ebbeeyi abamo oku bantu bʼe Isirairi egibapatanire bati niigyo egituuka okumugula,
40027010	era ni bagigulamu ekigona ekibakuulangamu eitakali lyʼokubbumbamu ebintu, ngʼoMusengwa oKibbumba oweyabbaire ankobeire.”
40027011	Awo oYesu ni bamutwala ni bamwemererya omu maiso ga Piraato omufugi oMulooma era omufugi oyo nʼamubuulya ati, “Niiwe okabaka wʼaBayudaaya?” OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Ee, kityo ngʼowokobere.”
40027012	Neye abakabona abakulu nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga owebabbaire bamuvunaana, tiyabairiremu kadi.
40027013	Awo oPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Towulira ebyo byonabyona ebibakulumiriza?”
40027014	Neye oYesu nandi nʼamwiramu ekibono kadi kimo kwebyo ebibamuvunaanire. Era omufugi oyo ni yeewunya ino.
40027015	Atyanu mu buli biseera ebyʼoMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, yabbaire mpisa yʼomufugi oMulooma okuteeranga omusibe, abantu ogubamusabanga okuteera.
40027016	Kale oku mulundi ogwo, wabbairewo omusibe owakabbikabbi ogubabbaire bamaite ino, nga bamweta Bbalaba.
40027017	Era abantu owebakumbaine e wa Piraato nʼababuulya ati, “Aliina ogumutaka mbateerere; Bbalaba, ooba Yesu abamo ogumweta oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta?”
40027018	Yababwirye atyo olwakubba yabbaire amaite ati bawaireyo oYesu egyali lwʼengongi.
40027019	Awo oPiraato oweyabbaire atyaime oku ntebe eyʼobulamuzi, omukaliwe nʼamutumira obukwenda ngʼakoba ati, “Omuntu oyo abula omusango, kale tiwamukola ekintu kyonakyona, olwakubba ngadire ino omu kiire kinu omu kirooto okululwe.”
40027020	Neye abakabona abakulu, nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, ni basendasenda ekiziima kyʼabantu okusaba oPiraato ateere Bbalaba, neye iye oYesu bamwite.
40027021	Awo oPiraato nʼababuulya ati, “Oku babiri mutaka mbateerere naani?” Ni bairamu bati, “Bbalaba.”
40027022	Awo oPiraato omufugi oyo oMulooma nʼababuulya ati, “Kaisi iye oYesu abamo ogumweta oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta mmukole ntya?” Bonabona ni bairamu bati, “Omukomerere oku musalabba!”
40027023	Neye oPiraato nʼababuulya ati, “Lwaki? Kibbikibbiki ekyakolere?” Neye ibo ni bongeramu maani kukooka-bukooki bati, “Iwe omukomerere ku musalabba!”
40027024	Awo oPiraato oweyaboine nga bimukaisirye, era nʼabantu nga bataka kwediima, nʼakwata amaizi, era nʼanaaba omu ngalo omu maiso gʼekiziima kya bantu nga waakoba ati, “Nze mpaawo kibanvunaana oku kwita omusaiza oyo. Neye kigosi kyanywe.”
40027025	Era abantu bonabona ni bairamu bati, “Oleke omusango gubbe ku niiswe nʼabaana baiswe olwʼokufaakwe!”
40027026	Kale oPiraato nʼabateerera oBbalaba. Neye nʼalagira ni bafaamuula oYesu nʼofaalu aliku emirobo egisima, kaisi nʼamuwaayo okwaba okumukomerera oku musalabba.
40027027	Awo abaisulukale bʼomufugi oMulooma ni batwala oYesu omu lubiri lwʼomufugi nago, olubeeta Pulaitoriyo. Era ni bakumbaania abaisulukale abʼekibinja ekyo bonabona ni beeruguulirirya oYesu.
40027028	Awo ni bamutoolamu ebizwalobye, ni bamuzwalisya ekizwalo ekitukuliikiriri.
40027029	Era ni baluka engule eya mawa, ni bagimuzwalisya oku mutwe. Ni bamukwatisya nʼolugada omu ngaloye endiiro. Awo ni bakoma amazwi omu maisoge, ni bamukiina nga bamukoba bati, “Owangaale, iwe okabaka wʼaBayudaaya!”
40027030	Era ni bamwandaku ebitanta, ni bakwata olugada, ni bamukubba oku mutwe emirundi nʼemirundi.
40027031	Awo owebamalire okumukiina, ni bamutoolamu ekizwalo kidi ekitukuliikiriri, ni bamuzwalisya ebizwalo ebibye, awo ni bamutwala okumukomerera.
40027032	Awo owebabbaire bawuluka omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, ni basangaana omusaiza owʼe Kuleene, ogubeeta oSimooni, ni bamukaka okwetiika omusalabba gwa Yesu.
40027033	Era owebatuukire omu kifo ekibeeta Gologoosa, amakulu gaakyo eKifo kyʼeKiyanga,
40027034	ni bawa oYesu enviinyo okunywa, nga bagitabwiryemu ekintu ekirulu ooti maizi gʼomundulwe. Neye oweyakombereku, nʼagaana okuginywa.
40027035	Awo owebamalire okumukomerera oku musalabba, ni bagabana ebizwalobye, nga babikubbiraku kalulu.
40027036	Oluzwanyuma lwʼekyo ni batyama awo era ni bamukuuma.
40027037	Era e ngulu wʼomutwegwe bateekereyo ekiwandiiko kyʼomusango ogubamuvunaana bati, “ONU NIIYE OYESU, OKABAKA WʼABAYUDAAYA.”
40027038	Era ni bakomerera nʼabaibbi babiri oku misalabba okumpi nʼoYesu, omoiza oku lubba lwa Yesu olwʼengalo endiiro, nʼogondi oku lwʼengooda.
40027039	Awo ababbaire babitawo ni batengeetya emitwe nʼobulwa nga baduula oYesu,
40027040	era ni bakoba bati, “Iwe ayaba okuvunawo eYeekaalu, tete ogyombeke omu naku isatu, weeramye. Aale ngʼoli Mwana wa Kibbumba, ozwe oku musalabba oike ansi!”
40027041	Era abakabona abakulu nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga bona ni bamukiina, nga bakoba bati,
40027042	“Yalamyanga abandi, tayezya okweramya onyere! Iye oKabaka wa Isirairi, aale atyanu azwe oku musalabba aike ansi kaisi tumwikiririryemu.
40027043	Akoba ati yeesiga Kibbumba, era yakobere ati Mwana wa Kibbumba. Kale aale ngʼoKibbumba amutaka, amulamye.”
40027044	Era abaibbi abebakomereire okumpi naye, bona ni bamuduula mu ngeri enanyere eyo.
40027045	Atyanu okuzwa oku saawa omukaaga egyʼomusana, paka oku saawa omwenda egyʼeigolo, endikiirya nʼekwata oku kyalo kyonakyona.
40027046	Era oku saawa ooti mwenda, oYesu nʼakunga nʼeigono eryaminkirira ati, “Eloyi, Eloyi, lama sabbakusaani?” Amakulu gaakyo gati, “Kibbumba wange, Kibbumba wange, lwaki ondekerewo?”
40027047	Era abamo kwabo ababbaire beemereire aawo owebawuliire, ni bakoba bati, “Ayeta onaabbi Eriya!”
40027048	Era amangu ago omoiza kwibo nʼairuka, nʼakwata ekijuulo, nʼakitimya omu nviinyo ensaasaami, nʼakiteeka oku lugada, nʼawa oYesu okufunfuuna.
40027049	Neye abandi ni bakoba bati, “Aale muleke tubone ooba ngʼEriya yaiza nʼamulamya!”
40027050	Awo oYesu tete nʼakunga nʼeigono eryaminkirira, era nʼafa.
40027051	Omu kaseera ako olutimbe olwʼomu Yeekaalu ni lunyiirikamu akati, okuzwa angulu okutuuka ansi ni bibba ebitundu bibiri. Ekyalo ni kitengeeta, era amabbaale ni gaatikamu.
40027052	Era amagombe agamo ni gaatikamu, era abatuukirirye bangi ababbaire bafiire oKibbumba nʼabazuukiza,
40027053	ni bazwa omu magombe. Era oluzwanyuma lwa Yesu okuzuukira, ni baaba omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, era abantu bangi ni bababona.
40027054	Omukulu wʼekibinja kyʼabaisulukale 100 era nʼabaisulukale ababbaire naye nga bakuuma oYesu, owebaboine ngʼomusisi atengeetya ekyalo, era nʼebintu ebindi byonabyona ebyabbairewo, ni batya ino, ni bakoba bati, “Dala onu abbaire niiye oMwana wa Kibbumba!”
40027055	Era wabbairewo abakali bangi awo ababbaire eyalakuuku nga balengera. Babbaire basengereirye oYesu kuzwa Galiraaya nga bamuweererya.
40027056	Era mwibo mwabbairemu oMalyamu oMangadaleena, nʼoMalyamu omaaye wa Yaakobbo nʼoYusufu, era nʼomaaye wʼabataane ba Zebedaayo.
40027057	Awo obwire owebwabbaire bwatira okwirugala, omusaiza omusuni owʼAlimasaaya ogubeeta oYusufu, era yena eyabbaire asuukire omwegi wa Yesu nʼatuuka egibakomereire oYesu.
40027058	Kale nʼayaba egiri oPiraato, nʼamusaba omulambo gwa Yesu. Era oPiraato nʼalagira okugumuwa.
