40027059	Kale oYusufu nʼatwala omulambo, nʼagulingira omu lugoye olutukula, oluyaaka olwʼebbeeyi.
40027060	Era nʼaguteeka omu magombege agʼempuku, ageyabbaire yankatemanga omwibbaale era nga tateekangakuumu mulambo. Nʼayiringitya ogubbaale, nʼaigalira omulyango ogwʼamagombe, nʼazwawo.
40027061	Era oMalyamu oMangadaleena nʼoMalyamu ogondi babbaire batyaime awo okumpi nga balingiriire oku magombe.
40027062	Awo oku lunaku olwairireku, era nga ku Saabbaato, abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo, ni baaba egiri oPiraato,
40027063	ni bamukoba bati, “Musengwa, twewukirya tuti omubbeyi oyo oweyabbaire ngʼakaali mwomi, yakobere ati oluzwanyuma lwʼokufa yalizuukira oku lunaku lwokusatu.
40027064	Kale olagire bakuumire nakimo amagombe paka oku lunaku lwʼokusatu nga bamuliikire. Anambula ekyo abeegibe bayinza okwaba ni baibbamu omulambogwe, kaisi ni bakobera abantu bati, ‘Azuukire!’ Olwo obubbeyi obwʼoluzwanyuma obwo bubba bwabba bubbibubbi okukiraku obwasookere.”
40027065	Awo oPiraato nʼabakoba ati, “Mutwale abaisulukale abakuumi, era bakuumire nakimo amagombe ago ngʼowebeezya.”
40027066	Kale ni baaba, ni basiba bakalangulira nakimo eibbaale omu mulyango, era ni balekawo abakuumi.
40028001	Awo ngʼeSaabbaato ewoireku, amakeezi pwi olwesaabbiiti, oMalyamu oMangadaleena nʼoMalyamu ogondi ni baaba okubona amagombe agʼempuku omu babbaire bateekere oYesu.
40028002	Kale owebatuukire ni wagwawo omusisi owʼamaani, olwakubba omalaika wa Musengwa oKibbumba yazwire omwigulu nʼaika oku magombe nago nʼayiringitya eibbaale eryabbaire omu mulyango nʼalitoolawo, era nʼalityamaku.
40028003	Omalaika oyo yabbaire amasaamasa ooti kumesya kwa ikendi, nʼebizwalobye nga bitukula ooti mabbaale ga ikendi.
40028004	Nʼolwekyo abakuumi ni bamutya ino, ni batukuta era ni babba ooti bafiire.
40028005	Awo omalaika nʼakoba abakali abo ati, “Timwatya, mmaite nti munoonia Yesu ogubakomereire oku musalabba.
40028006	Aanu abulawo, azuukiire ngʼoweyakobere. Mwize mubone egibabbaire bamuteekere.
40028007	Olwo kaisi mwabe mangu mukobere abeegibe muti, ‘Azuukiire, era yeesookere okwaba e Galiraaya, eeyo gimwamubonera.’ Obwo niibwo obukwenda obumbakobeire.”
40028008	Kale abakali abo ni bazwa mangu oku magombe agʼempuku nga batiire, neye nga baizwire eisangaalo, ni bairuka okukobera abeegibe.
40028009	Awo owebabbaire baaba, oYesu nʼabeerukira nga abazwera omu maiso, nʼabakoba ati, “Mbasugiirye!” Era bamwigereraku, ni bakoma amazwi kaisi ni beevambirya oku bigerebye ni bamusinza.
40028010	Kale awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Timwatya, mwabe mukobere abeegi bange baabe e Galiraaya eeyo niiyo egibambonera.”
40028011	Awo abakali abo owebabbaire bazwa oku magombe nga bali omu nzira baaba, abamo oku baisulukale abakuumi bʼamagombe ga Yesu, ni baaba omu kibuga, ni bakobera abakabona abakulu byonabyona ebyabbaire bituukirewo.
40028012	Kale abakabona abakulu ni bakumbaana aamo nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, ni bateesa. Era ni basalawo ni bawa abaisulukale empiiya nyingi okubagulirira,
40028013	nga babakoba bati, “Mukobe muti, ‘Abeegibe eizo baizire obwire nga tugonere, ni baibba omulambogwe.’
40028014	Ekyo omufugi oPiraato oweyakiwulira, iswe twabawozererya ni mulama omusango.”
40028015	Kale awo abakuumi ni bakwata empiiya, era ni bakola ngʼowebabakobere. Ekibono ekyo ni kisaalaana omu Bayudaaya paka atyanu.
40028016	Awo abeegi eikumi na moiza ni baaba e Galiraaya, oku lusozi oYesu egiyabakobere okwaba.
40028017	Era owebamuboine, ni bamusinza, neye abamo kwibo ni bamubuusabuusa.
40028018	Awo oYesu nʼaigerera egibali kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Bampaire obwezye bwonabwona omwigulu nʼoku kyalo.
40028019	Nʼolwekyo mwabe musuuce abantu abʼamawanga gonagona babbe beegi bange, nga mubabatiza omu liina lya Bbaabba, nʼeryʼoMwana, nʼeryʼoMwoyo oMweru,
40028020	nga mubeegesya okukwatanga byonabyona ebinabalagiire inywe. Era dala naabbanga na inywe paka ekyalo owekyaliwaawo.”
41001001	Ganu niigo aMawuliro aMasa agakwata oku Musengwa, oYesu Kurisito oMwana wa Kibbumba.
41001002	Gatandiikire ngʼonaabbi Isaaya oweyawandiikire ebyo oKibbumba ebiyakobere oMwanawe ati: “Obone, ntuma omukwenda wange akwekubbembere okukwewulirya enzira egyoyaba.
41001003	Era niiye oyo atumulira omu kitera nʼeigono eryaminkirira ati, ‘Mutegeke oluguudo lwa Musengwa aiza, mutereerye amanzirage.’ ”
41001004	Omukwenda oyo yabbaire Yokaana oMubatizi eyabonekeire omu kitera, era ngʼalaabba eeri abantu beenenye era bababatize, kaisi oKibbumba abasoniye ebikole byabwe ebibbibibbi.
41001005	Abantu ni bazwanga omu byalo byʼomu Buyudaaya mwonamwona, nʼomu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, ni baabanga egiri oYokaana, ni babbutulanga ebikole byabwe ebibbibibbi era nʼababatiziranga omu Mwiga oYoludaani.
41001006	OYokaana oyo yazwalanga ekizwalo ekibakolere omu byoya bya kisolo ogubeeta ongamira, ngʼomu nkende yeesiba musipi gwʼeidiba. Era yaalyanga nzige nʼomujenene gwʼenzoki egyʼomu kigona.
41001007	Abantu yabalaabbiranga ati, “Waliwo ankiraku obwezye aali kwiza oluzwanyuma lwange, nze oguntasaanira naire okukotama okusibindula obusibiro bwʼengaitogye ni ngitoola omu bigerebye.
41001008	Nze mbabatiza nʼamaizi, neye iye yalibabatiza na Mwoyo oMweru.”
41001009	Omu naku egyo, oYesu nʼazwa omu kabuga kʼe Naazaleesi omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya, nʼayaba oYokaana nʼamubatizira omu Mwiga oYoludaani.
41001010	OYesu nga yankazwa omu maizi, nʼabona eigulu nga lyeigula, era nʼoMwoyo oMweru ngʼamwikaku ooti njiiwa.
41001011	Eigono ni lizwa omwigulu nga likoba liti, “Niiwe oMwana wange omutake, era ogunsiima eino.”
41001012	Awo amangwago oMwoyo oMweru nʼasindika oYesu omu kitera,
41001013	nʼamalayo enaku 40 ngʼoSitaani amukema. Yabbaire aamo nʼebisolo bya mu kigona neye ngʼabamalaika bamulabirira.
41001014	Awo nga bamalire okwigalira oYokaana omu mabbuusu, oYesu nʼayaba omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya, nʼalaabbanga eeri abantu aMawuliro aMasa agazwa eeri oKibbumba,
41001015	ngʼabakoba ati, “Ekiseera ekimwabbaire mukumiriire kituukire; ekitegeeza kiti, obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba bwigereire. Kale, mwenenye era mwikirirye aMawuliro aMasa agʼengeri ya kwingira omu bwakabaka obwo.”
41001016	Lumo, oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼabita oku mbale kwʼenyanza oGaliraaya, nʼabona oSimooni nʼomugandawe Andereya nga batega akatimba omu nyanza olwakubba babbaire bazibuli.
41001017	Awo oYesu nʼabeeta ati, “Mwize mubbe beegi bange! Nalibasuuca bazibuli bʼabantu omu kifo kya bazibuli bʼenyanyi.”
41001018	Era amangu ago ni baleka aawo obutimba bwabwe, ni baaba naye.
41001019	Tete oweyeeyongeireku omu maiso butyayi buti, nʼabona oYaakobbo nʼomugandawe oYokaana, abataane ba Zebedaayo, nga bali omu lyato bakwania obutimba bwabwe.
41001020	Amangu ago bona nʼabeeta. Owebawuliire ngʼabeeta, ni baleka aawo oitewaabwe oZebedaayo nʼabapakasibe omu lyato; batyo bona ni basuuka beegi ba Yesu.
41001021	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe ni batuuka omu kibuga e Kaperenawumu. ESaabbaato oweyatuukire, oYesu nʼaingira omwikumbaaniro lya Bayudaaya omu beegeseryanga ebyʼediini, nʼatandiika okwegesya.
41001022	Abantu abamuwulisisyanga ni beewunya ino engeri egyayegesyamu olwakubba yayegesyanga ngʼonyere obwezye, nga tali ooti bakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa.
41001023	Kaisi omwikumbaaniro oomwo mwabbairemu omuntu aliku omuzimu. Omu kaseera ako, nʼaceera ino ati,
41001024	“Otubbaire niki iwe Yesu owʼe Naazaleesi? Oizire kutujigirica? Okoba oti tinkumaite? Niiwe oMweru oyo azwa egiri oKibbumba.”
41001025	Neye oYesu nʼagukaawuukira ati, “Osirike mangu, nʼomuntu onu omuzweku!”
41001026	Omuzimu ni gusukunsulya ino omuntu oyo, era ni gwasyamika omulundi gumo, ni gumuzwaku.
41001027	Era bonabona ababbairewo ni bawuninkirira nga beebuulyangana bati, “Enjegesyaye eenu nga mpyaka! Aate eizwire bwezye! Alagira nʼemizimu ni gimuwulira! Onu muntuki onu?”
41001028	Okuzwa nʼolwo, okufumakwe ni kusaalaanira omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya lyonalyona, nʼoku mirirano.
41001029	OYesu oweyazwire omwikumbaaniro, nʼayaba nʼoSimooni nʼAndereya omu nyumba yaabwe aamo nʼoYaakobbo, nʼoYokaana.
41001030	Yabbaire yankatuuka ati, ni bamukobera bati omaaye wa muka Simooni yabbairewo ngʼomusuuja gumuluma ino.
41001031	OYesu nʼayaba egyali, nʼamukwata oku ngalo, nʼamusetuca. Awo, omusuuja ni gulama, era nʼatandiika nʼokubainula.
41001032	Akanaigolo, ngʼeisana ligwire, ni bamuleetera abalwaire bonabona, nʼabo ababbaireku emizimu.
41001033	Era abantu abʼomu kibuga ekyo bonabona ni bakumbaanira e nza oku mulyango.
41001034	Nʼalamya bangi ababbaire nʼendwaire egya buli ngeri. Nʼababbaireku emizimu, nʼagibabbingaku nga tagiikirirya kadi kutumula olwakubba gyabbaire gimumaite.
41001035	Eizo waaku, oYesu yalamukire makeezi pwi, obwire nga bukaali okuca, nʼawuluka, nʼayaba omu kifo ekinambulamu abantu nʼabba eeyo ngʼasaba oKibbumba.
41001036	Owekwaceire, oSimooni nʼabainaye ni baaba nga bamunoonia.
41001037	Owebamuboine, ni bamukoba bati, “Abantu bonabona bakunoonia.”
41001038	Neye iye oYesu, amantabafaaku, nʼabairamu ati, “Twabe omu bubuga obundi obuliraine aanu eeyo yona ndaabbeyo olwakubba ekyo niikyo ekyagirire ni njiza.”
41001039	Atyo nʼatambula omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya lyonalyona ngʼalaabba omu makumbaaniro gaabwe, nʼabantu ababbaireku emizimu ngʼagibabbingaku.
41001040	Awo omugenge nʼaiza egiri oYesu, nʼakoma amazwi ngʼamwegairira ati, “Musengwa, mmaite nti oyezya okundamya, owoobba ngʼotakire.”
41001041	OYesu ekisa ni kimukwata, nʼagolola engalo nʼamukwataku, nʼamukoba ati, “Ntaka. Kale olame!”
41001042	Amangu ago, ebigengebye ni bimuwaaku, era nʼalamira nakimo.
41001043	OYesu nʼamuseebulirawo, era nʼamusisiitira ino
41001044	ati, “Ekyo tokikoberaku omuntu kadi moiza, wazira oyabe weeyanjule e wa kabona, era ngʼoMusa oweyalagiire, oweeyo nʼekyokuwaayo ekyokwetukulya kaisi bakakase bati olamire.”
41001045	Neye tete, omusaiza oyo oweyaabire, yatandiikire kusansya wonawona ngʼoYesu oweyabbaire niiye amulamirye. Nʼolwekyo, oYesu nga takaali ayezya okwingira omu kibuga omu lwatu, olwʼokutya abantu okumumigirirya. Yaabbanga mbale mbale eeyo omu bifo ebinambulamu bantu. Neye era, eeyo yona abantu ni bamusengereryangayo, nga bazwa buli wantu.
41002001	Nga wabitirekuuwo enaku, oYesu nʼakanga omu kibuga e Kaperenawumu. Abantu owebawuliire bati akangire e ika,
41002002	ni bakumbaana bangi ino, nga nʼomu luuga tibakaali baweeramu. OYesu oweyabbaire ngʼabalaabbira ekibono kya Kibbumba,
41002003	ni waizawo abantu bana nga bagingire omulwaire asanyalaire, bamumuleeteire.
41002004	Owebakayire okumutuuca oYesu egiyabbaire, olwʼekiziima kyʼabantu, ni babiikula ekitundu kyʼekisooto kyʼenyumba, okuteeba oYesu egiyabbaire. Ni babitya omulwaire oyo omu kiwundu ekyo ngʼalambaire oku mukeeka okubamuleeteire.
41002005	OYesu oweyaboine okwikirirya kwabwe, nʼakoba asanyalaire ati, “Mwana wange, nkusoniyire ebikolebyo ebibbibibbi.”
41002006	Abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa ababbaire batyaime awo, oolwo ni baseega omu myoyo gyabwe bati,
41002007	“Onu abba atya okutumula atyo? Atumula omu ngeri ezumirira oKibbumba! Naani ali nʼobwezye okusoniya ebikole ebibbibibbi okutoolaku oKibbumba?”
41002008	Amangu ago, oYesu, omu mwoyogwe, nʼategeera ebyabbaire omu biseego byabwe. Iye awo niiye okubakoba ati, “Lwaki mwebuulya ebintu ebyo omu myoyo gyanywe?
41002009	Oku bibiri binu kiriina ekikalanguki eino okutumula ni kibbaawo; kukoba asanyalaire nti, ‘Nkusoniyire ebikolebyo ebibbibibbi,’ ooba nti, ‘Osetuke, weetiike omukeekagwo oyabe?’
41002010	Aale atyanu oleke mbalage nti oMwana wa Muntu, ali nʼobwezye okusoniya ebikole ebibbibibbi oku kyalo kunu.” Era awo nʼakoba asanyalaire ati,
41002011	“Osetuke! Oginge omukeekagwo, era okange e ika!”
41002012	Amangu ago, omusaiza nʼayemerera, bonabona nga babona, nʼaginga omukeekagwe, nʼatambula. Bonabona ni bawuninkirira, ni bawuuja oKibbumba, ni bakoba bati, “E! Titubonangaku ekintu ekiti!”
41002013	Olundi oYesu nʼairayo oku mbale kwʼenyanza eyʼe Galiraaya, abantu nga bali kwabanga bangi ino egyali, era ngʼabeegesya.
41002014	Oluzwanyuma oweyabbaire ngʼatambula, nʼabona oLeevi, omusolooji wa musolo, omutaane wʼAlufaayo, ngʼatyaime omu yaafeesi ya musolo. OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Oize otambulenge na nze.” OLeevi yena nʼasetukiramu nʼayaba naye.
41002015	Oluzwanyuma, oYesu nʼayaba nʼabeegibe e wa Leevi oku kiinulo. Abasolooji ba musolo bangi, nʼabakola ebikole ebibbibibbi, ni baaba naye, era bonabona ni batyama okulya nʼoYesu nʼabeegibe.
41002016	Abamo oku bakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa abʼomu kibbula kyʼaBafalisaayo, owebaboine oYesu ngʼaliira aamo nʼabakola ebibbibibbi, nʼabasolooji ba musolo, ni babuulya abeegibe bati, “Lwaki oyo aliira aamo nʼabakola ebikole ebibbibibbi ngʼabo abasolooji ba musolo?”
41002017	OYesu oweyawuliire ekibabuulya, iye onyere nʼabairamu ati, “Aboomi tibeetaaga omusawo, wazira abalwaire. Abatuukirirye tiniibo abenaizire okweta beenenye, wazira abakola ebibbibibbi.”
41002018	Omu kiseera abeegi ba Yokaana oMubatizi nʼaBafalisaayo ekibabbaire basiibiramu, abantu abamo ni baiza egiri oYesu, ni bamubuulya bati, “Lwaki abeegi ba Yokaana oMubatizi nʼabeegi bʼaBafalisaayo basiiba, kaisi ababo ni batasiiba?”
41002019	OYesu, okutaka okubalaga ati iye nʼenjegesyaye empyaka tibakwatagana nʼobulombolombo bwʼekifalisaayo, nʼabairamu nʼengero ginu ati, “Abageni abeete oku mbaga yʼobugole tibeezya okusiiba ngʼomugole omusaiza akaali ali nabo.
41002020	Neye ekiseera kyalituuka ni babatoolaku omugole oyo, kaisi oolwo ni basiiba omu biseera ebyo.
41002021	“Omuntu takubbira omu kizwalo ekikaire ekiraaka ekiyaaka ekibakaali okwozakuumu, olwakubba owekyekaza, kyezya okukanula ekizwalo, kaisi ekituli ni kyeyongera okugalama.
41002022	Era omwenge gwʼemizabbibbu omuyo tibagusuka mu bisawo byagwo ebyʼamadiba ebikaire. Singa ekyo bakikola, gubyata, kaisi nʼofiirwa omwenge ogwo nʼekisawo kyaku. Omwenge gwʼemizabbibbu omuyo bagusuka mu bisawo byagwo ebiyaaka.”
41002023	Lumo, oYesu yabbaire abita omu kasinde akabbaire omu musiri gwʼengaano oku Saabbaato, abeegibe abeyabbaire atambula nabo, ni baaba nga bawulula ebigala byʼengaano.
41002024	ABafalisaayo ni babuulya oYesu bati, “Ala obone, lwaki abeegibo batambire, ekintu aMateeka ga Musa ekigataikirirya oku Saabbaato?”
41002025	Iye nʼabairamu ati, “Inywe timusomangaku omu Biwandiike kwekyo okabaka oDawudi nʼabeyabbaire nabo ekibakolere enzala oweyabalumire?
41002026	Yaingiire omu nyumba ya Kibbumba, nʼalyaku emigaati egibabbaire bawongere eeri oKibbumba. Ekyo oDawudi yakikoleire mu kiseera Abbyasaali oweyabbaire nga niiye okabona akira obukulu. Waire ngʼemigaati egyo aMateeka ga Musa gabbaire tigaikirirya abantu abandi okugiryaku okutoolaku abakabona bonkani, iye oDawudi yagiriireku; era nʼawaaku nʼababbaire naye!”
41002027	Awo niiwo oYesu okubeebuulisya ati, “Lwaki oKibbumba yateekerewo eSaabbaato? Museega muti yaluteekerewo kufugiraku bantu ekibakola? Kadi! Yaluteekerewo kaisi abantu beezye okuwuumulirangaku okuzwa omu mirimo gyabwe.
41002028	Nʼolwekyo oMwana wa Muntu ali nʼobwezye okusalawo abantu ekibasaaniire okukola oku Saabbaato.”
41003001	Olundi, oYesu nʼayaba omwikumbaaniro. Era oomwo mwabbairemu omuntu owʼengalo eyanyolere.
41003002	Era omunyere oomwo mwabbairemu aBafalisaayo ababbaire banoonianga ensonga yʼokuzweraku okuwaabira oYesu. Kale ni bamwekalikica babone ooba nga yalamya omuntu oyo oku Saabbaato, kaisi basunire okwo ekyʼokumuwaabira.
41003003	OYesu nʼakoba owʼengalo eyanyolere ati, “Osetuke, oyemerere abantu bonabona egibeezya okukubonera!”
41003004	Kaisi nʼabuulya abamwakanisya ati, “Kaisi niki amateeka ekigaikirirya okukola oku Saabbaato? Kukola busa ooba bubbibubbi? Kulamya bwomi ooba kwita?” Neye ibo ni basirika-busiriki.
41003005	Awo nʼabeeruguulyamu amaiso nʼobusungu, era ngʼobukakanyali bwʼemyoyo gyabwe bumukwatisirye obutaki, nʼakoba omuntu oyo ati, “Waama iswe ogolole engaloyo.” Era nʼagigolola, era nʼeramirawo.
41003006	Awo aBafalisaayo ibo ni bawulukamu, era amangu ago ni beeyimbya nʼabandi abʼekibbula ekiwagira okabaka oKerode ni bateesa engeri egibeezya okujigiricamu oYesu.
41003007	Olundi oYesu nʼayaba oku mbale kwʼenyanza eyʼe Galiraaya aamo nʼabeegibe. Oguyindi gwʼabantu ni gwaba egyali, nga guzwa e bugwaisana omu Galiraaya nʼomu Buyudaaya,
41003008	omu maserengenta gʼomu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, nʼomu kitundu kyʼe Idumeya, nʼokwitale kudi kwʼomwiga oYoludaani, nʼe ngulu omu bitundu ebiriraine ebibuga oTiiro nʼoSidoni. Abo bonabona baabire egyali olwakubba babbaire bawuliire ebyakola.
41003009	Olwʼabantu okubitirira obungi, oYesu nʼalagira abeegibe bateekewo eryato libbaawo nga limukuumiriire okutyamamu olwʼekiziima kyʼabantu obutamumigirirya.
41003010	Yabalagiire okukola ekyo olwakubba yabbaire alamirye abantu bangi, ngʼabalwaire bonabona beemigirirya beezye okumutuukirira bamukwateku.
41003011	Abantu ababbaireku emizimu owebamubonangaku nga bagwa ansi omu maisoge ni baasyamika bati, “Niiwe oMwana wa Kibbumba!”
41003012	Neye oYesu iye ngʼagaanira nakimo emizimu egyo okumubbutula.
41003013	Olundi, oYesu nʼayaba oku lusozi, nʼayeta abo abeyalonderemu, ni baaba egyali.
41003014	Mwibo nʼayabulaku ikumi na babiri babbenge aamo naye, era abatumenge okulaabba obukwendabwe.
41003015	Abo abeyalonderemu nʼabeeta batume, era nʼabawa obwezye okubbinganga emizimu oku bantu.
41003016	Abatume eikumi na babiri abeyayabwireku niibo banu: OSimooni, oguyatuumire erya Peetero;
41003017	oYaakobbo nʼomugandawe oYokaana abataane ba Zebedaayo abeyeerwire erya “Bbowaneruuge” amakulu gaakyo kiti, “Ababbwatuka ooti laadu.”
41003018	Era nʼAndereya, nʼoFiripo, nʼoBbantulumaayo, nʼoMatayo, nʼoTomasi, nʼoYaakobbo omutaane wʼAlufaayo, nʼoSadaayo, nʼoSimooni oMulwaniriri wa kwefuga kwʼeigwangalye,
41003019	nʼoYuda Isikalyoti eyaliiremu oYesu olukwe.
41003020	Olundi, oYesu nʼakanga e Kaperenawumu, tete abantu bangi ni bakumbaanira egyali, iye nʼabeegibe ni bakayaku nʼakaseera kʼokulya ekyokulya.
41003021	Abʼe waabwe e Naazaleesi owebawuliire bati airire, ni baaba okumukwata olwakubba ibo babbaire bakitwala bati agwire eiralu.
41003022	Abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ababbaire bazwire e Yerusaalemi ibo nga bakoba abantu bati, “Aliku Bberuzebbuli omukulu wʼemizimu, era akolesya bwezye bwa mukulu oyo okugibbinga.”
41003023	Awo oYesu nʼayeta abakugu omu bya Mateeka nago okwaba egyali, nʼabairiramu mu ngero ati, “OSitaani ogumwetere oBberuzebbuli ayezya atya okwebbinga iye onyere oku bantu?
41003024	Abantu abʼobwakabaka obumo owebeesalamu, obwakabaka obwo tibuwangaala.
41003025	Nʼomu kisito, singa abantu baamu owebeesalamu, baawukana, nʼekisito ekyo ni kisansukana.
41003026	Singa oSitaani yena yeerwanisya, obwezyebwe ni bugabukanamu, abba takaali ali nʼamaani, era abba ngʼajigirikire.
41003027	“Mpaawo ayezya okwingira omu nyumba ya muntu owʼamaani nʼanyaga ebintubye, okutoolaku ngʼasookere kumusiba, oolwo kaisi nʼayezya okunyaga ebyʼomu nyumbaye.
41003028	“Mbakobera amazima nti, kyezyeka okusoniya abantu ebibbibibbi byabwe byonabyona, era kyezyeka okubasoniya ebizumi byonabyona ebibazuma.
41003029	Neye, buli azuma oMwoyo oMweru, tibalimusoniya olwakubba abba akolere kibbikibbi ekyasigala nakyo emirembe nʼemirembe.”
41003030	Ekyo oYesu yakitumwire kwakanisya baabo ababbaire bakobere bati aliku muzimu.
41003031	Atyanu abaganda ba Yesu nʼomaaye ni batuuka egiyabbaire. Iye ngʼali omu nyumba, ni beemerera e nza, ni bamutumira omuntu okumweta.
41003032	Ekiziima kyʼabantu ekyabbaire kityaime nga kimweruguuliriirye ni bamukoba bati, “Omaawo nʼabagandabo bali e nza bataka okukubona.”
41003033	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Abantu abenjeta nti mama ooba nti baganda bange niibo ababba abʼengeriki?”
41003034	Awo nʼabitya amaiso omu bantu ababbaire batyaime okumpi naye awo abamweruguuliriirye, nʼakoba ati, “Omama nʼabaganda bange niibo banu.
41003035	Buli akola oKibbumba ebyataka niiye abba omuganda wange, niiye abba omwonyoko wange, era niiye abba omama.”
41004001	Olunaku olunyere oolwo, oYesu nʼatandiika tete okwegesya ngʼali oku mbale kwʼenyanza oGaliraaya, ekiziima kyʼabantu ni kikumbaanira egyali. Neye owekyabitiriire obunene, oYesu nʼaingira omu lyato eryabbaire oku nyanza, nʼalityamamu; ekiziima ikyo ni kisigala oku mbale.
41004002	Awo nʼabeegesya ebintu bingi ngʼakolesya ngero, era omu kwegesyakwe nʼabakoba ati,
41004003	“Muwulisisye. Wabbairewo omulimi eyaabire okusiga ensigogye.
41004004	Oweyabbaire ngʼasiga, egimo gyagwire ku nzira, enyonyi ni giiza ni gigirya.
41004005	Era ensigo egindi ni gigwa mwitakali eryʼoku bubbaalebbaale, tigyalwire ni gimera, olwakubba eitakali eeryo tiryabbaire lyabiriri.
41004006	Neye eisana oweryocerye eino, ni liwotoca ebimera ebyo era ni bikala olwakubba emiri gyabyo gyabbaire tigyabiriire ansi omwitakali.
41004007	Ensigo egindi ni gigwa mwitakali eryabbairemu amawa kaisi ni gakulira aamo nʼensigo egyo, kale ni gagikaisya nʼokwama.
41004008	Nʼensigo egindi ni gigwa omwitakali erisa, ni gimera, ni gikula, era ni gibala. Egimo ni gibala ensigo 30; nʼegindi 60; era nʼegindi 100.”
41004009	Awo oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Aale omuntu aliku amatwi agawulira, awulisisye era ategeere ekintumula.”
41004010	Awo abantu abakira obungi nga bamalire okuzwawo ni baaba, abeegi eIkumi na babiri, nʼabandi ababbaire basigaire nʼoYesu ni bamubuulya ebikwata oku ngero egyo.
41004011	Iye nʼabakoba ati, “Inywe babawaire enkabi egyʼokumanya ekyama ekifa oku bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba. Neye abantu abandi bawulirira buli kintu mu ngero,
41004012	kaisi dala, ‘balingirirenge, neye nga tibabona; bawulisisyenge, neye nga tibategeera, demba ni beenenya ni babasoniya ebibbibibbi byabwe.’ ”
41004013	Awo niiye oYesu okubabuulya ati, “Abba ngʼamakulu ga lugero oolwo timugategeire, oolwo mwalyezya mutya okubbaaku nʼolugero olumutegeera?
41004014	Omusigi niiye omuntu asiga ekibono kya Kibbumba omu bantu.
41004015	Abantu abamo bafaanana ngʼensigo egyagwire oku nzira. Ekibono owebakibasigamu bakiwulira, neye amangu ago oSitaani aiza nʼakibatoolamu.
41004016	Abandi bafaanana ngʼensigo egyagwire omwitakali eryʼoku bubbaalebbaale. Owebawulira ekibono, amangu ago bakyaniriza nʼeisangaalo.
41004017	Neye, olwakubba bafaanana ooti bimera ebidamba emiri egyabirira nakimo ansi omwitakali, bamala ekiseera kityayi kiti. Owebagwa omu bigosi, ooba okubayigaania olwʼekibono kya Kibbumba owekwiza, amangu ago ni bawaamu amaani.
41004018	Abandi bafaanana ngʼensigo egyagwire omwitakali eryamereremu amawa. Ekibono bakiwulira,
41004019	neye okweraliikirira ebintu byʼe kyalo, nʼokubabbeyabbeya nʼebyobusuni, nʼamasanyu gʼekyalo kinu, owebifuga emyoyo gyabwe bikaisya ekibono kya Kibbumba okubabbeera okukola ebikole ebisa.
41004020	Kaisi abandi bafaanana ngʼensigo egyagwire omwitakali erisa. Owebawulira ekibono bakiikirirya, era ni bakikuuma era ni beekalangula okukolanga ebikole ebisa; omu bamo ni byekubbisyamu emirundi 30, omu bandi emirundi 60, nʼomu bandi emirundi 100.”
41004021	Awo oYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Eitaala owebalireeta awali endikiirya tete baira ni balifuunikaku ekiibo ooba balikukuulirirya mu mantalike? Tibalyanika aweeru ku kikondo?
41004022	Aale buli kintu ekibisabise kyalibbutuka; era buli kyama kyalibbutuka.
41004023	Abba nga waliwo aliku amatwi agawulira, awulisisye era ategeere ekintumula.”
41004024	Era nʼayongereryaku ati, “Mugenderere engeri egimuwulisisya. Ekipimo ekimukolesya okumpulisisya, ekinyere ekyo niikyo oKibbumba ekiyalikolesya okupima ebiyalibawa, era nʼokwongeraku yalibongereryaku.
41004025	Oyo aali nabyo balimwongeraku nʼebindi. Neye oyo abula, nʼakatono akaali nako balikamutoolaku.”
41004026	OYesu nʼayongera okubakobera olugero olundi ati, “Obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba tubufaananiaku nʼowekibba ngʼomuntu asiga ensigo omwitakali.
41004027	Omusigi oyo obwire abba agona, omusana nabba abonia. Igyo ensigo ni gimera gyonkani, era ni gikula, iye eyagisigire amantamanyaku engeri egigimeramu, nʼegigikulamu.
41004028	Eitakali niiryo erikulya ebimera ebyo paka mu kwama. Ebimera ebyo bisooka kuleeta bukoola, ni biiryaku okusowola emitwe gyʼebigala ebitobito. Kaisi oluzwanyuma, omu mitwe gyʼebigala egyo ni mwizamu amaiso, ni gakakata.
41004029	Amaiso ago nga gengere, oolwo omukesi nʼakwata akagoda, olwakubba eikesa lituukire.”
41004030	Awo oYesu tete nʼabagerera olugero olundi ati, “Obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba twezya kubufaanania naaki? Ooba lugeroki olutwezya okukolesya okubusonzola?
41004031	Bufaananaku ooti kansigo aka kalidaali. Akansigo ako niiko akakirira nakimo obutono omu nsigo gyonagyona egiri oku kyalo.
41004032	Neye owebakakoma omwitakali, kamera ni kasuuka kimera kya syodo ekikira ebirime bya syodo ebindi byonabyona ebibba omu musiri. Kyabula amasaga amanene, enyonyi gyʼomwibbanga ni gyezya okulukamu ebisaasiriro, nʼokuwuumulira omu kyoleerya kya masaga gaaku.”
41004033	OYesu yalaabbanga eeri abantu ekibono kya Kibbumba ngʼakolesya engero nyingi egifaananaku na ginu, okusinzirira kwekyo ekyababbeeranga ekyangu okutegeera.
41004034	Mpaawo ekiyabakoberanga nga takoleserye ngero. Kaisi oweyasigalanga nʼabeegibe bonkani, ibo ngʼabasonzolera byonabyona ebyategeezerenge.
41004035	Oku lunaku olunyere oolwo, eigolo, oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Tusalemu awo twabe oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza.”
41004036	Awo abeegibe ni baleka aawo ekiziima kyʼabantu, ni baingira omu lyato oYesu omuyabbaire atyaime, ni bagimba ni baaba naye. Abantu abandi ababbairewo ni bagimba amaato gaabwe, bona ni babasenjaku baabe naye.
41004037	Nga bali akati omu nyanza, ogumpunga ni gutandiika okufuwa, amayengo ni geesuka omu lyato, ni libbuuca kwizula amaizi.
41004038	Omu kaseera ako oYesu iye yabbaire mu kifo ekyʼenyuma omu lyato yeigikire omwito agonere. Abeegibe ni bamulamuca, ni bamukoba bati, “ Musomesya, iwe tofaayo ngʼenyanza etwita?”
41004039	OYesu nʼasetuka nʼakaawuukira ogumpunga ati, “Oikaikane!” Era nʼakoba enyanza ati, “Oteeke!” Omu kaseera akanyere ako, ogumpunga ni guwolererya, nʼenyanza nʼeteekera nakimo kusani.
41004040	Kaisi oYesu nʼaira oku beegibe nʼababuulya ati, “Lwaki mutiire? Paka atyanu mukaali kubba nʼokwikirirya?”
41004041	Neye ibo okutya okwababbairemu ni kweyongera, ni bakobangana bati, “Onu muntu wʼengeriki? Obona nʼogumpunga nʼamayengo bimugondera!”
41005001	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe ni batuuka oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza omu kitundu kyʼe Bageraasa.
41005002	OYesu oweyabbaire yankazwa omu lyato, omuntu aliku omuzimu nʼazwa omu kifo omwabbaire amagombe agʼempuku, nʼayaba egyali amusangaane.
41005003	Omuntu oyo nago yagonanga mu mpuku egyo. Wabbaire nga tiwakaali waliwo omuntu ayezya okumukuuma nga musibe oku kintu kyonakyona, kadi ku lujegere,
41005004	olwakubba emirundi mingi bamusibanga nʼenjegere oku mangalo nʼebigere, neye egyo gyona ngʼagitiica-butiici. Kale tiwabbairewo muntu owa maani kadi moiza ayezya okumukalangula.
41005005	Omusaiza oyo bulijo omusana nʼobwire, yasinziriranga omu kifo omuli empuku egibaliikamu abafu, nʼoku nsozi, nʼabbookooka, era ni yeesalyaga nʼamabbaale.
41005006	Awo oweyalengeire oYesu, nʼayaba egyali ngʼairuka, nʼamuwa ekitiisya ngʼamukomera amazwi.
41005007	OYesu nʼalagira omuzimu ogwo ati, “Ozwe oku muntu oyo!” Neye omuzimu ni gumwekungirira nga wegukooka guti, “Onvunaanira niki, iwe Yesu oMwana wa Kibbumba oNambulaku aMwagaagana? Nkwegairiire, omu mwoyo gwa Kibbumba, tiwangadya.”
41005009	Kaisi oYesu nʼagubuulya ati, “Eriinalyo niiwe onaani?” Ni gwiramu guti, “Eriina lyange ninze oKiziima, olwakubba tuli bangi.”
41005010	Gutyo ni gumwegairira ino guti, “Tiwatubbinga omu kitundu kinu!”
41005011	Oku mugingi awo wabbairewo ekiraalo kinene ekyʼembiizi nga giriisya.
41005012	Emizimu egyo ni gyegairira oYesu giti, “Otusindike mu mbiizi niigyo egitubba twingiremu.”
41005013	Oweyagiikiriirye, emizimu ni gizwa oku muntu oyo, ni gingira omu mbiizi egyo, ekiraalo ekyabbaire ekyeraamu embiizi ooti nkumi ibiri ni kitantawuka okuzwa e ngulu oku mugingi, ni kiyoolookera omu nyanza, gyonagyona ni gifeera oomwo.
41005014	Awo abaliisya baagyo ni bairuka, ni baaba bakobera abʼomu kibuga nʼabʼomu byalo. Era abantu ni baaba ni babona ekigwirewo.
41005015	Owebatuukire oYesu egiyabbaire, ni babona omuntu eyaabbangaku ekiziima kyʼemizimu ngʼatyaime, azwaire, era ngʼategeera kusani ni batya.
41005016	Abo ababbairewo ngʼemizimu gizwa oku muntu oyo gingira omu mbiizi ni balonserya abantu abaabireyo.
41005017	Owebawuliire ebikole ebyo, abantu abo ni batandiika okwegairira oYesu abazwere omu kitundu kyabwe, yena nʼaikirirya okwaba.
41005018	Ngʼayaba okuniina omu lyato, omuntu oguyabbingireku emizimu nʼamwegairira ati amwikirirye atambulenge naye.
41005019	Neye iye oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Bbe. Okangeyo e waanywe, omu bantubo, obakobere byonabyona oMusengwa oKibbumba ebyakukoleire, era ngʼowakukwatiire ekisa.”
41005020	Awo omuntu oyo nʼayaba nʼatandiika okukobera abʼomu kitundu kyʼe Dekapooli, byonabyona oYesu ebiyamukoleire. Bonabona ababiwuliire ni beewunya.
41005021	OYesu nʼabeegibe owebaniinire omu lyato, ni bakangayo oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza, olwʼe ika. Abantu bangi ni bakumbaanira oYesu egiyabbaire, era nabba nabo awo oku mbale kwʼenyanza.
41005022	Awo omoiza oku bakulu bʼeikumbaaniro ogubeeta oYairo yena giyaiziire. Oweyaboine oYesu, nʼakoma amazwi okumpi kumpi nʼebigerebye,
41005023	nʼamukungirira ino ati, “Oo! Musengwa, akaala kange kataka okunfaaku. Oize okateekeku engalogyo okalamye tikaafa.”
41005024	OYesu nʼayaba naye, era abantu abandi bangi ino ni bamusengererya, nga baaba bamumigirirya.
41005025	Mwabo mwabbairemu omukali eyabbaire agadire nʼobulwaire bwʼekikulukuto kyʼeisaaye obwabbaire bumumalireku emyanka ikumi na mibiri.
41005026	Omukali oyo yabbaire agadire ino nʼekirwaire ekyo era ngʼatambwire omu basawo bangi, nga bamumalireku nʼebintubye byonabyona neye nga talama, era ekirwairekye nga kyeyongera kubba bundi.
41005027	Era olwakubba yabbaire awuliireku ebibatumula oku Yesu, yakikimitire omu kiyindi kyʼabantu ababbaire basengererya oYesu, ayezye okumuzwera enyuma akwate oku kizwalokye.
41005028	Ekyo kityo olwakubba yabbaire akoba omu mwoyogwe ati, “Kadi singa ni mmukwataku-bukwati oku kizwalokye, mmaite nti nalama.”
41005029	Oweyakikwaiteku, amangu ago ekikulukuto kyʼeisaaye ni kikalirawo. Era nʼawulira omu mubirigwe ngʼalamire.
41005030	Omu kaseera akanyere ako, oYesu nʼawulira ngʼamaanige agalamya gawulukire ni gakola omulimo. Awo nʼacuukira ekiyindi kyʼabantu, nʼababuulya ati, “Naani azwa okunkwata oku kizwalo?”
41005031	Abeegibe ni bamwiramu bati, “Wena dala obona abantu bakwizwireku, kaisi era nʼobuulya oti, ‘Naani azwa okunkwataku?’ ”
41005032	Neye iye oYesu nʼabityabitya amaiso abone amukwaiteku.
41005033	Awo omukali oyo, olwʼokumanya ekimutuukireku, omu kutya okunene, era ngʼatukuta, nʼaiza nʼagwa oku mazwi omu maiso ga Yesu, era nʼamukobera amazima.
41005034	Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Mwala wange, olwa kwikiriryakwo olamire. Oyabe mwidembe! Okugadakwo kukomere.”
41005035	OYesu ngʼakaali atumula, abakwenda abazwa omu kisito kya Yairo, omukulu wʼeikumbaaniro, ni baaba, ni bakobera omukulu oyo bati, “Mukulu, tikikaali kyetaagisya okudambya oMusomesya, omwalawo afiire.”
41005036	Waire oYesu yawuliire abo ebibatumula, tiyabafiireku, nʼakoba oYairo ati, “Tiwaatya, obbe na kwikirirya kwonkani.”
41005037	Ekyazwiremu oYesu nʼagaana abantu abandi okwaba naye e wa Yairo, okutoolaku oPeetero, nʼoYaakobbo, nʼoYokaana omuganda wa Yaakobbo.
41005038	Owebatuukire oku nyumba ya Yairo, omukulu wʼeikumbaaniro, oYesu nʼayajaawo obuyoga, ngʼabantu bakunga, nga bakubba enduulu.
41005039	Oweyaingiire, nʼakoba ababbairemu ati, “Lwaki mukuukulya, lwaki mukunga? Omwana timufu, agonere-bugoni.”
41005040	Neye ibo ni bamusekerera, ekyazwiremu nʼababbingamu. Ngʼamalire okubabbingawo nʼabandi bonabona, nʼatwala ababyaire ba mwana, nʼabeegibe abasatu, nʼaingira nabo omu kisenge omwana omuyabbaire.
41005041	Oweyatuukire omu kisenge, nʼakwata omwana oku ngalo, nʼamukoba ati, “Talisa kumi.” Amakulu gaakyo gati, “Kaala iwe, nkukoba nti olamuke!”
41005042	Amangu ago, akaala akabbaire akʼemyanka eikumi na mibiri, ni keemerera, ni katambulatambulamu. Ababbairewo ni bawuninkirira ino!
41005043	Neye oYesu nʼabasisiitira ino ati ekyo tibakikoberaku abantu abandi. Era atyo nʼabalagira okuwa omwana oyo ekyokulya alye.
41006001	OYesu nʼazwa omu kitundu ekyo, nʼayaba omu kitundu kyʼe waabwe, nʼabeegibe ni baaba naye.
41006002	Awo oku Saabbaato, nʼayaba omwikumbaaniro nʼatandiika okwegesya. Abantu bangi ababbairewo owebawuliire ebyayegesya, ni bawuninkirira! Ni bakoba bati, “Binu byonabyona yabitoire yaina? Malabuki gʼengeriki ganu oKibbumba ageyamuwaire? Era ayezya atya okukola ebyewunyo binu?
41006003	Onu tiniiye omubaizi, omutaane wa Malyamu, era omuganda wa Yaakobbo nʼoYose, nʼoYuda, nʼoSimooni? Era aboonyokobe tibabba kwaiswe kunu na iswe?” Awo ni bamukwatira engongi.
41006004	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “ Onaabbi bamuwa ekitiisya wonawona okutoolaku omu kitundu kyʼe waabwe, nʼomu kikaakye, nʼomu nyumba yʼe waabwe.”
41006005	Era eeyo oYesu tiyeezyerye kukolerayo byewunyo, okutoolaku okulamyakuuyo abalwaire batontono bati, ngʼabateekaku engalogye.
41006006	Yeewunyire ino olwakubba abantu baayo tibabbaire nʼokwikirirya. Atyo nʼayaba ngʼayegesya omu byalo ebirirainewo.
41006007	Lumo oYesu nʼayeta abeegibe eIkumi na babiri, ni baaba egyali, nʼabatuma babiri babiri. Era nʼabawa obwezye okubbinganga emizimu oku bantu.
41006008	Nʼabasisiitira ati, “Omu lugendo lunu timwaba na kantu kadi kamo, okutoolaku omukoomero. Timwaba nʼekyokulya, kadi mpiiya, ooba emigoba.
41006009	Neye muzwale biraito, era buli moiza azwale ekizwalo kimo kyonkani, tiyaaba nʼekyokubiri.”
41006010	Era nʼabakoba ati, “Buli kibuga ekimubba mutuukiremu, mugonenge mu kisito kyʼabantu ababasangaaliranga, paka owemwalizwa omu kibuga ekyo.
41006011	Owemutuuka omu kifo kyonakyona, abantu nandi ni babasangaalira ooba ni bagaana okubawulisisya, awo nga muzwawo. Era owemubba muzwawo, mwekunkumulyangaku nʼenkungu egibba gibakwaite oku bigere byanywe, ngʼakamanyiciryo kʼobujulizi obulaga okuvunaana abantu abo.”
41006012	Batyo abeegi ni baaba nga bakobera abantu bati, “Kiwomeire mwenenye.”
41006013	Ni babbinga emizimu mingi oku bantu. Ni basiiga abalwaire amafuta gʼenkabi ni babalamya.
41006014	Awo okabaka Kerode nʼawulira okufuma kwa Yesu, olwakubba babbaire bamutumulaku wonawona. Abamo nga bakoba bati, “Niiye oYokaana oMubatizi azuukiire. Ekyo niikyo ekigira ali nʼobwezye okukola ebyewunyo.”
41006015	Neye abandi nga bakoba bati, “Niiye Eriya.” Nʼabandi bati, “Naabbi, omoiza oku banaabbi abʼeira.”
41006016	OKerode oweyabiwuliire nʼakoba ati, “OYokaana oMubatizi ogunatemereku omutwe niiye azuukiire!”
41006017	-
41006019	OYokaana oMubatizi yabbaire adeebere oKerode ngʼamukoba ati, “Amateeka tigaikirirya iwe okutwala oKerodiya omuka mugandawo oFiripo, nʼomusuuca mukaliwo. Ekyo kyagirire oKerodiya nʼakoolesya oYokaana, ngʼataka nʼokumwita, neye ngʼabula ngeri.” Ekiseera kyatuukire oKerode nʼalagira ati, oYokaana bamukwate era bamwigalire omu mabbuusu, okusangaalya oKerodiya, okabaka oKerode oguyabbaire abandwire oku mugandawe.
41006020	OKerode iye yabbaire atya oYokaana, ngʼamaite ati oYokaana musaiza atuukiriire, era mweru, kale yamukuumanga kusani tiyabbaaku kabbikabbi. Yatakanga okumuwulisisya, newankubbaire nga buli oweyamuwulisisyanga, yeeraliikiriranga ino omu mwoyo.
41006021	Neye lumo, oKerodiya nʼasuna akakisa. Lwabbaire lunaku lwa kwewukiriryaku olubabyaliire oKerode. OKerode nʼakola embaga, nʼayeta abantube abakulu, nʼabakulu bʼabaisulukale, nʼabantu abafuma omu Galiraaya.
41006022	Kwolwo omwala wa Kerodiya yaizire nʼabina, nʼasangaalya ino oKerode nʼabagenibe. Olwʼokusiima eino okabaka nʼakoba omwala ati, “Onsabe kyonakyona ekyotaka, nakuwa.”
41006023	Nʼalayira nʼokulayira ati, “Kyonakyona ekiwansaba nakuwa, nʼowewataka oti obwakabaka bwange tubugabaniremu akati.”
41006024	Awo omwala nʼawuluka, ni yeebulyaku omaaye ati, “Nsabe niki?” Omaaye nʼamwiramu ati, “Mutwe gwa Yokaana oMubatizi gwʼobba osabe.”
41006025	Amangu ago omwala nʼaluuya okukanga egiri okabaka, nʼamusaba ati, “Ekintaka okumpeerawo omu kaseera kanu, mutwe gwa Yokaana oMubatizi nga baguteekere okwitiba.”
41006026	Ekyo ni kiruma ino okabaka, neye olwakubba yabbaire alayiire, aate nga nʼabagenibe bawuliire, nandi nʼataka kumwima ekyamusabire.
41006027	Amangu ago okabaka nʼatuma omwisulukale omukuumi wʼamabbuusu okuleeta omutwe gwa Yokaana. Oguyatumire, nʼayaba omu mabbuusu nʼatemaku oYokaana omutwe.
41006028	Era ni baguleetera okwitiba, ni baguwa omwala, era nʼomwala yena nʼaguwa omaaye.
41006029	Abeegi ba Yokaana owebakiwuliire, ni baaba ni batwala omulambogwe, ni baguliika.
41006030	Awo abatume ni bakanga egiri oYesu, ni bamulonserya byonabyona ebibabbaire bakolere nʼebibabbaire beegeserye.
41006031	Iye nʼabakoba ati, “Mwize, twabe omu kifo omutwezya okubba swenkani, muwuumuleku.” Babbaire bakayireku nʼakaseera akʼokulyaku olwʼabantu abangi abaizanga egibaabbanga. Abantu abamo baabbanga ooti bazwawo, nga tete abandi batuuka.
41006032	Nʼolwekyo ni bagimba eryato, ni baaba bonkani, omu kifo ekinambulamu bantu.
41006033	Neye era abantu bangi ni bababona nga baaba, ni babamanyica bati niibo. Awo-so ni bazwa omu bibuga byonabyona, ni babagedya nga babita oku lukalu, nga baaba bairuka, ni babeesooka omu kifo oYesu nʼabeegibe egibabbaire baaba.
41006034	OYesu oweyatuukire oku lukalu, nʼabona ekiziima kyʼabantu kinene nga kiri awo, nʼabakwatira ekisa olwakubba babbaire ooti ntaama eginambulaku muliisya! Kale nʼamala ekiseera kiwanvu ngʼabeegesya.
41006035	Abeegi owebaboine ngʼobwire bwatira okwirugala, ni baaba egiri oYesu, ni bamukoba bati, “Ekifo kinu mpaamu bantu, aate nga nʼobwire buunu bwirugala.
41006036	Abantu obaseebule baabe beegulire ekyokulya omu byalo nʼomu bubuga obuliraine aanu.”
41006037	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Niinywe omubbe mubawe ekyokulya balye.” Ibo ni bamubuulya bati, “Otaka twabe tubagulire emigaati egimalawo edinaali 200, tubawe balye?”
41006038	Iye nʼababuulya ati, “Muliwo nʼemigaati mimeka? Mwabe mubone.” Owebamalire okwekalikica, ni bamukoba bati, “Mitaanu, nʼenyanyi ibiri.”
41006039	Awo oYesu nʼalagira abantu bonabona okutyama ansi okwisubi mu bibbubbu.
41006040	Ni batyama nga bali mu bibbubbu, ebimo nga buli kimo mulimu abantu 100, nʼebindi nga buli kimo mulimu 50.
41006041	OYesu nʼatoola emigaati emitaanu nʼenyanyi eibiri, nʼalingirira omwigulu, ni yeebalya oKibbumba. Nʼavunavunamu emigaati, nʼagiwa abeegibe okwinula abantu. Era nʼenyanyi eibiri gyona nʼagivunavunamu, bonabona ni basunaku.
41006042	Era abantu bonabona baliire ni baikuta.
41006043	Era abeegibe ni bakumbaania ebitundutundu ebyafiikireku, ni baizulya ebiibo ikumi na bibiri.
41006044	Oku bantu bonabona abaliire, obungi bwʼabasaiza bonkani bwabbaire 5,000.
41006045	Amangu ago oYesu nʼalagira abeegibe bagimbe eryato beekubbemberemu, baabe e Bbesusaida, oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza, nga iye akaali aseebula abantu.
41006046	Oweyamalire okubaseebula, nʼaniina oku lusozi okusaba oKibbumba.
41006047	Endikiirya oweyakwatiire, ngʼabeegibe bali mu lyato akati omu nyanza, oYesu iye ngʼali yenkani oku lukalu.
41006048	Awo nʼabalengera nga bakalabana okugimba eryato nʼenkasi, olwʼogumpunga ogwabbaire guzwa egibaaba. Obwire owebwabbaire bwatira okuca, nʼayaba egibali ngʼatambulira oku maizi. Nabba ooti ababitaku.
41006049	Neye ibo owebamuboine ngʼatambulira oku maizi, ni baseega bati kyewo. Ni bakubba enduulu,
41006050	olwakubba bonabona bamuboine, ni batya ino. Neye iye amangu ago nʼatumula nabo, nʼabakoba ati, “Ninze! Timwatya, mwiremu omwoyo.”
41006051	Atyo nʼaniina omu lyato omu babbaire. Ogumpunga ni gulekera awo okufuwa. Abeegibe ni bawuninkirira ino,
41006052	olwakubba ekyewunyo ekyʼemigaati babbaire tibategeire makulu gaakyo, bati oYesu ali nʼamaani. Emyoyo gyabwe gyabbaire mikakanyali.
41006053	Awo owebasaliremu enyanza ni basomoka kudi, batuukiire mu kitundu kyʼe Genesareeti, ni basiba eryato oku mbale kwʼenyanza.
41006054	Owebazwire omu lyato, abantu ni bamanyica oYesu amangu ago.
41006055	Ni bairuka nga babita buli wantu omu kitundu ekyo, ni baleeta abalwaire, nga babagingiire oku mikeeka, ni babatwala wonawona awebawuliranga bati oYesu niiwo egyali.
41006056	Wonawona aweyayabanga, omu butale, omu bibuga, ooba omu byalo, abantu bateekanga abalwaire omu bifo ebyʼokukumbaaniramu, ni bamwegairira aikirirye kadi bakwate oku mugo gwʼekizwalokye. Era bonabona abakikwaiteku, ni balama.
41007001	Lumo aBafalisaayo nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa ababbaire bazwire e Yerusaalemi, bakumbaaniire egiri oYesu.
41007002	Abantu abo ni babona abamo oku beegibe nga baliira engalo egitali ntukulye, ekikoba kiti, nga tibaginaabirye ngʼobulombolombo bwʼaBayudaaya obwebulagira.
41007003	Ibo aBafalisaayo nʼaBayudaaya abakira obungi, basengereryanga akalombolombo ka bazeiza baabwe akʼobutalya nga tibasookere kukola mukolo ogwʼokunaaba omu ngalo.
41007004	Era ebibatoolanga omu katale nga tibabirya, okutoolaku nga basookere kukola mukolo ogwʼokubitukulya. Babbaire nʼobulombolombo obundi bungi obubasengereryanga, ngʼokunaabya ebikopo, nʼagacupa, nʼebibange ebitali byʼeitakali.
41007005	Awo aBafalisaayo nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ni babuulya oYesu bati, “Lwaki abeegibo tibasengererya obulombolombo bwa bazeiza baiswe, neye ni balya nʼengalo egitali ntukulye ngʼobulombolombo bwabwe obwebulagira?”
41007006	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Bananfunsi inywe, kaisi ekibono kya Kibbumba onaabbi Isaaya ekiyabalagwireku kituuce, oweyakobere ati: ‘Abantu banu bampa ekitiisya mu bibono-bubono, neye emyoyo gyabwe gimbulaku.
41007007	Nʼengeri egibansinzamu tintuuce olwakubba ebibono ebyʼabantu-obuntu, niibyo ebibeegesya bati mateeka ga Kibbumba.’
41007008	“Muleka ekiragiro kya Kibbumba, ni mukwata obulombolombo bwʼabantu.”
41007009	Nʼabakoba tete ati, “Mukola kibbikibbi okugaana ekiragiro kya Kibbumba, olwʼokutaka okusengererya obulombolombo bwanywe.
41007010	OMusa yalagiire ati, ‘Oiteewo nʼomaawo obawenge ekitiisya.’ Era ati, ‘Eyazumanga oiteeye ooba omaaye, bamwitenge-bwiti.’
41007011	Neye inywe mukoba muti singa omuntu akoba oiteeye ooba omaaye ati, ‘Ekinandikuwaire ngʼobubbeeri, kisuukire “Kolubbaani,” ’ amakulu gaakyo kiti kiwonge eeri oKibbumba,
41007012	olwo-so nga timukaali mumwikirirya abbeeku nʼakantu kadi kamo akaakolera oiteeye ooba omaaye.
41007013	Omu ngeri eyo oKibbumba ekyakoba ni mukidibya ni musengererya bulombolombo bwanywe obumwegesya. Era mukola nʼebindi bingi ebyʼengeri eyo.”
41007014	Olundi oYesu nʼayeta ekiziima kyʼabantu tete, ni kyaba egyali, nʼabakoba ati, “Mumpulisisye nywenanywena, era mutegeere.
41007015	Ebyo omuntu ebyalya, tiniibyo ebimwonoona omu maiso ga Kibbumba, neye ebyo ebizwa omu mwoyogwe, niibyo ebimwonoona. [
41007016	Abba nga waliwo aali nʼamatwi agawulira, awulire].”
41007017	Oweyamalire okutumula ekyo nʼaleka awo ekiziima kyʼabantu, nʼaingira omu nyumba. Abeegibe ni bamubuulya amakulu gʼekyo ekyatumwire.
41007018	Nʼabakoba ati, “Nywena kadi kutegeera? Timubona muti omuntu ebyalya tiniibyo ebimusuuca okubba owa muliko?
41007019	Ekyokulya tikingira mu mwoyogwe, neye kyaba mu kida, era kizwamu ni kiwuluka omu mubiri.” (OYesu, omu kutumula atyo, yalagire ati mpaawo byakulya, abantu ebibabbaire nʼokuzira okulya).
41007020	Era nʼabakoba ati, “Omuntu ebyatumula, niibyo ebimusuuca okubba owa muliko.
41007021	Ekyo kityo olwakubba omu mwoyo gwa muntu niimwo omuzwa ebiseego ebibbibibbi, nʼobudankaani, nʼobwibbi, nʼobwiti, nʼobulendi,
41007022	nʼobuluvu, nʼenkwe, nʼebikole ebibbibibbi ebya buli ngeri, nʼobubbeyi, nʼengongi, nʼokusibirirya oku bantu, nʼokwekudumbalya, nʼobusirusiru.
41007023	Ebintu ebyo byonabyona ebibbibibbi bizwa mu mwoyo, ni bisuuca omuntu okubba owa muliko.”
41007024	OYesu oweyazwire awo, nʼayaba omu kitundu ekiriraine ebibuga oTiiro nʼoSidoni, nʼabba omu kisito ekimo, nʼatataka abantu bakimanye, neye era nandi nʼayezya kwebisira nakimo.
41007025	Waliwo omukali eyabbaire nʼakaalake akaaliku omuzimu. Oweyawuliire okufuma kwa Yesu, amangu ago nʼayaba egyali, nʼakoma amazwi okumpi nʼebigerebye.
41007026	Omukali oyo tiyabbaire Muyudaaya, eigwanga lya Yesu. Yabbaire Muyonaani omubyale wʼe Fenisiya ekyʼomu kyalo kyʼe Siiriya. Nʼasaba oYesu abbinge omuzimu oku kaalake.
41007027	OYesu, olwakubba yaizire kusooka kubbeera bantube aBayudaaya, nʼamwiramu omu lugero ati, “Oleke abaana niibo ababba beesooke okulya baikute, olwakubba owebabba bakaali kwikuta, tikituuce okutoola ekyokulya kyabwe, ni nkimumira embwa.”
41007028	Omukali nʼairamu oYesu ati, “Niikyo ekyo Musengwa, neye nʼembwa gyona, owegibba ansi wʼemenza, giryaku obukunkumukira obuzwa oku kyokulya kyʼabaana.”
41007029	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Olwʼebibono ebyo ebyoiriremu, weekangireyo e ika, omwalawo, omuzimu gumuzwireku.”
41007030	Omukali nʼakangayo e ika, nʼayaja omwalawe ngʼagalaamiriire oku kitaliri, era ngʼomuzimu gumuzwireku.
41007031	Awo oYesu nʼazwa omu kitundu ekyʼe Tiiro, nʼayaba oku nyanza oGaliraaya, ngʼabitira omu bitundu ebyʼe Sidoni nʼomu Dekapooli.
41007032	Ni wabbaawo abamuleeteire omasiipe, era eyabbaire tayezya kutumula kusani, ni beegairira oYesu amukwateku amulamye.
41007033	OYesu nʼatoola omuntu nago omu kiziima kyʼabantu, nʼamwirya oku mbale, nʼamuteeka enwe omu matwige, nʼayanda ebitanta, nʼamukwata oku lulimi.
41007034	Kaisi nʼalola omwigulu, nʼaica omuyeero, neenu waakoba omuntu oyo ati, “Efufaasa!” Amakulu gaakyo kiti, “Oigulukuke.”
41007035	Ananyere awo amatwige ni gaigulukuka, nʼolulumirwe ni lusindibuka, nʼatumula kusani.
41007036	OYesu nʼasisiitira abantu ekyo okutakikoberaku abandi. Neye era egiyakomerye okubasisiitira, tete ibo niiyo egibakomerye okukisalaanirya nakimo wonawona.
41007037	Bonabona abakiwuliire, ni bawuninkirira ino, nga bakoba bati, “Byonabyona abikola kusani; ababbaire abaigaliri bʼamatwi, abeezyeserye okuwulira; kaisi ababbaire tibatumula, nʼabeezyesya okutumula.”
41008001	Olundi omu naku egyo, abantu ni bakumbaana bangi tete. Owebabbaire nga badamba ekyokulya, oYesu nʼayeta abeegibe, ni baaba egyali, nʼabakoba ati,
41008002	“Abantu banu bankwatisirye ekisa, olwakubba bamalire na nze enaku isatu nambirira, aate atyanu badambaku ekibalya.
41008003	Owembaseebula okukangayo e waabwe ngʼenzala ebaluma, bademba babbalikira omu nzira, olwakubba abamo bazwa yala.”
41008004	Abeegibe ni bamwiramu bati, “Omu kitundu kinu omunambula muntu, omuntu atoola yaina emigaati egyezya okuliisya abantu banu?”
41008005	Iye nʼababuulya ati, “Muliwo nʼemigaati mimeka!” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Musanvu.”
41008006	Awo nʼalagira abantu batyame ansi. Era nʼatoola emigaati omusanvu, ni yeebalya oKibbumba, nʼagivunavunamu, nʼagikwatisya abeegibe bagigabire abantu. Ni bagibagabira.
41008007	Babbairewo nʼobunyanyi bubiri buti. Oweyamalire okwebalya oKibbumba, bwona nʼalagira babubagabire.
41008008	Abantu ni balya ni baikuta. Era abeegibe ni bakumbaania ebitutundutundu ebyafiikireku, ni biizulya ebiibo musanvu.
41008009	Abantu babbaire ooti 4,000.
41008010	Awo oYesu nʼabaseebula. Era oluzwanyuma nʼaniina omu lyato nʼabeegibe, ni baaba omu kitundu ekyʼe Dalumanusa.
41008011	ABafalisaayo ni baaba egiri oYesu, ni batandiika okwakana naye, ni bamusaba nga bamukema, abawe akamanyiciryo akalaga kati obwezyebwe buzwa giri Kibbumba.
41008012	Awo nʼaica omuyeero, olwʼokulumwa omu mwoyogwe, nʼabakoba ati, “Lwaki abantu bʼomulembe gunu basaba akamanyiciryo? Mbakobera amazima nti abʼomulembe gunu mpaawo kamanyiciryo akenabawa.”
41008013	Awo nʼabazwaku, tete nʼaingira omu lyato ni bagimba, nʼayaba ku lubba lundi olwʼenyanza.
41008014	Olundi abeegi ba Yesu ni beerabira okwabaku nʼemigaati. Neye ngʼomu lyato balimu nʼomugaati gumo.
41008015	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mulabuke, mwekuume ekizimbulukuca kyʼenjegesya yʼaBafalisaayo, nʼeya bantu ba Kerode.”
41008016	Ibo ni beegeyamu bati, “Atukoba atyo olwakubba tudamba migaati?”
41008017	OYesu oweyamanyicirye ekibakoba, nʼababuulya ati, “Inywe, lwaki mukoba muti mubula emigaati? Era paka atyanu mukaali kubona waire kumanyica? Emyoyo gyanywe gikaali mikakanyali?
41008018	Muli nʼamaiso, neye timubona? Nʼamatwi agemuli nago tigawulira? Era nʼokwewukirya timwewukirya?
41008019	Owenagabwire abantu 5,000 emigaati emitaanu, mwasolongere ebiibo bimeka ebiizwire ebitundutundu ebyafiikireku?” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Ikumi na bibiri.”
41008020	“Kaisi tete owenagabuliire abantu 4,000 emigaati omusanvu, mwasolongere ebiibo bimeka ebiizwire ebitundutundu ebyafiikireku?” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Ebiibo musanvu.”
41008021	Awo nʼababuulya ati, “Era paka atyanu mukaali okutegeera?”
41008022	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe, ni batuuka e Bbesusaida. Wabbairewo abantu abaleetere omwofu egiri oYesu, ni bamwegairira amukwateku amulamye.
41008023	OYesu nʼakwata omwofu oku ngalo, nʼamutoola omu kabuga ako. Oweyamalire okwanda ebitanta oku maiso ga mwofu, nʼokugakwataku, nʼamubuulya ati, “Oliku nʼekyobona?”
41008024	Omwofu nʼabonakuumu katono kati, nʼakoba ati, “Mbona abantu abatambula, okutoolaku nti, bambonekera ooti misaale.”
41008025	OYesu nʼayongera okumukwata oku maiso, ni gabonera nakimo, nʼabona kusani buli kintu.
41008026	OYesu nʼakoba eyabbaire omwofu ati, “Oyabe e waanywe, tiwakangayo eedi omu kabuga.”
41008027	Awo oYesu nʼayaba nʼabeegibe omu bubuga bwʼomu kitundu ekibeeta Kaisaaliya Firipo. Owebabbaire batambulatambula, nʼabuulya abeegibe ati, “Abantu owebabba bantumulaku, banjeta naani?”
41008028	Ni bamukobera bati, “Abamo bakweta Yokaana oMubatizi. Abandi bati mbu niiwe onaabbi Eriya, kaisi nʼabandi bakoba bati mbu niiwe omoiza oku banaabbi badi abandi.”
41008029	Olwo nʼababuulya ati, “Kaisi inywe munjeta naani?” Iye oPeetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Niiwe oKurisito nago oKibbumba oguyasukireku amafuta.”
41008030	OYesu nʼabasisiitira ino, ekyo tibakikoberaku omuntu kadi moiza.
41008031	Awo oYesu nʼatandiika okubeegesya ati, “ OMwana wa Muntu, bateekwa okumugadya ino, era nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, nʼabakabona abakulu, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka okumugaana. Era bali nʼokumwita, neye oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku isatu, yalizuukira.”
41008032	Ebyo yabitumuliire mu lwatu. Awo oPeetero nʼairya oYesu oku mbale nʼamwakanisya ino.
41008033	Neye oYesu oweyagalukire nʼalola enyuma, nʼabona abeegibe abandi, nʼakaawuukira oPeetero ati, “Onzwe omu maiso, oli Sitaani! Ebigendererwa bya Kibbumba tiniibyo ebyofaaku, neye ofa ku bya bantu!”
41008034	Awo oYesu nʼayeta ekiziima kyʼabantu, nʼabeegibe, ni kyaba egyali, nʼabakoba ati, “Buli muntu ataka okubba omusengereri wange, ali nʼokwerabira ekyali, ni yeetiika omusalabbagwe ogwa kugada olwʼobwakabaka bwa Kibbumba, era nʼansengererya.
41008035	Buli agezyaku okulamya obwomibwe okululwe, yalibufiirwa, neye buli afiirwa obwomibwe okulwange nʼolwʼaMawuliro aMasa, yalibulamya.
41008036	“Aale kirimu mugasoki omuntu okusuna obusuni bwonabwona obwa ku kyalo, neye kaisi nʼafiirwa obwomibwe?
41008037	Era dala mpaawo omuntu ekyayezya okuwaayo okugula obwomibwe.
41008038	Buli ankwatira nze era nʼebibono byange ensoni omu bantu bʼomulembe gunu abazwazwa oku Kibbumba era abakola ebibbibibbi, oMwana wa Muntu yena yalimukwatira ensoni oweyaliizira omu kitiisya kya Iteeye, ngʼali nʼabamalaika abeeru.”
41009001	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera okubakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti abamo oku bantu abali aanu, tibalifa nga bakaali okubonaku obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba nga buliwo nʼamaani.”
41009002	Enaku mukaaga owegyabitirewo, oYesu nʼayaba nʼoPeetero, nʼoYaakobbo, nʼoYokaana nʼabeekubbembera, ni baniina olusozi oluwanvu ni babbaayo bonkani. Awo embonekaye nʼecuuka nga babona.
41009003	Ebizwalobye ni bimirikiinya, ni bitukula ino nga mpaawo kadi moiza oku kyalo ayezya okubitukulya paka atyo.
41009004	Ananyere awo Eriya nʼoMusa ni babeerukira nga batumula nʼoYesu.
41009005	Awo oPeetero nʼakoba oYesu ati, “ Musomesya, kisa okubba aanu. Oleke tulukewo obusiisira busatu, akamo kako, akandi ka Musa, nʼakandi kʼEriya.”
41009006	OPeetero yakobere atyo, olwo-so ngʼebyokutumula bimugotere, olwakubba iye nʼabainaye, babbaire batiire ino.
41009007	Awo ekireri ni kiiza, ni kibabbuunaku nʼekiiriirye kyakyo, era eigono ni lizwera omu kireri ekyo nga likoba liti, “Onu niiye oMwana wange oguntaka eino, mumuwulisisye.”
41009008	Tete amangu ago baabire okulolyamika, nga tibabonaku muntu gondi aali nabo, okutoolaku oYesu yenkani.
41009009	Kaisi owebabbaire baniinuka oku lusozi, oYesu nʼabasisiitira ati, “Ekimuboine timukikoberangaku muntu yenayena paka oMwana wa Muntu ngʼamalire okuzuukira.”
41009010	Era bona ni bagondera ekyabakobere, neye ni beebuulyangana bati, “Ategeezere niki owaatumwire oku kuzuukira?”
41009011	Ananyere awo ni bamubuulya bati, “Lwaki abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa bakoba bati Eriya niiye ateekwa okusooka okwira kaisi oKurisito aize?”
41009012	-
41009013	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Kituuce, Eriya niiye aali nʼokusooka okwira okwirya emyoyo gyʼabantu obuyaaka. Neye mbakobera nti, omuntu aali ooti Eriya yaizire ira, ni bamukola ebintu byonabyona ebibatakire, ngʼeBiwandiike owebyamutumwireku.” Era nʼoMwana wa Muntu yena, bali nʼokumugadya eino, era nʼokumutalyanguka ngʼeBiwandiike owebimutumulaku.
41009014	Kwolwo oYesu nʼabeegibe abasatu, owebazwire oku lusozi, ni baaja ekiziima kyʼabantu ekinene, nga kyeruguuliriirye abeegibe abandi, era ngʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa baakana nabo.
41009015	Abantu bonabona owebaboine oYesu, ni basiima ino, ni bairuka okwaba egyali, ni bamusangaalira.
41009016	Awo iye nʼabuulya abeegibe ati, “Niki ekimwakana nabo?”
41009017	Omoiza oku bantu abangi ababbairewo, nʼamwiramu ati, “Musomesya, nakuleeteire omutaane wange aliku omuzimu ogumugaana okutumula.
41009018	Buli owegumukwata, gumukubba ebigwo, nʼafuuja eifulo, nʼaluma amaino, era ni yeegolola nʼakala. Nsabire abeegibo okugumubbingaku neye ni bakaya.”
41009019	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Abantu inywe, abʼomulembe gunu ababula okwikirirya, nalimala na inywe kiseera kyenkana aina nga mbaguminkiriza? Ondeetere omwisuka nago.”
41009020	Batyo ni bamumuleetera. Omuzimu owegwaboine oYesu, amangu ago ni gusukunsulya omwisuka, nʼagwa ansi, ni yeegalanzula, nga waafuuja eifulo.
41009021	OYesu nʼabuulya oiteeye wʼomwisuka ati, “Amalire ibbangaki kasooka omuzimu gunu gumukwata?” Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Kuzwera nakimo mu butobuto.
41009022	Era emirundi mingi gumumuma omu musyo, ooba omu maizi, gumwite. Kale otukwatire ekisa, otubbeere, owoobba oyezya.”
41009023	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Okobere oti, ‘Owoobba oyezya?’ Omanye oti byonabyona byezyeka, omuntu owaabba nʼokwikirirya.”
41009024	Amangu ago, oiteeye wʼomwisuka nʼairamu maaminkirira ati, “Njikirirya, neye era ombeere Musengwa, okwikirirya kwange kuweemu okubuusabuusa!”
41009025	OYesu oweyaboine abantu abandi bangi nga baiza bairuka, nʼakaawuukira omuzimu ati, “Iwe muzimu ogwa kutatumula, era ogwaigaire amatwi, nkulagira nti omwisuka oyo omuzweku, era tomwirangaku tete.”
41009026	Gutyo owegwamalire okwasyamika nʼokusukunsulya ino omwisuka, ni gumuzwaku, nʼawola ooti afiire. Era abakira obungi ni bakoba bati, “Afiire!”
41009027	Neye oYesu nʼamukwata oku ngalo, nʼamusetuca, era omwisuka nʼayemerera.
41009028	Oluzwanyuma, oYesu oweyakangire e ika, abeegibe ni bamubuulya bati, “Olwo lwaki iswe titwezyerye okugumubbingaku?”
41009029	Iye nʼabairamu ati, “Mpaawo kintu kindi ekimwezya okubbingisya omuzimu ogwʼengeri eenu oku muntu, okutoolaku okusaba oKibbumba.”
41009030	OYesu nʼabeegibe owebazwire awo, ni babita omu Galiraaya, oYesu nʼatataka abantu abandi bakimanye,
41009031	olwakubba yabbaire nʼabeegibe ngʼabeegesya ati, “OMwana wa Muntu baaba okumulyamu olukwe era bamuweeyo eeri abʼobwezye. Era balimwita, neye oku lunaku olwokusatu nga bamalire okumwita, yalizuukira.”
41009032	Neye ekiyabakobeire tibakitegeereku, kaisi tete ni batya okumubuulya.
41009033	Batyo oYesu nʼabeegibe ni batuuka e Kaperenawumu. Owebamalire okwingira omu nyumba, oYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Mubbaire mwakana kuuki omu nzira?”
41009034	Neye ibo ni basirika olwakubba omu nzira babbaire baakana nga beebuulyangana bati naani akira ekitiisya mwibo?
41009035	Awo oYesu nʼatyama era nʼayeta abeegibe eikumi na babiri, ni baiza egyali. Nʼabakoba ati, “Buli ataka okubba omwekubbemberi, ateekwa kubba niiye asembayo mu bonabona, era nʼokubba muweererya wa bonabona.”
41009036	Ananyere awo nʼayeta omwana omutomuto, kaisi nʼamukoba okwemerera omu maiso gaabwe. Nʼamulera, kaisi nʼabakoba ati,
41009037	“Buli asangaalira omwana ooti yoonu okulwange, abba asangaaliire ninze. Era buli ansangaalira, abba tasangaaliire ninze, neye abba asangaalira yooyo eyantumire.”
41009038	Olundi oYokaana nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Musomesya, twaboine omuntu ngʼabbinga emizimu oku bantu ngʼakolesya eriinalyo, iswe ni tugezyaku okumuloberya olwakubba takusengererya aamo na iswe.”
41009039	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Oyo timumuloberyanga, olwakubba buli akola ebyewunyo ngʼakolesya eriina lyange, tayezya kwanguya kuntumulaku obubbibubbi nga wankabitawo ekiseera ekitono kiti.
41009040	Buli atatulwanisya, oyo yena abba munaiswe.
41009041	Mbakobera amazima nti buli abawa inywe amaizi agʼokunywa olwakubba muli bantu ba Kurisito, anambula kubuusabuusa yalisuna empeeraye.”
41009042	“Singa omuntu yenayena azweraku omoiza oku batobato abo abanjikiririryamu okukola ekibbikibbi, ekikiraku, omuntu oyo kumusiba ibbaale erizito omu mamiro, ni bamudyaka omu nyanza.
41009043	Era singa engaloyo ekuzweraku okukola ekikole ekibbikibbi, ogitemeku. Kisa osune obwomi obutawaawo ngʼoli muleme, okukiraku okusigalya engalo eibiri, neye ni bakumuma, omu geyeena, [
41009044	omuli omusyo ogutalikira, era omutawa nʼokuvunda].”
41009045	Ooba singa ekigerekyo kikuzweraku okukola ekikole ekibbikibbi, okitemeku. Kisa osune obwomi obutawaawo ngʼoli muleme, okukiraku okusigalya ebigere ebibiri, neye ni bakumuma omu geyeena, [
41009046	omuli omusyo ogutalikira, era omutawa nʼokuvunda.]
41009047	“Abba ngʼeriisolyo niiryo erikuzweraku okukola ekikole ekibbikibbi, olyokolemu. Kisa oingire obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba ngʼoli wʼeriiso limo, okukiraku okusigalya amaiso gonagona, neye ni bakumuma omu geyeena,
41009048	omuli omusyo ogutalikira, era omutawa nʼokuvunda.
41009049	“OKibbumba yalikengeiza buli mwikirirya okumusuuca omusa, ngʼosyodo owaabba omusa nga bamulungiiremu omuunyu.
41009050	Omuunyu omugaanike gwa mugaso, neye singa gusuuka mujaalaali, mwezya mutya okugwiryamu ensa? Mubbe nʼomuunyu omu mpisa gyanywe, era mubbe mwidembe nʼabantu.”
41010001	Awo oYesu nʼazwa omu kitundu ekyo, nʼayaba omu kitundu ekyʼe Buyudaaya, nʼomu kitundu ekyʼoku lubba olundi olwʼomwiga oYoludaani. Era ekiziima kyʼabantu kinene ni kikumbaanira egyali tete, nʼabeegesya, nga oweyabbaire analirye okukola.
41010002	Abamo oku Bafalisaayo ni baaba egyali ni bamutega nʼekibuulyo bati, “Amateeka gaikirirya omusaiza okubbinga omukaliwe?”
41010003	Iye nʼabairamu ati, “ OMusa yabalagiire niki oku nsonga eenu?”
41010004	Ni bamukoba bati, “ OMusa yaikiriirye omusaiza okukola ekiwandiiko ekikakasa kiti abbingire omukaliwe, oolwo kaisi ni baawukana.”
41010005	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Olwʼobukakanyali bwʼemyoyo gyʼabantu, oMusa kiyazwireku nʼabateekerawo ekiragiro ekyo.
41010006	Neye okuzwera nakimo oku ntandiika oweyabbumbiire ekyalo, ‘OKibbumba yabbumbire omusaiza nʼomukali.
41010007	Kagira omusaiza yalekanga oiteeye nʼomaaye, nabba nʼomukaliwe,
41010008	era ni basuuka muntu moiza.’ Olwo nga tibakaali bali babiri, neye nga bali muntu moiza.
41010009	Kale oKibbumba ekiyagaitire aamo, omuntu takigaitululanga.”
41010010	Owebakangireyo omu nyumba, abeegi ni babuulya oYesu oku nsonga eyo.
41010011	Nʼabairamu ati, “Buli abbinga omukaliwe, kaisi nʼaleeta omukali ogondi, abba abbengere ogwʼobulendi.
41010012	Era owekibba ngʼomukali niiye anobere e wa ibaaye, kaisi nʼafumbirwa omusaiza ogondi, abba abbengere ogwʼobulendi.”
41010013	Abantu abamo babbaire baleeta abaana abatobato egiri oYesu abakwateku, neye abeegibe ni babaloberya nga babakaawuukira.
41010014	OYesu oweyaboine abeegibe ekibakola, nʼanyiiga, nʼabakoba ati, “Muleke abaana abatobato baize egyendi era timwabaloberya, olwakubba abali ooti baabo, niibo ababba omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.
41010015	Mbakobera amazima nti buli muntu ataikirirya okwesiga oKibbumba, ngʼomwana omutomuto oweyeesiga ababyairebe, tiwakwingira omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.”
41010016	Era awo nʼalera abaana abatobato, era nʼabawa enkabi ngʼabateekaku engalogye.
41010017	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼatandiika olugendolwe, omusaiza nʼaiza egyali ngʼairuka, nʼakoma amazwi omu maisoge, nʼamubuulya ati, “ Musomesya omusa, niki ekinteekwa okukola okusuna obwomi obutawaawo?”
41010018	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Lwaki onjeta omusa? Mpaawo muntu omusa okutoolaku oKibbumba yenkani.
41010019	Okubikwata oku bwomi obutawaawo, omaite ebiragiro bya Kibbumba ebikoba biti, ‘Tiwaitanga muntu, tiwayendanga, tiwaibbanga, tiwasibiriryanga oku muntu, tiwaalyanga ebya guzu. Oiteewo nʼomaawo obawenge ekitiisya.’ ”
41010020	Omusaiza onu nʼairamu oYesu ati, “Musomesya, ebiragiro ebyo byonabyona nabituukiriirye kuzwera nakimo mu butobuto paka atyanu.”
41010021	Awo oYesu oweyamulingiriire, nʼamusaasira, nʼamukoba ati, “Obulwaku ekintu kimo ekyoli nʼokukola. Oyabe otunde ebibyo byonabyona, empiiya egyazwamu ogigabire abadoobi, kaisi oize otambulenge na nze, awo walisuna obusuni omwigulu.”
41010022	Oweyawuliire ebyo, omusaiza oyo, nʼaboneka ngʼanyiikaire, era nʼayaba nga muyungubali, olwakubba yabbaire nʼebyobusuni bingi.
41010023	OYesu nʼabityabitya amaiso omu babbairewo, era nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Nga kyalibba kigosi omusuni okwingira omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba!”
41010024	Abeegibe ni bawuninkirira olwʼebibonobye. Neye oYesu nʼabakoba tete ati, “Bainange, nga kigosi omusuni okwingira omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba!
41010025	Kyanguku okisolo omunene ooti ngamira okubita omu kawundu kʼempisyo, okukiraku omusuni okwingira omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba!”
41010026	Awo ni bawuninkirira ino, ni bamubuulya bati, “Olwo naani ayezya okulokoka?”
41010027	OYesu nʼabalingirira, kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Abantu tibakyezya, neye oKibbumba iye akyezya, olwakubba Iye ayezya byonabyona.”
41010028	Awo oPeetero nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Musengwa, aale obone iswe twalekere ebyaiswe byonabyona, kaisi tutambulenge na iwe.”
41010029	OYesu nʼairamu ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti buli muntu eyalekere ekisitokye, ooba abagandabe, ooba aboonyokobe, ooba omaaye, ooba oiteeye, ooba abaanabe, ooba ebigonabye, okulwange nʼolwakubbeera aMawuliro aMasa,
41010030	yalisuna ebyʼomu bwomi bunu obwʼoku kyalo emirundi 100. Ekikoba kiti, kisitokye, nʼabagandabe, nʼaboonyokobe, nʼabamaaye, nʼabaanabe, nʼebigonabye, aamo nʼokumuyigaania. Kaisi tete, yalisuna nʼobwomi obutawaawo ngʼazwire oku kyalo.
41010031	Neye bangi kwabo abʼekitiisya omu kiseera kinu abalibba aba bulijo, era bangi kwabo aba bulijo omu kiseera kinu, abalibba abʼekitiisya.”
41010032	OYesu nʼababbaire naye, babbaire omu lugendo, nga baaba e Yerusaalemi. OYesu yabbaire abeekubbembeiremu, ngʼabalekeirekuuku eibbanga. Abeegibe ni bawuninkirira, era abantu abandi ababbaire babazwaku enyuma ni batya. Awo nʼairya tete abeegibe eikumi na babiri oku mbale, nʼatandiika okubakobera ebyabbaire byaba okumutuukaku.
41010033	Nʼabakoba ati, “Atyanu tuli kwaba e Yerusaalemi; era eeyo oMwana wa Muntu baaba okumulyamu olukwe bamuweeyo eeri abakabona abakulu, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa. Era baaba okumusalira ogwʼokufa, kaisi bamuweeyo eeri aBatali Bayudaaya.
41010034	Abo ibo baaba kumusekerera, bamwandeku ebitanta, bamukubbire emiigo egiriku emirobo egisima, era baiza kumwita. Neye oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku isatu yalizuukira.”
41010035	Awo oYaakobbo nʼoYokaana abataane ba Zebedaayo, ni baaba egiri oYesu, ni bamukoba bati, “Musomesya, tutaka otukolere kyonakyona ekitwakusaba.”
41010036	OYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Niki ekimutaka mbakolere?”
41010037	Ni bamwiramu bati, “Owewalityama oku ntebeyo eyʼekitiisya omu bwakabakabwo, tutaka otwikirirye tukulirane, ngʼomoiza atyaime oku lubbaalwo olwʼengalo endiiro, kaisi ogondi oku lwʼengalo engooda.”
41010038	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Ekimusaba timukimaite. Mwezya okunywa oku kipimo kyokugada ekinjaba okunywa, ooba okubainika omu kugada okunjaba okubba nga banjinikamu?”
41010039	Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Twezya.” OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Ekipimo ekyokugada ekinjaba okunywaku, dala mwalikinywaku, era mwaliganya ni babainika omu kugada omu ngeri eginjaba okubba nga banjinikamu.
41010040	Neye ekyʼokutyama nga mundiraine oku lubba olwʼengalo endiiro ooba engooda, tininze nsalawo, bakigabira baabo oKibbumba abeyakitegekeire.”
41010041	Abeegi abandi eikumi owebawuliire, ni banyiiga olwa Yaakobbo nʼoYokaana.
41010042	Awo oYesu nʼabeeta bonabona aamo, kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Mumaite muti abebeeta abafugi bʼabo aBatali Bayudaaya, bataka kubaweererya era abakungu baabwe abakulu bataka abantu abebafuga babamanye bati babaliku obwezye.
41010043	Neye mwinywe tiniikyo owekiri nʼokubba. Wazira mwinywe, buli ataka okubba omukulu, ateekwa kubba muweererya wʼabainaye,
41010044	era buli ataka okubba omukulu wa bainaye, ali nʼokubba muweererya wa bonabona.
41010045	NʼoMwana wa Muntu tiyaizire bamuweererye, neye kuweererya, era nʼokuwaayo obwomibwe ngʼomugaito okununula abangi.”
41010046	Batyo oYesu nʼabeegibe, nʼekiyindi kyʼabantu ekinene, ni batuuka omu kibuga e Yeriko. Owebabbaire bazwamu, ni baajirya omwofu ngʼatyaime oku nzira, ogubeeta oBbaatimaayo, eyasabiriryanga. Omwofu onu yabbaire mutaane wa Timaayo.
41010047	OBbaatimaayo oyo oweyawuliire ati oYesu owʼe Naazaleesi niiye abita, nʼatandiika okutumula amaaminkirira ati, “Yesu oMwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi, onkwatire ekisa!”
41010048	Abantu ni bamukaawuukira nga bamukoba asirike. Neye iye ni yeeyongera-bweyongeri kwaminkirira ati, “Iwe oMwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi, onkwatire ekisa!”
41010049	Awo oYesu nʼayemerera, nʼakoba ati, “Mumwete aize.” Ni bamweta, ni bamukoba bati, “Ogume omwoyo, osetuke, akweta.”
41010050	Awo nʼamuma eedi ekizibaawokye, nʼasetukiramu mangu, nʼaiza egiri oYesu.
41010051	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Otaka nkukolere niki?” Omwofu nʼamwiramu ati, “Musomesya, ondamye amaiso.”
41010052	Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Aale oyabe, olamire olwa kwikiriryakwo.” Amangu ago amaisoge ni galama, era ni yeeyabira nʼoYesu.
41011001	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe, owebabbaire batira okutuuka omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, era nga baigereire e Bbesufaage nʼe Bbesaniya, ebiri oku lusozi olubeeta oLusozi olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni, oYesu nʼatuma babiri oku beegibe ati,
41011002	“Mwabe omu kitundu ekyo ekiri omu maiso awo era owemwabba mwankangira muti, mwabona ompunda omutomuto ogubatatyamangaku ogubasibire awo. Mumuteere era mumuleete.
41011003	Owewabbaawo ababuulya ati, ‘Lwaki mukola ekyo?’ Mwairamu muti, ‘OMusengwa waiswe amwetaaga, era ngʼamalire okumutambuliraku, yalagira ni bamwirya aanu mangu.’ ”
41011004	Batyo ni baaba, ni baajirya ompunda omutomuto ogubasibire oku mulyango, ngʼayemereire e nza oku luguudo, ni bamuteera.
41011005	Abamo oku babbaire beemereire aawo, ni bababuulya bati, “Mukola niki? Lwaki muteera ompunda oyo?”
41011006	Ibo ni babairamu ngʼoYesu oweyabbaire abakobere. Badi ni babaleka baaba.
41011007	Batyo abeegi ni baleetera oYesu ompunda, ni bamwalaku ebizibaawo byabwe okumuwa ekitiisya, era nʼamutyamaku.
41011008	Era abantu bangi ni baala omu nzira ebizwalo byabwe, era abandi ni baalamu bikoola ebibatemere omu misiri.
41011009	Awo ababbaire beekubbembeire, nʼababbaire bazwa enyuma, ni baaminkirira bati, “Tuwuuje oMusengwa oKibbumba. Wʼenkabi oyo iye aiza omu liina lya Musengwa oKibbumba.
41011010	Obwakabaka bwa zeiza waiswe oDawudi, obubaaba okwiryawo nga bwʼenkabi. Tuwuuje oMusengwa aali omwigulu.”
41011011	Awo oYesu nʼatuuka omu Yerusaalemi, nʼaingira omu Yeekaalu. Oweyamalire okubityabitya amaiso okubona ebintu byonabyona, nʼawuluka. Nʼayaba aamo nʼabeegibe eikumi na babiri e Bbesaniya, omu kifo egibabbaire baaba okugona olwakubba obwire bwabbaire bwatira okwirugala.
41011012	Oku lunaku olwairireku, oYesu nʼabeegibe owebabbaire bazwa e Bbesaniya, oYesu enzala nʼemuluma.
41011013	Oweyalengeire omusaale omutiini oguliku ebikoola, nʼayaba okubona obanga yagwajaaku ebineneka. Oweyagutuukireku, nandi nʼayajaaku kineneka kadi kimo, okutoolaku ebikoola byonkani olwakubba kyabbaire tiniikyo ekiseera emitiini omu ginenekera.
41011014	Nʼagukoba ati, “Okuzwa atyanu tiwaabbaawo alya oku binenekabyo tete!” Ebibono binu abeegibe ni babiwulira.
41011015	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe owebatuukire e Yerusaalemi, oYesu nʼaingira omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, era nʼatandiika okubbingamu abo ababbaire batundiramu era nʼababbaire baguliramu ebintu. Nʼagangulyaga amamenza gʼabawanyisya empiiya, nʼebityamo ebyʼababbaire batundiramu enjiiwa.
41011016	Era nʼaloberya buli muntu okubitya ebintu omu Yeekaalu.
41011017	Ananyere awo nʼayegesya ababbairewo ati, “Tibakiwandiikire bati, ‘Enyumba yange yaabbanga nyumba abantu bʼamawanga gonagona omu basabiranga?’ Neye inywe mugisuucirye mpuku yʼabanyagi omu beebisa!”
41011018	Abakabona abakulu nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka owebawuliire ebibono ebyo, ni basala amalabuki agʼokujigirica oYesu. Babbaire bamutiire olwakubba ekiziima kyʼabantu kyonakyona kyabbaire kiwuninkiriire olwʼenjegesyaye.
41011019	Obwire owebwairugaire, oYesu nʼabeegibe ni bazwa omu kibuga.
41011020	Eizo waaku amakeezi, oYesu nʼabeegibe owebabbaire babitawo, ni babona omusaale omutiini gudi nga gukalire okuzwera nakimo oku kikolo.
41011021	Awo oPeetero nʼayewukirya, nʼakoba oYesu ati, “ Musomesya, obone, omusaale omutiini oguwalaamire gukalire!”
41011022	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mubbe nʼokwikirirya omu Kibbumba.
41011023	Mbakobera amazima nti omuntu owaakoba olusozi lunu ati, ‘Weeginge oyabe weemume omu nyanza, ekyo balikimukolera, kasita nʼatabuusabuusa omu mwoyogwe, neye nʼaikirirya ati ekyakoba kyatuukirira.’
41011024	Nʼolwekyo mbakoba nti, buli ekimwasabanga oKibbumba, mwikiriryenge muti mukisunire, era mwalikisuna.
41011025	“Era buli owemwirya emyoyo gyanywe eeri oKibbumba, owewabbaawo abba akolere ekibalumirirya inywe, mumusoniye, kaisi oItewaanywe aali omwigulu atire abasoniye nywena ebikole byanywe ebibbibibbi. [
41011026	Neye owemutasoniya, era nʼoItewaanywe aali omwigulu tiyalibasoniya ebibbibibbi byanywe].”
41011027	Olundi oYesu nʼabeegibe ni baira tete e Yerusaalemi. OYesu oweyabbaire atambulira omu Yeekaalu, abakabona abakulu nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka, nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, ni baaba egyali.
41011028	Ni bamubuulya bati, “Oli na bwezyeki okukola ebintu ebyo ebyokola? Era naani eyakuwaire obwezye obwo?”
41011029	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Zena oleke mbabuulye ekibuulyo kimo. Owemwanjiramu, zena nabakobera egintoola obwezye okukola ebintu binu.
41011030	Naani eyatumire oYokaana okubatiza, Kibbumba, ooba bantu? Munjiremu.”
41011031	Awo ni beegeyamu bati, “Singa tumwiramu tuti, Kibbumba niiye eyamutumire ayaba okutubuulya ati, ‘Kaisi lwaki oYokaana iye timwamwikiririiryemu?’
41011032	Neye singa tumwiramu tuti, ‘Abantu niibo abamutumire’ tutya abantu olwakubba abantu bonabona baikirirya bati oYokaana dala yabbaire naabbi.”
41011033	Kale ni bairamu oYesu bati, “Titumaite.” Awo oYesu yena nʼabakoba ati, “Aale zena tinabakobere obwezye obundinabwo okukola ebintu binu.”
41012001	Awo oYesu nʼatandiika okutumula nabo omu ngero, ngʼabakoba ati, “Wabbairewo omuntu eyakomere omusiri gwʼemizabbibbu, nʼagusitaku olukita, nʼakuulamu ekikunyiro, nʼayombekamu ekifo ekigingice nga kuliku nʼakasiisira, abakuumi omu balengerera. Olwo nʼaguteekamu abapangisya era nʼazwawo nʼayaba omu lugendo.
41012002	“Ekiseera ekyʼamakungula owekyatuukire, nʼatuma omugalama eeri abapangisya, bamuweeku ebineneka byʼomusiri gwʼemizabbibbu.
41012003	Ibo bamukwaite ni bamukubba-bukubbi, era ni bamubbinga nga tibamuwaireku akantu konakona.
41012004	“Nʼabasindikira tete omugalama ogondi, ni bamukubba oluguma, ni bamwemulayemula.
41012005	Era nʼatuma ogondi, oyo ni bamwita. Nʼabandi bangi ni bababitya mu ngeri nanyere eyo, abamo ni babakubba, abandi ni babaita.
41012006	“Yabbaire asigairyewo omuntu ogondi owʼokutuma moiza, niiye omutaanewe omutake eino. Onu guyasembeseryeyo okubatumira, ngʼakoba ati, ‘Omutaane wange bamuwa iye ekitiisya.’
41012007	Neye ibo abapangisya nago ni beegeyamu bati, ‘Onu niiye omusika, oleke tumwite, obusika bwalibba bwaiswe!’
41012008	Kale ni bamukwata, ni bamwita, ni bamutoola omu musiri gwʼemizabbibbu ni bamumuma eedi.
41012009	“Kale onyere omusiri ogwo niki ekiyalikola? Yalyaba nʼaita abapangisya abo, kaisi nʼagukwatisya abandi.
41012010	Dala mmaite nti eKiwandiike mwakisomereku ekikoba kiti: ‘Eibbaale abombeki eribagaine, lisuukire niiryo erikulu erisiba ensonda.
41012011	Ekyo oMusengwa niiye eyakikolere, ni tukibona, ni tukyewunya.’ ”
41012012	Awo abalabe ba Yesu owebamanyicirye bati olugero oolwo aluleetere nga lutumula ku niibo, ni bagezyaku okumukwata, neye tete ni batya ekiziima kyʼabantu, ni bamuleka ni baaba.
41012013	ABafalisaayo nʼabawagiri ba Kerode abamo, ni babatuma okutega oYesu omu bibono.
41012014	Batyo ni baiza ni bamukoba bati, “ Musomesya, tumaite tuti iwe oli wa mazima, era tokolerera bantu kukusiima, olwakubba bonabona obabitya mu ngeri moiza, era abantu obeegesya mu mazima ebyo oKibbumba ebyataka bakole. Atyanu Musengwa, otukobere, kibba kituuce okuwa oKaisaali omusolo, ooba bbe?
41012015	Tuli nʼokugumuwa ooba tituli nʼokugumuwa?” OYesu nʼamanyica omutego gwabwe, nʼabakoba ati, “Lwaki muntega? Mundeetere edinaali ngibone.”
41012016	Ni bagireeta. Iye nʼababuulya ati, “Ekifaananyi nʼamaliina ebiriku byani?” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Bya Kaisaali.”
41012017	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Kale ebya Kaisaali mubiwe oKaisaali, nʼebya Kibbumba mubiwe oKibbumba.” Era ni bamwebunya ino.
41012018	Olundi aBasedukaayo, abakoba bati mpaawo kuzuukira, ni baaba egiri oYesu, ni bamubuulya bati,
41012019	“Musomesya, oMusa yatuwandikiire ekiragiro kiti, omuntu owaafa nʼaleka onamwandu, neye nga tabyaireku omwana, omuganda wʼomufu ali nʼokufumbirwa onamwandu oyo, kaisi abyalire omugandawe abaana.
41012020	“Kale wabbairewo abaganda musanvu. Asooka nʼaleeta omukali, neye nʼafa nga tabyaireku omwana.
41012021	Owokubiri nʼatwala onamwandu wʼoodi eyasookere, era nʼoyo nʼafa nga tabyaireku mwana. Nʼowokusatu yena atyo.
41012022	Bonabona omusanvu ni batwalaku omukali oyo, neye era ni batamubyalamu mwana. Oluzwanyuma, bonabona nga bamalire okufa, omukali yena nʼafa.
41012023	“Olwo oku lunaku olwʼokuzuukira, omukali oyo yalibba mukaani ngoyo bonabona omusanvu bamufumbiirweku!”
41012024	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mugota, era ekibaleetera ekyo, lwʼobutamanya Biwandiike, era nʼobwezye bwa Kibbumba.
41012025	Abantu owebalizuukira, balibba ooti bamalaika omwigulu, nga tibakaali babba nʼobufumbo.
41012026	“Kaisi ebifa oku kuzuukira, dala mmaite nti mwasomereku omu kitabo kya Musa, omu kitundu ekitumula oku kisaka, ngʼoKibbumba yakobere oMusa ati, ‘Ninze oKibbumba wa Ibbulaimu, era wa Isaka, era wa Yaakobbo.’
41012027	OKibbumba wa bantu ababba aboomi newankubbaire nga bamalire okufa neye tiwa bantu abasigala omu kufa. Kale mugota ino!”
41012028	Awo omoiza oku bakugu omu byʼaMateeka nʼaiza, nʼawulira aBasedukaayo nga baakana. Oweyaboine ngʼoYesu abairiremu kusani, yena nʼamubuulya ati, “Kiragiroki ekikira byonabyona obukulu?”
41012029	OYesu nʼairamu ati, “Ekiragiro ekikira byonabyona obukulu niikyo kinu: ‘Iwe Isirairi, owulire: OMusengwa niiye oKibbumba waiswe, oMusengwa yenkani.
41012030	Era otakenge oMusengwa oKibbumbawo, nʼomwoyogwo gwonagwona, nʼobwomibwo bwonabwona, nʼebiseegobyo byonabyona, nʼamaanigo gonagona.’
41012031	Ekiragiro ekiiririraku omu bukulu, niikyo kinu: ‘Otakenge omuntu omwinawo, ngʼoweweetaka iwe onyere.’ Mpaawo kiragiro kindi ekikira binu obukulu.”
41012032	Awo oMukugu omu byʼaMateeka nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Musomesya, oiriremu nakusani. Ekyotumwire kya mazima oti, OKibbumba ali moiza yenkani, nga mpaawo gondi yenayena.
41012033	Era oti okumutaka nʼomwoyogwo gwonagwona, nʼebiseegobyo byonabyona, nʼamaanigo gonagona, nʼokutaka abantu abanaiswe ngʼowetwetaka iswe abanyere, kikira byonabyona ebibawonga nga babyoca biramba, nʼebindi ebituwaayo ngʼesadaaka eeri oKibbumba.”
41012034	OYesu oweyaboine ngʼomukugu omu byʼaMateeka airiremu nʼamalabuki, nʼamukoba ati, “Otandiikire okutegeera ebyʼomu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.” Era okuzwa oolwo ni watabbaawo muntu ogondi eyagumire nʼamubuulya ebibuulyo ebindi.
41012035	OYesu oweyabbaire omu Yeekaalu ngʼayegesya, nʼabuulya ati, “Abakugu omu byʼaMateeka beezya batya okukoba bati, ‘ OKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta Mwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi?’
41012036	ODawudi onyere, oweyabbaire ngʼaizwire oMwoyo oMweru, yakobere ati: ‘OMusengwa oKibbumba yakobere oMusengwa wange ati: Otyame ngʼondiraine oku lubba lwange olwʼengalo endiiro, paka owenaligondya abalabebo ni mbasuuca mukonkolo gwa kuwuumuliryaku ebigerebyo.’
41012037	“Ooba ngʼoDawudi onyere amweta ‘Musengwawe,’ kaisi tete oolwo oKurisito ayezya atya okubba mwizukuluwe?” Ekiziima kyʼabantu ekyabbairewo, ebibonobye ebyo ni babiwulisisya nʼokusiima kunene.
41012038	Atyo oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼayegesya, nʼakoba ati, “Mwekuume abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, abataka okutambula nga bazwaire ebizwalo ebyanvuwiriri ebyekuusira ansi, okulaga bati bantu beeru. Era bataka okubasugiryasugirya omu butale,
41012039	nʼokutyama omu bifo ebyʼomu maiso omu makumbaaniro nʼomu bifo ebyʼabantu abʼekitiisya oku mambaga.
41012040	Era banyaga ebintu byonabyona omu manyumba ga banamwandu, nʼokusaba oKibbumba omu bibono ebingi olwʼokweraga. Abo balisuna ekibonerezo ekikiraku obunene.”
41012041	OYesu oweyabbaire ngʼatyaime omu maiso gʼekifo omu bateeka ebirabo omu Yeekaalu, nʼabona abantu bangi nga bateekamu empiiya. Abasuni bangi bateekeremu empiiya nyingi.
41012042	Awo onamwandu omudoobi nʼaiza, nʼateekamu obumpiiya bubiri, obwʼebbeeyi esembayo okubba entono eino.
41012043	OYesu nʼayeta abeegibe, ni baiza egyali, nʼabakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti onamwandu onu omudoobi ateekere kinene ino omu kifo omu bateeka ebirabo, okukiraku abandi bonabona.
41012044	Ibo bateekeremu nga batoola ku bingi ebibabbaire nabyo. Neye onamwandu onu iye, ateekeremu kyonakyona ekyabbaire ali nakyo, ekibbaire ekijejera obwomibwe.”
41013001	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼazwa omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, omoiza oku beegibe nʼamukoba ati, “ Musomesya, obone amabbaale agʼenyumba eenu eYeekaalu ageewunyisya!”
41013002	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Aganyumba ganu aganene ogabona? Gonagona abalabe baliiza ni bagakubbirawo ansi. Era omu kifo kinu timwalibba ibbaale kadi limo aanu eryalisigala nga lyombeke oku liinaye. Gonagona baaba kugawumpulyagawo.”
41013003	OYesu oweyabbaire ngʼatyaime oku Lusozi olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni, ngʼalingiriire eYeekaalu, oPeetero, nʼoYaakobbo, nʼoYokaana, nʼAndereya, ni bamubuulya omu kyama bati,
41013004	“Otukobere, ebyo byalibbaawo di? Era kamanyiciryoki akaliraga kati ebyo byonabyona byatira okubbaawo?”
41013005	Iye oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mwekuume tiwaabbaawo abagotesyagotesya.
41013006	Bangi baliiza nga beeyeta ninze, era baligotesyagotesya bangi.
41013007	Era owemuwuliranga entalo aanu nʼaadi, timutyanga. Ebyo biteekwa okubbaawo, neye era enkomerero yalibba ekaali okutuuka.
41013008	“Eigwanga lyalirumba eigwanga erindi, nʼobwakabaka bwalirumba obwakabaka obundi. Walibbaawo omusisi ngʼatengeetya ekyalo omu bitundu bingi, era nʼamanzala galigwawo. Olwo okugada kwalibba nga kwankatandiika-butandiiki.
41013009	“Kale inywe abanjikirirya mukimanye muti balibakwata ni babawaayo omu mbuga gyʼamateeka. Balibakubbira omu makumbaaniro ga Bayudaaya. Era okulwange mwalyemerera omu maiso gʼabafugi nʼaga bakabaka. Omu ngeri eyo, mwalyezya okubatuucaaku obukwenda bwange.
41013010	Enkomerero ngʼekaali kutuuka, aMawuliro aMasa tuli nʼokumala okugalaabba eeri abantu omu mawanga gonagona.
41013011	“Era owebabakwatanga ni babatwala omu mbuga gyʼamateeka, timweraliikiriranga ekimwatumula, nga muwozya mutumulanga ekyo oKibbumba ekyabawa okutumula omu kaseera ako. Ebibono ebimutumula tibyalibba byanywe, neye bya Mwoyo oMweru.
41013012	“Omuntu yaliwaayo omugandawe okumwita, nʼomusaiza omubyaire yaliwaayo omwanawe. Era abaana balyediima ni bawaayo ababyaire baabwe okubaita.
41013013	Era nywena abantu bonabona balibacaawa olwakubba muli basengereri bange. Neye oyo eyaligumira ebigosi ebyo paka oku nkomerero, yalirokoka.
41013014	“Owemwalibona ekintu ekyomuliko era ekikwatisya enyinya nga bakiteekere awekitateekwa okubba (oyo asoma binu amanye amakulu), oolwo abo abalibba omu Buyudaaya, bairukiranga mu nsozi.
41013015	Eyalibba e ngulu oku nyumbaye, owaikanga ansi, taingiranga omu nyumba ati atoolemu ekiyatwala.
41013016	Era eyalibba omu musiri, takangangayo e ika okusyoma ekizwalokye ekindi.
41013017	Abalibba ebida nʼabalibba bayonkesya omu naku egyo nga baligada ino!
41013018	Mwegairire oKibbumba, ebyo tibyabbaawo omu biseera bya ikendi nʼobuwolondoki bwa bbalaafu.
