41013019	“Omu naku egyo, walibbaawo okugada kunene, nga kukira okundi kwonakwona okwabbairekuuwo, okuzwera nakimo oKibbumba oweyabbumbiire ebintu, paka atyanu. Era tiwalibbaawo tete okugada okundi okwagaagana awo.
41013020	Era singa oMusengwa oKibbumba tiyakendeiryeku-bukendeeri enaku egyo, egyʼokugada, tiwankulamirewo omuntu kadi moiza. Neye olwʼabalondemube, enaku egyo yagikendeiryeku.
41013021	“Omu biseera ebyo, singa omuntu owabakobanga ati, ‘Aale mubone oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta ali aanu,’ ooba ati, ‘Aale mubone, ngodi,’ timukiikiriryanga.
41013022	Ekyo kityo olwakubba abaKurisito abʼobubbeyi, era nʼabanaabbi abʼobubbeyi, baliboneka. Era balikola obumanyiciryo bwʼebyewunyo nʼebyamagero, nga bagenderera kugotesya nʼabalondemu ba Kibbumba, owekibba kyezyeka.
41013023	Neye mwekuume, mbakobeire byonabyona nga bukaali.
41013024	“Omu naku egyo, ngʼekiseera ekyokugada kyankawa, eisana lyaliirugaza, nʼomweri gwalirekeraawo okwaka.
41013025	Nʼenkota gyalyanuka e ngulu ni gigwa, era nʼamaani agali e ngulu omwibbanga baligatengeetya.
41013026	“Olwo kaisi ni babona oMwana wa Muntu ngʼaizira oku bireri, era ngʼali nʼobwezye bungi nʼekitiisya.
41013027	Yalituma abamalaika omu kyalo kyonakyona, okukumbaania abantube abalondemu, okuzwa mu buli kansonda konakona akʼekyalo kyonakyona.
41013028	“Aale mubonere oku musaale omutiini mwege. Ebikoola byagwo owebikunkumuka biwaaku, nʼobusaga ni busebuka, mumanya muti ebiseera ebyʼensaaca biigereire.
41013029	Nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo, owemubonanga ebyo ebimbakobeire nga biri kubbangawo, mumanyanga muti enkomerero eigereire.
41013030	“Mbakobera amazima nti ebintu ebyo byonabyona byaba okubbaawo ngʼabantu abʼomulembe gunu bakaali okufa okuwaawo.
41013031	Eigulu nʼekyalo byaliwaawo, neye ebibono byange tibyaliwaawo kadi naire.
41013032	“Neye mpaawo amaite olunaku olunyere kadi saawa, ebyo owebyaligwerawo, waire abamalaika omwigulu, naabba oMwana, okutoolaku oBbaabba yenkani niiye amaite.
41013033	Mwetege, mubonie olwakubba timumaite kiseera ekitukuumire owekyalituukira.
41013034	“Ekyo kifaananaku nʼekyo omuntu omukulu ekyakola ngʼayaba omu lugendo. Owaabba azwa e ika, aleka akwatisirye buli mugalamawe omulimo, nʼomwisulukale wʼe ika nʼamulagira okukuuma.
41013035	Kale mubbe bulindaala olwakubba timumaite onyere ekisito oweyaliirira, ooba kiire akati, ooba enkoko owegikokoolera, ooba nga kuca,
41013036	tiyabagwaku-bugwi, nʼabaajirya nga mugonere.
41013037	Ekimbakoba inywe, era kinkoba nʼabandi bonabona nti, ‘Mubonie!’ ”
41014001	Omu kiseera ekyo, wabbaire wasigaireyo enaku ibiri, oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, era oMukolo ogwʼeMigaati eGibulamu eKizimbulukuca, gutuuke. Abakabona abakulu, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa babbaire banoonia engeri yʼokukwata oYesu, bamwite omu mbiso.
41014002	Neye ni bakoba bati, “Tuleke okumukwata omu naku gyʼomukolo, demba abantu beediima.”
41014003	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire e Bbesaniya ngʼali kulya omu nyumba ya Simooni eyabbaireku omugenge, ni wabbaawo omukali eyaabireyo, nʼecupa erimu amafuta amakengeize agebeeta naludo agʼakaloosa, era agʼebbeeyi eino. Nʼasaanukula ecupa eyo, nʼasuka amafuta oku mutwe gwa Yesu.
41014004	Neye abamo oku babbairewo, ni basunguwala. Ni bakobangana bati, “Lwaki amafuta ago bagabebenyeserye batyo?
41014005	Babbaire beezya okugatunda ni gʼazwamu empiiya egibita omu dinaali ebisatu, ni bagigabira abadoobi.” Era omukali ni bamunenya ino.
41014006	Neye oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Lwaki mumuleyerya? Ekintu ekyankoleire kisa.
41014007	Ekyo kityo olwakubba abadoobi ibo baabbanga na inywe bulijo, era buli owemutakire, mwezya okubabbeera. Neye nze tinaabbe na inywe okumala ekiseera ekinene.
41014008	Omukali onu akolere ekyayezya, omubiri gwange agusukireku amafuta agʼakaloosa nga nkaali kufa, nʼagukwanirya nakimo olwa kuguliika.
41014009	Era mbakobera amazima nti, wonawona aMawuliro aMasa agankwataku egibagalaabbanga okumalaku ekyalo, nʼekinu omukali onu ekyakolere, bakitumulangaku ni bamwewukirya.”
41014010	Awo oYuda Isikalyoti, omoiza oku beegi eikumi na babiri, nʼayaba egiri abakabona abakulu, ngʼataka okulyamu oYesu olukwe, amuweeyo egibali.
41014011	Abakabona owebawuliire ekyataka okubakolera, ni basangaala, era ni basuubiza okumuwa empiiya. Okuzwa oolwo oYuda nʼanoonia akaseera akasa akʼokubabbeera bakwate oYesu.
41014012	Oku lunaku olusooka olwa Mukolo ogwʼeMigaati eGibulamu eKizimbulukuca, olubasaliraku ontaama omutomuto ogubasadaaka oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, abeegi ba Yesu ni bamubuulya bati, “Otaka twabe tukutegekere yaina egiwaliira oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya?”
41014013	Awo oYesu nʼatuma babiri kwibo, nʼabakoba ati, “Mwabe omu kibuga, mwasangaana omusaiza eyetiikire ensaka yʼamaizi, mwabe naye.
41014014	Era mukobe onyere enyumba omuntu oyo omuyangira, muti, ‘ OMusomesya akobere ati, nambu ekisengekye kiri yaina, iye nʼabeegibe omu baliira oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya?’
41014015	Iye yabalagisya ekisenge ekinene ekiri e ngulu omu kalina, ekibamalire okwalirira, mugututegekere oomwo.”
41014016	Awo abeegi ni basimbuka, ni baaba omu kibuga. Era ni baaja nga byonabyona biri ngʼoYesu oweyabakobere, era ni bategeka oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.
41014017	Obwire owebwairugaire, oYesu nʼatuuka nʼabeegibe eikumi na babiri.
41014018	Awo owebabbaire bali oku menza nga balya, oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti omoiza kwinywe alya na nze atyanu, yandyamu olukwe.”
41014019	Abeegibe ni beekondamira ino, era moiza moiza, ngʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Olwo ninze?”
41014020	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Ee, omoiza kwinywe eikumi na babiri, akozya na nze omu kibya.
41014021	Dala oMwana wa Muntu baaba okumwita, ngʼeBiwandiike owebimutumulaku. Neye wobe! Omuntu oyo eyalyamu oMwana wa Muntu olukwe, ngʼalabire! Kyandimubbeereire kisa singa tibamubyaire!”
41014022	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe owebabbaire nga balya, oYesu nʼatoola omugaati, ni yeebalya oKibbumba, nʼaguvunavunamu nʼabawa, nʼabakoba ati, “Mutoole mulye, gunu niigwo omubiri gwange.”
41014023	Era oluzwanyuma nʼakwata ekikopo kyʼenviinyo, era oweyamalire okwebalya oKibbumba nʼabawa bonabona ni banywaku,
41014024	nʼabakoba ati, “Linu niiryo eisaaye lyange eryasusuka oku lwʼabangi, era erikakasa endagaano ya Kibbumba empyaka.
41014025	Mbakobera amazima nti tinaliirayo tete okunywa ekyokunywa kyʼemizabbibbu, paka owenalikinywa omu ngeri empyaka, omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.”
41014026	Awo owebamalire okwemba olwembo olwa kuwuuja oKibbumba, ni bawuluka, ni baaba oku Lusozi olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni.
41014027	Awo oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Nywenanywena mwairuka ni mundekawo, olwakubba bakiwandiikire bati, ‘Naliita omuliisya, entaama ni gisalaanika.’
41014028	Neye owebalimala okunzuukiza, nalibasooka okwaba e Galiraaya.”
41014029	Awo oPeetero nʼamukoba ati, “Abandi bonabona nʼowebairuka ni bakulekawo nze tinakulekewo.”
41014030	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Nkukobera amazima nti, omu kiire ekinanyere kinu, onkoko yaabba akaali nʼokukookoola emirundi emibiri, nga wankanegaanira emirundi misatu.”
41014031	Neye oPeetero nʼairamu nʼakakasira nakimo ati, “Nʼowebaabba nga bateekwa kunjitira aamo na iwe, tinakwegaane.” Nʼabeegi abandi bonabona ni bakoba kinanyere ekyo.
41014032	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe ni baaba omu kifo ekibeeta Gesusemani. OYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Mutyame aanu, nga nze negairira oKibbumba.”
41014033	Nʼatwalaku oPeetero nʼoYaakobbo nʼoYokaana, nʼatandiika okutya ino nʼokweririgana.
41014034	Nʼabakoba ati, “Omwoyo gwange gwizwire enima eyezya nʼokunjita! Musigale aanu era nga mubonia.”
41014035	Oweyeeyongeireyo katono omu maiso, nʼagwa oku mazwige, ni yeegairira oKibbumba ati, “Owekibba kyezyeka, esaawa eya kugada ereke okuntuukaku.”
41014036	Era nʼakoba ati, “Iwe Bbaabba oyezya byonabyona, ontooleku ekipimo ekyokugada okwo. Neye, iwe ekyotaka niikyo ekyobba okole tinga nze owentaka.”
41014037	Awo nʼaiza, nʼayaja oPeetero nʼoYaakobbo nʼoYokaana nga bagonere, nʼakoba oPeetero ati, “Simooni, mugonere? Mubbaire timwezya kubonia waire esaawa emoiza eti?
41014038	Mubonie, era musabe oKibbumba, kaisi okubagezesya tikwa batuukaku, olwakubba emyoyo gyanywe dala mimaliriri, neye emibiri minafu.”
41014039	Era nʼayaba nʼasaba oKibbumba omu ngeri enanyere eyo ngʼoweyasabire omu kusooka.
41014040	Era oYesu oweyakangire omulundi ogundi tete nʼabaajirya nga bagona olwakubba endoolo gyabbaire gibali kubbikubbi. Ni babba nga tibamaite ekyokumwiramu.
41014041	Oweyaizire omulundi ogwokusatu nʼabakoba ati, “Mukaali mugona, era mukaali muwuumula? Mulekere awo! Esaawa etuukire, era aale mubone oMwana wa Muntu bali kumulyamu olukwe bamuweeyo eeri obwezye bwʼabakola ebikole ebibbibibbi bamugadye.
41014042	Musetuke twabe tubasangaane! Era andiiremu olukwe ngonu atuukire.”
41014043	OYesu yabbaire akaali atumula, amangu ago oYuda, omoiza oku beegibe eikumi na babiri, nʼatuuka nʼekiyindi kyʼabantu ababbaire nʼempiima nʼemiigo. Abantu abo, abakabona abakulu nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka, nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga.
41014044	Atyanu eyaliiremu oYesu olukwe, yabbaire amalire okuwa ekiyindi kyʼabantu ekyo akamanyiciryo ngʼabakobere ati, “Omuntu ogunasugirya nga mmugwa omu kifubba, yaabba niiye oyo, mwamukwata-bukwati era ni mumutwala nga mumukalangwire.”
41014045	Awo oYuda oweyatuukire, amangu ago nʼayaba egiri oYesu, nʼamukoba ati, “Musomesya!” Era nʼamugwa nʼomu kifubba.
41014046	Awo ni bavumbikirirya oYesu, ni bamukwata ni bamukalangula.
41014047	Neye omoiza oku babbaire beemereire aawo, nʼatoolayo empiimaye, nʼatemaku omugalama wa kabona akira obukulu ekitwi nʼamutiicaaku.
41014048	Awo oYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Mwizire okunkwata nga muli nʼempiima nʼemiigo, ooti-so mwaba kukwata muyeekera?
41014049	Kale buli lunaku naabbanga na inywe omu Yeekaalu nga njegesya ni mutankwata. Neye kinu mukikolere eBiwandiike byezye okutuukirira.”
41014050	Awo abeegibe bonabona ni bairuka bamulekawo.
41014051	Wabbairewo omwisuka eyabbaire tazwaire kintu kindi kyonakyona okutoolaku olugoye oluyabbaire yeebwikiriire. Abantu ni bamukwata ngʼasengererya oYesu.
41014052	Neye omwisuka oyo nʼababunuka, nairuka bwere, ni basigalya lugoye.
41014053	Awo oYesu ni bamutwala e wa kabona akira obukulu. Abakabona abakulu bonabona nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka, ni bakumbaana, ni batyama omu lukiiko.
41014054	OPeetero yasengereirye oYesu, ngʼalekerekuuwo eibbanga, nʼaingirira nakimo omu luuga lwa kabona akira obukulu, nʼatyama nʼabakuumi, nʼayota omusyo.
41014055	Olwo abakabona abakulu nʼabʼoLukiiko oLufugi olwʼaBayudaaya bonabona ni banoonia obujulizi obubasinziriraku okwita oYesu, neye ni batabusuna.
41014056	Wabbairewo bangi abawaire obujulizi obwa bubbeyi nga bamulumiriza, obujulizi bwabwe ni butakwatagana.
41014057	Era abamo ni basetuka, ni bawa obujulizi obwa bubbeyi nga bamulumiriza bati,
41014058	“Twamuwuliire ngʼakoba ati, ‘Nalivunawo eYeekaalu eenu abantu egibombekere, tete omu naku isatu, nʼalyombekawo egendi, ngʼabantu tiniibo abagyombekere.’ ”
41014059	Neye obujulizi bwa banu bwona nandi bukwatagana.
41014060	Awo okabona akira obukulu nʼayemerera omu maiso gʼabantu, kaisi nʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Tiwairemu? Niki ekyokoba ku binu ebibakulumiriza?”
41014061	Neye oYesu nʼasirika, nʼatairamu. Okabona akira obukulu ni yeeyongera okumubuulya ati, “Niiwe oKurisito, oMwana wa Kitiisya waiswe oKibbumba?”
41014062	Awo oYesu nʼairamu ati, “Ee ninze. Era mwalibona oMwana wa Muntu ngʼatyaime nʼoKibbumba omu kifo kyʼekitiisya eino, era ngʼaizira oku bireri okuzwa omwigulu.”
41014063	Awo omu busungu, okabona akira obukulu nanyiira ebizwalobye, era nʼakoba ati, “Tete tukaali tutakira niki abajulizi abandi?
41014064	Muwuliire ebibono ebizumirira oKibbumba ebyatumwire. Inywe museega mutya?” Awo bonabona ni basalira oYesu omusango bati awomeire kumwita.
41014065	Abamo ni batandiika okumwandaku ebitanta, ni bamubwika amaiso, kaisi ni bamukubba ebinfuute oolwo ni bakoba bati, “Aale olagule akukubbire.” Awo abakuumi ni bamutwala nga webamukubba empi.
41014066	Awo oPeetero oweyabbaire ansi oku luuga, omoiza oku baala abaweererya e wa kabona akira obukulu, nʼaiza.
41014067	Oweyaboine oPeetero ngʼayota omusyo, nʼamwekalikica, nʼakoba ati, “Wena wabbaire nʼowʼe Naazaleesi oyo, oYesu.”
41014068	Neye oPeetero ni yeegaana ati, “Ekyokoba tinkimaite era tinkitegeera.” Awo oPeetero nazwa omu luuga, nʼayaba amuzigo. Era onkoko nʼakookoola.
41014069	Awo omwala oodi nairamu okubona oPeetero, nʼakoba ababbaire beemereire aawo ati, “Omusaiza onu ali ooti niiye omoiza oku basengereri ba Yesu.”
41014070	Neye oPeetero ni yeeyongera okwegaana. Era nga wabitirewo akaseera katono, ababbaire beemereire aawo ni bamukoba tete bati, “Dala oli moiza oku basengereri ba Yesu olwakubba wena oli Mugaliraaya.”
41014071	Neye oPeetero nʼatandiika okweraama era nʼokulayira ati, “Nze timmaite omusaiza oyo ogumutumulaku!”
41014072	Amangu ago onkoko nʼakookoola omulundi ogwokubiri. Awo oPeetero nʼayewukirya ebyo oYesu ebiyabbaire amukobere ati, “Onkoko yaabba akaali nʼokukookoola emirundi emibiri, nga wanegaine emirundi misatu ngʼokoba oti tommaite.” Awo oPeetero nʼatinduka, era nʼakunga.
41015001	Awo obwire owebwaceire, amakeezi pwi, abakabona abakulu nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka, era nʼabʼoLukiiko oLufugi olwʼaBayudaaya abandi bonabona, ni bateesa era ni basalawo. Ni basiba oYesu, ni bamutwala ni bamuwaayo eeri oPiraato omufugi oMulooma.
41015002	OPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Niiwe okabaka wʼaBayudaaya?” OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Ee, kityo ngʼowokobere.”
41015003	Awo abakabona abakulu ni bamuwaabira emisango mingi.
41015004	OPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Obula ekyokwiramu? Obone emisango egibakuwaabira owegiri emingi.”
41015005	Neye oYesu tiyairireyo kumwiramu; kale oPiraato ni yeewunya.
41015006	Omu biseera ebyʼoMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, yabbaire mpisa okuteeranga omusibe abantu ogubasabanga okuteera.
41015007	Oku mulundi ogwo, omu mabbuusu mwabbairemu omusaiza nga bamweta Bbalaba, ogubasibiire aamo nʼabayekera abainaye, abaitire abantu omu kediimo.
41015008	Awo ekiziima kyʼabantu ni kyaba, ni kitandiika okusaba oPiraato okubakolera ngʼoweyabbaire abakoleranga.
41015009	OPiraato nʼabairamu ngʼababuulya ati, “Mutaka mbateerere okabaka wʼaBayudaaya?”
41015010	Ekyo yakitumwire olwakubba yamaite ati abakabona abakulu babbaire bawaireyo oYesu egyali lwʼengongi.
41015011	Neye abakabona abakulu ni bacoolesya ekiziima kyʼabantu bati oPiraato abateerere Bbalaba omu kifo kya Yesu.
41015012	OPiraato oweyababwirye ati, “Kaisi ogumweta okabaka wʼaBayudaaya nʼamukola ntya?”
41015013	Ibo bamwiriremu nga bakooka bati, “Omukomerere oku musalabba!”
41015014	OPiraato nʼababuulya ati, “Lwaki? Kibbikibbiki ekyakolere?” Neye ibo ni bongeramu maani kukooka-bukooki bati, “Iwe omukomerere ku musalabba!”
41015015	Awo oPiraato olwa kutaka okusangaalya ekiziima kyʼabantu, nʼabateerera oBbalaba. Neye nʼalagira ni bafaamuula oYesu nʼofaalu aliku emirobo egisima, kaisi nʼamuwaayo okwaba okumukomerera oku musalabba.
41015016	Awo abaisulukale ni batwala oYesu omu lubiri lwa Piraato olubeeta Pulaitoriyo, ni beeta abanaabwe abʼekibinja ekyo kyonakyona.
41015017	Ni bazwalisya oYesu olugoye olutukuliikiriri, ni baluka engule eya mawa, kaisi ni bagimuzwalisya oku mutwe.
41015018	Awo ni batandiika okumukoba bati, “Owangaale, iwe okabaka wʼaBayudaaya!”
41015019	Ni bamukubba emirundi nʼemirundi omu mutwe nʼolugada, ni bamwandaku ebitanta, ni bakoma amazwi nga beesuuca ooti bamuwa kitiisya.
41015020	Awo owebamalire okumukiina batyo, ni bamutoolamu olugoye olutukuliikiriri, ni bamuzwalisya engoye egigye, ni bamuwuluca, ni bamutwala okumukomerera.
41015021	Waliwo omusaiza ogubeeta oSimooni owʼe Kuleene eyabbaire akanga e ika omu kibuga Yerusaalemi ngʼazwa omu kyalo ekiriraine awo. Ngʼabitawo, abaisulukale ni bamukaka okwetiika omusalabba gwa Yesu. OSimooni onu niiye oiteeye wʼErigizanda nʼoLuufo.
41015022	Awo oYesu ni bamutuuca omu kifo ekibeeta Gologoosa, amakulu gaakyo eKifo kyʼeKiyanga.
41015023	Ni bamuwa enviinyo nga batabwiryemu obulezi obubeeta miira, neye nʼagaana okuginywa.
41015024	Awo ni bamukomerera oku musalabba. Ni bagabana ebizwalobye, nga babikubbiraku kalulu, bʼabone buli moiza oluyatwala.
41015025	Bamukomereire oku musalabba owegyatuukire esaawa eisatu egyʼamakeezi.
41015026	Omusango ogubamuvunaana ni baguwandiika oku kipande e ngulu oku musalabba bati, “OKABAKA WʼABAYUDAAYA.”
41015027	Bakomereire nʼabaibbi babiri oku misalabba, okumpi nʼoYesu, omoiza oku lubba lwa Yesu olwʼengalo endiiro, ogondi oku lwʼengooda. [
41015028	EKiwandiike ni kituukirira, ekikoba kiti, “Bamubaliire aamo nʼabakola ebibbibibbi].”
41015029	Awo ababbaire babitawo ni batengeetya emitwe nʼobulwa nga baduula oYesu, era ni bakoba bati, “Oleke tubone! Iwe ayaba okuvunawo eYeekaalu, tete ogyombeke omu naku isatu,
41015030	weeramye! Era ozwe oku musalabba oike ansi!”
41015031	Abakabona abakulu nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, bona ni bamukiina nga bakobangana bati, “Yalamyanga abandi, tayezya okweramya onyere!
41015032	OKurisito, iye oKabaka wa Isirairi, aale atyanu azwe oku musalabba aike ansi kaisi tumwikiririryemu!” Nʼabo abebakomereire okumpi nʼoYesu, bona ni bamuduula.
41015033	Okuzwa oku saawa omukaaga paka oku saawa omwenda egyʼeigolo, endikiirya nʼekwata oku kyalo kyonakyona.
41015034	Oku saawa ooti mwenda oYesu nʼakunga nʼeigono eryaminkirira ati, “Eloyi, Eloyi, lama sabbakusaani?” Amakulu gaakyo gati, “Kibbumba wange, Kibbumba wange, lwaki ondekerewo?”
41015035	Abamo kwabo ababbaire beemereire aawo owebawuliire, ni bakoba bati, “Muwulire ayeta onaabbi Eriya!”
41015036	Awo omoiza nʼairuka nʼatimya ekijuulo omu nviinyo ensaasaami, nʼakiteeka oku lugada, nʼawa oYesu okufunfuuna, era ngʼakoba ati, “Oleke tubone abba ngʼEriya yaiza nʼamutoola oku musalabba!”
41015037	Awo oYesu nʼakunga maaminkirira, era nʼafa.
41015038	Omu kaseera ako olutimbe olwʼomu Yeekaalu ni lunyiirikamu akati, okuzwa angulu okutuuka ansi.
41015039	Omukulu wʼekibinja kyʼabaisulukale 100 eyabbaire ayemereire awo ngʼalingiriire oYesu, oweyaboine engeri egyafiiremu, nʼakoba ati, “Dala omusaiza onu abbaire niiye oMwana wa Kibbumba!”
41015040	Era wabbairewo abakali ababbaire eyalakuuku nga balengera. Era mwibo mwabbairemu oMalyamu oMangadaleena, nʼoMalyamu omaaye wa Yaakobbo omutomuto nʼoYose, ni mubbaamu nʼoSoloome.
41015041	Abakali abo batambulanga nʼoYesu nga bamuweererya, oweyabbaire omu Galiraaya. Era wabbairewo abakali abandi bangi abaizire naye ngʼaniinaniina okwiza e Yerusaalemi.
41015042	Atyanu eisana lyabbaire lyatira okugwa, aate ngʼeeri aBayudaaya lunu lwabbaire lunaku lwa kutegeka, olwakubba niirwo olwekubbembera okuwuumula kwa Saabbaato.
41015043	Wabbairewo omusaiza ogubeeta oYusufu owʼAlimasaaya eyabbaire omukwenda omu lukiiko olukulu olwʼaBayudaaya, era ogubawa ino ekitiisya. Era yena yabbaire akuumirira okubbaawo kwʼobwakabaka bwa Kibbumba. OYusufu oyo nʼaguma, nʼayaba egiri oPiraato nʼamusaba omulambo gwa Yesu.
41015044	OPiraato ni yeewunya okuwulira ati oYesu afiire ira. Nʼayeta omukulu wʼekibinja kyʼabaisulukale 100, nʼamubuulya ooba ngʼoYesu amalire okufa.
41015045	Omukulu wʼekibinja kyʼabaisulukale 100 oweyamalire okukakasa oPiraato ati oYesu yabbaire amalire okufa, oPiraato nʼaikirirya oYusufu okutwala omulambo.
41015046	Kale oYusufu nʼagula olugoye olutukula, oluyaaka olwʼebbeeyi, nʼayanula omulambo gwa Yesu oku musalabba, nʼagulingira omu lugoye oolwo, nʼaguteeka omu magombe agʼempuku, era agebabbaire batemere mwibbaale. Nʼayiringitya ogubbaale, nʼaigalira omulyango gwʼamagombe.
41015047	OMalyamu oMangadaleena, nʼoMalyamu omaaye wa Yose, ni beekalikica omulambo gwa Yesu egibaguteekere.
41016001	Awo eSaabbaato oweyawoireku, oMalyamu Mangadaleena, nʼoSoloome, nʼoMalyamu omaaye wa Yaakobbo, ni bagula ebyakaloosa baabe basiige omulambo gwa Yesu.
41016002	Eizo waaku, oku lunaku olwesaabbiiti, amakeezi pwi, ni baaba oku magombe nga
41016003	beebuulyangana bati, “Neye, naani eyatwiringitirya eibbaale okulitoola omu mulyango gwʼamagombe?”
41016004	Olwakubba eibbaale nago lyabbaire linene ino. Neye owebatuuka oku magombe, baabire okulola angulu oku kagingi amagombe egigabbaire nga babona eibbaale baliyiringitirye balitoire omu mulyango gwʼamagombe agʼempuku!
41016005	Owebangira omu magombe, ni babona omusaiza atyaime oku lubba lwʼengalo endiiro, ngʼazwaire ekanzu enjeru, ni bawuninkirira.
41016006	Awo omusaiza oyo nʼabakoba ati, “Muleke okuwuninkirira. Timunoonia Yesu owʼe Naazaleesi ogubakomereire oku musalabba? Aanu abulawo, azuukiire. Mubone, kinu niikyo ekifo egibabbaire bamuteekere.
41016007	Aale mwabe mukobere abeegibe, eino eino oPeetero, muti, ‘Yeesookere okwaba e Galiraaya. Eeyo gimwamubonera, era ngʼoweyabakobere.’ ”
41016008	Oweyamalire okubakoba ebyo, olwʼokuwuninkirira nʼobuti obubitiriri obwabbaire bubakwaite, ni bawulukamu, ni bazwa oku magombe nga bairuka, era ni batakoberaku muntu yenayena olwakubba babbaire batiire ino. [
41016009	OYesu oweyazuukiire amakeezi eino, oku lunaku olwesaabbiiti, yasookere kubonekera Malyamu oMangadaleena, oodi oguyabbingireku emizimu omusanvu.
41016010	OMalyamu oyo nʼayaba nʼakobera abeegi ba Yesu, era nga babbaire bakaali bakunga.
41016011	Neye owebawuliire bati nambu oYesu mwomi, era mbu oMalyamu amuboineku, ni batakiikirirya.
41016012	Ebyo nga biwoire, oYesu nʼabonekera babiri kwibo nga baaba omu kyalo. Yabbaire afaanana mu ngeri gendi.
41016013	Awo ni bairayo, ni bakobera abanaabwe. Neye bona ni bataikirirya.
41016014	Oluzwanyuma, oYesu nʼabonekera abeegibe eikumi na moiza, nga batyaime balya. Nʼabanenya olwa kutabba nʼokwikirirya, nʼolwʼobukakanyali bwʼemyoyo gyabwe olwakubba tibaikiriirye ebibono byabo abamuboine ngʼamalire okuzuukira.
41016015	Era kwolwo nʼabakoba ati, “Mwabe omu byalo byonabyona mulaabbe eeri abantu bonabona aMawuliro aMasa.
41016016	Buli agaikiririryamu, era ni bamubatiza, yalirokoka, neye atagaikiririryamu, omusango gwalimusinga.
41016017	“Abo abanjikiririryamu bakolanga ebyewunyo binu: Omu liina lyange babbinganga emizimu oku bantu; batumulanga omu ntumu egibatayegangaku;
41016018	singa bakwata empiri, era singa balinywa ekintu kyonakyona ekiita, tikyabakolenge bubbibubbi. Bateekanga engalo gyabwe oku balwaire, abalwaire abo ni balama.”
41016019	Awo oMusengwa oYesu oweyamalire okutumula nabo, ni bamutwala omwigulu, nʼatyama nʼoKibbumba omu kifo kyʼekitiisya eino.
41016020	Awo abeegibe ni batambula nga balaabba wonawona aMawuliro aMasa. OMusengwa oYesu nʼababbeeranga, era nʼakakasanga obukwenda bwabwe ngʼabakolesya ebyewunyo].
42001001	Owʼekitiisya eino oTeefiiro, abantu bangi beewaireyo okulangaasira nakusani nʼokuwandiika ebintu oYesu ebiyakolere mwiswe abantu ngʼali oku kyalo.
42001002	Bawandiikire bintu ebyo, badi ababiboneireku nakimo okuzwa oku ntandiika yaabyo ebibatukobeire, era ni bakola omulimo ogwʼokusalaania ekibono kya Kibbumba.
42001003	Zena owemmalire okunoonererya nakusani byonabyona oYesu ebiyakolere okuzwa oku ntandiika yaabyo, mmboine nti kisa okubikuwandiikira nga mbicaanire kusani ngʼowebyabire bibbaawo.
42001004	Kinu nkikolere, kaisi omanyire nakimo amazima gʼebibono abantu abamo ebibakwegeserye.
42001005	Omu biseera okabaka oKerode oweyabbaire nga niiye afuga oBuyudaaya, wabbairewo okabona ogubeetanga bati Zakaliya, owʼomu kibbula kya bakabona ekibeetanga ekyʼAbbiya. OZakaliya yabbaire nʼomukaliwe nga bamweta Erizabbeesi, nga bonabona bʼomu lulyo lwa kabona Alooni eyasookeire nakimo omu Bayudaaya.
42001006	OZakaliya nʼomukaliwe babbaire batuukirirye omu maiso ga Kibbumba, nga babulaku ekyokubanenya omu byʼaMateeka era nʼebiragiro bya Musengwa oYesu byonabyona.
42001007	Neye babbaire badambaku omwana olwakubba Erizabbeesi yabbaire mugumba, tete bonabona ni babba nga bakairiire ino.
42001008	Lumo, oZakaliya yabbaire akola omulimogwe ogwʼobwakabona omu maiso ga Kibbumba, ngʼekibbulakye ekyabakabona ekiyabbairemu niikyo ekiri omu kiiwu.
42001009	Ngʼenkola ya bakabona oweyabbaire bamulondere na kalulu okwingira omu kifo ekyeru, aduunyirye obubbaani.
42001010	Omu kiseera kyʼokuduunyirya obubbaani, abantu bonabona ababbaire bakumbaine, babbaire nza nga basaba oKibbumba.
42001011	Awo omalaika wa Musengwa ngʼayemereire oku lubba lwʼengalo endiiro olwʼekyoto kyʼobubbaani nʼabonekera oZakaliya.
42001012	OZakaliya oweyamuboine ni yeerinduka, entiisya nʼemukwata.
42001013	Omalaika nʼamukoba ati, “Zakaliya tiwaatya, olwakubba oKibbumba awuliire okwegairirakwo; omukaliwo Erizabbeesi yalikubyalira omwana mwisuka, nʼomwerula eriina bati Yokaana.
42001014	Walisiima nʼosangaala ino, era nʼabantu abandi bangi balyesunga olwʼokumubyalakwe,
42001015	olwakubba yalibba mukulu omu maiso ga Musengwa oKibbumba. Tiyalikombaku mwenge gwʼemizabbibbu, newankubbaire ekiteemeerya ekindi kyonakyona. Balimwizulya oMwoyo oMweru ngʼakaali nʼokuzwa omu kida kya maaye.
42001016	Yaliirya aBaisirairi bangi eeri oMusengwa oKibbumba waabwe okuzwa omu kibbikibbi.
42001017	Balimuwa omwoyo nʼobwezye ngʼEriya ebiyabbaire nabyo, era niiye eyalyesooka oMulonde wa Kibbumba omu maiso nʼayaba ngʼalaabba eeri abantu okwiryayo emyoyo gya baiteeye bʼabaana eeri abaana baabwe. Era yaliirya abantu abajeemera oKibbumba omu nzira yʼabantu abasa, nʼategeka abantu okukuumirira oMusengwa.”
42001018	Awo oZakaliya nʼabuulya omalaika ati, “Ekyo nze mpezya ntya okukikakasa? Nze neekaiririire, nʼomukali wange yena mukaire ino.”
42001019	OMalaika nʼamwiramu ati, “Ninze oGabudyeri, ayemerera bulijo omu maiso ga Kibbumba nga mmuweererya, era niiye antumire okutumula na iwe, nʼokukukobera amawuliro ganu amasa.
42001020	Aale atyanu ngʼowobuusabuusire ebinkukobeire, ebyalibbaawo ngʼekiseera kyabyo kituukire, oyaba kweigala omunwa, obbe nga toyezya kutumula, paka oku lunaku ebyo olubyalibbeerawo.”
42001021	Omu kiseera ekyo, abantu babbaire bakuumiriire oZakaliya, era nga beewunya ekimulwisirye eino omu Yeekaalu.
42001022	Oweyawulukire nandi nʼayezya okutumula nabo, ni bamanyica bati wabbairewo ekinene ekyaboine omu Yeekaalu. Olwʼobuteezya kutumula, nʼabakoberanga ebintu mu kugerya-bugeri, era nʼasigala ngʼomunwa gwebbuunire.
42001023	Awo enakugye egyʼokuweererya ngʼokabona omu Yeekaalu owegyawoireku, nʼazwa e Yerusaalemi nʼakanga e wuwe.
42001024	Owewabitirewo ekiseera, Erizabbeesi omukaliwe nʼasuna ekida, era nʼamala emyeri mitaanu nga tabbutuka omu bantu, ngʼakoba ati,
42001025	“OMusengwa oKibbumba niiye anjezyesyerye okusuna ekida, nʼankwatira ekisa omu kiseera kinu, nʼantoolaku okuswala okwʼobugumba okwembaire nakwo omu bantu.”
42001026	Erizabbeesi yabbaire yankamala emyeri mukaaga ngʼali kida, oKibbumba nʼatuma omalaika oGabudyeri omu kibuga kyʼe Naazaleesi ekyʼomu kitundu kyʼe Galiraaya,
42001027	eeri omwala omuguna, eriinalye bati Malyamu. Omwala oyo yabbaire aikiriirye okufumbirwa omusaiza ogubeeta oYusufu, omwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi.
42001028	OMalaika oweyatuukire egiri omwala oyo, nʼamukoba ati, “Nkusugiirye ino, era nkumanyikisya nti oli nʼenkabi mpitiriri. Era oMusengwa ali na iwe!”
42001029	OMalyamu ni yeeraliikirira ino olwʼebibono ebyo, era ni yeebuulya omu mwoyogwe ekibitegeeza.
42001030	Neye omalaika nʼamukoba ati, “Malyamu tiwaatya, olwakubba oKibbumba akuwaire enkabi.
42001031	Oyaba okubba ekida, obyale omwana mwisuka, era bamwerule eriina bati Yesu.
42001032	Yalibba wa bwezye, era balimweta Mwana wa Kibbumba oNambulaku aMwagaagana. OMusengwa oKibbumba yalimuwa okubba kabaka ngʼozeizawe oDawudi.
42001033	Yalifuga abaizukulu ba Yaakobbo emirembe gyonagyona, era obwakabakabwe tibwakuwaawo.”
42001034	OMalyamu nʼabuulya omalaika ati, “Ekyokubba ekida kyabbaawo kitya, nga timbangaku nʼomusaiza?”
42001035	OMalaika nʼamwiramu ati, “OMwoyo oMweru yalikwikaku, era amaani ga Kibbumba oNambulaku aMwagaagana ni gakumaamira. Kale omwana oguwalibyala yalibba mweru, era balimweta Mwana wa Kibbumba.
42001036	Era nʼekindi, omugandawo Erizabbeesi, newankubbaire nga bamwetanga omugumba, era nga atyanu mukaire, neye gunu mweri gwa mukaaga ngʼali kida. Era yena ayaba okubyala omwana mwisuka,
42001037	olwakubba eri oKibbumba mpaawo kintu ekiteezyeka.”
42001038	Awo oMalyamu nʼamukoba ati, “Nze ndi muweererya-buweererya wa Musengwa oKibbumba; kale njikiriirye, kibbe ngʼowokobere.” Awo omalaika nʼalekaawo oMalyamu ni yeeyabira.
42001039	Omu naku egyo, nga bankumala okumukobera ebintu ebyo, oMalyamu nʼasetuka, nʼayaba mangu omu kibuga ekiri omu kyalo ekyo ekyʼensozi, ekyʼe Buyudaaya.
42001040	Era yaabire mu nyumba ya Zakaliya, nʼasugirya omukaliwe Erizabbeesi.
42001041	Neye Erizabbeesi oweyawuliire oMalyamu ngʼamusugirya, omwana nʼasambasamba omu kida kyʼErizabbeesi. Era Erizabbeesi nʼaizula oMwoyo oMweru,
42001042	nʼaminkirira ati, “OKibbumba akuwaire iwe enkabi okukiraku abakali abandi bonabona, nʼomwana oguwalibyala ali nʼenkabi.
42001043	Kale nze onu nsunire ntya ekitiisya kinu, dala omaaye wa Musengwa wange nʼaiza okuncaalira?
42001044	Owempuliire eigonolyo ngʼonsugirya, omwana nʼasambasamba omu kida kyange olwʼeisangaalo eryabbaire nalyo.
42001045	Oli wʼenkabi ino iwe eyaikirirye ati ebyo oMusengwa ebiyakukobere byalituukirira.”
42001046	Awo oMalyamu nʼakoba ati, “Omwoyo gwange gugulumalya oMusengwa.
42001047	Era omwoyo gwange gusangaalira oKibbumba oMulokoli wange,
42001048	olwakubba ankwatiire ekisa nze omuweereryawe onambulaku owaali. Okuzwa atyanu, abantu abʼemirembe gyonagyona banjetanga wʼenkabi,
42001049	olwʼebikulu onyere obwezye ebyankoleire. Eriinalye Lyeru!
42001050	Era akwatira ekisa abo abamutya, mu buli mulembe.
42001051	Alagire obwezyebwe omu byewunyo ebyakola. Abeekudumbalya omu biseego byabwe, abasalaanicirye.
42001052	Ayanwire abʼobwezye oku ntebe gyabwe nʼabaica, neye nʼagangamula abo abʼeiwooyo.
42001053	Abali omu kwetaaga abawaire ebintu ebisa bingi, neye abasuni nʼababbinga nga badambaku akantu konakona.
42001054	Abbeereire omuweereryawe oIsirairi, ngʼoweyasuubizire abazeiza baiswe.
42001055	Ayewukiirye okukwatira ekisa oIbbulaimu nʼeibyairerye emirembe gyonagyona.”
42001056	OMalyamu yamalire nʼErizabbeesi emyeri ngʼemisatu, kaisi nʼakanga e wuwe.
42001057	Awo enaku gyʼErizabbeesi egyʼokubyala ni gituuka, era nʼabyala omwana mwisuka.
42001058	Abaliranwabe nʼabagandabe ni bawulira ngʼoMusengwa owamuwaire enkabi enyingi, era ni basangaalira aamo naye.
42001059	Awo omwana oweyayererye enaku omunaana, abantu ni baiza oku mukolo ogwʼokukomola omwana onu. Babbaire baaba kumwerula liina lya iteeye oZakaliya.
42001060	Neye omaaye wʼomwana nʼakoba ati, “Kadi, nze tinjikirirya eriina eeryo! Omwana bamwete bati Yokaana.”
42001061	Kale era abaliranwabe ni bamukoba bati, “Ekyo kibba kitya, ngʼomu ba lulyolwo mpaamu kadi moiza ogubeeta eriina eeryo!”
42001062	Awo ni bakolesya okugerya, ni babuulya iteeye wʼomwana eriina eryataka beerule omwana.
42001063	OZakaliya nʼasaba ekipande ekyokuwandiikaku, nʼawandiika ati, “Eriina lyʼomwana niiye oYokaana.” Awo bonabona ni beewunya.
42001064	Era nʼamangu ago omunwa gwa Zakaliya ni gubbunulukuka, nʼolulumirwe ni lusibinduka, nʼatandiika nʼokutumula ngʼawuuja oKibbumba.
42001065	Awo abantu bonabona ababbaire babaliraine ni batya. Era ebibono ebyo byonabyona ni bisalaana omu kitundu kyonakyona ekyʼe Buyudaaya ekyʼensozi ekyo.
42001066	Kale abantu bonabona abawuliire ebintu ebyo, ni bibaingira omu myoyo, era ni bakoba bati, “Olwo omwana onu yalibba muntu wʼengeriki?” Bakobere ekyo olwakubba baboine obwezye bwa Musengwa nga buli oku mwana oyo.
42001067	Awo oZakaliya oiteeye wa Yokaana, nʼaizula oMwoyo oMweru, nʼawa obunaabbi, ngʼakoba ati:
42001068	“Tuwuujenge oMusengwa oKibbumba wa Isirairi, olwakubba acaaliire abantube era abanunwire.
42001069	Atuwaire oMulokoli owʼobwezye, azwera omu lulyo lwʼomuweereryawe okabaka oDawudi,
42001070	ngʼoweyasuubizire eira ngʼabita omu banaabbibe abeeru,
42001071	okutulamya abalabe baiswe, era nʼokututoola omu ngalo gyʼabo bonabona abatucaawa,
42001072	ngʼoweyasuubizire okukwatira abazeiza baiswe ekisa, nʼokwewukirya endagaanoye enjeru,
42001073	nga niikyo ekirayiro ekiyalayiriire oIbbulaimu ozeiza waiswe,
42001074	ati yalitutoola omu ngalo gyʼabalabe baiswe, kaisi twezye okumuweererya anambula kutya,
42001075	nga tuli beeru era abatuukiriire omu maisoge nʼobwomi bwaiswe bwonabwona.
42001076	Era na iwe omwana, balikweta naabbi wa Kibbumba oNambulaku aMwagaagana, olwakubba walyesooka oMusengwa nʼoyaba omu maiso, okumwewulirya enzira,
42001077	nʼokumanyikisya abantube ooti, yalibalokola, ngʼabasoniya ebibbibibbi byabwe,
42001078	olwakubba oKibbumba waiswe aizwire ekisa. Era olwʼekisa ekyo yalitucaalira ngʼamoleka kusani ooti isana eryankazwayo,
42001079	nʼayakira abo abali omu bwomi bwʼekibbikibbi nʼomu kiriirye ekyokufa kwʼomu mwoyo, era nʼokulungamya ebigere byaiswe omu nzira eyʼeidembe.”
42001080	Omwana nʼayaba ngʼakula, era nga yeeyongera amaani omu mwoyo, nʼabbanga omu kitera paka oku lunaku oluyeeragisiirye eeri abantu bʼe Isirairi.
42002001	Awo omu naku egyo, oKaisaali Agusito nga niiye afuga obwakabaka bwʼe Looma nʼawuluca ekiragiro ati abantu bonabona abʼomu matwalege beewandiikisye, bababale.
42002002	Okubala abantu okwo niikwo okwabbaire okusooka ngʼoKwiriniya niiye afuga eitwale lyʼe Siiriya.
42002003	Awo buli muntu nʼayaba okwewandiikisirya egibamubyala.
42002004	Kale nʼoYusufu nʼazwa omu kibuga e Naazaleesi, ekyʼomu Galiraaya, nʼayaba omu Buyudaaya, omu kibuga e Bbeserekeemu oDawudi ekibamubyaliiremu olwakubba oYusufu yabbaire mwizukulu wa Dawudi.
42002005	Yaabire nʼoMalyamu okwewandiikisya, ngʼoMalyamu amusuubizire okumufumbirwa era nga kimanyikanire kiti ayaba okumufumbirwa era nʼomu kiseera ekyo ngʼali nʼekida kikulu.
42002006	Owebatuukire eeyo ni batasuna kifo omu nyumba abantu abali omu nŋendo egibagonamu era ni basigala mu kinyumba ebyayo omu bigona. Owebabbaire nga bali eeyo, enaku gya Malyamu egyʼokubyala ni gituuka. Yabyaire omwanawe omubere, mwisuka, nʼamubwika omu bugoye, kaisi nʼamuteeka omwitiba ebisolo omu biriira.
42002008	Okumpi kumpi aawo omu kitundu ekyo, mwabbairemu abaliisya abagonanga omu kiriisiryo eeyo, nga bakuuma entaama gyabwe obwire.
42002009	Awo omalaika wa Musengwa oKibbumba nʼababonekera, nʼekitiisya kya Musengwa oKibbumba ni kimoleka okubeeruguulirirya. Ni batya ino!
42002010	Neye omalaika nʼabakoba ati, “Timwatya olwakubba mbaleeteire amawuliro amasa, agʼeisangaalo erinene eeri abantu bonabona.
42002011	Olwatyanu, omu kibuga egibabyala oDawudi, bababyaliiremu oMulokoli, niiye oKurisito oMusengwa.
42002012	Kanu niiko akamanyiciryo akembawa akemwamumanyiciryaku: Mwajirya omwana omwibo ogubabwikire omu bugoye, nga bamuteekere omwitiba ebisolo omu biriira.”
42002013	Amangu ago, aawo awabbaire omalaika oyo, ni waizawo nʼabamalaika abandi bangi abʼomwije eryʼomwigulu. Ni bawuuja oKibbumba nga webemba bati,
42002014	“Ekitiisya kibbe eeri oKibbumba omwigulu! Era nʼoku kyalo, eidembe libbe omu bantu abo oKibbumba abaasiima!”
42002015	Abamalaika owebamalire okuzwa egiri abaliisya, ni bakanga omwigulu. Awo abaliisya ni bakobangana bati, “Twabe e Bbeserekeemu, tubone ekintu ekyo ekigwireyo, oMusengwa ekyatukobeire.”
42002016	Kale ni baabayo mangu, era ni baajirya oMalyamu nʼoYusufu, nʼomwana omwibo nga bamuteekere omwitiba ebisolo omu biriira.
42002017	Owebamalire okubona omwana, ni basalaania ebibono ebibabbaire babakobeire oku omwana oyo.
42002018	Era abantu bonabona ababiwuliire ni beewunya abaliisya abo ebibabbaire bakoba.
42002019	Neye oMalyamu ebibono ebyo byonabyona nʼabikuumira oku mwoyogwe, era nʼabiseegangaku ino.
42002020	Awo abaliisya ni bakanga egiri entaama gyabwe nga bawuuja era nga bagulumalya oKibbumba olwʼebyo ebibawuliire nʼebibaboine. Ekyo kityo olwakubba byonabyona byabbaire nga biri nakimo ngʼomalaika oweyabbaire abakobeire.
42002021	Awo omwana oweyayererye enaku omunaana igyo egyʼokumukomoleraku, ni bamwerula eriina bati Yesu, iryo eriina omalaika eriyayetere omwana onu ngʼakaali nʼokubba omu kida kya maaye.
42002022	Awo ekiseera owekyawoireku ekyʼababyaire okubatukulya nga bamalire okubyala, ngʼowekiri omu Mateeka ga Musa, oYusufu nʼoMalyamu ni batwala omwana oYesu omu Yeekaalu e Yerusaalemi okumuwaayo eeri oMusengwa oKibbumba.
42002023	Ekyo bakikolere kutuukirirya kiwandiike ekiri omu Mateeka ga Musengwa ekikoba kiti, “Buli mwana omwisuka omubere, bamuwangayo eeri oMusengwa oKibbumba.”
42002024	Era baabire okuwaayo esadaaka, ngʼeiteeka lya Musengwa oweryabbaire liragira liti; enjiiwa ibiri ooba amaizima amatomato mabiri.
42002025	Awo, wabbairewo omusaiza omukaire omu Yerusaalemi eriinalye bati Simyoni. Omusaiza oyo yabbaire muntu musa, nga mutuukirirye, era ngʼakwata amateeka ga Kibbumba gonagona. Omusaiza oyo yabbaire akuumiriire okubonaku ekiseera kyʼokununula kwa Isirairi. Era yabbaire nga muntu aizwire oMwoyo oMweru.
42002026	OMwoyo oMweru yabbaire amumanyikisirye ati tiyalifa ngʼakaali okubona oku Kurisito oMulonde wa Musengwa oKibbumba.
42002027	Omu kiseera ekibaleeteiremu oYesu omu Yeekaalu oMwoyo oMweru nʼakoba oSimyoni yena nʼaiza oku Yeekaalu. Ababyaire owebatuucirye oYesu oku Yeekaalu bakole ebintu ngʼaMateeka ga Musa owegakoba,
42002028	oSimyoni nʼaginga omwana omu ngalogye, nʼatandiika okuwuuja oKibbumba ngʼakoba ati:
42002029	“Aale atyanu Musengwa Kibbumba, otuukirirye ekiwasuubizire. Oleke omuweereryawo yeefeere kusani omwidembe,
42002030	olwakubba amaiso gange gaboine oku Mulokoli
42002031	oguwategekeire abantu bonabona,
42002032	oti abbe ekitangaala eeri aBatali Bayudaaya, era awesye abantubo aBaisirairi ekitiisya.”
42002033	Oiteeye nʼomaaye wʼomwana ni beewunya olwʼebibono oSimyoni ebiyatumwire oku mwana oyo.
42002034	Awo oSimyoni nʼabasabira enkabi, tete nʼakoba oMalyamu, omaaye wʼomwana ati, “Omwana onu bamuteekerewo, okuleetera abantu bangi omwIsirairi okujigirika, neye tete era bangi basune okulokoka. Era aiza kubba kamanyiciryo akebalyakanisya,
42002035	era kaisi ebiseego byʼomu myoyo gyʼabantu bangi kwibo bibbutuke. Era na iwe ekiseera kyalituuka enima nʼekusumuta omwoyo ooti-so mpiima enjogi niiyo ekusumuta.”
42002036	Era wabbairewo nʼonaabbi omukali eriinalye bati Anna, omwala wa Fanuweri, owʼomu kika kyʼAseri. Anna oyo yabbaire mukali mukaire ino. Yabbaire yafumbiirweku nga mwala mutomuto, nʼamala emyanka musanvu omu bufumbo oibaaye nʼafa.
42002037	Okuzwa oolwo yabbaire yankamala emyanka 84 nga namwandu. Omukali oyo tiyaazwanga omu Yeekaalu. Omusana nʼobwire yaabbanga mu kuweererya Kibbumba nʼomu kumwegairira, era ngʼasiiba.
42002038	Omu kiseera ngʼoSimyoni atumula nʼababyaire ba Yesu, Anna yena nʼatuukawo era ni yeebalya oKibbumba ngʼatumula ebikwata oku mwana oyo egiri abo bonabona ababbaire bakuumiriire ebyokununula kwa Yerusaalemi.
42002039	OYusufu nʼoMalyamu owebamalire okutuukirirya byonabyona ngʼowebabbaire balagira omu Mateeka ga Musengwa, ni bakanga e Galiraaya omu kibuga kyʼe waabwe, e Naazaleesi.
42002040	Awo omwana ni yeeyongera okukula, nabba wa maani, ngʼaizwire amalabuki era nʼenkabi gya Kibbumba.
42002041	Kale, ababyaire ba Yesu baabanga buli mwanka e Yerusaalemi, oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.
42002042	OYesu oweyayererye emyanka eikumi na mibiri, ni baaba naye e Yerusaalemi ngʼowebakolanga omu kiseera ekyʼoMukolo ogwo nago.
42002043	Owebabbaire bakanga e waabwe, ngʼenaku gyʼoMukolo giwoireku, oYesu nʼasigala omu Yerusaalemi neye ababyairebe nga tibamaite.
42002044	Owebamalire okutambula olugendo lwa lunaku lubbeereri, nga baseega bati omwana ali omu kiziima kyʼabantu abebabbaire batambula nabo neenu kadi, oolwo ni bamunoonia omu baganda baabwe nʼomu mikago gyabwe.
42002045	Owebakayire omwana, ni bakanga e Yerusaalemi okumunoonia.
42002046	Wabitirewo enaku isatu kaisi ni bamubonera oku Yeekaalu, ngʼatyaime nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, ngʼali kubawulisisya era ngʼababuulya ebibuulyo.
42002047	Bonabona abamuwulisisirye, ni beewunya ino olwʼamalabukige nʼebyo yena ebiyabairangamu.
42002048	Ababyairebe owebamuboine, ni beewunya ino. Omaaye nʼamukoba ati, “Mwana wange, lwaki otukolere otyo? Oiteewo na nze tubbaire tukunoonia nga tweraliikiriire ino.”
42002049	Neye iye nʼabakoba ati, “Lwaki mubbaire munnoonia? Mubbaire timumaite muti nteekwa kubba mu nyumba ya Bbaabba?”
42002050	Neye ibo nandi ni bamanyica ekyabakobere.
42002051	Awo nʼayaba nabo ni baserengeta okwaba e Naazaleesi, era nʼabagonderanga. Neye omaaye nʼakuumanga ebintu ebyo byonabyona oku mwoyogwe.
42002052	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okukula, era ni yeeyongoranga nʼomu malabuki era nga mukoda eri oKibbumba nʼeri abantu.
42003001	Omu mwanka ogweikumi na mitaanu okumulembe gwa Kaisaali oTibberiyo oweyafugiire obwakabaka bwʼe Looma, ngʼoPontiyo Piraato niiye afuga eitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya, ngʼoKerode niiye afuga eryʼe Galiraaya, era ngʼomugandawe oFiripo niiye afuga eitwale lyʼe Yituleya nʼe Turakonaiti; ngʼoLisaniya iye afuga eryʼAbbireene,
42003002	ngʼAnasi nʼoKayaafa niibo abakabona abakulu omu Yerusaalemi, oYokaana omutaane wa Zakaliya ngʼali omu kitera, nʼasuna obukwenda okuzwa egiri oKibbumba.
42003003	Kale nʼatambula okumalaku ebitundu byonabyona ebiriraine omwiga oYoludaani, ngʼakoba abantu okwenenya bababatize, kaisi oKibbumba abasoniye ebikole byabwe ebibbibibbi.
42003004	Ebyo byabbairewo ngʼowebakiwandiikire omu kitabo kyʼebibono bya Isaaya onaabbi bati: “Waliwo atumulira omu kitera nʼeigono eryaminkirira ati: ‘Mutegeke oluguudo lwa Musengwa aiza, mutereerye amanzirage.
42003005	Buli kiinamo bakiizulye; buli lusozi nabuli kasozi babiice. Amanzira amagedesye bagagolole, nʼagalimu ebikonko bagakwanie.
42003006	Olwo abantu bonabona baaba okubona ngʼoKibbumba owabalokola.’”
42003007	Abantu bangi ino ni baabanga egiri oYokaana ababatize, neye nʼabakoba ati, “Inywe abakabbikabbi ooti mpiri enfulugundu! Naani abalabwire ati eenu niiyo engeri eyʼokwiruka obusungu bwa Kibbumba obwaba okwiza?
42003008	Aale atyanu mukole ebikole ebiraga biti dala mwenenyere ebibbibibbi byanywe. Era timwatandiika kuseega muti, ‘Kasita iswe tuli baizukulu ba Ibbulaimu,’ olwakubba mbakobera nti omu mabbaale ganu, oKibbumba ayezya okusuuciryamu oIbbulaimu abaizukulu abandi.
42003009	Mumanye muti muli ooti misaale, nga nʼamambaizi agagitema bamalire okugabiikirya oku kikolo kya buli musaale. Ogwo ogutaneneka ebineneka ebisa baaba kugutema, era bagudyake omu musyo.”
42003010	Awo abantu ni bamubuulya bati, “Aale atyanu tukole niki?”
42003011	Nʼabairamu ati, “Oyo aali nʼebizwalo ebibiri aweeku ogondi adamba, era aali nʼebyokulya yena akole atyo.”
42003012	Awo abasolooji ba musolo bona ni baiza ababatize, era ni bamubuulya bati, “ Musomesya, iswe tukole tutya?”
42003013	Nʼabairamu ati, “Timwasoloojanga ekinene okukiraku ekyo ekibabalagira.”
42003014	Abaisulukale bona ni bamubuulya bati, “Kaisi iswe tukole tutya?” Nʼabakoba ati, “Abantu timwabanyagangaku ebyabwe, era timwabasibiriryangaku emisango eginandi babbenga. Mwererenge ku kusuna mpeera yaanywe yonkani.”
42003015	Awo abantu bonabona ni batandiika okuseega omu myoyo gyabwe bati, “Amo ni tubbangaawo ngʼoYokaana niiye oKurisito oKibbumba oguyalondere okununula abantu ogutusuubira.”
42003016	Neye oYokaana nʼabakobera bonabona ati, “Nze mbabatiza na maizi, neye waliwo ankiraku obwezye aali kwiza, oguntasaanira naire okusibindula obusibiro bwʼengaitogye ni ngitoola omu bigerebye. Iye, yalibabatiza na Mwoyo oMweru era na musyo.
42003017	Iye ayaba okwabulamu abantu ooti muntu owaakwata olugali nʼasenyenta, empeke nʼebisusungu. Empeke igyo yaligikumbaanirya omu kideerokye, kaisi ibyo ebisusungu nʼabyoca nʼomusyo ogutalikira.”
42003018	Atyo oYokaana, nʼayegesya abantu emirundi mingi ngʼakolesya ebibono ebyo, era ngʼabakobera aMawuliro aMasa.
42003019	Era nʼanenya omufugi oKerode, olwʼokutwala oKerodiya omuka mugandawe, nʼolwʼebibbibibbi ebindi byonabyona ebiyakolanga.
42003020	Kaisi kwebyo byonabyona, nʼayongereryaku nʼekyʼokwigalira oYokaana omu mabbuusu.
42003021	Awo olwatuukire, abantu owebabbaire nga bali kwizanga egiri oYokaana okubabatiza, oYesu yena nʼaiza ni bamubatiza. Nga bamalire okumubatiza, yabbaire ngʼasaba oKibbumba, eigulu ni libikuka,
42003022	era oMwoyo oMweru, ngʼafaananira nakimo ooti njiiwa, nʼaika nʼamugwaku. Era eigono ni lizwa omwigulu nga likoba liti, “Niiwe oMwana wange omutake, era ogunsiima eino.”
42003023	OYesu yatandiikire omulimogwe ogwʼokwegesya, ngʼayerya emyanka ooti 30, abantu nga bamweta mutaane wa Yusufu. OYusufu oyo yabbaire mutaane wʼEeri,
42003024	Eeri nga mutaane wa Matati, oMatati mutaane wa Leevi, kaisi oLeevi mutaane wa Mereki, oMereki nʼabba mutaane wa Yanai, oYanai iye yabbaire mutaane wa Yusufu,
42003025	oYusufu oyo mutaane wa Matatiya, oMatatiya mutaane wʼAmosi, Amosi nʼabba mutaane wa Nakumu, oNakumu mutaane wʼEsiri, Esiri iye mutaane wa Nangai,
42003026	kaisi oNangai yabbaire mutaane wa Maati, oMaati iye yabbaire mutaane wa Matatiya, oMatatiya nʼabba mutaane wa Semeeni, oSemeeni iye mutaane wa Yoseki, kaisi oYoseki nʼabba mutaane wa Yoda,
42003027	oYoda nʼabba mutaane wa Yowanaani, oYowanaani iye mutaane wa Leesa, oLeesa nʼabba mutaane wa Zerubbabbeeri, kaisi oZerubbabbeeri yabbaire mutaane wa Seyalutiyeeri, oSeyalutiyeeri iye nʼabba mutaane wa Neeri,
42003028	oNeeri oyo nʼabba mutaane wa Mereki, oMereki iye yabbaire mutaane wʼAdi, Kaisi Adi nʼabba mutaane wa Kosamu, oKosamu iye yabbaire mutaane wʼErimadamu, Erimadamu oyo nʼabba mutaane wʼEeri,
42003029	Eeri iye yabbaire mutaane wa Yoswa, oYoswa nʼabba mutaane wʼEryezaali, Eryezaali iye yabbaire mutaane wa Yolimu, kaisi oYolimu nʼabba mutaane wa Matati, oMatati oyo yabbaire mutaane wa Leevi,
42003030	oLeevi iye nʼabba mutaane wa Simyoni, kaisi oSimyoni nʼabba mutaane wa Yuda, oYuda iye yabbaire mutaane wa Yusufu, oYusufu oyo nʼabba mutaane wa Yonamu, kaisi oYonamu nʼabba mutaane wʼEryakimu,
42003031	Eryakimu iye yabbaire mutaane wa Mereya, oMereya nʼabba mutaane wa Meena, oMeena iye yabbaire mutaane wa Matata, kaisi oMatata nʼabba mutaane wa Nasani, oNasani nʼabba mutaane wa Dawudi,
42003032	kaisi oDawudi iye yabbaire mutaane wa Yese, oYese iye nʼabba mutaane wʼObbedi, Obbedi iye nʼabba mutaane wa Bbowaazi, oBbowaazi iye yabbaire mutaane wa Seera, oSeera nʼabba mutaane wa Nasoni,
42003033	kaisi oNasoni iye yabbaire mutaane wʼAminadaabbu, Aminadaabbu iye nʼabba mutaane wʼAdimini, Adimini iye yabbaire mutaane wʼArini, Arini nʼabba mutaane wa Kazirooni, oKazirooni oyo nʼabba mutaane wa Pereezi, kaisi oPereezi iye yabbaire mutaane wa Yuda,
42003034	oYuda iye yabbaire mutaane wa Yaakobbo, oYaakobbo nʼabba mutaane wa Isaka, oIsaka iye yabbaire mutaane wa Ibbulaimu, oIbbulaimu nʼabba mutaane wa Teera, kaisi oTeera iye yabbaire mutaane wa Nakoli,
42003035	oNakoli oyo nʼabba mutaane wa Serugi, kaisi oSerugi iye yabbaire mutaane wa Lewu, oLewu oyo nʼabba mutaane wa Pereegi, oPereegi iye yabbaire mutaane wʼEbberi, Ebberi iye nʼabba mutaane wa Seera,
42003036	kaisi oSeera yabbaire mutaane wa Kainaani, oKainaani iye nʼabba mutaane wʼAlupakusaadi, Alupakusaadi iye yabbaire mutaane wa Seemu, oSeemu iye nʼabba mutaane wa Nuwa, oNuwa iye yabbaire mutaane wa Laameeka,
42003037	OLaameeka iye nʼabba mutaane wa Mesuseera, oMesuseera iye nʼabba mutaane wʼEnoka, Enoka oyo yabbaire mutaane wa Yaledi, oYaledi, iye nʼabba mutaane wa Makaleeri, oMakaleeri iye yabbaire mutaane wa Kainaani,
42003038	oKainaani iye yabbaire mutaane wʼEnosi, Enosi nʼabba mutaane wa Seezi, oSeezi nʼabba mutaane wʼAdamu, Adamu eyabbaire omutaane wa Kibbumba.
42004001	Awo oYesu ngʼaizwire oMwoyo oMweru, nʼazwayo omu Mwiga oYoludaani, oMwoyo oMweru nʼamutwala omu kitera,
42004002	nʼamalayo enaku 40 ngʼoSitaani amukema. Omu naku egyo gyonagyona mpaawo kantu akeyaliireku, era owegyawoireku, awo enzala nʼemuluma.
42004003	Kale oSitaani nʼamukoba ati, “Ngʼooli Mwana wa Kibbumba, aale olagire eibbaale linu lisuuke kyokulya.”
42004004	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Bakiwandiikire bati, ‘Omuntu tabba mwomi omu bwizulye ngʼalya kyokulya kyonkani.’ ”
42004005	Awo oSitaani nʼalungamya oYesu okuniina awantu awagingice eino, era omu kaseera-buseera nʼamulagisyaku obwakabaka obwʼamawanga gonagona obwʼoku kyalo.
42004006	Nʼamukoba ati, “Nakuwa obwezye okufuga amawanga ago gonagona era nkuwe nʼebisa byonabyona ebigalimu, olwakubba byonabyona ebyo babimpaire, era oguntaka yenayena gumbigabira.
42004007	Aale atyanu iwe singa oikirirya okunkomera amazwi nʼonsinza, byonabyona byaba okubba bibyo.”
42004008	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Bakiwandiikire bati, ‘Osinzenge Musengwa oKibbumbawo, era guwaweereryanga yenkani.’ ”
42004009	Awo oSitaani nʼalungamya oYesu okwaba e Yerusaalemi, nʼamuniinisya oku kisooto kyʼeYeekaalu, kaisi nʼamukoba ati, “Ngʼooli Mwana wa Kibbumba, ozwere aanu, ojuuke ogwe ansi,
42004010	olwakubba bakiwandiikire bati, ‘OKibbumba yalagiranga abamalaikabe okukukuuma nandi nʼobbaaku kabbikabbi konakona.’
42004011	Era ati, ‘Balikubbaka omu ngalo gyabwe, kaisi nandi ni weekontola ekigerekyo okwibbaale.’ ”
42004012	OYesu nʼairamu ati, “Bakiwandiikire bati, ‘Tokemanga oMusengwa oKibbumbawo.’ ”
42004013	OSitaani ngʼamalire okukema oYesu omu ngeri enyingi eino egyo, nʼamulekaku paka ekiseera ekindi.
42004014	Awo oYesu nʼakanga omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya ngʼali nʼamaani ga Mwoyo oMweru. Era amawuliro agamukwataku ni gasaalaana omu kitundu ekyo kyonakyona.
42004015	Yaabire ngʼayegesya omu makumbaaniro agʼomu kitundu ekyo, era abantu bonabona ni bamuwuuja.
42004016	OYesu oweyakangireyo omu kabuga kʼe Naazaleesi egiyakuliire era oku Saabbaato, nʼayaba omwikumbaaniro, ngʼoweyabbaire enkolaye. Awo ni bataka niiye abbe asome era nʼasetuka okusoma eBiwandiike.
42004017	Bamukwatisirye ekitabo kya naabbi Isaaya. Oweyakibiikwire, nʼatuuka egibawandiikire bati:
42004018	“OMwoyo wa Kibbumba andiku, olwakubba oKibbumba yannondere okulaabba aMawuliro aMasa eeri abadoobi. Antumire okukobera abasibe ati beezya okuzwa omu busibe, nʼaboofu bona ati baiza kwiramu ni babona. Era antumire okukobera abebagadya ati beezya okusuna eidembe,
42004019	nʼokulangirira ekiseera kya Musengwa ekyokukwatiramu abantu ekisa.”
42004020	OYesu oweyamalire okusoma awo, nʼabwikaku ekitabo, nʼakiirirya omuweererya owʼomu Yeekaalu, era ni yeetyamira. Abantu bonabona omwikumbaaniro ni bamukaliryaku amaiso.
42004021	Awo nʼatandiika okubakoba ati, “Olwatyanu ekyo eKiwandiike ekimuwuliire, kituukirire.”
42004022	Bonabona ni bamusiima ino, era ni beewunya olwʼebibono ebisa ebiyatumwire, ni bakoba bati, “Onu tiniiye omutaane wa Yusufu?”
42004023	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mmaite nti mwaba okunkoba bibono ebyolugero olukoba luti, ‘Omugangi, weeramye.’ Era nʼokunkoba muti, ‘Ebyewunyo ebiwakoleire e Kaperenawumu, ebitwawuliire, obikolereku nʼaanu omu kibuga kyʼe waanywe.’ ”
42004024	Era nʼabakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti mpaawo naabbi ogubasiima omu kitundu kyʼe waabwe.
42004025	Era mbakakasa nti omu mirembe gyʼEriya wabbairewo abanamwandu bangi omwIsirairi. Omu biseera ebyo, ensaaca nʼekubba era oikendi nandi nʼatoonya okumala emyanka misatu nʼemyeri mukaaga, enzala nebba mpitiriri omu kyalo kyonakyona.
42004026	Neye Eriya tibamutumire eeri kadi moiza kwibo, wazira bamutumire wa namwandu omu kyalo kyʼe Zerifaasi omu omwitwale lyʼe Sidoni.
42004027	Era omu mirembe gyʼErisa onaabbi, wabbairewo abagenge bangi omwIsirairi, neye tiwabbairewo kadi moiza kwibo ogubalamirye, wazira oNamani yenkani owʼomu kyalo kyʼe Siiriya.”
42004028	Abantu bonabona ababbaire omwikumbaaniro owebawuliire ebyo, ni banyiiga,
42004029	ni basetuka, ni bamwindikiaga era ni bamubuluca e nza wʼekibuga, ni bamutwala oku mugo gwʼakasozi oku bombekere ekibuga kyabwe kaisi beezye okumudyaka ansi eedi.
42004030	Neye oYesu nʼabeeteeresya kaisi nʼababitamu akati ni yeeyabira.
42004031	Awo oYesu nʼayaba omu kibuga e Kaperenawumu, ekiri omu kitundu kyʼe Galiraaya. Era oku Saabbaato nʼayaba omwikumbaaniro okwegesya abantu.
42004032	Abantu ni beewunya ino engeri egyayegesyamu olwakubba yayegeserye nʼobwezye.
42004033	Omwikumbaaniro oomwo mwabbairemu omuntu eyabbaireku omuzimu, nʼaceera ngʼakoba ati,
42004034	“Otubbaire niki iwe Yesu owʼe Naazaleesi? Oizire kutujigirica? Nkumaite. Niiwe oMweru oyo azwa egiri oKibbumba.”
42004035	Neye oYesu nʼagukaawuukira ati, “Osirike mangu, nʼomuntu onu omuzweku.” Omuzimu ni gukubbirawo omuntu oyo omu bantu awo kaisi ni gumuzwaku nga mpaawo kabbikabbi konakona akegumukolere.
42004036	Era bonabona ababbairewo ni bawuninkirira, ni beebuulyangana bati, “Ekibonokye kyʼengeriki? Obona emizimu agiragira-bulagiri na bwezye ni gizwa oku bantu!”
42004037	Olwo amawuliro agakwata oku Yesu ni gasaalaana wonawona omu kitundu ekyo.
42004038	Awo oYesu nʼazwa omwikumbaaniro, nʼayaba omu nyumba ya Simooni omoiza oku beegibe. Omu kiseera ekyo omaaye wa muka Simooni yabbairewo ngʼomusuuja gumuluma ino. Kale abʼomu kisito ekyo ni beegairira oYesu amulamye.
42004039	OYesu nʼayaba nʼakotama egiri omulwaire, nʼakaawuukira omusuuja era omusuuja ni gulamirawo. Amangu ago omukali oyo eyabbaire omulwaire nʼasetukirawo, era nʼatandiika nʼokubainula.
42004040	Eisana nga ligwire, abantu bonabona ababbaire nʼabalwaire abʼendwaire egya buli ngeri, ni babaleeta egiri oYesu, nʼakwata ku buli mulwaire nʼamulamya.
42004041	Era emizimu gyonagyona ni gizwa oku bantu bangi, ni gyaba nga giwolooga giti, “Iwe niiwe oMwana wa Kibbumba!” Neye oYesu nʼagikaawuukira, nandi nʼagiganya okutumula, olwakubba gyabbaire gimumaite giti niiye oKurisito oKibbumba oguyasukireku amafuta.
42004042	Obwire owebwaceire, oYesu nʼayaba omu kifo ekinambulamu bantu. Abantu bangi ni bamunoonia paka owebamuboine, era ni bagezyaku okumugaana okubazwaku.
42004043	Neye iye nʼabakoba ati, “Nteekwa okulaabba aMawuliro aMasa agakwata oku bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba nʼomu bibuga ebindi byona olwakubba bantumire lwʼensonga eyo.”
42004044	Awo nʼayaba ngʼalaabba omu makumbaaniro agʼomu Buyudaaya.
42005001	Lumo, oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼayemereire oku mbale mbale kwʼenyanza oGenesareeti, abantu bangi ni baiza nga basindikangana, beezye okutuuka egiyabbaire bawulire ekibono kya Kibbumba.
42005002	OYesu nʼabona amaato mabiri nga gali aawo oku mbale mbale omu maizi, ngʼabavubi bagazwiremu era nga baanika obutimba bwabwe.
42005003	Awo nʼaniina omu limo oku maato ago nga niiryo eryabbaire erya Simooni, nʼamusaba aliigereryekuuyo butyayi buti omu nyanza okuzwa oku mugo gwʼenyanza. Awo oYesu ngʼatyaime omu lyato linu, nʼayegesya abantu abo ababbaire awo.
42005004	Oweyamaliriirye okutumula, nʼakoba oSimooni ati, “Oyongereyo eryato omu lwabi, era mutege obutimba bwanywe mukwate enyanyi.”
42005005	OSimooni nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, ekiire kyonakyona twakalabaine neye ni tutakwatisyayo kantu konakona. Neye olwakubba niiwe okobere, kale oleke tutege obutimba.”
42005006	Awo owebategere obutimba, ni bakwatisya enyanyi mpitiriri ino, era obutimba bwabwe ni bubba ooti bwatiikamu.
42005007	Ni basimiryaku abanaabwe ababbaire omu lyato erindi, baize bababbeereku. Era abanaabwe ni baiza, ni baizulya amaato gonagona amabiri enyanyi, nʼamaato ni gatandiika okweinika.
42005008	OSimooni ogubeetanga bati Peetero oweyaboine ekyo, nʼakoma amazwi abigere bya Yesu, nʼakoba ati, “Ondeke Musengwa olwakubba nze njizwire bibbibibbi!”
42005009	OPeetero yakobere atyo olwakubba iye nʼabainaye bonabona abeyabbaire nabo, babbaire ngʼentiisya ebakwaite olwʼobungi bwʼenyanyi egibakwaite.
42005010	Era oYaakobbo nʼoYokaana, abataane ba Zebedaayo, ababbaire nʼoSimooni bona ni batya ino. Awo oYesu nʼakoba oSimooni ati, “Tiwaatya, okuzwa atyanu, oyaba kunnooneryanga bantu ngʼobasuuca beegi bange.”
42005011	Owebairirye amaato gaabwe oku mugo gwʼenyanza, ebyo ni babizwaku, ni baaba nʼoYesu.
42005012	Lwabbaire lumo, oYesu ngʼali omu kimo oku bibuga byʼe Galiraaya, ni waizawo omusaiza ngʼomubiri gwonagwona gwizwire bigenge. Oweyaboine oYesu, nʼakotama oku mazwige, nʼamwegairira ati, “Musengwa, mmaite nti owoobba ngʼotakire oyezya okundamya ni nnongooka.”
42005013	OYesu nʼagolola engalo nʼamukwataku, nʼamukoba ati, “Ntaka, era olame.” Amangu ago ebigenge ni bimuwaaku.
42005014	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Ekyo tokikoberaku omuntu kadi moiza, wazira oyabe weeyanjule e wa kabona, era ngʼoMusa oweyalagiire, oweeyo nʼekyokuwaayo kaisi bakakase bati olamire.”
42005015	Neye amawuliro agakwata oku Yesu ni geyongera-bweyongeri kusaalaana, era ekyazwiremu abantu bangi ino ni bakumbaananga okumuwulisisya, era nʼokubalamya endwaire gyabwe.
42005016	Wazira emirundi egimo oYesu yazwangawo, nʼayaba omu bifo ebinambulamu bantu, nʼasaba oKibbumba.
42005017	Lumo, oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼayegesya, aBafalisaayo nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa bona babbairewo nga batyaime awo. Babbaire bazwire omu byalo byonabyona ebyʼe Galiraaya nʼebyʼe Buyudaaya era nʼomu kibuga e Yerusaalemi. Amaani ga Kibbumba gabbaire nʼoYesu, ni gamwezyesyanga okulamya nʼabalwaire.
42005018	Awo ni waizawo abasaiza abaleetere omusaiza asanyalaire, nga bamugingiire oku mukeeka, ni bagezyaku okumwingirya bamuteeke egiri oYesu.
42005019	Olwʼekiziima kyʼabantu, ni bakayaku egibamubitya okumwingirya neye ni baniina e ngulu oku kisooto kyʼenyumba, ni babiikulaku ekitundu, ni bamubitya omwibbanga eeryo ngʼali oku mukeeka, ni bamwica omu bantu akati paka giri Yesu.
42005020	OYesu oweyaboine okwikirirya kwabwe, nʼakoba asanyalaire ati, “Mwana wange, nkusoniyire ebikolebyo ebibbibibbi.”
42005021	Awo abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo ni batandiika okwebuulyangana bati, “Onu niiye naani atumula omu ngeri ezumirira oKibbumba? Naani ali nʼobwezye okusoniya ebikole ebibbibibbi okutoolaku oKibbumba?”
42005022	OYesu oweyamanyicirye ebiseego byabwe, nʼababuulya ati, “Lwaki mwebuulya omu myoyo gyanywe?
42005023	Ekikiraku owangu niikyo ekiriina, kukoba nti ‘Nkusoniyire ebikolebyo ebibbibibbi,’ ooba nti, ‘Osetuke era otambule?’
42005024	Aale atyanu oleke mbalage nti oMwana wa Muntu ali nʼobwezye okusoniya ebikole ebibbibibbi oku kyalo kunu.” Era awo nʼakoba omusaiza eyabbaire asanyalaire ati, “Osetuke, oginge omukeekagwo, okange e ika.”
42005025	Amangu ago omusaiza nʼayemerera, bonabona nga babona, nʼaginga omukeeka ogubamuleeteireku, nʼakanga e wuwe ngʼawuuja oKibbumba.
42005026	Bonabona ababoine ekyo beewunyire, ni bawuuja oKibbumba, era entiisya nʼebakwata, ni bakoba bati, “Olwatyanu tuboine ebyewunyo!”
42005027	Ebyo owebyawoire, oYesu nʼazwa omu kifo ekyo, era oweyabbaire ngʼatambula nʼabona omusolooji wa musolo ogubeeta oLeevi, ngʼatyaime omu yaafeesi ya musolo. OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Oize otambulenge na nze.”
42005028	OLeevi yena nʼasetukiramu, nʼabizwaku era nʼayaba naye.
42005029	Era oLeevi nʼasumbira oYesu embaga enene omu kisitokye. Abasolooji ba musolo bangi ino era nʼabantu abandi abakola ebibbibibbi ni batyama okulya aamo nʼoYesu nʼabeegibe.
42005030	ABafalisaayo nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa abʼomu kibbula kyabwe ni beezuluguma nga bakoba abeegi ba Yesu bati, “Lwaki muliira aamo era ni munywera aamo nʼabasolooji ba musolo nʼabakola ebibbibibbi?”
42005031	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Aboomi tibeetaaga omusawo, wazira abalwaire.
42005032	Abatuukirirye tiniibo abenaizire okweta beenenye, wazira abakola ebibbibibbi.”
42005033	Awo abantu abamo ni bakoba oYesu bati, “Abeegi ba Yokaana batira okusiiba era nʼokusaba oKibbumba, nʼabeegi bʼaBafalisaayo bona niiye owebakola, neye ababo tibasiiba era beeriira buli lunaku.”
42005034	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mwezya okukoba abageni abeete oku mbaga yʼobugole okusiiba, ngʼomugole omusaiza akaali ali nabo?
42005035	Neye ekiseera kyalituuka ni babatoolaku omugole oyo, kaisi oolwo ni basiiba omu biseera ebyo.”
42005036	Era nʼabagerera olugero ati, “Omuntu tasala ekiraaka oku kizwalo ekiyaaka nʼakikubbira omu kizwalo ekikaire. Singa akola atyo, ekizwalo ekiyaaka akiteekamu ekituli, tete nʼekizwalo ekikaire nandi ni kiwoomeramu ekiraaka ekiyaaka.
42005037	Era omwenge ogwʼemizabbibbu omuyo tibagusuka omu nsawo eyʼeidiba erikaire. Singa ekyo bakikola, gunyiira ensawo era nʼofiirwa omwenge ogwo nʼensawo yaaku.
42005038	Wazira omwenge ogwʼemizabbibbu omuyo, bagusuka mu nsawo yaagwo eyʼeidiba eriyaaka.
42005039	Nʼekindi, omuntu analiriire okunywa omwenge gwʼemizabbibbu omuwolu, tataka okunywa omuyo, olwakubba akoba ati, ‘Omuwolu niigwo ogukiraku okuwooma.’ ”
42006001	Awo olwatuukire oku Saabbaato, oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼabita omu kasinde akabbaire omu musiri gwʼengaano, abeegibe ni bawululaku ebigala byʼengaano, kaisi ni ba giirirya omu bigalabaayo byabwe, era ni balya empeke gyamu.
42006002	ABafalisaayo abamo ni bababuulya bati, “Lwaki abeegibo bakolere omulimo, ekintu aMateeka ga Musa ekigagaana oku Saabbaato?”
42006003	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Inywe timusomangaku omu Biwandiike kwekyo okabaka oDawudi nʼabeyabbaire nabo ekibakolere enzala oweyabalumire?
42006004	ODawudi yaingiire omu nyumba ya Kibbumba, nʼatoola era nʼalyaku emigaati egibabbaire bawongere eeri oKibbumba, era nʼawaaku nʼabeyabbaire nabo, aate ngʼaMateeka ga Musa gabbaire tigaikirirya abantu abandi okulyaku emigaati egyo, okutoolaku abakabona bonkani.”
42006005	Awo oYesu nʼakoba aBafalisaayo ati, “ OMwana wa Muntu ali nʼobwezye okusalawo abantu ekibasaaniire okukola oku Saabbaato.”
42006006	Awo oku Saabbaato olundi, oYesu nʼayaba omwikumbaaniro okwegesya. Omwikumbaaniro oomwo mwabbairemu omuntu owʼengalo endiiro eyanyolere.
42006007	Abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo ni bamwekalikica babone ooba nga yalamya omuntu oyo oku Saabbaato kaisi basunire okwo ekyʼokumuwaabira.
42006008	OYesu iye yamanyicirye ebiseego byabwe, neye era nʼakoba omuntu nago owʼengalo eyanyolere ati, “Osetuke oyemerere abantu bonabona egibeezya okukubonera.” Era omusaiza onu nʼasetuka nʼayemerera.
42006009	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Ndi nʼekibuulyo ekimbabuulya. Niki amateeka ekigaikirirya okukola oku Saabbaato? Kukola busa ooba bubbibubbi? Kulamya bwomi, ooba kubujigirica?”
42006010	Awo nʼabeeruguulyamu bonabona amaiso, kaisi nʼakoba omuntu oyo ati, “Waama iswe ogolole engaloyo.” Era nʼagigolola, era nʼeramirawo!
42006011	Neye abalabe ba Yesu ni baizula obusungu, era ni beebuulyangana ekibakola oYesu.
42006012	Lwabbaire lumo omunaku egyo, oYesu nʼayaba oku lusozi okusaba oKibbumba, era nʼamala ekiire kyonakyona ngʼasaba.
42006013	Obwire owebwaceire, yayetere abeegibe. Omu beegi abo nʼalondamu eikumi na babiri, era nʼabeeta batume, nga niibo banu:
42006014	OSimooni, oguyawaire erya Peetero, nʼAndereya omuganda wa Peetero nago, nʼoYaakobbo, nʼoYokaana, nʼoFiripo, nʼoBbantulumaayo,
42006015	nʼoMatayo, nʼoTomasi, nʼoYaakobbo omutaane wʼAlufaayo, nʼoSimooni ogubeetanga oMulwaniriri wa kwefuga kwʼeigwangalye,
42006016	nʼoYuda omutaane wa Yaakobbo, nʼoYuda oIsikalyoti, eyamuliiremu olukwe.
42006017	Awo oYesu nʼaserengeta nʼabatume abo, kaisi nʼayaba nʼayemerera omu kifo ekitereeri, era omu kifo ekyo wabbaire wakumbaaniirewo abeegibe bangi aamo nʼekiziima kyʼabantu abandi. Abantu abo babbaire bazwire omu kyalo kyʼe Buyudaaya mwonamwona nʼomu kibuga e Yerusaalemi, era nʼomu kitundu ekyʼoku mbale mbale kwʼenyanza, ekirimu ebibuga oTiiro nʼoSidoni.
42006018	Abantu abo bonabona babbaire baizire okuwulisisya oYesu era nʼokubalamya endwaire gyabwe. Era abo ababbaire bakaanya emizimu, oYesu nʼabalamya.
42006019	Buli muntu yagezyeryeku okumukwataku olwakubba obwezye wamuzwangamu era ni bubalamyanga bonabona.
42006020	Awo oYesu nʼaira oku beegibe, kaisi nʼabakoba ati: “Muli bʼenkabi inywe abadoobi, olwakubba obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba bwanywe.
42006021	Muli bʼenkabi inywe enzala abeeruma atyanu, olwakubba balibaikutya. “Muli bʼenkabi inywe abali omu maliga atyanu, olwakubba mwalisangaala.
42006022	“Muli bʼenkabi singa abantu owebabacaawanga, era owebabagudyanga, era owebabazumanga, era owebabeetanga okubba abakola ebibbibibbi, nga babalanga oMwana wa Muntu.
42006023	“Musangaalenge nga bababitirye batyo, era mujuukejuukenge olwʼeisangaalo, olwakubba oKibbumba yalibawa empeera eyʼamaani omwigulu. Ibo bababitya batyo, era ngʼabazeiza baabwe owebabitirye abanaabbi.
42006024	“Wobe! Ala inywe abasuni, nga mwalaba! Ekyo kityo olwakubba inywe mumalire okusuna eisangaalo eryanywe.
42006025	“Wobe! Ala inywe omwikutire, nga mwalaba! Ekyo kityo olwakubba inywe enzala yalibaluma. “Wobe! Ala inywe abaseka atyanu, nga mwalaba! Ekyo kityo olwakubba inywe enima yalibakwata era mwalikunga.
42006026	“Wobe! Ala inywe nga mwalaba, singa abantu owebabawuujanga! Ekyo kityo olwakubba nʼabazeiza bʼabantu abo ibo batyo niiye owebawuujanga abanaabbi abʼobubbeyi.”
42006027	“Neye inywe abampulisisya mbakoba nti mutakenge abalabe baanywe, era abo ababacaawa mubakolerenge ebintu ebisa.
42006028	Musabirenge enkabi abo ababalaama. Nʼabo ababazuma mubasabirenge enkabi egiri oKibbumba.
42006029	Omuntu owakukubbanga okwitama, omucuusiranga nʼerindi lidi lyona nʼakubba. Era omuntu owakutoolangaku ekizibaawokyo, omulekeranga nʼesaatiyo yona nʼatwala.
42006030	Buli abbaaku nʼekyʼakusaba omuwanga, era owebakutoolangaku ebibyo, tosabanga okubikwirirya.
42006031	Mukolerenge abantu ebintu ebyo nywena ebimutaka abandi babakolere.
42006032	“Singa owemutaka baabo ababataka bonkani, mubba mukolere niki awo ekibasiimisya? Nʼababbibabbi bona bataka baabo bonkani ababataka!
42006033	Era singa owemukolera ebisa bantu abo bonkani ababakolera ebisa, mubba mukolere niki awo ekibasiimisya? Mbona nti nʼababbibabbi bona bakola batyo!
42006034	Era singa owemukoopa baabo bonkani abemusuubira okubasasula, mubba mukolere niki awo ekibasiimisya? Nʼababbibabbi bona bakoopa babbibabbi banaabwe, nga babasuubira okubasasula mu bwizulye ekibabekoopereku.
42006035	Neye inywe mutakenge abalabe baanywe, era mubakolerenge ebisa. Mukoopenge nga timufiireyo ooba tibabasasule. Olwo kaisi empeera yaanywe ebbe nene, era mubbe baana ba Kibbumba oNambulaku aMwagaagana, olwakubba iye wʼekisa eri abatasiima nʼababbibabbi.
42006036	Muli nʼokubba bʼekisa ngʼoItewaanywe aali omwigulu.”
42006037	“Timusaliranga abantu emisango, kaisi nywena mulame oKibbumba okubasalira. Timusaliranga abantu emisango okubasinga, kaisi nywena oKibbumba tiyabasingisya. Singa owemwasoniyanga abantu, nywena oKibbumba yabasoniyanga.
42006038	Owemwagabanga, nywena mwalisuna. Ebimwalisuna balibapimira omu kipimo ekituuce ekibasiinyire, kaisi ni bakitengeetyamu, era ni kiizulira nakimo nʼomutwe. Kale ekipimo ekimukolesya okupimira abantu, era niikyo ekibalikolesya okubapimira nywena.”
42006039	Awo oYesu nʼabagerera olugero lunu ati, “Omwofu takubbembera omwofu omwinaye. Singa amwekubbembera, bonabona bagwa omu kiina.
42006040	Ogubeegesya takiraku amwegesya, wazira buli ogubeegesya owaamala okwega nakusani, abba ooti yoodi amwegeserye.
42006041	“Era lwaki ofaayo oku kasubi akali oku liiso lya mugandawo, kaisi nandi nʼofaayo oku gusubi oguli oku liisolyo?
42006042	Oyezya otya okukoba omugandawo oti, ‘Muganda wange, oleke nkutooleku akasubi oku liisolyo,’ kaisi nga iwe onyere tofaayo oku gusubi oguli oku liiso eriryo? Iwe omunanfunsi, osooke kutoola gusubi oguli oku liiso eriryo, kaisi oyezye okubona nakusani okutoola akasubi akali oku liiso lya mugandawo.
42006043	“Omusaale omusa tiguneneka ebineneka ebibbibibbi, nʼomusaale omubbimubbi tiguneneka ebineneka ebisa.
42006044	Buli musaale bagutegeerera ku bineneka byagwo. Ebineneka byʼomutiini tibabinokola oku namuswata, nʼebineneka byʼemizabbibbu tibabinokola oku mukamirya.
42006045	Omuntu omusa, atoola ku bisa ebiri omu mwoyogwe okukola ebisa, nʼomuntu akola ebikole ebibbibibbi, atoola ku bibbibibbi ebiri omu mwoyogwe, okukola ebikole ebibbibibbi. Ebintu ebibba omu mwoyo gwa muntu, omunwagwe niibyo ebigutumula.
42006046	“Lwaki munjeta muti, ‘Musengwa, Musengwa,’ kaisi ni mutakola ebimbakoba?
42006047	Oleke mbalage omuntu ngʼowaafaanana, iye oyo buli aiza egyendi, kaisi nʼawulisisya ebibono byange, era nʼabikoleraku.
42006048	Omuntu oyo afaanana ooti yoodi eyayombekere enyumba ngʼakuuliire nakimo omusingi mwabiriri, era ni gwabira nakimo ansi paka kwibbaale. Kaisi ogwikendi ogunene owegwatoonyere, nʼamaizi gaizula nabuli wantu, era nʼomukula ni gubandya okuteeba enyumba eyo, neye ni guteezya kuginyeenya, olwakubba bagyombekere kusani.
42006049	Wazira oodi awulira ebibono byange nandi nʼabikoleraku, ali ooti muntu eyayombekere enyumba okwitakali eryʼoku ngulu nga takwire kadi musingi. Kaisi oikendi oweyatoonyere, nʼalandirya omukula okugiteeba, kale awo nʼegwa era nʼeweera okwitakali.”
42007001	OYesu oweyamalire okwegesya abantu ababbairewo, nʼayaba omu kibuga e Kaperenawumu.
42007002	Wabbaireyo oMulooma omukulu wʼekibinja kyʼabaisulukale 100, eyabbaire nʼomugalamawe oguyabbaire ataka eino. Omugalama oyo yabbaire mulwaire, ngʼali kumpi nʼokufa.
42007003	Omukulu wʼekibinja kyʼabaisulukale oweyawuliire ebikwata oku Yesu, nʼamutumira abamo oku Bayudaaya abakulu, ngʼamusaba aize alamye omugalamawe.
42007004	Bona owebatuukire egiri oYesu, ni bamwegairira ino nga bakoba bati, “Singa owewabba nga waliwo ogwoli nʼokubbeeraku, kale omusaiza oodi awoomera okumukolera ekyʼakusaba,
42007005	olwakubba ataka abantu bʼeigwanga lya iswe, era yatwombekeire nʼerimo oku makumbaaniro gaiswe.”
42007006	Awo oYesu nʼayaba nabo. Neye owebabbaire nga bali kumpi okutuuka egibabbaire baaba, omukulu wʼekibinja oyo nago nʼatuma abakaagwabe okukoba oYesu bati, “Musengwa, oleke nʼokweteganya, olwakubba tinsaanira iwe okwingira omu nyumba yange.
42007007	Era tinsaanira kadi kwiza egyoli okukusangaana. Kale okobere ananyere awo kibono-bubono, era nʼomugalama wange yalama.
42007008	Nze zena ndi muntu aali nʼabasengwa bange abanfuga, era ngʼowendi nʼabaisulukale abentwala. Owenkoba onu nti, ‘Oyabe,’ era ayaba; nʼogondi nti, ‘Oize,’ era aiza; nʼomugalama wange nti, ‘Okole kinu,’ era akikola.”
42007009	OYesu oweyawuliire ebyo, nʼamwewunya, kaisi nʼaira oku kiyindi kyʼabantu ekyabbaire kimusengererya, era nʼakikoba ati, “Mbakoba nti tinjajiryangaku omuntu ali nʼokwikirirya okwʼamaani ngʼookwo, waire kadi mu Baisirairi!”
42007010	Era abakaagwa ba mukulu wa baisulukale owebakangire omu kisito kyʼomukulu oodi nago, ni baajirya ngʼomugalamawe alamire.
42007011	Awo ngʼebyo byankabbaawo, oYesu nʼayaba omu kibuga ekibeeta e Naini nʼabeegibe aamo nʼekiyindi kyʼabantu abandi.
42007012	Oweyabbaire ngʼali kumpi okutuuka oku muzigo gwʼekibuga, ni wazwerayo abantu nga bagingire omulambo gwʼomwisuka nʼabakungi nga bali kusenjaku. Omwisuka oyo yabbaire mwanamoiza wʼomukali onamwandu.
42007013	Awo oMusengwa oYesu oweyaboine onamwandu oyo, nʼamukwatira ekisa, era nʼamukoba ati, “Tiwakunga.”
42007014	Olwo nʼaigerera era nʼakwata oku mukeeka okubabbaire bagingiireku omulambo. Awo ababbaire bagugingire ni beemerera, kaisi oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Mwisuka iwe, nkulagira nti, osetuke.”
42007015	Omwisuka iye oyo eyabbaire afiire nʼasetuka nʼatyama, era nʼatandiika nʼokutumula, awo oYesu nʼamukanjirya omaaye.
42007016	Abantu bonabona ababbairewo, entiisya nʼebakwata era ni bawuuja oKibbumba nga bakoba bati, “ Onaabbi omukulu atubbutukiiremu, era oKibbumba aizire okulokola abantube.”
42007017	Awo amawuliro ago agakwata oku Yesu ni gasaalaana omu Buyudaaya mwonamwona nʼomu kyalo ekiriraine awo.
42007018	Awo abeegi ba Yokaana oMubatizi ni bamukobera ebyo byonabyona ebikwata oku Yesu. OYokaana niiye okwetaku ababiri baaku,
42007019	kaisi nʼabatuma egiri oMusengwa oYesu bamubuulya bati, “Niiwe oKibbumba oguyasuubizire okutuma okwiza okununula abantu, ooba tukuumirire gondi?”
42007020	Abasaiza abo owebatuukire egiri oYesu, ni bamukoba bati, “OYokaana oMubatizi atutumire egyoli ngʼabuulya mbu ati, ‘Niiwe oKibbumba oguyasuubizire okutuma okwiza okununula abantu, ooba tukuumirire gondi?’ ”
42007021	Nʼoku lunaku oolwo lwona, oYesu nʼalamya abantu bangi endwaire nʼokubabbingaku emizimu, era nʼokwiryawo amaiso ga boofu bangi okubona.
42007022	Awo oYesu nʼairamu abakwenda ba Yokaana ati, “Mukange era mukobere oYokaana ebimuboine nʼebimuwuliire. Ababbaire boofu babona; ababbaire abaleme, batambula; abagenge balama, ababbaire abamasiipe bawulira; abafu bazuukira, nʼabadoobi bona basuna enkabi gyʼokuwulira aMawuliro aMasa.
42007023	Ali nʼenkabi omuntu oyo atambuusabuusamu.”
42007024	Abakwenda ba Yokaana owebazwirewo, oYesu nʼatandiika okubuulya ekiziima kyʼabantu ebikwata oku Yokaana ati, “Owemwabire egiri oYokaana omu kitera, mwasuubiire kubona muntu afaanana atya? Mwamwajiirye ngʼomuntu omugondi ooti lugada olutengeeta nabuli ompunga owaafuwa?
42007025	Ooba nga tikiikyo, mwasuubiire kubona muntu afaanana atya? Muntu azwaire ebizwalo ebyebbeeyi? Kadi tiyabbaire atyo, olwakubba abazwala ebizwalo ebyebbeeyi era ababba omu bwomi obwʼokwetalawusa babba mu bisito bya bakabaka.
42007026	Aale kale mwabire okubona oYokaana olwakubba yabbaire naabbi? Ekinanyerenyeere nabakobera nʼokubakobera nti yabbaire akiraku okubba naabbi.
42007027	OYokaana oyo, niiye eBiwandiike ogubitumulaku biti: “ ‘Aale obone, ntuma omukwenda wange akwekubbembere, okukwewulirya enzira egyoyaba.’
42007028	Mbakoba nti kasookeede abantu babba oku kyalo kunu, mpaawo muntu akira oYokaana ekitiisya. Neye Iye oKibbumba abala oyo amusemberya omu bwomibwe, waire nga niiye abantu ogubanyooma omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba, okubba akira oYokaana oyo ekitiisya ekyalimu.”
42007029	Abantu bonabona ngʼogaitireku nʼabasolooji ba musolo owebawulisisirye ebibono ebyo, ni bakakasa amazima ga Kibbumba olwakubba oYokaana yabbaire ababatizire.
42007030	Neye aBafalisaayo nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa ibo babbaire bamalire okugaana entegeka ya Kibbumba egibali, olwakubba babbaire bagaine oYokaana okubabatiza.
42007031	OYesu nʼayongera okukoba ababbaire bamuwulisisya ati, “Abantu abʼomulembe gunu nʼabagerya kuuki? Bafaanana naaki?
42007032	Bafaanana ooti baana abatobato, abazeenya omuzeenyo omu kisaawe abantu okubabona. Batyo nga beezulugumira abanaabwe bati ‘Twabafuwiire emirere omu wembo obusa, neye nandi mubina; kale ni twemba enyembo gyʼenima neye nandi mukunga.’
42007033	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oYokaana oMubatizi yabbaire talya waire kunywa nviinyo, mwakobere muti, ‘Aliku omuzimu!’
42007034	Tete zena oMwana wa Muntu ndya ebyokulya era nnywa enviinyo era munkoba muti, ‘Omuntu oyo wa gukobbo, era muteemeere, kaisi mukaagwa wa basolooji ba musolo nʼabakola ebibbibibbi.’
42007035	Neye abantu abo bonabona abakolera oku malabuki ga Kibbumba, bakakasa bati matuuce.”
42007036	Lumo omoiza oku Bafalisaayo yayetere oYesu e ika e wuwe oku kiinulo, kale oYesu yena nʼaikirirya okwabayo, era nʼaingira omu nyumba okulya.
42007037	Omu kibuga ekyo mwabbairemu omukali akola ebibbibibbi. Kale oweyamanyicirye ati oYesu ali kulya omu nyumba yʼoMufalisaayo, nʼatwala ecupa erimu okalifuwa owakaloosa,
42007038	nʼatuuka nʼayemerera enyuma okumpi nʼebigere bya Yesu nga waakunga, oluzwanyuma nʼakoma awo amazwi. Amaliga ga mukali oyo gamagalikiire oku bigere bya Yesu, kaisi nʼabisiimuula nʼenziiri egyʼoku mutwegwe. Era yadeebereire nʼokubinuuna, nʼokubisukaku okalifuwa owakaloosa.
42007039	OMufalisaayo oodi eyabbaire acaazire oYesu oweyaboine omukali oyo ekiyabbaire akola, nʼakoba omu mwoyogwe ati, “Singa omusaiza onu abbaire naabbi, yandimanyicirye omukali oyo amukwataku atyo ati akola ebibbibibbi.”
42007040	Awo oYesu nʼabbutula ebiseego byʼoMufalisaayo ngʼamukoba ati, “Simooni, ndi nʼekinkukoba.” Kaisi iye nʼakoba ati, “ Musomesya, okobe.”
42007041	OYesu niiye okumugerera olugero lunu ati, “Wabbairewo abantu babiri, omukoopi wʼempiiya ngʼababanza. Omoiza babbaire bamubanza edinaali 500, kaisi ogondi edinaali 50.
42007042	Owebakayire okusasula, bonabona nʼabasoniya. Aale iwe obona oti naani kwibo eyakirireku okumutaka oluzwanyuma?”
42007043	OSimooni nʼairamu ati, “Nseega nti oyo oguyasoniyire eibbanja erikira obunene.” OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Ogusalire kusani.”
42007044	Awo oYesu nʼalola oku mukali, kaisi nʼakoba oSimooni ati, “Obona omukali onu? Owenyingiire omu nyumbayo, tompaireku amaizi gʼokunaaba ebigere, neye onu adoderye ebigere byange nʼamaligage, era nʼabisiimuula nʼokubisiimuula nʼenziirigye.
42007045	Iwe tongwireku omu kifubba, neye onu iye okuzwera nakimo Owenyingiire omu nyumba munu, akaali okulekeraawo okunuuna ebigere byange.
42007046	Iwe tonsiigireku okalifuwa omu mutwe, neye onu iye asiigire ebigere byange okalifuwa owakaloosa.
42007047	Nʼolwekyo nkukobera nti bamusoniyire ebibbibibbibye ebingi, olwakubba ali nʼokutaka kunene. Kaisi era ogubasoniya ebitono, yena abba nʼokutaka kwona kutono.”
42007048	Awo oYesu nʼakoba omukali nago ati, “Nkusoniyire ebibbibibbibyo.”
42007049	Ababbaire batyaime awo nʼoYesu nga balya ni batandiika okwebuulyangana bati, “Naani onu iye ayezya nʼokusoniya abantu ebibbibibbi?”
42007050	Awo oYesu nʼakoba omukali nago ati, “Olamire olwʼokwikiriryakwo, era weeyabire idembe.”
42008001	OYesu nga yankazwa omukucaala okwo, nʼatambula olugendo ngʼabita omu bibuga nʼomu byalo, ngʼalaabba eeri abantu aMawuliro aMasa agakwata oku bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba. Omu lugendo oolwo oYesu yabbaire nʼabeegibe eikumi na babiri,
42008002	era nʼabakali. Neye abakali abo nago ibo oYesu yabbaire amalire okubalamya endwaire era nʼokubabbingaku emizimu, era nga niibo banu: OMalyamu ogubeetanga oMangadaleena iye oguyabbingireku emizimu omusanvu,
42008003	nʼoYowani omuka mukwati wʼensawo wa Kerode ogubeetanga bati Kuuza, nʼoSusaana era nʼabakali abandi bangi. Abakali abo batoolanga oku byabwe okubbeera oYesu nʼabeegibe.
42008004	Omu kiseera ekinyere ekyo ekiziima kyʼabantu kinene era ngʼabantu bazwa mu buli kibuga ni bakumbaanira egiri oYesu, kaisi nʼabagerera olugero lunu ati,
42008005	“Wabbairewo omulimi eyaabire okusiga ensigogye. Oweyabbaire ngʼasiga, egimo gyagwire ku nzira, kaisi ni bagyemyaga era enyonyi ni gigirya.
42008006	Era ensigo egindi ni gigwa okwitakali eryʼokwibbaale. Neye owegyamerere, ni gikala olwakubba eitakali eeryo lyabbaire likalu.
42008007	Ensigo egindi ni gigwa mwitakali eryabbairemu amawa, kaisi ni gakulira aamo nʼensigo egyo, kale amawa ago ni gagiita.
42008008	Nʼegindi ni gigwa omwitakali erisa, kale ni gikula, era nabuli nsigo omoiza nʼabala ensigo egindi 100.” OYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼatumula maaminkirira ati, “Aale omuntu aliku amatwi agawulira, awulisisye era ategeere ekintumula.”
42008009	Awo abeegi ba Yesu ni bamubuulya amakulu gʼolugero oolwo.
42008010	Kale iye nʼabairamu ati, “Inywe mwasunire enkabi egyʼokumanya ebyama ebikwata oku bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba, neye abantu abandi ibo mbakobera mu ngero, kaisi eBiwandiike binu ebiti bituukirire: “ ‘Newankubbaire babonia neye nga tibeezya kumanyica; newankubbaire bawulisisya neye nga tibategeera ebintumula.’
42008011	“Amakulu gʼolugero oolwo niigo gaanu: Ensigo, niikyo ekibono kya Kibbumba.
42008012	Ensigo egyagwire oku nzira, niibo abantu abawulira ekibono kya Kibbumba, neye oSitaani nʼaiza nʼakitoola omu myoyo gyabwe, kaisi ni bakaya okwikirirya era nʼokulokoka.
42008013	Kaisi ensigo egyagwire omwitakali eryʼokwibbaale, niibo abantu abawulira ekibono kya Kibbumba era ni bakyaniriza nʼeisangaalo, neye ni babba ooti bimera ebidamba emiri egyabirira nakimo ansi omwitakali. Ibo baikirirya ekibono kya Kibbumba okumala ekiseera kityayi kiti, kaisi omu kiseera ekyokubakema ni bakizwaku.
42008014	Igyo egyo egyagwire omwitakali eryamereremu amawa, niibo abantu abawulira ekibono kya Kibbumba, neye okweraliikirira ebintu byʼe kyalo, nʼokubabbeyabbeya nʼebyobusuni nʼamasanyu gʼekyalo kinu, ni byaba nga bibamalamu amaani, owebifuga emyoyo gyabwe bibakaisya okukula omu bwomi bwabwe obwʼomwoyo.
42008015	Neye ensigo egyo egyagwire omwitakali erisa, niibo abantu abawulira ekibono kya Kibbumba nʼomwoyo omusa nakimo, kaisi ni bakikuuma era ni beekalangula okukolanga ebikole ebisa.”
42008016	“Omuntu takwatisya eitaala kaisi nʼalifuunikaku ekiibo, ooba nʼaliteeka omu mantalike, wazira aliteeka ku kikondo, kaisi abantu abaingira ni beezya okubona ekitangaala.
42008017	Ekyo kityo olwakubba buli kintu ekikukuulirirye balikitoolayo, era buli kyama kyalibbutuka.
42008018	Kale muwulisisye nʼokwekalikica ebinjegesya. Mbakobera nti buli aali nabyo balimwongeraku nʼebindi, kaisi oyo abula, balimutoolaku nʼakatyayi kadi akebalibba bamuwaire.”
42008019	Awo abaganda ba Yesu nʼomaaye ni baaba nga bataka okumubona, neye ni bateezya okumutuukaku olwʼekiziima kyʼabantu.
42008020	Awo omuntu nʼakobera oYesu ati, “Omaawo nʼabagandabo bali e nza, era bataka okukubona.”
42008021	Neye iye oYesu nʼairamu ati, “Omama nʼabaganda bange niibo abo abawulira ekibono kya Kibbumba era ni bakikoleraku.”
42008022	Lwabbaire lumo, oYesu nʼabeegibe ni baniina omu lyato, kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Tusalemu awo twabe oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza.” Era ni basimbuka ni baaba.
42008023	Owebabbaire baaba, oYesu endoolo ni gimutwala. Awo, ogumpunga ogwʼamaani nga gulikuumu nʼoikendi ni gwiza, era eryato ni libba ooti lyaizula amaizi, era ibo bonabona ababbaire omu lyato ni babba mu kabbikabbi akananyerenyeere.
