42020001	Lwabbaire lumo, oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼayegesya omu Yeekaalu, era ngʼabakobera aMawuliro aMasa, abakabona abakulu nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, aamo nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, ni baaba egyali.
42020002	Kale awo ni bamubuulya bati, “Otukobere, oli na bwezyeki okukola ebintu ebyo ebyokola? Era naani eyakuwaire obwezye obwo?”
42020003	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Zena oleke mbabuulye ekibuulyo. Munkobere,
42020004	naani eyatumire oYokaana okubatiza, Kibbumba ooba bantu?”
42020005	Awo ni beegeyamu bati, “Singa tumwiramu tuti Kibbumba niiye eyamutumire, ayaba okutubuulya ati, ‘Kaisi lwaki oYokaana iye timwamwikiririiryemu?’
42020006	Neye singa tumwiramu tuti abantu niibo abamutumire, abantu bonabona batukubba amabbaale olwakubba baikirirya nakimo bati oYokaana yabbaire naabbi.”
42020007	Kale ni bairamu bati, “Titumaite eyamutumire.”
42020008	Awo oYesu yena nʼabakoba ati, “Aale zena tinabakobere obwezye obundinabwo okukola ebintu binu.”
42020009	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera era nʼagerera abantu ababbairewo olugero lunu ati, “Wabbairewo omuntu eyakomere omusiri gwʼemizabbibbu, nʼaguteekamu abapangisya, nʼayaba awantu nʼalwayo.
42020010	Ekiseera ekyʼamakungula owekyatuukire, nʼatuma omugalama eeri abapangisya, bamuweeku ebineneka byʼomusiri gwʼemizabbibbu. Neye ibo bamukubbire-bukubbi, era ni bamubbinga nga tibamuwaireku akantu konakona.
42020011	Kale nʼabasindikira tete omugalama ogondi. Neye oyo yena ni bamukubba, ni bamwemulayemula, era ni bamubbinga nga tibamuwaireku akantu konakona.
42020012	Era tete nʼatuma owokusatu. Nʼoyo yena ni bamutemulatemula, era ni bamutoola omu musiri ni bamumuma eedi.
42020013	“Awo onyere omusiri gwʼemizabbibbu ni yeebuulya ati, ‘Nakola ntya? Njaba okutuma omwana wange omutake, amo bamuwa iye ekitiisya.’
42020014	Neye abapangisya owebamuboine, ni beegeyamu bati, ‘Onu niiye omusika; oleke tumwite, obusika bwalibba bwaiswe.’
42020015	Kale ni bamutoola omu musiri gwʼemizabbibbu ogwo, ni bamutwala ni bamwita. “Kale onyere omusiri ogwo niki ekiyalibakola?
42020016	Yalyaba nʼaita abapangisya abo, kaisi nʼagukwatisya abandi.” Awo abantu ababbairewo owebawuliire ebyo ni bakoba bati, “Kadi singa ekyo tikibbaawo!”
42020017	Neye oYesu nʼabalingirira nakusani, kaisi nʼababuulya ati, “Aale eKiwandiike kinu kibba kitegeeza niki? Ekikoba kiti: ‘Eibbaale abombeki eribagaine, lisuukire niiryo erikulu erisiba ensonda.’ ”
42020018	“Buli muntu agaana enjegesya yange ali ooti muntu agwa okwibbaale eeryo, nʼavunikavunika, era ali ooti yooyo oguligwaku ni limususungula.”
42020019	Awo abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼabakabona abakulu, olwakubba babbaire bamaite bati olugero oolwo oYesu olwagerere, lubbaire lukwata ku niibo, ni banoonia engeri yʼokumukwata omu kaseera akananyere ako neye ni batya abantu.
42020020	Kale awo abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa na bakabona abakulu owebabbaire bakaali bakiiya oYesu okumukwata, ni batuma abakeeti beesuuce ooti bantu abasa, bamukwatisye omu bibono ebyatumula, kaisi bayezye okumuwaayo omu mbuga yʼoweitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya.
42020021	Batyo abakeeti abo ni bamukoba bati, “ Musomesya, tumaite tuti ebyotumula nʼebyoyegesya byʼamazima, era tomomola omu bantu, neye obeegesya mu mazima ebyo oKibbumba ebyataka bakole.
42020022	Atyanu Musengwa, otukobere: Kibba kituuce okuwa oKaisaali omusolo, ooba bbe?”
42020023	Neye oYesu nʼamanyica omutego gwabwe ogubabbaireku, kaisi nʼabakoba ati,
42020024	“Kaade muleete edinaali. Ekifaananyi nʼamaliina ebiriku byani?” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Bya Kaisaali.”
42020025	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Kale ebya Kaisaali mubiwe oKaisaali, nʼebya Kibbumba mubiwe oKibbumba.”
42020026	Batyo abakeeti ni bateezya kumukwatikisya omu kintu kadi kimo oku ebiyatumwire awo omu maiso gʼabantu. Kale ni beewunya ino olwʼekiyabairiremu, era ni basirika.
42020027	Awo aBasedukaayo olwakubba bakoba bati mpaawo kuzuukira, abamo ni baaba egiri oYesu ni bamubuulya bati,
42020028	“Musomesya, oMusa yatuwandikiire ekiragiro kiti omuntu owaafa, nʼaleka onamwandu, neye nga tabyaireku omwana, omuganda wʼomufu ali nʼokufumbirwa onamwandu oyo, kaisi abyalire omugandawe abaana.
42020029	Kale wabbairewo abaganda musanvu. Asooka nʼaleeta omukali, neye nʼafa nga tabyaireku omwana.
42020030	Nʼowokubiri nʼamusika era yena nʼafa nga tamubyairemu omwana.
42020031	Era nʼowokusatu yena atyo. Nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo bonabona omusanvu ni basikaku omukali oyo, era ni bafa nga tibamubyairemu omwana.
42020032	Oluzwanyuma, omukali yena nʼafa.
42020033	Atyanu oolwo oku lunaku olwʼokuzuukira, omukali oyo yalibba mukaani, ngoyo bonabona omusanvu bamufumbiirweku?”
42020034	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Abantu abʼoku kyalo kunu ibo basuna obufumbo.
42020035	Neye abantu abo oKibbumba abaasaniza okubba omwigulu oluzwanyuma lwʼokuzuukira, ibo tibalibba nʼobufumbo.
42020036	Era ibo balibba tibeezya okufa tete olwakubba balibba ooti bamalaika. Era balibba baana ba Kibbumba olwakubba balibba bazuukiire.
42020037	Era nʼoMusa alaga ati abafu bazuukira olwakubba omu kitundu ekitumula oku kisaka, atumula oku Musengwa oKibbumba ati, Kibbumba wa Ibbulaimu, era wa Isaka, era wa Yaakobbo.
42020038	OKibbumba wa bantu ababba aboomi newankubbaire nga bamalire okufa neye tiwa bantu abasigala omu kufa, olwakubba aboomi nʼabafu eeri oKibbumba babba boomi.”
42020039	Abamo oku bakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa ni bairamu bati, “Musomesya, oiriremu kusani.”
42020040	Bakobere batyo olwakubba wabbaire mpaawo eyaguma ni yeeyongera okumubuulya ebibuulyo ebindi.
42020041	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Beezya batya okukoba bati oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta, Mwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi?
42020042	NgʼoDawudi onyere, omu kitabo kya Zabbuli yakobere ati: ‘OMusengwa oKibbumba yakobere oMusengwa wange ati: Otyame ngʼondiraine oku lubba lwange olwʼengalo endiiro,
42020043	paka owenaligondya abalabebo ni mbasuuca mukonkolo gwa kuwuumuliryaku ebigerebyo.’
42020044	“Ooba ngʼoDawudi onyere amweta ‘Musengwawe’ kaisi tete oKurisito ayezya atya okubba mwizukuluwe?”
42020045	Kale awo abantu bonabona nga bawulira, oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati,
42020046	“Mwekuume abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, abataka okutambula nga bazwaire ebizwalo ebyanvuwiriri ebyekuusira ansi, okulaga bati bantu beeru. Era bataka okubasugiryasugirya omu butale nʼokutyama omu bifo ebyʼomu maiso omu makumbaaniro, nʼomu bifo ebyʼabantu abʼekitiisya oku mambaga.
42020047	Era banyaga ebintu byonabyona omu manyumba ga banamwandu, nʼokusaba oKibbumba omu bibono ebingi olwʼokweraga. Abo balisuna ekibonerezo ekikiraku obunene.”
42021001	Awo oYesu ngʼakaali ali omu Yeekaalu, nʼabona abasuni nga bateeka empiiya gyabwe omu kintu kyʼebirabo omu Yeekaalu.
42021002	Awo era nʼabona nʼonamwandu omudoobi yena ngʼateekamu obumpiiya bubiri, obusembayo okubba obwʼebbeeyi entono nakimo.
42021003	Kale nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti onamwandu omudoobi onu iye ateekeremu kinene ino okukiraku abandi badi bonabona.
42021004	Ekyo kityo olwakubba ibo ebirabo byabwe batoire ku busuni obubali nabwo, neye onu iye omu budoobibwe ateekeremu kyonakyona ekyabbaire nakyo ekibbaire kyʼokujejera obwomibwe.”
42021005	Awo abamo oku beegi ba Yesu owebabbaire batumula oku Yeekaalu ngʼowebagyombekere nʼamabbaale amasa, era ngʼowebagitimbire nʼebyokujolija ebigibonekesya nakusani, oYesu nʼakoba ati,
42021006	“Ebyo ebimubona, ekiseera kyalituuka, owewatalibbeerawo eibbaale kadi limo eryalisigala nga lyombeke oku liinaye. Gonagona baaba kugawumpulyagawo.”
42021007	Awo abeegi ba Yesu ni bamubuulya bati, “ Musomesya, ebyo byalibbaawo di? Era kamanyiciryoki akaliraga kati byatira okubbaawo?”
42021008	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mwekuume, tiwaabbaawo abagotesyagotesya; olwakubba bangi baliiza nga beeyeta ninze, era nga bakoba bati, ‘Ekiseera kya Kurisito okwira kiri kumpi okutuuka.’ Timubasengereryanga.
42021009	Owemuwuliranga entalo nʼobwediimo, timutyanga. Ebyo biteekwa okusooka okubbaawo, neye era enkomerero tiyalituukirawo.”
42021010	Era awo ni yeeyongera okubakobera ati, “Eigwanga lyalirumba eigwanga erindi, nʼobwakabaka bwalirumba obwakabaka obundi.
42021011	Walibbaawo omusisi owʼamaani, nʼamanzala nʼokawumpuli omu bitundu bingi. Era walibbaawo nʼebitiisirirya nʼobumanyiciryo obwʼamaani okuzwa omwigulu.
42021012	“Neye ebyo byonabyona nga bikaali okubbaawo, balibakwata era ni babayigaania. Balibawaayo okubawozesya omu makumbaaniro, nʼokubasiba omu mabbuusu. Era balibatwala omu maiso ga bakabaka nʼagʼabafugi olwʼeriina lyange.
42021013	Ekyo kyalibazweramu inywe abeegi bange okubatuucaaku aMawuliro aMasa.
42021014	Neye muli nʼokumanya muti timuli nʼokusooka okweraliikirira ekya kuwozya.
42021015	Ekyo kityo olwakubba nze nalibawa ebibono nʼamalabuki, abalabe baanywe ebibateezya kwakanisya waire okugaana.
42021016	Paka nʼababyaire baanywe nʼabaganda baanywe, nʼabekika kyanywe, nʼemikago gyanywe bona balibalyamu olukwe era abamo kwinywe balibaita.
42021017	Abantu bonabona balibacaawa olwʼeriina lyange.
42021018	Neye mpaawo kwinywe eyalijigirika obwomibwe obwa mwoyo.
42021019	Olwʼokugumira ebigosi kwanywe mwalirokoka.”
42021020	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Owemwalibona ngʼamaje geeruguuliriirye ekibuga kyʼe Yerusaalemi, oolwo nga mumanya muti bali kumpi okukijigirica.
42021021	Olwo abo abalibba omu Buyudaaya, bairukiranga mu nsozi, ibo abalibba omu kibuga kyʼe Yerusaalemi bakizwangamu, era abo abalibba omu byalo tibakingirangamu.
42021022	Ekyo kityo olwakubba ekiseera ekyo kyalibba kya Kibbumba kunyaaŋa eeri abantu bʼomu kibuga ekyo, era ekyo kyalibba kutuukirirya Biwandiike.
42021023	Abalibba ebida nʼabalibba bayonkesya omu naku egyo, nga baligada ino! Walibbaawo okugada okwʼamaani oku kyalo kinu, nʼobulwa bwa Kibbumba oku bantu baamu.
42021024	Abandi balibaita nʼempiima, kaisi abandi balibatwala omu byalo ebitali bimo omu busibe, era aBatali Bayudaaya baliwamba era ni bafuga kubbikubbi ino ekibuga kyʼe Yerusaalemi paka ebiseera oKibbumba ebiyategekeire aBatali Bayudaaya okufuga, owebyaliwaaku.”
42021025	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Walibbaawo ebyewunyo okwisana nʼoku mweri nʼoku nkota. Nʼoku kyalo abantu balyeraliikirira nga batya olwʼokuwolomboga kwʼenyanza nʼokubbaapa kwʼamayengo.
42021026	Abantu balibbalikaku olwʼentiisya nʼolwʼokweraliikirira ebyalibbaawo oku kyalo, olwakubba obufugi nʼebibbumbe ebyʼe ngulu omwibbanga balibitengeetya.
42021027	Olwo kaisi ni babona oMwana wa Muntu ngʼaizira oku bireri, era ngʼali nʼobwezye bungi nʼekitiisya ekyʼamaani.
42021028	Kale ebyo owebyalitandiika okubbaawo, musetukanga era ni mugangamula emitwe gyanywe olwakubba okubanunula inywe, kwalibba kuli kwigereranga.”
42021029	Awo oYesu nʼabagerera olugero ati, “Aale mubonere oku musaale omutiini, era nʼegindi gyonagyona.
42021030	Owemubona nga gikunkumuka nga mumanya muti ebiseera ebyʼensaaca biigereire.
42021031	Nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo, owemubonanga ebyo ebimbakobeire nga biri kubbangawo, mumanyanga muti obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba bwigereire.”
42021032	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti ebintu ebyo byonabyona byaba okubbaawo ngʼabantu abʼomulembe gunu bakaali okufa okuwaawo.
42021033	Eigulu nʼekyalo byaliwaawo, neye ebibono byange tibyaliwaawo kadi naire.”
42021034	Awo oYesu nʼalabula abantu ati, “Mwekuume okwetalawusa, nʼobuteemeere, nʼokweraliikirira ebyobwomi bwʼoku kyalo kunu okutazitowereranga emyoyo gyanywe, amo ni mubba ooti muli awo ngʼolunaku lwa Kibbumba olwʼokusaliraku emisango lubagwireku nga timwetegekere ooti muntu azwa omu mutego.
42021035	Ekyo kityo olwakubba ekyo kyalikwata oku bantu bonabona abali oku kyalo.
42021036	Kale mubbenge beetegeki, era musabenge oKibbumba, kaisi mwezye okubunuka ebyo byonabyona ebyaba okubbaawo, nʼokwezya okwemerera omu maiso gʼoMwana wa Muntu.”
42021037	Buli lunaku omusana oYesu yaabbanga mu Yeekaalu ngʼayegesya, kaisi owekwairugalanga nʼawuluka okwaba oku Lusozi olubeeta olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni okugona.
42021038	Abantu bangi ino bawuunanga makeezi ni baaba egyali omu Yeekaalu okumuwulisisya.
42022001	Kale awo oMukolo ogwʼeMigaati eGibulamu eKizimbulukuca, ogubeeta oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, gwabbaire gwatira okutuuka.
42022002	Era abakabona abakulu nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa babbaire banoonia engeri yʼokwita oYesu mu mbiso olwakubba babbaire batya abantu.
42022003	Awo oSitaani nʼaingira omu mwoyo gwa Yuda oIsikalyoti, eyabbaire omoiza oku beegi ba Yesu eikumi na babiri.
42022004	Kaisi oYuda nʼayaba nʼateesa nʼabakabona abakulu, nʼabakuumi bʼeYeekaalu abakulu engeri egyayinza okulyamu oYesu olukwe, amuweeyo egibali.
42022005	Olwʼekyo badi ni basangaala ino, era ni bategeragana okumuwa empiiya.
42022006	Kale awo nʼaikirirya, era nʼanoonia akaseera akasa akʼokubabbeera bakwate oYesu, ngʼekiziima kyʼabantu kibulawo.
42022007	Awo olunaku ni lutuuka olwa Mukolo ogwʼeMigaati eGibulamu eKizimbulukuca, olubasaliraku ontaama omutomuto ogubasadaaka oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.
42022008	Kale oYesu nʼatuma oPeetero nʼoYokaana, nʼabakoba ati, “Mwabe mututegekere oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, tugulye.”
42022009	Ibo ni bamubuulya bati, “Otaka tugutegekere yaina?”
42022010	Iye nʼabakoba ati, “Aale owemwabba nga mwingira omu kibuga, mwajirya omusaiza eyetiikire ensaka yʼamaizi, mumusengererye paka omu nyumba omuyaingira.
42022011	Era mukobe onyere enyumba omuntu oyo omuyaingira muti, ‘ OMusomesya akobere ati; nambu ekisenge kiri yaina, iye nʼabeegibe omu baliira oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya?
42022012	Iye yabalagisya ekisenge ekinene ekiri e ngulu omu kalina, ekibamalire okwalirira, kaisi mututegekere oomwo ebyokulya.’ ”
42022013	Awo ni baaba, era ni baaja nga byonabyona biri ngʼoYesu oweyabakobere, era ni bategeka oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.
42022014	Awo esaawa eyʼokulya oweyatuukire, oYesu nʼatyama okuliira aamo nʼabatumebe.
42022015	Kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Ntakire ino okuliira aamo na inywe oku Mukolo gunu ogwʼoKutambukirya, nga nkaali okugada.
42022016	Era mbakobera nti tinaliiramu okugirya, paka amakulu gaayo owegalituukirira omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.”
42022017	Kale oYesu nʼakwata ekikopo kyʼenviinyo, ni yeebalya oKibbumba, era nʼabakoba ati, “Mukwate kinu mugabane nywenanywena,
42022018	olwakubba mbakobera nti okuzwa atyanu tinaliirayo tete okunywa ekyokunywa kyʼemizabbibbu, paka obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba owebwalibbeerawo.”
42022019	Era nʼatoola omugaati, ni yeebalya oKibbumba, kaisi nʼaguvunavunamu, nʼawa abeegibe ngʼabakoba ati, “Gunu niigwo omubiri gwange [ogumpaayo okulwanywe. Mukolenge kinu olwa kunjewukirya.”
42022020	Ekiinulo owekyawoire, nʼabawa ekikopo ekyʼenviinyo omu ngeri enanyere eyo, ngʼakoba ati, “Ekikopo kinu niiryo eisaaye lyange eryasusuka okulwanywe era erikakasa endagaano ya Kibbumba empyaka.]
42022021	“Neye obone, oyo ayaba okundyamu olukwe alya na nze ekyokulya oku menza.
42022022	Dala oMwana wa Muntu ayaba okufa ngʼowebakitegekere, neye wobe! Omuntu oyo eyamulyamu olukwe ngʼalabire!”
42022023	Awo ibo abeegibe ni batandiika okwebuulyangana bati, “Naani kwiswe ayaba okukola ekyo.”
42022024	Kale awo ni wabbaawo empaka omu beegi ba Yesu, nga beebuulyangana bati naani kwibo ogubatwala okubba akira ekitiisya.
42022025	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Abakabaka bʼabo aBatali Bayudaaya bataka abantu abebafuga babamanye bati babaliku obwezye, era abo abʼobwezye, beeyeta babbeeri baabwe.
42022026	Neye inywe timwabba ooti niibo, wazira akira okubba owʼekitiisya mwinywe, abbe ooti niiye omutomuto waamu era omwekubbemberi abbe ngʼomuweererya.
42022027	Aale akira okubba owʼekitiisya niiye aliina? Oyo atyaime okulya, ooba oyo aweererya? Tiyooyo atyaime okulya? Neye nze mwinywe ndi ooti muweererya.
42022028	“Era inywe abantu abasigaire na nze omu bigosi byange,
42022029	zena mbawa obwezye okufuga obwakabaka nga zena oBbaabba oweyampaire obwezye okufuga,
42022030	kaisi muliire oku menza yange omu bwakabaka bwange. Era mwalityama oku ntebe egyʼobufugi eikumi na ibiri ni musalira ebika eikumi na bibiri ebya Isirairi emisango.”
42022031	Awo oYesu nʼakoba oSimooni Peetero ati, “Simooni, Simooni, oSitaani asabire oKibbumba amwikirirye abagezesye okwabula abasa omu babbibabbi ngʼomuntu awasenyentamu engaano.
42022032	Neye nze nkusabiire, tiwawaamu okwikirirya. Era owewalimala okwenenya, ogumyanga abeegi abainawo.”
42022033	Neye oPeetero nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, netegekere okwaba na iwe omu mabbuusu era nʼokufeera aamo na iwe.”
42022034	Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Peetero, nkukobera nti olwatyanu, onkoko yaabba akaali nʼokukookoola, nga wankanegaanira emirundi misatu ngʼokoba oti tommaite.”
42022035	Kale awo oYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Owenabatumire ni mutayaba nʼomugoba ogwʼempiiya, newankubbaire ebikotiya ebyʼabasabiriri, waire engaito, wabbairewo ekimwadambire?” Ni bairamu bati, “Mpaawo naire.”
42022036	Kale awo nʼabakoba ati, “Neye atyanu oyo aali nʼomugoba ogwʼempiiya ayabe nagwo, nʼoyo aali nʼekisawo yena ayabe nakyo, era owoobba odamba empiima, otunde ekizwalokyo ogigule.
42022037	Ekyo kityo olwakubba eKiwandiike ekintumulaku kiti: ‘Bamubaliire aamo nʼabakola ebibbibibbi,’ kiteekwa okutuukirira. Era eBiwandiike ebyo byonabyona ebinkwataku biteekwa okutuukirira.”
42022038	Neye ibo abeegibe ni bamukoba bati, “Musengwa, obone aanu tulikuuwo nʼempiima ibiri.” Iye nʼabairamu ati, “Ekyo kimala!”
42022039	Awo oYesu nʼawuluka omu kibuga nʼayaba oku Lusozi olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni ngʼoweyakolanga, era abeegibe ni bamusengererya.
42022040	Oweyatuukire omu kifo ekyo, nʼabakoba ati, “Musabe oKibbumba kaisi timwagwa omu bikemo.”
42022041	Awo oYesu iye nʼabazwaku ni yeeyongerakuuyo katono omu maiso ebigere ooti 30, nʼakoma amazwi nʼasaba oKibbumba,
42022042	ati, “Bbaabba, owoobba ngʼotaka, ontooleku ekipimo ekyokugada okwo, neye iwe ekyotaka niikyo ekyobba okole tinga nze owentaka.” [
42022043	Kaisi awo omalaika nʼazwa omwigulu nʼamubonekera, era nʼamugumya.
42022044	Kale oYesu ngʼali omu bulumi obungi, ni yeeyongera okwegairira ino oKibbumba, era olwotalwe ni lutoonya nga luli ooti gatondo gʼeisaaye agatoonya ansi.]
42022045	Awo oweyasetukire okuzwa omu kusaba oKibbumba, nʼaiza egiri abeegibe, nʼabaajirya nga bagonere olwʼenima egibabbaire nayo.
42022046	Kaisi nʼababuulya ati, “Inywe, mugona-bugoni? Musetuke musabe oKibbumba, kaisi timwagwa omu bikemo.”
42022047	Ala oYesu yabbaire akaali atumula; kaisi ekiyindi kyʼabantu ni kituuka, ngʼomusaiza ogubeetanga bati Yuda eyabbaire omoiza oku beegibe eikumi na babiri akyekudembeire. Kale awo nʼaigerera egiri oYesu okumusugirya ngʼamugwa omu kifubba.
42022048	Neye oYesu nʼamubuulya ati, “Yuda, olyamu oMwana wa Muntu olukwe mu ngeri yʼokumusugirya ngʼomugwa mu kifubba!”
42022049	Kale awo abeegi ba Yesu owebaboine ekyaba okubbaawo, ni bamubuulya bati, “Musengwa, tubalwanisye nʼempiima?”
42022050	Era omoiza oku beegi abo nʼatemaku omugalama wa kabona akira obukulu ekitwi ekyʼoku ndiiro nʼamutiicaaku.
42022051	Neye oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mulekeraawo!” Kaisi nʼakwata oku kinkuyu kyʼekitwi kyʼomugalama oyo, era nʼakiiryawo.
42022052	Awo oYesu nʼakoba abakabona abakulu, nʼabakuumi bʼeYeekaalu abakulu, era nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga ababbaire baizire okumukwata, ati, “Mwizire nga muli nʼamampiima nʼemiigo ooti mwaba kukwata muyeekera?
42022053	Kale buli lunaku naabbanga na inywe omu Yeekaalu, nandi munkwata. Neye kinu niikyo ekiseera kyanywe, era niikyo ekiseera kyʼobwezye bwʼendikiirya.”
42022054	Awo ni bakwata oYesu, ni bamutwala omu nyumba ya kabona akira obukulu, era oPeetero nʼasenjeryaku ngʼalekerekuuwo eibbanga.
42022055	Neye owebamalire okukuma ekisiki omu luuga akati, ni batyama aamo, era oPeetero yena nʼatyama aamo nabo okwota omusyo.
42022056	Awo omoiza oku baala ababbaire abaweererya e wa kabona akira obukulu oweyaboine oPeetero ngʼatyaime omusyo egigumoleka, nʼamwekalikica, kaisi nʼakoba ababbairewo ati, “Nʼomusaiza oyo yena abbanga nʼoYesu.”
42022057	Neye oPeetero ni yeegaana ati, “Mukali iwe, omusaiza oyo timmumaite.”
42022058	Era nga wabitirewo akaseera katono, omuntu ogondi nʼamubona, era nʼamukoba ati, “Na iwe wena oli moiza kwibo.” Neye oPeetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Musaiza iwe, tiniiye owekiri bbe!”
42022059	Tete nga wabitirewo ekiseera kyʼesaawa ooti moiza, omuntu ogondi nʼakakasa ngʼakoba ati, “Dala onu yena moiza oku basengereri ba Yesu olwakubba yena Mugaliraaya.”
42022060	Neye era oPeetero nʼakaalaamira nakimo ino ngʼakoba ati, “Musaiza iwe, timmaite ekyokoba, nze omusaiza oyo timmumaiteku kadi!” Amangu ago, oweyabbaire ngʼakaali atumula, onkoko nʼakookoola.
42022061	OMusengwa waiswe nʼagaluka nʼalingirira oPeetero. Awo oPeetero nʼayewukirya ekibono kya Musengwa, ngʼoweyabbaire amukobere ati, “Olwatyanu onkoko yaabba akaali nʼokukookoola, nga wanegaine emirundi misatu ngʼokoba oti tommaite.”
42022062	Era awo oPeetero nʼawuluka, era nʼakunga ino.
42022063	Awo abasaiza abebabbaire bakuumisirye oYesu, ni bamujooga era nga webamukubba.
42022064	Era ni bamubwika amaiso, kaisi ni bamukoba bati, “Aale otuwe obunaabbi, naani akukubbire?”
42022065	Era ni bamuduula ebintu ebindi bingi ino.
42022066	Awo obwire owebwaceire, olukiiko lwʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, nʼabakabona abakulu, era nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, ni bakumbaana, kaisi awo ni baleeta oYesu omu maiso gaawe.
42022067	Kale ni bamukoba bati, “Otukobere obanga niiwe oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.” Neye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Nowenabakobera, timwaikirirye,
42022068	era nʼowenababuulya, timwanjiremu.
42022069	Neye okuzwa atyanu, oMwana wa Muntu ayaba okutyama nʼoKibbumba omu kifo kyʼekitiisya eino.”
42022070	Awo bonabona ni bamubuulya bati, “Ekyoli kutegeeza oti iwe oli Mwana wa Kibbumba?” Iye nʼabairamu ati, “Ngʼowemukobere era ninze oyo.”
42022071	Kale awo ni bakoba bati, “Tukaali tutaka obujulizi obundi bwaki? Iswe abananyere ngoyo tuwuliire ngʼatumula.”
42023001	Awo abʼolukiiko bonabona ababbairewo ni basetuka, ni batwala oYesu egiri oPiraato.
42023002	Era owebamutuucirye ni batandiika okumuwaabira nga bakoba bati, “Onu twamwajiirye ngʼasasamaza abantu bʼeigwanga lya iswe, ngʼabaloberya okuwa oKaisaali omusolo, era nga yeeyeta Kurisito ogubasukireku amafuta, okabaka.”
42023003	OPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Niiwe okabaka wʼaBayudaaya?” OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Ee, kityo ngʼowokobere.”
42023004	Awo oPiraato nʼakoba abakabona abakulu nʼekiziima kyʼabantu ati, “Timbona musango ogumuvunaana omuntu onu.”
42023005	Neye ibo ni beekalangula nʼamaani okumukakasa bati, “Asasamaza abantu omu njegesyaye. Yatandiikire mwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya, nʼabita omu Buyudaaya mwonamwona ngoyo atyanu atuukire nʼaanu.”
42023006	Kale oPiraato oweyawuliire ebyo, nʼabuulya ooba ngʼomuntu oyo Mugaliraaya.
42023007	Oweyamanyicirye ati oYesu azwa mwitwale lya Kerode, nʼamuweererya egyali, aate ngʼoKerode yena omu naku egyo yabbaire mu Yerusaalemi.
42023008	Kale awo oKerode oweyaboine oYesu nʼasangaala ino olwakubba yabbaire awuliire ebimufaaku, era okuzwa eira nʼeira yatakanga okumubona, era ngʼasuubira okumubona ngʼakola ebyewunyo.
42023009	Kale nʼabuulya oYesu ebibuulyo bingi, neye oYesu nandi nʼamwiramu kadi kimo.
42023010	Awo-so abakabona abakulu nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa ni beeteekawo, kaisi ni bakaalaama nʼamaani oku Yesu.
42023011	Awo oKerode nʼabaisulukalebe ni bamunyaiya nga bamutala era ni bamukiina kaisi oKerode nʼamuzwalisya ekizwalo ekimirikiinya, era nʼalagira ni bamukanja e wa Piraato.
42023012	OKerode nʼoPiraato ababbaire bacaawaganire ngʼensonga gya Yesu gikaali okubbaawo, ni basuuka ba mukago oku lunaku oolwo.
42023013	Awo oPiraato nʼayeta abakabona abakulu nʼabamo oku bʼakakiiko akafugi nʼekiziima kyʼabantu ekyabbaire awo.
42023014	Era nʼabakoba ati, “Muleetere omuntu oyo egyendi nga mukoba muti asasamaza abantu; aale mubone, mmubuuliirye omu maiso gaanywe, era timboinemu musango mwebyo ebimusinziriraku okumuvunaana.
42023015	Era waire oKerode yena atyo tasunire ekyokumuvunaana, kagira amwirirye egituli. Ngʼowemubona omuntu oyo mpaawo musango oguyabbengere ogumusinziriraku okumusalira ogwʼokufa.
42023016	Aale njaba okumubonereza, kaisi mmuteere.” [
42023017	Kyabbaire kityo olwakubba ku buli Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, oPiraato yateekwanga okubateerera omusibe ogubamusabanga].
42023018	Kale awo ekiziima kyʼabantu kyonakyona ni kiceerera aamo kiti, “Oyo omwite-bwiti, otuteerere Bbalaba!”
42023019	OBbalaba oyo yabbaire musibe omu mabbuusu olwʼakeediimo ekiyakolere omu kibuga era nʼolwʼomuntu oguyabbaire aitire.
42023020	Atyo oPiraato nʼagezyaku okubagambirirya tete ngʼataka okuteera oYesu.
42023021	Neye ibo ni beeyongera okukooka bati, “Omukomerere oku musalabba, omukomerere oku musalabba!”
42023022	Tete era oPiraato nʼababuulya omulundi ogwokusatu ati, “Lwaki? Kibbikibbiki ekyakolere? Timbona nsonga kwiye emusingisya omusango ogwʼokufa. Aale owenaabba nga mmalire okumubonereza, nʼamuteera.”
42023023	Neye ibo ni beeyongera okukooka nga bakakasa bati oYesu bamukomerere oku musalabba era ni bamuyinga.
42023024	Kale oPiraato yena nʼasalawo okukola ekibamusabire.
42023025	Awo nʼabateerera omusaiza oyo ogubamusabire, eyabbaire omusibe omu mabbuusu olwʼakeediimo akeyakolere nʼolwʼomuntu oguyabbaire aitire, era nʼawaayo oYesu eeri abantu ngʼowebabbaire bataka.
42023026	Awo abaisulukale owebabbaire batwala oYesu, ni basangaana omusaiza ogubeeta oSimooni owʼe Kuleene, eyabbaire akanga e ika omu kibuga ngʼazwa omu kyalo, era ni bamukaka ni bamuteekaku omusalabba okugwetiika ngʼazwaku oYesu e nyuma.
42023027	Awo ekiyindi kyʼabantu kinene ni kisengererya oYesu, oomwo mwabbairemu abakali era ibo ni baaba nga bakunga era nga bakubba enduulu olwa Yesu.
42023028	Neye oYesu nʼaira oku bakali abo kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Inywe abakali abʼe Yerusaalemi, timwakunga okulwange; neye mwekungire niinywe abananyere era nʼolwa baana baanywe.
42023029	Ekyo kityo olwakubba enaku gyalituuka, abantu owebalikobera bati, ‘Abakali abagumba bʼenkabi, era ebida ebitabyalangaku nʼamabeere agatayonkesyangaku byona nga byʼenkabi!’
42023030	Olwo balikoba ensozi bati, ‘Mutugweku,’ nʼobusozi bati, ‘Mutubbuuneku.’
42023031	Obanga abantu bakolere batyo ku musaale omubisi kaisi leero kyalibba kitya oku mukalu?”
42023032	Awo wabbairewo abasaiza abandi babiri ababbaire oku gwʼokuvuna amateeka, abebatwaire okwitira aamo nʼoYesu.
42023033	Kale owebatuukire omu kifo ekibeeta ekyʼeKiyanga, ni bakomerera awo oYesu oku musalabba nʼabavuni nago abamateeka, omoiza oku lubba lwa Yesu olwʼengalo endiiro, ogondi oku lwʼengooda. [
42023034	Awo oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Bbaabba, obasoniye olwakubba tibamaite ekibakola].” Kale awo abaisulukale ni bagabula ebizwalo bya Yesu nga babikubbiraku kalulu.
42023035	Era abantu ni beemerera awo okubona ebintu ebyo ebyabbairewo, ngʼabafugi ibo bali kumusekerera nga bakoba bati, “Yalamyanga abandi, aale oleke yeeramye owaabba nga niiye oKurisito oMulonde wa Kibbumba!”
42023036	Cooka abaisulukale bona ni baigerera awo egibabbaire bamukomereire, ni bamukiina nga bamuwa enviinyo ensaasaami okufunfuuna,
42023037	era nga bamukoba bati, “Owoobba nga niiwe okabaka wʼaBayudaaya, weeramye!”
42023038	Era bateekereyo ekiwandiiko e ngulu oku musalabba ekibawandiikire bati, “ONU NIIYE OKABAKA WʼABAYUDAAYA.”
42023039	Kale awo omoiza oku bavuni bamateeka abebabbaire bakomereire oku musalabba, nʼaduula oYesu ngʼamukoba ati, “Tiniiwe oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta? Weeramye, na iswe swena otulamye.”
42023040	Neye omuvuni wa mateeka oodi ogondi nʼakaawuukira omwinaye ati, “Iwe, totyaku oKibbumba olwakubba tuli oku kibonerezo kimo naye?
42023041	Cooka iswe era mazima tuwoomera ekibonerezo kinu olwʼebitwakolere, neye omusaiza onu iye mpaawo ensobi egyakolere.”
42023042	Era awo nʼayongeraku ati, “Yesu, wenewukiryanga owewaliirira omu kitiisya kyʼobwakabakabwo.”
42023043	Neye iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Nkukobera amazima nti, olwatyanu waabba na nze omu kifo ekyokwesiima.”
42023044	-
42023045	Awo esaawa gyabbaire ooti mukaaga egyʼomusana, eisana ni lirikira era endikiirya nʼekwata oku kyalo kyonakyona paka oku saawa omwenda egyʼeigolo. Era omu kaseera ako olutimbe olwʼomu Yeekaalu ni lunyiirikamu akati ni bibba ebitundu bibiri.
42023046	Awo oYesu nʼakunga maaminkirira ati, “Bbaabba, nkukwatisya omwoyo gwange!” Oweyamalire okukunga atyo, nʼafa.
42023047	Kale omukulu wʼekibinja kyʼabaisulukale 100 oweyaboine ebibbairewo, nʼawuuja oKibbumba era nʼakoba ati, “Dala onu abbaire musaiza atuukiriire!”
42023048	Awo abantu bonabona ababbaire bakumbaine okweboneraku owebaboine ebibbairewo, ni bakanga e waabwe nga baizwire enima.
42023049	Neye abakaagwa ba Yesu bonabona nʼabakali abamusengereirye okuzwa e Galiraaya, beemereire yalakuuku okulengeranga ebyabbairewo.
42023050	-
42023051	Awo, wabbairewo omusaiza eriinalye bati Yusufu, omusaiza oyo yabbaire mutyami wʼomu kibuga kyʼomu Buyudaaya ekibeeta Alimasaaya. Era yabbaire mukwenda oku lukiiko lwʼaBayudaaya olukulu, wazira tiyaikirizaganyire nalwo omu kiteeso kyokwita oYesu era nʼomu ngeri yʼokukikolamu. Yabbaire musaiza musa era ngʼatuukiriire, era ngʼakumiriire okubbaawo kwʼobwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.
42023052	Kale oYusufu oyo nʼayaba egiri oPiraato, nʼamusaba omulambo gwa Yesu.
42023053	Kale awo nʼagwanula oku musalabba, nʼagulingira omu lugoye olutukula oluyaaka olwʼebbeeyi. Nʼaguteeka omu magombe agʼempuku egibabbaire nga batemere mwibbaale, igo agebabbaire nga tibagateekangakuumu mulambo.
42023054	Olunaku lwʼokumuliika oolwo, lwabbaire lwa kwetegekeraku Saabbaato era eyabbaire yatira okutandiika.
42023055	Batyo abakali ababbaire bazwereire nʼoYesu e Galiraaya, ni basengererya oYusufu, era ni babona amagombe, ni babona nʼengeri egibateekeremu omulambo gwa Yesu.
42023056	Kale awo ni bakanga e waabwe, ni bategeka ebyakaloosa, nʼokalifuwa. Neye oku Saabbaato ni bawuumula ngʼeiteeka lyʼaBayudaaya oweriragira.
42024001	Awo oku lunaku olwesaabbiiti, abakali abo bawiine makeezi pwi ni bakwata ebyakaloosa ebibabbaire bategekere ni baaba oku magombe ga Yesu.
42024002	Kale owebatuukire eeyo baajiirye nga bayiringitirye eibbaale balitoirewo omu mulyango gwʼamagombe agʼempuku omu babbaire bamuliikire.
42024003	Neye owebaingiiremu, tibaajiiryemu omulambo gwa Musengwa oYesu.
42024004	Awo owebabbaire nga bakaali bawugulaire olwʼekyo, okwaba okwewukirya ngʼabasaiza babiri ababbaire bazwaire ebizwalo ebimirikiinya ooti kumesya kwa ikendi nga babeemereireku awo.
42024005	Kale awo abakali abo omu kutya ni bakoma amazwi okukotama, nʼempumi ni giguunya ansi okwitakali, neye abasaiza nago ni babakoba bati, “Lwaki munoonerya omwomi omu bafu?
42024006	Aanu abulawo; azuukiire! Mwewukirye oweyabbaire ngʼakaali ali na inywe omu Galiraaya nga yabakobeire ati,
42024007	‘ OMwana wa Muntu bateekwa okumuwaayo omu ngalo gyʼabantu abakola ebibbibibbi bamukomerere oku musalabba, era oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ibiri, oku lwokusatu azuukire.’ ”
42024008	Owebawuliire ebyo oolwo awo ni beewukirya ebibonobye.
42024009	Awo owebazwire oku magombe ni bakanga, baabire ni bakobera abatume ba Yesu eikumi na moiza, nʼabandi bonabona ebintu ebyo byonabyona.
42024010	OMalyamu oMangadaleena, nʼoYowani, nʼoMalyamu omaaye wa Yaakobbo, nʼabandi abebabbaire nabo niibo abaabire okukobera abatume ebintu ebyo.
42024011	Cooka abatume tibabaikiririiryemu olwakubba ebibono byabwe byafaananiire abatume ooti mpaamu makulu.
42024012	Neye tete oPeetero iye nʼasetuka, nʼairuka nʼayaba oku magombe. Oweyatuukire eeyo, ala okwaba okukotama okulolenkereryamu, yaboinemu ngoye egitukula egyʼebbeeyi njereere, era nʼazwayo nga yena onyere yeewunya-kwewunya ebibbairewo.
42024013	Awo, oku lunaku olunyere oolwo, ababiri oku beegi ba Yesu babbaire baaba omu kabuga akʼEmaawo, ekiromita ooti ikumi na moiza okuzwa e Yerusaalemi.
42024014	Abeegi abo babbaire balonsya ku biibyo byonabyona ebyabbaire bimalire okubbaawo.
42024015	Awo owebabbaire nga babironsyaku era nga webeebuulyanganaku, oYesu yena onyere nʼabbutuka, era nʼayabirana nabo;
42024016	neye nandi ni bamumanyica.
42024017	Kale awo nʼababuulya ati, “Muli kutambula nga mulonsya kuuki?” Cooka ibo ni beemerera nga baicirye amaiso.
42024018	Awo omoiza kwibo, eriinalye bati Kulewopa nʼamwiramu ati, “Oli mugeni omu Yerusaalemi iwe atamaite ebibbairewo omu naku ginu?”
42024019	Iye nʼababuulya ati, “Bintuki?” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Ebikwata oku Yesu owʼe Naazaleesi, ngʼoweyabbaire omusaiza onaabbi owʼamaani omu biyakolanga nʼomu biyatumulanga omu maiso ga Kibbumba nʼomu maiso gʼabantu bonabona.
42024020	Era ngʼabakabona abakulu nʼabafugi baiswe owebamuwaireyo okumusalira ogwʼokufa, era ni bamukomerera oku musalabba.
42024021	Neye iswe-so twabbaire tusuubira tuti niiye eyabbaire owʼokununula oIsirairi. Neye ebyo byonabyona nga biri awo, lunu atyanu lunaku lwokusatu kasookeede ebyo bibbaawo.
42024022	Kaisi nʼekindi kiri kiti abamo oku bakali abʼe waiswe olwatyanu batwewunyisirye ino. Cooka amakeezi bawiine oku magombe eeyo,
42024023	neye tibaajiiryemu omulambogwe. Era baizire ni batukobera bati nambu abamalaika bababonekeire ni babakobera bati oYesu mwomi.
42024024	Kale awo abamo oku banaiswe baabire oku magombe era ni baajirya nga biri ngʼabakali owebatukobeire, neye iye onyere tibamuboineku.”
42024025	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Nga muli basirusiru era ngʼemyoyo gyanywe midoto omu kwikirirya byonabyona abanaabbi ebibalangire eira!
42024026	OKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta yabbaire tateekwa kugada nʼebyo byonabyona kaisi aingire omu kitiisyakye?”
42024027	Era ngʼazwera oku Musa nʼabanaabbi abandi, oYesu nʼabasonzolera byonabyona ebimufaaku ngʼowebiri omu Biwandiike.
42024028	Kale owebabbaire bali kumpi okutuuka egibabbaire baaba, iye oYesu nʼaboneka ooti akaali yeeyongerayo omu maiso.
42024029	Neye ni bamwegairira ino bati, “Osigale aanu na iswe olwakubba eisana ligwa era obwire bwirugala.” Kale nʼayawuka ayabe agone awo nabo.
42024030	Awo owebabbaire batyaime okulya, yatoire omugaati, ni yeebalya oKibbumba, nʼaguvunavunamu kaisi nʼagubawa.
42024031	Awo ni bairamu amalabuki era ni bamumanyica, kaisi ni yabeegoteraku.
42024032	Awo ni beebuulyangana bati, “Emyoyo tigitucemukire owaabbaire ngʼatumula na iswe omu nzira, era ngʼatusonzolera eBiwandiike?”
42024033	Kale ni basetukiramu mangu ni bakangayo e Yerusaalemi. Eeyo baajiryeyo abatume eikumi na moiza aamo nʼabantu abandi nga bakumbaine.
42024034	Awo abatume ni babakobera bati, “Kya mazima nti oMusengwa azuukiire era nʼoSimooni amuboineku.”
42024035	Era abasaiza ababiri abo bona ni babalonserya ebyabbairewo omu nzira era ngʼowebamanyicirye oYesu oweyabavunavuniiremu omugaati.
42024036	Awo owebabbaire nga bakaali balonsya kwebyo, oYesu yena onyere nʼababbutukamu era nʼabakoba ati, “Eidembe libbe na inywe.”
42024037	Ekyo kyabeerindukisirye era ni batya nga baseega bati bali kubonanga mwigu.
42024038	Awo nʼabakoba ati, “Lwaki mweraliikirira? Era lwaki mubuusabuusa omu myoyo gyanywe?
42024039	Aale mubone amangalo nʼebigere byange. Ninze nakimo onu onyere! Aale munkwateku mubone. Omwigu igwo tigubba nʼomubiri nʼamagumba ngʼowemumbona nze.”
42024040	Oweyamalire okutumula atyo, nʼabalagisya engalogye nʼebigerebye.
42024041	Era nʼowebakayire okwikirirya olwʼeisangaalo nʼolwʼokuwuninkirira, nʼababuulya ati, “Mulikuuwo aanu nʼekyokulya?”
42024042	Kale ibo ni bamuwa ekitundu kya nyanyi omukalu,
42024043	Era nʼakitoola, nʼakirya nga balingiriire.
42024044	Kale awo nʼabakoba ati, “Niibyo ebyo ebinabakobeire nga nkaali ndi na inywe, nti buli ekibampandiikireku omu Mateeka ga Musa nʼomu bitabo byʼabanaabbi nʼomu Zabbuli, kiteekwa okutuukirira.”
42024045	Era awo nʼabategeeresya eBiwandiike,
42024046	ngʼabakoba ati, “Kinu niikyo ekibawandiikire bati: ‘OKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta nago yaligada era nʼafa neye oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ibiri, oku lwokusatu yalizuukira,
42024047	era omu liinalye, obukwenda obwʼokwenenya nʼokubasoniya ebibbibibbi bateekwa okubulaabba omu mawanga gonagona nga basookera mu Yerusaalemi.’
42024048	Inywe muli bajulizi bʼebintu ebyo.
42024049	Era njaba kubaweererya ekyo oBbaabba ekiyabasuubizire; neye musigale aanu omu kibuga, paka owemwasuna amaani ga Mwoyo oMweru okuzwa omwigulu.”
42024050	Awo oYesu nʼabawuluca omu kibuga, nʼabatwala paka awantu okumpi nʼekyalo kyʼe Bbesaniya, kaisi nʼasiirya engalogye, era nʼabawa enkabi.
42024051	Era awo oweyabbaire akola ekyo, nʼabazwaku nʼayaba omwigulu.
42024052	Kale awo ni bamusinza kaisi ni bakanga e Yerusaalemi nga bʼasangaala ino.
42024053	Era buli lunaku basiibanga oku Yeekaalu nga bawuuja oKibbumba.
43001001	Owebabbaire nga bakaali okubbumba ekyalo, iye ogubeeta oKibono yabbairewo. Iye oyo yabbaire aamo nʼoKibbumba era oKibono nago ali nʼobwa Kibbumba obwizulye.
43001002	Era iye nago yabbaire aamo nʼoKibbumba okuzwera nakimo nga nʼekyalo bakaali okukibbumba.
43001003	OKibbumba yakoleserye niiye okubbumba ebintu byonabyona. Era anambula iye mpaawo kintu kadi kimo oKibbumba ekiyabbumbire.
43001004	Iye oKibono nago niiye onanzwa wʼobwomi, era iye kitangaala ekimolekera abantu okumanya oKibbumba ekyali era ekyataka bakole.
43001005	Era oKibono nago kitangaala ekyo ekimolekera abantu abataikirirya, neye ibo abantu abo tibamutegeire.
43001006	Awo, ni wabbaawo omuntu, iye oKibbumba oguyatumire, eriinalye bati Yokaana.
43001007	Iye yaizire okukakasa abantu amazima agakwata oku kitangaala nago, kaisi oolwo abantu bonabona baikiririrye mu yooyo.
43001008	Iye oYokaana tiniiye eyabbaire ekitangaala, wazira yaizire akobere abantu ebikwata kwoyo iye ekitangaala nago.
43001009	Iye oyo eyabbaire ali kwiza oku kyalo niiye ekitangaala ekituuce ekimolekera buli muntu.
43001010	Iye oyo oKibono yabbaire oku kyalo era oKibbumba yabbumbire ekyalo ngʼakolesya niiye. Neye oKibono oweyabbaire oku kyalo, abantu ibo tibamutegeire.
43001011	Kale iye yaizire oku kyalokye, neye ibo abantube abananyerenyeere tibamwanirizire.
43001012	Neye abo bonabona abamwanirizire ni bamwikiririryamu, yabeezyesyerye okusuuka baana ba Kibbumba.
43001013	Cooka tibasuukire baana ba Kibbumba mukubabyala mubutonde, mukuzwa mu lulyo lwa bazeiza baabwe, ooba mukusalawo kwa buntu waire mu kutaka kwa musaiza omufumbo, wazira oKibbumba onyere niiye oitewaabwe.
43001014	Kale oKibono oyo yasuukire muntu, era yena nʼabba oku kyalo ooti niiswe. Twamuboine omu kitiisyakye, ikyo kidi ekyʼoyo era iye yenkani eyazwire egiri oKibbumba oIteeye, nga iye oKibono aizwire ekisa nʼamazima agakwata oku Kibbumba.
43001015	Cooka oYokaana yalangiriire ati, “Onu niiye ogunatumwireku owenakobere nti, ‘Oyo eyaliiza oluzwanyuma lwange, ankiraku ekitiisya, olwakubba yansookere okubbaawo.’ ”
43001016	Era okusinzirira oku bwizulye bwʼekisaakye, swenaswena twabire nga tusuna ebirabo ebyʼokumo kumo.
43001017	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oKibbumba yawaire Musa aMateeka okugatuleetera, kaisi ekisa nʼamazima agakwata oku Kibbumba ibyo twabisunire kubita mu Yesu Kurisito.
43001018	Era mpaawo abonangaku oKibbumba, okutoolaku oMwanawe omoiza yenkani oYesu, iye oyo aali aamo nʼoKibbumba omu kitiisyakye, era oMwanawe oyo nago niiye eyatumanyikisirye oKibbumba ekyali.
43001019	Kale awo abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya abʼomu kibuga kyʼe Yerusaalemi ni batuma abamo oku bakabona nʼaBaleevi okubuulya oYokaana oMubatizi bati, “Niiwe onaani?”
43001020	Iye tiyeebisabisire, wazira yabbutwire nʼeidembe ati, “Tininze oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.”
43001021	Awo niiwo ibo okumubuulya bati, “Aale atyanu niiwe onaani? Niiwe Eriya?” Iye oYokaana nʼabairamu ati, “Bbe tininze Eriya.” Tete ni bamubuulya bati, “Niiwe onaabbi oodi ogubatusuubizire?” Iye nʼabairamu ati, “Bbe.”
43001022	Awo ekisembayo tete ni bamubuulya bati, “Abatutumire twabakoba tuti niiwe onaani? Weeyeta otya?”
43001023	Kale awo oYokaana nʼabairamu ngʼajulira Kiwandiike ekiri omwIsaaya ekiti, “Ninze oyo atumulira omu kitera nʼeigono eryaminkirira nti, ‘Mutereerye oluguudo lwa Musengwa oYesu.’ ”
43001024	Awo oolwo aBafalisaayo abo abebatumire
43001025	niiwo okubuulya oYokaana bati, “Kale lwaki obatiza obanga tiniiwe oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta, era nga tiniiwe Eriya waire onaabbi oodi ogubatusuubizire?”
43001026	Era oYokaana nʼabairamu ati, “Nze mbatiza nʼamaizi, neye waliwo iye abeemereiremu aanu ogumutategeera.
43001027	Niiye oyo eyaliiza oluzwanyuma lwange, nze oguntasaanira okusibindula obusibiro bwʼengaitogye.”
43001028	Ebyo byonabyona byabbairewo mu Bbesaniya, oku lubba ludi olundi olwa mwiga oYoludaani eeyo oYokaana egiyabbaire abatizira.
43001029	Awo oku lunaku olwairireku, oYokaana nʼabona oYesu ngʼasimba egyali, kaisi oYokaana nʼakoba ati, “Aale mubone oyo aali ooti Ntaama oMutomuto owa Kibbumba, iye oYesu, oKibbumba oguyalondere okuwaayo ngʼesadaaka okutoolawo ebikole ebibbibibbi ebyʼekyalo.
43001030	Niiye oyo ogunatumwireku nti, ‘Waliwo omuntu eyaliiza oluzwanyuma lwange, iye ankiraku obwezye olwakubba iye yansookere okubona eisana.’
43001031	Era nze zena nabbaire timmutegeire nti niiye, neye ekyagirire ni njaba ngʼambatiza nʼamaizi, kyabbaire nti, Iye amanyikane ati niiye omulonde omu bantu bʼe Isirairi.”
43001032	Awo oYokaana nʼakakasa kusani ino ati, “Naboine oMwoyo oMweru ngʼamwikaku okuzwa omwigulu, ngʼali ooti njiiwa, era nʼamusigalaku.
43001033	Nze tinankubbaire mmumanya, neye oKibbumba eyantumire okubatiza nʼamaizi, niiye eyankobere ati, ‘Oguwalibona ngʼoMwoyo amwikaku era nʼamusigalaku, yalibba niiye oyo eyalibatiza nʼoMwoyo oMweru.’
43001034	Era ikyo nakiboine, era mbakakasa nti oyo niiye oMwana wa Kibbumba.”
43001035	Oku lunaku olwairireku, oYokaana tete yabbaire omu kifo ekinyere kidi ngʼayemereire aamo nʼababiri oku beegibe.
43001036	Awo nʼabona oYesu ngʼabita, oYokaana nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Aale mubone oyo aali ooti Ntaama oMutomuto, iye oYesu, oKibbumba oguyalondere okuwaayo!”
43001037	Awo abeegi ba Yokaana ababiri nago owebawuliire ngʼoYokaana atumula ebibono ebyo, ni basimbuka ni basengererya oYesu.
43001038	Kale awo oYesu oweyacuukire okulola enyuma nʼabona ngʼabantu abo nago ababiri bamusengererya, nʼababuulya ati, “Munoonia niki?” Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Laabbi ogona yaina?” (Ekibono “Laabbi,” kyʼolutumu oLwebbulaniya, amakulu gati Musomesya).
43001039	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mwize twabe mumanyiceeyo.” Awo ni baaba ni bamanyica oYesu egyagona. Owebaabiireyo gyabbaire ooti saawa ikumi egyʼeigolo era basiibire naye olunaku oolwo.
43001040	Era omoiza kwabo abawuliire oYokaana ngʼatumula oku Yesu, era nago abasengereirye oYesu, yabbaire Andereya, omuganda wa Simooni oPeetero.
43001041	Era iye Andereya ekintu ekiyasookere okukola kwabbaire kunoonia mugandawe oSimooni nʼamukoba ati, “Tuboine oMasiya.” Amakulu gati oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.
43001042	Era awo Andereya nʼatwala oSimooni egiri oYesu. Cooka oYesu nʼalingirira oSimooni kaisi nʼamukoba ati, “Niiwe oSimooni omutaane wa Yokaana. Era bakwetanga bati Keefa,” nga litegeeza Peetero.
43001043	Oku lunaku olwairireku, oYesu nʼasalawo okusimbuka okwaba omwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya. Kale eeyo nʼayajiriryayo oFiripo, era oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Oize obbe mwegi wange.”
43001044	OFiripo yena yabbaire azwera mu kibuga kyʼe Bbesusaida, Andereya nʼoPeetero egibabbaire bazwera.
43001045	Kale oFiripo nʼanoonia oNasanairi era nʼamubona, kaisi nʼamukoba ati, “Tuboine omuntu oodi oMusa oguyatumwireku omu Kitabo kyʼaMateeka, era nʼabanaabbi bona ogubatumwireku omu Biwandiike. Era oyo nago niiye oYesu omutaane wa Yusufu owʼomu kibuga kyʼe Naazaleesi.”
43001046	Awo oNasanairi nʼamubuulya ati, “Naazaleesi! Eeyo yona eyezya okuzwakuuyo akasa konakona?” OFiripo nʼamwiramu ati, “Ala oize obone.”
43001047	Iye oYesu oweyaboine oNasanairi nga yatira okumutuukaku, oYesu nʼamutumulaku ati, “Obone oMwisirairi onanyerenyeere, onambulamu bubbeyi naire.”
43001048	Awo iye oNasanairi nʼamubuulya ati, “Ommanyicirye otya?” OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Nkuboine ngʼokaali oli mu musaale omutiini, nga nʼoFiripo akaali nʼokukweta.”
43001049	Kale awo oNasanairi nʼakoba ati, “Musomesya, niiwe oMwana wa Kibbumba, era niiwe oKabaka wa Isirairi!”
43001050	Iye oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Oikirirya olwakubba nkukobere nti nkuboine ngʼokaali oli mu musaale omutiini? Walibona nʼebikiraku ebyo.”
43001051	Era oYesu nʼayongeraku okumukoba ati, “Mazima dala mbakobera nti mwalibona eigulu nga lyeigwire, nʼabamalaika ba Kibbumba nga baniina omwigulu era nga baika oku Mwana wa Muntu.”
43002001	Awo oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ibiri, oku lwokusatu, ni wabbaawo embaga eyʼobugole omu kibuga e Kaana ekyʼomwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya. Omaaye wa Yesu yabbaireyo oku mbaga eyo,
43002002	era oYesu nʼabeegibe bona babbaire beete oku mbaga nago, era bona babbaireyo.
43002003	Kale awo omwenge ogwʼemizabbibbu owegwawoirewo, omaaye wa Yesu nʼamukoba ati, “Tibakaali bali nʼomwenge gwʼemizabbibbu.”
43002004	Neye oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Mama, lwaki onnyingirya omu bintu ebyo? Nze ekiseera ekyange kikaali kutuuka.”
43002005	Neye omaaye nʼakoba abaweererya bʼokumbaga ati, “Buli ekiyabakoba nga inywe mukikola.”
43002006	Kale oku mbaga aawo wabbairewo agansaka aganene mukaaga agebabaizire omu mabbaale. Agansaka ago nago babbaire bagateekerewo lwʼomukolo ogwʼaBayudaaya ogwʼokwetukulya, buli gunsaka ogumo nga gwʼelita 80 ku 120.
43002007	Oluzwanyuma oYesu nʼakoba abaweererya abo nago ati, “Agansaka ago mugaizulye amaizi;” era bona ni bagaizulirya nakimo paka ku migo.
43002008	Awo nʼabakoba ati, “Aale atyanu museneku mutwalire oyo akulira embaga.” Kale abaweererya bona ni bakola ekyo oYesu ekiyabakobere,
43002009	era akulira embaga nʼalegaku amaizi oYesu ageyabbaire asuuciryemu omwenge ogwʼemizabbibbu. Cooka tiyamanyicirye egigwabbaire guzwire waire ngʼabaweererya abasenere amaizi ago ibo babbaire bamaite. Kale awo akulira embaga nʼairya omugole omusaiza oku mbale okumukoba ati,
43002010	“Buli muntu asooka kugabula mwenge omusa, atyanu abageni owebamala okunywa ni banoja, kaisi nʼaleeta ogutali musa. Neye iwe obisire omwenge omusa paka saawa eenu.”
43002011	Kanu niiko akamanyiciryo kʼekyewunyo akasooka oYesu akeyakolere omu kibuga e Kaana ekyʼomwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya, era omu ngeri eyo yalagire ekitiisyakye, era abeegibe ni bongera okumwikiririryamu.
43002012	Ekiseera owekyabitirewo ngʼembaga ewoire, oYesu nʼabagandabe nʼabeegibe, era nʼomaaye, ni baserengeta ni baaba omu kibuga e Kaperenawumu eeyo egibamalire enaku ntono giti.
43002013	Awo oMukolo ogwʼaBayudaaya ogwʼoKutambukirya owegwabbaire gwatira okutuuka, oYesu nʼabeegibe ni baniinaniina ni baaba omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi.
43002014	Cooka omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu yaajiiriryemu abantu nga batundiramu ente nʼentaama nʼenjiiwa egyʼokusadaaka, era nʼabandi nga batyaime bawaanyisya empiiya.
43002015	Kale awo oYesu nʼakwata emiguwa, nʼagikambamu ofaalu, era awo nʼabbingamu bonabona bazwe omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, era nʼabbingamu nʼentaama nʼente. Era nʼagangulyaga amamenza agebabbaire bawaanyisiryaku empiiya, era empiiya ni gisusukiaga.
43002016	Awo nʼakoba ababbaire batundiramu enjiiwa ati, “Enjiiwa ginu mugitoole aanu. Mubba mutya okusuuca enyumba ya Bbaabba okubba katale!”
43002017	Awo abeegi ba Yesu ni beewukirya bati bakiwandiikire bati, “Okutaka eino enyumbayo, Musengwa Kibbumba, kwalimmalisyawo.”
43002018	Kale awo abeekubbemberi ba Bayudaaya ababbairewo ni bamukoba bati, “Kamanyiciryo kʼekyewunyoki akooyezya okukola okutulaga oti oli nʼobwezye okukola ebyo byonabyona?”
43002019	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Aale muvunewo eYeekaalu eenu, nze nagyombeka omu naku isatu.”
43002020	Awo abeekubbemberi ba Bayudaaya ni bakoba bati, “Tumalire emyanka 46 nga twombeka eYeekaalu eyo, kaisi iwe wagyombeka otya omu naku eisatu?”
43002021	Neye eYeekaalu oYesu egiyabbaire atumulaku, niigwo omubirigwe.
43002022	Era oweyamalire okuzuukira, kaisi abeegibe ni beewukirya bati yakitumwire, ni baikirirya eBiwandiike, era nʼebibono oYesu ebiyabbaire atumwire.
43002023	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼakaali ali e Yerusaalemi oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, abantu bangi ni babona obumanyiciryo obwʼebyewunyo oYesu obuyakolere ni bamwikiririryamu.
43002024	Neye oYesu iye tiyabeesigire, olwakubba yabbaire amaite emyoyo gyʼabantu bonabona.
43002025	Yabbaire tiyeetaagisya muntu niiye nabba amukobera ebintu omuntu ebyaseega, olwakubba iye onyere yabbaire amaite ebiri omu mwoyo gwa buli muntu.
43003001	Wabbairewo omusaiza, eriinalye bati Nikodemu, era yabbaire mukwenda oku lukiiko lwʼaBayudaaya olukulu. Omusaiza oyo yabbaire wa mu kibbula kya Bafalisaayo.
43003002	Kale omusaiza oyo nʼayaba obwire egiri oYesu, era nʼamukoba ati, “ Musomesya, iswe tumaite tuti oli musomesya oKibbumba oguyatumire. Ekyo kityo olwakubba mpaawo ayezya okukola obumanyiciryo obwʼebyewunyo iwe owookola, okutoolaku ngʼoKibbumba ali naye.”
43003003	Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti omuntu owebatamubyala omulundi gwokubiri, tiwakwingira omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.”
43003004	Awo oNikodemu nʼamubuulya ati, “Omuntu akulire beezya batya okwiramu okumubyala tete? Mazima tayezya okukanga omu kida kya maaye, kaisi tete ni bamubyala omulundi ogwokubiri.”
43003005	Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Nkukobera amazima nti omuntu owebatamubatiza nʼamaizi era nʼasuna nʼoMwoyo oMweru, tiwakwingira omu bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.
43003006	Iye omuntu abyala muntu, era nʼomuntu asuna oMwoyo oMweru asuuka muyaaka omu bwomibwe obwʼomwoyo.
43003007	Tiweewunya olwakubba nkukobeire nti omuntu bateekwa okumubyala omulundi ogwokubiri.
43003008	Iye ompunga owaafuwa, egyataka gyalungama. Cooka owulira kuwuuma kwonkani, neye tomanyica egyazwa nʼegyayaba. Kale nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo tikyezyeka okukimanya engeri omuntu egibamubyala omu bwomibwe obwa mwoyo.”
43003009	Awo oNikodemu nʼamubuulya ati, “Ebyo byezya bitya okubbaawo?”
43003010	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Iwe omukugu omu byʼediini aanu omwIsirairi, obba otya okubba nga totegeera ebintu ebyo?
43003011	Nkukobera amazima nti iswe tutumula ku bintu ebitumaite, era tubakobera ku bintu ebitwaboineku, neye era inywe timwikirirya ebitubakobera.
43003012	Kaisi obanga owembakobeire ebintu ebibakola oku kyalo timwikiriirye, kaisi leero owenabakobera ebibakola omwigulu mwabiikirirya mutya?
43003013	Mpaawo kwinywe eyabbaire aniinireku omwigulu, wazira iye oMwana wa Muntu oyo iye eyazwereireyo.”
43003014	Era ngʼoMusa oweyaanikire ekibbumbe kya mpiri oku kisaale omu kitera, nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo nʼoMwana wa Muntu atyo webateekwa okumwanika oku musalabba,
43003015	kaisi kyezye okubba nti buli muntu amwikiririryamu asune obwomi obutawaawo.
43003016	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oKibbumba yatakire ino abantu era nʼawaayo oMwanawe omoiza yenkani, kaisi buli muntu amwikiririryamu tiyajigirika, wazira abbe nʼobwomi obutawaawo.
43003017	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oKibbumba tiyatumire oMwanawe oku kyalo kusalira bantu musango, wazira yamutumire, kaisi abantu balokoke nga babita mu niiye.
43003018	Buli aikiririrya omu Mwana wa Kibbumba tigumusinga, neye oyo atamwikiririryamu gubba gumalire okumusinga, olwakubba taikiririrya omu Mwana oyo omoiza yenkani owa Kibbumba.
43003019	Era gunu niigwo omusango. Iye oyo ekitangaala yaizire omu bantu, neye ibo ni bataka kukolanga bikole ebibbibibbi ebyʼendikiirya okukiraku ebisa ebyʼekitangaala.
43003020	Ekyo kityo olwakubba buli muntu akola ekikole ekibbikibbi, acaawa oyo ekitangaala, era taiza egyali olwʼokutya ati bademba ni babonekesya ebikolebye ebitali bisa.
43003021	Neye buli muntu akolera oku mazima ga Kibbumba, ayaba egyali oodi iye ekitangaala, kaisi oolwo kibbe aweeru kusani kiti, ekikole ekyo ekisa ekyabba akolere, asinziriire mu maani ga Kibbumba.
43003022	Ebyo owebyawoire, oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ntono oYesu nʼabeegibe ni baaba omu kitundu ekyʼe Buyudaaya, nʼabba eeyo nabo, era nʼabatiza abantu.
43003023	Era oYokaana yena yabbaire ngʼali kubatizanga omu mwiga Anoni, okumpi nʼekibuga e Saalimu olwakubba eeyo amaizi gabbaireyo mangi, era nʼabantu ni beeyongeranga okwabayo okubabatiza.
43003024	Ebyo byabbairewo ngʼoKerode akaali okwigalira oYokaana omu mabbuusu.
43003025	Atyanu, abamo oku beegi ba Yokaana ni babba nʼenkayaana nʼabamo oku Bayudaaya, oku bikwata oku bulombolombo obwʼokwetukulya.
43003026	Kale awo ni baaba eeri oYokaana ni bamukoba bati, “Musomesya, oyewukirya omusaiza oodi oguwabbaire naye era oguwatuwaireku obujulizi owewabbaire ngʼoli kubatiza abantu oku lubba ludi olwa mwiga oYoludaani? Omusaiza oyo aali kubatizanga, era abantu abakira obungi baaba giri niiye.”
43003027	Awo oYokaana nʼabairamu ati, “Omuntu tayezya okusuna obwezye bwonabwona ngʼoKibbumba tiniiye amuwaire.
43003028	Inywe abananyere mwezya okuwa obukakafu muti nakobere nti, ‘Tininze oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta, neye nze oKibbumba yantumire kukobera bantu ebikwata kwoyo ngʼakaali okwiza.’
43003029	Kityo nʼomugole abba wʼoyo amuleetere. Era omukaagwa wʼoyo aleetere omugole iye abbaawo kubbeera oyo aleetere, amubba kumpi nʼamuwulisisya, era asangaala ino owaawulira eigono lyʼoyo aleetere omugole. Era nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo zena eisangaalo lyange libba mu bwizulye owempulira nti abantu baaba egiri oYesu.
43003030	Nʼolwekyo iye oYesu ateekwa okweyongera okufuma, neenu nga nze niiye wenkendeera omu kufuma.” [
43003031	Awo oYokaana nʼayongera okubakoba ati, “Oyo oMulonde azwa omwigulu niiye akira bonabona. Cooka abo ababyale bʼoku kyalo kunu babba bantu-buntu, era batumula biibyo ebikwata oku kyalo. Neye oyo azwa omwigulu niiye akira bonabona.
43003032	Era iye nago akobera abantu ku biyaboineku nʼebiyawuliireku ngʼali egiri oKibbumba, neye mpaawo aikirirya ati ebyatumula bituuce.
43003033	Wazira omuntu aikirirya ekibonokye, abba bukakafu obulaga buti oKibbumba ekyakoba kituuce.
43003034	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oodi nago oKibbumba oguyatumire, atumula bibono ebyo ebyasuna okuzwa eeri oKibbumba olwakubba oKibbumba amuwa oMwoyowe omu bwizulye.
43003035	OKibbumba era oIteeye ataka oMwanawe, era yawaire oMwanawe obwezye oku bintu byonabyona.
43003036	Kale buli muntu aikiririrya omu Mwana wa Kibbumba, abba nʼobwomi obutawaawo. Neye atamwikiririryamu, tabba nabwo, wazira oKibbumba yeeyongera kusunguwala olwa muntu oyo].”
43004001	Omu kiseera ekyo aBafalisaayo bawuliire bati oYesu ali kusunanga era ngʼali kubatizanga abasengereri bangi okukiraku oYokaana.
43004002	Waire nga babbaire bakiwuliire batyo, ekituuce kiri nti oYesu iye onyere tiniiye eyabatizanga, neye abeegibe.
43004003	Kale oYesu oMusengwa oweyategeire ebintu ebyo abantu ebibabbaire bamutumulaku, nʼazwa omwitwale eryʼe Buyudaaya, nʼakanga omwitwale eryʼe Galiraaya.
43004004	Era yabbaire ngʼali nʼokubita omwitwale lyʼe Samaaliya.
43004005	Kale awo nʼatuuka omu kibuga ekyʼomu Samaaliya ekibeeta Sikali, ekiri okumpi nʼomuwuluko eira oYaakobbo oguyawaire omutaanewe oYusufu.
43004006	Omu muwuluko ogwo mwabbairemu eiruba oYaakobbo eriyabbaire akwire. Cooka oYesu yabbaire adembere olwʼolugendo, kale nʼatyamaku okwiruba eeryo okuwuumulaku oku saawa ooti mukaaga egyʼomusana.
43004007	Awo ni wabbaawo omukali oMusamaaliya eyaabire okwiruba nago okusena amaizi, kaisi oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Ompeeku amaizi nnyweku.”
43004008	Omu kiseera ekyo abeegi ba Yesu babbaire baabire mu kibuga Sikali kugula kyokulya.
43004009	Awo iye omukali oMusamaaliya nʼamwiramu ati, “Iwe oli Muyudaaya aate nze ndi mukali Musamaaliya. Oyezya otya okunsaba amaizi okunywa?” Omukali oyo yakobere atyo olwakubba aBayudaaya babbaire nga tibakolagana nʼaBasamaaliya.
43004010	Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Singa obbaire omaite ekirabo oKibbumba ekyataka okukuwa, era singa omaite akusaba amaizi okunywa, wandibbaire omusabire amaizi agaleeta obwomi, era yandigakuwaire.”
43004011	Tete omukali nʼamukoba ati, “Sebo, obula ekiwasenesya, aate eiruba lyabiriri. Watoola yaina amaizi nago agʼobwomi?
43004012	Ekyotegeeza iwe okira ozeiza waiswe oYaakobbo iye eyatuwaire eiruba linu, iye nʼabaanabe eryebanywangamu era nʼebyayobye?”
43004013	Awo oYesu tete nʼamwiramu ati, “Buli muntu anywa amaizi ganu, enyonta yaliiramu okumuluma.
43004014	Neye buli anywa amaizi gadi ageemuwa, enyonta tiyaliiramu okumuluma emirembe nʼemirembe. Era amazima aganyere, amaizi ago agempa omuntu oyo, mwiye galisuuka nsulo eyalimuwa obwomi obutawaawo.”
43004015	Tete era omukali nago nʼamukoba ati, “Sebo, ompeeku amaizi ago nago kaisi enyonta tiyandumanga, era mpezye okutaizanga aanu okwiruba tete okusena amaizi.”
43004016	Iye awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Oyabe oyete oibaawo, oire naye aanu.”
43004017	Iye omukali nʼamwiramu ati, “Mbula oibange.” Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Oli mutuuce okukoba oti obula oibaawo.
43004018	Dala ekyo ekyokobere kituuce olwakubba wankafumbirwaku abasaiza bataanu, era omusaiza ogwolinaye omu kiseera kinu tiniiye oibaawo. Era ekyo ekiwankazwa okutumula kituuce.”
43004019	Awo omukali nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Sebo, ombonekera ooti oli naabbi.
43004020	Aale obone kinu; iswe aBasamaaliya, abazeiza baiswe basinziranga oKibbumba ku lusozi lunu oGerizimu. Neye inywe aBayudaaya mukoba muti eYeekaalu eyʼomu Yerusaalemi niikyo ekifo omututeekwa okusinziranga oKibbumba.”
43004021	Awo iye oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Mukali iwe, oikirirye ebyenkoba nti ekiseera kiiza, ekimwalibbanga timukaali musinzira oItewaiswe oKibbumba ku lusozi lunu waire mu Yerusaalemi.
43004022	Aale inywe aBasamaaliya timumaite oKibbumba ogumusinza. Neye iswe aBayudaaya tumaite oKibbumba ogutusinza, olwakubba oKibbumba akolesya Bayudaaya okulokola abantu.
43004023	Neye era ekiseera kiiza, era kituukire, abantu abasinza omu butuuce atyanu ekibasinzirangamu oKibbumba oItewaiswe mu mwoyo era mu butuuce. Ekyo kityo olwakubba ibo abasinza batyo niibo oItewaiswe oKibbumba abanoonia.
43004024	Iye oKibbumba mwoyo mwereere, kale abo abamusinza bateekwa okumusinzanga mu mwoyo era mu mazima.”
43004025	Era awo omukali nʼamukoba ati, “Mmaite nti oMasiya aiza. Era iye oweyaliiza yalitusonzolera ebintu byonabyona.”
43004026	Kale awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Nze atumula na iwe ninze oyo nago ogwotumulaku.”
43004027	Omu kiseera ekinyere ekyo abeegi ba Yesu ni bakanga egiri oYesu, cooka ni beewunya okwajirya oYesu ngʼatumula nʼomukali. Neye ni watabbaawo kwibo eyabwirye omukali ati, “Otaka niki?” Ooba abuulya oYesu ati, “Lwaki otumula naye?”
43004028	Kale awo omukali oyo nʼaleka awo ensakaye eyʼamaizi, nʼakanga omu kibuga e Sikali nʼakoba abantu ababbaireyo ati,
43004029	“Mwize mubone omusaiza andagwireku byonabyona nenca ebinkolanga. Onu ayezya okubba niiye oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta?”
43004030	Awo abantu ni bazwa omu kibuga ekyo nago, ni baweera eeyo okumweboneraku.
43004031	Omu kiseera ekyo omukali ekiyakobeiremu abantu, abeegi babbaire mu kwegairira Yesu bati, “ Musomesya, obbeeku nʼakoolya.”
43004032	Neye iye nʼabairamu ati, “Nze ndi nʼekyokulya inywe ekimutamaiteku kadi.”
43004033	Awo abeegibe ni beebuulyangana bati, “Weezya okubba waliwo amuleeteireku ekyokulya?”
43004034	Neye iye oYesu nʼakobera abeegibe ati, “Owenkola ebyo eyantumire ebyataka nkole, mba mwikuti ooti-so ndiire kyokulya.
43004035	Aale timuli nʼentumula ekoba eti, ‘Wasigaireyo emyeri eena, kaisi amakungula gatuuke?’ Neye nze mbakoba nti mulole eedi oku misiri mubone amakungula gatuukire!
43004036	“Era nʼomu kiseera kinu omukunguli asuna empeeraye, era nʼamakungula niibo abantu abebaingirya omu bwomi obutawaawo. Ekyo kityo olwʼokuzweramu omusigi nʼomukunguli basune eisangaalo eryʼaamo.
43004037	Era omu ngeri eyo entumula eenu ntuuce ekoba eti, ‘Ogondi asiga, era ogondi nʼakungula.’
43004038	Aale nabatumire okwaba okukungula ekinandi muteganira. Ibo bantu bandi niibo abakalabanire nʼamaani kaisi niinywe ni mubba musunamu emigaso mwebyo abandi ebibakalabanire.”
43004039	Awo abantu bangi abʼomu kibuga kyʼe Samaaliya ekyo, ni baikiririrya omu oYesu olwʼebibono omukali oyo ebiyabakobeire ati, “Andagwireku byonabyona nenca ebinkolanga.”
43004040	Nʼolwekyo abantu bʼomu Samaaliya owebatuukire oYesu egiyabbaire, ni bamwegairira abbeeku eeyo nabo, kale oYesu nʼamalayo enaku ibiri.
43004041	Era olwʼebibono oYesu ebiyatumwire byazwereireku abantu abandi bangi abʼomu Samaaliya okumwikiririryamu.
43004042	Era ni bakoba omukali oyo nago bati, “Aale atyanu titwikiririrya omu Yesu lwʼebibonobyo ebyotukobeire, neye olwakubba iswe abanyere twewuliriireku, era atyanu tumaite tuti omusaiza onu dala niiye oMulokoli wʼabantu bʼoku kyalo.”
43004043	Oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku eibiri, oYesu nʼazwa omu kibuga e Sikali, nʼakanga omwitwale eryʼe Galiraaya.
43004044	Cooka oYesu onyere yabbaire akitumwireku ati, “Onaabbi tibamuwa ekitiisya omu kyalo kyʼe waabwe.”
43004045	Wazira oweyatuukire e Galiraaya, abantu baayo ni bamusangaalira. Ibo bakolere batyo olwakubba bona babbaire baboineku byonabyona ebiyabbaire akolere e Yerusaalemi, oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, olwakubba bona babbaireyo oku Mukolo ogwo.
43004046	Awo oYesu nʼakanga omu kibuga e Kaana ekyʼomwitwale eryʼe Galiraaya, enyumaku egiyasuuciirye amaizi ni gabba mwenge gwʼemizabbibbu. Cooka eeyo wabbaireyo omukungu wa kabaka eyabbaire omutyami wʼomu kibuga kyʼe Kaperenawumu eyabbaire nʼomutaanewe omulwaire.
43004047	Omusaiza oyo oweyawuliire ati oYesu azwire omwitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya atuukire omu Galiraaya, nʼayaba egiyabbaire nʼamwegairira aserengeteku e Kaperenawumu, alamye omutaanewe eyabbaire yatira okufa.
43004048	Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Owemutabone nga nkola obumanyiciryo obwʼebyewunyo era nʼebyewunyisya timwaikirirye.”
43004049	Neye omukungu nʼamwiramu ati, “Sebo, nkwegairiire tuserengeteku e wange ngʼomwana wange akaali okufa.”
43004050	Iye oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Okange e ika, omutaanewo ayaba okulama.” Kale omusaiza oyo nʼaikirirya ebibono oYesu ebiyamukobere, era nʼasimbuka okukanga e ika.
43004051	Oweyabbaire ngʼali omu nzira, abagalamabe ni bamusangaana, ni bamukobera bati, “Omutaanewo alamire.”
43004052	Kaisi iye oweyababwirye esaawa egiyaisuukiiremu, ni bamukoba bati, “Omusuuja gwalamire izo ku saawa musanvu.”
43004053	Awo oiteeye wʼomwana nʼayewukirya ngʼeeyo niiyo esaawa enanyerenyeere oYesu egiyamukobereiremu ati, “Omutaanewo ayaba okulama.” Awo omusaiza oyo aamo nʼabʼomu kisitokye bonabona, ni baikiririrya omu Yesu.
43004054	Era ako niiko akamanyiciryo kʼekyewunyo akokubiri oYesu ekiyakolere oweyazwire e Buyudaaya nʼakanga e Galiraaya.
43005001	Awo ekiseera owekyabitirekuuwo, oYesu nʼaniinaniina e Yerusaalemi oku mukolo gwʼaBayudaaya.
43005002	Omu Yerusaalemi, okumpi nʼogumo oku miryango egyaingirangamu ogubeeta oMulyango gwʼentaama, wabbairewo ekidiba kyʼamaizi. Ekidiba ekyo nago omu Lwebbulaniya ekibeeta Bbetizata, kyabbaireku ebisiisira bitaanu nga bikyeruguulirirye.
43005003	Omu bisiisira ebyo, mwalambaalangamu abalwaire bangi ino, nʼaboofu, nʼabaleme, nʼabasanyalaire era [ni bakuumiriranga amaizi okwekuyugamu.
43005004	Omalaika yaikanga omu kidiba omu biseera ebimo, nʼakuyugamu amaizi. Oyo eyesookanga okwika omu kidiba nga bamalire okukuyugamu amaizi, yalamanga buli bulwaire bwonabwona obuyaabbanga nabwo.]
43005005	Kale awo oku kidiba wabbairewo omusaiza, ngʼamalire emyanka 38 nga mulwaire.
43005006	OYesu oweyaboine omusaiza oyo ngʼalambaire awo, era nʼamanya ati yabbaire atyo okumala ekiseera kinene, nʼamukoba ati, “Otaka okulama?”
43005007	Omulwaire nʼamwiramu ati, “Sebo, nze ndambaku omuntu ambeera okugwa omu kidiba omu kiseera ekyo owebakuyugiramu amaizi. Mba-so nkaali ngalagatana okugwamu, ogondi nʼansookamu.”
43005008	Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Osetuke, weetiike omukeekagwo, era otambule oyabe.”
43005009	Era omusaiza oyo nʼalamirawo, nʼaginga omukeekagwe, nʼatambula nʼayaba. Olunaku oolwo lwabbaire ku Saabbaato.
43005010	Kale aBayudaaya ni bakoba omusaiza oYesu oguyalamirye bati, “Olwatyanu Saabbaato, era amateeka tigakwikirirya okwetiika omukeekagwo.”
43005011	Neye iye nʼabairamu ati, “Omusaiza andamirye, niiye ankobere ati, ‘Weetiike omukeekagwo, era otambule oyabe.’ ”
43005012	Kale awo ni bamubuulya bati, “Musaizaki oyo akukobere okwetiika omukeekagwo, era ati otambule oyabe?”
43005013	Cooka omusaiza oYesu oguyalamirye yabbaire tamaite amulamirye olwakubba nʼoYesu yabbaire agoteire omu kiziima kyʼabantu ekyabbaire awo.
43005014	Oluzwanyumaku, oYesu yaajiirye omusaiza nago omu Yeekaalu, era nʼamukoba ati, “Aale obone, ngoyo tete oli kusani. Aale toirangayo okukola ekibbikibbi, neye owewaliirayo ekigosi ekikiraku kidi kyezya okukubbaaku.”
43005015	Awo omusaiza nago nʼayaba nʼakobera aBayudaaya ati oYesu niiye eyabbaire amulamirye.
43005016	Kale awo, abeekubbemberi ba Bayudaaya ni batandiika okuyiiga oYesu okumwita iye olwʼokulamya omuntu oku Saabbaato, ikyo ekyabbaire ekivuna amateeka gʼeSaabbaato.
43005017	Neye iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Obanga oBbaabba iye akola bulijo paka lwatyanu, kaisi nze?”
43005018	Ikyo ekyo kyongeiremu Bayudaaya abo maani okugezyaku okumwita. Ekyo kyabbaire kityo olwakubba nti, oYesu tiyabbaire avunire mateeka gʼeSaabbaato kyonkani, neye era ngʼakoba ati oKibbumba niiye oIteeye onanyerenyeere. Kale mwekyo nʼabba yeesuuca okubba yenkanankana nʼoKibbumba.
43005019	Awo oYesu nʼabasonzolera ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti oMwana mpaawo ekyayezya okukola okululwe, wazira ekyo ekyabona ngʼoIteeye akola. Era iye oIteeye ekyakola, niikyo oMwanawe yena ekyakola.
43005020	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oIteeye wʼoMwana oyo, amutaka era amulaga ebyakola kaisi iye oMwana akole ebintu byonabyona oIteeye onyere ebyakola. Era mwewunye nʼakinu muti yalimulaga okukola ebyʼamaani nʼebikiraku nʼekyo ekyokulamya omusaiza oyo.
43005021	Era ngʼoIteeye owaazuukiza, atyo nʼoMwanawe niiye owaagabira abo abeyeesiimira obwomi obutawaawo.
43005022	Tete nʼekindi kiri kiti oIteeye mpaawo kadi moiza ogwasalira omusango, wazira iye oMwanawe niiye oguyawaire obwezye okusala emisango gyonagyona.
43005023	Ekyo kityo kaisi abantu bonabona beezye okuwa oMwana ekitiisya ekyo ekibawa oIteeye. Era singa omuntu yenayena tawa oMwana ekitiisya era mazima abba tawa nʼoIteeye ekitiisya, iye nago eyamutumire.”
43005024	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Era mbakobera amazima nti iye oyo awulira ebibono byange, nʼaikirirya oyo eyantumire, abba nʼobwomi obutawaawo, era tibalimusingisya omusango. Abba azwire omu kufa, nʼasuna obwomi obutawaawo.
43005025	Era mbakobera amazima nti ekiseera owekiri awo kituukire, abafu owebaliwulira eigono lyʼoMwana wa Kibbumba ni basuna obwomi obutawaawo.
43005026	Iye oKibbumba ali nʼobwezye obugabira omuntu obwomi, era obwezye obwo nago yabuwaire oMwanawe.
43005027	Era yamuwaire nʼobwezye okusalira abantu emisango olwakubba Mwana wa Muntu.
43005028	“Era ekyo timwakyewunya olwakubba ekiseera kiiza, bonabona abafu owebaliwulirira eigonolye,
43005029	era ni bazwa e magombe. Ibo abakola ebisa, balizuukira ni basuna obwomi obutawaawo. Neye ibo abo abakola ekibbikibbi, balizuukira ni babasingisya omusango.
43005030	Era nze mpaawo ekimpezya okukola okulwange. Nsala omusango ngʼoKibbumba obwankoba. Nʼolwekyo ensala yange ya bwenkanya olwakubba nkolera ku kiidi iye oodi eyantumire ekyasiima, tiku ninze ngʼowembona.”
43005031	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Aale singa ninze zenkani nga mpaawo gondi akobera abantu ebinkwataku, timwandibbaire mukakasa ikyo ekineyeeta.
43005032	Neye waliwo ogondi akobera abantu ebinkwataku. Iye oyo nago Kibbumba era mmaite nti obujulizibwe obunkwataku butuuce.
43005033	Cooka inywe mwatumire abakwenda egiri oYokaana, neye era yena nʼawa obukakafu ikyo ekyendi.
43005034	Ekyo tinkikoba lwakubba ntaka bujulizi ibwo obwa muntu-obuntu, neye ntumula oku bujulizi bwa Yokaana kaisi mwezye okwikirirya era mulokoke.
43005035	Ibwo obukwenda oYokaana obuyabaleeteire bwabbaire ooti itaala eryaka okubamolekera era bwabazwereiremu okubba basangaali okumalaku kaseera-buseera.
43005036	“Neye ndi nʼobukakafu obukiraku obwo oYokaana obuyantumwireku. Era obukakafu nago bubonekera mu mulimo ogwʼamaani nago oBbaabba oguyampaire okutuukirirya era nʼebintu ebinkola bikakasa biti nze oBbaabba dala yantumire.
43005037	Era oBbaabba iye eyantumire, onyere akakasa ikyo ekyendi. Inywe timuwulirangaku eigonolye, waire okumubonaku amaiso oku maiso.
43005038	Era nʼomu myoyo gyanywe mpaamu ekibono kya Kibbumba nago olwakubba oyo oguyatumire timumwikiririryamu.
43005039	“Cooka inywe mwekenenya nga musoma eBiwandiike olwakubba museega muti omu Biwandiike nago niimwo omu mwalisuna obwomi obutawaawo, era oomwo niimwo omu bakakasira ebinkwataku.
43005040	Cooka inywe tete mugaana okwiza egyendi kaisi mwezye okusuna obwomi obutawaawo.”
43005041	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Tintumula lwakutaka bantu kumpuuja,
43005042	neye nze mbategeera era mmaite nti inywe omu myoyo gyanywe, oKibbumba iye timumutaka.
43005043	Aale mubone eenu, nze naizire omu liina lya Bbaabba, neye timwanjanirizire. Neye singa omuntu ogondi obwaiza okululwe, oyo iye mumwaniriza.
43005044	Aale atyanu mwezya mutya okunjikiririryamu, nga mwikirirya kuwuujangana okwanywe inywe abananyere, kaisi nga timufa ku kuudi okuzwa egiri oKibbumba oyo omoiza yenkani?”
43005045	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Neye timuseega muti ninze enalibaloopa e wa Bbaabba. Wazira abaloopa, iye Musa inywe ogumulimu eisuubi okubawozererya.
43005046	Aale owekibba nti mwaikiririirye omu Musa, zena mwandibbaire munjikiririryamu olwakubba iye yena yampandiikireku.
43005047	Neye owemubbanga timwikirirya ebiyawandiikire, aale tete mubba mwaikirirya mutya ebinkoba?”
43006001	Ekiseera owekyabitirewo ebyo nga biwoire, oYesu nʼasalamu enyanza oGaliraaya, eriina erindi bati Tibberiyo, nʼasomoka okwitale kudi.
43006002	Era ekiyindi kyʼabantu kinene ni kimusengererya olwakubba baboine obumanyiciryo bwʼebyewunyo obuyabbaire akolere omu kulamya abalwaire.
43006003	Awo oYesu nʼabeegibe ni baniina oku kasozi, era nʼatyama eeyo aamo nabo.
43006004	Omu kiseera ekyo oMukolo ogwʼaBayudaaya ogwʼoKutambukirya, gwabbaire guli kumpi okutuuka.
43006005	Kale awo oYesu nʼagangamula omutwe, era nʼabona ekiyindi kyʼabantu nga kyaba egyali, kaisi nʼakoba oFiripo ati, “Twagula yaina ekyokulya, abantu abo bonabona ekibaalya?”
43006006	OYesu ekyo yakibwirye kugezesya Firipo olwakubba oYesu iye yabbaire amaite ekyayaba okukola.
43006007	OFiripo nʼamwiramu ati, “Waire singa tubbaire nʼedinaali 200 okugula ekyokulya buli muntu okusunaku waire katono, era tikimala.”
43006008	Awo ogondi oku beegibe nga niiye Andereya omuganda wa Simooni Peetero, nʼasiiryaku eigono ngʼakoba oYesu ati,
43006009	“Aanu waliwo omwisuka alikuuwo nʼemigaati mitaanu egibasumbire omu busye bwa bbaale, nʼenyanyi ibiri. Neye oku bantu abangi bati, ebyo-so bigasa niki?”
43006010	Iye oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Mutyamisye abantu.” Omu kifo ekyo wabbairewo eisubi lingi erisa lyʼokutyamaku. Awo abantu bonabona ni batyama. Ibo abasaiza bonkani ababbairewo babbaire ooti 5,000.
43006011	Awo oYesu nʼaginga obugaati nago budi, ni yeebalya oKibbumba kaisi nʼawa abeegibe ni babugabira abantu nga batyaime. Era nʼoku bukafingiri nʼakola atyo. Bonabona ni basuna ngʼowebatakire.
43006012	Owebamalire okwikuta, nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Mukumbaanirirye ebitudutundu ebifiikireku okutabebenyesya ekyokulya nago.”
43006013	Kale ni babukumbaanirirya, era ni baizulya ebiibo ikumi na bibiri ebyʼebitundutundu ebyʼobugaati obutaanu obwa bbaale obwafiikireku nga bamalire okulya.
43006014	Awo oluzwanyuma abantu owebaboine akamanyiciryo kʼekyewunyo oYesu akeyakolere, ni batandiika okutumula bati, “Dala onu niiye onaabbi oodi oMusa oguyatumwireku ati yaliiza oku kyalo!”
43006015	Kale oYesu oweyategeire ati babbaire batira okwaba okumukwata bamwazye bamusuuce kabaka, tete era nʼabazwaku ni yeeyongerayo e ngulu oku kasozi, nabba eeyo yenkani.
43006016	Awo esaawa egyʼeigolo owegyatuukire, abeegi ba Yesu ni baserengeta oku nyanza oGaliraaya,
43006017	ni baniina omu lyato, ni basalamu enyanza okwaba omu kibuga e Kaperenawumu. Omu kiseera ekyo obwire bwabbaire nga bwirugaire era oYesu yabbaire akaali okubeegaitaku.
43006018	Era ogumpunga ogwʼamaani gwabbaireku, era amayengo ni geyongera okubba gʼamaani oku nyanza.
43006019	Awo owebabbaire bankavugaku ekiromita ooti ina ooba itaanu, ni babona oYesu ngʼatambula oku maizi, ngʼasembera okumpi nʼeryato. Era owebamuboine ni batya ino.
43006020	Neye iye nʼabakoba ati, “Ninze, timwatya!”
43006021	Kale awo babbaire bataka okumwingirya omu lyato, amangu ago eryato ni lituuka oku lukalu egibabbaire baaba.
43006022	Oku lunaku olwairireku, ekiziima ekyʼabantu ababbaire basigaire oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza ni banoonia oYesu nga tibamubona. Kale awo ni beewukirya bati omu lyato eryabbairewo, oYesu tiyaniiniremu okwabira aamo nʼabeegibe, wazira abeegibe baabire bonkani.
43006023	Awo ni wabbaawo amaato agandi agazwire e Tibberiyo, ni gatuuka okumpi nʼekifo ekyo nago abantu owebaliriire obugaati, ngʼoMusengwa oYesu amalire okwebalya oKibbumba.
43006024	Kale abantu owebamanyicirye bati oYesu nʼabeegibe babulawo, ni baniina omu maato ago okwaba e Kaperenawumu okumunoonia.
43006025	Awo abantu owebaajiirye oYesu oku lubba ludi olwʼenyanza, ni bamubuulya bati, “ Musomesya, waizire eenu di?”
43006026	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Inywe mbakobera amazima nti timunnoonia olwakubba mwaboine obumanyiciryo obwʼebyewunyo obunkola, neye munnoonia lwakubba mwaliire obugaati budi ni mwikuta.
43006027	Timwemaliranga mu kukolerera kusuna kyokulya ekibebenyeka, wazira mwemalirenge mu kukolerera kusuna kyokulya kidi ekyʼomwoyo abantu ekibalya ni basuna obwomi obutawaawo. Iye agaba ekyokulya ekyo nago niiye oMwana wa Muntu. Ekyo kityo olwakubba niiye oKibbumba iye oIteeye oguyawaire akamanyiciryo kʼobwezye obwo.”
43006028	Awo ni bamubuulya bati, “Tuteekwa kukola niki okutuukirirya ebyo oKibbumba ebyataka?”
43006029	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Ikyo oKibbumba ekyataka mukole, niikyo kinu; kwikiririrya mu Mwana wa Muntu iye oyo oguyatumire.”
43006030	Awo niibo bona okumubuulya bati, “Kamanyiciryo kʼekyewunyoki iwe akewatuwa, tukibone kaisi twezye okwikirirya ebyokoba? Era niki ekyoyezya okukolawo?
43006031	Ibo abazeiza baiswe baliire ekyokulya ekibeeta emaanu omu kitera, ngʼowekikoba omu Kiwandiike kiti, ‘Yabawaire ekyokulya okuzwa omwigulu balye.’ ”
43006032	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti oMusa tiniiye eyawaire abazeiza baanywe ekyokulya okuzwa omwigulu, wazira oBbaabba niiye agaba ekyokulya ekituuce okuzwa omwigulu.
43006033	Ekyo kityo olwakubba ekyokulya oKibbumba ekyagaba, niiye oyo oguyatumire okuzwa omwigulu era agabira abantu obwomi obutawaawo.”
43006034	Awo niiwo ibo okumukoba bati, “Sebo, okuzwa olwatyanu otuwenge kyokulya ekyo nago.”
43006035	Iye oYesu nʼalangirira ati, “Ninze ekyokulya ekyʼobwomi obwʼomwoyo bwʼomuntu. Era iye aiza egyendi era nʼanjikiririryamu, enzala waire nyonta tiyalimulumaku kadi.”
43006036	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera nʼabakoba ati, “Era nga mbakobeire, mumboine era musigaire nga timunjikiririryamu.
43006037	Abantu bonabona oBbaabba abampa baiza egyendi, era buli aiza egyendi, tinalimubbinga.
43006038	Ekyo kityo olwakubba tinaizire okuzwa omwigulu kukola bintaka, neye naizire kukola biibyo oKibbumba oyo eyantumire ebyataka.
43006039	Era binu niibyo ebintu eyantumire ebyataka, tataka ngotyeku kadi muntu omoiza kwabo abeyampaire, neye ataka mbazuukize oku lunaku oluyalisaliraku emisango.
43006040	Kale oBbaabba ekyataka kiri kiti, buli muntu ategeera ati ndi Mwana wa Kibbumba nʼanjikiririryamu asuna obwomi obutawaawo, era nalimuzuukiza oku lunaku olwenkomerero.”
43006041	Awo abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya ni beezulugumira oYesu olwakubba yakobere ati, “Ninze ekyokulya ekyazwire omwigulu.”
43006042	Era nga bakoba bati, “Omusaiza onu tiniiye oYesu omwana wa Yusufu? Oiteeye nʼomaaye tubamaite. Kale ayezya atya atyanu okukoba ati, ‘Nazwire omwigulu?’ ”
43006043	Iye oYesu nʼairamu ati, “Mulekeraawo okwezuluguma abanyere oku banyere.
43006044	Mpaawo ayezya okwiza egyendi wazira nga oBbaabba eyantumire niiye amulungamirye, era nze nalimuzuukiza oku lunaku olwʼenkomerero.
43006045	Bakiwandiikire omu kitabo kyʼabanaabbi bati, ‘Bonabona oKibbumba yalibeegesya.’ Kale buli awulira oBbaabba era nʼayega, aiza egyendi.
43006046	Mpaawo muntu abonangaku oBbaabba okutoolaku oyo eyazwereire omwigulu.
43006047	“Mbakobera amazima nti oyo anjikiririryamu, asuna obwomi obutawaawo.
43006048	Ninze ekyokulya ekyʼobwomi obwʼomwoyo.
43006049	Abazeiza baanywe baliire emaanu omu kitera, era ni bafa.
43006050	Neye kiinu ekyokulya ekizwa omwigulu, ikyo omuntu ekyayezya okulya nandi nʼafa.
43006051	Nze ninze ekyokulya ekyʼobwomi obwʼomwoyo ekyazwire omwigulu. Era singa omuntu yenayena alyaku ekyokulya ekyo, yalibba mwomi emirembe nʼemirembe. Era ekyokulya ekyo nago, niigwo omubiri gwange ogunaliwaayo olwʼabantu bʼoku kyalo okusuna obwomi bwʼomwoyo.”
43006052	Awo abeekubbemberi ba Bayudaaya ni banyiiga era ni batandiika okwakana abanyere oku banyere nga bakoba bati, “Omusaiza onu ayezya atya okutuwa omubirigwe okugulya?”
43006053	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti singa owemutalya omubiri gwa Mwana wa Muntu, era singa owemutanywa eisaayerye timwezya okubba boomi emirembe nʼemirembe.
43006054	Neye oyo alya omubiri gwange, era nʼanywa nʼeisaaye lyange, abba nʼobwomi obutawaawo era nalimuzuukiza oku lunaku lwʼenkomerero.
43006055	Ekyo kityo olwakubba omubiri gwange kyokulya kyʼomwoyo ekinanyerenyeere, era eisaaye lyange kyokunywa kyʼomwoyo ekinanyerenyeere.
43006056	“Kale oyo alya omubiri gwange, era anywa eisaaye lyange, abba nʼenkolagana na nze, era zena mba nʼenkolagana naye.
43006057	Era kityo nakimo olwakubba, ngʼoBbaabba eyantumire owaagaba obwomi, nze ndi mwomi ku lwa bwezyebwe. Era nʼomu ngeri enanyere eyo, oyo alya omubiri gwange yalibba mwomi ku lwa bwezye bwange.
43006058	Era ekyo niikyo ekyokulya ekyazwire omwigulu. Ibo abazeiza baanywe baliire emaanu era ni bafa, neye oyo alya oku kyokulya nze ekingaba, yalibba mwomi emirembe nʼemirembe.”
43006059	Ebyo oYesu yabitumwire oweyabbaire ngʼayegesya abantu omwikumbaaniro e Kaperenawumu.
43006060	Awo bangi oku beegibe owebawuliire ebyo, ni bakoba bati, “Enjegesya eyo nga nkakati! Naani ayezya okugiikirirya?”
43006061	Neye oYesu yabbaire amaite ati abeegibe beezuluguma olwʼenjegesya eyo, kale nʼabakoba ati, “Olwo inywe ekyo kibesitalisya?
43006062	Kaisi leero mwaliseega mutya owemwalibona oMwana wa Muntu ngʼaniina okukanga omwigulu egiyazwereire!
43006063	Iye oMwoyo wa Kibbumba niiye agaba obwomi obutawaawo, neye omuntu tayezya okukola ekintu kyonakyona olwʼobwezyebwe okululwe. Era ebibono ebimbakobeire niibyo ebizweraku omuntu okusuna obwomi obutawaawo.
43006064	Neye waliwo abamo kwinywe abatanjikiririryamu.” OYesu yakobere atyo olwakubba oweyatandikiire okwegesya, yabbaire amaite abo abatamwikiririryemu, era yabbaire amaite nʼayaba okumulyamu olukwe.
43006065	Kale awo ni yeeyongera okutumula ati, “Eyo niiyo ensonga lwaki nabakobeire nti mpaawo ayezya okwiza egyendi ngʼoKibbumba tamubbeereire.”
43006066	Awo okuzwera nakimo omu kiseera ekiyatumuliiremu atyo, bangi oku beegibe ni bamuzwaku, era ni batairayo okutambulanga naye.
43006067	Awo oYesu nʼabuulya abeegibe eikumi na babiri ati, “Na inywe nywena mutaka okunzwaku?”
43006068	Iye oSimooni Peetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Musengwa, nga twaba eeri naani? Niiwe wenkani otumula ebibono ebikwata oku ngeri eyʼokusuna obwomi obutawaawo.
43006069	Era atyanu iswe twikirirya, era tumaite tuti niiwe oMweru azwa eeri oKibbumba.”
43006070	Kale awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Tininze enabalonderemu inywe eikumi na babiri? Neye omoiza kwinywe omwoyogwe gulimu oSitaani!”
43006071	Yabbaire atumula ku Yuda, omwana wa Simooni Isikalyoti oyo eyabbaire ayaba okumulyamu olukwe, waire nga yabbaire moiza oku beegibe eikumi na babiri.
43007001	Ebyo owebyawoire, oYesu nʼatambuliranga omu bitundu byʼeitwale lyʼe Galiraaya nga tasala ensalo okwaba omwitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya. Ekyo kityo olwakubba aBayudaaya babbaire eeyo nga bamwekuumire okumwita.
43007002	Cooka omukolo ogwʼaBayudaaya ogubeeta bati, “ Mukolo ogwʼoBusiisira,” gwabbaire gwatira okutuuka.
43007003	Awo abaganda ba Yesu ni bamukoba bati, “Kikwetaagisya ozwe aanu oyabe omwitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya kaisi abeegibo beezye okubona ebyamagero ebyokola.
43007004	Ekyo kityo olwakubba mpaawo muntu abisabisa ekyakola neenu ngʼataka abantu bamumanye omu lwatu. Aale ngʼowookola ebyamagero binu, oyabe obikolere nʼeeyo yona abantu bonabona bakumanye.”
43007005	Ibo abagandabe batumwire batyo olwakubba ibo bona abananyere tibamwikiririryemu.
43007006	Nʼolwekyo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Ekiseera ekyange ekituuce ekyokwaba eeyo kikaali okutuuka. Neye inywe ekiseera kyonakyona kituuce inywe okweyabira.
43007007	Ekyo kityo olwakubba inywe abantu tibeezya okubacaawa, neye nze bancaawa olwakubba mbakobera nti ebikole ebibakola bibbibibbi.
43007008	Inywe mwabe oku mukolo, nze tinaabe ekiseera kinu, olwakubba ekiseera ekyange ekituuce ekyokwabiramu eeyo kikaali okutuuka.”
43007009	Era oYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, iye nʼasigalaku omu Galiraaya.
43007010	Neye abaganda ba Yesu owebamalire okwaba oku mukolo, oYesu yena nʼabasenjaaku cooka nga timu lwatu, neye mu mbiso.
43007011	Kaisi eeyo oku mbaga nago abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya babbaire bamunoonia nga babuulirirya bati, “Omusaiza oyo nago ali nkonaki?”
