43007012	Cooka omu kiziima kyʼabantu awo, wabbairewo okumuweweetaku nga kungi omu bantu. Abamo nga bakoba bati, “Musaiza musa.” Abamo nga ibo bakoba bati, “Bbe, abbeyabbeya abantu.”
43007013	Neye olwʼokutya abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya, ni watabbaawo amutumulaku omu lwatu.
43007014	Awo akati omu naku gyʼomukolo, oYesu nʼayaba omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, era nʼatandiika okwegesya abantu.
43007015	Era aBayudaaya ni beewunya ino engeri egyayegesyamu, era ni beebuulya bati, “Omusaiza oyo yasunire atya okumanya okwo atyo aate nga tasomangaku kadi byʼediini?”
43007016	Awo oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Binu ebinjegesya tibyange, wazira bizwa eeri Kibbumba iye eyantumire.
43007017	Singa omuntu yenayena asalawo okukola oKibbumba ebyataka, ategeera obanga ebinjegesya bizwa eeri Kibbumba, ooba ntumula byange-kuwange.
43007018	Iye omuntu atumula ebibye okululwe abikola lwʼokwenoonerya kitiisyakye. Neye oyo akolerera kusunisya yoodi eyamutumire kitiisya, abba atumula mazima, era tabbaamu bubbeyi.
43007019	Kaisi oMusa tiyabawaire aMateeka? Mbona kwinywe nywena mpaawo muntu akwata aMateeka ago. Aale nga inywe mukoba muti mugakwata, lwaki musala amalabuki okunjita?”
43007020	Awo ekiziima kyʼabantu ababbairewo ni bamwiramu bati, “Iwe koizi oliku muzimu! Naani asala amalabuki okukwita?”
43007021	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Nze nakolere ekyewunyo kimo oku Saabbaato, nywenanywena ni kibasisiwalya.
43007022	Neye nti nywena oku Saabbaato mukomoleraku abaana olwakubba oMusa yabalagiire okukomolanga waire wona tikwatandiikiire ku Musa. Cooka ekinanyerenyeere kiri kiti, okukomola okwo kwatandikiire ku bazeiza baanywe.
43007023	Atyanu obanga beezya okukomola omwana oku Saabbaato, olwʼokutavuna eiteeka lya Musa, aale lwaki munnyiigira nze olwʼokulamirya nʼakimo omuntu oku Saabbaato?
43007024	Kale okumanya ekituuce, timwasalawo kusinzirira ku ngeri egimubibonamu oku ngulu, neye musinzirire ku nsonga entuuce omu maiso ga Kibbumba.”
43007025	Awo abamo oku bantu abʼomu Yerusaalemi ababbaire awo, ni batandiika okwebuulyangana bati, “Omusaiza onu tiniiye ogubanoonia okwita?
43007026	Aate ngonu atumulira mu lwatu, era mpaawo nʼekibamukoba. Abʼobwezye beezya okubba nga bategereire nakimo bati onu niiye oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta?
43007027	Neye omusaiza onu iye tumaite egyazwera, aate nga iye oKurisito oweyaliiza, mpaawo eyalimanya egyazwera.”
43007028	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire ngʼakaali ayegesya omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, nʼalangirira ati, “Inywe museega muti mummaite, era muti nʼeginzwera mumaiteyo. Aale mumanye muti tinaizire kulwange, wazira oyo eyantumire dala aliyo, cooka inywe oyo ogumutamaite.
43007029	Neye nze mmumaite olwakubba nazwire gyali, era niiye eyantumire.”
43007030	Awo ni bagezyaku okumukwata, cooka ni watabbaawo amukubbyaku olwakubba ekiseerakye ekyʼokumukwata kyabbaire kikaali okutuuka.
43007031	Neye era bangi omu kiziima kyʼabantu ababbaire awo ni bamwikiririryamu, nga bakoba bati, “Kaisi nago oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta oweyaliiza yalikola obumanyiciryo wʼebyewunyo obukiraku onu obwakola?”
43007032	Awo aBafalisaayo ni bawulira ngʼabantu baweweeta oku oYesu, kale abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo ni batuma abaisulukale okumukwata.
43007033	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Njaba okumala na inywe ekiseera kitono, kaisi njabe egiri oyo eyantumire.
43007034	Era mwalinnoonia neye timwalimbona, era inywe timwezya okutuuka eginjaba.”
43007035	Awo abeekubbemberi ba Bayudaaya ni bakobangana bati, “Omusaiza onu ataka kwaba yaina egitutalyezya okumubonera? Ataka kwaba giri bantu baiswe badi abasalaanikiire omu Buyonaani, ayezye okwegesya aBayonaani?
43007036	Ategeeza niki okukoba ati, ‘Mwalinoonia, neye timwalimbona,’ era ati, ‘Inywe timwezya okutuuka eginjaba?’ ”
43007037	Oku lunaku olusembayo era nga niirwo olukira obukulu oku Mukolo ogwʼoBusiisira, oYesu nʼayemerera, era nʼatumula maaminkirira ati, “Buli muntu enyonta ogweruma, aize egyendi anywe.
43007038	Iye yenayena anjikiririryamu ayezya okwiza nʼanywa. Ekyo kityo olwakubba eKiwandiike kikoba kiti: ‘Eiruba lyʼamaizi agʼobwomi obutawaawo lyalikulumuka nga lizwa omu omuntu oyo nago.’ ”
43007039	Ekyo oYesu yakitumwire ngʼategeeza Mwoyo oMweru abamwikiririryamu ogubabbaire baaba okusuna egibwizaku. Paka omu kiseera ekyo, babbaire bakaali okubawa oMwoyo oMweru olwakubba nti oKibbumba yabbaire akaali okugulumalya oYesu.
43007040	Kale awo abantu bʼomu kiziima ekyo owebawuliire ebibono ebyo, abamo ni bakoba bati, “Dala onu niiye onaabbi oodi ogubatusuubizire.”
43007041	Ibo abandi ni bakoba bati, “Onu niiye oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.” Kaisi abandi ni batala-butali bati, “OKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta ayezya atya okuzwa mu Galiraaya?
43007042	Ikyo eKiwandiike tikikoba kiti yalizwa mwibyaire lya Dawudi, era balimubyalira mu Bbeserekeemu, ikyo ekibuga omu babyala oDawudi?”
43007043	Kale omu ngeri eyo abantu ni batuuka omu butategeragana olwa Yesu.
43007044	Era awo abamo kwibo ni bataka okumukwata, neye era ni watabbaawo amukubbyaku.
43007045	Awo ekyazwiremu abaisulukale abakuumi bʼeYeekaalu ni bakanga egiri abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo. Kale ibo ni babuulya abaisulukale bati, “Lwaki timumuleetere?”
43007046	Abaisulukale ni bairamu bati, “Mpaawo muntu eyabbaire atumwire ebyʼamaani ooti biidi oodi ebyatumula!”
43007047	ABafalisaayo ni babairamu bati, “Ekimutegeeza muti inywe nywena abaliibirye?
43007048	Inywe mwabbaire muboineku iswe abafugi baanywe, ooba oMufalisaayo yenayena ngʼamwikiririryamu?
43007049	Naire! Okutoolaku ekikoosi kyʼabantu abatamaite amateeka ga Musa, kaisi nago ekikoosi ekiraame!”
43007050	Kale iye oNikodemu omoiza kwibo nago abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya, era iye enyumaku eyaabire obwire egiri oYesu, awo nʼabuulya abainaye ati,
43007051	“Amateeka gaiswe gaikirirya okusalira omuntu omusango nga bakaali okumuwozesya nʼokutegeera ekisobyo ekyakolere?”
43007052	Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Kaisi wena ozwera mwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya? Weekeenenye eBiwandiike. Ala omanye oti e Galiraaya mpaawo naabbi azwerayo.” [
43007053	Kale awo buli muntu nʼakanga e wuwe.
43008001	Awo iye oYesu nʼayaba oku Lusozi olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni.
43008002	Kaisi amakeezi pwi nʼakanga omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, era abantu bonabona ni baaba egyali, kale nʼatyama okubeegesya.
43008003	Yabbaire akaali ali aawo abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼaBafalisaayo ni baleeta omukali ogubakwatiire omu bulendi, awo ni bamuteeka akati bonabona owebeezya okumubonera.
43008004	Awo ni bakoba oYesu bati, “ Musomesya, omukali onu bamukwatiire omu kikole kyʼobulendi.
43008005	Cooka omu Mateeka, oMusa yatulagiire kubakubbanga nʼamabbaale ni bafa abakali abebakwatira omu bulendi. Atyanu iwe okoba otya kwekyo?”
43008006	Ibo abakugu bakoleserye ekibuulyo ekyo ngʼakatego, kaisi basune ekibazweraku okumuloopa. Neye oYesu omu kityamo awo nʼakotama kaisi nʼatandiika okuwandiika ansi nʼolunwe.
43008007	Era abavunaana omukali nago owebeeyongeire okubuulya oYesu ebibuulyo, nʼagangamuka kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Owewabbaawo mwinywe atakolangaku ekikole ekibbikibbi niiye abbe asooke okukubba omukali oyo eibbaale.”
43008008	Awo tete oYesu nʼakotama, nʼawandiika ansi.
43008009	Cooka ibo owebawuliire ekyo, ni batandiika okuzwangawo moiza ku moiza, okusookesya nʼabakira obukulu kaisi abatobato ni bairangaku. Abantu beeyongeire okuzwawo paka oYesu oweyasigaire awo yenkani nʼomukali nago nga iye akaali ayemereire awo.
43008010	Kale awo tete oYesu nʼagangamuka, kaisi nʼabuulya omukali nago ati, “Mukali iwe, banu bali yaina? Mpaawo agukusingisirye?”
43008011	Iye omukali nago nʼamwiramu ati, “Mpaawo sebo.” Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Na nze zena tingukusingisya. Aale atyanu weeyabire, neye olekewo empisa yʼokukolanga ekibbikibbi.”]
43008012	OYesu tete oweyabbaire atumula nʼabantu, yabakobere ati, “Ninze ekitangaala ekimolekera abantu. Era buli ansengererya tatambulirenge omu ndikiirya, wazira namulungamyanga omu nzira ereeta obwomi.”
43008013	Awo aBafalisaayo ni bamukoba bati, “Iwe onyere weetumulaku anambula gondi akakasa ebyotumula, kale ebiwetumulaku tibikola.”
43008014	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Waire nga ninze onyere owenetumulaku, ebintumula bituuce olwakubba mmaite eginazwire nʼeginjaba. Neye inywe timumaiteku eginazwire, waire eginjaba.
43008015	Inywe musala omusango kusinzirira ku malabuki gʼobuntu, cooka nze mpaawo muntu ogunsalira omusango.
43008016	Neye singa owemba kusala musango, ensala yange ebba ntuuce olwakubba timba zenkani. Nze mbawo nʼoBbaabba eyantumire.
43008017	Ebyo nga biri awo nʼomu Mateeka gaanywe agʼeKiyudaaya, bakiwandiikire bati obujulizi bwʼabantu ababiri ngʼabufaanana bukakasa buti ekibutumulaku kituuce.
43008018	Nze nkobera abantu ebinfaaku kaisi ogondi abakobera ebinfaaku niiye oBbaabba eyantumire.”
43008019	Awo ni bamubuulya bati, “OIteewo ali yaina?” OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Nze timuntegeera, kadi Bbaabba yena timumutegeera. Aale singa nze mubbaire muntegeera, nʼoBbaabba yena mwandibbaire mumutegeera.”
43008020	Ebibono ebyo oYesu yabitumwire oweyabbaire ngʼayegesya omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu okumpi nʼekifo egibaweranga ebirabo. Neye era omu kaseera ako tiwabbairewo waire moiza amukwata, olwakubba ekiseerakye ekyʼokumukwata kyabbaire kikaali okutuuka.
43008021	Awo tete oYesu nʼakoba abeekubbemberi ba Bayudaaya ati, “Nze ndi kuzwawo, kaisi era inywe mwalinnoonia, era mwalifeera omu kibbikibbi kyanywe. Era nze eginjaba inywe timwezya okwabayo.”
43008022	Kale awo abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya ni beebuulyangana bati, “Ayaba kweita? Ekyo niikyo ekyategeeza okukoba ati, ‘Nze eginjaba, inywe timwezya okwabayo?’ ”
43008023	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba aBayudaaya abo nago ati, “Inywe muli bʼoku kyalo kunu, neye nze nazwire mwigulu. Inywe muli bʼoku kyalo, neye nze tindi wʼoku kyalo.
43008024	Ekyo niikyo ekigira mbakobeire nti mwalifeera omu bikole byanywe ebibbibibbi. Era dala mwalibifeeramu okutoolaku nga mwikiriirye muti ninze oyo ngʼowenetumulaku.”
43008025	Awo ni bamubuulya bati, “Weeyeta otya?” OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Ninze oyo ogumbakoberanga nenca okuzwera nakimo owenatandikiire okutumula na inywe.
43008026	Cooka nandibbaire mbatumulaku bingi era nʼokubasingisya omusango, neye eyantumire mwesigwa era ekinasunire okuzwa egyali niikyo ekinkobera abantu.”
43008027	Era aBayudaaya abo nago tibategeire bati oYesu yabbaire abakobera kwIteeye oKibbumba.
43008028	Kale awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Owemwalimala okwanika oMwana wa Muntu oku musalabba, kaisi awo niiye owemwalitegeerera muti ninze oyo ngʼowenetumulaku. Era wemwalitegeerera muti nze mpaawo ekinkola okulwange, neye ntumula biibyo ebinanyerenyeere oBbaabba ebiyanjegeserye.
43008029	Era nago oyo eyantumire ali na nze, tandekanga zenkani, olwakubba bulijo nkola biibyo ebimusangaalya.”
43008030	Era oYesu nʼoweyabbaire atumula ebyo, abantu bangi ni bamwikiririryamu.
43008031	Awo oYesu nʼakoba aBayudaaya ibo ababbaire bamwikiririiryemu ati, “Singa owemugumira oku bintu ebimbeegesya, mubbeera nakimo beegi bange.
43008032	Era awo mwalimanya amazima agazwa e wa Kibbumba, era nʼamazima ago galibatoola omu bugalama ni gabasuuca abʼeidembe.”
43008033	Awo aBayudaaya ni bamwiramu bati, “Iswe tuli baizukulu ba Ibbulaimu, era titubbangaku bagalama bʼomuntu yenayena. Atyanu obba otya okutukoba oti twasuuka bʼeidembe?”
43008034	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti buli akola ekikole ekibbikibbi, abba mugalama wʼekikole ekibbikibbi.
43008035	Era iye omugalama tabba wʼenkalaakalira omu kisito oomwo, neye omwana abba waamu emirembe nʼemirembe.
43008036	Nʼolwekyo oMwana wa Kibbumba owabasuuca abʼeidembe okuzwa omu bugalama obwo, mwalibba bʼeidembe ino.
43008037	Inywe mukoba muti muli baizukulu ba Ibbulaimu, aate nga musala amalabuki okunjita olwakubba ebintu ebinjegesya timubiikirirya.
43008038	Cooka nze mbakobera ebinaboine e wa Bbaabba, na inywe mukola bya itewaanywe oSitaani ebyabakoba.”
43008039	Awo ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Iswe ozeiza waiswe Ibbulaimu.” Iye oYesu niiye okubakoba ati, “Singa mubbaire baizukulu ba Ibbulaimu, mwandibbaire mukola oIbbulaimu ebiyakolere.
43008040	Neye era kityo wekiri olwakubba muli bamaliriri okunjita, cooka nze omusaiza abakobeire amazima agenawuliire okuzwa eeri oKibbumba. Iye oIbbulaimu ebyo tiyabikolere.
43008041	Inywe mukola biibyo oitewaanywe ebyakola.” Ibo ni bamukoba bati, “Iswe tituli baana bʼe nza, tuli baana bananyerenyeere aba Kibbumba.”
43008042	Iye awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Singa dala muli baana ba Kibbumba, mwankubbaire muntaka olwakubba nazwire giri Kibbumba, era tinaizire kulwange, wazira iye onyere niiye eyantumire.
43008043	Aale lwaki mubba timutegeera ebintumula? Timwezya okubitegeera olwakubba timutaka okubiikirirya.
43008044	Cooka inywe muli ba itewaanywe oSitaani, era muyayaanira kukola biibyo oitewaanywe ebyasiima. Iye okuzwera nakimo owebabbumbiire ekyalo iye mutemo, era iye tagumira oku mazima ga Kibbumba olwakubba mwiye mpaamu mazima. Era owaatumula obubbeyi, abba atumula kiidi ekyʼekikulakye olwakubba iye mubbeyi, era niiye okibyali wʼobubbeyi.
43008045	Neye nze olwakubba ntumula amazima ga Kibbumba, timwikirirya ebinkoba.”
43008046	Era awo ni yeeyongera ati, “Waliwo kwinywe ayezya okunnumiriza ekibbikibbi? Aale owemba nti ntumula mazima, lwaki timwikirirya ebinkoba?
43008047	Iye omuntu wa Kibbumba, awulira ebibono bya Kibbumba. Kale inywe ekigira ni mutawulira oKibbumba, kiri kiti, timuli ba Kibbumba.”
43008048	Awo abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya ni bairamu oYesu bati, “Tituli batuuce okukoba tuti oli ooti Musamaaliya era oliku muzimu?”
43008049	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Nze tindi ku muzimu, wazira nteekamu oBbaabba ekitiisya, neye inywe mumbityamu amaiso.
43008050	Nze tindi kwenooneryanga kitiisya mwinywe. Neye waliwo oodi, aate nga niiye omulamuzi omu nsonga eenu, ali kutakanga ati nze bampe ekitiisya.
43008051	Cooka mbakobera amazima nti singa omuntu yenayena akwata ekibono kyange tiyalifa emirembe nʼemirembe.”
43008052	Awo aBayudaaya abo nago owebawuliire ebyo ni bamukoba bati, “Atyanu tukakasiire nakimo tuti oli mugwairalu! Obanga oIbbulaimu yafiire, era nʼabanaabbi bona bafiire, kaisi iwe nʼokoba oti omuntu yenayena akwata ekibonokyo tiyalirega oku kufa naire!
43008053	Iwe okiraku ozeiza waiswe oIbbulaimu? Obanga iye yafiire era nʼabanaabbi bona bafiire! Iwe weeyeta otya?”
43008054	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Singa nze owenegulumalya, ekitiisya kyange kibba kinambulamu. Cooka iye oBbaabba, oyo inywe ogumukoba muti niiye oKibbumba waanywe, niiye angulumalya.
43008055	Waire inywe timumutegeera, neye nze mmutegeera. Era singa nkobere nti timmumaite, nandibbaire mubbeyi ooti niinywe. Neye nze mmumaite, era nkwata ekibonokye.
43008056	Iye ozeiza waanywe oIbbulaimu oweyamanyicirye ati baaba okuntuma oku kyalo yajaagaanire era nʼabba nga akirengerera yala omu mwoyogwe era oweyakiboine nʼabba musangaali.”
43008057	Awo abeekubbemberi ba Bayudaaya nago ni bamukoba bati, “Iwe akaali okwerya emyanka 50 egyʼobukulu, era waboineku oIbbulaimu!”
43008058	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti oIbbulaimu babbaire bakaali nʼokumubyala, nga nze ndiwo.”
43008059	Awo owebawuliire ekyo ni bakwata amabbaale okumukubba, neye oYesu ni yeebisa, era nʼawuluka okuzwa omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu.
43009001	Awo oYesu oweyabbaire atambula nʼabeegibe, nʼabona omusaiza ogubabyaire nga mwofu.
43009002	Ibo abeegibe ni bamubuulya bati, “ Musomesya, oku musaiza oyo nʼababyairebe naani eyakolere ekikole ekibbikibbi ekyagirire ni bamubyala nga mwofu?”
43009003	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Timusaiza oyo ooba babyairebe niibo abakolere ekikole ekibbikibbi, neye bamubyaire nga mwofu kaisi abantu beezye okubona amaani ga Kibbumba nga gakola mwiye.
43009004	Aale nga kukaali musana omuntu owaayezyerya okukola, kyetaagisya okukola omulimo gwʼoyo eyantumire. Nʼolwekyo, nkola omu kiseera kinu olwakubba ekiseera kiiza obwire nga bwirugaire owenalibba nga tinkaali mpezya okukola.
43009005	Cooka nze nga nkaali ndi oku kyalo, ninze ekitangaala ekimolekera abantu.”
43009006	Awo oYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼayanda ebitanta ansi okwitakali, era nʼatuga eitakali eeryo nʼebita, kaisi nʼalisiiga oku maiso gʼomusaiza omwofu nago.
43009007	Awo kaisi nʼamukoba ati, “Oyabe onaabe omu maiso oku kidiba ekibeeta oSirowaamu.” Kale omusaiza oyo nʼayaba nʼanaaba omu maiso era nʼakanga e ika ngʼabona.
43009008	Cooka abaliranwabe nʼabantu abandi abamubonanga ngʼasabirirya owebamuboine, ni babuulyangana bati, “Omusaiza oyo tiniiye eyatyamanga eedi era nʼasabiriryanga?”
43009009	Era abamo kwibo nago ni bakoba bati niiye. Ibo abandi nga bakoba bati, “Kadi, amufaanana-bufaanani.” Neye omusaiza onyere nʼabakakasa ati, “Ninze omusaiza eyabbaire omwofu.”
43009010	Kale awo ni bamubuulya bati, “Aale atyanu amaisogo gabbaire gatya okubona?”
43009011	Awo iye nʼabairamu ati, “Omusaiza ogubeeta oYesu niiye eyatugire eitakali kaisi nʼalinsiiga oku bitigi. Era nʼankoba okwaba oku kidiba oSirowaamu okunaaba omu maiso. Nʼolwekyo ni njaba, ni naaba, era ni mpezya okubona.”
43009012	Awo ibo ni bamubuulya bati, “Omusaiza oyo nago ali yaina?” Iye nʼabairamu ati, “Timmaite.”
43009013	Awo abantu abo ni baaba nʼomusaiza nago eyabbaireku omwofu eeri abamo oku Bafalisaayo.
43009014	Cooka olunaku oYesu oluyatugiireku eitakali era nʼokulamya amaiso agʼomusaiza nago, lwabbaire ku Saabbaato.
43009015	Nʼolwekyo aBafalisaayo bona ni babuulya omusaiza oyo engeri egiyalamiremu amaiso. Iye nʼabairamu ati, “OYesu yatugire itakali nʼalinsiiga oku bitigi, kaisi ni njaba ni naabaku era atyanu mbona.”
43009016	Awo abamo oku Bafalisaayo ni bakoba bati, “Omusaiza oYesu oyo tiyazwire wa Kibbumba olwakubba takwata eiteeka lyʼeSaabbaato.” Neye abandi ni bakoba bati, “Omuntu akola ebibbibibbi ayezya atya okukola obumanyiciryo wʼebyewunyo obwenkana awo?” Kale ni wabbaawo okugabukanamu omu biseego.
43009017	Awo ekyazwiremu abeekubbemberi bʼaBafalisaayo tete ni baira oku musaiza eyabbaire omwofu era ni bamubuulya bati, “Yakulamirye niiwe amaiso. Iwe omutumulaku otya?” Iye nʼabairamu ati, “Nseega nti naabbi.”
43009018	Neye abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya era tibaikiriirye bati omusaiza oyo yabbaireku mwofu nʼalama-bulami, paka owebatumisirye okweta ababyairebe.
43009019	Kale ababyairebe owebatuukire, omoiza oku beekubbemberi nʼababuulya ati, “Onu mutaane waanywe? Niiye onu ogumukoba muti mwamubyaire nga mwofu? Kiiza kitya okubba nti atyanu ayezya okubona?”
43009020	Awo ababyaire bʼomusaiza nago ni bairamu bati, “Tumaite tuti oyo mutaane waiswe, era tumaite tuti twamubyaire nga mwofu.
43009021	Neye titumaite owebyabbaire kaisi atyanu nabba ngʼayezya okubona, era titumaiteku eyamulamirye amaiso. Onyere ngoyo muntu mukulu, mumubuulye, iye onyere yeetumulira.”
43009022	Cooka ababyaire bʼomusaiza eyabbaire omwofu batumwire batyo lwa kutya beekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya. Ekyo kityo olwakubba aBayudaaya babbaire bamalire okutegeragana bati buli muntu eyabbutulanga ati oYesu niiye oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta, bamubbinganga-bubbingi omwikumbaaniro.
43009023	Era ekyo niikyo ekyagirire ababyaire bʼomwofu nago ni bakoba bati, “Onyere ngoyo muntu mukulu, mumubuulye.”
43009024	Kale awo tete omulundi gwokubiri ni beeta omusaiza nago eyabbaireku omwofu, ni bamukoba bati, “Otumule amazima omu maiso ga Kibbumba, Iswe tumaite tuti omusaiza ogwotumulaku akola ebibbibibbi.”
43009025	Iye nʼabairamu ati, “Ooba akola ebibbibibbi ooba bbe, nze timmaite. Cooka nze ekintu kimo ekimmaiteku nti nabbaire mwofu neye atyanu mbona.”
43009026	Tete ni bairamu okumubuulya bati, “OYesu niki ekiyakukolere? Era yakulamirye atya amaisogo?”
43009027	Iye nʼabairamu ati, “Mbakobeire ira ni mugaana okuwulisisya. Olwo lwaki tete mutaka okubiwulira? Nywena mutaka kusuuka beegibe?”
43009028	Awo ni bamuzuma, era ni bakoba bati, “Niiwe omwegi wʼamusaiza nago, neye iswe tuli beegi ba Musa.
43009029	Era iswe tumaite nakusani tuti oKibbumba yatumwire nʼoMusa, neye oyo omusaiza iswe titumaite nʼegyazwera.”
43009030	Awo iye omusaiza eyabbaireku omwofu nʼabairamu ati, “Kinu nga kyewunyisya ino, inywe okukoba muti timumaite omusaiza oyo egyazwera, aate nga nze yandamirye amaiso!
43009031	Cooka tumaite tuti oKibbumba tairamu okusaba kwʼabakola ebibbibibbi. Neye airamu kusaba kwʼomuntu amuwa ekitiisya, era akola oKibbumba iye ebyataka.
43009032	Aate mpaawo awulirangaku ati balamirye amaiso ga muntu ogubabyaire nga mwofu.
43009033	Kale oyo eyandamirye amaiso singa oKibbumba tiniiye eyamutumire, tiyandyezyerye okukola ekyo ekiyakolere.”
43009034	Iye omusaiza oyo oweyakobere atyo aBayudaaya abo nago ni bamukoba bati, “Iwe ogubabyaliire mu kibbikibbi era nʼokulira mu kibbikibbi, wena niiwe ogezyaku okutwegesya iswe?” Era ni bamubbinga omwikumbaaniro.
43009035	Kale awo oYesu nʼawulira ati omusaiza oguyalamirye amaiso bamubbingire omwikumbaaniro. Era oYesu nʼayaba nʼamunoonia era nʼamubona. Awo oweyaboine omusaiza nago, oYesu nʼamubuulya ati, “Oikiririrya omu Mwana wa Muntu?”
43009036	Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Sebo, niiye onaani oyo? Kaade onkobere njezye okumwikiririryamu?”
43009037	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Omalire atyanu okumubona; era dala niiye onu atumula na iwe.”
43009038	Awo iye omusaiza oyo nʼamwiramu ati, “Musengwa, nkwikiririryamu,” era nʼakoma amazwi okusinza oYesu.
43009039	Kale awo oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Nze naizire oku kyalo kumanyikisya bantu ebibbibibbi byabwe, kaisi ababbaire boofu beezye okubona, tete ababbaire babona, boofuwale.”
43009040	Awo aBafalisaayo ababbaire awo okumpi nʼoYesu, owebawuliire ngʼoYesu atumula atyo, ni bamubuulya bati, “Okoba niki? Ekyokoba swena tuli boofu?”
43009041	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Singa mubbaire boofu, timwandibbaireku omusango gwʼekibbikibbi. Neye atyanu ngʼowemukoba muti mubona, musigala nʼomusango gwʼekibbikibbi kyanywe.”
43010001	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti omuntu atabita omu mulyango ngʼaingira omu kiraalo kyʼentaama, neye ni yeeyazya kungirira awandi, oyo abba mwibbi era mukondo.
43010002	Iye oyo aingirira omu mulyango niiye omuliisya onyere entaama.
43010003	Era omukuumi wʼekiraalo amwigulirawo, nʼentaama gitegeera eigonolye iye ngʼomuliisya waagyo. Entaamagye agyeta amaliina, era nʼagiwuluca e nza.
43010004	Owaamala okugiwuluca gyonagyona, agyekubbemberera ni gimusengererya olwakubba gimaite eigonolye.
43010005	Neye tigyalisengereryaku kadi ogugitamaite, wazira gimwirukaku-bwiruki olwakubba tigimaite eigonolye.”
43010006	OYesu yatumwire nʼabantu ababbaire awo omu lugero lunu, neye tibategeire ekiyabbaire abakoba.
43010007	Kale awo oYesu tete nʼatumula nabo ati, “Mbakobera amazima nti ninze aali ooti mulyango gwʼekiraalo kyʼentaama.
43010008	Ibo abandi bonabona abaizire nga nkaali okwiza nga beefananyiriza nze, baibbi era bakondo, neye ngʼentaama owegitawulisisya ogugitamaite, abantu bona tibabawulisisirye.
43010009	Ninze omulyango, era buli muntu yenayena abita mu nze alokoka. Ibo abo babba ooti ntaama egingira era ni giwuluka okwaba okuliisya.
43010010	Iye omwibbi aizirira kwibba, nʼokwita, nʼokujigirica. Neye nze naizire, kaisi abantu babbe nʼobwomi, era babbe nabwo mu bwizulye.”
43010011	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba ati, “Ninze omuliisya wʼentaama omusa, iye oyo awaayo obwomibwe olwʼentaamagye.
43010012	Cooka iye omupakasi, iye tabba ooti muliisya onyere entaama. Era owaabona omusege nga gwiza, iye alekaawo-buleki entaama ni yeirukirawo. Kale awo omusege gwiza ni gulumba entaama, ni gukwataku omoiza waaku era nʼegindi ni gisalaanika.
43010013	Iye yeirukirawo olwakubba iye mupakasi era entaama tagirumirwa.
43010014	“Neye nze ndi muliisya wʼentaama omusa. Nze mmaite entaama gyange era gyona gimmaite.
43010015	Ekikoba nti, ngʼoBbaabba owammaite ati ndi mwanawe, zena ntyo mmumaite nti niiye oBbaabba, era mpaayo obwomi bwange oku lwʼentaama gyange.
43010016	Cooka ndi nʼentaama egindi egitali gyʼomu kiraalo kinu. Nteekwa gyona okugireeta. Era gyona gyaliwulira eigono lyange, era walibbaawo ekiraalo kimo nʼomuliisya moiza.
43010017	Era ekigira oBbaabba nabba antaka, niikyo nti nze naliwaayo obwomi bwange ni banjita oku lwʼentaama gyange kaisi tete ni nzuukira.
43010018	Neye mpaawo aali nʼobwezye okunjita, wazira nze onyere naliwaayo-buwi obwomi bwange. Ndi nʼobwezye okubuwaayo, era nʼoluzwanyuma tete okubweirirya. Era ekyo niikyo oBbaabba ekiyandagiire okukola.”
43010019	Awo, olwʼebibono ebyo tete abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya ni bagabukanamu omu nseega.
43010020	Era abakira obungi kwibo ni bakoba bati, “Oyo aliku omuzimu, era agwire eiralu, lwaki mumuwulisisya?”
43010021	Cooka ibo abandi nga bakoba bati, “Ebyo tiniibyo ebibono byʼomuntu aliku omuzimu. Aale omuzimu gwona gwezya okulamya amaiso gʼomwofu?”
43010022	Awo ngʼebyo biwoire, omu Yerusaalemi, ni wabbaawo oMukolo ogwʼoKuwonga eYeekaalu, era bwabbaire bwire bwa buwolondoki.
43010023	Era oYesu yabbaire atambulatambula omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, omu kigango ekibeetanga bati pooci ya kabaka oSulemaani.
43010024	Awo aBayudaaya abamo ni bamweruguulirirya, ni bamubuulya bati, “Walituuca di okutuleka omu kubuusabuusa? Otukobere lwatu obanga niiwe oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.”
43010025	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Nabakobeire eira, neye timwaikiriirye. Obukakafu bwʼekyo ekyendi niibyo ebyewunyo ebyenkola omu bwezye bwa Bbaabba.
43010026	Neye inywe timunjikirirya olwakubba timuli bange.
43010027	Ngʼentaama owegiwulisisya eigono lyʼomuliisya waagyo, abantu ibo abange bona niiye owebawulisisya ebibono byange. Nze abo nago mbamaite, era bansengererya.
43010028	Abo mbawa obwomi obutawaawo, era tibalijigirika naire. Era mpaawo ayezya okubannyagulaku omu ngalo.
43010029	OBbaabba eyabampaire, iye akira bonabona obwezye, kale mpaawo ayezya okubanyagula omu ngalo gya Bbaabba.
43010030	Ekyo kityo olwakubba nze nʼoBbaabba tuli kimo.”
43010031	Awo abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya tete ni bakwata amabbaale okutaka okwita oYesu.
43010032	Neye iye nʼabakoba ati, “Muboine ebyewunyo bingi ebinkolere oBbaabba ebiyankobere okukola. Olwo kiri yaina kwebyo ekimusinziriraku okutaka okunkubba amabbaale?”
43010033	Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Mpaawo kwebyo ekitusinziriraku okutaka okukukubba amabbaale, neye lwa kuzumirira Kibbumba olwakubba iwe omuntu-obuntu, weeyeta okubba Kibbumba.”
43010034	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Tibakiwandiikire omu Mateeka gaanywe bati oKibbumba yakobere ati, ‘Muli bakibbumba.’
43010035	Era mumaite muti eBiwandiike tibeezya okubivunawo. Kale obanga abantu abasunire obukwenda bwa Kibbumba, yabeetere ‘bakibbumba,’
43010036	kaisi leero oodi iye oBbaabba oguyatukwirye era nʼamutuma nʼoku kyalo? Aale inywe lwaki munvunaana olwʼekizumi, nze olwakubba nkobere nti, ‘Ndi Mwana wa Kibbumba?’
43010037	Mwandingaine lwʼokutakola Bbaabba ebyakola.
43010038	Neye owembikola, newankubbaire mungaana, aale mwikiriryeku ebyamagero, kaisi mumanye era mutegeere muti oBbaabba ali nʼenkolagana na nze era zena ndi nʼenkolagana nʼoBbaabba.”
43010039	Era awo ni bagezyaku tete okumukwata, neye nʼababunuka.
43010040	Awo, oluzwanyuma oYesu nʼasalamu omwiga oYoludaani nʼakanga omu kifo oYokaana egiyabbaireku omu naku gyʼenyumaku ngʼabatiza. Nabbaaku eeyo,
43010041	era abantu bangi ni baabanga egyali, nga bakoba bati, “Waire oYokaana tiyakolereku akamanyiciryo kʼekyewunyo, neye byonabyona ebiyatumwire oku musaiza onu, byʼamazima.”
43010042	Era omu kifo ekyo bangi ni bamwikiririryamu.
43011001	Lumo omusaiza ogubeeta oLazaalo, owʼoku kyalo kyʼe Bbesaniya, yabbaire mulwaire. Era aboonyokobe, oMalyamu nʼoMaliza bona babbaire batyami bʼoku kyalo ekyo.
43011002	OMalyamu oyo, omwonyoko wa Lazaalo eyabbaire omulwaire niiye onyere oyo oluzwanyuma eyasiigire oMusengwa amafuta agakaloosa oku bigere, era nʼabisiimuula nʼenziiri gyʼokumutwegwe.
43011003	Kale abakali abo abaganda, ni baweererya oYesu obukwenda bati, “Musengwa, omukaagwawo ogwotaka eino mulwaire.”
43011004	Neye oYesu oweyakiwuliire, nʼakoba ati, “Obulwaire obwo tibwamuzweremu kufa kadi. Wazira kigendereire kugulumalya Kibbumba, era kaisi oMwana wa Kibbumba bamugulumalye okubita mwekyo.”
43011005	Kiri nti oYesu yabbaire ataka ino oMaliza nʼomugandawe nʼoLazaalo.
43011006	Neye aate oweyawuliire ati oLazaalo mulwaire, tete nʼasigalayo egiyabbaire enaku egindi ibiri.
43011007	Oluzwanyuma nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Tukange e Buyudaaya.”
43011008	Neye abeegibe ni bamukoba bati, “ Musomesya, eizuuli bunu aBayudaaya babbaire bataka okukukubba amabbaale, tete eeyo gyotaka okukanga?”
43011009	OYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Esaawa egyʼomusana tigibba ikumi na ibiri? Iye omuntu atambula omusana tiyeesitaala olwakubba abba atambulira mu kitangaala ekyaka oku kyalo kunu.
43011010	Neye omuntu atambula obwire, niiye eyesitaala olwakubba abba adamba ekitangaala mwiye.”
43011011	Awo oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼabakobera ati, “Omukaagwa waiswe oLazaalo agonere, neye njabayo okumulamuca.”
43011012	Abeegi ni bamukoba bati, “Musengwa, abba agonere, yalamuka.”
43011013	Cooka oYesu iye yabbaire atumula ku kufa kwa Lazaalo, neye abeegibe ni baseega bati ategeeza kugona ndoolo.
43011014	Kale awo nʼabakobera lwatu ati, “OLazaalo afiire,
43011015	era okulwanywe nsangaire olwakubba timbaireyo, kaisi oolwo mwezye okunjikiririryamu. Aale atyanu twabeyo egyali.”
43011016	Awo oTomasi ogubeeta “oMulongo,” nʼakoba abeegi abainaye ati, “Swena oleke twabe tufeere aamo nʼoMusengwa.”
43011017	OYesu oweyabbaire yatira okutuuka e Bbesaniya, nʼamanyica ati oLazaalo amalire enaku ina omu magombe.
43011018	E Bbesaniya kyabbaire kumpi nʼe Yerusaalemi, era wabbairewo ekiromita ooti isatu.
43011019	Era aBayudaaya bangi okuzwa e Yerusaalemi, babbaire baabire okubona oMaliza nʼoMalyamu olwʼokufiirwa omwonyoko waabwe.
43011020	Awo oMaliza oweyawuliire ati oYesu ali kwabayo, nʼayaba okumwaniriza, neye oMalyamu iye nʼasigala ika.
43011021	OMaliza oweyasangaine oYesu, nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Musengwa aale singa wabbairewo, omwonyoko wange tiyankafiire!
43011022	Neye mmaite nti atyanu, buli ekiwasaba oKibbumba, yakukolera.”
43011023	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “OMwonyokowo ayaba okuzuukira.”
43011024	OMaliza nʼamwiramu ati, “Mmaite nti yalizuukira omu kuzuukira okwʼolunaku olwʼenkomerero.”
43011025	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Ninze azuukiza, era agaba obwomi obutawaawo. Buli anjikiririryamu, nʼowaafa, tete yalibba mwomi.
43011026	Era buli muntu omwomi era anjikiririryamu, tiyalifa emirembe nʼemirembe. Ekyo okiikirirya?”
43011027	Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Niikyo Musengwa, njikirirya nti niiwe oKurisito oMwana wa Kibbumba, oguyasukireku amafuta. Era niiwe oyo eyabbaire nʼokwiza oku kyalo.”
43011028	Era oMaliza oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼakanga e ika, nʼairya omugandawe oMalyamu oku mbale, nʼamukoba kyama ati, “OMusomesya aizire, era akubuulya.”
43011029	OMalyamu oweyawuliire ekyo, nʼasetuka mangu, nʼayaba okwaniriza oYesu.
43011030	Awo oYesu yabbaire akaali okwingira omu kitundu ekyo, neye ngʼakaali ali mu kitundu oMaliza ekiyamwajiiryemu.
43011031	Awo aBayudaaya ababbaire nʼoMalyamu omu nyumba nga baizire okubabona, owebaboine ngʼasetukire mangu nʼawuluka, ni bamusenjaaku. Babbaire baseega bati demba nabba ngʼayaba ku magombe kukunga.
43011032	Awo oMalyamu oweyatuukireyo, era nʼabona oYesu, nʼakoma amazwi okumpi nʼebigerebye, nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, aale singa wabbairewo, omwonyoko wange tiyankafiire!”
43011033	OYesu oweyaboine oMalyamu ngʼakunga, nʼaBayudaaya ababbaire baabire nʼoMalyamu bona nga bakunga, nʼalumwa omu mwoyogwe, era ni kimuteganya ino.
43011034	Awo nʼababuulya ati, “Mwamuliikire yaina?” Ni bamukoba bati, “Musengwa, oize twabeyo obone.”
43011035	OYesu nʼakunga.
43011036	Awo aBayudaaya ni bakoba bati, “Mubone ngʼowaabbaire amutaka!”
43011037	Neye abamo kwibo ni bakoba bati, “Onu eyalamirye amaiso gʼomusaiza omwofu, tiyandibbaireku nʼekyakola oLazaalo nandi nafa?”
43011038	Awo oYesu tete nʼairamu okulumwa omu mwoyogwe, nʼatuuka oku magombe ga Lazaalo. Era gabbaire magombe agʼempuku, nga baigairewo omulyango nʼeibbaale.
43011039	OYesu nʼakoba ati, “Mutoolewo eibbaale.” OMaliza omwonyoko wʼomufu, nʼakoba oYesu ati, “Neye, Musengwa, atyanu afunya olwakubba amaliremu enaku ina!”
43011040	Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Tinkukobere nti owewaikirirya, wabona ekitiisya kya Kibbumba?”
43011041	Kale ni batoolawo eibbaale. OYesu nʼalingirira omwigulu era nʼakoba ati, “Bbaabba, nkwebalya olwakubba ompuliire.
43011042	Nze mmaite nti ompulira bulijo, neye ntumwire ekyo olwʼokugasa abantu abeemereire aanu, kaisi beezye okwikirirya bati wantumire.”
43011043	Oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼayeta nʼeigono eryʼamaani ati, “Lazaalo, obuluke!”
43011044	Era eyabbaire omufu nago nʼazwayo ngʼengoye gikaali mbiringe oku bigerebye nʼamangaloge, era nga nʼekiwero kikaali kisibe omu maisoge. OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mumusindibuleku engoye egyo, era mumuleke atambule.”
43011045	Nʼolwekyo bangi oku Bayudaaya ababbaire baabire okubona oMalyamu, era ni babona oYesu ekiyakorere, ni bamwikiririryamu.
43011046	Neye abamo kwibo ni baaba giri Bafalisaayo, era ni babakobera oYesu ekiyakorere.
43011047	Kale abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo ni batyamisya oLukiiko oLufugi olwʼaBayudaaya, ni beebuulya bati, “Tukole tutya? Omusaiza ngonu ali kukolanga obumanyiciryo bwʼebyewunyo bungi.
43011048	Singa owetumuleka ngʼakola ebintu ebyo, abantu bonabona baaba kumwikiririryamu. Era nʼaBalooma baliiza ni bajigirica eYeekaalu yaiswe nʼeigwanga lya iswe!”
43011049	Awo omoiza kwibo, eriina bati Kayaafa, eyabbaire okabona akira obukulu omu mwanka ogwo, nʼatumula ino ati, “Inywe mpaawo kimutegeera oku biri kubbangawo!
43011050	Timumaite muti kibagasa omusaiza omoiza okufeererera abantu, okukiraku eigwanga eribbeereri okujigirika?”
43011051	Ekyo tiyakitumwire kululwe, wazira nga iye okabona akira obukulu omu mwanka ogwo, yawaire bunaabbi ati oYesu wakufeererera eigwanga lyʼaBayudaaya.
43011052	Era nga tiwakufeererera Bayudaaya bonkani, neye nʼabalondemu ba Kibbumba abandi aBatali Bayudaaya abali omu byalo ebindi, okubairya aamo babbe kimo.
43011053	Kale okuzwa oku lunaku oolwo abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya ni basala olukwe okwita oYesu.
43011054	Nʼolwekyo oYesu nʼalekeraawo okutambulira omu Bayudaaya omu lwatu. Neye nʼazwayo, nʼayaba mu kifo ekiriraine ekitera oku kyalo ekibeeta Efulaimu, nabba eeyo nʼabeegibe.
43011055	Awo oMukolo ogwʼaBayudaaya ogwʼoKutambukirya owegwabbaire gwatira okutuuka, abantu bangi ni bazwa omu byalo, ni baaba e Yerusaalemi. Baabire kukola mukolo gwabwe ogwʼokwetukulya, ngʼoMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya gukaali okutuuka.
43011056	Kale eeyo ni babba omukunoonia oYesu. Era owebabbaire nga beemereire omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, ni beebuulyangana bati, “Museega mutya? Tiyaizeku oku Mukolo naire?”
43011057	Ekyo kyabbaire kityo olwakubba abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo babbaire balagiire bati singa wabbaawo amanyica oYesu egyali, abakobere kaisi beezye okumukwata.
43012001	Owewabbaire nga wabulayo enaku mukaaga, oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya gutuuke, oYesu nʼatuuka oku kyalo kyʼe Bbesaniya. OLazaalo yabbaire mutyami wʼoku kyalo okwo era niiye oyo oYesu oguyazuukizire.
43012002	Kale eeyo oYesu ni bamutegekera ekyeigolo, era oMaliza nʼabainula. Era oLazaalo yabbaire moiza kwabo abaliire oku menza nʼoYesu.
43012003	Kale awo oMalyamu nʼakwata ecupa erimu amafuta amakengeize agʼakaloosa, era agʼebbeeyi eino agebeeta naludo. Awo nʼagasuka oku bigere bya Yesu, era nʼabisiimuula nʼenziiri gyʼokumutwegwe. Era enyumba nʼeizula akaloosa akʼamafuta ago.
43012004	Neye oYuda oIsikalyoti, era omoiza oku beegi ba Yesu, eyabbaire ayaba okumulyamu olukwe, nʼakoba ababbairewo ati,
43012005	“Kale lwaki amafuta ago tibagatundiremu edinaali 300, era empiiya egyo ni bagigabira abadoobi?”
43012006	OYuda yatumwire ekyo tirwakubba nti yabbaire alumirwa abadoobi, neye olwakubba yabbaire mwibbi. Era ngʼowekyabbaire kiti niiye eyabbaire omuwanika waabwe, iye yaibbangaku egimo.
43012007	Awo oYesu nʼairamu ati, “OMalyamu mumuleke olwakubba kyabbaire kigenderere kiti yabbaire ali nʼokubisa amafuta ago kugakolesya ku lunaku olubalindiikiraku.
43012008	Ekyo kityo olwakubba abadoobi ibo baabbanga na inywe bulijo, neye nze tinaabbe na inywe okumala ekiseera ekinene.”
43012009	Awo ekiyindi kinene ekyʼaBayudaaya, ni kitegeera kiti oYesu ali e Bbesaniya. Kale ni baabayo, tirwakubona Yesu kyonkani, neye nʼokubona oLazaalo, oYesu oguyazuukizire.
43012010	Kale awo abakabona abakulu ni basala amalabuki okwita oLazaalo yena.
43012011	Ekyo kyabbaire kityo olwakubba okulwa Lazaalo, aBayudaaya bangi bazwanga oku bakabona abakulu ni baaba egiri oYesu, era ni bamwikiririryamu.
43012012	Oku lunaku olwairireku, ekiziima kinene ekyʼabantu ababbaire baabire e Yerusaalemi oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, ni bawulira bati oYesu ali kwabayo.
43012013	Awo ni bakwata ensansa egitali nkujuulye, era ni baaba okumwaniriza nga webaceera bati, “Tuwuuje oMusengwa oKibbumba! Wʼenkabi oyo iye aiza omu liina lya Musengwa oKibbumba! Tumuwuuje iye oyo oKabaka wa Isirairi.”
43012014	Awo oYesu nʼasuna ompunda omutomuto, nʼatyamaku okutuukirirya eKiwandiike ekiti,
43012015	“Inywe abantu bʼe Sayuuni timwatya. Aale mubone oKabaka waanywe aiza, ngʼatyaime oku mpunda omutomuto.”
43012016	Omu kiseera ekyo abeegibe tibategeire ebintu ebyo, neye oKibbumba oweyamalire okugulumalya oYesu ngʼamuzuukiza, kaisi ni beewukirya ngʼebyo byabbaire bityo ngʼowekiri omu Biwandiike byʼabanaabbi.
43012017	Ekiziima kyʼabantu ekyabbairewo ngʼoYesu ayeta oLazaalo okuzwa omu magombe era nʼamuzuukiza, ni beeyongera okukobera abantu abandi ebyabbairewo.
43012018	Nʼolwekyo abantu bangi, olwakubba babbaire bawuliire bati yabbaire akolere akamanyiciryo kʼekyewunyo kanu, ni baabayo okumusangaana
43012019	Kale aBafalisaayo ni bakobangana bati, “Kimanye kusani nti mpaawo kitwezya okukola. Aale mubone buli muntu amusengererya!”
43012020	Atyanu abamo oku Bayonaani babbaire bamo oku bantu abaabire e Yerusaalemi okusinza oKibbumba oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.
43012021	Kale aBayonaani abo owebatuukire eeyo ni baaba egiri oFiripo owʼoku kyalo kyʼe Bbesusaida ekyʼomwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya, ni bamusaba bati, “Sebo tutaka okutumulaku nʼoYesu.”
43012022	Awo oFiripo nʼayaba nʼakoba Andereya kaisi bonabona ni baaba okukobera oYesu.
43012023	Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Ekiseera kituukire oKibbumba okugulumalya oMwana wa Muntu.
43012024	Era mbakobera amazima nti onsigo owaatagwa omwitakali era ni bamuliika, asigala denge. Neye owebamuliika amera nʼabala empeke nyingi.
43012025	Buli agezyaku okulamya obwomibwe okululwe, yalibufiirwa, neye buli acaawa obwomibwe okulwange ngʼali oku kyalo kunu, yalisuna obwomi obutawaawo.
43012026	Era oyo iye ampeererya, ateekwa okubba aikiriirye okugumira nze ebinjaba okubitamu, kaisi oolwo eginaaba eeyo omwigulu yena beezye okumutuucaayo. Kale oBbaabba yaliwa ekitiisya iye oyo ampeererya.”
43012027	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Atyanu omwoyo gwange gweraliikiriire, era timmaite nʼekyokukoba. Nkobe nti, ‘Bbaabba toganya akaseera akagosi ako akʼokugada nʼokufa okuntuukaku?’ Bbe, olwakubba ekyandetere niikyo nze omu kaseera kanu okubita omu kugada!
43012028	Aale Bbaabba ogulumalye eriinalyo.” Awo eigono ni lizwa omwigulu erikoba liti, “Naligulumairye era nalirigulumalya tete.”
43012029	Ikyo ekiziima kyʼabantu ekyabbaire kyemereire awo owebawuliire, abamo ni bakoba bati, “Laadu niiyo ebbwatuka!” Abandi ni bakoba bati, “ Omalaika atumwire naye.”
43012030	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Eigono eeryo erimuwuliire tiriizire kugasa ninze, wazira kugasa niinywe.
43012031	Era atyanu oKibbumba ayaba okusalira ekyalo omusango. Nʼomu kiseera kinu iye oSitaani omufugi wʼekyalo kinu, oKibbumba ayaba okumuwambaku obufugi.
43012032	Neye nze owebalinjanika oku musalabba, nalikuusa abantu bonabona ni babba bange.”
43012033	Ekyo yakitumwire, ngʼategeeza enfa egiyabbaire ayaba okufaamu.
43012034	Awo ekiziima kyʼabantu ni kiceera nga bakoba bati, “Iswe tumaite tuti eBiwandiike bikoba biti oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta wa kubbaawo emirembe nʼemirembe. Olwo tete iwe okoba otya oti oMwana wa Muntu bateekwa okumwanika oku musalabba? Iwe otumula ku Mwana wa Muntu aliina oyo?”
43012035	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mwaba okweyongera okubbaaku nʼekitangaala ekiseera kitono. Kale mutambule nga kikaali kiriwo, ngʼendikiirya ekaali okubazingiza olwakubba atambulira omu ndikiirya tabona e gyayaba.
43012036	Kale mwikiririrye omu kitangaala nga kikaali kiriwo, kaisi mwezye okubba bantu bʼekitangaala.” OYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo nʼazwawo era ni yebeebisaku.
43012037	Awo oYesu nʼoweyamalire okukola obumanyiciryo bwʼebyewunyo obwo bwonabwona nga babona, era aBayudaaya tibamwikiririryemu.
43012038	Ekyo kyabbaire kityo lwʼokutuukirirya kibono kya Isaaya onaabbi, ekiti: “Musengwa Kibbumba, naani aikiriirye obukwenda bwaiswe era naani ogubabiikuliire obwezye bwa Musengwa?”
43012039	Ekyo niikyo ekyagirire ni bateezya okwikirirya, olwakubba oIsaaya era yakobeire awandi ati:
43012040	“OKibbumba yaboofuwairye era nʼabakakanyalya emyoyo, kale tibeezya kadi kubona nʼamaiso gaabwe agʼomwoyo, waire kutegeera, waire kucuuka ni baira egyendi omu myoyo gyabwe, era ni mbalokola.”
43012041	Ebyo oIsaaya yabitumwire olwakubba yaboine ekitiisya kya Yesu, era oIsaaya nʼamutumulaku.
43012042	Cooka era omu kiseera ekinyere ekyo bangi oku beekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya bamwikiririryemu. Neye olwʼokutya aBafalisaayo, tibakibbutwire nga baseega bati demba ni bababbinga omwikumbaaniro.
43012043	Ekyo kityo olwakubba batakire bantu okubawuuja okukiraku oKibbumba iye okubawuuja.
43012044	Awo oYesu nʼalangirira ati, “Omuntu owanjikiririryamu tabba anjikiririryamu ninze zenkani, wazira abba aikiririrya nʼomu Kibbumba eyantumire.
43012045	Era omuntu oyo owambonaku, abba ooti aboine Kibbumba eyantumire.
43012046	Nze naizire oku kyalo ngʼekitangaala, kaisi buli anjikiririryamu, tiyasigala omu ndikiirya.”
43012047	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Iye omuntu awulira ebibono byange kaisi nʼatabikwata, timmusalira omusango. Ekyo kityo olwakubba tinaizire kusalira bantu misango, wazira kubalokola.
43012048	Neye iye oyo angaana era ataikirirya ebibono byange, oKibbumba yalimusingisya omusango oku lunaku lwʼenkomerero ngʼasinzirira ku bibono ebyo ebinatumwire.
43012049	Ekyo kityo olwakubba tinabitumulanga kulwange, neye oBbaabba eyantumire niiye eyandagiire ebyokutumula, nʼengeri yʼokubitumulamu.
43012050	Era mmaite nti omukugondera ekiragirokye kizweramu omuntu okusuna obwomi obutawaawo. Kale buli ekintumula kibba kinanyerenyeere kidi oBbaabba ekiyankobere okutumula.”
43013001	Awo eizo waaku lwabbaire lwabba lunaku lwʼoMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya. Iye oYesu yategeire ati ekiseerakye ekyokuzwa oku kyalo kunu okukanga egiri oIteeye kituukire. Neye ibo abeegibe babbaire baaba okusigala oku kyalo kunu. Era oYesu yabbaire ataka ino abeegibe kale awo nʼabalaga ngʼowabataka omu bwizulye.
43013002	Kale omu kiseera oYesu nʼabeegibe ekibabbereire aamo oku kyeigolo, oSitaani yabbaire amalire okuteeka omu mwoyo gwa Yuda oIsikalyoti omutaane wa Simooni ekiseego kyʼokulyamu oYesu olukwe.
43013003	Neye iye oYesu yabbaire akimaite kusani ati oIteeye yamuwaire obwezye oku bintu byonabyona. Era yabbaire akimaite ati yazwire giri Kibbumba, era ati yatira okukanga egiri oKibbumba.
43013004	Kale awo nʼasetuka nʼazwa oku kiinulo, ni yeetoolamu ekizibaawokye, kaisi nʼakwata etawulo ni yeesiba omu nkende.
43013005	Oluzwanyuma lwʼekyo nʼasuka amaizi omu kalaayi kaisi nʼatandiika okunaabya abeegibe ebigere. Yabinaabyanga neenu wabisiimuula nʼetawulo egiyabbaire yeesibire.
43013006	Awo nʼatuuka oku Simooni oPeetero, kaisi iye nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, oyaba kunnaabya bigere?”
43013007	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Iwe totegeera ekindi kukola esaawa eenu, neye oluzwanyuma walikitegeera.”
43013008	Awo oPeetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Musengwa nze tinaliikiriryaku iwe okunnaabya ebigere.” Cooka oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Owentakunaabya ebigere, obba toli kimo na nze.”
43013009	Awo oSimooni Peetero nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, aale nga kityo tiwannaabyaku bigere byonkani, neye onnaabye paka nʼamangalo nʼomutwe gwona!”
43013010	Kale oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Iye omuntu owaabba ngʼabbaire amalire okunaaba omubiri gwonagwona, iye oyo abba yeetaaga kunaabaku bigere byonkani. Igwo omubiri gubba gutukwire. Aate era inywe muli batukulye, okutoolaku omoiza kwinywe.”
43013011	Yakobere atyo olwakubba iye yabbaire amaite ayaba okumulyamu olukwe, era niikyo ekyagirire nʼakoba ati batukulye okutoolaku omoiza kwibo.
43013012	Kale oYesu oweyamalire okunaabya abeegibe ebigere, tete nʼazwala ekizibaawokye era nʼakanga nʼatyama oku kiinulo. Awo nʼababuulya ati, “Mutegeera amakulu gʼekyo ekinkolere?
43013013	Inywe munjeta ‘ Musomesya’ era muti, ‘Musengwa,’ era ekimutumula kituuce olwakubba ekyo niikyo ekyendi.
43013014	Aale atyanu nze, oMusengwa waanywe era oMusomesya waanywe ngʼowemmalire okubanaabya ebigere, na inywe nywena muli nʼokunaabyangananga ebigere.
43013015	Nze mbateekeirewo ekyokuboneraku ekimuli nʼokukola ngʼowembakoleire.
43013016	Mbakobera amazima nti mpaawo mugalama abba wʼekitiisya okukiraku omusengwawe, waire mukwenda tabba wʼekitiisya okukiraku amutumire.
43013017	Atyanu ngʼowemumaite ebintu ebyo, mwabba nʼenkabi owemwabikolanga.”
43013018	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Tindi kutumulanga ku niinywe nywenanywena, nze mmaite abantu abenalonderemu, ikyo ekibali. Neye ekyo kyokutuukirirya Kiwandiike, ekikoba kiti, ‘Oyo ogundya naye ayaba okundyamu olukwe.’
43013019	Nze ndi kubakobera oku kintu ekyo atyanu nga kikaali okubbaawo, kaisi oolwo owekyalimala okubbaawo, mwezye okwikirirya muti ninze oyo ngʼowenetumulaku.
43013020	Era mbakobera amazima nti asangaalira buli oguntuma, abba asangaaliire ninze, era buli ansangaalira, abba asangaaliire Kibbumba oyo eyantumire.”
43013021	Kale awo oYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, ni yeeraliikirira ino omu mwoyogwe, nʼabbutula ati, “Mbakobera amazima, omoiza kwinywe ayaba okundyamu olukwe.”
43013022	Awo abeegibe ni balolanganaku, neye ni bibasobera olwʼokutamanya oguyabbaire atumulaku.
43013023	Iye omoiza oku beegi, oYesu oguyabbaire ataka eino, yabbaire atyaime kumpi nʼoYesu.
43013024	Kaisi awo oSimooni Peetero nʼagererya omwegi oyo nago ngʼamukoba ati, “Obuulye oYesu atukobere ogwatumulaku.”
43013025	Kale awo omwegi oyo nago eyabbaire atyaime okumpi nʼoYesu, nʼamweigikaku omu kifubba katono kaisi nʼamubuulya ati, “Musengwa, naani oyo ogwotumulaku?”
43013026	Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Niiye oyo ogunaawa ekimegero kinu ekinaabba nkozerye omu syodo.” Era oYesu nʼakozya ekimegero, kaisi nʼakiwa oYuda oIsikalyoti omutaane wa Simooni.
43013027	Era oYuda oweyamalire okulya ekimegero ekyo, amangu ago oSitaani nʼamwingiramu. Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Ekiwatira okukola, okikole mangu!”
43013028	Neye ku bonabona ababbaire awo oku kiinulo, mpaawo kadi moiza eyategeire ekyazwireku oYesu nʼakoba atyo oYuda.
43013029	Neye abamo ni baseega bati oYuda ngʼoweyabbaire niiye omuwanika, oYesu ayezya okubba amutuma kugula bintu byʼoku Mukolo, ooba amukoba kugabiraku badoobi mpiiya.
43013030	Kale oYuda oweyamalire okulya ekimegero ekyo, amangu ago nʼawuluka. Era omu kiseera ekyo omu mwoyogwe mwabbaire mwizwire endikiirya nga nʼobwire bwirugaire.
43013031	Kale awo oYuda oweyamalire okuwuluka okwaba, awo oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ababbaire basigaire awo ati, “Atyanu oMwana wa Muntu oKibbumba amugulumairye, era okubita omu Mwana nago abantu bagulumairye oKibbumba.
43013032	Kaisi obanga oKibbumba bamugulumairye kubita mu niiye, era nʼoKibbumba yagulumalya oMwana wa Muntu mangu ago.
43013033	Baana bange, naabba na inywe akaseera katono. Mwalinnoonia, era nakimo ngʼowenakobere aBayudaaya, nʼatyanu niikyo ekimbakobera nti, ‘Inywe timwezya okutuuka eginjaba.’ ”
43013034	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Cooka mbawa ekiragiro ekiyaaka nti, mutakanganenge. Nga nze owembataka, mutyo na inywe wemuteekwa okutakangananga.
43013035	Singa owemwabbanga nʼokutakangananga, awo abantu bonabona bamanyicanga bati muli beegi bange.”
43013036	Awo oSimooni Peetero nʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Musengwa, oli kwaba yaina?” OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Omu kiseera kinu toyezya okwabayo na nze, neye oluzwanyuma waliizayo.”
43013037	Tete oPeetero nʼamubuulya ati, “Musengwa, lwaki timpezya okwaba na iwe atyanu? Ndi mutegeki okukufeererera.”
43013038	Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Iwe dala oli mutegeki okunfeererera? Nkukobera amazima nti, onkoko yaabba akaali nʼokukookoola nga wankanegaanira emirundi misatu ngʼokoba oti tommaite.”
43014001	Awo oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Timweraliikiriranga. Inywe mwikiririrye mu Kibbumba, era na nze zena munjikiririryemu.
43014002	Omu nyumba ya Bbaabba mulimu ebisenge bingi, era njaba okubategekera ekifo. Singa ekyo tikibbaire kituuce, tinandibakobere nti njabayo okubategekera ekifo.
43014003	Era owenalimala okubategekera ekifo, naliira ni mbatwala ni mubbanga na nze kaisi nywena ni mubbanga eeyo eginalibba.
43014004	Era mumaite enzira etuuka eginjaba.”
43014005	Awo oTomasi nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa titumaite egyoyaba, kale twamanya tutya enzira eyabayo?”
43014006	Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Ninze enzira eyaba e wa Kibbumba, era ninze mmanyikisya abantu amazima agakwata oku oKibbumba, era ninze agaba obwomi obutawaawo. Mpaawo atuuka egiri oBbaabba okutoolaku ngʼabitire mu ninze.
43014007	Singa nze muntegeera, nʼoBbaabba yena mwandimutegeire. Era okuzwa olwatyanu mumutegeire era muli ngʼabamuboineku.”
43014008	Awo oFiripo nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, otulagisye oIteewo era ekyo kyatumala.”
43014009	Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Kasookeede mba na inywe ekiseera ekyo kyonakyona, Firipo tontegeeranga? Obanga buli muntu ambonaku, abba ngʼaboine oku Bbaabba. Tete obba otya okunkoba oti, ‘Otulagisye oIteewo?’
43014010	Iwe toikirirya oti nze ndi bumo nʼoBbaabba, era nʼoBbaabba ali bumo na nze? Ebibono ebimbakobera inywe, tibyange-kubwange. Neye oBbaabba iye aali obumo na nze, niiye akola ngʼowaataka ngʼabita mwebyo ebinkola nʼebintumula.”
43014011	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba ati, “Aale mwikirirye ebimbakobera nti nze ndi bumo nʼoBbaabba era nʼoBbaabba ali bumo na nze. Aale owemubbanga timwikirirya ebintumula, mwikirirye olwʼebyewunyo ebinkola waire byonkani.”
43014012	Mbakobera amazima nti buli anjikiririryamu, yalikola ebyewunyo ooti biibyo ebinkolanga, era yalikola nʼebikiraku ebyo olwakubba njaba egiri oBbaabba.
43014013	Era buli ekimwasabanga nga mubita omu liina lyange, nakibakoleranga, kaisi oBbaabba bamugulumalye nga babita omu Mwanawe.
43014014	Era buli owemwansabanga ekintu kyonakyona nga mubita omu liina lyange, nakikolanga.
43014015	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okutumula nabo ati, “Owemubbanga muntaka, mwakwatanga ebiragiro byange.
43014016	Era nalisaba oBbaabba nʼabawa oMubbeeri ogondi, iye etiyalibaleka emirembe nʼemirembe.
43014017	OMwoyo nago niiye amanyikisya abantu amazima agakwata oku Kibbumba. Cooka ibo abataikiririrya omu Kibbumba tibeezya okwikirirya Mwoyo nago olwakubba tibamutegeera, era tibamumaite. Neye inywe mumumaite olwakubba abba na inywe, era yatyamanga omu myoyo gyanywe.
43014018	Era tinalibalekawo okubba ooti bafuubbi olwakubba owemwalisuna oMwoyo nago kyalibba ooti ninze njirire egimuli.
43014019	Omu kiseera kitono kiti, ibo abataikiririrya omu Kibbumba baabbanga tibakaali bambona, neye inywe mwalimbona olwakubba tete nalibba mwomi, era nywena mwalibba boomi.
43014020	Era oku lunaku oolwo tete olumwalimboneraku nga mmalire okuzuukira mwalitegeera muti nze ndi bumo nʼoBbaabba, era muti nywena muli bumo na nze, era tete muti nze ndi bumo na inywe.
43014021	Buli awulira ebiragiro byange nʼabikwata, oyo niiye antaka. Era oBbaabba yatakanga oyo antaka, zena natakanga omuntu oyo, era namubiikuliranga ikyo ekyendi.”
43014022	Kale awo oYuda, neye nga tiyoodi oIsikalyoti, nʼamubuulya ati, “Neye Musengwa, lwaki ogenderera kutubiikulira niiswe tumanye ikyo ekyoli, kaisi nandi nʼobiikulira ibo abantu abandi oku kyalo?”
43014023	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Omuntu yenayena antaka, yakwatanga ebibono byange ebimmukoba. Nʼolwekyo oBbaabba yamutakanga era nze nʼoBbaabba twaizanga egyali ni tubbanga aamo naye.
43014024	Iye oyo atantaka, takwata ebibono ebyo aate ngʼebibono nago ebyembakobera tibyange, wazira bya Bbaabba era eyantumire.”
43014025	OYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba ati, “Mbakobeire ebyo byonabyona nga nkaali ndi na inywe.
43014026	Neye oMubbeeri, iye oMwoyo oMweru oyo oBbaabba oguyalituma omu kigere kyange, yalibeegesya byonabyona era yalibeewukirya byonabyona ebimbakobeire.
43014027	Aale atyanu mbalekera eidembe, era mbawa eidembe eryange. Iryo erimbawa tiriwaawo, era tiriri ooti liiryo abantu eribasuna oku kyalo. Nʼolwekyo timweraliikiriranga era timwatyanga olwʼebyabbangawo.”
43014028	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Muwuliire nga mbakobera nti ‘njaba, neye naira egimuli.’ Aale singa mubbaire muntaka, mwandisangaire nze okwaba egiri oBbaabba olwakubba iye ankiraku ekitiisya.
43014029	Ebyo mbibakobeire atyanu nga bikaali okubbaawo, kaisi owebyalimala okubbaawo mwezye okunjikiririryamu.
43014030	Cooka tineeyongere okutumula na inywe olwakubba oSitaani omufugi wʼekyalo kinu aiza okunnumba. Neye abula obwezye kwebyo ebintuukaku.
43014031	Wazira, ibo abantu abatali ba Kibbumba bateekwa okumanya okusinzirira kwebyo ebintuukaku bati ntaka oBbaabba. Era bati ndi kukolanga biidi oBbaabba ebiyandagiire.” Awo nʼamaliirirya ati, “Aale atyanu mwize twabe.”
43015001	Awo oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Ninze ekitina kyʼomuzabbibbu ogunanyerenyeere, kaisi oBbaabba niiye omulimi waagwo.
43015002	Ansalaku buli isaga erindiku eritaneneka neenu nga waasalira lidi erineneka kaisi lyezye okubala ino.
43015003	Kale inywe atyanu muli batukulye ooti masaga omulimi agaamalire okusalira olwakubba mwaikiriirye obukwenda obunalaabbire egimuli.
43015004	Aale musigale nga muli bumo na nze, era zena nga ndi bumo na inywe. Ekyo kityo olwakubba mpaawo isaga erineneka okulwalyo. Liri nʼokubba ku kitina kaisi ni lineneka. Kale nywena timwezya kukola ebikole oKibbumba ebyabasuubiriramu nga timuli bumo na nze.”
43015005	Awo ni yeeyongera ati, “Ndi ooti kitina kyʼomuzabbibbu, kaisi inywe ni mubba ooti masaga. Kale omuntu owaabba obumo na nze kaisi zena ni mba obumo naye akola ebikole ebisa bingi. Iye oyo abba ooti masaga agali oku muzabbibbu agabala ebineneka ebingi. Era anambula obubbeeri bwange mpaawo ekimwezya okukola.
43015006	Kale omuntu owaatabba obumo na nze, abba ooti isaga eribamuma eedi era ni liwotoka. Era agatyo niigo agebatoola ni bagamuma omu musyo ni gaya.
43015007	Neye owemubba obumo na nze, era ni musigala nga mukolera oku bibono ebimbakoba, mwezya okusaba kyonakyona ekimutaka era oKibbumba yakibawanga.
43015008	Kale owemukola ebikole ebisa ebingi, oBbaabba bamugulumalya era mubba mweragire muti muli beegi bange.”
43015009	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okubakoba ati, “Atyo nakimo ngʼoBbaabba owantakire, zena niiyo engeri egimbatakamu inywe. Mweyongere okubba obumo na nze kaisi neyongere okubataka.
43015010	Atyanu, singa owemwakwatanga ebimbalagira, zena neyongeranga okubataka. Era kityo nakimo nga zena owenkwatanga ebyo oBbaabba ebyandagira ni yeeyongera okuntaka.”
43015011	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Mbakobeire ebintu ebyo, kaisi oolwo mubbe nʼeisangaalo eriri ooti lyange erindi nalyo, era mubbe nalyo omu bwizulye.
43015012	Era ekiragiro kyange niikyo kinu ekiti, mutakanganenge, nga nze owenabatakire.
43015013	Mpaawo muntu aali nʼokutaka okukiraku okwʼoyo awaayo obwomibwe olwʼabakaagwabe.
43015014	Singa musigala nga mukola ebimbalagira mulaga muti muli bakaagwa bange.
43015015	Nze tinkaali mbeeta baweererya olwakubba omuweererya tamanya omusengwawe ebyakola. Wazira mbeeta bakaagwa bange olwakubba inywe mbakobeire byonabyona oBbaabba ebiyankobeire.
43015016	Era tiniinywe omwasalirewo okubba beegi bange, neye ninze enabalonderemu inywe era ni mbateekawo okukolanga ebikole ebisa. Kaisi awo oBbaabba ayezye okubawanga buli ekimusaba nga mubita omu liina lyange.
43015017	Era kinu niikyo ekimbalagira nti mutakanganenge.”
43015018	Kale awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba ati, “Singa abantu abataikiririrya omu Kibbumba owebabacaawanga, mwewukiryenge muti basookere kucaawa ninze.
43015019	Kale singa mubbaire bamo kwibo nago bandibbaire babataka nga inywe abaabwe. Kiri kiti, timuli bamo kwibo wazira inywe nabalonderemu okuzwa omu bantu abo. Ekyo niikyo ekigira abo abanjakanisya ni babacaawa.
43015020	Aale mwewukirye ebibono ebinabakobeire nti, ‘Mpaawo mugalama abba owʼekitiisya okukiraku omusengwawe.’ Owekibba nti nze banjiigaanirye, na inywe nywena balibagadya, era ngʼowekiri nti bakwaite okwegesya kwange, nʼebyanywe byona balibikwata.
43015021	Ibo baaba okubagadyanga olwakubba inywe muli bange, era olwakubba tibamaite oyo eyantumire.
43015022	Aale singa tinaizire ni ntumula nabo, oKibbumba tiyandibbaire abalumiriza olwʼekibbikibbi. Neye atyanu babula kyokuwozyeryaku olwʼekibbikibbi kyabwe.
43015023	Iye ancaawa acaawa nʼoBbaabba yena.
43015024	Aale singa tibaboine nga nkola ebyamagero ebyo omuntu yenayena ogondi ebyatakolangaku, oKibbumba tiyandibbaire abasalira omusango olwʼekibbikibbi. Neye atyanu baboine ebyamagero ebyo, kaisi era ni basigala nga batucaawa nze nʼoBbaabba.
43015025	Neye ebyo ibyo byokutuukirirya kibawandiikire omwIteeka lyabwe bati, ‘Bancaawire anambula nsonga.’ ”
43015026	Kale oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Omubbeeri oweyaliiza oyo ogunalibasindikira ngʼazwa egiri oBbaabba, yalikobera abantu ebinkwataku. Omubbeeri oyo nago yalibba Mwoyo atumula amazima agakwata oku Bbaabba era azwera nakimo egiri oBbaabba.
43015027	Era nywena muteekwa okukobera abandi ebinkwataku olwakubba mubbaire na nze kuzwera nakimo owenatandiikiire okwegesya.”
43016001	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Ebyo byonabyona mbibakobeire kaisi timwesiitaala ni muleka okwikirirya kwanywe.
43016002	Balibabbinga omu makumbaaniro. Era amazima gali gati, ekiseera kyaba okutuuka nga buli abaita inywe aseega ati omu kukola ekyo aweererya Kibbumba.
43016003	Ebyo balibibakola olwaibo okutamanya oBbaabba ekyali, ooba nze ekyendi.
43016004	Neye ebyo mbibakobeire, kaisi oolwo ekiseera kyabyo owekyalituuka, mwezye okwewukirya muti nabalabwire.” Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okutumula nabo ati, “Omu ntandiika yʼokwikirirya kwanywe, tinabakobeire oku byokubagadya ebyo olwakubba nabbaire nkaali ndi na inywe.”
43016005	“Neye atyanu njaba egiri oyo eyantumire, wazira mpaawo kwinywe ambuulya eginjaba.
43016006	Inywe olwakubba mbakobeire nti njaba okubazwaku, tete emyoyo gyanywe giirire ni giizula nima.
43016007	Neye mbakobera amazima nti nze okubazwaku okwaba egiri oBbaabba kibagasa niinywe olwakubba owentayaba, omubbeeri oMwoyo oMweru tiyaliiza egimuli. Cooka owenjaba, nalimutuma egimuli.
43016008	Era Iye oweyaliiza, yalirumiriza abataikiririrya omu Kibbumba ati enseega yaabwe tintuuce oku bikwata oku kibbikibbi nʼoku muntuki omutuukirirye. Era yalibalaga nʼoku muntu wʼengeriki oKibbumba oguyalisingisya omusango.
43016009	Era omusango ogwo gwalibba gusinzirira ku kibbikibbi ekyʼomuntu ekyokutanjikiririryamu.
43016010	Era oMwoyo oMweru yaliraga ati enseega yaabwe tintuuce oku butuukirirye bwange olwakubba nkanga egiri oBbaabba eeyo egimwabba nga timukaali mumbona.
43016011	Nʼokubikwata oku kusala omusango, era byona oMwoyo oMweru yalikakasa abantu ngʼoKibbumba oweyamalire okusingisya oSitaani omusango. Era oSitaani oyo nago niiye omufugi wʼabantu abakola ebibbibibbi.”
43016012	Awo oYesu era nʼabakoba ati, “Nkaali ndi na bingi ebyokubakobera, neye byabba ngʼatyanu bibitiriri inywe okubikwata.
43016013	Neye iye oMwoyo amanyikisya abantu amazima agakwata oku Kibbumba oweyaliiza, yalibalungamya ni mumanya amazima ago gonagona. Ekyo kityo olwakubba tiyalitumula kululwe, wazira yalitumulanga biibyo byonkani ebiyaliwuliranga okuzwa egiri oKibbumba, era nʼokubakoberanga ebyaba okwiza.
43016014	Era oMwoyo oyo yangulumalyanga olwakubba yabakoberanga kiikyo ekiyawuliranga okuzwa egyendi.
43016015	Kale ebintu byonabyona oBbaabba ebyalinabyo byange, era ekyo niikyo ekigira ni mbakoba inywe nti oMwoyo yabakoberanga biibyo ebiyawuliranga okuzwa egyendi.”
43016016	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Omwibbanga litono mwabba nga timukaali mumbona, kaisi tete oluzwanyuma lwʼeibbanga litono, mumbone.”
43016017	Awo abamo oku beegibe ni bakobangana bati, “Ategeeza niki okutukoba ati, ‘Omwibbanga litono mwabba nga timukaali mumbona, kaisi oluzwanyuma lwʼeibbanga litono tete mumbone,’ era ati, ‘Ekyo kityo olwakubba njaba egiri oBbaabba?’ ”
43016018	Era ni beegumya okwebuulyangana bati, “Ategeeza niki okukoba ati, ‘Mwibbanga litono?’ Cooka titutegeera ekyo ekyakoba.”
43016019	Awo oYesu nʼategeera ati bataka okumubuulya oku bintu ebyo, kale nʼabakoba ati, “Muli kwebuulyangana ku kintegeezere owenkobere nti, ‘Omwibbanga litono mwabba nga timukaali mumbona, kaisi tete oluzwanyuma lwʼeibbanga litono, mumbone?’
43016020	Aale mbakobera amazima nti, inywe mwalikunganga era mwalikubbanga enduulu, neenu abantu abakola ebyʼekyalo nga ibo bajaagaana. Inywe enima yalibakwata, neye tete enima yaanywe yalisuukamu isangaalo.
43016021	Cooka kyalibba ooti mukali alumwa. Iye abba omu bulumi bungi olwakubba ekiseerakye kibba kituukire. Neye owaamala okubyala, yeerabira okugada okunene okwabbairemu, olwʼeisangaalo eryʼokubyala omwana oku kyalo.
43016022	Kale inywe, atyanu ikyo kiseera kyanywe ekyenima, neye tete nalibabona era ni musangaala, era mpaawo eyalibatoolaku eisangaalo lyanywe.
43016023	Era ekiseera ekyo owekyalituuka mwalibbanga tete mpaawo ekimunsaba. Cooka mbakobera amazima nti oBbaabba yalibba ngʼabawa buli ekimumusaba omu liina lyange.
43016024	Wazira paka lwatyanu mubbaire mukaali okumusabangaku ekintu kyonakyona omu liina lyange. Neye atyanu aale musabenge era mwalisuna, nʼeisangaalo lyanywe lyalibba mu bwizulye.”
43016025	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Waire nga nzwa okutumulanga ebintu ebyo mu ngero, ekiseera kyaba okutuuka mbe nga tinkaali ntumula nga nkolesya ntumula eeyo, wazira nga mbakobera lwatu ebifa oku Bbaabba.
43016026	Era omu kiseera ekyo mwalibbanga musaba mu liina lyange. Cooka tindi kukoba nti kyalyetaagisyanga ninze okubasabiranga egiri oBbaabba okubawa ekimwasabanga.
43016027	Wazira oBbaabba iye onyere abataka yabawanga ekimwamusabanga olwakubba muntaka era mwikirirya muti nazwire giri niiye.
43016028	Nze nazwire giri Bbaabba kaisi ni njiza oku kyalo. Kale atyanu ndi kuzwa oku kyalo, era nkanga egiri oBbaabba.”
43016029	Awo abeegi ba Yesu ni bakoba bati, “Cooka awo atyanu oli kutumulanga lwatu era nga tokolesya ngero.
43016030	Era atyanu tutegeire tuti omaite ebintu byonabyona, era tuti tikyetaagisya waire nʼomuntu yenayena okukubuulya ebibuulyo. Era ekyo kituzweramu kwikirirya tuti wazwire giri Kibbumba.”
43016031	Kale awo oYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Atyanu mwikirirya?
43016032	Neye ekiseera kiiza, era kituukire, owemwasalaanikira buli muntu okukanga e wuwe. Inywe mwaba kundeka zenkani. Cooka ekinyere kiri kiti tinaabbe zenkani olwakubba oBbaabba ali aamo na nze.
43016033	Era ebyo mbibakobeire, kaisi oolwo mubbe nʼeidembe omu myoyo gyanywe olwʼenkolagana yaanywe na nze. Cooka oku kyalo kunu mwabbanga nʼokugada, neye mugume olwakubba nze mpangwire amaani gʼekyalo kinu.”
43017001	Awo oYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼagangamula omutwe okulingirira omwigulu kaisi nʼasaba ati: “Bbaabba, ekiseera kituukire. Aale atyanu olage abantu ekitiisya kyʼoMwanawo ngʼowekiri ekyʼamaani, kaisi yena ayezye okubalaga ekitiisyakyo ekyʼamaani.
43017002	Ekyo kityo olwakubba wamuwaire obwezye oku bantu bonabona, kaisi ayezye okubawa ibo nago abewamuwaire obwomi obutawaawo.
43017003	Era ibwo obwomi obutawaawo obwo busunika mu ngeri eenu eti: Abantu bali nʼokukumanya niiwe oKibbumba wenkani onanyerenyeere, era nʼokumanya oYesu Kurisito oguwatumire okununula abantu.
43017004	Nze ndagire abantu ekitiisyakyo ngʼowekiri ekyʼamaani omu kukola era ni mmala omulimo oguwampaire okukola.
43017005	Bbaabba, aale atyanu tete onganye mbe nʼekitiisya kidi ekinabbaire nakyo owenabbaire na iwe omwigulu nga nʼekyalo kikaali nʼokubbaawo.”
43017006	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okusaba ati, “Mmanyikisirye abantu abewampaire, ikyo ekyo ekyoli. Abantu abo nago niibo abewampaire ngʼobatoola mu badi abakwikiririryamu. Ibo abantu abo babbaire babo, nʼobampa era bakwaite ekibonokyo.
43017007	Era atyanu bamaite bati obukwenda nʼebyo byonabyona ebinkola bizwa giri niiwe.
43017008	Ekyo kityo olwakubba nabakobeire ebibono ebiwampaire, era ni babiikirirya. Era bakakasiire nakimo bati nazwire giri niiwe, era ni baikirirya bati wantumire.
43017009	Kale mbasabira. Cooka tindi kusabiranga bantu abatakwikiriryamu, wazira nsabira baabo abewampaire olwakubba babo.
43017010	Era abo abendi nabo bonabona babo, nʼababo era bange. Era balagire bati ekitiisya kyange kyʼamaani.
43017011	Aale atyanu nze ngonu njaba okuzwa oku kyalo era ndi kwiza egyoli neye ibo bakaali bali oku kyalo. Iwe Bbaabba oMweru, obakuumenge omu bwezyebwo obuwampaire kaisi beezye okubbanga nakimo ooti niiswe owetuli ekimo.
43017012	Era owenabbaire nabo, cooka olwʼobwezye obuwampaire, nabakuumire era ekigosi nandi kibatuukaku. Era mpaawo kwibo eyagotereku okutoolaku oyo eyabbaire ateekwa okugota kaisi eKiwandiike kyezye okutuukirira.”
43017013	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okusaba ati, “Aale ngonu atyanu njiza egyoli, neye ebyo mbitumula nga nkaali ndi oku kyalo kaisi eisangaalo lyange libbe mu bwizulye omu basengereri bange.
43017014	Era nabawaire ekibonokyo nʼolwekyo ekyalo ni kibacaawa olwakubba nti ibo nago tibakaali bʼekyalo ooti ninze owentali wʼekyalo.
43017015	Cooka tinkusaba nti obatoole oku kyalo, wazira nti obakuume eeri omubbimubbi oSitaani.
43017016	Nti ibo tibekyalo ooti ninze owentali waakyo.
43017017	Aale obatukulye ngʼokolesya obwezye bwʼekibonokyo. Nti ekibonokyo niigo amazima.
43017018	Cooka ngʼowewantumire oku kyalo, ntyo zena niiyo owembatumire oku kyalo.
43017019	Nze newaayo egyoli kaisi bona abanyere beezye okweweerayo nakimo egyoli.”
43017020	Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okusaba ati, “Tinsabira beegi banu bonkani, neye nʼabo abalinjikiririryamu olwʼobukwenda bwa banu.
43017021	Era Bbaabba, ekyo kityo kaisi bonabona babbenge bumo, ooti niiwe owooli obumo na nze, era zena owendi obumo na iwe. Mbasabira nti bona babbenge bumo na iswe kaisi abantu beezye okwikirirya bati iwe wantumire.
43017022	Era mbasuucirye okubba bʼekitiisya zena ngʼowonsuucirye kaisi beezye okubbanga bumo ooti ninze owendi obumo na iwe.
43017023	Ekikoba kiti, ntaka ibo beegaite nga ibo owebali bagaite na nze era nga iwe owooli mugaite na nze. Era mbasabira nti babbeere nakimo bumo, kaisi abantu bategeere bati wantumire, era obataka ngʼowontaka.”
43017024	Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Bbaabba, abantu abewampaire, ntaka lubbe lumo nga bali na nze omwigulu eeyo eginjaba okubba, era babbeeyo okubonaku ekitiisya ekinalibbaamu. Cooka ekitiisya ekyo wakimpaire olwakubba wantakire nga nʼekyalo tikibbumbe.
43017025	Bbaabba omutuukirirye, abantu tibakumaite, neye nze nkumaite, era bamaite bati wantumire.
43017026	Era nabamanyikisirye ikyo ekyo ekyoli, era njaba okweyongera okubamanyikisya ikyo ekyo nago, kaisi bona batakenge abantu abandi ooti niiwe owewantakire era kaisi nze mbe kimo nabo.”
43018001	Awo oYesu oweyamalire okusaba okwo, nʼasimbuka nʼabeegibe, ni basalamu ogwinamo ogubeeta bati Kidulooni. Okwitale kudi okubasomokere wabbaireyo omusiri gwʼemisaale emizaituuni era iye nʼabeegibe ni baingira oomwo.
43018002	Atyanu iye oYuda, eyamuliiremu olukwe, yabbaire amaite ekifo ekyo olwakubba oYesu yatiranga okwaba nʼakumbaana eeyo nʼabeegibe.
43018003	Kale awo oYuda nʼayaba omu musiri ogwo nago ngʼakudembereire ekibinja kyʼabaisulukale, nʼabakuumi abamo abʼeYeekaalu. Era ibo abo abeyabbaire yeekubbembereire, abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo niibo ababbaire babatumire. Era ibo nago babbaire bakwaite ebimoleka ooti mole nʼamataala era nʼebyokulwanisya.
43018004	Cooka oYesu yamaite byonabyona ebyaba okumutuukaku, kale awo ni yeetoolayo, era nʼababuulya ati, “Munoonia naani?”
43018005	Awo ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Yesu owʼe Naazaleesi.” OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Ninze onu.” Era oYuda eyamuliiremu olukwe, yabbaire ayemereire awo nabo.
43018006	Cooka oYesu oweyabakobere ati, “Ninze onu,” ibo ni baira enyuma era ni bagwa ansi.
43018007	Awo oYesu nʼababuulya omulundi ogwokubiri ati, “Munoonia naani?” Tete ni bairamu bati, “Yesu owʼe Naazaleesi.”
43018008	Era oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mbakobeire nti ninze onu. Aale obanga munoonia ninze, muleke abeegi bange banu ibo baabe.”
43018009	Ekyo kyabbairewo kaisi oolwo ebibono ebiyabbaire atumwire byezye okutuukirira, ebikoba biti, “Kwabo abewampaire tinagoteryeku kadi moiza.”
43018010	Cooka oSimooni Peetero omoiza oku beegi ba Yesu yabbaire nʼempiima, kale awo nʼagitoolayo, nʼatemaku omugalama wa kabona akira obukulu ekitwi ekyʼoku ndiiro, nʼamutiicaaku. Era omugalama oyo nago yabbaire niiye oMaluko.
43018011	Awo oYesu nʼalagira oPeetero ati, “Empiimayo ogikanjeeyo omu kiruutu kyayo. Iwe oseega oti tindi nʼokubita omu kipimo kyokugada kudi oBbaabba okwataka mbitemu?”
43018012	Awo ekibinja kyʼabaisulukale nʼomuduumiri waabwe, era nʼabakungu bʼaBayudaaya ni bakwata oYesu. Awo ni bamusibira aamo engalogye enyuma,
43018013	kaisi ni basooka bamutwala egiri Anasi. Oyo yabbaire niiye oiteeye wa muka Kayaafa era oKayaafa oyo yabbaire niiye okabona akira obukulu omu mwanka ogwo.
43018014	Era oKayaafa nago niiye eyabbaire awaire aBayudaaya amalabuki ati kibba kisa omuntu omoiza okufeererera abantu.
43018015	Awo oSimooni Peetero nʼomwegi omwinaye ni basenjaaku oYesu. Cooka omwegi oyo olwakubba yabbaire mumanye eeri okabona akira obukulu, iye nʼasenjaaku oYesu ni baingira omu luuga lwa kabona oyo.
43018016	Neye iye oPeetero yabbaire nʼokukuumira nza ku geeti. Kale omwegi oodi nago eyabbaire omumanye, nʼakanga e nza okutumula nʼomwala eyabbaire omukuumi wʼoku geeti, era nʼaingirya oPeetero.
43018017	Awo omwala oyo nago nʼabuulya oPeetero ati, “Wena toli moiza oku beegi bʼomusaiza nago?” Iye oPeetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Nze bbe.”
43018018	Cooka empewo yabbaireku era abagalama ba kabona akira obukulu nʼabakuumi bʼeYeekaalu babbaire beemereire okweruguulirirya ekisiki kyʼomusyo ekibabbaire bakumire okwota. Kale awo oPeetero yena yabbaire ayemereire nabo ngʼayota omusyo.
43018019	Awo, okabona akira obukulu nʼabuulya oYesu oku beegibe, nʼokwebyo iye oYesu ebyayegesya.
43018020	Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Nze ntumulanga lwatu eeri abantu. Nze nenca njegesyanga omu makumbaaniro nʼomu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu aBayudaaya bonabona omu bakumbaaniranga. Tintumulangaku kintu kadi kimo omu kyama.
43018021	Kale aale lwaki obuulya ninze? Obuulye baadi abawuliranga ebinatumulanga. Mazima ibo babimaite.”
43018022	Awo oYesu oweyatumwire ebyo, omoiza oku bakuumi bʼeYeekaalu eyabbaire okumpi nʼoYesu, nʼamukubba oluwi okwitama neenu waamukoba ati, “Eyo niiyo engeri egyoiramu okabona akira obukulu?”
43018023	Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Obanga ekintumwire tikituuce, kaade okakase obutali butuuce bwakyo. Neye obanga ntumwire kituuce, lwaki onkubbire?”
43018024	Awo oYesu ngʼakaali musibe wʼengalogye Anasi nʼamuweererya egiri oKayaafa okabona akira obukulu.
43018025	Awo oSimooni Peetero oweyabbaire ngʼayemereire ayota omusyo, tete ni wabbaawo omuntu ogondi nʼamubuulya ati, “Iwe wena toli moiza oku beegi bʼomusaiza nago?” Iye ni yeegaana ngʼakoba ati, “Nze bbe.”
43018026	Cooka omoiza oku baweererya ba kabona akira obukulu, era omuganda wʼoodi oPeetero oguyatiiciryeku ekitwi, nʼamulumiriza ati, “Tinakuboine naye eedi omu musiri gwʼemisaale emizaituuni?”
43018027	Awo tete era oPeetero nʼakyegaana, era nʼomu kiseera ekyo onkoko nʼakookoola.
43018028	Awo oYesu ni bamutoola e wa Kayaafa, ni bamutwala omu lubiri lwʼomufugi omu Looma. Omu kiseera ekyo obwire bwabbaire bwankaca. Era aBayudaaya tibaingiire omu lubiri olwakubba okwingira kyabbaire kibasuuca okubba tibatukulye era ni babba nga tibasaanira okulya oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.
43018029	Nʼolwekyo oPiraato nʼawuluka nza egibali era nʼababuulya ati, “Musangoki ogumuvunaana omusaiza onu?”
43018030	Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Singa abbaire abula musango, titwandimuleetere okumukukwatisya.”
43018031	Awo oPiraato nʼabakoba ati, “Aale atyanu inywe mumutwale mumuwozesye okusinzirira oku mateeka agaanywe.” ABayudaaya ni bamukoba bati, “Nti iswe tibatwikirirya kwita muntu yenayena.”
43018032	Ekyo kyabbairewo kaisi oYesu ebibono ebiyabbaire atumwire ngʼalaga engeri egiyabbaire ayaba okufaamu, byezye okutuukirira.
43018033	Awo oPiraato nʼakanga omu lubiri, kaisi nʼalagira ni beeta oYesu kaisi nʼamubuulya ati, “Niiwe okabaka wʼaBayudaaya?”
43018034	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Ekyo kiseegokyo, ooba bandi niibo abakukobeire ebinkwataku?”
43018035	Awo oPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Nze ndi Muyudaaya? Ibo bantu bʼeigwangalyo, nʼabakabona baanywe abakulu niibo abakunkwatisirye. Olwo nago niki ekyokolere?”
43018036	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Obwakabaka bwange tibwa ku kyalo kunu. Singa ekyo kibbaire kityo, abantu bange bandirwaine, ni bakaisya aBayudaaya okunkwata. Neye obwakabaka obwange ibwo buzwa awandi.”
43018037	Awo oPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Olwo oli kabaka?” OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Otuucirye okukoba oti ndi kabaka. Igo amazima gali gati, nze bambyaire kubba Kabaka era niikyo ekyandetere oku kyalo kunu era nʼokukakasa abantu amazima. Era buli ataka amazima, ampulisisya.”
43018038	Awo oPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Amazima niikyo niki?” OPiraato oweyamalire okubuulya oYesu ebyo, iye oPiraato nʼawuluka tete e nza egiri aBayudaaya era nʼabakoba ati, “Timbona ekyokuzweraku okumuvunaana omusango gwonagwona.
43018039	Neye inywe munaliriire nze okubateererangaku omusibe moiza oku lunaku lwʼoMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya. Kale oolwo mutaka mbateerere nago yoodi ogumukoba muti kabaka wʼaBayudaaya?”
43018040	Cooka ibo ni bakooka nga bamwiramu bati, “Bbe, tiyooyo! Otuwe Bbalaba!” OBbalaba oyo nago yabbaire musibe olwʼakeediimo akeyabbaire yeemigiiremu.
43019001	Awo oPiraato nʼalagira abaisulukale okutwala oYesu bamufaamuule nʼofaalu aliku emirobo egisima.
43019002	Era abaisulukale ni baluka engule eya mawa kaisi ni bagimuzwalisya oku mutwe. Bamuzwalisirye nʼekizwalo ekitukuliikiriri,
43019003	era ni basoosera okumwabaku okumukiina bati, “Owangaale, iwe oKabaka wʼaBayudaaya!” Era batyo nga webamukubba empi oku matama.
43019004	Awo oPiraato era tete nʼawuluka e nza, nʼakoba aBayudaaya ati, “Aale mumpulisisyeku, ngonu njaba okumuwuluca egimuli okubamanyikisya nti timbona ekyokuzweraku okumuvunaana omusango gwonagwona.”
43019005	Awo oYesu ni bamuwuluca nga bamutiikire engule eyʼamawa, era nga bamuzwalisirye ekizwalo ekitukuliikiriri kaisi oPiraato nʼabakoba ati, “Aale mubone omusaiza nago!”
43019006	Amangu ago ibo abakabona abakulu nʼabakuumi bʼeYeekaalu owebamuboine, ni bakooka bati, “Omukomerere oku musalabba, omukomerere oku musalabba!” Neye oPiraato nʼabakoba ati, “Inywe mumutwale mumukomerere, neye okulwange timbona ekyokuzweraku okumuvunaana omusango gwonagwona.”
43019007	Era ibo aBayudaaya ni beekalangula bati, “Iswe tuli nʼeiteeka, era okusinzirira okwiteeka eeryo, ateekwa kufa olwakubba yeeyeta okubba Mwana wa Kibbumba.”
43019008	Awo oPiraato oweyawuliire ekyo, era ni yeeyongera ino okutya.
43019009	Kale nʼalagira ni bakanjaayo oYesu omu lubiri kaisi nʼayaba nʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Ozwera yaina?” Neye oYesu tiyamwiriremu.
43019010	Awo oPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Ogaine okunjiramu? Tomaite oti ndi nʼobwezye okukuteera ooba okukukomerera oku musalabba?”
43019011	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Tiwandibbaireku nʼobwezye singa tiKibbumba kubukuwa. Nʼolwekyo iye oodi ampaireyo egyoli niiye aali nʼekibbikibbi ekikiraku.”
43019012	Okuzwa omu kiseera ekyo oPiraato nʼagezyaku okuteera oYesu neye aBayudaaya nga beeyongera kukooka bati, “Singa oteera omusaiza oyo, waabba toli mukaagwa wa Kaisaali. Nti omuntu yenayena iye eyeeyeta okubba kabaka, abba ayakanisya Kaisaali.”
43019013	Awo oPiraato oweyawuliire ebyo, nʼalagira ni bawuluca oYesu oku luuga. Era oku luuga awo oPiraato nʼatyama oku ntebeye eyʼobulamuzi omu kifo ekibeeta bati Kya Mabbaale aMaalirire, neye omu Lwebbulaniya bati, Gabbasa.
43019014	Era esaawa gyabbaire ooti mukaaga egyʼomusana oku lunaku lwa kutegeka oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya. Awo oPiraato nʼakoba aBayudaaya ati, “Aale mumpulisisyeku, okabaka waanywe ngoyo!”
43019015	Neye ibo era ni bakooka bati, “Omumalewo, omumalewo, omukomerere oku musalabba!” Awo oPiraato nʼababuulya ati, “Okabaka waanywe gumbe nkomerere oku musalabba?” Abakabona abakulu ni bamwiramu bati, “Tubula kabaka gondi, wazira oKaisaali.”
43019016	Kale awo omu kukomenkereza, oPiraato nʼabakwatisya oYesu baabe bamukomerere oku musalabba. Awo abaisulukale ni bakwata oYesu, ni bamutoolawo.
43019017	Era omu kwaba yabbaire nga yeetiikire omusalabbagwe okwaba omu kifo ekibeeta ekyʼeKiyanga, omu Lwebbulaniya ekibeeta Gologoosa.
43019018	Era omu kifo ekyo niiyo egibamukomereire oku musalabba. Era omu kifo ekinyere ekyo ni bakomerera nʼabandi babiri oku misalabba gyabwe, oku lubba nʼolubba, oYesu nga iye abalimu akati.
43019019	Awo oPiraato nʼalagira ni bawandiika ekiwandiiko, ni bakikubbirira e ngulu oku musalabba, nga kisoma kiti, “OYESU OWʼE NAAZALEESI, OKABAKA WʼABAYUDAAYA.”
43019020	Era aBayudaaya bangi ni basoma ekiwandiiko ekyo olwakubba ekifo ekyo egibakomereire oYesu, kyabbaire kumpi nʼekibuga. Era nti nʼekiwandiiko ekyo nago babbaire bakiwandiikire mu Lwebbulaniya, nʼomu Lulantini, nʼomu Luyonaani.
43019021	Awo abakabona abakulu abʼaBayudaaya ni bakanga egiri oPiraato okwezuluguma bati, “Tibandikiwandiikire bati, ‘Kabaka wʼaBayudaaya,’ wazira tutaka bakiwandiike bati, ‘Omusaiza onu abbaire yeeyeta Kabaka wʼaBayudaaya.’ ”
43019022	Awo oPiraato nʼabairamu ati, “Ekyo ekyendagiire nti bawandiike kiri nʼokubba kinyere ekyo.”
43019023	Cooka abaisulukale owebamalire okukomerera oYesu oku musalabba, ni batwala ebizwalobye, ni babigabulamu emigabo eena, buli mwisulukale nʼasunaku gumo. Neye iyo ekanzuye eyʼomunda iyo nʼesigala. Iyo babbaire tibagitungire-butungi, neye nga bagirukire-buluki yonayona okuzwa angulu paka ansi.
43019024	Kale abaisulukale ni bakobangana bati, “Titwaginyiiramu, neye tugikubbireku kalulu okusalawo eyagitwala.” Ekyo kyabbairewo kutuukirirya Kiwandiike ekikoba kiti: “Bagabanire ebizwalo byange, era ekanzu yange ni bagikubbiraku akalulu.” Kale abaisulukale bona ekyo niikyo ekibakolere.
43019025	Awo okumpi nʼomusalabba gwa Yesu, wabbairewo omaaye, nʼomuganda wa maaye, nʼoMalyamu omuka Kulopaasi, era nʼoMalyamu oMangadaleena nga beemereire.
43019026	Kale oYesu oweyaboinewo omaaye, nʼomwegi oodi oYesu oguyatakanga eino nga beemereire okumpi aawo, nʼakoba omaaye ati, “Mama, oyo omutwale ngʼomwanawo,”
43019027	era nʼakoba nʼomwegiwe oyo nago ati, “Oyo omutwale ngʼomaawo.” Okuzwa oolwo omwegi oyo nʼatandiika okulabirira omaaye wa Yesu ngʼomoiza oku bantu bʼomu kisitokye.
43019028	Awo oluzwanyuma ngʼoYesu amalire okumanya ati amalire emirimo egibamutumire okukola era okutuukirirya eKiwandiike, nʼakoba ati, “Enyonta enduma.”
43019029	Abaisulukale babbaire bateekere awo ensaka eizwire enviinyo ensaasaami kale ni batimyamu ekijuulo. Awo ni bakiteeka oku kasaale akebeeta yisopu, kaisi ni basiirya okukituuca oku munwagwe.
43019030	Awo oYesu oweyafunfuunireku enviinyo ensasaami egyo, nʼakoba ati, “Kiwoire.” Era nʼekibono ekyo nʼakotamya omutwe, era nʼafa.
43019031	Awo, lwabbaire lunaku lwa kutegeka era ngʼeizo lwabba Saabbaato olukulu. Kale olwakubba abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya babbaire tibataka emirambo okutuuca oku Saabbaato nga giri oku musalabba, ni basaba oPiraato olukusa bavune ebigere bya bantu nago era nʼemirambo bagyanuleyo.
43019032	Nʼolwekyo abaisulukale ni baiza okuvuna ebigere byabwe moiza moiza nga basookera oku basaiza badi abebabbaire bakomereire aamo nʼoYesu buli muntu oku musalabbagwe.
43019033	Neye owebatuukire oku Yesu, ni babona nga iye amalire okufa, tibamuvunire ebigere.
43019034	Awo, iye omu kifo kyʼokumuvuna, omoiza oku baisulukale nʼamusumuta eisimo omu mpete okukakasa ngʼafiire, amangu ago ni muzwamu eisaaye nʼamaizi.
43019035	Era omusaiza eyaboineku ngʼekyo kibbaawo yakikobeire abantu, era nʼekiyabakobeire ni kibba kituuce. Iye omusaiza nago amaite ati atumula mazima era akola atyo kaisi nywena mwezye okwikirirya.
43019036	Ebyo byabbairewo kaisi oolwo eKiwandiike kituukirire ekikoba kiti, “Tibalimuvunaku eigumba kadi limo,”
43019037	era nga nʼeKiwandiike ekindi owekikoba kiti, “Baliringirira yoodi ibo ogubalibba basumutire.”
43019038	Ebyo owebyawoire, oYusufu owʼAlimasaaya, nʼayaba nʼasaba oPiraato omulambo gwa Yesu. Era oYusufu oyo nago yabbaire mwegi wa Yesu, neye nga wʼomu mbiso olwʼokutya aBayudaaya. Awo ngʼasunire olukusa okuzwa eeri oPiraato, nʼayaba nʼatoolayo omulambo gwa Yesu.
43019039	OYusufu yabbaire nʼoNikodemu omusaiza nago enyumaku eedi eyacaaliire oYesu obwire. Era oNikodemu yaabire nʼekiro ooti 33 egya kalifuwa ogubeeta omiira nʼogondi bati alowe nga bitabanganie.
