43019040	Awo ni batwala omulambo gwa Yesu nga bagusiigire okalifuwa, ni bagulingira omu ngoye egitukula empyaka egyʼebbeeyi! Eyo yabbaire niiyo empisa yʼaBayudaaya eyʼokuliika abafu.
43019041	Omu kifo oYesu egibamukomereire oku musalabba, wabbairewo omusiri omwabbaire amagombe agʼempuku amayaaka, agebabbaire tibateekangakuumu mulambo.
43019042	Era olwakubba wabbaire kumpi, oomwo niimwo omu bateekere omulambo gwa Yesu. Ekyo kityo olwakubba lwabbaire lunaku lwʼaBayudaaya kwetegekaraku ngʼeizo lwabba Saabbaato.
43020001	Awo oku lunaku olwesaabbiiti oMalyamu oMangadaleena nʼawuuna makeezi pwi omu kandikiirya oku magombe agʼempuku aga Yesu. Cooka yaajiirye eibbaale eryabbaire omu mulyango nga balitoirewo.
43020002	Nʼolwekyo nʼairuka egiri oSimooni Peetero, nʼomwegi odi ogondi oYesu oguyatakanga eino, nʼabakoba ati, “OMusengwa bamutoiremu omu magombe, era titumaite nʼegibamuteekere!”
43020003	Awo oPeetero nʼomwegi odi nago ni basimbuka ni baaba oku magombe.
43020004	Bonabona baabire nga bairukira aamo, neye omwegi oodi nago nʼakiraku oPeetero okwiruka, nʼamusooka oku magombe.
43020005	Cooka tiyaingiiremu wazira yakomere mu mulyango era nʼakotama okulolamu, nʼabona ngoye njereere nga bagiteekere awo.
43020006	Awo oSimooni Peetero eyabbaire amusenjaaku yena nʼatuuka neye iye nʼaingiramu, era yena nʼabona omu magombe ngoye nga bagiteekere awo.
43020007	Era yaboine nʼekiwero ekibabbaire basibiire oYesu oku mutwe okubwika omu maiso. Ikyo kyabbaire bakiringire kusani nga kiri ku mbale kyonkani.
43020008	Oku nkomerero omwegi odi nago eyabbaire nʼoPeetero era eyeekeereire okutuuka oku magombe, yena nʼaingira nʼabona, era nʼaikirirya.
43020009	Neye era babbaire bakaali okutegeera eKiwandiike ekiti, oYesu yabbaire ateekwa okuzuukira.
43020010	Awo abeegi abo ni bakanga egibaabbanga.
43020011	Neye oMalyamu oMangadaleena yabbaire ayemereire e nza wʼamagombe agʼempuku nago, ngʼakunga. Kale awo oweyabbaire akaali akunga, nʼakotama nʼalola omu magombe,
43020012	era nʼabona abamalaika babiri. Babbaire mu bizwalo byeru nga batyaime, omoiza e namutwe, nʼogondi e nabigere omu kifo egibabbaire bateekere omulambo gwa Yesu.
43020013	Awo ni bamubuulya bati, “Mukali iwe, okunga niki?” Iye nʼabairamu ati, “OMusengwa wange bamutoiremu, era timmaiteku egibamuteekere!”
43020014	Awo oMalyamu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼagaluka nʼalola e nyuma, nʼabona oYesu ngʼayemereire awo, neye tiyamumanyicirye ati niiye oYesu.
43020015	Awo oYesu yena nʼamubuulya ati, “Mukali iwe, okunga niki? Onoonia naani?” Iye oMalyamu olwʼokumusuubiriramu okubba niiye omulabiriri wʼomusiri ogwo, nʼamukoba ati, “Sebo, obanga niiwe omutoiremu, ondagirire egyomuteekere njabe mmutooleyo.”
43020016	Awo oYesu nʼamweta ati, “Malyamu!” Awo oMalyamu nʼagaluka okumulolaku, kaisi nʼamukoba omu Lwebbulaniya ati, “Labbooni!” Ekitegeeza kiti, “ Musomesya.”
43020017	Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Tiwaneevambiryaku olwakubba nkaali okukanga egiri oBbaabba. Wazira oyabe egiri abaganda bange obakobere oti, ‘Nkanga egiri oBbaabba era oItewaanywe, oKibbumba wange era oKibbumba waanywe.’ ”
43020018	Era oMalyamu oMangadaleena nʼayaba, nʼakobera abeegi ati, “Mboine oMusengwa!” Era nʼabakobera oMusengwa ebyamukobere.
43020019	Awo oku lunaku lwesaabbiiti olwo nago eigolo abeegi babbaire beefungiriirye omu nyumba olwʼokutya aBayudaaya, oYesu nʼaiza, nʼabeemereramu akati, nʼabakoba ati, “Eidembe libbe na inywe!”
43020020	Oweyamalire okutumula atyo, nʼabalagisya engalogye nʼebigerebye nʼempetegye. Awo abeegi ni basangaala ino owebaboineku oMusengwa.
43020021	Era nʼairamu nʼabakoba ati, “Eidembe libbe na inywe. NgʼoBbaabba oweyantumire, zena mbatuma.”
43020022	Oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼabayeereraku omuyeerero, nʼabakoba ati, “Musune oMwoyo oMweru.
43020023	Owemwasoniyanga omuntu yenayena ebikole ebibbibibbi ebyakola, oKibbumba yena yaabbanga amusoniyire era singa owemutamusoniyenge, oKibbumba yena yaabbanga tamusoniyire.”
43020024	Awo oTomasi omoiza oku beegi eikumi na babiri, ogubeeta oDidimo, tiyabbaire nʼabainaye oYesu oweyabeeragisiirye.
43020025	Kale abeegi abainaye ni bamukobera bati, “Tuboine oMusengwa.” Neye iye nʼabakoba ati, “Okutoolaku nga mboineku enkozu egyʼemisumaali omu ngalogye, era ni nkubbya olunwe lwange omu nkozu nago, era ni nkwata nʼomu mpetegye, tinakiikirirye.”
43020026	Awo owewabitirewo enaku munaana, abeegi ba Yesu tete babbaire bali omu nyumba, leero nga bali nʼoTomasi. Waire nga babbaire beefungiriirye oomwo, oYesu nʼaingira nʼababbaamu nga ayemereire, kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Eidembe libbe na inywe.”
43020027	Awo nʼakoba iye oTomasi ati, “Okubbye aanu olunwe, era obone engalo gyange. Era oleete engaloyo onkwate omu mpete. Aale atyanu olekeraawo okubuusabuusa, wazira oikirirye.”
43020028	Awo oTomasi nʼamwiramu ati, “Niiwe oMusengwa wange, era oKibbumba wange!”
43020029	OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Iwe oikiriirye olwakubba omboineku. Ibo nga bʼenkabi abatambonangaku neye ni baikirirya!”
43020030	OYesu yakolere obumanyiciryo bwʼebyewunyo obundi bungi ngʼabeegibe babona obutali buwandiike omu kitabo kinu.
43020031	Neye obwo babuwandiikire kaisi mwezye okwikirirya muti oYesu niiye oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta. Era muti niiye oMwana wa Kibbumba, era olwʼokwikirirya mutyo, kaisi mwezye okusuna obwomi obutawaawo.
43021001	Ebyo owebyawoire, oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ntono oYesu nʼabonekera tete abeegibe oku nyanza oTibberiyo. Ikyo kyabbairewo kiti:
43021002	OSimooni Peetero, nʼoTomasi ogubeeta oMulongo, nʼoNasanairi owʼe Kaana ekyʼe Galiraaya, nʼabataane ba Zebedaayo, nʼabeegi ba Yesu abandi babiri, bonabona abo babbaire aamo.
43021003	Awo oSimooni Peetero nʼabakoba ati, “Nze njaba kuvuba.” Ibo ni bamukoba bati, “Swena oleke twabe na iwe.” Era awo ni baaba, ni baniina omu lyato. Cooka ekiire ekyo kyonakyona ni batakwatisyaku ekintu.
43021004	Neye amakeezi nga buca, oYesu nʼabonekera oku mbale kwʼenyanza ngʼayemereire, Cooka abeegibe ni batamumanyica bati niiye.
43021005	Awo oYesu nʼabeeterera ati, “Bainange, mupapairyekuuyo?” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Bbe.”
43021006	Iye nʼabakoba ati, “Aale mutege akatimba kaanywe oku lubba lwʼengalo endiiro lwʼeryato era mwapapalyawo.” Owebategere ni bateezya okukakuusira omu lyato olwʼobuzito bwʼenyanyi empitiriri egibabbaire bapapairye.
43021007	Awo omwegi oodi oYesu oguyatakanga eino, nʼakoba oPeetero ati, “Oyo Musengwa!” Amangu ago oSimooni Peetero oweyawuliire ngʼoodi akoba ati, “Oyo Musengwa,” nʼazwala ekizibaawokye, olwakubba yabbaire akitoiremu, kaisi nʼagwa omu maizi.
43021008	Abeegi badi abandi ni bamusenjaaku nga ibo bali omu lyato, neenu webakuusa akatimba akaizwire enyanyi. Ekyo kyabbaire kityo olwakubba tibabbaire yala nʼokulukalu, ngʼeibbanga lyʼemita ooti 90.
43021009	Awo owebatuukire oku lukalu, ni babona omusyo nga baguteekereku enyanyi, era nʼekyokulya nga kiri awo.
43021010	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Muleeteku enyanyi egimwankazwa okupapalya.”
43021011	OSimooni Peetero nʼaniina omu lyato kaisi nʼakulukuusa akatimba, nʼakasomoca oku lukalu. Kabbaire kaizwire aganyanyi aganene 153. Newankubbaire nga gabbaire gangi ino gatyo, akatimba tikatiikire.
43021012	Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mwize okulya ekyʼamakeezi.” Cooka oku beegibe, mpaawo eyagumire okumubuulya ati, “Niiwe onaani?” Ibo babbaire bamaite bati niiye oMusengwa.
43021013	Kale oYesu nʼayaba nʼatoola ekyokulya nʼabawa era nʼatoola nʼenyanyi gyona nʼagibawa.
43021014	Ogwo atyanu gwabbaire mulundi gwokusatu oYesu okubonekera abeegibe oluzwanyuma lwʼokumuzuukiza.
43021015	Awo owebamalire okulya, oYesu nʼabuulya oSimooni Peetero ati, “Simooni omwana wa Yokaana, ontaka ino okukiraku abainawo?” Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Niikyo ekyo Musengwa, era iwe omaite oti nkutaka.” Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Aale olisyenge entaama gyange.”
43021016	Era tete nʼamubuulya omulundi ogwokubiri ati, “Simooni omwana wa Yokaana, ontaka?” Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Niikyo ekyo Musengwa, omaite oti nkutaka.” OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Olisyenge entaama gyange.”
43021017	Tete nʼamubuulya omulundi ogwokusatu ati, “Simooni omwana wa Yokaana, ontaka?” Ekyo ni kimuluma olwakubba oYesu yamubwirye omulundi ogwokusatu ati, “Ontaka?” Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Musengwa, iwe mpaawo ekyotamaite. Omaite oti nkutaka.” OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Olisyenge entaama gyange.
43021018	Nkukobera amazima nti owewabbaire ngʼoli munyeete, wazwalanga nʼoyaba egyotaka. Neye atyanu owookulire, waliteekawo engalogyo, ni bakuzwalisya kaisi ni bakutwala egyotataka.”
43021019	Ekyo oYesu yakitumwire, ngʼalaga enfa oPeetero egiyalifaamu okugulumalya oKibbumba. Era awo, nʼakoba oPeetero ati, “Weegumye okubba musengereri wange.”
43021020	Awo oPeetero nʼagaluka okulola enyuma, nʼabona omwegi oodi oYesu oguyatakanga, ngʼabasengererya. Omwegi oyo nago, niiye oodi eyeigikireku oku Yesu omu kifubba katono nga balya, kaisi nʼamubuulya ati, “Musengwa, naani eyakulyamu olukwe?”
43021021	Awo oPeetero oweyamuboine, nʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Musengwa, onu iye yalibba atya?”
43021022	OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Singa owentaka nti asigale mwomi paka owenaliira, ekyo kikukwataku? Iwe weegumye kubba musengereri wange.”
43021023	Olwʼekibono ekyo okalebule nʼasaalaana omu boluganda ati omwegi oPeetero ogubabbaire batumulaku nago, tiyalifa. Neye oYesu iye tiyakobere ati omwegi nago tiyalifa, wazira ekiyakobere kyabbaire kiti, “Singa owentaka nti asigale mwomi paka owenaliira, ekyo kikukwataku?”
43021024	Oyo nago niiye omwegi akakasa ebintu ebyo, era niiye eyabiwandiikire. Kale tumaite tuti ebiyawandiikire ebyo bituuce.
43021025	OYesu yakolere ebintu ebindi bingi. Era singa buli kimo bakiwandiikire, nseega nti waire kyalo kyonakyona tikyandituukiremu ebitabo ebibandibbaire bawandiikire.
44001001	Sebo Teefiiro, omu kitabo kyange ekisooka, nʼawandiikire ku biibyo oYesu ebiyakolere nʼebiyayegeserye okuzwera nakimo oweyatandikiire okukola omulimogwe,
44001002	paka oku lunaku oKibbumba oluyamutwaliireku omwigulu. Okumutwala omwigulu okwo kwabbairewo ngʼamalire okuwa abatumebe abo abeyabbaire alonderemu ebiragiro, ngʼoMwoyo oMweru oweyamulungamirye.
44001003	Oluzwanyuma lwʼokugadakwe nʼokufa, yazuukiire era ni yeeragisiya eeri abatumebe abo nago emirundi mingi, nʼabawa nʼebiraga ebyera ebyabakakasiire nakimo biti yazuukiire. Okumala enaku 40, yababonekeranga era nʼatumulanga nabo oku bikwata oku bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.
44001004	Lumo, owebabbaire aamo naye oku kiinulo, nʼabasisiitira ati, “Timwaluuya okuzwa aanu omu Yerusaalemi, wazira mubbe nga mukuumirira ekirabo kidi ekinabakobeireku ekyʼoMwoyo oMweru oBbaabba ekiyasuubizire okubawa.
44001005	OYokaana yabatizire abantu na maizi, neye inywe, omu naku egitali gyʼe yala, baaba okubabatiza na Mwoyo oMweru.”
44001006	Olundi, abatume owebakumbaine aamo nʼoYesu, ni bamubuulya bati, “Musengwa, oolwo atyanu omu kiseera kinu oyaba okutoolawo obufugi bwa Balooma era ofuge?”
44001007	OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Tikibeetaagisya inywe okumanya ebiseera nʼenaku oBbaabba iye, omu bwezyebwe, ebiyasalirewo.
44001008	Wazira, ekimubba mumanye niikyo kinu muti oMwoyo oMweru oweyalibaikaku, yalibawa amaani. Era, mwalimmanyikisya eeri abʼomu kibuga ekyʼe Yerusaalemi, nʼabʼomwitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya mwonamwona, nʼabʼomwitwale lyʼe Samaaliya paka owemwaliwoisya ebyalo byonabyona.”
44001009	Oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, oKibbumba nʼamutwala omwigulu nga nʼabatume balingiriire, ekireri ni kimubbuuna ni kibalobeesererya okumubona tete.
44001010	Nga bakaali bali aawo bakaliirye amaiso omwibbanga, nga iye ayaba, abasaiza babiri abazwaire ebizwalo ebyeru ni babbutukira anyere aawo, nga beemereire okumpi nabo.
44001011	Abasaiza abo ni babuulya abatume bati, “Inywe abasaiza abʼe Galiraaya, lwaki mukaali mwemereire aanu mulangaasiire omwibbanga? OYesu oyo ogubabatoireku ni bamutwala omwigulu niiye onyere oyo eyaliira, era yaliira mu ngeri enanyere eyo.”
44001012	Abasaiza ababiri abo owebazwirewo, abatume ni bairayo omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi nga bazwa oku Lusozi olubeeta olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni, akagendo akeerya ooti kiromita moiza yonkani okuzwa e Yerusaalemi.
44001013	Owebaingiire omu kibuga, ni baaba omu nyumba, ni baniina omu kisenge ekyʼe ngulu omu baabbanga. Mwabo ababbairewo mwabbairemu banu: OPeetero, nʼoYokaana, nʼoYaakobbo, nʼAndereya, nʼoFiripo, nʼoTomasi, nʼoBbantulumaayo, nʼoMatayo, nʼoYaakobbo ogondi omutaane wʼAlufaayo, nʼoSimooni oMulwaniriri wa kwefuga kwʼeigwangalye, nʼoYuda omutaane wa musaiza ogondi ogubeeta oYaakobbo.
44001014	Abo bonabona, nga bali aamo nʼoMalyamu omaaye wa Yesu nʼabakali abandi, era nʼabaganda ba Yesu, nga bali omu bumo, ni banyikiiranga okusaba oKibbumba.
44001015	Lumo, abaikirirya ababbaire beera ooti 120 nga bakumbaine, oPeetero nʼayemerera akati mwibo, nʼabakoba ati,
44001016	“Boluganda, ekibono okabaka oDawudi ekiyatumwire omu Biwandiike ekikwata oku Yuda kyabbaire nʼokutuukirira. OMwoyo oMweru, e nyumaku eedi, ngʼabitira omu Dawudi, yalagwire ekyalibbaawo oku Yuda. OYuda niiye eyalagiriire era ni yeekubbemberamu abo abakwaite oYesu,
44001017	newankubbaire ngʼoYesu yabbaire amulondere ngʼomutume aamo na iswe, era ni tuweereryaku aamo naye ngʼomunaiswe omu mulimo gunu.”
44001018	Omu mpiiya egibawaire oYuda olwʼekikolekye ekibbikibbi, yagiguliremu kigona. Ekigona ekyo niimwo omu yeemyedeire nʼafa, omulambogwe ni gwepotolerawo nga gugwera mutwe, ni gwatikamu ekida akati, ebyenda ni bisusuka.
44001019	Newankubbaire nga bakigulire mu kyama neye abatyami bʼomu Yerusaalemi bonabona ekyo bakitegeire, kagira omu lutumu lwabwe, ekigona ekyo bakiwaire eriina bati Akerudama.
44001020	OPeetero ni yeeyongera ati, “Ekyo kyabbaire nʼokubbaawo olwakubba bakiwandiikire omu kitabo kyʼeZabbuli bati: ‘Ekisitokye kisuuke kinameje, tiwaabbaawo muntu akityamamu.’ “Era bati, ‘Omuntu ogondi atwale ekifookye ekyʼobwekubbemberi omu mulimo.’
44001021	-
44001022	“Nʼolwekyo, kyetaagisya tulondemu omusaiza moiza atweyungeku omu mulimo gwʼokukakasa abantu tuti oMusengwa waiswe oYesu yazuukiire. Omusaiza oyo aali nʼokubba nga moiza oku basaiza ababbaire na iswe ekiseera kyonakyona oMusengwa waiswe oYesu ekiyamalire na iswe, ekikoba kiti, ngʼabbaire na iswe nga tutandiika okuzwera nakimo ebiseera oYokaana omu yabatiziranga, okutuukira nakimo owebatutooleireku oYesu ni bamutwala omwigulu.”
44001023	Awo omu baikirirya ni muzwamu abaleetere amaliina gʼabasaiza babiri. Erya Yusufu oBbalusabba abamo ogubabbaire bamaite ngʼoYusito, nʼerya gondi bati Matiya.
44001024	Bonabona owebamalire okugabitya, ni baingira omu kusaba. Omoiza oku batume ni yeekubbembera, nʼasaba ati, “Musengwa waiswe, niiwe omaite abantu bonabona ngʼowebafaanana omu myoyo gyabwe. Kale tukusaba, oku babiri banu, otulagisye ogwolondereku,
44001025	tumuwe ekifo omu mulimo gwʼobutume, oYuda ekiyalekere nʼayaba egyasaaniire okubba.”
44001026	Okusaba owekwawoire, ekyaiririire Kibbumba kubalagisya ati Matiya niiye ogwalondere, atyo ni yeeyunga okwikumi na moiza, tete ni babba abatume ikumi na babiri.
44002001	Awo olunaku olwa Pentekonte ni lutuuka. Kwolwo, abaikirirya bonabona babbaire bakumbaaniire mu nyumba moiza, omu Yerusaalemi.
44002002	Babbaire ooti bali awo, ni bawulira okululuma okwʼamaani okuli ooti gumpunga ogwʼamaani nga kuzwa omwigulu. Okululuma okwo ni kumalaku enyumba omu babbaire batyaime mwonamwona, buli moiza nʼakuwulira.
44002003	Babba ooti bakaali bali awo, ni babona ebintu ebiri ooti nnimi gya musyo egigawukaine okusuukamu lumolumo, era buli lumo kwigyo ni lugwa oku buli moiza kwibo.
44002004	Abaikirirya bonabona ni baizula oMwoyo oMweru, batyo ni batandiika nʼokutumula omu ntumu egindi egibatayegangaku, buli moiza ngʼoMwoyo oMweru oweyamwezyesyanga okugitumula.
44002005	Omu kiseera ekyo, omu Yerusaalemi mwabbairemu abasaiza aBayudaaya ababbaire batya oKibbumba, ababbaire baizire okuzwa kumpi ooti mu buli kitundu ekiri oku kyalo.
44002006	Abasaiza abo owebawuliire olukero, ni beekumbaania mu bungi egiri abaikirirya okubona niki ekyaba omu maiso. Neye buli moiza kwibo kyamwewunyisirye okuwulira abaikirirya nga batumula omu ntumu gyabwe ibo aBayudaaya abageni.
44002007	Awo abasaiza abo ni bawuninkirira ino era ni beebuulyangana bati, “Ii, abantu banu bonabona abatumula, kaisi tibatyami bʼomwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya?”
44002008	Kaisi tete kiiza kitya okubba kiti iswe swenaswena otuli aanu tubuliramu abatumula omu ntumu gyʼeedi egituzwera?
44002009	Iswe ngʼowetuli aanu, newankubbaire nga tuli Bayudaaya, tuzwera mu byalo byʼenjabulo. Abamo kwiswe tuzwera mu Palutiya, nʼe Mediya, nʼEramu; mu Mesopotaamiya, Buyudaaya, nʼe Kapadookiya; mu Ponto, nʼAsiya.
44002010	Era, tulimu nʼabazwera omu Furigiya, nʼe Panfiriya, nʼe Misiri, nʼebitundu ebyʼe Liibbiya okulirana ekibuga Kuleene. Kaisi era, mwiswe mulimu nʼabageni-obugeni okuzwa Looma
44002011	nga tutwaliiremu aBayudaaya nʼabamawanga agandi abacuukire okwaba omu diini yʼeKiyudaaya. Kaisi tete, ni wabbaawo abali mwiswe abazwera mu Kuleete, nʼomu Buwalabbu. Neye aale obone swenaswena owetubawulira nga batumulira mu ntumu egyʼe waiswe ebyʼamaani oKibbumba ebyakolere!
44002012	Olwakubba bonabona babbaire bawungire era nga bibasobeire, abamo kwibo ni beefudangaku kwebuulyangana bati, “Kinu kyezya okubba kitegeeza niki?”
44002013	Neye abandi kwibo ni babeesekeranga-bwesekeri na kujerega baikirirya nga webakoba bati, “Banu leero bateemeire mwenge omuyo!”
44002014	Neye oPeetero ngʼali aawo nʼabatume abandi eikumi na moiza, nʼasetuka nʼayemerera omu maiso gʼabantu kaisi nʼairamu ebibabbaire bakoba. Nʼamagono agʼangulu era nʼobukanu obunene nʼatandiika okutumula egibali ati, “Bayudaaya bainange, era na inywe nywenanywena abali omu Yerusaalemi, muwulisisye kusani, nga mbasonzolera ekintu ekiri aanu.
44002015	Abantu banu abemubona tibateemeire nga inywe owemuseega, olwakubba nginu giri saawa isatu-busatu egyʼamakeezi.
44002016	Ekituuce kiri kiti, ekitutuukireku niikyo ekyo onaabbi oYoweri ekiyatumwireku oweyakobere ati:
44002017	‘OKibbumba atyo waakoba ati omu naku egyʼoluzwanyuma, naligira oMwoyo wange nʼaika omu maani amabitiriri oku bantu aba buli ngeri. Era okubitira mwiye, naliragulisya abataane baanywe nʼabaala baanywe ebyaiza omu maiso. Abanyeete mwinywe balisuna okwolesebwa okuzwa egyendi, nʼabasaiza abakulu mwinywe ni mbalootesya ebirooto.
44002018	Era, nʼoku bagalama bange, abakali nʼabasaiza abampeererya, bona omu naku egyo oMwoyo wange yalibaikaku, nʼabeezyesya okutumula obukwenda obuzwa egyendi.
44002019	Naligira ebintu ebyewunyisya ni bibbaawo angulu omwibbanga, ni nkola nʼebyewunyisya oku kyalo birage amaani gange, walibbaawo okusuka eisaaye, nʼomusyo, nʼomwosi omudiiki gwaliduunya.
44002020	Naligira eisana ni lirikira, nʼomweri ni gutukulika ni gufaanana ooti isaaye. Ebyo byalisooka ni bibbaawo kaisi olunaku lwa Musengwa olukulu era olwʼekitiisya olwʼokusaliraku abantu omusango ni lutuuka.
44002021	Neye olunaku oolwo nga lukaali kutuuka, buli moiza eyalikungirira oMusengwa okumubbeera balimulokola.’ ”
44002022	OPeetero niiye okweyongera ati, “Aale Baisirairi bainange muwulisisye ebibono ebinjaba okutumula. OYesu owʼe Naazaleesi yabbaire musaiza oKibbumba onyere oguyakakasire ati niiye onyere amutumire. Ekyo yakikolere mu kumwezyesya okukola ebyamagero, nʼebyewunyo, nʼobumanyiciryo oKibbumba ebiyamukolesyanga oweyabbaire mwinywe, era nywena abananyere mukimaite nakusani.
44002023	Neye newankubbaire ngʼekyo mwabbaire mukimaite nakusani, omusaiza oyo bamuwaireyo egimuli, nywena ni mumukwatisya abakola ebibbibibbi okumukomerera oku musalabba, mutyo ni mumwita, era ngʼoKibbumba onyere oweyabbaire amalire okukitegeka, era ngʼakimaitiirewo.
44002024	OYesu yabitire omu bulumi bubitiriri kaisi nafa. Neye oKibbumba nʼamuzuukiza, atyo nʼamuteeresya okuzwa omu bulumi okufa obukuleeta olwakubba amagombe gabbaire tigeezya okumukalangulirayo okusigala nga mufu.
44002025	Tukakasa obutuuce bwʼekyo olwakubba, eira nakimo, ebyo niibyo oKurisito ebiyatumulisirye okabaka oDawudi oweyakobere ati: ‘Mbona oMusengwa oKibbumba ngʼanekubbembeire bulijo; olwakubba ali na nze okumbeera kaisi tiwaabbaawo ekintukutya omwoyo.
44002026	Kagira omwoyo gwange gwizwire eisangaalo, ntyo ni nkuwuuja; neenu ndi mugumu nti, waire nzwaire mubiri-biiri ogufa ni guvunda, owenalifa waligwiryawo ni gubba mwomi tete.
44002027	Ekyo kityo olwakubba, tiwalireka omwoyo gwange omu Kiina eKitakoma, waire okuganya omubiri gwʼoMweruwo okuvunda.
44002028	Ondagire amanzira agendi nʼokukwata kaisi ntuuke omu bwomi. Olwakubba oli na nze, wanjizulya eisangaalo.’ ”
44002029	OPeetero ni yeeyongera nʼakoba ati, “Boluganda, oleke mbakobere kinu anambula kutya nti, ozeiza waiswe okabaka oDawudi yafiire, ni bamuliika omu magombe, era nʼatyanu-bunu amagombege gakaali gali okwaiswe kunu.
44002030	Nʼolwekyo, ekintu kyeraga kyonkani kiti oDawudi tiyabbaire yeetumulaku nanyere, neye olwakubba yabbaire naabbi, era ngʼamaite kusani oKibbumba ekiyamusuubizire ngʼalayira ati, ‘Omoiza oku baizukulu ba Dawudi yalisikira entebe eyʼobwakabakabwe.’
44002031	Olwakubba yamaite ebiiza okubbaawo omu maiso, kagira yalagwire oku kuzuukira kwa Kurisito ogubasukireku amafuta, ngʼakoba ati, ‘Tibamulekeswire omu bafu, waire okuganya omubirigwe okuvunda.’
44002032	OYesu oyo oKibbumba yamuzuukizire, era swenaswena abaikiriryabe, tweboneireku nʼagaiswe era tukikakasa eeri buli muntu.
44002033	Era oKibbumba yamalire okumuniinisya omwigulu, nʼamutyamisya aamo naye omu kifo ekyʼekitiisya eino, nʼamukwatisya nʼoMwoyo oMweru, era nga iye oIteeye oweyabbaire amusuubizire. OYesu yena niiye okutwicaaku oMwoyo oMweru oyo, era oMwoyo niiye aleeterewo ebyo ebimubona nʼebimuwulira.
44002034	Dala okabaka oDawudi tiyabbaire yeetumulaku niiye onyere, olwakubba iye tibamuniinisirye omwigulu ngʼowekyabbaire oku Yesu. Tete era onyere yatumwire biinu oku Yesu ati, ‘OMusengwa oKibbumba yakobere oMusengwa wange ati: Otyame na nze omu kifo ekyʼekitiisya ino
44002035	paka owenaligondya abalabebo ni mbasuuca mukonkolo ogwa kuwuumuliryaku ebigerebyo.’ ”
44002036	Ngʼamaliirirya, oPeetero nʼakoba ati, “Nʼolwekyo, abantu bʼe Isirairi nywenanywena mukimanye anambula kubuusabuusa muti, oYesu oyo ogumwakomereire oku musalabba niiye oKibbumba oguyasuucirye okubba oMusengwa era oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.”
44002037	Abantu ababbaire bawulisisya oPeetero owebawuliire ebyo ebiyatumwire, ni bibalumirirya, ni bawulira oku myoyo gyabwe ngʼomusango gubakwata, niiye okubuulya oPeetero nʼabatume abainaye bati, “Baganda baiswe, oolwo atyanu twakola tutya kaisi oKibbumba ayezye okutusoniya?”
44002038	OPeetero nʼabairamu ati, “Mwenenye ebikole ebibbibibbi, era buli moiza bamubatize omu liina lya Yesu oKurisito. Awo oKibbumba yabasoniya omusango gwʼebibbibibbi byanywe, era nʼabawa nʼekirabokye, nga niikyo oMwoyo oMweru,
44002039	olwakubba ikyo oKibbumba yakibasuubizire niinywe, nʼabaana baanywe, era nʼabo bonabona abali e yala, bonabona abo oMusengwa waiswe oKibbumba abeyalyeta.”
44002040	Nʼebibono ebindi bingi, oPeetero ni yeeyongera okubalaabbira, ngʼabasisiitira ati, “Muganye oKibbumba abalokole muwunuke ekibonerezo ekyayaba okuwa abantu ababbibabbi abʼomulembe gunu ogwalemaire.”
44002041	Nʼolwebyo, abaikiriirye ebibono oPeetero ebiyakobere bababatizire, era oku lunaku oolwo, abaikirirya abayaaka abeera ooti 3,000 ni babeegaitaku.
44002042	Abaikirirya bonabona ni banyiikiriranga okusuna okubeegesya okuzwa eeri abatume nʼokukwata ebibabeegeserye, nʼokubba nʼomwoyo ogwʼobumo, ekikoba kiti, buli moiza ngʼalumirwa omwinaye, nʼokugabana oku kiinulo ekimo, okwo ngʼoteekereku nʼokusaba.
44002043	OKibbumba nʼayezyesya abatume okukola ebyewunyo bingi ino, era abʼe Yerusaalemi bonabona ni baizula okuwuninkirira.
44002044	Bonabona abaikiriirye oYesu baabbanga bumo, nga bakumbaanira aamo bulijo, era nga buli moiza wʼeidembe okukolesya ekintu omwinaye ekiyabbaire nakyo.
44002045	Ekikoba kiti, olwisi abamo kwibo batundanga nʼebyabwe, empiiya egibatoolangamu ni bagigabira yenayena mwibo okusinzirira oku kyetaagokye.
44002046	Tibagoneryanga okukumbaanira aamo omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu buli lunaku, oteekeku nʼokucaalanganiranga kisito ku kisito ni bagabanira aamo ebiinulo nʼemyoyo egiizwire eisangaalo nʼeiwooyo anambula kwekolesya,
44002047	era nga webawuuja oKibbumba, era nga nʼabantu bonabona babasiima. Ebyo nga byaba omu maiso, buli lunaku oMusengwa nʼabongerangaku abantu abandi, abo abalokokanga.
44003001	Lumo, oPeetero nʼoYokaana ni baniinaniina okwaba omu Yeekaalu oku saawa omwenda egyʼeigolo, esaawa abantu omu bakumbaaniranga okusaba oKibbumba.
44003002	Owebabbaire batuuka oku luuga lwʼeYeekaalu wabbairewo omusaiza ogubabyaire nga munialuuki ogubabbaire batuuca oku geeti. Buli lunaku bamuteekanga awo oku geeti egibeeta eNsa, asabirirye abantu abaingira.
44003003	Oweyaboine oPeetero nʼoYokaana nga baiza batira okwingira, nʼabasaba empiiya.
44003004	Awo bona ni bamwekalikica, era oPeetero nʼamukoba ati, “Kaade otulingirire!”
44003005	Atyo yena nʼabakaliryaku amaiso, ngʼasuubira ati babbaaku nʼakantu akebamuwa.
44003006	Awo oPeetero nʼamukoba ati, “Empiiya ngibula, wazira ekindinakyo kinakuwa. Omu liina lya Yesu oKurisito owʼe Naazaleesi, nkulagira nti, otambule.”
44003007	Awo oPeetero nʼamukwata oku ngalo endiiro, nʼamubbeeraku okumusetuca. Amangu ago, ebigere bya musaiza oyo nʼobubbongebwe ni bicaata.
44003008	Omusaiza nʼayalamuka nʼayemerera, era nʼatandiika nʼokutambula. Era nʼaingira nabo oku luuga lwʼeYeekaalu ngʼatambula era ngʼajuukajuuka ngʼawuuja oKibbumba.
44003009	Abantu bonabona ababbaire awo owebaboine ngʼatambula awuuja oKibbumba
44003010	baabire okumwetegereza nga dala niiye oyo eyatyamanga oku geeti yʼoluuga lwʼeYeekaalu egibeeta bati Nsa ngʼasabirirya. Bonabona ni beewunya ino, era ni bawugulala olwʼekyo ekyabbaire kituukire oku musaiza oyo.
44003011	Awo omusaiza eyabbaire omunialuuki ngʼakaali ali nʼoPeetero nʼoYokaana abeesibireku olwʼekibabbaire bamukoleire, abantu bonabona ababbairewo, ni beewunya era ni bairuka okwiza egiri oPeetero nʼoYokaana omu kigango ekibakaliryeku eriina bati Pooci ya kabaka oSulemaani.
44003012	OPeetero oweyaboine abantu beekumbaanirye, nʼabakoba ati, “Baisirairi bainange, ekyo lwaki dala kibeewunyisya? Ekigira mutumaliraku amaiso mutyo niki ooti-so amo bwezye bwaiswe, ooba butuukirirye bwaiswe omu maiso ga Kibbumba niibyo ebyezeserye omusaiza onu okutambula?
44003013	OKibbumba wa Ibbulaimu, era wa Isaka, era wa Yaakobbo, abazeiza baiswe abo ogubasinzanga, niiye agulumairye oMuweereryawe oYesu, inywe ogumwawaireyo bamwite, era ni mumwegaanira omu maiso ga Piraato, waire nga iye yabbaire asalirewo okumuteera.
44003014	Obone dala ni mwegaana oyo Atuukiriire era oMweru wa Kibbumba, kaisi omu kifookye ni musaba babateerere omutemo.
44003015	Dala ni mwita oyo onsulo wʼobwomi obutawaawo, neye oKibbumba nʼamuzuukiza. Era iswe swenaswena ekyo ekitukoba twakyeboneireku nʼagaiswe.
44003016	Olwʼokwesiga oYesu oyo nʼobwezyebwe, kagira omuntu onu ogumubona aanu era ogumumaite nakusani airiremu amaani. Ekikoba kiti, kwikirirya okutuli nakwo omu liina lya Yesu niikwo okugirisirye nʼalamirya nakimo omusaiza onu, era nywenanywena ngʼowemwebonesya.
44003017	“Aale atyanu baganda bange, nkimaite nga inywe, aamo nʼabeekubbemberi baanywe, ebimwakolere oYesu, mwabikolere mu butamanya.
44003018	Neye obone, mwibyo niimwo oKibbumba omuyabitiire okutuukirirya ebyo ebiyabbaire alangiriire e nyuma nakimo eedi, ngʼabitira omu banaabbi bonabona, ati oKurisito oyo oguyalondere okununula abantu yalibita omu kugada era ni bamwita.
44003019	Nʼolwekyo mwenenye, mugaluke mwire eeri oKibbumba asoniye ebibbibibbi byanywe, kaisi emyoyo gyanywe gisunenge okwira obuyaaka okuzwa eeri oMusengwa oKibbumba.
44003020	Era aweererye tete oKurisito oyo oguyamalire okubalondera, era ngʼoyo niiye oYesu.
44003021	OKurisito oyo aali nʼokubba ngʼasigala omwigulu paka ekiseera oKibbumba oweyaliiriryawo obuyaaka buli kintu nga kituukiriire, era ngʼoweyasuubizire eira eino ngʼabitira omu banaabbibe abeeru.
44003022	Ngʼekyokuboneraku, onaabbi Musa yakobere ati, ‘OMusengwa waanywe oKibbumba yalibasetulira onaabbi okuzwa omu bantu bʼeigwanga lyanywe eyalifaanana ooti ninze. Muteganga amatwi eeri byonabyona ebyo ebiyalibakoba.
44003023	Oyo yenayena atawulisisya onaabbi oyo, oKibbumba yalimutooleramu kimo nantabba omuntu owuwe, era nʼamujigirica.’
44003024	“Era abanaabbi abandi bonabona, nga mwotwaliirye nʼoSamwiri nʼabo abamwiririireku, abo bonabona ababbaireku nʼekibono okuzwa eeri oKibbumba ekibatumwire, ebiriwo omu naku ginu babirangiriire.
44003025	Ebyo oKibbumba ebiyasuubizire ngʼabitira omu banaabbi, byanywe era nʼendagaano egiyalaagaine nʼabazeiza baanywe, bagikolere kugasa niinywe. Yakobere oIbbulaimu ati, ‘Naliwa amawanga gonagona enkabi nga mbita mu baizukulubo.’
44003026	Kagira obona oti oKibbumba oweyamalire okulonda omuweereryawe oYesu, yasookere kumusindika eeri niinywe abagase kinene ngʼabagaluca nywenanywena abatoole omu kwabira oku bikole byanywe ebibbibibbi.”
44004001	OPeetero nʼoYokaana nga bakaali batumula eeri abantu, abakabona nʼakulira abakuumi bʼeYeekaalu, aamo nʼabʼekibbula kyʼaBasedukaayo ababbaire awo, ni baigerera egibali.
44004002	Babbaire banyiigi ino olwakubba abatume babbaire beegesya abantu oku Yesu ngʼoweyazuukiire, ekyo nga kiragisya era ni kikakasa kiti abafu bʼokuzuukira, ekintu ekyakanisya enjegesya yʼeKisedukaayo.
44004003	Nʼolwekyo, ni bagwera oPeetero nʼoYokaana, ni babakwata, neye olwakubba ebiseera byabbaire byʼeigolo ngʼobwire bubitire, ni babadyaka mu mabbuusu paka eizo.
44004004	Neye era, bangi kwabo ababbaire awo abawuliire ebibono oPeetero ebiyalaabbiire abaikiririirye omu Yesu, era kwolwo obungi bwʼabaikirirya ni bweyongera paka ooti 5,000, nga tobaliireku abakali.
44004005	Oku lunaku olwairireku, abafugi bʼaBayudaaya nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, ni bakumbaanira omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi.
44004006	Omu bikonge ebyabbairewo niimwo omwabbaire Anasi okabona akira obukulu eyawuumwire, nʼoKayaafa eyabbaire okabona akira obukulu eyabbaireku ebiseera ebyo, nʼabakabona abandi babiri, oYokaana nʼErigizanda, nʼabasaiza abandi abʼomu lulyo lwa kabona akira obukulu.
44004007	Ni beetesya oPeetero nʼoYokaana, ni babeemererya omu maiso gʼakakiiko akakulu akʼabanadiini, ni batandiika okubabuulya ebibuulyo bati, “Okwaba okulamya omusaiza oyo, mwamulamiirye mu bwezye bwani? Ooba naani eyabawaire olukusa okukola ekyo?”
44004008	Awo oPeetero, ngʼaizwire amaani ga Mwoyo oMweru, nʼabairamu ati, “Basebo bafugi baiswe, era abantu abakulu omwigwanga lya iswe.
44004009	Abba ngʼolwatyanu lunu mutuwozesya lwʼekikole ekisa ekitukolere eeri omuntu abbaire omunialuuki, na kutubuulya ngeri egyalamiremu,
44004010	aale inywe nywenanywena nʼabantu bʼomwIsirairi abandi bonabona mukimanye muti bwezye bwa Yesu oKurisito owʼe Naazaleesi, inywe ogumwakomereire oku musalabba neye oKibbumba nʼamuzuukiza, niibwo obulamirye omusaiza onu. Era kagira ayemereire omu maiso gaanywe nga mwomi piri.
44004011	OYesu oyo niiye eBiwandiike ogubitumulaku biti: ‘Eibbaale eeryo abombeki eribagaine lisuukire niiryo erikulu erisiba ensonda yʼomusingi.’
44004012	“Era, mpaawo muntu gondi ayezya okulokola abantu okutoolaku oYesu. Ekyo kityo olwakubba mpaawo muntu gondi ansi wʼeisana oKibbumba oguyatusindikiire ateekwa okutulokola.”
44004013	AbʼoLukiiko owebaboine oPeetero nʼoYokaana nga bakalu bʼamaiso, era nga bakitegeireku bati bonabona bantu ba bulijo abatali bakugu omu byʼediini, ni kibeewunyisya ino, neye oluzwanyuma ni kibaizira kiti kaisi ababiri abo batambulanga nʼoYesu.
44004014	Nʼolwakubba babbaire beeboneraku omusaiza, eyabbaire omu kaseera ako ayemereire awo ampi nʼoPeetero nʼoYokaana, ngʼoweyabbaire alamire, ni bakayaku ekyʼokubavunaana.
44004015	Niiwo okulagira abo abebawozesya bawuluke omu Lukiiko. Owebamalire okubawuluca, abʼoLukiiko ni beegeyamu oku Peetero nʼoYokaana, nga webeebuulya bati,
44004016	“Twakola tutya okubonereza abantu banu? Ekisooka-obusooki, ekyewunyo ekyʼamaanimaani ekyo ekibakolere kimalire okumanyikana kumpi omu bʼe Yerusaalemi bonabona kale titwezya kukyegaana!
44004017	Koizi ekitubba tukole, tulabule basaiza banu kutairayo okutumula na muntu yenayena ooba okwegesya omu liina eeryo, amo ni twezya okulobeesererya ebikwata kwekyo ekibakolere okweyongera okusalaana omu bantu.”
44004018	Batyo ni beetesya oPeetero nʼoYokaana, ni babalagira okutairayo okutumula, ooba okwegesya omuntu yenayena omu liina lya Yesu, waire ebimukwataku.
44004019	Okubairamu, oPeetero, ngʼali aamo nʼomwinaye oYokaana, nʼabairamu ati, “Inywe nywena abanyere kaabbo mwesalirewo ku binu ekisaaniire okukola omu maiso ga Kibbumba; kugondera niiye ooba niinywe?
44004020	Ekyo kityo olwakubba, mpaawo ngeri iswe egitwezya okutatumula kwebyo ebitweboneireku nʼagaiswe ngʼoYesu akola era nʼebyo ebitwawuliire ngʼayegesya.”
44004021	Awo oluzwanyuma lwʼokubatiisyatiisya, ni babateera, olwo-so nga bakayire ensonga etegerekeka egibababonerezeraku ni batakayula abantu, olwakubba abantu bonabona ababbaire awo babbaire bali mu kuwuuja Kibbumba olwʼekyo ekyakolere.
44004022	Omusaiza oyo nago ogubalamirye omu ngeri eyʼekyewunyo yabbaire wʼemyanka egibita omu 40.
44004023	Owebamalire okubateera, oPeetero nʼoYokaana ni bairayo eeri abanaabwe, ni babakobera byonabyona abakabona abakulu, aamo nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga abandi ebibabakobere.
44004024	Owebawuliire ebyo, bonabona omu bumo, ni beegairira oKibbumba nʼebibono binu bati, “Musengwa oKirabyonabyona, iwe eyabbumbire eigulu, nʼekyalo, nʼenyanza, era nabuli kintu ekibirimu.
44004025	Ngʼobitira omu Mwoyo oMweru, watumuliire omu zeiza waiswe era omuweereryawo okabaka Dawudi, nʼokoba oti: ‘Lwaki aBatali Bayudaaya baizwire obunyiigi, era lwaki aBaisirairi basalire enkwe eginambulamu?
44004026	Abafugi bʼoku kyalo bakolere entegeka, nʼabeekubbemberi ni bakumbaanira aamo okulwanisya oMusengwa oKibbumba nʼokulwanisya oyo oguyasukireku amafuta.’
44004027	“Era omu butuuce kityo wekyabbaire; okabaka oKerode nʼoPontiyo Piraato nʼaBatali Bayudaaya, era nʼaBaisirairi beekumbaaniirye omu kibuga kinu ni basala olukwe okulwanisya omuweereryawo omweru, oYesu, oguwasukireku amafuta.
44004028	Omu kukola ekyo, ni batuukirirya ekyo iwe ekiwabbaire omalire okutegeka omu bwezyebwo, ngʼowewatakire.
44004029	Aale atyanu Musengwa, olingirire omu kutiisyatiisya okubakolere, oyezyesye abaweereryabo okutumula ekibonokyo nʼobugumu anambula kwezizyazizya.
44004030	Olage amaanigo olamye abantu, era nʼebyamagero tubikole omu liina lya muweereryawo omweru oYesu.”
44004031	Owebamalire okwegairira oKibbumba, ni wabbaawo okutengeeta omu kifo omu babbaire bakumbaaniire. Bonabona ni baizula oMwoyo oMweru, era ni batandiika okutumula ekibono kya Kibbumba nʼobugumu.
44004032	Ebiro ebyo, abaikirirya ba Kurisito bonabona babbaire mu bumo era nga bʼenseega moiza. Mpaawo kadi moiza mwibo eyakobanga ati ekintu kirebe ekyali nakyo kikye-kububwe iye yenkani, wazira ngʼakitwala ngʼekyʼokukolesya nʼokugasa nʼabainaye abandi bonabona.
44004033	Nʼamaani mangi, abatume ni bakakasa okuzuukira kwa Musengwa waiswe oYesu, era bonabona oKibbumba nʼababbeeranga ino.
44004034	Buli moiza kwibo yasunanga ebiyeetaaganga, olwakubba abaabbanga nʼebigona ooba nyumba bagitundangamu, empiiya egyazwangamu
44004035	ni bagiwaayo eeri abatume, abatume ni bagigabira buli muntu okusinzirira oku kwetaaga okuyaabbanga nakwo.
44004036	Omu ngeri eyo, nʼomusaiza oMuleevi ogubeeta bati Yusufu omutyami wʼe Kupulo, abatume ogubabbaire bakaliryeku erya Bbalunaba, amakulu gaalyo, Airyamu abantu amaani,
44004037	nʼatunda ekigonakye, empiiya egyazwiremu nʼagitwala nʼagikwatisya abatume.
44005001	Neye lumo, omusaiza omoiza kwibo ogubeeta bati Ananiya, eyabbaire nʼomukali ogubeeta bati Safira, yena nʼatunda ekigona.
44005002	Empiiya egyazwiremu nʼatoolaku ekitundu nʼakibisa akyesigalirye, era nga nʼomukaliwe akimaiteku. Egyasigairewo nʼagitwala nʼagikwatisya abatume nga waabbeyesya ati egyaleetere niigyo egyo gyonagyona egiyasuniremu.
44005003	Awo niiye oPeetero okumubuulya ati, “Ananiya, lwaki oikiriirye oSitaani okufuga omwoyogwo, nʼobbeya oMwoyo oMweru nga weebisiraku egimo oku mpiiya egiwasunire omu kutunda ekigona?
44005004	Mbona owewabbaire ngʼokaali kukitunda kyabbaire kikyo. Tiniikyo? Era, nʼowewamalire okukitunda, empiiya egiwasuniremu gyabbaire mu bwezyebwo okugikolesya omu ngeri yonayona egyotaka. Tiniikyo? Tete niki dala ekyagirire nʼoseega omu mwoyogwo okukola ekintu ekibbikibbi ekyo? Ala tobbeyere bantu-buntu neye obbeyere Kibbumba.”
44005005	Ananiya oweyawuliire ebyo, nʼagwa eedi nʼafa. Bonabona abawuliire ebibbairewo ensisi nʼebakwata, ni baizula okutya.
44005006	NgʼAnaniya amalire okufa, ni wabbaawo abanyeete abaizire ni balingira omulambogwe omu masuuka, ni baguwuluca, ni bagutwala, ni baguliika.
44005007	Nga wabitirewo eibbanga lyʼesaawa ooti isatu, omukaliwe nʼatuuka, nga-so tamaiteku ebigwirewo, nʼaingira oPeetero omu babbaire.
44005008	Awo oPeetero nʼamubuulya ati, “Onkobere! Kituuce dala empiiya ginu niibwo obungi obumwasunire omu kigona?” OSafira nʼamwiramu ati, “Kituuce niigyo egyo.”
44005009	OPeetero niiwo okumukoba ati, “Mutyoso wemwaikirizaganyire okukema oMwoyo wa Musengwa? Aale nʼowentumulira aanu, ensindo gyʼabaliikire oibaawo ngijo giri oku mulyango, mbabo baingira. Wena bakutwala.”
44005010	Amangu ago, oSafira nʼagwa abigere bya Peetero era nʼafa. Abanyeete owebatuukira kaisi baingire, bamwajiirye akalire, ni batwala omulambogwe, ni baguliika okulirana amagombe ga ibaaye.
44005011	Awo ekanisa yonayona era nʼabantu abandi bonabona ababiwuliireku, ensisi nʼebakwata.
44005012	Abatume ni bakolanga ebyewunyo nʼebyamagero bingi omu bantu. Abaikirirya bonabona, omu bumo, ni bakumbaaniranga bulijo oku luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, omu kisenge ekibeetanga bati pooci ya kabaka oSulemaani.
44005013	Waire ngʼabantu bonabona babawanga ekitiisya kinene, mpaawo kadi moiza kwabo abatabbaire baikirirya eyagezyangaku okwekolesya ati mwikirirya ayezye okubeerirania ooba okukolagana nabo, olwʼokutya ati demba oKibbumba nʼamubbutula.
44005014	Neye era, nga buli oluca, abantu bangi ino abasaiza nʼabakali ni baikiririryanga omu Musengwa, obungi bwabo ababeeyungangaku butyo ni bweyongera.
44005015	Olwʼebintu abatume ebibakolanga, abantu ni baleetanga abantu baabwe abalwaire, ni babateeka oku bitaliri nʼoku mikeeka oku nzira oPeetero egiyabita, kasinga naabba kiriirye-obwiriiryekye kigweku oku bamo abaateezye okukwataku.
44005016	Era, olwebe lwʼabantu okuzwa omu bubuga obuliraine e Yerusaalemi ni beesombanga nga baleeta egiri abatume abantu baabwe abalwaire nʼabo ababbaireku emizimu egyabagadyanga; bonabona oKibbumba na balamya.
44005017	Okabona akira obukulu nʼabo bonabona abeyakolagananga nabo, ibo bonabona nga babbaire bʼekibbula kyʼaBasedukaayo, owebaboine ebyaba omu maiso, engongi ni gibabitiriraku.
44005018	Niibo okusetukiramu, ni bakwata abatume, ni babadyaka omu mabbuusu.
44005019	Neye omu kiire, omalaika oMusengwa oguyatumire nʼaigulawo enjigi gyʼamabbuusu, nʼabawuluca e nza, nʼabakoba ati,
44005020	“Mwabe, mwemererenge nakimo ku luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, mukoberenge abantu byonabyona ebifa oku bwomi obwo obuyaaka oYesu obwawa abamwikirirya.”
44005021	Bona okugondera ekibabbaire babakobere, eizo bawiine kibbambya ni baaba oku luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, ni batandiika okwegesya ababbairewo. Eenu byabbanga bityo, nʼeedi okabona akira obukulu nʼabainaye abeyakolagananga nabo beeta oLukiiko oLufugi lwʼaBayudaaya, oolwo nga niirwo olubbaamu abantu abakira obukulu omwigwanga lya Isirairi lyonalyona. AbʼoLukiiko owebakumbaine, ni batumisya omu mabbuusu okuleeta abatume.
44005022	Neye okwaba okutuuka omu mabbuusu, abebatumire nandi ni baajiryamu abatume. Niiwo okwirayo eeri abʼoLukiiko ni babakobera bati,
44005023	“Owetutuukiire twajiirye enjigi gyʼamabbuusu nfunge nakusani, era nga nʼabakuumi beemereire aawo; neye owetwigwirewo, titwajiiryemu kadi moiza oku batume!”
44005024	Akulira abakuumi bʼeYeekaalu nʼabakabona abakulu owebawuliire ebyo, ni bibasobera, era ni beeraliikirira ikyo ekyezya okubazweramu.
44005025	Omu kaseera ako ni wabbaawo omuntu eyaizire ngʼazwa oku Yeekaalu nʼabakoba ati, “Muwulisisye kinu! Abasaiza abemwaigaliire omu mabbuusu, owentumulira aanu, mbadi ku luuga lwʼeYeekaalu beegesya bantu ebifa oku Yesu.”
44005026	Akulira abakuumi bʼeYeekaalu oweyawuliire ekyo, nʼayaba nʼabaisulukalebe, ni baleeta abatume mwiwooyo amantabakolaku obukambwe, olwakubba batiire bati bona demba abantu ni babakubba amabbaale singa kabatanda ni babitya bundi abatume.
44005027	Owebaleetere abatume, ni babeemererya omu maiso gʼabʼoLukiiko oLufugi olwʼaBayudaaya, okabona akira obukulu abawozesye.
44005028	Okabona akira obukulu nʼabakoba ati, “Twabalagiire okutairayo okwegesyanga abantu omu liina lya musaiza oyo oYesu, neye atyanu obone ekimukolere! Musalaanirye oYerusaalemi yenayena nʼenjegesya yaanywe. Era timukomere ku kiikyo kyonkani, mumaliriire nʼokututeekesyaku omusango muti eisaaye lya musaiza oyo liri mu ngalo gyaiswe.”
44005029	Awo oPeetero aamo nʼabatume abandi, ni bairamu bati, “Tusaaniire kukola kiikyo oKibbumba ekyatukoba okukola neye tikiikyo abantu ekibatukoba.
44005030	Inywe mwaitire oYesu nga mumukomerera oku musalabba, neye oKibbumba, abazeiza baiswe abʼeira ogubasinzanga nʼamuzuukiza.
44005031	Era, oyo niiye oKibbumba oguyaniinirye, nʼamuwa okutyama omu kifo ekyʼekitiisya ngʼamuliraine oku ngalo endiiro, nʼasuuka niiye omufugi era oMulokoli kaisi aBaisirairi basune akakisa okwenenya, era oKibbumba ayezye okubasoniya ebibbibibbi.
44005032	Iswe tumanyikisya bintu ebyo ebitukakasa tuti byabbairewo oku Yesu, era nʼoMwoyo oMweru, oKibbumba ogwawaire abo abamugondera, yena abikakasa.”
44005033	AbʼoLukiiko owebawuliire ebibono ebyo, obusungu ni bubakwata, ni bataka baite abatume.
44005034	Neye omoiza kwibo, eriinalye bati Gamalyeri eyabbaire oMufalisaayo, omukugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa era nga musaiza wʼekitiisya ino omu bantu bonabona, nʼasetuka nʼalagira bawulucekuumu abatume omu Lukiiko nago okumala akaseera.
44005035	Owebamalire okubawuluca, oGamalyeri nʼakoba abainaye ati, “Baisirairi abainange, mwegendereze ekimutaka okukola abantu banu.
44005036	Enyumaku awo, omusaiza ogubeeta oTawoda yazwireyo ni yeekubbembera akeediimo okwifuge lyʼaBalooma nga yeetuubba ati muntu mukulu ino, era abasaiza abeera ooti 400 ni bamusengererya. Neye owebamwitire, abasengereribe basalaanikire, ekibbulakye ni kiwaamu amaani ni kifaawo.
44005037	Oluzwanyuma lwʼokuzwawo kwʼoyo, omu biseera egavumenti ebiyabaliiremu abantu, ni wazwayo oYuda owʼe Galiraaya, ni yeekubbembera ekibbula kyʼabantu abeyalalikire ni beediima okwifuge lyʼaBalooma. Oyo yena bamwitire, era nʼababbaire bamusengererya bonabona ni basalaanika.
44005038	“Nʼolwekyo, oku nsonga eenu atyanu egituliku, amalabuki agembawa niigo ganu: Muzwe oku bantu banu, mubaleke beetaaye, olwakubba abba ngʼekigendererwa kyabwe nʼebyo ebibakola biseego byʼabantu-buntu, biiza kufafaagana biweewo ngʼebya badi abasookere.
44005039	Neye owekibba kiti Kibbumba niiye abirungamya, nʼowemwakola mutya timwezye okubijigirica. Aate mugenderere ino, demba mweyaja nga mulwanisya Kibbumba!” AbʼoLukiiko owebawuliire entumula ya Gamalyeri, ni babona amakulu omu biyatumwire, ni baabira oku malabukige.
44005040	Awo ni beeta abatume, ni balagira babakubbe efaalu, era ni babalagira nʼokutairamu okutumulanga omu liina lya Yesu, batyo ni babateera.
44005041	Ibo abatume ni bawuluka okuzwa omu maiso gʼabʼoLukiiko nago nga basangaali ino olwakubba babbaire basunireku akakisa, era ngʼatyanu batuukana okubabalira mwabo abebagadya olwʼokwikiririrya omu Yesu.
44005042	Era buli lunaku, omu Yeekaalu nʼomu bisito, ni batagoneryanga okulaabba aMawuliro aMasa eeri abantu bati oYesu niiye oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.
44006001	Omu biseera ebyo, obungi bwʼabeegi ba Yesu owebwabire nga bweyongerera nakimo, abaikirirya aBayudaaya abatumula oLuyonaani olwʼokutakulira omu Buyudaaya, ni beezuluguma olwʼaBayudaaya abanaabwe abakuliire okwo abatumula oLwebbulaniya. Abatumula oLuyonaani ekyabbaire kibaluma kyabbaire kiti, owekyatuukanga omu kugabirira ebyetaago byʼabanamwandu okwa buli lunaku, nga ibo abaabwe babatambuca amaiso.
44006002	Awo niiwo abatume eikumi na babiri okweta abeegi bonabona, ni babakoba bati, “Tikisaaniire niiswe otubba twire omu kugabulanga ebintu, ekyagira ni tulekerera okwegesya ekibono kya Kibbumba.
44006003	Nʼolwekyo boluganda, mulonde mwinywe abasaiza musanvu abemwekakasa muti baabira ino oku kulungamya kwʼoMwoyo oMweru era abali nʼamalabuki, abo betubba tukwatisye omulimo ogwo.
44006004	Omu ngeri eyo, iswe twaba kwemalira ku mulimo gwʼokwegairira Kibbumba aamo nʼokwegesya ekibonokye.”
44006005	Ekanisa yonayona nʼesiima ekiseego ekyo. Batyo ni balonda oSitefaano omusaiza eyabbaire nʼokwikiririrya era ayabira ino oku kulungamya kwʼoMwoyo oMweru. Era ni balonda nʼoFiripo, nʼoPulokoolo, nʼoNikanooli, nʼoTimoni, nʼoPalumeena, nʼoNikolaawo azwera Antiyokiya era eyabbaire asookere kwingira diini yʼeKiyudaaya kaisi aize asuukenge omwikirirya.
44006006	Abo ni babaleeta ni babanjula omu maiso gʼabatume, abatume ni baingira omu kusaba oKibbumba abbeere abo abebalonderemu, era ni babateekaku nʼengalo okubasabira.
44006007	Awo ekibono kya Kibbumba ni kyeyongera okusaalaana nga wekikwata nʼoku bantu abayaaka ababbaire bakaali okukiwulira nʼokukiikiririryamu. Omu ngeri eyo, omu Yerusaalemi mwonkamwonkani, obungi bwʼabaikirirya ni bwaba nga buniina, era mwabo niimwo omwabbaire nʼabakabona abʼomu diini yʼeKiyudaaya bangi abaikiririirye omu Yesu, bona ni basuuka abasengereribe.
44006008	Atyanu, oKibbumba nʼakwatira ino oSitefaano ekisa nʼamuwa nʼamaani ngʼamwezyesya okukolanga ebyewunyo nʼebyamagero bingi omu bantu.
44006009	Neye aBayudaaya bʼomwikumbaaniro eribeetanga eryʼaBateere, abazwera omu bibuga e Kuleene nʼAlekizandereya, nʼabanaabwe abazwera omu matwale gʼe Sirisiya nʼAsiya ni bamusetukiraku, ni batanula okumwakanisya.
44006010	Neye era nandi ni bamwezya, olwakubba yabbaire nʼamalabuki mabitiriri egibali, ngʼoMwoyo oMweru niiye amuwa ebyokutumula.
44006011	Owebaboine nga tibamwezya, omu nkukutu ni babbeegererya abantu basibirirye oku Sitefaano bati, “Twamuwuliire ngʼatumula ebibono ebizumirira onaabbi Musa nʼoKibbumba.”
44006012	Batyo ni bacoolesya abantu abakulu omwigwanga, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, aamo nʼabantu abandi aba bulijo bona ni basetukiramu. Era ni bakwata oSitefaano, ni bamuleeta omu bʼoLukiiko oLufugi olwʼaBayudaaya.
44006013	Eeyo, ni baleeta abajulizi abʼobubbeyi ni bawa obujulizi bati, “Omuntu onu bulijo atumula ebibono ebizumirira eYeekaalu, nʼekifo ekyeru, aamo nʼaMateeka oKibbumba ageyatuwaire okubitira omu Musa.
44006014	Twamuwuliire ngʼakoba mbu omusaiza onu oYesu owʼe Naazaleesi aiza kujigirica eYeekaalu eenu, acuuse nʼempisa gyʼobuwangwa onaabbi Musa egiyatuwaire okwabirangaku.”
44006015	Omu kaseera ako, ababbaire awo omu Lukiiko oLufugi bonabona ni beekalikica oSitefaano amaiso, okwaba okumwetegereza ngʼomu maisoge mwaka ooti mu maiso ga malaika.
44007001	Awo okabona akira obukulu nʼabuulya oSitefaano ati, “Ebyo ebibakoba bati wabbengere bituuce?”
44007002	Omu kuwozyakwe eeri okabona nʼabo ababbairewo, oSitefaano nʼakoba ati, “Bayudaaya abainange na inywe abantu abakulu, mumpulisisyeku! Ozeiza waiswe oIbbulaimu oweyabbaire e Mesopotaamiya, awo ngʼakaali kuwulikira omu Kalani, oKibbumba owʼekitiisya yamubonekeire
44007003	nʼamukoba ati, ‘Ozwe omu kyalo kyʼe waanywe era omu bantubo, oyabe omu kyalo ekinalikulungamya okwabamu.’
44007004	“Nʼolwekyo oIbbulaimu nʼawulika okuzwa omu Mesopotaamiya, omu kyalo kyʼabantu abebeetanga bati Bakaludaayo, nʼawulikira omu Kalani. Oluzwanyuma lwa iteeye okufa, oKibbumba nʼamutoola omu Kalani nʼamulungamya okwiza omu kyalo kinu iswe omututyaime paka atyanu.
44007005	Neye nandi nʼamuwaamu itakali erirye-okububwe, waire akatundu akeerya obuwanvu bwʼekigere ekimo. Neye nʼamusuubiza ati ekyalo ekyo nago kyalibba kikye, iye nʼabʼekiizukulukye abaliirawo, waire nga yabbaire akaali kusunaku mwana.
44007006	OKibbumba yamukobere biinu ati, ‘Abʼekiizukulukyo balyaba ni batyama omu kyalo ekindi ekitali kyabwe ngʼabaizaizana, era eeyo balibasuuca abagalama, ni bababitya bundi okumala emyanka 400.
44007007	Neye, nalisalira omusango era ni mbonereza eigwanga eryalibasuuca abagalama, neye oluzwanyuma lwʼebyo balizwayo ni baira bansinziranga omu kifo kinu.’
44007008	Awo oKibbumba nʼakola endagaano nʼoIbbulaimu ngʼamukoba okukomola buli musaiza aliwo nʼabaliizawo omu kisitokye ngʼakamanyiciryo kʼendagaano nago. Nʼolwekyo, oIbbulaimu oweyabyaire oIsaka, yamukomoire oku lunaku olwomunaana ngʼabamalire okumubyala. Omu nkola enanyere eyo, oIsaka yena oweyakulire nʼabyala oYaakobbo, yamukomoire. OYaakobbo yena atyo nʼakomola abataanebe, abo abasuukire abazeiza baiswe abakulu omuzwa ebika byaiswe eikumi na bibiri.”
44007009	“Abazeiza baiswe abakulu abo abataane ba Yaakobbo olwakubba bakwatiire omuganda waabwe oYusufu engongi, bamutundiremu nga bamugulya abantu abamutwaire omu bugalama omu kyalo kyʼe Misiri. Neye oKibbumba yabbaire naye,
44007010	nʼamulamya okuzwa omu kugadakwe kwonakwona. Yamuwaire amalabuki, nʼabba mukoda eri oFalaawo okabaka wʼe Misiri, ekyazwiremu oFalaawo nʼamusuuca mwekubbemberi omu Misiri nʼomu lubirirwe lwonalwona.”
44007011	“Oluzwanyuma, enzala enene nʼegwa omu Misiri mwonamwona paka nʼomu Kanani, nʼereeta okulaada kubitiriri ino, abazeiza baiswe ni bakayaku awokutoola ekyokulya ekimala.
44007012	Neye oYaakobbo oweyakiwuliireku ati omu Misiri waliyo ekyokulya, nʼatumayo abataane baabe baabbe. Era ogwo niigwo omulundi ogwasookeire nakimo abazeiza baiswe abakulu okwemaku omu Misiri.
44007013	Owebakangireyo okwabba oku mulundi ogwaiririireku, oYusufu ni yeemanyikisya egiri abagandabe, era nʼoFalaawo weyamanyiire olulyo lwa Yusufu.
44007014	Ebyo nga biwoire, oYusufu nʼatumisya okuleeta oiteeye oYaakobbo, nʼabʼolulyolwe bonabona okutwalirya aamo abantu 75.
44007015	Nʼolwekyo oYaakobbo ni baserengeta okwaba e Misiri okutyama eeyo, era oluzwanyuma iye nʼabazeiza baiswe abakulu abandi eeyo gibafeereire.
44007016	Abantu bʼe Isirairi owebabbaire bazwayo e Misiri, emirambo gyabwe ni bagiginga ni bagiirya e Sekemu, ni bagiteeka omu magombe gʼempuku oIbbulaimu ageyabbaire agulire okuzwa oku baizukulu ba Kamoli awo e Sekemu.”
44007017	“Ekiseera owekyabbaire kiigerera, ebiseera oKibbumba omu yatuukirirya ekyo ekiyabbaire asuubizire oIbbulaimu, abazeiza baiswe ni babyalagana, ni babba bangi omu Misiri.
44007018	Awo kaisi ni waizawo omu kyalo kyʼe Misiri okabaka ogondi eyabbaire tamaiteku oYusufu.
44007019	Okabaka oyo nʼalebalebania abantu baiswe era nʼagadya ino abazeiza baiswe, ngʼabamumisya nʼabaana baabwe abaibo e nza ati bafe.”
44007020	“Omu kiseera ekyo mubabyaliire oMusa era ngʼaboneka kusani omu maiso ga Kibbumba. Okumala emyeri misatu, bamulabiririranga mu kisito kya iteeye omu mbiso.
44007021	Owebamusengucirye ni bamuteeka e nza, omwala wa Falaawo niiye eyamwangaire, nʼamwetwalira nʼamukulya ngʼomwana owuwe okububwe.
44007022	OMusa ni bamwegesya amalabuki gʼaBamisiri gonagona, nʼabba wʼamaani omu biyatumulanga nʼomu biyakolanga.
44007023	“OMusa oweyayererye emyanka 40 egyʼobukulu, nʼasuna ekiseego omu mwoyogwe ekiti ayabe acaalireku aBaisirairi abainaye eedi egibabbaire.
44007024	Ngʼali eeyo, nʼabona omoiza kwibo nga waliyo oMumisiri amuliku amuluja, nʼabingiramu okubbeera oMwisirairi omwinaye nʼokunyaaŋa eeri oMumisiri, okwaba okweyaja ngʼamwitire.
44007025	OMusa iye yaseegere ati abagandabe bakitegeera bati oKibbumba ali kumukolesya okubanunula, neye ibo ekyo tibakitegeire.
44007026	Olunaku olwairireku, oMusa nʼagwerenkerera aBaisirairi babiri nga balwana, nʼagezyaku ati basyanie ngʼabakoba ati, ‘Basaiza inywe, muli boluganda; lwaki mulumyangana dala?’
44007027	“Neye omoiza waaku eyabbaire ali kunoja omwinaye nʼasindika eedi oMusa ngʼamukoba ati, ‘Naani eyakusuucirye omufugi era omulamuzi waiswe?
44007028	Otaka-so kunjita zena ngʼeizo owewaitire oMumisiri?’
44007029	OMusa oweyawuliire ebyo nʼairuka, nʼawulikira omu kyalo kyʼe Midyani, era eeyo giyafumbiriirwe nʼabyala abaana abaisuka babiri.”
44007030	“Nga wabitirewo emyanka 40, lumo oMusa yabbaire ali eeyo omu kitera, okumpi nʼolusozi oSinaayi, oKibbumba nʼamubonekera omu kifaananyi kya malaika, omu nnimi gyʼomusyo ogwabbaire gwakira omu kisaka neye nga tikiya.
44007031	Ekyo oweyakiboine ni kimwewunyisya ino. Oweyabbaire ooti aigerera yeetegereze, nʼawulira eigono lya Musengwa nga likoba liti,
44007032	‘Ninze oKibbumba abazeizabo ogubasinzanga; oKibbumba wa Ibbulaimu, era wa Isaka, era wa Yaakobbo.’ Olwʼokutya okubitiriri okwabbaire okumukwaite, oMusa nʼatukuta ino era nʼakaya nʼokusetula amaisoge tete ati aloleyo.
44007033	“OMusengwa oKibbumba nʼamukoba ati, ‘Otoolemu ebiraitobyo olwakubba ekifo ekyo ekyoyemereiremu kyeru.
44007034	Dala nningiriire ni mbona ngʼabantu bange abali omu Misiri owebagada eino. Mpuliire okwekunga kwabwe, era njikire njize mbalamye. Aale atyanu, oize, nkutuma okangeyo e Misiri.’
44007035	“OMusa dala oyo ogubabbaire bagaine okwikirirya nga bakoba bati, ‘Naani eyakusuucirye omufugi era omulamuzi waiswe?’ oKibbumba guyatumire, ngʼabitira omu malaika eyamubonekeire omu kisaka, abbe omufugi era omununuli.
44007036	Yabeekubbembeire okuwuluka omu Misiri era nʼakola ebyewunyisya nʼobumanyiciryo obwʼebyamagero omu kyalo kyʼe Misiri, nʼaadi nga bali oku Nyanza eNtukuliki, era nʼomukitera omu bamalire emyanka 40.”
44007037	“OMusa onyere oyo niiye eyakobere aBaisirairi ati, ‘OKibbumba yalibasindikira onaabbi okuzwa omu bantu bʼeigwanga lwanywe nga nze, eyalibakobera ebibono bya Musengwa.’
44007038	Era oMusa onyere oyo niiye eyabbairewo aBaisirairi bonabona owebakumbaaniire omu kitera, ngʼali nʼomalaika eyatumwire naye oku lusozi oSinaayi. Niiye oyo eyabbaire nʼabazeiza baiswe, era niiye onyere oyo ogubakwatisirye ebibono ebirimu endagirira yʼokubbaawo omu bwomi obutawaawo okubituwa.”
44007039	“Neye, abazeiza baiswe bagaine okumuwulisisya. Omu kifo kyʼekyo, ni bamwegaana era nʼomu myoyo gyabwe ni beegombanga kwirayo Misiri.
44007040	Bakobere Alooni bati, ‘Iswe otukolerewo amagasani agatwekubbembera nga tukangayo, olwakubba iswe oyo oMusa eyatutoire omu kyalo kyʼe Misiri titwemaitiire ekimutuukireku.’
44007041	Ekyo niikyo ekiseera owebeekoleire ekifaananyi ekiri ooti nyana. Era ni bakisadaakira ebisolo, era ni bakola emikolo egyʼokuwa ekifaananyi ekyo abanyere ekibeyeseire ekitiisya.
44007042	Atyo oKibbumba yena nʼabakubba omugongo, era nʼabaleka ni beemalira omu kusinza ebibbumbe ebiri angulu omwibbanga. Ekyo abo ekibakolere onaabbi Amosi yabbaire akitumwirekuuku e nyumaku eedi ngʼakoba ati oKibbumba akoba ati: ‘Bantu bʼe Isirairi, neso aale ebisolo ebimwabbiraganga nʼesadaaka egimwawangayo eibbanga lyonalyona eryʼemyanka 40 egimwabbaire omwidungu mwabiwanga ninze!
44007043	Owemwatambulanga, eweema ya Kibbumba egimwaginganga e ngulu ngʼeraga okubbaawo kwange akati mwinywe timwabbaire muteekeremu kifaananyi kya nkuni waanywe oMoleki nʼonkota eyabbaire ekifaananyi kya nkuni waanywe oLefaani, ebifaananyi byʼamagasani ebimwekoleire kaisi oolwo mubisinzenge? Nʼolwekyo naligira ni babadooma ni babatwala omu busibe eeyo e yala eino nʼokubita e Bbabbulooni.’
44007044	“Abazeiza baiswe nga bali omwidungu baabbanga nʼeweema eya Kibbumba eyaabbanga akamanyiciryo akalaga kati oKibbumba ali aawo nabo. Eweema eyo babbaire bagikolere ngʼoKibbumba oweyalagiire oMusa okugikola, era nga njeese mu kifaananyi oKibbumba ekiyabbaire amulagisiryeku.
44007045	Oluzwanyuma, abazeiza baiswe abo oYoswa abeyeekubbembeire bona owebamalire okubakwatisya eweema eya Kibbumba eyo, ni baiza nayo owebaingiriire omu kyalo ekyo okukitwala bakyefugire okuzwa oku mawanga oKibbumba ageyabbingiremu nga nʼabazeiza baiswe babona. Eweema eyo yasigaire omu kyalo ekyo paka omu biseera bya kabaka oDawudi.
44007046	Era oyo niiye oKibbumba oguyasiimire eino era eyasabire ati ayombekere oKibbumba oyo oYaakobbo oguyasinzanga enyumba eyenkalaakalira,
44007047	waire ngʼokabaka oSulemaani niiye eyairire nʼagyombeka.
44007048	“Neye, newankubbaire nga bakolere ekyo, oKibbumba oNambulaku aMwagaagana, tabba mu nyumba abantu egibombeka, era dala ngʼonaabbi oweyakitumwire ngʼoMusengwa oKibbumba owaakoba ati:
44007049	‘Eigulu niiryo entebe yange oku ntyama nga nfuga, kaisi ekyalo ikyo ni kibba mukonkolo oku mpuumulirya ebigere. Nyumbaki dala egimwezya okunnyombekera nʼentuukana? Ooba wantuki dala awemwezya okunkolera mbeemu ni wantuukana?
44007050	Byonabyona ebyo ebiri angulu nʼansi tininze nabikolere?’ ”
44007051	OSitefaano ni yeeyongera ati, “Bantu inywe abajeemu, abʼemyoyo egiri ooti gyʼabataikiririrya omu Kibbumba, era enkusyali egitawulisisya ebibono bya Kibbumba! Muli ooti bazeiza baanywe, olwakubba bulijo mugaana okugondera oMwoyo oMweru!
44007052	Oku banaabbi bonabona aale kulikuuku kadi moiza abazeiza baanywe ogubatayigaanirye? Obanga baitire nʼabo bona abalagwire okwiza kwa Mweru wa Kibbumba atuukiriire, yena ogumwaliiremu olukwe ni mumwita.
44007053	Niinywe abasunire aMateeka ga Musa, ngʼabamalaika owebagalangiriire neye mukaire okugakwata.”
44007054	AbʼaKakiiko owebawuliire ebyo, ni baizula eikabyo, era ni bamunyiigira ino.
44007055	Neye oSitefaano, eyabbaire omu kaseera ako aizwire amaani ga Mwoyo oMweru, nʼalola omwigulu, nʼabona ekitiisya kya Kibbumba nga kimesyamesya, era nʼoYesu ngʼayemereire aamo nʼoKibbumba omu kifo kyʼekitiisya eino.
44007056	OSitefaano nʼakoba ati, “Aale mubone! Mbona eigulu nga libiikukire, era mbona oMwana wa Muntu ngʼayemereire aamo nʼoKibbumba omu kifo ekyʼekitiisya eino.”
44007057	Awo bonabona omulundi gumo ni bakwata omu matwi gaabwe okugaigalawo nga baasyamika, era aamo ni bayoolookera oku Sitefaano, ni bamugwera.
44007058	Awo ni bamukulukuusa okumuwuluca omu kibuga, ni batandiika okumukubba amabbaale. Abo ababbaire bamukubba, ebizwalo byabwe ebyʼoku ngulu ni bʼabisisya omusaiza ogubeeta bati Sawulo abibakuumire.
44007059	Nga bakaali bamukubba amabbaale, oSitefaano nʼasaba nʼebibono binu ati, “Musengwa oYesu, otwale omwoyo gwange.”
44007060	Ekyazwiremu nʼagwa oku mazwige, nʼasaba maaminkirira ati, “Musengwa, obasoniye ekibbikibbi kinu.” Oweyamalire okutumula ebibono ebyo, nʼafa.
44008001	Omusaiza oodi oSawulo yena yabbaire awo ngʼasiima ekyʼokwita oSitefaano. Oku lunaku olunyere oolwo, okuyigaania ekanisa eyabbaire omu Yerusaalemi okwʼamaani ni kutandiika. Era okutoolaku abatume, kumpi abaikirirya abasigairewo bonabona basalaanikiire mu bitundu byʼeitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya nʼomu lyʼe Samaaliya.
44008002	Abasaiza abʼeiganyi omu kuweererya oKibbumba ababbairewo ni baliika oSitefaano, era ni bamukunga ino.
44008003	Neye oodi oSawulo iye nʼatandiika okukolerera okujigirica ekanisa. Ngʼayaba nyumba ku nyumba, nʼaingira nʼakwata buli mwikirirya yenayena, era abo abaakwaite nʼabawaayo babasibe omu mabbuusu.
44008004	Awo abaikirirya abo abebasalaanicirye ni baabanga nga webalaabba ekibono kya Kibbumba omu bitundu omu bawulikiire.
44008005	Omoiza kwibo, oFiripo, iye yaserengetere mu kibuga ekyʼe Samaaliya, nʼalaabba eeri abantu baayo ebifa oku Kurisito.
44008006	Abantu baayo owebawuliire oFiripo ebyatumula era ni babona nʼebyewunyo ebyakola, bonabona ni bateeka ino omwoyo kwebyo ebyayegesya.
44008007	Emizimu ni gizwanga oku bantu bangi nga wegikuukulya nʼamagono agaaminkirira. Era abasanyalali nʼabanialuuki bangi ino ni balama.
44008008	Nʼolwebyo, abʼomu kibuga kyʼe Samaaliya ni baizula eisangaalo libitiriri.
44008009	Omu kibuga ekyo mwabbairemu omusaiza ogubeetanga oSimooni eyabbaire alwire ngʼakola ebyeirogo ni yeewunyisya ino aBasamaaliya. Era yeewaananga ino nga yeeyeta muntu wʼamaani eino.
44008010	Abʼe Samaaliya abʼebibbula ebyʼenjabulo, nʼabakulu nʼabatobato, nʼabʼebitiisya nʼabasembayo ansi bamuwulisisyanga nʼomwoyo gumo, nga bakoba bati, “Omuntu onu dala niiye amaani ga Kibbumba gadi nakimo agebeeta amaani amabitiriri.”
44008011	Era, nga bamuwuliriramu ino olwakubba yabbaire alwire ngʼabeewunyisya nʼebyamalikoolo byʼeirogolye.
44008012	Neye abantu abo owebaikiriirye aMawuliro aMasa oFiripo ageyabbaire alaabba agafa oku bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba era ati oYesu niiye oKurisito, ni bababatiza, abakali nʼabasaiza kitabulye.
44008013	Era nʼoSimooni yena nʼaikiririrya omu Yesu. Owebamalire okumubatiza, nʼatandiika okusengererya oFiripo buli egiyaabanga okulaabba, era ebyewunyo ebibitiriri ebiyabonanga ni bimuwugulalyanga.
44008014	Awo abatume ababbaire omu Yerusaalemi owebawuliire bati omu Samaaliya abaayo baikiriirye ekibono kya Kibbumba, ni babasindikira oPeetero nʼoYokaana.
44008015	Owebatuukireyo, ni basabira abaikirirya basune oMwoyo oMweru.
44008016	Ekyo kityo olwakubba mwibo timwabbairemu kadi moiza oMwoyo oguyabbaire aikireku. Babbaire bababatizire-bubatizi mu liina lya Musengwa oYesu kyonkani.
44008017	Awo oPeetero nʼoYokaana ni babateekaku engalo gyabwe oku mitwe babasabire, atyo oMwoyo oMweru nʼaika ku buli moiza kwibo.
44008018	Iye oSimooni oweyaboine ngʼabatume bateeka engalo oku bantu oMwoyo oMweru nʼabaikaku, nʼaleetera abatume empiiya,
44008019	nʼabakoba ati, “Zena mumpeeku obwezye obwo kaisi mbe nga zenabuli ogunteekaku engalo gyange oMwoyo oMweru amwikaku.”
44008020	Neye oPeetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Ojigirike nʼempiiyagyo olwakubba oseegere oti wasuna ekirabo kya Kibbumba ekyagaba bwereere ngʼokigula-buguli!
44008021	Omu buweererya bunu obulamu kifo waire mugabo, olwakubba omwoyogwo timuteereeri omu maiso ga Kibbumba.
44008022	Weenenye, era weegairire oKibbumba amo nʼakusoniya okuseega ekiseego ekyʼengeri eyo ekiri omu mwoyogwo.
44008023	Ekyo kityo olwakubba mbona ngʼoizwire ngongi era oli muntu ekibbikibbi ogukifugira nakimo.”
44008024	OSimooni nʼakoba oPeetero ati, “Muneegairireku oMusengwa olwʼebibono ebyo ebyotumwire tiwaabbaawo waire kimo ekintuukaku.”
44008025	Awo oPeetero nʼoYokaana owebamalire okulaabba ekibono kya Kibbumba nʼokukikakasa omu bantu, ni bakwata ekangayo e Yerusaalemi, nga baaba webalaabba eeri abantu abʼomu bitundu bingi ebyʼe Samaaliya aMawuliro aMasa agakwata oku Yesu.
44008026	Oluzwanyuma, omalaika okuzwa e wa Musengwa nʼakoba oFiripo ati, “Osetukiremu oyabe olubba lwʼe maserengeta, okwate enzira ezwa e Yerusaalemi nʼerungama e Gaaza okubita omwidungu.”
44008027	Yena atyo nʼasetukiramu nʼayaba. Ngʼali omu nzira, nʼasangaana omusaiza oMwesyopiya omulaawe, nga mufugi mukulu akola ngʼomuwanika omukulu owa kabaka wʼEsyopiya. Okabaka oyo yabbaire mukali era ngʼekitiisyakye bamwetanga bati Kandake. Omusaiza oyo yabbaire ayabire e Yerusaalemi kusinza Kibbumba.
44008028	Kale atyanu ngʼakangayo e waabwe, atyaime-so bamusiringitya omu kigaalikye, nʼayaba nga waasoma ekitabo ekirimu ebibono bya naabbi oIsaaya.
44008029	OMwoyo oMweru nʼakoba oFiripo ati, “Oigerere oku kigaali ekyo otambulire ampyampi nakyo.”
44008030	OFiripo yena nʼairuukirira ekigaali nʼakituukaku, era oweyeetegerezere nʼawulira omusaiza oyo ngʼasoma okuzwa omu kitabo kya naabbi Isaaya. OFiripo nʼamubuulya ati, “Amakulu gʼebyo ebyosoma dala ogasuna?”
44008031	Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Kaisi dala mpezya ntya okugasuna okutoolaku nga waliwo abinsonzoleire?” Awo nʼayeta oFiripo okuniina oku kigaali atyame aamo naye, nga webaabirana.
44008032	Ekitundu kyʼeBiwandiike omukungu ekiyabbaire asoma kikoba kiti: “Bamutwaire okumwita ooti badooma ntaama kutwala mu kibbaagiro kusala; era ngʼontaama owaatabbaalaala okwerwanaku nga bamumwa ebyoya; yena tiyabbuunwire munwagwe okubakobaku ekibono waire kimo okwekankaba.
44008033	Bamubitirye omu ngeri yʼokumuswazaswaza, era nʼomusango ogubabbaire bamuvunaana ni bagusalirirya. Mpaawo eyalyezya okubalisya abaizukulube, olwakubba obwomibwe babukapwire-bukapuli oku kyalo.”
44008034	Awo omukungu nʼabuulya oFiripo ati, “Kaabbo onkobere, naani onu onaabbi ogwatumulaku? Yeetumulaku niiye onyere ooba atumula ku muntu gondi?”
44008035	OFiripo ngʼasinzirira oku kitundu kyʼeBiwandiike ekinyere ekyo, nʼatandiika okulaabba egyali aMawuliro aMasa agakwata oku Yesu.
44008036	Owebeeyongeire omu maiso omu lugendo lwabwe, ni batuuka awabbaire ekidiba kyʼamaizi, omukungu nʼakoba oFiripo ati, “Obone amaizi nganu! Neso aale ekindoberya okumbatiza tete niki?” [
44008037	OFiripo nʼakoba ati, “Owoobba ngʼoikiririirye omu Yesu nʼomwoyogwo gwonagwona, kyezyeka okukubatiza.” Iye nʼairamu ati, “Njikirirya nti oYesu niiye oKurisito oMwana wa Kibbumba].”
44008038	Awo omukungu nʼalagira okwemererya ekigaali. Awo iye nʼoFiripo bonabona ni baniinuka, ni baaba omu maizi, oFiripo nʼamubatiza.
44008039	Owebazwire omu maizi, oMwoyo wa Musengwa nʼayangula oFiripo okumutoola awo, nʼamulungamya enkona, atyo nʼamugotaku. Neye era, omukungu iye ni yeeyongera nʼolugendolwe ngʼaizwire eisangaalo omu mwoyogwe.
44008040	OFiripo okwaba okweyaja ngʼali mwAzoto, era nʼabitabita omu bubuga bwonabwona obuli awo, ngʼayaba akobera abantu aMawuliro aMasa paka oweyatuukire e Kaisaaliya.
44009001	Ebyo nga byaba omu maiso, iye oSawulo yabbaire nga yeeyayira kwita beegi ba Musengwa. Era nʼayaba eeri okabona akira obukulu,
44009002	nʼamusaba ebbaluwa emwanjula era emuwa obwezye okwaba omu makumbaaniro agʼomu kibuga e Damaasiko. Eeyo ngʼali nʼokukwata abo bonabona abasengereri bʼeNzira ya Musengwa singa abaajiryayo, aba basaiza ooba bakali, abatwale e Yerusaalemi babasibe.
44009003	Ngʼali omu lugendolwe ayaba e Damaasiko nʼabagalaagalabe, awo-so ngʼaigereire okumpi nʼekibuga ekyo, ekitangaala ekyʼamaani ni kizwa omwigulu ni kimumoleka okumweruguulirirya.
44009004	OSawulo nʼagwa ansi era ananyere awo nʼawulira eigono erimukoba liti, “Sawulo, Sawulo, lwaki onjiigaania?”
44009005	OSawulo nʼabuulya ati, “Niiwe onaani, Musengwa?” Eigono ni liiramu liti, “Ninze oYesu ogwoli kuyigaania.
44009006	Aale atyanu osetuke oyabe oingire omu kibuga. Eeyo wayajiryayo abakukobera ekyokukola.”
44009007	Abasaiza ababbaire batambula nʼoSawulo ni beemerera awo omu kuwugulala okwʼamaani; nga bawulira eigono eritumula, neye nga tibabonaku onyereryo.
44009008	Eigono oweryamalire okutumula, oSawulo nʼasetuka okwitakali, neye oweyabbaire ati abonie, nandi nʼayezya kubona kintu naire. Awo abainaye ni bamukwata oku ngalo, ni bamubbeera okumutuuca okwingira omu kibuga e Damaasiko.
44009009	OSawulo nʼamala enaku isatu ngʼayofuwaire, era nga nʼokulya talya ooba okunywa.
44009010	Omu kibuga e Damaasiko mwabbairemu omwegi wa Yesu eriinalye yena bati Ananiya. OMusengwa nʼabonekera Ananiya oyo omu kwolesebwa, nʼamukoba ati, “Ananiya!” Iye nʼayetuka ati, “Wangi Musengwa.”
44009011	OMusengwa nʼamukoba ati, “Osetukiremu oyabe omu kisito kya Yuda ekiri oku nzira egibeeta eNterembereri, obuulye bakulage omusaiza azwire e Taasasi ogubeeta oSawulo. Owentumulira aanu aliyo ali omu kusaba,
44009012	era asunire okwolesebwa ngʼomusaiza ogubeeta Ananiya aiza egyali amuteekeku engalo amusabire kaisi ayezye okwiramu okubona.”
44009013	Ananiya nʼamwiramu ati, “Musengwa, neye nga mpuliire bingi ebibatumula oku musaiza oyo, nga kwoteekereku nʼakabbikabbi akʼamaanimaani akeyatuucirye oku batuukirirye abali omu Yerusaalemi!
44009014	Era nʼokwiza munu, asunire obwezye okuzwa eeri abakabona abakulu okukwata era adyake omu mabbuusu abo bonabona abakusinza.”
44009015	Neye oMusengwa nʼamukoba ati, “Iwe oyabe! Omusaiza oyo ninze onyere mmwerondeiremu okummanyikisya omu bantu aBatali Bayudaaya nʼabakabaka baabwe, era nʼomu Baisirairi.
44009016	Era, nze namulaga ngʼowekyalimwetaagisya okubita omu kugada okunene olwʼokulaabba ebikwata oku liina lyange.”
44009017	Nʼolwekyo, Ananiya nʼayaba egiri oSawulo, nʼaingira omu nyumba omuyabbaire. Ngʼamuteekaku engalo, Ananiya niiye okumukoba ati, “Woluganda oSawulo, oMusengwa oYesu, iye onyere oyo eyakubonekeire owewabbaire omu nzira ngʼoiza, antumire egyoli kaisi oyezye okwiramu okubona, era oizule nʼoMwoyo oMweru.”
44009018	Amangu ago, oku maiso ga Sawulo ni kuzwaku ebintu ebiri ooti bikalakamba bya nyanyi, ni gabbuunulukuka, nʼayezya okubona tete. Awo nʼasetuka, ni bamubatiza,
44009019	era oweyamalire okulyaku ekyokulya, omubirigwe ni gwiramu amaani. OSawulo nʼamala enaku egyeraku ngʼali nʼabeegi ba Yesu abʼomu Damaasiko.
44009020	Era tiyalwire, nʼatandiika okwabanga omu makumbaaniro, ngʼakobera abantu ati oYesu niiye oMwana wa Kibbumba.
44009021	Bonabona abamuwuliranga ni bawuninkirira, ni beebuulyangana bati, “Onu tiniiye oyo eyagadyanga era nʼagezyaku okujigirica abʼomu Yerusaalemi abasinza eriina lya Yesu eeryo? Era ekinanyere ekyo tiniikyo ekyamuleetere nʼaanu abakwate abatwale eeri abakabona abakulu?”
44009022	Neye era, oSawulo ni yeeyongera okubba nʼamaani omu kwegesyakwe, nʼengeri egiyakakatyanga amantalekamu muntu akakunkuna oteekeku nʼokuwa ebiraga biti oYesu niiye oKurisito. Atyo nʼawugulalyanga aBayudaaya ababbaire omu Damaasiko, ni bakayaku nʼekyokumwakanisyamu.
44009023	Eibbanga eryera oweryabire nga libitawo, aBayudaaya ni basala olukwe okwita oSawulo,
44009024	neye olukwe lwabwe oolwo oSawulo nʼalugwamu. Abantu abo ibo-so omusana nʼobwire, ni baabbanga oku miryango egingira omu kibuga egibamwekuumiire ngʼawulukamu bamwite.
44009025	Neye omu kimo oku biire, ni wabbaawo abaikirirya abateekere oSawulo omu kiibo, ni bamubitirya omu kimo oku biwundu ebiri oku kitempe ekyesitiriire ekibuga, ni bamwica e nza nʼemiguwa nʼasodoka nʼayaba.
44009026	OSawulo oweyatuukire omu Yerusaalemi, nʼagezyaku okwegaita oku baikirirya ba Yesu ababbaireyo, neye ibo olwʼokutakiikirirya bati dala yena atyanu mwikirirya wa Yesu, ni bamwesambanga-bwesambi nga bamutya.
44009027	Neye oBbalunaba nʼamubbeera, nʼamutwala nʼamwanjulayo eeri abatume. OBbalunaba nʼabakobera ngʼoSawulo oweyabbaire oku nzira ngʼali omu lugendo olwʼe Damaasiko nʼabona oMusengwa. Era ngʼoMusengwa oweyatumwire naye, era nʼabakobera ngʼoSawulo oweyalaabbanga mu liina lya Yesu ngʼali omu kibuga ekyo.
44009028	Nʼolwekyo, oSawulo nʼabbanga aamo nʼabaikirirya, era ni yeeyaayanga omu Yerusaalemi, era nʼayabanga nʼatumula nʼabantu omu liina lya Musengwa nʼobugumu.
44009029	Yatumulanga eeri aBayudaaya abatumula oLuyonaani, era nʼawanyisyagananga nabo ebiseego neye tete ibo ni baira bakitoolamu busungu, ekyazwiremu kugezyaku kunoonia ngeri yʼokumwita.
44009030	Aboluganda ekyo owebakitegeireku, ni bamuserengetya e Kaisaaliya, egibamuseebuliire okwaba e Taasasi.
44009031	Awo amakanisa agabbaire omu Buyudaaya mwonamwona nʼomu Galiraaya nʼomu Samaaliya ni gasuna eidembe era ni geekalangulira omu kwikirirya. Era, ngʼoMwoyo oMweru waabbeera abaikirirya nʼokubairyamu amaani, ni beeyongera obungi, nga webeebitya omu ngeri egiweesya oKibbumba ekitiisya.
44009032	Eedi nga biri bityo, eenu ngʼoPeetero waabitabita omu byalo byʼoku kitundu ekyo byonabyona okucaaliraku abatuukirirye. Era nʼayaba nʼacaaliraku nʼabʼomu kabuga kʼe Liida.
44009033	Eeyo nʼayajiryayo omusaiza eriinalye bati Aineya eyabbaire yasanyalaire era ngʼamalire oku kitaliri emyanka munaana.
44009034	OPeetero nʼamukoba ati, “Aineya, nʼawentumulira aanu oYesu Kurisito akulamya. Aale osetuke, olingeku omukeekagwo!” Amangu ago Aineya nʼasetuka ngʼalamire.
44009035	Kumpi abatyami bʼomu kabuga kʼe Liida nʼokutwalirya aamo abʼomu kitundu kyʼe Saroni bonabona bamweboneireku ngʼowaalamire, era bangi kwibo ni baikiririrya omu Musengwa.
44009036	Omu kibuga kyʼe Yoopa mwabbairemu omukali omwikirirya eriinalye bati Taabbiisa, omu Luyonaani bati Doloka. OTaabbiisa oyo yabbaire muntu akola ebikole ebisa bulijo era ngʼabbeera ino abadoobi.
44009037	Omu naku egyo, omukali oyo nʼalwala era nʼafa, omulambogwe ni bagunaabya, ni baguteeka omu kisenge ekyʼe ngulu.
44009038	Atyanu, akabuga Yoopa kabbaire kumpikumpi nʼakabuga kʼe Liida. Kale abaikirirya abʼomu Yoopa owebakiwuliireku bati oPeetero ali omu Liida, ni batumayo abasaiza babiri egiri oPeetero okumwekungirira bati, “Tukwegairiire, oizeku e waiswe era oyanguweku!”
44009039	OPeetero yena nʼasetula nʼayaba nabo. Owebatuukire, ni bamutwala buterembereri omu kisenge ekyʼe ngulu omulambo omu gwabbaire. Abanamwandu ababbairemu bonabona ni bamweruguulirirya nga bakuukulya, era nga webamulaga ebizwalo omugenzi oDoloka ebiyabbaire abatwingiire ngʼakaali mwomi.
44009040	Ekyazwiremu oPeetero nʼawulucaamu nabuli moiza, kaisi iye ngʼasigairemu yenkani nʼakoma amazwi ni yeegairira oKibbumba. Kaisi nʼacuukira omulambo, nʼagukoba ati, “Taabbiisa, osetuke oyemerere!” Omufu nʼalibulya amaiso. Oweyaboine oPeetero, nʼasetuka nʼatyama.
44009041	OPeetero nʼamukwata oku ngalo nʼamubbeera okusetuka okwemerera. Kaisi nʼayeta abanamwandu badi nʼabatuukirirye abandi okwingira, nʼamubakwatisya nga mwomi.
44009042	Amawuliro gʼekikole ekyo ni gasalaanikira omu Yoopa mwonamwona, era abantu bangi ni baikiririrya omu Musengwa.
44009043	Atyo oPeetero nʼatwala eibbanga eryeraku omu Yoopa, ngʼatyama wa musaiza ogubeeta oSimooni omuwaali wʼamadiba.
44010001	Omu kibuga kyʼe Kaisaaliya mwabbairemu omusaiza eriinalye bati Koloneeryo. Yabbaire niiye aduumira ekibinja kyʼabaisulukale 100 abʼamaje gʼaBalooma ekyo abakira ekibabbaire bamaite ngʼeKikoosi kyʼabʼe Itale.
44010002	Omusaiza oyo aamo nʼabʼomu kisitokye bonabona babbaire batya oKibbumba era ngʼeneebitya yaabwe emuweesya ino ekitiisya. Yagabiranga abo abadoobi nʼomwoyo gumo, era ngʼokusaba oKibbumba tagonerya.
44010003	Lumo oku saawa ooti mwenda egyʼeigolo, oKoloneeryo nasuna okwolesebwa. Era nʼabona kusani ngʼomalaika wa Musengwa oKibbumba aiza egyali, nʼamweta ati, “Koloneeryo!”
44010004	Awo oKoloneeryo, ensisi nʼemukwata, ni yeekalikica omalaika amaiso, nʼamubuulya ati, “Niki Musengwa?” Omalaika nʼamwiramu ati, “Okusabakwo nʼokugabakwo bikwaite oKibbumba oku mwoyo nʼabisiima, era atyanu akwiramu.
44010005	Aale atyanu otume abantu e Yoopa baabe beete omusaiza ogubeeta oSimooni, nʼerindi bati Peetero.
44010006	Acaire e wʼomusaiza yena ogubeeta bati Simooni, omuwaali wʼamadiba, aali nʼekisito ekiri oku mbale mbale kwʼenyanza.”
44010007	Omalaika wa Musengwa eyatumwire naye oweyamalire okuzwawo, oKoloneeryo nʼayeta babiri oku bagalamabe abʼomu nyumba nʼomwisulukale omoiza kwabo abakuumibe asinza oKibbumba.
44010008	Oweyamalire okubabitiramu byonabyona ebibbairewo, nʼabatuma e Yoopa.
44010009	Oku lunaku olwairireku, ngʼabebatumire bakaali bali mu nzira batira okutuuka e Yoopa, oku saawa ooti mukaaga egyʼomusana, iye oPeetero nʼaniina e ngulu oku kisooto oku nyumba okusaba oKibbumba.
44010010	Ngʼali eeyo, enzala nʼemuluma, ni yeegomba okubbaaku nʼekyokulya. Nga bakaali bakimutegekera, yaabire okweyaja ngʼaingiire mu kwolesebwa.
44010011	Era nʼabona eigulu nga libiikukire. Ekintu ekiri ooti gujoola ogugalami gwika oku kyalo ampi nʼegyali ooti-so amo waliwo abagukwaite ku buli nsonda gyagwo eina bagwica.
44010012	Omu gujoola ogwo mwabbairemu ebisolo ebya buli ngeri ebyʼebigere ebina, nʼebyekulukuusa. Era mwabbairemu nabuli kika kyʼenyonyi.
44010013	Ni wawulikikawo eigono nga limukoba liti, “Peetero, osetuke osale ku binu, olye!”
44010014	OPeetero nʼairamu ati, “Bbe Musengwa, timpezya okukola ekintu ngʼekyo. Nze tindyangaku kintu kyonakyona amateeka gʼekiyudaaya ekigatwala ngʼekyomuliko ooba ekitasaana okulya.”
44010015	Eigono nago tete ni limukoba liti, “Ekintu oKibbumba ekyatukwirye nʼakiikirirya ngʼekisa tokitwalanga ngʼekitali kitukulye.”
44010016	Okumukoba okukola ebyo kwabbairewo emirundi misatu, era amangu ago ogusuuka ogwo ni bagwiryayo omwigulu.
44010017	NgʼoPeetero akaali ali aawo yeebuulya niki ebyaboine omu kwolesebwa ekibitegeeza, abasaiza oKoloneeryo abeyatumire, ni batuuka. Okukubba amaiso bati, nga beemereire nakimo ku geeti yʼekisito kya Simooni omuwaali wʼamadiba. Kaisi babbaire babuuliriirye ni bavumbula ekisito nago egikiri.
44010018	Awo ni bakubba okoodi, ni babuulya ababbairewo bati, “Kinu niikyo ekisito oSimooni, erindi bati Peetero egyabba?”
44010019	Iye oPeetero ngʼakaali ali eenu aseega kwekyo ekyaboine, oMwoyo oMweru nʼamukoba ati, “Simooni, waliwo abasaiza basatu bakunoonia.
44010020	Nʼolwekyo osetukiremu oniinuke, era oyabe nabo amanteezizyazizya, olwakubba ninze mbatumire.”
44010021	Awo oPeetero nʼayaba egiri abasaiza nago, ni yeeyanjula egibali ati, “Ninze onu ogumunoonia. Mubbaire mukoba mutya?”
44010022	Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Tuzwereire wa Koloneeryo, aduumira ekibinja kyʼabaisulukale 100, omusaiza atuukiriire, era atya oKibbumba, era aBayudaaya bangi ogubawa ekitiisya. Omalaika omweru owa Kibbumba yamubonekeire, nʼamukoba akwete oyabe e wuwe awulireku ebyokoba.”
44010023	Kale oPeetero nʼabaaniriza omu nyumba ngʼabagenibe, era ni bagonawo. Eizo waaku, oPeetero nʼasetula okwaba nʼabakwenda ba Koloneeryo abo, era abamo oku boluganda ababbaire omu Yoopa ni bamwerekaku.
44010024	Olunaku olwairireku, ni batuuka e Kaisaaliya. OKoloneeryo yabbaire abasuubira, kale ngʼabakuumiriire. Era yabbaire ayetereku nʼabantube nʼabakaagwabe abʼomunda, bonabona nga bali aawo bakumbaine okuwulisisya obukwenda bwa Peetero.
44010025	OPeetero oweyatuukire, oKoloneeryo nʼairuka nʼaiza okumwaniriza, era nʼagwa oku mazwi abigere bya Peetero okumusinza.
44010026	Neye oPeetero nʼamusetula nga waamukoba ati, “Bbe, oleke bba, tiwakola ekyo, osetuke! Zena ogwobona ndi muntu-buntu nga iwe.”
44010027	Awo ni baaba nga balonsya nʼoKoloneeryo, oPeetero nʼaingira omu nyumba. Oweyatuukiremu, yaajiiryemu abantu bangi oKoloneeryo abaayetere nga bakumbaine.
44010028	Omu ntumulaye, oPeetero nʼatandiika nʼokubakoba ati, “Inywe nywena mukimaite nakusani ngʼowekiri kya muliko, omu mateeka gʼekiyudaaya, oMuyudaaya okukolagana nʼatali Muyudaaya ooba okumucaalira. Neye, oKibbumba andagire okutatwalanga muntu yenayena nti oKibbumba tamwikirirya, ooba nti tatukula.
44010029	Kagira owemwanjetere, tinezizyazizirye wazira njizire-kwiza. Aale atyanu munkobere ekyagirire ni munjeta.”
44010030	Awo oKoloneeryo nʼamwiramu ati, “Enaku ina atyanu egibitirewo, omu kiseera ooti kinanyere kinu esaawa mwenda egyʼomusana, nabbaire omu nyumba yange nga nsaba oKibbumba. Mbu nkubba amaiso nti, ni mbona omuntu azwaire ebizwalo ebimirikiinya ngʼanjemereireku omu maiso.
44010031	Omuntu oyo nʼankoba ati, ‘Koloneeryo, oKibbumba awuliire okusabakwo, era asiimire nʼokugabakwo.
44010032	Aale otumisye e Yoopa, bakwetere omusaiza ogubeeta oSimooni Peetero abba omu kisito kya Simooni omuwaali wʼamadiba, ekiri oku mbale mbale kwʼenyanza.’
44010033	Zena niiye okukutumisya, era nsiimire ino okwizakwo. Swenaswena aanu ngʼowotubona tukumbaine omu maiso ga Kibbumba kuwulisisya biibyo byonabyona oMusengwa oKibbumba ebyakulagiire okutukobera.”
44010034	Awo oPeetero nʼatandiika entumulaye ati, “Atyanu mazima ntegeereire nakimo ngʼoKibbumba owaatamomola.
44010035	Neye ayaniriza buli muntu owʼeigwanga lyonalyona amuwa ekitiisya, era akola ebyasiima.
44010036	Mumaite obukwenda oKibbumba obuyasindikire eeri aBaisirairi ngʼabakobera aMawuliro aMasa agaleetera abantu eidembe akati waabwe naye, okubitira omu kwikirirya oYesu Kurisito, oMusengwa wa bantu bonabona.
44010037	Mumaite ebikole ebikulu ebyaizire bibbaawo okubita omu Buyudaaya mwonamwona, nga bisetukira e Galiraaya kasookeede oYokaana alaabba eeri abantu ebikwata oku kubatiza.
44010038	Ekikoba kiti, mumaite ebifa oku Yesu owʼe Naazaleesi. Mumaite ngʼoKibbumba oweyamulondere, nʼamuwa oMwoyowe oMweru era nʼamaani okukola ebyewunyo. Era, mumaite ngʼoYesu oyo oweyabitabitanga wonawona nga waakolera abantu ebisa neenu waalamya nʼabo bonabona ababbaire ansi wʼeifuge lya Sitaani. Ebyo byonabyona yabikolanga olwʼokubba oKibbumba yaabbanga naye.
44010039	“Iswe abatume tuli bajulizi ba buli kimo ekiyakolere omu kyalo kyʼaBayudaaya era nʼomu kibuga e Yerusaalemi. Bamwitire nga bamukomerera oku musalabba,
44010040	neye oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ibiri, oku lwokusatu oKibbumba nʼamuzuukiza, atyo nʼamuzweraku okubonekaku tete.
44010041	Aate nʼomu kubonekaku tiyabonekeire Bayudaaya bonabona. Yabonekeireku bajulizi oKibbumba abeyabbaire amalire okulondamu nga bukaali. Ekikoba kiti, niiswe ababbaireku oku kiinulo ekimo naye ngʼazuukiire.
44010042	OYesu oyo yatulagiire okulaabba obukwenda obwo eeri abantu nga tujulira tuti iye niiye oKibbumba oguyalondere okubba omulamuzi wʼabantu abalibba bakaali boomi nʼabalibba bafiire.
44010043	EBiwandiike byʼabanaabbi bonabona bimutumulaku biti, ‘Buli moiza amwikiririryamu asuna okumusoniya ebibbibibbibye olwʼobwezye bwʼeriinalye.’ ”
44010044	OPeetero ngʼakaali atumula ebibono ebyo, oMwoyo oMweru nʼaika ku bonabona ababbaire bawulisisya obukwendabwe.
44010045	Ekyo ni kyewunyisya ino aBayudaaya abaikirirya, nʼabo ababbaire baizire nʼoPeetero okuzwa e Yoopa, okubona ngʼoKibbumba awaire ekirabo ekyʼoMwoyo oMweru nʼaBatali Bayudaaya bona.
44010046	Ekyo kityo olwakubba babawuliire nga batumula omu ntumu egindi era nga bawuuja oKibbumba. Awo oPeetero nʼakoba ati,
