51003003	Ekyo kityo olwakubba inywe mwafiire, era obwomi bwanywe obwʼomu mwoyo babubisire egiri oKurisito omu Kibbumba.
51003004	Era oKurisito oyo nago, iye abawa okubba aboomi omu mwoyo, oweyaliboneka, nywena mwalibonekera aamo naye nga muli nʼekitiisya.
51003005	Kale mulekewo ebikole ebyʼokwegomba okubbikubbi okwʼomubiri, nga niimwo omuli: Obulendi, nʼokwegaita omu ngeri etali eyʼobutonde, nʼobukaba, nʼokwegomba okwʼensoni, nʼokuyayaanira ebintu ebyʼe kyalo, okwo nga niikwo okusinza ebifaananyi.
51003006	OKibbumba asunguwalira era ayaba okubonereza nʼobulwa abantu abakola ebyo.
51003007	Era nywena ebinanyere ebyo niibyo ebimwakolanga eira omu bwomi bwanywe nga mukaali kwikirirya oKurisito.
51003008	Neye atyanu binu byonabyona mubireke: Obusungu, nʼenkwe, nʼococo, nʼokusibirirya oku bantu, era nʼokwemula, ibyo tibyazwanga omu munwa gwanywe.
51003009	Timwabbeyangananga, olwakubba mweyambwirye obwomi obukaire nʼebikole byabwo ebibbibibbi.
51003010	Era mwazwaire obwomi obuyaaka, obwo oKibbumba obwayaba ngʼayongera okwirya obuyaaka omu kifaananyikye, kaisi oolwo mumutegeere omu bwizulye.
51003011	Omu bwomi bunu obuyaaka tikikulu kwabulamu tuti onu Muyonaani nʼoodi Muyudaaya, ooba onu mukomole nʼoodi timukomole, onu jwalo, oodi mupuuye, onu mugalama oodi wʼeidembe. Wazira oKurisito nga niiye ekintu ekikulu, era nga niiye ali mwabo bonabona abamwikiririryamu.
51003012	Muli bantu oKibbumba abeyalondere okubba ababe, nʼabawa okubba abeeru era abaataka eino. Nʼolwekyo mubbenge bantu abaizwire okusaasira, nʼekisa, nʼobuwombeeki, nʼeiwooyo, era nʼokuguminkiriza.
51003013	Muguminkirizaganenge era ni musoniyangana nabuli owewabbaawo alumirye omwinaye. Muteekwa okusoniyangana omu ngeri enanyere eyo ngʼoMusengwa waiswe oweyabasoniyire inywe.
51003014	Era nʼokukira kwebyo byonabyona, mwongereryeku okutaka. Okutaka okwo niikwo okukalangulira aamo abaikirirya omu Kurisito omu bumo obwizulye.
51003015	Eidembe oKurisito eryagaba, liizulenge omu myoyo gyanywe olwakubba oKibbumba yabeeteire kubba mwidembe nga muli aamo ngʼebitundu ebyʼomubiri ogumo. Era emyoyo gyanywe giizulenge okusiima oKibbumba.
51003016	Ekibono kya Kurisito, omu busuni bwakyo bwonabwona, kityamire nakimo omunda mwinywe era kirungamyenge ebintu byonabyona ebimutumula nʼebimukola. Era mwegesyanganenge ni mulabulangana omu malabuki gonagona. Nga mwizwire okwebalya omu myoyo gyanywe, mwemberenge oKibbumba eZabbuli, nʼenyembo egyʼebika ebitali bimo oMwoyo egyabawa okuyiiya.
51003017	Nabuli kintu ekimutumula ooba ekimukola, mukikolenge omu liina lya Musengwa waiswe oYesu, era nga mu mubitamu okwebalya oKibbumba oItewaiswe.
51003018	Inywe abakali mugonderenge abaibaanywe, ngʼabaikirirya oMusengwa waiswe owebasaaniire okukola.
51003019	Kaisi inywe abasaiza mutakenge abakali baanywe, era timwabakaawuukiranga.
51003020	Inywe abaana muwulirenge ababyaire baanywe omu bintu byonabyona, olwakubba ekyo kisangaalya oMusengwa.
51003021	Abaiteeye bʼabaana, timulumiriryanga abaana baanywe nga mubazuma buli owebabbenga demba ni bawaamu amaani okukola ebintu ebisa.
51003022	Abagalama, muwulirenge abasengwa baanywe abʼoku kyalo kunu omu bintu byonabyona, timu kiseera ekibabba nga bababona kaisi babasiime kyonkani, neye mubaweereryenge nʼomwoyo ogunambulamu bubbeyi, nga mukola mutyo olwʼokuweesya oMusengwa waiswe ekitiisya.
51003023	Nabuli ekimukola, mukikolenge nʼomwoyo gwanywe gwonagwona, ngʼabakolera oMusengwa waiswe, neye tinga abakolera abantu.
51003024	Mumanye muti oMusengwa waiswe yalibawa omugabo ogwʼebintu ebiyasuubizire ngʼempeera yaanywe, olwakubba oKurisito niiye oMusengwa waanywe ogumuweererya.
51003025	Era nabuli akola ekibbikibbi, balimubonereza olwʼekibbikibbi ekyo ekiyakolere, olwakubba timwalibbaamu kwekubbira.
51004001	Abasengwa bʼabagalama, mubityenge nakusani abagalama baanywe, era nga timwekubbira, nga mumaite muti nywena muli nʼoyo abaliku obwezye, oMusengwa aali omwigulu.
51004002	Munyikirenge okusaba, nga timwiririra era nga timwerabira okwebalya oKibbumba olwʼebyabakoleire.
51004003	Era swena mutusabirenge, oKibbumba atutemere amanzira, kaisi twezye okukobera abantu ekibonokye, era tubamanyikisye ekyama ekikwata oku Kurisito. Kaisi ngʼokukola ekyo niikyo ekyansibisirye omu mabbuusu.
51004004	Munsabire oKibbumba anjezyesye okukobera abantu ekyama ekyo omu ngeri etegeerekeka okusani eino ngʼowensaaniire okukola.
51004005	Abo abakaali okusuna okwikirirya, mukolaganenge nabo nʼamalabuki, nga mukolesya nabuli nkabi egimusuna okubabbeera okumanya oKurisito.
51004006	Bulijo mutumulenge omu ngeri ewooma era esangaalya, kaisi mwezye okumanyanga engeri egikisaaniire okwiramu nabuli moiza ali nʼekyabuulya oku kwikirirya kwanywe.
51004007	OTukiko owoluganda ogututaka eino, omuweererya wa Kurisito omwesigwa, era omukoli omunaiswe omu mulimo ogwa Musengwa waiswe, aiza kubakobera ebyantuukireku.
51004008	Niikyo ekigirire ni mmutuma egimuli, kaisi mumanye byonabyona ebitufaaku, era agumye emyoyo gyanywe omu kwikirirya oMusengwa.
51004009	Era aamo naye, ntumire Onesimo owoluganda omwesigwa era omutake eino era omuntu owʼe waanywe eeyo. Baiza kubakobera byonabyona ebifa eenu.
51004010	Esitaluuko omusibe omunange, nʼoMaako omwiwa wa Bbalunaba babasugiirye. Nabawandikiireku ebifa oku Maako, kale oweyaliiza egimuli mumusangaliranga.
51004011	NʼoYesu ogubeeta oYusito, abasugiirye. Abo niibo bonkani aBayudaaya abakola aamo na nze omulimo ogwʼokulaabba aMawuliro aMasa agʼobwakabaka bwa Kibbumba, era bambeera ino.
51004012	Epafula yena owʼe waanywe eeyo, omuweererya wa Kurisito Yesu, abasugiirye. Era bulijo abasabira ino ati mubbe omu bwomi obutuukiriire, nʼabategereire nakimo oKibbumba ebyataka.
51004013	Ntaka okubakakasa nti Epafula, abakoleire ino inywe aamo nʼabaikirirya omu Kurisito abʼomu kibuga ekyʼe Lawodikiya, era nʼabʼomu kibuga ekyʼe Yerapooli.
51004014	OLuuka omusawo era owoluganda ogututaka eino, nʼowoluganda oDeema babasugiirye.
51004015	Mutusugirirye aboluganda abʼomu Lawodikiya. Era Musugirye omwonyoko waiswe oNinfa, nʼekanisa ekumbaanira omu kisitokye.
51004016	Nga bamalire oku basomeremu ebbaluwa eenu, muli nʼokubona muti bagitwala okugisomera ekanisa eyʼe Lawodikiya. Era nywena muli nʼokubona muti babasomera ebbaluwa eginawandikiire abʼe Lawodikiya.
51004017	Era mukobe Alikipo muti, “Weefudeku okutuukirirya obuweererya oMusengwa waiswe oKurisito obuyakukwatisirye.”
51004018	Nze oPawulo, ninze mpandiikire nʼengalo yange obusugirye bunu. Timwerabira muti ndi mu mabbuusu, kale munsabirenge. OKibbumba abakwatirenge ekisa.
52001001	Nze oPawulo nʼoSiruvaano nʼoTemuseewo, tuwandiikira abʼekanisa eri omu kibuga ekyʼe Sesalonika, era abantu ba Kibbumba oItewaiswe nʼoMusengwa oYesu Kurisito. Tubasugiirye nga tubatakirya ekisa nʼeidembe ebizwa egiri oKibbumba, byeyongere okubba na inywe.
52001002	Bulijo twebalya oKibbumba okulwanywe nywenanywena, era titugonerya okubasabira eeri oKibbumba.
52001003	Era nga tuli omu maiso ga Kibbumba era oItewaiswe, tumukobera ngʼowemulaga okwikirirya kwanywe omu Yesu nʼokutaka kwanywe eeri oKibbumba, mwebyo ebimukola. Era tumukobera ngʼowemulaga eisuubi lyanywe eritatiika omu kwira kwa Musengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito.
52001004	Aboluganda omu Kurisito, tumaite ngʼoKibbumba abataka, era yabalonderemu mubbe babe,
52001005	olwakubba owetwabakobeire aMawuliro aMasa, tigabbaire mu bibono-bubono, wazira gabbairemu amaani ga Mwoyo oMweru, iye ngʼabawa okukakasira nakimo muti ebitukoba byʼamazima. Mumaite kusani ino ngʼowetwebityanga nga tuli mwinywe. Twebityanga kusani lwa kutaka kugasa niinywe, titwabakaisya obwomi bwa kwikirirya oYesu.
52001006	Nywena mwasengereirye empisa gyaiswe nʼegya Musengwa waiswe, olwakubba newankubbaire nga babagadirye olwʼekibono kya Kibbumba, neye mwaikiriirye aMawuliro ga Musengwa nʼeisangaalo erizwa omu Mwoyo oMweru.
52001007	Mutyo ni mubba kyokuboneraku eeri abaikirirya bonabona abʼomu kyalo kyanywe, omu kitundu kya Makedooniya nʼomwAkaya.
52001008	Ekyo kityo olwakubba mwasalaanirye ekibono kya Kibbumba, timu Makedooniya nʼomwAkaya mwonkani, neye nʼomu bitundu bingi ino bategeire ngʼowemwikirirya oMusengwa oKibbumba. Kale iswe tikitwetaagisya kubbaaku nʼekitutumula.
52001009	Abantu abanyere balonsya ngʼowemwasiimire ino nga twizire e waanywe, ni muzwa oku bifaananyi, ni mwira eeri oKibbumba omutuuce era onyere obwomi mumuweereryenge.
52001010	Era balonsya ngʼowemukuumiriire oMwanawe okwira ngʼazwa omwigulu, oguyazuukizire, nga niiye oYesu atulamya obusungu bwa Kibbumba obwaba okwiza.
52002001	Aboluganda, inywe abananyere mumaite muti okwiza kwaiswe egimuli, tikwabbaire kwabwereere.
52002002	Mumaite ngʼowebatudambirye, era ni batuduula e Firipi, nga tukaali kwiza egimuli e Sesalonika. Neye oKibbumba waiswe yatugumirye, ni twezya okubakobera nywena aMawuliro aMasa agazwa egyali, newankubbaire nga bangi bagezyangaku okutukaisya.
52002003	Ebitubalaabbira tibya bubbeyi ooba ebyokwegaita omu ngeri etali yʼobutonde, waire ebya kwekolesya.
52002004	Neye ngʼoKibbumba oweyatwesigire nʼatukwatisya aMawuliro aMasa, swena tutyo wetugalaabba, nga titutaka tuti abantu batusiime, wazira tuti oKibbumba, akebera emyoyo gyaiswe, niiye abbe atusiime.
52002005	Mwewukirya kusani ino muti, titukolesyangaku bibono bya kubawaanawaana, era titwabbaire ooti bantu abatumula ebibono ebisa oku ngulu neye ngʼomunda bibwikire ku buluvu. Mwebyo oKibbumba niiye omujulizi waiswe.
52002006	Aate titwegombangaku kusuna kitiisya, tuti inywe ooba abandi bakituwe, newankubbaire nga twankwezyerye okukibasaba, ngʼowetuli abatume ba Kurisito.
52002007	Neye twegenderezere nga tuli mwinywe, ngʼomukali omubyaire owaalabirira abaanabe.
52002008	Twabatakire ino, era ni tusiima, tikugabana na inywe aMawuliro aMasa agazwa egiri oKibbumba gonkani, neye naabba okufa okulwanywe, olwakubba mwasuukire bʼebbeeyi ino egituli.
52002009	Aboluganda mwewukirye ngʼowetwalwanikaine era ni tuwutuka, nga tukola omusana nʼobwire, kaisi twewale okudambya omuntu yenayena kwinywe nga tulaabba eeri inywe aMawuliro aMasa aga Kibbumba.
52002010	Inywe mwezya okutujulira, era nʼoKibbumba atujulira ati empisa gyaiswe nga tuli mwinywe gyabbaire gya bwa Kibbumba egituukiriire, era eginambulaku kyokunenya.
52002011	Mumaite muti twabityanga buli moiza kwinywe ngʼoiteeye wʼabaana owaabitya abaanabe.
52002012	Twababuuliriranga, ni tubagumyanga, era twabakubirizanga mubbe omu bwomi oKibbumba obwasiima, oyo eyabeetere okubba omu bwakabakabwe nʼomu kitiisyakye.
52002013	Era kyetuzwa twebalya oKibbumba bulijo, olwakubba owemwawuliire ekibonokye, ekitwabalaabbiire, mwaikiriirye, tinga ekyʼabantu, wazira mwakiikiriirye muti dala kya Kibbumba. Era ekibonokye, niikyo ekikolera mwinywe abaikirirya.
52002014	Aboluganda, mufaanana nʼabʼekanisa gya Kibbumba abali omu Kurisito oYesu abʼomu kintundu kyʼe Buyudaaya. Ekyo kityo olwakubba, abantu baanywe abʼomu kyalo kyanywe ekinanyerenyeere babagadirye nga badi aBayudaaya abanaabwe owebabagadirye.
52002015	Aate abamo oku Bayudaaya abo baitire oMusengwa waiswe oYesu era nʼabanaabbi, tete swena ni batubbingirira. Abo oKibbumba tabasiima, era balabe bʼabantu bonabona.
52002016	Bagezeryeku nʼokutukaisya okukobera aBatali Bayudaaya ebikwata oku kulokoka, ekyo ni kyongererya oku bibbibibbi byabwe ebibaizire nga bakola okuzwa eira. Oku nkomerero oKibbumba nʼabasunguwalira ino.
52002017	Aboluganda, owetwawukaine akaseera akatono oku maiso, neye nga timu mwoyo, tweyongeire ino okwegomba okubabonaku,
52002018	ni tutaka okwiza egimuli. Nze oPawulo, nagezeryeku omulundi ogusooka nʼogwokubiri, neye oSitaani nʼatatuganya.
52002019	Kale oMusengwa waiswe oYesu oweyaliiza, aale tiniinywe omwalibba eisuubi lya iswe nʼeisangaalo lya iswe omu maisoge? Tiniinywe abetwalisinziriraku okwewuuja olwʼobuwanguli?
52002020	Inywe muli kitiisya kyaiswe, era niinywe eisangaalo lya iswe.
52003001	Neye owetwatuucirye ekiseera, ngʼemyoyo gitweyanikire titumaite ebibafaaku, nga titukaali twezya kuguma, ni tusalawo tuti abamo tosooke tusigale omu kibuga Asene.
52003002	Kale ni tutuma owoluganda omu Kurisito oTemuseewo, ogutukola naye omulimo gwa Kibbumba ogwʼokusalaania aMawuliro aMasa aga Kurisito. Twamutumire abagumye emyoyo, era abongeremu amaani omu kwikirirya kwanywe,
52003003	kaisi tiwaabbaawo omuntu yenayena kwinywe abbaamu okulebera olwʼokubagadya okwemubitamu.
52003004	Owetwabbaire tukaali tuli na inywe twabakoberanga tuti abaikirirya tuli nʼokubita omukutuyigaania, era mumaite ngʼekyo kyatuukiriire.
52003005	Kale olwʼensonga eyo, owenaboine nga tinkaali njezya okuguma omwoyo oku bibafaaku, niiye okubatumira oTemuseewo. Namutumire, kaisi njezye okumanya okwikirirya kwanywe omu Kurisito owekuli, nga ntya nti demba omukemi oSitaani nabba nga yabakemere ni muzwa omu kwikirirya, era okukalabana kwaiswe ni kubba nga kwabbaire kwa bwereere.
52003006	Atyanu oTemuseewo ngonu yankaira egituli ngʼazwa egimuli. Atuleeteire obukwenda, obufa oku kwikirirya kwanywe omu Kurisito nʼokutaka kwanywe egituli. Era nʼatukobera ati bulijo mutwewukirya kusani ino, era ati mwegomba ino okutubonaku, nga swena obwetwegomba okubabonaku.
52003007	Kale aboluganda, newankubbaire nga tuli omu bigosi bingi, nʼomu kutuyigaania, neye okwikirirya kwanywe kutwiriryemu ino amaani.
52003008	Ekyo kityo olwakubba owemubba abagumu omu Musengwa waiswe, tuwulira kusani ino ngʼemyoyo gyaiswe giikire.
52003009	Kale oKibbumba twamuwa niki okumwebalya olwʼeisangaalo erituli nalyo omu maisoge okulwanywe?
52003010	Omusana nʼobwire twegairira ino oKibbumba, twezye okubonanganaku na inywe maiso ku maiso, era kaisi tutuukirirye ekikaali kibulwaku oku kwikirirya kwanywe.
52003011	OKibbumba onyere era oItewaiswe, nʼoMusengwa waiswe oYesu, batwezyesye okwiza egimuli.
52003012	OMusengwa abongeremu okutakangana nʼokutakanga abantu bonabona, nga iswe owetubataka inywe.
52003013	Akalangule emyoyo gyanywe, oMusengwa waiswe oYesu oweyaliiza aamo nʼabantube abeeru, kaisi oolwo abaajirye nga mubulaku ekyokubanenya, nga mutuukiriire omu maiso ga Kibbumba era oItewaiswe.
52004001	Oku bisigaireyo, aboluganda nkoba nti, tusiima ino okuwulira tuti, dala mukola ngʼowetwabeegeserye engeri ya kubba omu bwomi oKibbumba obwasiima. Kale atyanu tubasaba nga tubeegairira omu liina lya Musengwa waiswe oYesu, tuti mweyongere ino okukola mutyo.
52004002	Ekyo kityo olwakubba mumaite ebiragiro ebitwabawaire, ebizwa e wa Musengwa waiswe oYesu, ngʼowebiri.
52004003	OKibbumba ekyabatakirya, niikwo okubba abatuukiriire, nga mwewala obulendi.
52004004	Nʼolwekyo, buli moiza mwinywe ali nʼokumanya engeri ya kukuumamu omubirigwe omu ngeri etuukiriire, era nga yʼekitiisya.
52004005	Ekyo nga timukikolera mu kibinyibinyi, nʼokwegomba kwa mubiri ngʼabakaafiiri ibo abatamaite oKibbumba.
52004006	Era omu nsonga eyo tiwaabbangawo akola ekirumya omwinaye, ooba okumutoolaku ekikye, olwakubba oMusengwa iye niiye akola okunyaaŋa omu bintu ebityo byonabyona. Ebintu ebyo byonabyona twabibalabwireku era twabibakobeire ira.
52004007	OKibbumba tiyatweteire kwegaitanga mu ngeri etali yʼobutonde, wazira yatwetere kubba beeru.
52004008	Nʼolwekyo yenayena agaana ebitwegesya, abba tagaine bibono bya muntu, neye abba againe bibono bya Kibbumba, abawa oMwoyowe oMweru.
52004009	Neye ebikwata oku kutakangana kwa boluganda, tineetaaga kubibawandiikira byona, olwakubba inywe abanyere oKibbumba yabeegeserye okutakangana.
52004010	Era mutyo wemukola omu boluganda bonabona abali omu Makedooniya mwonamwona. Kale aboluganda, tubeegairira mweyongere-bweyongeri okukola mutyo.
52004011	Mwefengeku okubba omwidembe nʼabantu, buli muntu ngʼaafa kubibye, nga mukola nʼengalo gyanywe ngʼowetwabakobere.
52004012	Olwo kaisi abataikirirya babawenge ekitiisya, era mubbenge abeemala omu byetaago byanywe.
52004013	Aboluganda, tutaka mumanye ebikwata kwabo abafiire, kaisi muleke okweraliikirira ngʼabantu abandi ababula eisuubi owebakola.
52004014	Iswe twikirirya tuti oYesu yafiire nʼazuukira, era kityo wekyalibba nʼokwabo abafiire nga baikiririrya omu Yesu. Era oKibbumba yalibairirya aamo nʼoYesu.
52004015	Tubakobera ekyo oMusengwa waiswe ekiyakobere ati iye oMusengwa waiswe oweyaliiza, iswe aboomi titwalisookayo abo abafiire.
52004016	OMusengwa waiswe onyere yaliika okuzwa omwigulu, nʼokuduumira okwʼamaani eino, eigono lya malaika omukulu nga liwulikikana, era nʼekondeere ya Kibbumba ngʼevuga. Abo abafiire nga baikiririrya omu Kurisito, niibo abalisooka okuzuukira.
52004017	Awo swena abalibba bakaali boomi, ni twiririraku ni batutwalira aamo nabo omu bireri, okusangaana oMusengwa waiswe omwibbanga. Olwo kaisi ni tubbanga nʼoMusengwa waiswe emirembe nʼemirembe.
52004018	Aale buli moiza airyengemu omwinaye amaani nʼebibono ebyo.
52005001	Aboluganda, titwetaaga okubawandiikira oku bifa oku mwanka nʼebiseera bya kwira kwa Musengwa waiswe.
52005002	Inywe abanyere mukimaite kusani muti olunaku lwa kwira kwa Musengwa lwaliiza mantamanyaku ngʼomwibbi owaiza obwire.
52005003	Abantu owebalibba nga bakoba bati, “Tuli mwidembe nʼobukuumi bubitiriri era mpaawo kabbikabbi,” awo kaisi okugada niiwo owekwalibaizira, ngʼentuuko gyʼokubyala owegiizira omukali aali ekida. Tibalibunuka okujigirika kadi katyayi kati.
52005004	Neye inywe, baganda bange, timuli mu bwomi bwʼendikiirya yʼekibbikibbi, kaisi olunaku oolwo lubagwerenkerere-obugwerenkereri ngʼomwibbi.
52005005	Ekyo kityo olwakubba nywenanywena muli bantu bʼomu kitangaala kyʼobwomi obukengeize era obwʼebikole ebisa, era muli ba musana. Tituli ba bwire obwʼokutaikirirya, naabba abʼomu ndikiirya eiza olwʼekibbikibbi.
52005006	Kale tuleke okubba omu bwomi bwa kugona, nga titufaayo oku bintu oKibbumba ebyataka, ngʼabantu abataikirirya oYesu owebakola. Neye tubbe nga tubonia omu kwetegekera okwira kwa Musengwa, era nga tuli bantu abeegendereza.
52005007	Abagona, bagona bwire, nʼabateemeera ni beebitya obundi, bateemeera bwire.
52005008	Neye iswe ngʼowetuli abamusana, tubbe bantu abeegendereza. Okwikirirya nʼokutakangana bitukuumenge ooti kizwalo kya mwisulukale ekyʼekyoma ekikuuma ekifubba. Era nʼosuubi wʼokulokoka atukuumenge ooti nkofiira yʼekyoma oku mutwe.
52005009	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oKibbumba tiyatutegekeire kutubonereza omu busungubwe, wazira yatutegekeire kulokoka nga tubita omu Musengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito.
52005010	Iye yatufeereire, kaisi awo nga tukaali tuli omu bwomi, waire nga tumalire okufa, twezye okubba boomi aamo naye.
52005011	Kale mwiryanganengemu amaani, era mubbeeranganenge, era ngʼowemubbaire mukola.
52005012	Aboluganda, tubeegairira muwenge ekitiisya abo abakola eino omu kuweererya egimuli, era oMusengwa oKibbumba abeyalondere okubeekubbembera nʼokubeegesyanga.
52005013	Mubawenge ino ekitiisya, era mubatakenge olwʼomulimo gwabwe. Mubbenge nʼeidembe omu bantu buli moiza nʼomwinaye.
52005014	Aboluganda, tubegairiire mulabulenge abagayaali, mwiryengemu amaani abalebera, mubberenge abanafu, muguminkirizenge bonabona.
52005015	Mubone muti mwinywe tiwaabbaawo anyaaŋa, wazira bulijo mwegumyenge kukola bintu ebisa mwinywe, nʼomu bantu bonabona.
52005016	Mubbenge basangaali bulijo.
52005017	Musabenge oKibbumba buli kiseera.
52005018	Mu buli mbeera mumwebalyenge, olwakubba ekyo inywe ngʼabantu ba Kurisito Yesu, oKibbumba kyataka mukolenge.
52005019	Timwamalangamu amaani okukola kwa Mwoyo oMweru.
52005020	Timwatalanga obunaabbi.
52005021	Mwekalisisyenge buli kintu, mugumirenge oku kisa,
52005022	mwewalenge buli kibbikibbi.
52005023	OKibbumba onyere atuwa eidembe, abatukulye. Era emyoyo gyanywe, obwomi bwanywe nʼemibiri gyanywe, mubikuumenge nga biteereri kusani ino, oMusengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito oweyaliizira, mubbe nga mubulaku ekyokubanenya.
52005024	Eyabeetere mwesigwa, era ekyo yalikituukirirya.
52005025	Boluganda, mutusabirenge.
52005026	Mutusugirirye aboluganda bonabona omu nsugirya eya batuukirirye.
52005027	Mbalagira nti, omu liina Iya Musengwa waiswe, ebbaluwa eenu mugisomere aboluganda bonabona.
52005028	OMusengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito abakwatirenge inywe ekisa.
53001001	Nze oPawulo, nʼoSiruvaano nʼoTemuseewo, tuwandiikira abʼekanisa eyʼomu Sesalonika, abantu ba Kibbumba oItewaiswe nʼoMusengwa oYesu Kurisito.
53001002	Tubasugiirye ino nga tubatakirya ekisa nʼeidembe ebizwa eeri oKibbumba oItewaiswe nʼoMusengwa oYesu Kurisito bibbe na inywe.
53001003	Aboluganda, twebalya oKibbumba bulijo okulwanywe. Ekyo tusaaniire okukikola olwakubba okwikirirya kwanywe omu Yesu kweyongeire ino okukakata, era nʼokutaka buli moiza okwatakamu abainaye kweyongera.
53001004	Nʼolwekyo twewuuja okulwanywe omu kanisa gya Kibbumba egindi. Twewuuja olwa kuguma nʼolwa kwikirirya oMusengwa oYesu okumuli nakwo nga mubita omu kubayigaania, nʼokudamba okwa buli ngeri.
53001005	Okugumira okubagadya ni musigala nga mwikirirya oMusengwa oYesu kiragisya kiti oKibbumba tiyeekubbira omu kusalawokwe, olwakubba oku nkomerero kyalibabbeera okubba nga musaanira obwakabaka bwa Kibbumba obwebabagadirya.
53001006	Era oKibbumba omu bwenkanyabwe, yalibonereza abo ababagadya,
53001007	kaisi inywe abebagadya nʼabawa ekiwuumulo aamo na iswe. Ebyo byalibbaawo oMusengwa waiswe oYesu oweyalibonekera ngʼazwa omwigulu, ngʼali nʼabamalaikabe abʼamaani.
53001008	Omusyo ogulunkuuma gwalibbaayo era nʼabonereza abo abatamaite oKibbumba, nʼabo abagaana okwikirirya aMawuliro aMasa aga Musengwa waiswe oYesu.
53001009	Balibawa ekibonerezo ekyʼokudamba okwʼemirembe nʼemirembe, ni bababbinga nʼomu maiso ga Musengwa owʼekitiisya eino.
53001010	Ebyo byalibbaawo ku lunaku oluyaliiziraku okumuwa ekitiisya omu batuukiriryebe. Era bonabona abaikirirya balimubona nga bawuninkiriire olwʼekitiisyakye. Nywena mwalibba aamo nabo, olwakubba mwaikiriirye ebyo ebitwabakobeire.
53001011	Nʼolwekyo tubasabira nga titugonerya eeri oKibbumba waiswe, ababale ngʼabasaaniire ekyo ekiyabeeteire ekyʼokubba omu bwakabakabwe. Era tusaba tuti, omu bwezyebwe, atuukiriryenge ebintu ebisa byonabyona ebimumaliriire okukola, nʼebyo ebimukola olwa kwikirirya kwanywe.
53001012	Kaisi oolwo oMusengwa waiswe oYesu asune ekitiisya mwinywe, na inywe oKibbumba abawe ekitiisya mwiye. Ekyo kyalibba kityo olwʼekisa kya Kibbumba waiswe, nʼoMusengwa oYesu Kurisito.
53002001	Atyanu aboluganda, binu niibyo ebikwata oku kwira kwa Musengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito, era ngʼowetwalikumbaanira egyali.
53002002	Tubakoba muleke okusagaasagananga mangu omu biseego byanywe, waire okweraliikirira, nga babakobeire bati olunaku lwa kwira kwa Musengwa lwamalire ira okutuuka. Timwabbanga mutyo waire babakobanga bati obunaabbi bukoba butyo, ooba bati kiri mu lugambo, waire bati kiri mu bbaluwa iswe egitwawandiikire.
53002003	Timwikiriryanga omuntu yenayena okubagotesya olwakubba, olunaku oolwo nga lukaali kubbaawo, walisooka kubbaawo kujeema okunene, ngʼabantu bagaana oKibbumba, awo kaisi omuntu oodi, aizwire ebibbibibbi era ali nʼokwaba omu kujigirika, nʼamala nʼabbutuka.
53002004	Omuntu oyo yalyakanisya oKibbumba era ni yeebbimbyabbimbya ati akira oKibbumba, ooba ekintu kyonakyona ekibasinza. Era yalingirira nakimo nʼatyama omu Yeekaalu ya Kibbumba, nga iye onyere yeeyeta Kibbumba.
53002005	Timwewukirya nga nabakoberanga ebintu ebyo owenabbaire nga nkaali ndi na inywe?
53002006	Era mumaite nga waliwo ekikaali ekikaisya omuntu oyo okuboneka, paka ekiseera ekituuce owekyalituuka kaisi nʼaboneka.
53002007	Ekyo kityo olwakubba omujeemu oyo akaali yeebisire neye ngʼokujeemera oKibbumba ikwo kuliwo nʼatyanu, okutoolaku nti abakukola, bakukolera mu mbiso. Neye ekyo ekikaisya omujeemu oyo okubba omu lwatu kyalituuca ekiseera ni bakitoolawo.
53002008	Olwo kaisi omujeemu oyo nʼabonekera nakimo. Neye okunkomerero oMusengwa waiswe oYesu yalimumalawo nʼokulagira-bulagiri, era yalimulikirya nʼokumirikiinya kwʼekitiisyakye ekiyaliiziramu.
53002009	Omuntu oweibbengo oyo oSitaani ogwaleeta, yaliiza nʼakola nʼamaani mangi ebyamagero, era nʼobumanyiciryo nʼebyewunyo ebyobubbeyi.
53002010	Era omuntu oyo oweibbengo, yalikolesya buli kibbikibbi ekyezya okugotesya abo abeyalitwala omu kujigirika, olwakubba bagaine okutwala amazima agandibalokoire.
53002011	OKibbumba kyazwa abaleka babagotesyegotesye, baikirirye ebyobubbeyi,
53002012	kaisi abo bonabona abataikirirya mazima, oolwo omusango gubasinge, olwakubba basangaaliire omu kukola ekibbikibbi.
53002013	Aboluganda, oMusengwa waiswe abaataka eino, era tusaaniire okwebalya oKibbumba bulijo okulwanywe. Ekyo kityo olwakubba oKibbumba yabalondere mubbe bantu abasooka okwikirirya omu kyalo kyanywe, ababbeere omu kubalokola olwa maani ga Mwoyo oMweru abatukulya olwʼokwikirirya amazima.
53002014	Yabeetere ngʼabita mu Mawuliro aMasa, agetwalaabbire egimuli, kaisi oolwo mugabane oku kitiisya kya Musengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito.
53002015	Nʼolwekyo, aboluganda, mubbe bagumu, mukalangukire kwebyo ebyʼamazima ebitwabeegeserye omu bibono ooba omu bbaluwa yaiswe.
53002016	Kale oMusengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito onyere, nʼoKibbumba oItewaiswe, eyatutakire atyo era olwʼekisaakye, nʼatuwa eisangaalo eritawaawo nʼeisuubi erisa,
53002017	abagumye emyoyo, era abawe amaani, omu bisa byonabyona ebimukola nʼomu bimutumula.
53003001	Nga mmaliirirya, aboluganda, mbasaba mutusabirenge, ekibono ekizwa eeri oMusengwa kyeyongere okusaalaana amangu, era abakisuna bakiwenge ekitiisya ngʼowekyabbaire mwinywe.
53003002	Era mutusabirenge, oMusengwa atulamye abantu abaŋeŋese era ababbibabbi eino, olwakubba waliwo abantu bangi ino abataikirirya aMawuliro aMasa.
53003003	Neye oMusengwa waiswe mwesigwa era yabongeramu amaani, nʼabalamya omubbimubbi oSitaani.
53003004	OMusengwa waiswe oYesu atuwa obugumu oku bibakwataku nga tumaite tuti, mukola era mwakolanga ebyo ebitwabalagiire.
53003005	Kale oMusengwa alungamye emyoyo gyanywe omu kweyongera okumanya okutaka okuzwa eeri oKibbumba nʼokuguminkiriza okuzwa eeri oKurisito.
53003006	Aboluganda, tubalagira nʼobwezye obuzwa eeri oMusengwa oYesu Kurisito tuti mwewale aboluganda abagayaali, era abatasengererya ebyo ebitwabeegeserye inywe.
53003007	Inywe abanyere mumaite kusani ino muti musaaniire okukolanga nga iswe owetwakolanga owetwabbaire na inywe, titwabbaire bagayaali.
53003008	Titwaliireku kyokulya kya bwereere, neye twakolanga ino, nga twefudaku omusana nʼobwire, nga twewala okugosiyirira omuntu yenayena mwinywe.
53003009	Tirwokubba iswe twabbaire titusaanira kusuna bubbeeri okuzwa egimuli, wazira twatakire kubawa kyokuboneraku, nywena mwezye okukolanga ni mwebbeesyawo nga iswe.
53003010	Nʼowetwabbaire nga tukaali tuli aamo na inywe, twabalagiire tuti, “Atataka okukola emirimo, nʼokulya tiyalyanga.”
53003011	Twawuliire mbu abamo kwinywe baladuuki, tibakola mirimo, wazira baliwo kweingirya mu bya banaabwe.
53003012	Abʼengeri eyo tubalagira era tubasisiitira nʼobwezye obuzwa eeri oMusengwa oYesu Kurisito, tuti bateereere babbeeku ekibakola, kaisi oolwo basune ekibaalya.
53003013	Aboluganda, timwadembanga okukola ebintu ebisa.
53003014	Owewabbangawo omuntu agaana okusengererya ekitukoba omu bbaluwa eenu, mumwegendereze era muleke okukolagana naye, kaisi oolwo ensoni gimukwate.
53003015	Neye timwamutwalanga ngʼomulabe waanywe, wazira mumulabulenge mpola mpola ngʼomuganda waanywe.
53003016	Kale oMusengwa waiswe iye onyere eidembe, abawenge eidembe bulijo, yonayona egimubba. OMusengwa abbenge na inywe nywenanywena.
53003017	Ninze oPawulo, era obusugirye bunu ninze mbuwandiikire nʼengalo eyange enanyere. Ako niiko akamanyiciryo akalaga buli bbaluwa egimba mpandiikire. Nze ntyo wempandiika.
53003018	OMusengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito abakwatirenge ekisa inywe nywenanywena.
54001001	Nze oPawulo omutume wa Kurisito oYesu okusinzirira oku kiragiro kya Kibbumba eyatulokoire, nʼoKurisito oYesu omututeekere eisuubi lya iswe,
54001002	nkuwandiikira iwe oTemuseewo, eyasuukiire nakimo omwana owange onanyerenyeere omu kwikirirya oKurisito Yesu. OKibbumba oItewaiswe nʼoKurisito Yesu oMusengwa waiswe bakukwatire ekisa, bakusaasire, era bakuwe eidembe.
54001003	Ntaka osigale omu kibuga Efeeso, ngʼowenakusabire nga njaba omu kitundu kyʼe Makedooniya, olagire abantu badi ababbibabbi tibairayo okwegesya enjegesya egya bubbeyi.
54001004	Obakobe balekeraawo okusiisira oku bisimo, nʼomu kunonenkererya enyiriri empanvu egya maliina ga bazeiza baabwe. Ebyo byongera kuleeta kwakana omu kifo kyʼokwegesya abantu ebya Kibbumba nga babita omu kwikirirya.
54001005	Ekyagirire ni nkukoba okusigala aawo kyabbaire nti oleetewo omu baikirirya okutaka okuzwera nakimo omu myoyo emirongoole, nʼenseega ensa, era nʼokwikirirya okunambulamu bubbeyi.
54001006	Ebyo abantu abamo babizwireku, ni baira mu kwakana okubulamu na mugaso.
54001007	Beesuuca okubba abakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, neye tibategeera aMateeka ebigakoba, nʼebyo ibo abananyere ebibeegesya.
54001008	Tumaite ngʼaMateeka masa singa omuntu agakolesya omu ngeri entuuce.
54001009	Tusaaniire tumanye tuti, aMateeka tibagateekeirewo bantu abatuukiriire, bbe. Neye bagateekeirewo bavuni ba Mateeka nʼabajeemu, abo abakola ebibbibibbi era abatatya oKibbumba, abo abatatuukiriire era abazumirira ebya Kibbumba, era abo abaita abaitewaabwe nʼabamawaabwe aamo nʼabaiti bonabona.
54001010	Bagateekeirewo bantu abalendi nʼabalya ebisiyaga, abo abasuubuula abantu abo ababbeyi nʼabalairira obwereere, nʼabo bonabona abakola ebyakanisya enjegesya entuuce.
54001011	Enjegesya entuuce ebba niiyo eyo eyabirana okusani nʼaMawuliro aMasa agʼekitiisya aga Kibbumba ogubawuuja, era ageyankwatisirye okulaabba.
54001012	Neebalya oKurisito oYesu oMusengwa waiswe, omu mwoyo gwange, eyampaire amaani agʼokumuweererya, era eyaboine nga ndi mwesigwa, nʼantuma omulimogwe.
54001013	Newankubbaire ngʼeira nʼamutumulangaku bundi, ni muzumiriranga, era ni njigaanianga abamwikirirya nʼobukambwe obungi, obone owansaasira. Yansasiire lwakubba ebyo nʼabikoleranga mu butamanya, nga nkaali kumwikirirya.
54001014	OMusengwa waiswe yankwatiire ekisa kinene ino, nʼampa okwikirirya era nʼokutaka, ebyo oKurisito oYesu ebyatuwa owetumwikiririryamu.
54001015	Ekibono kituuce ino era kisaaniire okukiikiririrya nakimo, ekikoba kiti, “OKurisito oYesu yaizire omu kyalo kulokola bantu abakola ebibbibibbi.” Mwibo abekitumulaku ninze nsingiramu nakimo okubba akola ebibbibibbi.
54001016	Neye oKibbumba yankwatiire ekisa, nze akirira nakimo okubba akola ebibbibibbi, kaisi oKurisito oYesu ninze ogwabba alagiraku okuguminkirizakwe okutakoma, era ninze mbe ekyokuboneraku eri abo abalimwikiriryamu era ni basuna obwomi obutawaawo.
54001017	OKabaka owʼebiseera byonabyona atafa era ataboneka, oKibbumba omoiza yenkani, tumuwuujenge era tumuwenge ekitiisya emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
54001018	Temuseewo mwana wange, ndi kukuwanga ekiragiro ekiikirizagana nʼobunaabbi obukukwataku obwabulukire eira. Ntaka okulungamya kunu kukubbeere okulwanirira kusani amazima gʼokwikirirya ooti mwisulukale omusa alwana okuwangula olutalo.
54001019	Era nkukoba nti weekwate oku kwikiriryakwo omu Kurisito, era weekuumenge okubona oti okola bintu ebituuce. Ekyo kityo olwakubba abantu abandi bagaine okukola ebintu ebituuce, kale ni kizweramu okwikirirya kwabwe okuteeyongera, ni kubba ooti meeri etubiire.
54001020	Mwabo niimwo omuli oKaimenaayo nʼErigizanda abenawaireyo eeri oSitaani kaisi balekeraawo okuzumisyanga eriina lya Kibbumba.
54002001	Kale mbakoba nti ekikulu, musabenge oKibbumba ebintu ebimubba mutaka. Mumwegairirenge oku lwʼabantu bonabona, era nga wemumwebalya olwʼebyakola eeri abantu bonabona.
54002002	Musabirenge abakabaka nʼabandi bonabona abafuga kaisi tubbe omu bwomi obwʼeidembe era obuteeki, omu kutya oKibbumba nʼomu bweru bwonabwona.
54002003	Owemukola mutyo kibba kisa, era oKibbumba oMulokoli waiswe, iye ataka abantu bonabona balokoke era bamanye amazima, kyasiima.
54002005	Ekyo kityo olwakubba oKibbumba ali moiza, era nʼomutabagania wa bantu nʼoKibbumba ali moiza, era niiye omuntu oyo oKurisito oYesu,
54002006	eyeewaireyo abbe mugaito oku lwʼabantu bonabona. Okwewaayokwe kwabbaire bujulizi obwaiziire mu kiseera ekituuce okulaga ngʼoKibbumba owaataka abantu bonabona okulokoka.
54002007	Era nze ekinyere ekyo niikyo ekyagirire oKibbumba nʼannonda okubba omulaabbi, era omutume. Yannondere kubba mwegesi wʼaBatali Bayudaaya mbatuuceeku obukwenda obukwata oku kwikirirya kunu ngʼowekuli kutuuce. Ntumula mazima, timbeya naire.
54002008	Nʼolwekyo ntaka abasaiza buli wantu beegairirenge oKibbumba nga beewaayo mu bwomi obutuukiriire, anambula busungu ooba mpaka.
54002009	Era ntaka abakali bazwalenge bizwalo ebisaanira. Beegenderezenge okutamalira ebiseera nʼempiiya gyabwe mu misono gyʼenziiri, ooba mu kwewoomya nʼokwejolija nʼebya zaabbu nʼamabbaale agʼebbeeyi, waire mu kuzwala ngoye egyʼebbeeyi eino.
54002010	Wazira, ebibabba nabyo babikolesyenge mu kwefudaku kukola bikole ebisaaniire, ebisa, era ebiweesya oKibbumba ekitiisya, ngʼowekisaana abakali abasinza oKibbumba.
54002011	Nga muli egibeegeserya, omukali asirikenge, nga yeewombekere.
54002012	Tinjikirirya mukali kwegesya, ooba okubba nʼobwezye oku musaiza, wazira asaaniire asirikenge,
54002013	olwakubba Adamu niiye ogubasookere okubbumba, kaisi ni bairyaku oKaawa.
54002014	Era Adamu tiniiye ompiri oguyabbeyabbeyere kaisi nʼagwa omu kibbikibbi, wazira omukali niiye ogubabbeyabbeyere, atyo nʼasuuka oodi akola ekibbikibbi.
54002015	Neye era, oKibbumba yalirokola omukali okuzwa omu kibbikibbi ekyo ngʼabitira mu kubyala, kasita nabba agumiire omu kwikirirya, nʼomu kutaka, nʼomu kubba omweru, nʼomu kwefuga.
54003001	Ekibono kituuce ekikoba kiti: Buli muntu ataka okubba omulabirizi, abba yeegombere mulimo omusa.
54003002	Omulabirizi ali nʼokubba ngʼabulaku kyokumunenya. Ali nʼokubba nʼomukali moiza yenkani, timuntu omulendi. Ali nʼokubba nga muntu eyegendereza, eyefuga, ogubawa ekitiisya, ayaniriza abageni, era amaite okwegesya ebya Kibbumba nakusani.
54003003	Ali nʼokubba nga timunywamwenge, nga tiwʼeikayu, wazira nga muwombeeki, nga timutonganitongani, era nga talulunkanira empiiya.
54003004	Ali nʼokubba ngʼafuga kusani ino enyumbaye, era nʼabaanabe nga bamugondera, nga bali nʼempisa nsa.
54003005	Aale omuntu atayezya okufuga enyumbaye ayezya atya okulabirira ekanisa?
54003006	Omulabirizi tali nʼokubba muntu eyankaikiriryanga oKurisito akaali kukula omu kwikirirya, demba ni yeekudumbalya, oKibbumba nʼamusalira omusango, ngʼoweyagusaliire oSitaani.
54003007	Ali nʼokubba muntu oyo nʼabatali bʼomu kanisa bona ogubawa ekitiisya, kaisi ayezye okutabbaaku kisobyo kya kumuvunaana, nʼokugwa omu mutego gwa Sitaani.
54003008	Abadikoni bona basaaniire okubba bantu abebawa ekitiisya, abatumula amazima, abatayabira oku mwenge, era abatalulunkanira bya kusuna.
54003009	Basaaniire kubba bantu abatambulira omu kwikirirya okutuuce oKibbumba okuyatuwaire, ngʼomu biseego byabwe mpaamu kwegomba okubbikubbi, ooba okwewuliramu musango.
54003010	Era musookenge kubagezesyamu kaisi ni basuuca abaweererya ababulaku ekyokubanenya.
54003011	Nʼabakali baabwe batyo, bona basaaniire okubba bantu abebawa ekitiisya, abatasibirirya oku banaabwe, abeegendereza, era abeesigwa mu buli kimo.
54003012	Omudikoni ali nʼokubba wa mukali moiza yenkani, era afuga kusani ino abaanabe nʼabʼomu kisitokye,
54003013	olwakubba ababba baweereirye kusani omu budikoni basuna ekitiisya ekyʼamaani, era ni babba bacaati omu kwikirirya kwabwe omu Kurisito oYesu.
54003014	Nsuubira okwiza amangu egyoli. Neye era, binu mbikuwandiikira,
54003015	nʼowenaalwawo okwiza, omanye engeri abantu egibasaaniire okwebityamu omu kisito kya Kibbumba. Ekisito ekyo niiyo ekanisa ya Kibbumba onyere obwomi ekikola ngʼomusingi nʼompango ebikwatiriire amazima omu kyalo kyonakyona.
54003016	Tukakasira nakimo tuti ekyama ekiri omu njegesya yaiswe, oKibbumba ekiyabiikwire, kituuce ino. Ekyo niikyo ekikoba kiti: “OKurisito yabonekere ngʼomuntu onanyerenyeere, oMwoyo oMweru nʼamukakasa ati niiye oyo. Abamalaika bamuboine, ebimufaaku ni babiraabba omu mawanga. Abantu bʼoku kyalo ni bamwikiririryamu, oKibbumba nʼamutwala omwigulu omu kitiisya.”
54004001	OMwoyo oMweru akoba butembereri ati, omu biseera ngʼekyalo kyatira okutuuka oku nkomerero, abantu abamo balizwa omu kwikirirya, ni basengererya emizimu egigotesyagotesya, era ni basengererya enjegesya gyʼemizimu.
54004002	Enjegesya egyo abagireeta bantu ababbeyi, abo abʼemyoyo egibulamu akabuntu.
54004003	Abo niibo abagaana abantu okufumbirwa, era ni baloberya okulya ebyokulya ebimo. OKibbumba yateekerewo obufumbo, era nʼabbumba ebyokulya ngʼataka abaikirirya, abamaite amazima, babikolesyenge nga webamwebalya.
54004004	Ekyo kityo olwakubba buli kintu oKibbumba ekiyateekerewo kisa, era tibakigaana, kasita ni basooka kumwebalya kaisi ni bakikolesya.
54004005	Ekityo kisuuka kitukulye lwʼekibono kya Kibbumba, era nʼokusaba.
54004006	Oweweegesya aboluganda ebibono ebyo, waabba oli muweererya omusa owa Kurisito oYesu, akulire omu mazima agʼenjikirirya era nʼenjegesya ensa eyo egyosengererya.
54004007	Weewalenge emboozi egitagasa omu bwomi bwa muntu wa Kibbumba, ngʼebisimo ebyʼabakaire. Omu kifo kyʼebyo, weetendeke mu bwomi obuweesya oKibbumba ekitiisya.
54004008	Ekyo kityo olwakubba okukola ebisaizi byʼomubiri kigasa katono, neye okukola ebintu ebiweesya oKibbumba ekitiisya kigasa omu bintu byonabyona. Ikwo kuleeta eisuubi eryʼomu bwomi bunu obwʼoku kyalo, era nʼobwo obutawaawo oKibbumba obuyaliwa abaikirirya.
54004009	Ekibono ekyo kituuce era kisaanira nakimo okukiikirirya.
54004010	Kagira tukalabana era twefudaku ino okubba omu bwomi oKibbumba obwataka, olwakubba eisuubi lya iswe liri mu Kibbumba onyere obwomi era oMulokoli wʼabantu bonabona, eino eino abo abaikirirya.
54004011	Abantu obeegesyenge ebintu ebyo era obalagirenge okubikola.
54004012	Tobbangamu okutya waire okwetalirirya kwonakwona oti okaali mwisuka mutomuto. Wazira, omu ntumulayo, nʼomu mpisagyo, nʼomu kutakakwo, nʼomu kwikiriryakwo, nʼomu butuukiriryebwo, obbenge kyokuboneraku eri abaikirirya.
54004013	Onyiikiirenge okusoma eBiwandiike, nʼokubuulirira abantu ebya Kibbumba, nʼokubeegesyanga paka owenaliiza.
54004014	Togayaaliriranga ekirabo ekiri mwiwe, oMwoyo oMweru ekiyakuwaire, okusinzirira oku bunaabbi obwawulukire ngʼabʼakakiiko kʼabakaire bʼekanisa bakuteekereku engalo okukusabira.
54004015	Ebyo obimalireku ino amaani, era weeweeyo mwibyo, kaisi buli muntu abone nga weeyongera okukola kusani.
54004016	Weegenderezenge ino omu mpisagyo nʼomu byoyegesya. Era weekalangule mwebyo olwakubba owookola otyo, walyerokola iwe onyere, era nʼabo abakuwulisisya.
54005001	Tokaawuukiranga omusaiza omukaire, wazira omubuulirirenge ngʼoiteewo. Abo abakaali abaisukaisuka obabuulirirenge ngʼabagandabo.
54005002	Abakali abakaire obabuulirirenge ngʼababyairebo, nʼabakali abatobato obabuulirirenge ngʼaboonyokobo, era ngʼobikolera omu butuukirirye obunambulaku kabuulya.
54005003	Abanamwandu, abookakasa oti badambaku abantu abababbeera, obalabirirenge.
54005004	Onamwandu owaabba nʼabaana ooba abaizukulu, abaana ooba abaizukulu abo, okusookera nakimo, bali nʼokwega okutuukirirya oKibbumba ebyalagira oku kyʼokulabirira abʼomu kisito kyabwe. Omu kukola ekyo, babba baliku nʼekibasasula ababyaire baabwe ooba abazeiza baabwe, olwakubba ekyo oKibbumba kyasiima.
54005005	Onamwandu oyo adambaku obubbeeri, ngʼasigaire yenkani, abba yeesigire Kibbumba, era tagonerya okwegairira nʼokusaba oKibbumba omusana nʼobwire.
54005006	Neye oyo aabba onamwandu tete nʼaira mu kunoonia byʼamasanyu, abba amalire okufa omu mwoyogwe, waire ngʼoku ngulu akaali mwomi.
54005007	Owe abantu ebiragiro ebyo kaisi tibaagwa omu kubanenya.
54005008	Kaisi tete, oyo atafa oku bantube, eino eino abʼomu nyumbaye, abba azwire omu kwikirirya oKurisito, era abba mubbimubbi nʼokukiraku omutaikirirya.
54005009	Onamwandu akaali kwerya emyanka 60, tomuwandiikanga okusuna obubbeeri omu banamwandu. Neye nʼowaabba ayerya emyanka egyo, ali nʼokubba ngʼabbaire mwesigwa eeri oibaaye.
54005010	Onamwandu oyo aali nʼokubba bamumaite bati akola ebikole ebisa ngʼokukulya okusani eino abaanabe, okwaniriza abageni, okulabirira abatuukirirye, okubbeera abali omu bigosi, nʼokwewangayo eino okukola ebintu ebisa mu buli ngeri.
54005011	Neye abanamwandu abakaali abatobato toikiriryanga okubawandiika omu lukalala lwa banamwandu okusuna obubbeeri. Ekyo kityo olwakubba okwegomba kwʼomubiri owekwiza, kuyinga okwewaayo kwabwe eeri oKurisito, ni baira bataka okufumbirwa.
54005012	Batyo ni beeteekaku omusango olwʼobutatuukirirya ekyo ekibasuubizire okusigala nga tibafumbo baweererye Kibbumba.
54005013	Nʼekindi, baleka okukola, ni baira mu kuladuuka nga baaba kisito ku kisito. Tibabba bagayaali kyonkani, neye batambulya olugambo, ni beingirya omu bintu ebitali byabwe, ni beesakabba nʼebitasaaniire okutumula.
54005014	Kagira nkoba abanamwandu abakaali abatobato bafumbirwenge, babyale abaana, balabirire ebisito byabwe, kaisi tibaawa omulabe awokubitira okututumulaku obundi.
54005015	Era abanamwandu abamo bamalire eira okugota ni basengererya oSitaani.
54005016	Owewabbaawo omukali omwikirirya aali nʼabanamwandu abʼolulyolwe, iye niiye abbe abalabirirenge. Tibaawa omugugu ogwo kanisa, kaisi eyezye kulabiriranga banamwandu badi abadambaku abantu abababbeera.
54005017	Abeekubbemberi bʼabaikirirya abeekubbembera kusani, basaaniire empeera ekiraku eyʼabainaabwe obunene, eino eino abo abakalabana okulaabba nʼokwegesya abantu ekibono kya Kibbumba.
54005018	Ekyo kityo olwakubba eKiwandiike kikoba kiti, “Ondaawo ogwosibire oku kijooko okukukolera omulimo tomusiba omunwa.” Nʼekindi kiti, “Omukoli asaaniire empeeraye.”
54005019	Toikiriryanga ebyo ebibavunaana omwekubbemberi okutoolaku nga biriku abajulizi abeera ababiri ooba abasatu.
54005020	Abo ababba bakolere ekibbikibbi mubanenyenge mu lwatu, kaisi ekyo ni kibba kulabula eeri abasigairewo.
54005021	Nkusisiitira omu maiso ga Kibbumba nʼoKurisito oYesu nʼabamalaika abalonde, okusengereryanga ebyo bulijo nga tiwekubbira naire, ooba okusalirirya.
54005022	Toluuyanga okuteeka engalo oku muntu yenayena ngʼomwabula okuweererya oKibbumba, okutoolaku ngʼomalire kumugezesya. Ekyo kityo olwakubba owʼengeri eyo owaagwa omu kibbikibbi, wena bakubalira omu kibbikibbi ekyo. Weekuume ngʼobulaku akamogo.
54005023	Olwʼobulwaire bwa mu kida obutira okukudambya, tiwaanywanga maizi gonkani neye onywengeku nʼenviinyo ntyayi giti ngʼobulezi.
54005024	Ebibbibibbi byʼabantu abamo bibonekerawo omu lwatu nga bakaali nʼokubasalira omusango, kaisi ebya bandi ni biboneka luzwanyuma.
54005025	Era bityo nʼebikole ebisa abantu abamo ebibakola webiboneka omu lwatu. Neye ebya bandi, nʼowebibba nga nandi ni bibonekerawo omu Lwatu, mazima tibyalikaya kuboneka oluzwanyuma.
54006001	Abo bonabona abali omu kijooko kyʼobugalama basaaniire okuwa ino abasengwa baabwe ekitiisya, kaisi abantu bakaye ensonga yʼokuzumiraku eriina lya Kibbumba nʼenjikirirya yaiswe.
54006002	Kaisi abo abagalama abali nʼabasengwa baabwe abaikirirya oYesu, tibalekangayo okubawa ekitiisya bati olwakubba abasengwa baabwe atyanu baganda baabwe. Wazira, beeyongerenge kubaweererya kusani ekibitiriire, olwakubba abo abasunamu omu kuweererya kwabwe baikirirya banaabwe, era bʼebbeeyi egibali. Ebyo obibeegesyenge era obasisiitirenge okubikuumanga.
54006003	Buli muntu ayegesya enjikirirya egyʼengeri egendi, era nga tagondera ebiragiro ebituuce ebya Musengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito nʼenjegesya eyabirana nʼebintu ebiweesya oKibbumba ekitiisya,
54006004	abba aizwire kwemanya, okumukaisya okutegeera buli kintu. Omuntu owʼengeri eyo atira okubba nʼekibinyibinyi kya kwakana nʼokukayaana ku buli kibono. Era ebizwamu kubba na ngongi, nʼoyombo, nʼokoolo, nʼokusibiriryaku, nʼokukayaana.
54006005	Ebyo byonabyona ababikola bantu ababebenyekere ebiseego, abawoiremu amazima, era abaseega bati okwikirirya oYesu nzira ya kunooneryamu byobusuni.
54006006	Neye omuntu owaikirirya oYesu, obwomibwe bubba bwikuti, kasita nʼabba ngʼaikirirya ati ebyo ebyali nabyo bimumala.
54006007	Ekyo kityo olwakubba mpaawo kitwaizire nakyo omu kyalo munu, era mpaawo kitwalyaba nakyo nga tuzwamu.
54006008	Kale owetubba nʼebyokulya nʼebizwalo, ebyo bitumalenge.
54006009	Abo abeegomba okugaigawala bagwa omu bikemo, nʼomu kwegomba okwʼenkola nʼenkola okwekisiru, era okwa kabbikabbi, ni bakaya nʼokusigala omu kwikirirya, batyo ni beinika omu kugota nʼomu kujigirika.
54006010	Ekyo kiiza olwakubba okululunkanira empiiya niikwo onsulo wʼebibbibibbi byonabyona. Olwa kululunkana okwo, abamo bagotere, ni bazwa omu kwikirirya, ni beereetera obulumi bungi omu myoyo gyabwe.
54006011	Kale iwe omuntu wa Kibbumba, weewalenge ebibbibibbi ebyo byonabyona. Osengereryenge ebya butuukirirye, obwomi oKibbumba obwasiima, nʼokwikirirya, nʼokutaka, nʼokuguminkiriza, nʼeiwooyo.
54006012	Olwanenge masaiza omu bwomi bwa kwikirirya oYesu. Ekyo kyakwezyesya okusuna obwomi obutawaawo oKibbumba obuyakweteire, owewabbutuliire kusani ino okwikiriryakwo, omu maiso gʼabajulizi abangi.
54006013	Nkusisiitira omu maiso ga Kibbumba aawa buli kintu obwomi, era nʼaga Kurisito Yesu eyabbutuliire nakimo amazima omu maiso ga Pontiyo Piraato,
54006014	nti okuumenge ebintu byonabyona ebinkulagiire. Owewakola ekyo, wayezya okutabbaaku akamogo, kadi ekyokukunenya, okutuukira nakimo oMusengwa waiswe oYesu Kurisito oweyalibonekera.
54006015	Okwizakwe okwo, oKibbumba ogutuwuuja era onyere obwezye, oKabaka wa bakabaka era oMusengwa wa basengwa, yalikutuukirirya omu kiseera iye onyere ekiyalisiima.
54006016	Iye yenkani atafa era abba omu kitangaala abantu ekibateezya kwigereraku, mpaawo eyabbaire amuboineku, era mpaawo ayezya okumubona. Iye wʼekitiisya, era iye wa bwezye obutawaawo. Amiina.
54006017	Olabule abasuni abʼoku kyalo kinu, kaisi baleke okwekudumbalya, ooba okwesiga obusuni obutali bwʼemirembe nʼemirembe, wazira beesigenge Kibbumba atuwa buli kintu ekitusangaalya.
54006018	Basaaniire okukolanga ebintu ebisa, kaisi basuuke abasuni omu bisa ebibakola, era basuuke abʼekisa era abagabi.
54006019	Batyo balibba beebisira obusuni obwalibba omusingi omukalanguki ogwalibagasa omu biseera ebyaliiza, kaisi ni beezya okusuna obwomi obunanyerenyeere.
54006020	Temuseewo, weegumye omu buweererya bwa kwemereryawo okwikirirya okutuuce. Weewalenge emboozi egitaweesya oKibbumba ekitiisya, nʼempaka egya busirusiru, egyo abo abeebbeya egibeeta mbu-so gya malabuki.
54006021	Abamo kwabo abakoba bati bali nʼamalabuki nago bagota ni bazwa omu kwikirirya. OKibbumba abakwatire inywe ekisa.
55001001	Ninze oPawulo oKibbumba oguyasiimire okubba omutume wa Kurisito oYesu, nkobere abantu ebifa oku bwomi obutawaawo oKibbumba obuyatusuubizire, obutusuna okuzwa eeri Kurisito oYesu.
55001002	Nkuwandiikira iwe omwana wange omu Kurisito, oTemuseewo oguntaka eino. OKibbumba oItewaiswe nʼoKurisito Yesu oMusengwa waiswe bakukwatire ekisa, bakusaasire, era bakuwe eidembe.
55001003	Neebalya oKibbumba ogumpeererya omu mwoyo omulongoole, ngʼabazeiza bange owebakolanga. Bulijo mmwebalya buli owenkwewukirya nga mmwegairira omusana ooba obwire.
55001004	Nabuli owenjewukirya amaliga agewakungire nga tuseebulangana, neegomba okukubonaku, kaisi njizulire nakimo eisangaalo.
55001005	Njewukirya kusani okwikirirya omu Yesu okwoli nakwo okwa mazima, era nʼokwa zeizawo oLooyi nʼomaawo Ewuniike okubabbaire nakwo, era atyanu nkakasa nti wena oli nakwo.
55001006	Kagira nkwewukirya nti oyongerenge okukumamu omusyo omu kirabo kya bulabirizi ekiri mwiwe, oKibbumba ekiyakuwaire olunaku olunakuteekeireku engalo nga nkwabula okukola omulimo gwa Kibbumba.
55001007	OMwoyo oMweru oKibbumba oguyatuwaire tatusuuca kubba bantu abati, wazira atwizulya maani, na kutaka, na kwefuga.
55001008	Nʼolwekyo ensoni tigyakukwatanga okutumula oku Musengwa waiswe, ooba ku nze omusibewe; wazira wena oikirirye okudambira aamo na nze olwʼaMawuliro aMasa, nga twesiga maani ga Kibbumba.
55001009	Iye yatulokoire, nʼatweta tubbe batuukirirye nga tasinzirira ku bintu ebisa ebyo ebitwakolere, wazira ngʼasinzirira ku kigendererwakye nʼoku kisaakye ekiyatukwatiire ngʼabita omu Kurisito Yesu okuzwera nakimo eira nʼeira.
55001010	Atyanu ekisa ekyo nago kyabbutukiire mu kuboneka kwa Mulokoli waiswe oKurisito oYesu, eyatoirewo okufa, nʼaleeta obwomi obutawaawo, ngʼabita omu Mawuliro aMasa.
55001011	OKibbumba yannondere nkobere abantu aMawuliro aMasa ngʼomutumewe era omwegesi.
55001012	Era kagira ndamba nti ngʼabantu banjakanisya era nga bangadya. Neye era, ekyo tikinkwatisya nsoni naire, olwakubba mmaite ogunaikiriirye, era nkakasa nti ayezya okukuuma obwomi bwange obunamubisisirye paka oku lunaku ludi olwʼenkomerero.
55001013	Okwatenge ebibono ebyʼamazima ebiwawuliranga nga ntumula nʼobisengererya, era okalangukirenge omu njikirirya nʼomu kutaka, ebituli nabyo olwakubba tuli omu Kurisito oYesu.
55001014	Olabirirenge obuweererya obwʼebbeeyi obubakukwatisirye, ngʼoMwoyo oMweru oyo abba mwiswe akwezyesya okubukola.
55001015	Omaite oti abʼomwAsiya bonabona bandekerewo. Mwabo niimwo omuli oFigeero nʼoKerumogeene.
55001016	OMusengwa akwatiire abʼomu kisito kyʼOnesifoolo ekisa, olwakubba yandabiriire emirundi mingi, era ensoni tigyamukwaite okunnemanyikisya nga ndi musibe.
55001017	Neye oweyaizire e Looma, yakalabaine ino okunnoonia, nʼantuukaku.
55001018	Era iwe omaite kusani ino ebintu ebisa byonabyona ebiyankoleire omwEfeeso. Oweyalituuka omu maiso ga Musengwa okumusalira omusango, oku lunaku ludi olwʼenkomerero, oMusengwa amukwatire ekisa.
55002001	Kale mwana wange Temuseewo, ogume, era amaani oKurisito oYesu agatuwa gakubbeerenge.
55002002	Nʼebyo ebiwawuliranga nga ntumula omu maiso gʼabajulizi abangi, obyegesyenge abantu abeesigwa, abalyezya okubyegesya abandi.
55002003	Wena owutuke nʼebigosi ngʼomusirikale omusa owa Kurisito oYesu, nga swena owetukola.
55002004	Mpaawo mwisulukale aali oku lutalo eyeyingirya omu nsonga egyʼabantu aba bulijo, olwakubba ekibba kimuli oku mwoyo esaawa eyo, niikyo ekya kusangaalya oyo eyamuwaire omulimo gwa kubba omwisulukale.
55002005	Era ekyokuboneraku ekindi kiri kiti, oyo aingira omu mizeenyo gyʼempaka nʼowaawangula tibamuwa engule ya buwanguli owaatakuuma amateeka ga muzenyo ogwo.
55002006	Nʼekindi, omulimi oyo akola nʼeiganyi abba niiye asaaniire okusooka okulya oku bibala ebyʼomu musiri omwalimira.
55002007	Onoonererye amakulu gʼebintu ebinkoba, oMusengwa aiza kukuwa okutegeera ebintu ebyo byonabyona.
55002008	Oyewukiryenge oti oYesu Kurisito, omwizukulu wa kabaka oDawudi yazuukiire ngʼaMawuliro aMasa agenkobera abantu owegatukoba.
55002009	Era olwʼokulaabba aMawuliro aMasa ago kigira ni ngada, ni bansiba ngʼomuntu akola ebibbibibbi. Neye ekibono kya Kibbumba ikyo tibakisibiire omu mabbuusu.
55002010	Nʼolwekyo ngumiire buli kintu olwʼabalondemu ba Kibbumba, kaisi oolwo basune okubalokola, nʼekitiisya ekitawaawo, ebiiza olwʼokwikirirya oKurisito Yesu.
55002011	Ekibono kinu kya mazima ekikoba kiti: “Owetubba twafeereire aamo naye, twalibba boomi aamo naye.
55002012	Owetuguminkirizira aamo naye, twalifugira aamo naye. Owetumwegaana, yena yalitwegaana.
55002013	Nʼowetutabba beesigwa, iye abba mwesigwa, olwakubba tayezya kweyakanisya iye onyere.”
55002014	Oyewukiryenge abaikirirya aboolabirira ebibono ebyo. Obasisiitirenge omu maiso ga Kibbumba okwewalanga okwakana okunambulamu mugaso, ikwo okwonoona-bwonooni abo abawulisisya.
55002015	Weefudengeku ino bulijo okubba muntu oKibbumba ogwasiima, ngʼokola ebintu ebitakuswaza, era oyegesyenge kusani ino ekibono ekyʼamazima.
55002016	Weewalenge emboozi eteweesya oKibbumba ekitiisya, era ebibulamu makulu, olwakubba abantu bibongera-bwongeri kutatya Kibbumba.
55002017	Ebibono byabwe ebyo nago bisalaanikira mangu omu bantu ooti musyo gwa luyira. Mwabo abasomesya ebityo niimwo omuli oKaimenaayo nʼoFireeto.
55002018	Abo bagotere ni bazwa oku mazima, nga bakoba bati okuzuukira kwʼabantu bonabona oKibbumba okuyasuubizire, kwamalire ira okubbaawo. Era boonoona okwikirirya kwa bantu abamo.
55002019	Neye oKibbumba yateekerewo oYesu nʼabatume ngʼomuntu owaayombeka omusingi omugumu, era oguliku eraama yʼebibono ebikoba biti, “OMusengwa amaite ababe.” Era biti, “Buli abbutula eriina lya Musengwa, azwe omu bibbibibbi.”
55002020	Ebintu ebibakolesya omu nyumba ya muntu omusuni tibibba bya zaabbu nʼebya feeza byonkani, neye mubbaamu nʼebibabaizire mu bisaale, era nʼebibabbumbire mwitakali. Ebimo babikolesya mirimo egyʼekitiisya, nʼebindi kwibyo mirimo egitali gyʼekitiisya.
55002021	Kale buli moiza kwinywe eyeewala ebintu ebitaweesya ekitiisya byonabyona, oyo niiye eyaabbanga ekintu ekyʼekitiisya, ekibatukuliirye nakimo, era ekisaanira buli mulimo omusa.
55002022	Weewalenge okwegomba okubbikubbi okwa maisuka, osengereryenge bya butuukirirye, nʼebya kwikirirya, nʼebya kutakangana, era nʼebyʼeidembe aamo nʼabo abeegairira oMusengwa oYesu nga bali nʼemyoyo egitukula.
55002023	Weewalenge empaka egya busirusiru, eginambulamu malabuki, olwakubba omaite oti gizwamu yombo.
55002024	Omuweererya wa Musengwa tasaaniire kwombererya, wazira kubba wʼekisa eeri buli muntu, nʼokubba ayegesya okusani, era aguminkiriza.
55002025	Era ali nʼokubba muntu ayegesya nʼeiwooyo abo abamwakanisya, amo oKibbumba nʼademba nʼabawa okwenenya ni bamanya amazima.
55002026	Awo babba bazwa omu lutuula oSitaani oluyabakwatiiremu nʼasigala ngʼabakolesya ebyataka, olwo nga niikyo ekibbikibbi.
55003001	Nʼekindi, Temuseewo, omanye kinu oti omu naku ngʼekyalo kyatira okutuuka oku nkomerero, walibbaawo ebiseera ebibbibibbi.
55003002	Omu biseera ebyo abantu balibba nga beemaite bonkani, nga bantu abalulunkanira empiiya, abʼeidumi, abeewulira, abataka okuzuma, era nga tibagondera babyaire baabwe. Balibba bantu abatasiima ebibabakolera, abatatya oKibbumba,
55003003	ababula okutaka, abatasoniya, abasibirirya oku banaabwe, abateefuga nga buli moiza ekyataka kiyeekolera, nga baŋeŋese, era nga tibataka abo abakola ebisa.
55003004	Balibba bantu abaizwire enkwe, ababula okuguminkiriza, abeebona bonkani, nga bataka ino ebyamasanyu okukiraku owebataka oKibbumba;
55003005	ngʼoku ngulu baboneka ooti-so bantu abawa ediini ekitiisya neye omu myoyo gyabwe nga tibaikiririrya omu maani agali omu diini nago. Abantu abo abatyo wabeewalenge.
55003006	Mwabo niimwo omuli abakikimita ni baingira omu bisito byʼabanaabwe, ni bafuga abakali abasirusiru, abaizwire ebibbibibbi, nga tibeezya kuguma olwa kwegomba okubbikubbi okwa buli ngeri okubabba nakwo.
55003007	Era abakali abo babeegesya bulijo, neye ni bakaira nakimo okutegeera amazima.
55003008	Kale, ngʼabasaiza abafumu, oYaane nʼoYambule, abʼeira owebaakanisirye oMusa, nʼabantu ababbibabbi abo bona batyo baakanisya amazima. Niibo abantu ababebenyekere obuwongo, era abawoiremu okwikirirya okutuuce.
55003009	Neye mpaawo gibaaba, olwakubba obusirusiru bwabwe bwiza kumanyikana omu bantu bonabona, ngʼobwa Yaane nʼoYambule owebwamanyikaine.
55003010	Neye iwe wasengereirye okwegesya kwange, nʼempisa gyange, nʼekigendererwa. Wasengereirye enjikirirya yange, nʼokutaka kwange.
55003011	Omaite ngʼowenagumiire okunjiigaania nʼokugada, ebyantuukireku omu bibuga byʼAntiyokiya, nʼe Ikoniya nʼe Lisitula. Mazima banjiigaanirye ino! Neye era oMusengwa nʼandamya mu byonabyona.
55003012	Kituuce, era nabuli moiza ataka okubba nʼobwomi obuweesya oKibbumba ekitiisya ngʼali omu Kurisito oYesu, bali nʼokumuyigaania.
55003013	Kale batyo abantu ababbibabbi nʼababbeyi balyeyongera okubba ababbibabbi, ni bagotesyagotesya abandi, era batyo bona abanyere oSitaani nʼabagoterya nakimo.
55003014	Neye iwe okalangukirenge mwebyo ebiwayegere era nʼobiikiririrya nakimo, ngʼowomaite obucaati nʼobutuukirirye omaawo nʼozeizawo ebibakwegeserye ebibabbaire nabyo.
55003015	Era okuzwera nakimo ngʼokaali mutomuto, wabbaire omaite eBiwandiike ebyeru, ebyo ebyezya okukusuuca omulabuki, nʼolokoka olwa kwikirirya omu Kurisito oYesu.
55003016	OKibbumba niiye eyalungamirye okuwandiika kwʼeBiwandiike byonabyona. Era ibyo bigasa omu kwegesya enjikirirya, nʼomu kunenya abasoberye, nʼomu kuteereerya abazwire omu nzira entuuce, nʼomu kwegesya omuntu okukola ebituukirirye.
55003017	Awo kaisi oolwo omuntu wa Kibbumba ayezye okubba atuukiriire, ngʼali nabuli kintu ekyetaagisya omu kukola ebikole ebisa, ebyo oKibbumba ebyataka.
55004001	Nʼolwekyo nkusisiitira Temuseewo, omu maiso ga Kibbumba nʼoKurisito oYesu eyalisalira aboomi nʼabafu omusango oweyalibonekera ngʼairire omu bwakabakabwe,
55004002	nti obbenge mwetegeki okukoberanga abantu ekibono kya Kibbumba nga togonerya. Ekyo okolenge omu biseera ebisaaniire okukikola, ooba mu biseera ebigosi. Ogololenge abeetaaga okugolola, onenyenge abandi, era abandi nʼobairyamu amaani nʼobuguminkiriza, era ngʼobwoyegesya nʼobwegendereza.
55004003	Okolenge otyo olwakubba ekiseera kiiza kutuuka abantu omu baligaanira okuwulisisya enjegesya eyʼamazima, neye olwʼokusengererya okwegomba nʼamairu gʼemibiri gyabwe, ni beekumbaaniryaku abasomesya ababeegesya biibyo byonkani ebibataka era ebibanyumira okuwulira.
55004004	Baligaana okuwulisisya ebyʼamazima, ni basengererya enfumo-obufumo.
55004005	Neye iwe obbenge muteeki bulijo, era ogumirenge okukudambya. Okolenge omulimo gwa kulaabba eeri abantu aMawuliro aMasa, era otuukirirye obuweererya oKibbumba obuyakuwaire.
55004006	Ekiseera kyange ekya kuzwa oku kyalo kituukire; baaba okunjita olwa kuweererya oMusengwa oYesu Kurisito.
55004007	Ndwaine kusani ino olutalo lwa kwemereryawo okwikirirya okutuuce, mmaliriirye olugendo lwange olwa bwomi obwa kwikirirya oYesu. Nsigaire nga ndi mwesigwa mwebyo oKibbumba ebiyampaire okukola.
55004008	Ekinsigairye niikwo okusuna engule eraga obutuukirirye bwange, oMusengwa omulamuzi etiyekubbira egiyalimpa oku lunaku ludi olwʼenkomerero. Tiyaligiwa ninze zenkani, neye yaligiwa nʼabo bonabona abakuumiriire okwirakwe.
55004009	Weefudeku ino okwiza mangu egyendi,
55004010	olwakubba oDeema yanzwireku olwʼokutaka eino ebyʼoku kyalo kunu, nʼayaba e Sesalonika. OKuleseene iye yaabire Galatiya, kaisi oTito iye nʼayaba e Dalumatiya.
55004011	OLuuka yenkani niiye ali na nze. Obitye oMaako oize naye, olwakubba ambeera ino omu buweererya bwange.
55004012	OTukiko namutumire Efeeso.
55004013	Owewaabba ngʼoiza, ondeeteranga ekooti yange eginalekere e Tulowaasi e wa Kalipo. Ondeeteranga nʼebitabo byange, eino eino ebyo ebikira obukulu.
55004014	Erigizanda omuyeesi wʼebikomo yambitirye bundi ino. OMusengwa yalimusasula olwʼebyo ebiyakolere.
55004015	Wena wamwekuume, olwakubba yaakanisirye ino ebibono byaiswe.
55004016	Omu kuwozya kwange okwasookere, mpaawo kadi moiza eyanyambire, buli muntu yandekeswire aawo. Nsaba oKibbumba ekyo tiyakibavunaana.
55004017	Neye oMusengwa yabbaire na nze, nʼampa amaani, ni njezya okulaabbira nakimo eeri aBatali Bayudaaya bonabona ekibono kya Kibbumba, ni bakiwulira, atyo nʼandamya abantu ababbibabbi.
55004018	Era oMusengwa yannunulanga mu buli kabbikabbi, era yalintuuca kusani omu bwakabakabwe obuli omwigulu. OMusengwa oyo tumuwenge ekitiisya emirembe nʼemirembe. Amiina.
55004019	Onsugirirye oPulisikira nʼoibaaye Akwira, nʼabʼomu kisito kyʼOnesifoolo.
55004020	Erasito yasigaire omu Kolinso, kaisi oTulofiimo iye namulekere ku mwalo gwʼe Mireeto nga mulwaire.
55004021	Weefudeku ino oize ngʼekiseera kyʼobuwolondoki obungi kikaali kutandiika. Ewubbulo, nʼoPudeene, nʼoLiino, nʼoKirawudiya, aamo nʼaboluganda omu Kurisito bonabona bakusugiirye.
55004022	OMusengwa waiswe abbe aamo na iwe, era akukwatirenge ekisa.
56001001	Nze oPawulo omuweererya wa Kibbumba, era omutume wa Yesu Kurisito, ogubatumire mbiraabbe eeri abalondemu ba Kibbumba okwikirirya okutuuce, era mbamanyikisye amazima agatuuca abantu omu kugondera oKibbumba.
56001002	Okwikirirya nʼamazima ago byeigikire ku kusuubira bwomi obutawaawo, oKibbumba atayezya kubbeya, obuyasuubizire okuzwa eira eino.
56001003	Ekiseera ekituuce owekyatuukire, obwomi obwo nʼabulagira omu bibono, era ebibono ebyo niibyo ebiyankwatisirye mbiraabbe eeri abantu, ngʼoKibbumba oMulokoli waiswe oweyalagiire.
56001004	Nkuwandiikira iwe Tito omwana wange onanyerenyeere omu kwikirirya swenaswena okutuli nakwo. OKibbumba oItewaiswe nʼoKurisito Yesu oMulokoli waiswe bakukwatire ekisa, era batyo bakuwe eidembe.
56001005	Nakulekere omu Kuleete nga ntaka otereerye ebyo ebyetaagisya okuteereerya, era oteekewo abeekubbemberi bʼamakanisa mu buli kibuga, ngʼowenakulagiire.
56001006	Oyo ogwolonda asaaniire okubba ngʼabulaku ekyokumunenya, era ngʼali nʼomukali moiza. Abaanabe bali nʼokubba baikirirya, era nga tibababalira mwabo abeekolakolania olwʼeiralu, ooba mwabo abajeemu.
56001007	Ekyo kityo olwakubba omulabiriri ngʼowaali muweererya wa Kibbumba ali nʼokubba ngʼabulaku ekyokumunenya, nga tiyeekudumbalya, nga tasunguwala mangu, nga timunywamwenge, nga timukambwe, era nga talulunkanira ebyobusuni.
56001008	Wazira, ali nʼokubba ngʼamaite okwaniriza abageni, era ngʼataka abakola ebisa, nga yeegendereza, nga atuukiriire, nga mweru, era nga yeefuga omu bintu byʼamasanyu.
56001009	Ali nʼokubba muntu agumira oku bibono ebyʼamazima agʼenjegesya yaiswe ngʼowebabimwegeserye, kaisi ayezye okusonzolera abantu enjegesya entuuce, era nʼokulaga engeri abo abagyakanisya egibagotamu.
56001010	Waliwo bangi abajeemu, abakola gwa kulaaduuka nga batumula ebya bubbeyi, eino eino abo abakoba bati abaikirirya kibeetaagisya okusengererya eiteeka lyʼeKiyudaaya erya kukomola. Batumula ebinambulamu nga bataka abantu babiikiririryemu.
56001011	Abo basaaniire kubasirica, olwakubba bagotesya buli moiza abba omu kisito ekibaingiramu nga beegesya abantu ebitaiza olwa kutaka okusuna empiiya omu ngeri embiibbi.
56001012	Omoiza oku banyere abo, era nga yeeyeta naabbi waabwe, yakobere ati, “Abʼoku kizinga kyʼe Kuleete bulijo omu kubbeya beekansa; bisolo ebya kabbikabbi, era baluvu, era bagayaali.”
56001013	Neye era, ekiyakobere kituuce. Nʼolwekyo, oli nʼokubanenyanga nʼamaani, kaisi oolwo babbe nʼenjikirirya entuuce ezwa omu nseega ensa.
56001014	Nga tibateeka emyoyo gyabwe ku bifumo byʼeKiyudaaya ebyobubbeyi ooba ku mateeka abantu abo abagaana amazima egibagunjire-obugunji.
56001015	Eeri abalongoole omu myoyo, buli kintu kibba kirongoole. Neye eeri abo aboonoonoki omu myoyo nʼabataikirirya, mwibo timubbaamu kikenene naire, olwakubba tobona ngʼobuwongo bwabwe nʼebiseego byabwe bibba byayonoonekere ira.
56001016	Omu bʼengeri eyo mutira okubbaamu nʼabo abeetwala bati bamaite oKibbumba neye ngʼomu bibakola nʼengeri egibeebityamu balagira nakimo ngʼowebamwegaana. Bakoli bʼebya muliko era bajeemu; tibasaanira mulimo omusa waire gumo.
56002001	Neye iwe Tito, oyegesyenge ebyo ebyabirana nʼenjegesya entuuce, nga oomwo niimwo omuli:
56002002	Okwegesyanga abasaiza abakulu babbenge bantu abateeki omu biseego, nʼabebawa ekitiisya, nʼabeegendereza, era abatuukiriire omu kwikirirya, nʼomu kutaka, nʼomu okuguminkiriza.
56002003	Abakali abakulu bona obeegesyenge otyo. Babbenge nʼempisa egisaanira abantu ba Kibbumba, nga tibasibirirya oku banaabwe, era nga tibagalama bʼomwenge. Bali nʼokwegesyanga bintu ebisa, nga kwoteekere okwebityanga ngʼekyokuboneraku,
56002004	kaisi beezyenge okwegesya abakali abankafumbirwanga okutakanga abaibaabwe nʼabaana baabwe.
56002005	Obeegesyenge okubba bantu abeefuga, nʼababulaku akamogo. Babbenge bantu abakola okusani emirimo omu bisito byabwe, era abeegendereza, nʼabakuuma ebyama byʼomu nyumba. Era babbenge tibalendi, abamaite okutuukirirya emirimo gyabwe omu kisito, era abagondera abaibaabwe, kaisi awo abataikirirya oYesu bakayenge awokusinzirira okuzumirira ekibono kya Kibbumba.
56002006	Abaisuka bona obalaabbirenge okubba abeegendereza.
56002007	Era iwe wena onyere, oli nʼokubba kyokuboneraku omu byoyegesya na mu buli kintu ekyokola, ngʼoli muntu omucaati atayuugayuuga era owa mazima omu enjegesya yʼenjikiriryayo.
56002008	Buli ekyotumula kiri nʼokubba kituuce, nga mpaamu kibakunenya, kaisi oyo akyakanisya aswale olwa kutabba nʼekibbikibbi ekyatutumulaku.
56002009	Oyegesyenge abagalama okuwuliranga abasengwa baabwe, nga beefuda okubona ngʼabasengwa baabwe babasiima mu buli kintu, era nga tibaakanisya basengwa baabwe,
56002010	ooba okubaibbaku ebyabwe. Balagenge abasengwa baabwe bati bali nʼobwesigwa obwizulye, kaisi abantu oolwo basiime enjegesya ya Kibbumba oMulokoli waiswe.
56002011	Olwakubba oKibbumba yalagire ati wʼekisa eri abantu bonabona, yateekerewo enzira ya kulokola buli moiza aikirirya.
56002012	Era ekisa ekyo kitubbeera okwega okuzwa oku bintu ebitaweesya oKibbumba ekitiisya nʼamasanyu gʼekyalo, kaisi tubbe bantu abeegendereza. Era tubbe bantu abacaati abatayuugayuuga, era abawa oKibbumba ekitiisya omu mulembe gunu.
56002013	Era tubbe nga buli kiseera tukuumiriire lunaku oolwo olwa suubi waiswe owʼenkabi, okwo nga niikwo okuboneka kwʼekitiisya okwa Kibbumba owʼamaani era oMulokoli waiswe oYesu Kurisito.
56002014	OKurisito yeewaireyo okufa okulwaiswe kaisi atununule omu bibbibibbi byaiswe byonabyona, atusuuce abantube abakenene omu myoyo, era abamaliriire okukolanga ebintu ebisa ebyataka.
56002015	Ebyo niibyo ebyobba oyegesyenge. Era owoobba ngʼolaabba ooba ngʼonenya abaikirirya bonabona aboolabirira, okikolenge nʼobwezye bwonabwona. Tiwaabbangawo kadi moiza mwibo atwala ati ebibono ebyoyegesya tibikulu.
56003001	Oyewukiryenge abaikiririrya omu Yesu ibo okuwanga ekitiisya abafugi nʼabʼobwezye, era babagonderenge, era babbenge beetegeki okukolanga buli kikole ekisa kyonakyona.
56003002	Obasisiitire okutatumulanga bundi oku muntu kadi moiza, era beewalenge oyombo; nga balumirwa abantu bonabona. Era, bawenge buli muntu ekitiisya,
56003003	olwakubba swena abanyere eira twabbaire basirusiru, era bajeemu, era ngʼatuli bagalama eeri okwegomba okubbikubbi nʼamasanyu aga buli ngeri. Twabbaire bʼeitima era abaizwire ensaalwa, ngʼabandi batucaawire, era nga swena abananyere tucawagana.
56003004	Neye oKibbumba oMulokoli waiswe, omu kutulaga ekisa nʼokutakakwe okwatakamu abantu,
56003005	yatulokoire, tirwokubba nʼebikole ebisa ebitwakolere, wazira lwa kusaasirakwe. Yatulokoire ngʼakolesya kutuwa bwomi obuyaaka oMwoyo oMweru obwaleetawo omu muntu owetwikirirya oYesu.
56003006	Omwoyo oyo niiye oguyatuwaire nʼomwoyo gumo ngʼabita omu Yesu Kurisito oMulokoli waiswe.
56003007	Ekyo yakikolere kaisi atutooleku omusango atutukulye olwʼekisaakye, tusuuke basika bʼebintu bya Kibbumba, era nga tusuubira obwomi obutawaawo obuyatusuubizire.
56003008	Ekyo ekintumulaku kituuce. Era ebyo ntaka obikakasirenge nakimo, kaisi abaikirirya oKibbumba beegumyenge kukola bikole ebisaaniire oKibbumba. Ebyo niibyo ebisa era ebigasa abantu.
56003009	Neye weewalenge empaka egyʼekisirusiru, nʼokwakana oku bikwata oku nkalala gyʼamaliina gʼabazeiza bʼabantu abʼeira, era nʼoku bikwata oku Mateeka ga Musa. Ekyo kityo olwakubba ebiri ngʼebyo bibula kibibagasa, era bya bwereere.
56003010	Omuntu aleetera abainaye okwawukana, owoomulabulanga omulundi ogusooka, tete nʼogwokubiri, awo ngʼomuzweraku nakimo.
56003011	Ekyo kityo olwakubba obba okitegeera-butegeeri oti omuntu owengeri eyo abba muntu akola ebibbibibbi eyaliibire ebiseego, era ngʼebikolebye bimalire okumusalira omusango okumusinga.
56003012	Owenalikusindikira Aliteema ooba oTukiko, oyanguwangaku okwiza egyendi omu kibuga kyʼe Nikopooli ngʼebiseera byʼogumpunga nʼokutambula nga kugosi bikaali okutuuka, olwakubba eeyo niiyo eginsalirewo okumalira emyeri egyo.
56003013	Okole kyonakyona ekyoyezya obbeere oZeena omukugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa nʼApolo okwetegekera olugendo lwabwe, beezye okusunabuli kimo ekibeetaaga okukolesya omu lugendo oolwo.
56003014	Oyegesyenge abaikirirya aboolabirira beege okwekoleranga emirimo omu batoolanga ebibakolesya omu bwomi bwabwe. Tibaabbanga awo nga babula kintu ekisa kadi kimo ekibagasa abantu abandi.
56003015	Bonabona abali na nze bakusugiirye. Otusugirirye bonabona abatutaka, abetufaanana omu njikirirya. OKibbumba akukwatirenge ekisa.
57001001	Ninze oPawulo ogubasibire olwa kuweererya oKurisito oYesu. Nkusugiirye iwe Firimooni, nʼomwonyoko waiswe omu Yesu, Afiya, nʼAlikipo alwanikanira aamo na iswe omu buweererya, nʼekanisa ekumbaanira omu nyumbayo. Era nʼoTemuseewo owoluganda omu Yesu, yena abasugiirye.
57001003	Tubatakirya enkabi nʼeidembe ebizwa eeri oKibbumba oItewaiswe, nʼoMusengwa oYesu Kurisito. Nkuwandiikira iwe oFirimooni omutake, era omuweererya omunaiswe.
57001004	Buli owenkusabira, neebalya oKibbumba wange,
57001005	olwakubba bankobera ngʼoweweesiga eino oMusengwa oYesu, era ngʼowootaka eino nʼabatuukirirye bonabona.
57001006	Era nsaba oKibbumba nti, okukolera aamokwo nʼabaikirirya abandi omu kwikiriryakwo, kukwezyesye okumanyira nakimo ebisa byonabyona ebitusunira omu Kurisito.
57001007	Woluganda, nsiima ino okutakakwo, era ni nsangaala ino, olwakubba wairiryemu emyoyo gyʼabatuukirirye amaani.
57001008	Kale newankubbaire nze, ngʼomuweererya wa Kurisito, nandyezyerye okukulagira ekyosaaniire okukola,
57001009	neye okutaka okundi nakwo eeri iwe kugira ni nkwegairira-bwegairiri. Omu ngeri eyo, nze ngʼoPawulo, omutume wa Kurisito Yesu, era atyanu omusibe olwa kuweererya oKurisito Yesu,
57001010	nkwegairira olwa Onesimo eyasuukire mwana wange omu Kurisito nga ndi omu busibe.
57001011	Eira yabbaire takugasa, neye atyanu atugasa swenaswena, iwe na nze.
57001012	Mmusindika aire egyoli neye nga mmutaka ekibitiriire.
57001013	Nanditakire mbe naye aanu, ambeere omu kifookyo, omu busibe obundimu olwʼaMawuliro aMasa.
57001014	Neye tinatakire kukola kintu kadi kimo ngʼekyo, nga toikiriirye. Ntaka ekintu ekisa ekyokola okikolere mu kwetakirya, neye tinga nkukakire-bukaki.
57001015	Kyezya okubba ngʼekyagirire Onesimo nʼakwawukanaku akaseera akatono, kwabbaire kuleetawo ngeri egyoyezya okumweirirya abbe aamo na iwe emirembe nʼemirembe.
57001016	Era atyanu nga takaali mugalama-bugalama, wazira nga wʼebbeeyi okukiraku omugalama; nga woluganda omutake, eino eino eeri nze. Kaisi eeri iwe kikiraku nʼaawo, olwakubba yakugasa ngʼakuweererya, tete era nʼomu bya Mwoyo, atyanu mugandawo.
57001017	Kale, abba nga ndi mwinawo, oyanirize Onesimo ngʼowewandinjanirizire.
57001018	Abba ngʼaliku nʼekiyakusoberye, ooba ngʼoliku nʼekyomubanza, ebyo byonabyona obiteeke ku ninze.
57001019	Nze oPawulo mpandiikire nʼengalo eyange enanyerenyeere nti nze nalisasula, newankubbaire ngʼomaite oti wena nkubanza. Ekyo kityo olwakubba nakolere kinene okukubbeera okubba omu Yesu.
57001020	Kale woluganda, ntaka nkusunemu omugaso omu Musengwa oku nsonga eyo, era omwoyo gwange ogwiryemu amaani omu Kurisito.
57001021	Olwakubba mmaite ngʼompulira, nkuwandikiire nga nesiga nti wakola ekinkoba, nʼebindi ebikira kwekyo ekinkusabire.
57001022	Era ekindi, ontegekere awokugona, olwakubba nsuubira nti olwʼokusaba kwanywe, banteera ni njira egimuli.
57001023	Epafula, omusibe omunange olwa Kurisito oYesu, akusugiirye.
57001024	Era oMaako, nʼEsitaluuko, nʼoDeema, era nʼoLuuka abaweererya abanange bona bakusugiirye.
57001025	Enkabi gya Musengwa oYesu Kurisito gibbenge na inywe.
58001001	Eira, oKibbumba yatumulanga nʼabazeiza baiswe emirundi nʼemirundi era omu ngeri enyingi ngʼabitira mu banaabbi.
58001002	Neye omu biseera ebyaiswe binu ebyʼenkomerero atumwire na iswe kubitira mu Mwanawe, oguyalondere okuwa obusika bwa buli kimo, era oguyabitiiremu okubbumba ekyalo.
58001003	Mwiye niimwo okwasya kwʼekitiisya kya Kibbumba omu kweraga, era mwiye mutubonera enfaanana ya Kibbumba enanyere. Niiye abbesyawo buli kimo nʼamaani gʼekibonokye. Oweyamalire okutunaabyaku ebibbibibbi byaiswe, nʼatyama omwigulu nʼoKibbumba onyere oBwezye omu kifo kyʼekitiisya eino.
58001004	OMwana oyo ekitegeeza, oKibbumba yamusuucirye owʼamaani eino okukiraku abamalaika omu ngeri nti, ekitiisya ekiyamuwaire ekyʼokubba oMwanawe kikira ekyabwe.
58001005	Aale naani oku bamalaika oKibbumba oguyabbaire akobereku ati: “Oli Mwana wange, olwatyanu nnangirira nti ndi Iteewo?” Ooba ati: “Nalibba ninze oIteeye, yena nʼabba Mwana wange?”
58001006	Kaisi tete era, oKibbumba oweyabbaire yatira okusindika oMwanawe omubere oku kyalo, yakobere ati: “Abamalaika ba Kibbumba bonabona bamusinzenge.”
58001007	Owaabba atumula ku bamalaika, oKibbumba akoba ati: “Asuuca abamalaikabe ooti mpewo, era abaweereryabe ooti nnimi gya musyo.”
58001008	Neye owekituuka oku Mwanawe, oKibbumba akoba ati: “Oli Kibbumba wena, era obwakabakabwo bwakubbaawo emirembe nʼemirembe. Okufugakwo omu bwakabakabwo kutambulira ku bwenkanya.
58001009	Otaka ebikole byʼobutuukirirye, nʼocaawa ebikole ebibbibibbi. Kagira zena, nze oKibbumbawo, nkusukireku amafuta ni nkuwa eisangaalo eryʼekitiisya ekikira ekyʼabandi bonabona.”
58001010	Era oKibbumba yakobere ati: “Iwe Musengwa niiwe omu ntandiika eedi eyakomekere omusingi ekyalo oku kyemereire, era nʼeigulu niiwe onyere eyalibbumbireyo.
58001011	Ebyo ibyo byalijigirika ni biwaawo, neye iwe oli wa kubbaawo emirembe nʼemirembe. Byonabyona byalikairira ni biwaamu ngʼekizwalo.
58001012	Walibiringaku ngʼowebalingaku eijoola, era byalicucuka ni bicuuka ooti kizwalo ekikaire owekicucuka. Neye iwe osigala kyekimo, era tocuukaku, era nʼobwomibwo tibwalikoma.”
58001013	Neye aale naani oku bamalaika oKibbumba ogwakobangaku ati: “Otyame ngʼondiraine oku lubba lwange olwʼengalo endiiro, paka owenaligondya abalabebo ni mbasuuca mukonkolo gwa kuwuumuliryaku ebigerebyo?”
58001014	Neso abamalaika nago niikyo eniki? Aale tiniigyo emyoyo gyonagyona egiweererya oKibbumba, egyo egyatuma okubbeera abo abalisuna okubalokola?
58002001	Nʼolwekyo tusaaniire twekalangulire oku njegesya egitwasunire, kaisi awo tuleke okugizwaku.
58002002	Nti kyazuukire ngʼobukwenda bwa Kibbumba abamalaika obubaleetere owebuli nʼobukakafu. Era, abo bonabona abanandi babwabiraku nʼabagaine okubukwata basunire ekibonerezo ekibasaanira.
58002003	Kaisi tete oolwo iswe? Twalyezya tutya aale okulama okutubonereza ngʼowekitusaanire swena, singa titwateekeyo omwoyo oku bukwenda obukwata oku kulokoka obwʼamaanimaani obutyo? Obukwenda obwo, oMusengwa onyere niiye eyasookere okubumanyikisya abantu, era abo abawuliire ngʼabumanyikisya babukakasire egituli ngʼowebuli bwʼamazima.
58002004	Era oKibbumba yeeyongeire okukakasa obukwenda bwabwe okubita omu bumanyiciryo, nʼebyewunyo, nʼebyamagero ebitali bimo, era nʼokugaba ebirabo bya Mwoyo oMweru, okusinzirira oku kutakakwe.
58002005	Nti okufuga ekyalo ekyo ekiiza okubbaawo omu maiso, ekyo ekituli kutumulaku, oKibbumba tiyakukwatisirye bamalaika.
58002006	Neye era, eeriyo awantu omu Biwandiike egikiijulira, nga waliwo akoba ati: “Omuntu-obuntu niki-so ekyabbaire ekigira iwe, Kibbumba nʼomufaaku, ekigira nʼomulumirwa?
58002007	Wamukolere nʼabba, okumala akaseera katyayi kati, ngʼabulwaku okwagaagana abamalaika; nʼomutiikira engule eyʼekitiisya nʼokugulumalya.
58002008	Ebintu byonabyona wabiteekere ansi wʼobwezyebwe.” Atyanu, omu kuteeka ebintu byonabyona ansi wʼobwezyebwe, oKibbumba mpaawo kintu kadi kimo ekyatamukwatisirye okufuga. Neye era wona nʼatyanu, titubona ngʼebintu byonabyona biri ansi wʼobwezyebwe.
58002009	Wazira ogutubona Yesu, iye oyo ogubakolere nʼabba, okumala akaseera katyayi kati, ngʼabulwaku okwagaagana abamalaika. Era, atyanu niiye ogubatiikiire obugulumali nʼekitiisya olwakubba yabitire omu kufa kaisi, olwʼekisa kya Kibbumba, ayezye okufeererera abantu bonabona.
58002010	OKibbumba, eyabbumbire era abbesyawo ebintu byonabyona okululwe, yaboine nga kisaaniire okutuukirirya oYesu kubita mu kugada atuuce abaanabe abangi oku kulokoka, batyo bagabane omu kitiisya.
58002011	Nti abo abebasuuca abatukulye nʼoyo abasuuca abatukulye bonabona oitewaabwe niiye omoiza onyere oyo. Kagira oYesu tikimukwatisya nsoni okubeeta aboluganda.
58002012	Akoba ati: “Nalimanyikisya obukulu bwʼeriinalyo omu boluganda, nalikuwuujira akati omu lukumbaana lwʼabo abakusinza.”
58002013	Era akoba ati: “Nesiganga Kibbumba.” Era ayaba omu maiso nʼakoba ati: “Ngonu ndi aanu aamo nʼabaana oKibbumba abeyampaire.”
58002014	Nʼolwekyo, ngʼowekiri kiti abo oYesu abaayeta abaana, bantu abali mu mubiri, yena yeezwalisirye omubiri nʼasuuka muntu nga ibo. Eyo niiyo engeri yonkani egiyeezyeryemu okufa. Era, okubita omu kufa niiyo engeri yonkani omu yeezyeirye okujigirica amaani ga Sitaani, iye aali nʼobwezye oku kufa.
58002015	Nʼomu ngeri eyo, nʼataisulya abo bonabona ababbaire omu obwomi bwabwe bwonabwona omu bugalama obwʼokutya okufa.
58002016	Nti omu butuuce obunyere tiyaiziriire kubbeera bamalaika wazira baizukulu ba Ibbulaimu.
58002017	Nʼolwekyo yabbaire nʼokubbeera nakimo pulu ngʼabolugandabe mu buli ngeri, kaisi abbe kabona akira obukulu owʼekisa era omwesigwa omu kuweereryakwe omu maiso ga Kibbumba, okuwaayo esadaaka odenge eyasoniyisya abantu ebikole byabwe ebibbibibbi.
58002018	Era atyanu ayezya okubbeera abo ababita omu bikemo, olwakubba yena onyere yabitireku omu bikemo aamo nʼokugada.
58003001	Kale boluganda omu Kurisito era abeeru abeyayeteire obwomi bwʼomwigulu, muteeke ebiseego byanywe ku Yesu omutume wa Kibbumba, era okabona akira obukulu owʼenjikirirya yaiswe.
58003002	Yabbaire mwesigwa eeri oKibbumba, eyamulondere okukola omulimo ogwo, dala ngʼoMusa oweyabbaire omwesigwa omu kuweererya abantu ba Kibbumba bonabona.
58003003	Atyanu, oKibbumba niiye eyakolere buli kimo okubba ngʼowekiri. Kintu kimanye kiti buli nyumba ebbaawo wabba waliwo eyagyombekere. Kale, ngʼomwombeki wʼenyumba owaabba nʼekitiisya ekikira ekyʼenyumba egyayombekere, nʼoYesu atyo webamutwala okubba asaaniire ekitiisya ekikiraku ekya Musa.
58003005	OMusa yabbaire mwesigwa ngʼomuweererya omu nyumba ya Kibbumba okumalaku, ngʼakakasa abantu baamu ebyo oKibbumba ebiyalitumula omu maiso eeyo.
58003006	NʼoKurisito yena atyo weyabbaire omwesigwa wazira ngʼoMwana akulira enyumba ya Kibbumba. Era, iswe niiswe enyumba ya Kibbumba nago, kasita twasigala bulijo nga tuli bacaati era nga tuli nʼosuubi oyo ogutwenyumirizaamu.
58003007	Kale ngʼoMwoyo oMweru owaakoba, “Olwatyanu, owemwawulira eigono lya Kibbumba,
58003008	timwakakanyalya emyoyo gyanywe ngʼabazeiza baanywe owebakolere oku lunaku oKibbumba oluyabagezeseirye omu kitera.
58003009	OKibbumba yakobere ati: ‘Eeyo, bankemere ni bangezesya, waire nga babbaire baboine ebikulu ebinakolere okumala emyanka 40.’
58003010	Kagira zena nanyiigire olwʼabantu abʼomulembe ogwo, ni nkoba nti, ‘Emyoyo gyabwe gitamaatama ni gigota okunzwaku, tibategeera enkola gyange egimbakoba okukoleraku.’
58003011	Nʼolwekyo, niiwo okunyiiga ni ntuuka nʼokwerima nti, ‘Tibalituuka kadi omu kifo omu nankabaweereire ekiwuumulo.’ ”
58003012	Kale, boluganda, aale mugenderere kaisi tiwaabbaawo kadi moiza kwinywe abba nʼomwoyo omubbimubbi era omukakanyali ogutaikirirya, nʼazwa oku Kibbumba onyere obwomi.
58003013	Wazira, bulijo mwiryanganengemu amaani kasita ni kubba nga kukaali “Lwatyanu,” kaisi waleke okubbaawo waire moiza kwinywe, ekibbikibbi ogukibbeyabbeya nʼakakanyalya omwoyogwe eeri oKibbumba.
58003014	Tusuuka bantu abali omu bumo nʼoKurisito singa twekalangula tutyo paka ku nkomerero omu bwesigwa obutwabbaire nabwo nga twankatandiikanga okwikirirya.
58003015	NgʼeKiwandiike owekikoba: “Olwatyanu owemwawulira eigono lya Kibbumba, timwakakanyalya emyoyo gyanywe, ngʼabazeiza baanywe owebakolere.”
58003016	Atyanu, aale banaani abo abawuliire eigonolye neye ni bamutenguwa? Tibaabo bonabona oMusa abeyeekubbembeire okubatoola omu Misiri?
58003017	Era, aale banaani abo oKibbumba abeyasunguwaliire okumala emyanka 40? Tibabbaire baabo ababbengere omu maisoge, abo abafiire, emirambo gyabwe ni gisigala omu kitera?
58003018	Era, aale banaani abo abeyalairiire ati tiyalibaganya okwema ekigere omu kifo ekiyabbaire abategekeire ati mubaliwuumulira? Tibaabo abamutenguwire?
58003019	Kale mwekyo tubona tuti bakayire okutuuka omu kifo oKibbumba ekiyabbaire abategekeire okuwuumuliramu, lwa kutaikirirya kwabwe.
58004001	Ekisuubize kya Kibbumba ekyʼokutuuca abantube omu kifo omu yabaweera ekiwuumulo kikaali kiriwo. Nʼolwekyo, twegendereze tiwaabbaawo kwinywe akaya okutuuka omu kifo ekyʼekiwuumulo ekyo.
58004002	Nti swena aMawuliro aMasa agetwawuliire niigo aganyere ago aBaisirairi agebawuliire. Okutoolaku nti, ibo ebibawuliire tibyabagasire olwakubba waire bagawuliire, tibagaikiririiryemu.
58004003	Atyanu iswe abaikiririrya omu Yesu, niiswe abaingira omu kifo kyʼekiwuumulo ekyo, olwakubba eeri abataikirirya, oKibbumba yakobere ati: “Nʼolwekyo, niiwo okunyiiga ni ntuuka nʼokwerima nti, ‘Tibalituuka kadi omu kifo omu nankabaweereire ekiwuumulo.’ ” OKibbumba ekyo yakitumwire waire nga yabbaire yamaliriirye omulimogwe, ekikoba nti, ngʼokubbumba ekyalo kwabbaire kuwoire.
58004004	Tukitwala tutyo olwakubba omu Biwandiike ebyeru waliwo egikitumulira oku lunaku olwomusanvu kiti: “Oku lunaku olwomusanvu oKibbumba nʼawuumula okuzwa oku mirimogye gyonagyona.”
58004005	Era tete, ananyere awo oKibbumba akoba ati: “Tibalituuka kadi omu kifo omu nankabaweereire ekiwuumulo.”
